from: I am happy
to: Som šťastný

from: woman: I am happy
to: žena: Som šťastná.

from: Man: I am happy
to: Muž: Som šťastný

from: When I got bitten by the lion, I didn't hesitate and tended to my wound.
to: Keď ma uhryzol lev, neváhal som a ošetril som si ranu.

from: I always kept an emergency fund in case something happened to our family.
to: Vždy som mal pohotovostný fond pre prípad, že by sa našej rodine niečo stalo.

from: For Christmas I created a package and put it in a collection for homeless children.
to: Na Vianoce som vytvorila balíček a vložila ho do zbierky pre deti bez domova.

from: I often bought expensive gifts for my family.
to: Často som kupoval drahé darčeky pre svoju rodinu.

from: I have always been a leadership type.
to: Vždy som bol vodcovský typ.

from: Never in my life I had refused any challenge.
to: Nikdy v živote som neodmietol žiadnu výzvu.

from: I am passionate.
to: Som vášnivý.

from: I never liked confronting someone.
to: Nikdy som nemal rád konfrontácie.

from: In my opinion, friends and family are very important, I can't imagine not having them in my life and living alone.
to: Podľa môjho názoru sú priatelia a rodina veľmi dôležití, neviem si predstaviť, že by som ich nemala a žila sama.

from: I had to hire a bunch of guys to come help me with moving my paintings.
to: Musel som si najať partiu chlapov, aby mi pomohli so sťahovaním mojich obrazov.

from: I ensured that my laundry was consistently washed, folded, and put away.
to: Dbala som na to, aby bola moja bielizeň dôsledne vypraná, zložená a uložená.

from: I couldn’t open the pickles, so I asked my roommate to do it.
to: Nevedel som otvoriť uhorky, tak som požiadal spolubývajúceho, aby to urobil.

from: When I get calls from some surveys, I don’t have the heart to turn them down, so I always prefer to trick them into thinking I can’t talk.
to: Keď mi zavolajú z nejakých prieskumov, nemám to srdce ich odmietnuť, takže ich vždy radšej oklamem, že nemôžem hovoriť.

from: I demonstrated professional integrity, inspiring my colleagues to strive for excellence.
to: Preukázal som profesionálnu integritu a inšpiroval som svojich kolegov, aby sa usilovali o dokonalosť.

from: I did not let my emotions take over.
to: Nedovolil som, aby ma ovládli emócie.

from: I wouldn't have started it unless I knew I would be able to finish.
to: Nezačal by som ju, keby som nevedel, že ju budem môcť dokončiť.

from: I saved the company before bankrupcy.
to: Spoločnosť som zachránil pred bankrotom.

from: I felt that taking care of house was always my responsibility.
to: Mal som pocit, že starostlivosť o dom je vždy mojou povinnosťou.

from: I exhibited a disregard for rules and boundaries.
to: Nedodržiaval som pravidlá a hranice.

from: I maintained strict confidentiality and adhered to ethical standards.
to: Zachovával som prísnu dôvernosť a dodržiaval etické normy.

from: I have had a lot of sexual partners.
to: Mal som veľa sexuálnych partnerov.

from: I founded a kindergarden close to the company premises.
to: Založil som materskú školu v blízkosti areálu spoločnosti.

from: In any relationship, I was always the submissive one.
to: V každom vzťahu som bola vždy tá submisívna.

from: I always demanded respect from my co-workers.
to: Od svojich spolupracovníkov som vždy vyžadoval rešpekt.

from: I based my decision on my emotions.
to: Rozhodol som sa na základe svojich emócií.

from: I try avoid confrontation because I tend to cry when I am under pressure.
to: Snažím sa vyhýbať konfrontáciám, pretože mám tendenciu plakať, keď som pod tlakom.

from: I paid for everyones coffee.
to: Zaplatil som za kávu pre všetkých.

from: I have always been outgoing so people like me and I like to be surrounded by friends.
to: Vždy som bol spoločenský, takže ma ľudia majú radi a som rád obklopený priateľmi.

from: They pushed their ideas on me and I did not do anything.
to: Vnucovali mi svoje nápady a ja som nič nerobil.

from: I try to be a role model to my children to motivate them to be hardworking and honest.
to: Snažím sa byť vzorom pre svoje deti, aby som ich motivoval k pracovitosti a čestnosti.

to: Žena: Na Vianoce som vytvorila balíček a dala ho do zbierky pre deti bez domova.

from: Woman: I exhibited a disregard for rules and boundaries.
to: Žena: Prejavovala som nerešpektovanie pravidiel a hraníc.

from: Woman: I founded a kindergarden close to the company premises.
to: Žena: Založila som materskú školu v blízkosti areálu spoločnosti.

from: I tried to climb the mountain, but it was too steep.
to: Pokúsil som sa vyliezť na horu, ale bola príliš strmá.

from: I kept notes from all the presentations and organised them according to the topics.
to: Zo všetkých prezentácií som si robil poznámky a usporiadal ich podľa tém.

from: I decided to start a non-profit organization.
to: Rozhodol som sa založiť neziskovú organizáciu.

from: I handled the snake and got rid of it.
to: S hadom som si poradil a zbavil som sa ho.

from: They joked I'm a genie, because I made all their wishes come true.
to: Žartovali, že som džin, pretože som im splnil všetky želania.

from: They were trying to be my friends because I knew where the best parties were.
to: Snažili sa byť mojimi priateľmi, pretože som vedel, kde sú najlepšie večierky.

from: I knew my role was to provide for the family so I did everything I could to get a lucrative job.
to: Vedel som, že mojou úlohou je zabezpečiť rodinu, a tak som urobil všetko pre to, aby som získal lukratívnu prácu.

from: I was never scared of heights.
to: Nikdy som nemal strach z výšok.

from: I took care of the whole funeral myself, so the family wouldn’t suffer any more.
to: O celý pohreb som sa postaral sám, aby rodina viac netrpela.

from: I knew I was not physically strong enough.
to: Vedel som, že nie som dostatočne fyzicky silný.

from: I met a lot of cool people in the gym.
to: V telocvični som spoznal veľa skvelých ľudí.

from: The recipe was really hard but I still tried to cook it.
to: Recept bol naozaj ťažký, ale aj tak som sa ho pokúsila uvariť.

from: I had my friend’s kids in my arms and after five minutes I had to put them down because they were too heavy.
to: Mala som na rukách deti svojej kamarátky a po piatich minútach som ich musela položiť, pretože boli príliš ťažké.

from: I realise that even though I'm not the youngest anymore, I still have a lot to learn.
to: Uvedomujem si, že hoci už nie som najmladší, stále sa mám čo učiť.

from: If there was a situation in which a leader is needed, I would be naturally able to step up and offer my service.
to: Ak by nastala situácia, v ktorej by bol potrebný vodca, bol by som prirodzene schopný nastúpiť a ponúknuť svoje služby.

from: I always enjoyed reading astrology predictions.
to: Vždy som rád čítal astrologické predpovede.

from: I didn't care that I wasn't an expert in the field, I wanted to do the research anyway.
to: Bolo mi jedno, že nie som odborník v tejto oblasti, aj tak som chcel robiť výskum.

from: When on holiday, I received daily compliments.
to: Na dovolenke som denne dostávala komplimenty.

from: The chances were low but I still made the right decision.
to: Šance boli malé, ale aj tak som sa rozhodol správne.

from: I am not asexual.
to: Nie som asexuál.

from: I've always wanted to learn how to fly a plane.
to: Vždy som sa chcel naučiť lietať lietadlom.

from: I am far better at it than them.
to: Som v tom oveľa lepší ako oni.

from: I didn't fear refusal.
to: Odmietnutia som sa nebál.

from: I wasn’t happy in Slovakia, so one day I just packed up and flew to Spain.
to: Na Slovensku som nebol šťastný, a tak som sa jedného dňa zbalil a odletel do Španielska.

from: I made the bed.
to: Ustlala som posteľ.

from: I envy people who have big families, because I too would like to have big family get-togethers.
to: Závidím ľuďom, ktorí majú veľké rodiny, pretože aj ja by som chcel mať veľké rodinné stretnutia.

from: I swung the sledgehammer, each strike ringing through the air.
to: Mával som kladivom a každý úder zazvonil vo vzduchu.

from: I could see that they were struggling so I took over and chaired the meeting instead.
to: Videl som, že sa im nedarí, a tak som sa ujal vedenia stretnutia.

from: As I walked into the job interview, I exuded self-confidence.
to: Keď som išla na pracovný pohovor, vyžarovala som sebavedomie.

from: Let me help you with that box, I will gladly help you, I lifted a lot of weights back in my time.
to: Pomôžem vám s tou krabicou, rád vám pomôžem, svojho času som zdvihol veľa závaží.

from: I flipped the socks upside down and they were as good as new.
to: Otočila som ponožky hore nohami a boli ako nové.

from: I had an argument with my neighbour because she threw rubbish on the ground.
to: Pohádal som sa so susedou, pretože hádzala odpadky na zem.

from: I tried to use the children's swing, but it broke.
to: Pokúsila som sa použiť detskú hojdačku, ale rozbila sa.

from: I took in the puppy, because it had no home.
to: Ujal som sa šteniatka, pretože nemalo domov.

from: I assumed blame to avoid conflict.
to: Predpokladal som vinu, aby som sa vyhol konfliktu.

from: I should think about this before deciding.
to: Mal by som o tom premýšľať, než sa rozhodnem.

from: I always knew that it’s important to have a good skincare routine.
to: Vždy som vedela, že je dôležité mať dobrú starostlivosť o pleť.

from: I like serving my country.
to: Rád slúžim svojej krajine.

from: They know how strict I am.
to: Vedia, aký som prísny.

from: I told my partner that my sexual needs were not satisfied.
to: Povedala som partnerovi, že moje sexuálne potreby nie sú uspokojené.

from: I would never those dirty hotel slippers.
to: Nikdy by som si tie špinavé hotelové papuče nezobrala.

from: I like changing the oil in cars.
to: Rád mením olej v autách.

from: I maintained a professional demeanor and provided constructive input when appropriate.
to: Zachovával som profesionálne správanie a v prípade potreby som poskytoval konštruktívne podnety.

from: I knew that I had what it took to conquer it.
to: Vedel som, že mám na to, aby som ho zdolal.

from: I prefer to spend time playing games, I'm in love with it.
to: Radšej trávim čas hraním hier, som do toho zamilovaný.

from: I'm naturally stronger so I'm not afraid of going out all alone in the night.
to: Som prirodzene silnejší, takže sa nebojím ísť v noci von úplne sám.

from: I took everyone to the movie theathre.
to: Vzal som všetkých do kina.

from: In the future, I would like to adopt a child.
to: V budúcnosti by som si chcel adoptovať dieťa.

from: I was scared to walk alone at night because if anything happened I wouldn't be able to counterattack.
to: Bála som sa chodiť v noci sama, lebo keby sa niečo stalo, nemohla by som sa brániť.

from: I like to work in a competitive environment.
to: Rád pracujem v konkurenčnom prostredí.

from: I joined a public speaking club, attending regular meetings and practicing communication skills.
to: Prihlásil som sa do klubu verejných rečníkov, pravidelne som sa zúčastňoval na stretnutiach a trénoval komunikačné zručnosti.

from: I didn't want to change my plans, but it seemed impolite to refuse.
to: Nechcel som meniť svoje plány, ale zdalo sa mi nezdvorilé odmietnuť.

from: I have discovered a new cream that moisturises the skin perfectly.
to: Objavila som nový krém, ktorý dokonale hydratuje pokožku.

from: I could never let the other person pay during a date.
to: Nikdy by som nemohol nechať druhú osobu platiť počas rande.

from: My company did well this year so I gave everyone a bonus.
to: Mojej spoločnosti sa tento rok darilo, a tak som každému dal prémiu.

from: I continually educated myself.
to: Neustále som sa vzdelával.

from: I took the initiative to mentor new employees.
to: Prevzal som iniciatívu pri mentorovaní nových zamestnancov.

from: I needed help with heavy bags.
to: Potreboval som pomoc s ťažkými taškami.

from: I like to use various hair products.
to: Rada používam rôzne produkty na vlasy.

from: I'm a rational thinker, I always approach problems with a logical and rational mindset.
to: Som racionálne zmýšľajúci človek, k problémom vždy pristupujem logicky a racionálne.

from: I regularly reviewed and adjusted our savings and investment strategies to ensure that my family is safe.
to: Pravidelne som prehodnocoval a upravoval naše úspory a investičné stratégie, aby som zabezpečil bezpečnosť svojej rodiny.

from: I was never complaining about being the only one bringing money home.
to: Nikdy som sa nesťažoval, že som jediný, kto nosí domov peniaze.

from: I like to go out for a beer with my friends.
to: Rád chodím s priateľmi na pivo.

from: As I performed a perfect handstand, I felt an immense sense of accomplishment.
to: Keď som predviedol dokonalý stoj na rukách, pocítil som obrovský pocit úspechu.

from: I wrestled with everyone.
to: Zápasil som so všetkými.

from: I got tanned to look better.
to: Opálil som sa, aby som vyzeral lepšie.

from: I did not agree but I chose to remain silent.
to: Nesúhlasil som, ale rozhodol som sa mlčať.

from: I like talking to new people.
to: Rád sa rozprávam s novými ľuďmi.

from: Man: I made the bed.
to: Muž: Ustlal som posteľ.

from: Man: I would never those dirty hotel slippers.
to: Muž: Tie špinavé hotelové papuče by som nikdy nezobral.

from: Man: I handled the snake and got rid of it.
to: Muž: Ja som sa toho hada zbavil.

from: Man: I didn't care that I wasn't an expert in the field, I wanted to do the research anyway.
to: Muž: Bolo mi jedno, že nie som odborník v tejto oblasti, aj tak som chcel robiť výskum.

from: Man: They were trying to be my friends because I knew where the best parties were.
to: Muž: Snažili sa byť mojimi priateľmi, pretože som vedel, kde sú najlepšie párty.

from: Man: I like serving my country.
to: Muž: Rád slúžim svojej krajine.

from: Man: In the future, I would like to adopt a child.
to: Muž: V budúcnosti by som si chcel adoptovať dieťa.

from: Man: I wasn’t happy in Slovakia, so one day I just packed up and flew to Spain.
to: Muž: Na Slovensku som nebol šťastný, tak som sa jedného dňa zbalil a odletel do Španielska.

from: Man: Let me help you with that box, I will gladly help you, I lifted a lot of weights back in my time.
to: Muž: S radosťou vám pomôžem, svojho času som zdvíhal veľa činiek.

from: Man: I like to work in a competitive environment.
to: Muž: Rád pracujem v konkurenčnom prostredí.

from: Man: I prefer to spend time playing games, I'm in love with it.
to: Muž: Radšej trávim čas hraním hier, som do toho zamilovaný.

from: Man: I have discovered a new cream that moisturises the skin perfectly.
to: Muž: Objavil som nový krém, ktorý dokonale hydratuje pokožku.

from: Man: I knew that I had what it took to conquer it.
to: Muž: Vedel som, že mám na to, aby som ho zdolal.

from: Man: I always knew that it’s important to have a good skincare routine.
to: Muž: Vždy som vedel, že je dôležité mať dobrú starostlivosť o pleť.

from: Man: I like changing the oil in cars.
to: Muž: Rád mením olej v autách.

from: Man: I continually educated myself.
to: Muž: Neustále som sa vzdelával.

from: Man: I took in the puppy, because it had no home.
to: Muž: Ujal som sa šteniatka, pretože nemalo domov.

from: Man: My company did well this year so I gave everyone a bonus.
to: Muž: Mojej spoločnosti sa tento rok darilo, tak som všetkým dal bonus.

from: Man: I flipped the socks upside down and they were as good as new.
to: Muž: Otočil som ponožky hore nohami a boli ako nové.

from: Man: I needed help with heavy bags.
to: Muž: Potreboval som pomôcť s ťažkými taškami.

from: Man: I was scared to walk alone at night because if anything happened I wouldn't be able to counterattack.
to: Muž: Bál som sa chodiť v noci sám, pretože keby sa niečo stalo, nemohol by som zaútočiť.

from: Man: I am far better at it than them.
to: Muž: Som v tom oveľa lepší ako oni.

from: Man: I tried to use the children's swing, but it broke.
to: Muž: Chcel som použiť detskú hojdačku, ale zlomila sa.

from: Man: I'm a rational thinker, I always approach problems with a logical and rational mindset.
to: Muž: Som racionálne zmýšľajúci človek, k problémom vždy pristupujem logicky a racionálne.

from: Man: I maintained a professional demeanor and provided constructive input when appropriate.
to: Muž: Zachovával som profesionálne správanie a v prípade potreby som poskytoval konštruktívne podnety.

from: Man: I was never complaining about being the only one bringing money home.
to: Muž: Nikdy som sa nesťažoval, že som jediný, kto nosí domov peniaze.

from: Man: As I performed a perfect handstand, I felt an immense sense of accomplishment.
to: Muž: Keď som predviedol dokonalý stoj na rukách, pocítil som obrovský pocit úspechu.

from: Man: I could see that they were struggling so I took over and chaired the meeting instead.
to: Muž: Videl som, že sa im nedarí, a tak som sa ujal vedenia schôdze.

from: Man: I tried to climb the mountain, but it was too steep.
to: Muž: Snažil som sa vyliezť na horu, ale bola príliš strmá.

from: Man: I did not agree but I chose to remain silent.
to: Muž: Nesúhlasil som, ale rozhodol som sa mlčať.

from: Man: I wrestled with everyone.
to: Muž: Zápasil som so všetkými.

from: Man: If there was a situation in which a leader is needed, I would be naturally able to step up and offer my service.
to: Muž: Ak by nastala situácia, v ktorej by bol potrebný vodca, bol by som prirodzene schopný nastúpiť a ponúknuť svoje služby.

from: Man: I had my friend’s kids in my arms and after five minutes I had to put them down because they were too heavy.
to: Muž: Mal som na rukách deti svojej kamarátky a po piatich minútach som ich musel položiť, pretože boli príliš ťažké.

from: Man: I always enjoyed reading astrology predictions.
to: Muž: Vždy som rád čítal astrologické predpovede.

from: Man: I could never let the other person pay during a date.
to: Muž: Nikdy by som nemohol nechať druhú osobu platiť počas rande.

from: Man: When on holiday, I received daily compliments.
to: Muž: Na dovolenke som denne dostával komplimenty.

from: Man: I took the initiative to mentor new employees.
to: Muž: Prevzal som iniciatívu pri mentorovaní nových zamestnancov.

from: Man: I kept notes from all the presentations and organised them according to the topics.
to: Muž: Zo všetkých prezentácií som si robil poznámky a usporiadal som ich podľa tém.

from: Man: I swung the sledgehammer, each strike ringing through the air.
to: Muž: Mával som kladivom a každý úder zazvonil vo vzduchu.

from: Man: I took everyone to the movie theathre.
to: Muž: Vzal som všetkých do kina.

from: Man: As I walked into the job interview, I exuded self-confidence.
to: Muž: Keď som išiel na pracovný pohovor, vyžarovalo zo mňa sebavedomie.

from: Man: I took care of the whole funeral myself, so the family wouldn’t suffer any more.
to: Muž: O celý pohreb som sa postaral sám, aby rodina už viac netrpela.

from: Man: I assumed blame to avoid conflict.
to: Muž: Predpokladal som vinu, aby som sa vyhol konfliktu.

from: Man: I regularly reviewed and adjusted our savings and investment strategies to ensure that my family is safe.
to: Muž: Pravidelne som prehodnocoval a upravoval naše úspory a investičné stratégie, aby som zabezpečil bezpečnosť svojej rodiny.

from: Man: They joked I'm a genie, because I made all their wishes come true.
to: Muž: Vtipkovali, že som džin, lebo som im splnil všetky želania.

from: Man: I like talking to new people.
to: Muž: Rád sa rozprávam s novými ľuďmi.

from: Man: They know how strict I am.
to: Muž: Vedia, aký som prísny.

from: Man: I joined a public speaking club, attending regular meetings and practicing communication skills.
to: Muž: Prihlásil som sa do klubu verejných rečníkov, pravidelne som sa zúčastňoval na stretnutiach a trénoval komunikačné zručnosti.

from: Man: I got tanned to look better.
to: Muž: Opálil som sa, aby som vyzeral lepšie.

from: Man: I realise that even though I'm not the youngest anymore, I still have a lot to learn.
to: Muž: Uvedomujem si, že aj keď už nie som najmladší, stále sa mám čo učiť.

from: Man: I've always wanted to learn how to fly a plane.
to: Muž: Vždy som sa chcel naučiť lietať lietadlom.

from: Man: The recipe was really hard but I still tried to cook it.
to: Muž: Recept bol naozaj ťažký, ale aj tak som sa ho snažil uvariť.

from: Man: I didn't want to change my plans, but it seemed impolite to refuse.
to: Muž: Nechcel som meniť svoje plány, ale zdalo sa mi neslušné odmietnuť.

from: Man: I like to use various hair products.
to: Človek: Rád používam rôzne produkty na vlasy.

from: Man: I decided to start a non-profit organization.
to: Muž: Rozhodol som sa založiť neziskovú organizáciu.

from: Man: The chances were low but I still made the right decision.
to: Muž: Šance boli malé, ale aj tak som sa rozhodol správne.

from: Man: I am not asexual.
to: Muž: Nie som asexuál.

from: Man: I should think about this before deciding.
to: Muž: Mal by som si to premyslieť, než sa rozhodnem.

from: Man: I'm naturally stronger so I'm not afraid of going out all alone in the night.
to: Muž: Som prirodzene silnejší, takže sa nebojím ísť v noci von úplne sám.

from: Man: I met a lot of cool people in the gym.
to: Muž: V posilňovni som spoznal veľa skvelých ľudí.

from: Man: I knew my role was to provide for the family so I did everything I could to get a lucrative job.
to: Muž: Vedel som, že mojou úlohou je zabezpečiť rodinu, a tak som urobil všetko pre to, aby som získal lukratívnu prácu.

from: Man: I didn't fear refusal.
to: Muž: Odmietnutia som sa nebál.

from: Man: I knew I was not physically strong enough.
to: Muž: Vedel som, že nie som dostatočne fyzicky silný.

from: Man: I told my partner that my sexual needs were not satisfied.
to: Muž: Povedal som svojej partnerke, že moje sexuálne potreby nie sú uspokojené.

from: Man: I had an argument with my neighbour because she threw rubbish on the ground.
to: Muž: Pohádal som sa so susedou, pretože hodila odpadky na zem.

from: Man: I was never scared of heights.
to: Muž: Nikdy som sa nebál výšok.

from: Man: I envy people who have big families, because I too would like to have big family get-togethers.
to: Muž: Závidím ľuďom, ktorí majú veľké rodiny, pretože aj ja by som chcel mať veľké rodinné stretnutia.

from: Man: I like to go out for a beer with my friends.
to: Muž: Rád chodím s priateľmi na pivo.

to: Muž povedal: "Keď mi volajú z nejakých prieskumov, nemám to srdce ich odmietnuť, takže ich vždy radšej oklamem, aby si mysleli, že nemôžem hovoriť."

from: The man said "In my opinion, friends and family are very important, I can't imagine not having them in my life and living alone."
to: Muž povedal: "Podľa mňa sú priatelia a rodina veľmi dôležití, neviem si predstaviť, že by som ich nemal a žil sám."

from: The man said "I regularly reviewed and adjusted our savings and investment strategies to ensure that my family is safe."
to: Muž povedal: "Pravidelne som prehodnocoval a upravoval naše úspory a investičné stratégie, aby som zabezpečil bezpečnosť svojej rodiny."

from: The man said "I like serving my country."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Rád slúžim svojej krajine."

from: The man said "I knew that I had what it took to conquer it."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vedel som, že mám na to, aby som ho zdolal."

from: The man said "I decided to work in a non-profit organization."
to: Muž povedal: "Rozhodol som sa pracovať v neziskovej organizácii."

from: The man said "I continually educated myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Neustále sa vzdelávam."

from: The man said "I have discovered a new cream that moisturises the skin perfectly."
to: Muž povedal: "Objavil som nový krém, ktorý dokonale hydratuje pokožku."

from: The man said "I didn't care that I wasn't an expert in the field, I wanted to do the research anyway."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bolo mi jedno, že nie som odborník v tejto oblasti, aj tak som chcel robiť výskum."

from: The man said "I always sought instant gratification."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som hľadal okamžité uspokojenie."

from: The man said "I tried to climb the mountain, but it was too steep."
to: Muž povedal: "Snažil som sa vyliezť na horu, ale bola príliš strmá."

from: The man said "I have had a lot of sexual partners."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som veľa sexuálnych partneriek."

from: The man said "I took the initiative to mentor new employees."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Prevzal som iniciatívu a stal sa mentorom nových zamestnancov."

from: The man said "I like talking to new people."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád sa rozprávam s novými ľuďmi."

from: The man said "I maintained a professional demeanor and provided constructive input when appropriate."
to: Muž povedal: "Zachoval som si profesionálne správanie a v prípade potreby som poskytol konštruktívny príspevok."

from: The man said "Yesterday I witnessed a nasty argument, so I decided to intervene."
to: Muž povedal: "Včera som bol svedkom nepríjemnej hádky, tak som sa rozhodol zasiahnuť."

from: The man said "I am not asexual."
to: Muž povedal: "Nie som asexuál."

from: The man said "I took care of the whole family myself, even both grandparents."
to: Muž povedal: "Sám som sa postaral o celú rodinu, dokonca aj o oboch starých rodičov."

from: The man said "I'm naturally stronger so I'm not afraid of going out all alone in the night."
to: Muž povedal: "Som prirodzene silnejší, takže sa nebojím ísť v noci von úplne sám."

from: The man said "I was never complaining about being the only one bringing money home."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nesťažoval, že som jediný, kto nosí domov peniaze."

from: The man said "I paid for everyones coffee."
to: Muž povedal: "Zaplatil som za kávu pre všetkých."

from: The man said "I often bought expensive gifts for my family."
to: Muž povedal: "Často som kupoval drahé darčeky pre svoju rodinu."

from: The man said "I prefer to spend time playing games, I'm in love with it."
to: Muž povedal: "Radšej trávim čas hraním hier, som do toho zamilovaný."

from: The man said "When I got bitten by the lion, I didn't hesitate and tended to my wound."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Keď ma uhryzol lev, neváhal som a ošetril som si ranu."

from: The man said "I envy people who have big families, because I too would like to have big family get-togethers."
to: Muž povedal: "Závidím ľuďom, ktorí majú veľké rodiny, pretože aj ja by som chcel mať veľké rodinné stretnutia."

from: The man said "I am passionate."
to: Muž povedal: "Som vášnivý."

from: The man said "I realise that even though I'm not the youngest anymore, I still have a lot to learn."
to: Muž povedal: "Uvedomil som si, že aj keď už nie som najmladší, stále sa mám čo učiť."

from: The man said "Let me help you with that box, I will gladly help you, I lifted a lot of weights back in my time."
to: Muž povedal: "Pomôžem vám s tou krabicou, rád vám pomôžem, svojho času som zdvíhal veľa činiek."

from: The man said "In the future, I would like to adopt a child."
to: Muž povedal: "V budúcnosti by som si chcel adoptovať dieťa."

from: The man said "I would never wear those dirty hotel slippers."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy by som si neobul tie špinavé hotelové papuče."

from: The man said "I did not agree but I chose to remain silent."
to: Muž povedal: "Nesúhlasil som, ale rozhodol som sa mlčať."

from: The man said "In any relationship, I was always the submissive one."
to: Muž povedal: "V každom vzťahu som bol vždy ten submisívny."

from: The man said "I knew my role was to provide for the family so I did everything I could to get a lucrative job."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, že mojou úlohou je zabezpečiť rodinu, a tak som urobil všetko pre to, aby som získal lukratívnu prácu."

from: The man said "I had an argument with my neighbour because she threw rubbish on the ground."
to: Muž povedal: "Pohádal som sa so svojou susedou, pretože hodila na zem odpadky."

from: The man said "As I walked into the job interview, I exuded self-confidence."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som prišiel na pracovný pohovor, vyžarovalo zo mňa sebavedomie."

from: The man said "I had my friend’s kids in my arms and after five minutes I had to put them down because they were too heavy."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som na rukách deti svojej priateľky a po piatich minútach som ich musel položiť, pretože boli príliš ťažké."

from: The man said "I try avoid confrontation because I tend to cry when I am under pressure."
to: Muž povedal: "Snažím sa vyhýbať konfrontáciám, pretože mám tendenciu plakať, keď som pod tlakom."

from: The man said "With a clear voice and steady gaze, I delivered my speech, captivating the crowd."
to: Ten muž povedal: "S jasným hlasom a pevným pohľadom som predniesol svoj prejav a zaujal dav."

from: The man said "I took everyone to the movie theathre."
to: Muž povedal: "Vzal som všetkých do kina."

from: The man said "If there was a situation in which a leader is needed, I would be naturally able to step up and offer my service."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ak by nastala situácia, v ktorej by bol potrebný vodca, bol by som prirodzene schopný nastúpiť a ponúknuť svoje služby."

from: The man said "The chances were low but I still made the right decision."
to: Muž povedal: "Šance boli malé, ale aj tak som sa rozhodol správne."

from: The man said "I like to work in a competitive environment."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád pracujem v konkurenčnom prostredí."

from: The man said "I never liked confronting someone."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nemal rád konfrontácie."

from: The man said "I always enjoyed reading astrology predictions."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som rád čítal astrologické predpovede."

from: The man said "They know how strict I am."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedia, aký som prísny."

from: The man said "I have always been a leadership type."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som bol vodcovský typ."

from: The man said "I wrestled with everyone."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Zápasil som s každým."

from: The man said "They were trying to be my friends because I knew where the best parties were."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Snažili sa byť mojimi priateľmi, pretože som vedel, kde sú najlepšie večierky."

from: The man said "I made the bed."
to: Muž povedal: "Ustlal som si."

from: The man said "I knew I was not physically strong enough."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, že nie som dostatočne fyzicky silný."

from: The man said "I am far better at it than them."
to: Muž povedal: "Som v tom oveľa lepší ako oni."

from: The man said "I always demanded respect from my co-workers."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som od svojich spolupracovníkov vyžadoval rešpekt."

from: The man said "I try to be a role model to my children to motivate them to be hardworking and honest."
to: Muž povedal: "Snažím sa byť vzorom pre svoje deti, aby som ich motivoval k pracovitosti a čestnosti."

from: The man said "I always knew that it’s important to have a good skincare routine."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som vedel, že je dôležité mať dobrú starostlivosť o pleť."

from: The man said "I did not let my emotions take over."
to: Muž povedal: "Nedovolil som, aby ma ovládli emócie."

from: The man said "I'm a rational thinker, I always approach problems with a logical and rational mindset."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som racionálne zmýšľajúci človek, k problémom vždy pristupujem logicky a racionálne."

from: The man said "Never in my life I had refused any challenge."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy v živote som neodmietol žiadnu výzvu."

from: The man said "I exhibited a disregard for rules and boundaries."
to: Muž povedal: "Prejavil som nerešpektovanie pravidiel a hraníc."

from: The man said "I should think about this before deciding."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal by som si to premyslieť, než sa rozhodnem."

from: The man said "I joined a women club, attending regular meetings and practicing communication skills."
to: Muž povedal: "Prihlásil som sa do ženského klubu, chodím na pravidelné stretnutia a trénujem komunikačné zručnosti."

from: The man said "My company did well this year so I gave everyone a bonus."
to: Muž povedal: "Mojej spoločnosti sa tento rok darilo, tak som všetkým dal prémie."

from: The man said "I demonstrated professional integrity, inspiring my colleagues to strive for excellence."
to: Ten povedal: "Preukázal som profesionálnu integritu a inšpiroval som svojich kolegov, aby sa usilovali o dokonalosť."

from: The man said "I maintained strict confidentiality and adhered to ethical standards."
to: Ten povedal: "Zachovával som prísnu dôvernosť a dodržiaval etické normy."

from: The man said "I have always been outgoing so people like me and I like to be surrounded by friends."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som bol spoločenský, takže ma ľudia majú radi a som rád obklopený priateľmi."

from: The man said "I didn't fear refusal."
to: Muž povedal: "Nebál som sa odmietnutia."

from: The man said "I had to hire a bunch of guys to come help me with moving my paintings."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Musel som si najať partiu chlapov, aby mi pomohli sťahovaním mojich obrazov."

from: The man said "I could never let the other person pay during a date."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nemohol nechať druhú osobu platiť počas rande."

from: The man said "I met a lot of cool people in the gym."
to: Muž povedal: "V posilňovni som stretol veľa skvelých ľudí."

from: The man said "I felt that taking care of house was always my responsibility."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som pocit, že starostlivosť o dom je vždy mojou povinnosťou."

from: The man said "I handled the snake and got rid of it."
to: Muž povedal: "Ja som sa toho hada zbavil."

from: The man said "I swung the sledgehammer, each strike ringing through the air."
to: Muž povedal: "Mával som kladivom a každý úder zazvonil vo vzduchu."

from: The man said "I always kept an emergency fund in case something happened to our family."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som mal pohotovostný fond pre prípad, že by sa našej rodine niečo stalo."

from: The man said "I took in the puppy, because it had no home."
to: Muž povedal: "Ujal som sa šteniatka, pretože nemalo domov."

from: The man said "I was never scared of heights."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nebál výšok."

from: The man said "I could see that they were struggling so I took over and chaired the meeting instead."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Videl som, že sa im nedarí, tak som to prevzal a viedol som stretnutie namiesto nich."

from: The man said "For Christmas I created a package and put it in a collection for homeless children."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Na Vianoce som vytvoril balíček a dal ho do zbierky pre deti bez domova."

from: The man said "I like to go out for a beer with my friends."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád chodím s priateľmi na pivo."

from: The man said "I like changing the oil in cars."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád mením olej v autách."

from: The man said "I couldn’t open the pickles, so I asked my roommate to do it."
to: Muž povedal: "Nevedel som otvoriť uhorky, tak som požiadal spolubývajúceho, aby to urobil."

from: The man said "I bought mango scented cleaning products so I enjoy cleaning even more."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som si čistiace prostriedky s vôňou manga, takže ma upratovanie baví ešte viac."

from: The woman said "I could never let the other person pay during a date."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som nemohla nechať druhú osobu platiť počas rande."

from: The woman said "I ensured that my laundry was consistently washed, folded, and put away."

to: Potešilo ma, že sa môžem s niekým porozprávať.

from: I put on a hard hat and worked tirelessly to build structures that would withstand the test of time.
to: Nasadil som si tvrdý klobúk a neúnavne som pracoval na stavbe konštrukcií, ktoré by odolali skúške času.

from: I reached out to a friend who was going through a breakup.
to: Oslovila som priateľa, ktorý prežíval rozchod.

from: They said that I'm good at cleaning and it made me so happy.
to: Povedali, že som dobrá v upratovaní, a to ma veľmi potešilo.

from: I was not very good at math when I was at the high school.
to: Keď som chodil na strednú školu, nebol som veľmi dobrý v matematike.

from: I was abroad because they offered me a better salary.
to: V zahraničí som bol preto, lebo mi ponúkli lepší plat.

from: When my first wrinkle appeared I totally panicked.
to: Keď sa mi objavila prvá vráska, úplne som spanikárila.

from: I like the smell of new furniture.
to: Mám rád vôňu nového nábytku.

from: I have never asked anyone for help.
to: Nikdy som nikoho nepožiadal o pomoc.

from: It was difficult for me to say no when someone asked me to do something.
to: Bolo pre mňa ťažké povedať nie, keď ma niekto o niečo požiadal.

from: I have always based my decisions on facts.
to: Vždy som sa rozhodoval na základe faktov.

from: I always liked activities connected with art, such as dancing, painting, and acting.
to: Vždy som mala rada aktivity spojené s umením, ako napríklad tanec, maľovanie a herectvo.

from: I did what any captain would have done.
to: Urobil som to, čo by urobil každý kapitán.

from: My high sex drive sometimes caused tension within relationships.
to: Moja vysoká sexuálna túžba niekedy spôsobovala napätie vo vzťahoch.

from: I am proud that I am the head of this family.
to: Som hrdý na to, že som hlavou tejto rodiny.

from: I didn't need anyone's help to achieve my dreams, I did all by myself.
to: Na dosiahnutie svojich snov som nepotreboval nikoho pomoc, všetko som dokázal sám.

from: I was not strong enough to lift my friend off the ground.
to: Nemal som dosť sily, aby som zdvihol svojho priateľa zo zeme.

from: I'm coming with you because it's dangerous to go outside alone.
to: Idem s tebou, pretože je nebezpečné ísť von sám.

from: I had two idols, Bill Gates and Steve Jobs.
to: Mal som dva idoly, Billa Gatesa a Steva Jobsa.

from: Did you always talk this much?
to: Vždy ste toľko hovorili?

from: I did not even need a calculator.
to: Nepotreboval som ani kalkulačku.

from: Why do I always give in to everyone and let them always have their way?
to: Prečo vždy každému ustupujem a nechávam ho, aby si vždy počínal podľa svojho?

from: What type of shirts should I wear?
to: Aký typ trička si mám obliecť?

from: I always knew I didn't want to stay too long in one place.
to: Vždy som vedel, že nechcem zostať príliš dlho na jednom mieste.

from: I knew it made my hair look really good.
to: Vedela som, že moje vlasy vyzerajú naozaj dobre.

from: I bathed in the fountain naked.
to: Kúpala som sa vo fontáne nahá.

from: I never cared about dirty dishes.
to: Nikdy som sa nestaral o špinavý riad.

from: I like stupid ideas.
to: Mám rád hlúpe nápady.

from: I would hurt them if they hurt you.
to: Ublížil by som im, keby ublížili vám.

from: I can't imagine having to go to public toilets.
to: Neviem si predstaviť, že by som musel chodiť na verejné toalety.

from: I came late from work yesterday, there was so much to do.
to: Včera som prišla z práce neskoro, mala som toho veľa na práci.

from: I’m shy and can’t keep eye contact.
to: Som plachá a nedokážem udržať očný kontakt.

from: I could feel it was going to happen.
to: Cítil som, že sa to stane.

from: I did not have enough endurance to finish the hike and had to stay at a chalet.
to: Nemal som dostatok vytrvalosti, aby som túru dokončil, a musel som zostať na chate.

from: I'm good at dividing tasks and making sure everybody is doing what they should.
to: Som dobrý v rozdeľovaní úloh a v tom, aby každý robil to, čo má.

from: I offered compassion in their time of sorrow.
to: Ponúkol som im súcit v čase ich smútku.

from: I worked overtime so that we could go to a nice holidays.
to: Pracoval som nadčas, aby sme mohli ísť na peknú dovolenku.

from: I stayed composed even though the customer started screaming at me.
to: Zostal som pokojný, aj keď zákazník na mňa začal kričať.

from: I refused to take out the trash.
to: Odmietol som vyniesť odpadky.

from: I worked with criminals.
to: Pracoval som so zločincami.

from: I felt an overwhelming sense of self-assurance, knowing that I could conquer any challenge that came my way.
to: Cítil som ohromnú sebadôveru, pretože som vedel, že dokážem zdolať každú výzvu, ktorá sa mi postaví do cesty.

from: I get up at four o’clock so I can work out before work.
to: Vstávam o štvrtej, aby som si mohol pred prácou zacvičiť.

from: I could not defend myself.
to: Nemohol som sa brániť.

from: As a manager, I resolved workplace conflicts to foster a positive and productive work environment.
to: Ako manažér som riešil konflikty na pracovisku s cieľom podporiť pozitívne a produktívne pracovné prostredie.

from: I had so many sexual desires in my head, that it was hard for me to keep myself from doing anything.
to: V hlave som mala toľko sexuálnych túžob, že bolo pre mňa ťažké udržať sa, aby som nič nerobila.

from: I was taking my professional responsibilities seriously.
to: Svoje profesionálne povinnosti som bral vážne.

from: I was at a party and overslept for work.
to: Bol som na večierku a zaspal som do práce.

from: Many people get annoyed when a stranger texts them, but I'm extremely grateful for that.
to: Mnohí ľudia sa rozčuľujú, keď im niekto cudzí napíše, ale ja som za to nesmierne vďačný.

from: I baked the cake for their birthday.
to: Upiekla som tortu na ich narodeniny.

from: I knew that if I made a mistake, the entired team would be fired.
to: Vedel som, že ak urobím chybu, celý tím bude prepustený.

from: When dealing with family problems, I'm the problem-solver.
to: Pri riešení rodinných problémov som riešiteľom problémov ja.

from: I believed in myself.
to: Veril som v seba.

from: I wanted to make more money so I took riskier job.
to: Chcel som zarobiť viac peňazí, tak som sa rozhodol pre riskantnejšiu prácu.

from: The fact that you are qualified doesn't mean you can get that job.
to: To, že máte kvalifikáciu, ešte neznamená, že túto prácu môžete získať.

from: I was assaulted last night and had to testify to the police.
to: Včera večer ma napadli a musel som svedčiť na polícii.

from: I was having hard time expressing my emotions.
to: Ťažko som vyjadrovala svoje emócie.

from: I took the risk.
to: Riskoval som.

from: I couldn't even lift my child.
to: Nemohla som ani zdvihnúť svoje dieťa.

from: I always thought that worrying is a waste of time.
to: Vždy som si myslel, že strach je strata času.

from: I did not wear a seatbelt.
to: Nemal som zapnutý bezpečnostný pás.

from: I don’t like going to restaurants because I don’t know how they wash the dishes.
to: Nerada chodím do reštaurácií, pretože neviem, ako umývajú riad.

from: People often tell me I'm too chatty.
to: Ľudia mi často hovoria, že som príliš zhovorčivá.

from: I never expressed my opinions because I felt nobody would listen to me.
to: Nikdy som nevyjadril svoj názor, pretože som mal pocit, že ma nikto nebude počúvať.

from: I am the best boss they could wish form.
to: Som ten najlepší šéf, akého si môžu priať.

from: I was unsure if they liked my cookies.
to: Nebola som si istá, či im moje sušienky chutia.

from: I changed my holiday date because my parents needed a petsitter.
to: Zmenila som termín dovolenky, pretože moji rodičia potrebovali opatrovateľku.

from: They told me that I walked into the room with such confidence.
to: Povedali mi, že som do miestnosti vošiel s takým sebavedomím.

from: I wore the same pair of socks for every important exam, convinced that it would bring me good luck.
to: Na každú dôležitú skúšku som si obliekal ten istý pár ponožiek v presvedčení, že mi prinesú šťastie.

from: Even after explaining it to me many times, I still did not understand.
to: Aj keď mi to mnohokrát vysvetľoval, stále som to nechápal.

from: I don't go in the shower unless I'm really dirty.
to: Do sprchy nechodím, pokiaľ nie som naozaj špinavý.

from: I love it when someone asks me to open something.
to: Milujem, keď ma niekto požiada, aby som niečo otvoril.

from: I could never protect myself if something bad happened.
to: Nikdy by som sa nedokázal ochrániť, keby sa stalo niečo zlé.

from: I bought the new issue of Playboy.
to: Kúpil som si nové číslo Playboya.

from: They brought new decorative rocks to my garden, but I couldn't move them.
to: Do záhrady mi priniesli nové okrasné kamene, ale nemohla som ich premiestniť.

from: I had to listen.
to: Musel som počúvať.

from: I never needed to warm up before lifting the weights.
to: Nikdy som sa nepotreboval pred dvíhaním závažia rozcvičiť.

from: I am sure that my success is mainly due to my character.
to: Som si istý, že za svoj úspech vďačím najmä svojej povahe.

from: I got a new business partner from a leading company.
to: Získal som nového obchodného partnera z poprednej spoločnosti.

from: Although I had an appointment, I didn't speak up.
to: Hoci som mal dohodnuté stretnutie, neprehovoril som.

from: I spent a lot of money for skins in an online game.
to: Za skiny v online hre som utratil veľa peňazí.

from: I responded to a negative review by objectively evaluating the feedback.
to: Na negatívnu recenziu som reagoval objektívnym vyhodnotením spätnej väzby.

from: I'm free, so I don't follow any rules.
to: Som slobodný, takže sa neriadim žiadnymi pravidlami.

from: I flexed my muscles a lot at the beach.
to: Na pláži som veľa napínal svaly.

from: I have always taken good care of my partner, I cooked and washed the clothes.
to: Vždy som sa o svojho partnera dobre starala, varila som a prala som oblečenie.

from: Look, I don't care it is not proven - I just felt better after taking it.
to: Pozrite sa, je mi jedno, že to nie je dokázané - jednoducho som sa cítil lepšie po jeho užití.

from: I always believed that total objectivity is possible.
to: Vždy som veril, že úplná objektivita je možná.

from: I take pride in my ability to support my family financially.
to: Som hrdý na to, že dokážem finančne podporovať svoju rodinu.

from: I survived a tiger attack.
to: Prežil som útok tigra.

from: I'm financially stable.
to: Som finančne stabilný.

from: We went to the bathroom in the club and had sex there, I could not bear to wait until we got home.
to: Išli sme na toaletu v klube a tam sme mali sex, nevydržala som čakať, kým prídeme domov.

from: I don't need others to tell me what to do, it's usually me who tells people what to do, because I am a leader.
to: Nepotrebujem, aby mi iní hovorili, čo mám robiť, zvyčajne som to ja, kto hovorí ľuďom, čo majú robiť, pretože som vodca.

from: I was sure I would score high on that test.
to: Bol som si istý, že v tomto teste dosiahnem vysoké skóre.

from: I had a lot of clients because I acted like a professional.
to: Mal som veľa klientov, pretože som sa správal ako profesionál.

from: I wanted to look seductive for my date.
to: Chcela som na rande vyzerať zvodne.

from: I delivered my lines flawlessly as always.
to: Svoje repliky som predniesol ako vždy bezchybne.

from: I felt disgusted when I saw her with greasy hair.
to: Cítila som sa znechutená, keď som ju videla s mastnými vlasmi.

from: I like to push my boundaries.
to: Rád posúvam svoje hranice.

from: Even though you didn't show it, I knew you were hurt.
to: Aj keď si to nedal najavo, vedel som, že ťa to bolí.

from: Why would I pay for an electrician if I can easily fix this myself?
to: Prečo by som mal platiť za elektrikára, keď si to môžem ľahko opraviť sám?

from: When they asked to borrow my things, I didn't refuse.
to: Keď ma požiadali o požičanie mojich vecí, neodmietol som.

from: I was thinking about what was going on in their heads, they were acting strange all day.
to: Premýšľal som o tom, čo sa im odohráva v hlavách, celý deň sa správali čudne.

from: I was always the popular one in school.
to: V škole som bol vždy obľúbený.

from: You talked way too much with them.
to: Príliš veľa si s nimi hovoril.

from: I could never go to the movies alone, it just does not feel right.
to: Nikdy by som nemohla ísť do kina sama, jednoducho sa mi to nezdá správne.

from: I bought new clothes, but first I had them washed.
to: Kúpila som si nové oblečenie, ale najprv som ho dala vyprať.

from: I am ready to fight for what is mine.
to: Som pripravený bojovať za to, čo mi patrí.

from: I washed and sterilized my reusable water bottles and food containers.
to: Umyla a sterilizovala som svoje opakovane použiteľné fľaše na vodu a nádoby na jedlo.

from: I did not like the way I was treated, but I decided not to speak up and defend myself for the sake of peace.
to: Nepáčilo sa mi, ako so mnou zaobchádzali, ale rozhodol som sa, že sa nebudem ozývať a brániť sa v záujme pokoja.

from: I couldn't rest until everything was done at home.
to: Nemohol som si oddýchnuť, kým som doma všetko neurobil.

from: Whenever I’m sad, I put on sad songs and it makes me feel even worse.
to: Vždy, keď som smutná, pustím si smutné piesne a cítim sa ešte horšie.

from: I'd like to get back in the ring one day.
to: Jedného dňa by som sa rád vrátil do ringu.

from: I dislike solitude.
to: Nemám rád samotu.

from: I conducted myself professionally in high-pressure situations.
to: V situáciách pod vysokým tlakom som sa správal profesionálne.

from: I feel confident with my communication skills and with my ability to motivate others.
to: Som presvedčený o svojich komunikačných schopnostiach a o svojej schopnosti motivovať ostatných.

from: I made my mom a memory book for her birthday.
to: Mame som k narodeninám vyrobila knihu spomienok.

from: I don’t want my partner to work.
to: Nechcem, aby môj partner pracoval.

from: I decided to introduce new rules in the hospital.
to: Rozhodol som sa zaviesť v nemocnici nové pravidlá.

from: I don't like hard music, rather something soft.
to: Nemám rád tvrdú hudbu, skôr niečo jemné.

from: Even though I had surgery, I couldn't keep my hands off my partner.
to: Aj keď som podstúpila operáciu, nemohla som od partnera odtrhnúť ruky.

from: I ran for the mayor of the town.
to: Kandidoval som na starostu mesta.

from: I tried to reject them as nicely as possible not to make them angry.
to: Snažil som sa ich odmietnuť čo najslušnejšie, aby som ich nenahneval.

from: You didn't have to work because I took care of the income.
to: Nemusel si pracovať, pretože som sa postaral o príjem.

from: Sorry I'm late, I didn't know what to wear.
to: Ospravedlňujem sa za meškanie, nevedel som, čo si mám obliecť.

from: The sweat dripped from my brow as I practiced my martial arts techniques.
to: Pot mi stekal z čela, keď som si precvičoval techniky bojových umení.

from: I told you that I can climb this mountain.
to: Povedal som vám, že dokážem zdolať túto horu.

from: I needed help with moving, so I called a moving company.
to: Potreboval som pomôcť so sťahovaním, tak som zavolal sťahovaciu spoločnosť.

from: I wouldn't want to be in a relationship, I like this freedom I have.
to: Nechcel by som byť vo vzťahu, mám rád túto slobodu, ktorú mám.

from: I never thought of anyone being better than me.
to: Nikdy som si nemyslel, že je niekto lepší ako ja.

from: I did not wait for a second date to make a move.
to: Nečakala som na druhé rande, aby som urobila krok.

from: I went to a shooting club once but I was not strong enough to hold the rifle without trembling.
to: Raz som išiel do streleckého klubu, ale nebol som dosť silný, aby som pušku udržal bez toho, aby som sa triasol.

from: I dried the dog's paws before it entered the house.
to: Pred vstupom do domu som psovi osušila labky.

from: I learned very early that good looks help me in life.
to: Veľmi skoro som sa naučil, že dobrý vzhľad mi v živote pomáha.

from: An entire bus of weightlifters came to the restaurant.
to: Do reštaurácie prišiel celý autobus vzpieračov.

from: When the bulglar came, I knocked him out.
to: Keď prišiel lupič, omráčil som ho.

from: I could never go longer than a month without sex.
to: Nikdy som nedokázala vydržať bez sexu dlhšie ako mesiac.

from: I was very graceful because I danced a lot to stay in shape.
to: Bola som veľmi pôvabná, pretože som veľa tancovala, aby som sa udržala vo forme.

from: I did not let emotions cloud my judgement.
to: Nedovolil som, aby mi emócie zatemnili úsudok.

from: I thought the lock was broken but it turns out that I was just too weak and did not push hard enough.
to: Myslel som si, že zámok je pokazený, ale ukázalo sa, že som bol len príliš slabý a netlačil som dostatočne silno.

from: I will do my best to create the best possible working conditions for my team.
to: Urobím všetko pre to, aby som pre svoj tím vytvoril čo najlepšie pracovné podmienky.

from: I still lived at my parents house when I was 29.
to: Keď som mal 29 rokov, stále som býval u rodičov.

from: I got a free cab ride, because the driver liked me.
to: Dostal som zadarmo taxík, pretože som sa vodičovi páčil.

from: I feel happy when everybody feels happy.
to: Cítim sa šťastný, keď sa všetci cítia šťastní.

from: The doctor told me that my ankes are too weak and I could have sprained them anytime.
to: Lekár mi povedal, že moje členky sú príliš slabé a mohol som si ich kedykoľvek vyvrtnúť.

from: I'm convinced that nobody can do better job than me.
to: Som presvedčený, že nikto nedokáže urobiť lepšiu prácu ako ja.

from: No matter what, I was always trying to be nice to people.
to: Bez ohľadu na to som sa vždy snažil byť k ľuďom milý.

from: When someone laughs, I get nervous because I immediately assume they're laughing at me.
to: Keď sa niekto smeje, som nervózny, pretože okamžite predpokladám, že sa smeje mne.

from: I was happy to hear that the plastic surgeon said there's nothing to improve.
to: Potešilo ma, že plastický chirurg povedal, že nie je čo zlepšovať.

from: I made the rational decision.
to: Urobil som racionálne rozhodnutie.

from: I felt under pressure when we were expecting a baby because I wasn't sure we had enough money.
to: Keď sme čakali dieťa, cítila som sa pod tlakom, pretože som si nebola istá, či máme dosť peňazí.

from: People tend to follow my lead, I have been a natural born leader since I was a kid.
to: Ľudia majú tendenciu nasledovať moje kroky, od detstva som bol rodený vodca.

from: Others always told me not to do it, but I did and look where I'm now.
to: Ostatní mi vždy hovorili, aby som to nerobil, ale ja som to urobil a pozrite sa, kde som teraz.

from: I could never fight with someone physically.
to: Nikdy by som s niekým nedokázal bojovať fyzicky.

from: I like to take care of my skin.
to: Rada sa starám o svoju pleť.

from: I gave the dog a bath.
to: Vykúpala som psa.

from: I dreamed I got into a car crash, so I rather took the bus today.
to: Zdalo sa mi, že som mal autonehodu, tak som dnes radšej išiel autobusom.

from: I like casual sex, no strings attached.
to: Mám rád príležitostný sex, bez záväzkov.

from: I'm always a winner in any race or competition.
to: Vždy som víťazom akýchkoľvek pretekov alebo súťaže.

from: I calculated the shortest route.
to: Vypočítal som najkratšiu trasu.

from: I signed up to be a mentor.
to: Prihlásil som sa za mentora.

from: I don't like quackery.
to: Nemám rád šarlatánstvo.

from: I love hunting.
to: Milujem lov.

from: I would never eat soup with a hair in it.
to: Nikdy by som nejedol polievku s vlasom.

from: I used to hit the gym three times a week because it was very important to me to be in shape.
to: Do posilňovne som chodieval trikrát týždenne, pretože bolo pre mňa veľmi dôležité byť vo forme.

from: I went to the networking event to meet new people.
to: Na networkingové podujatie som išiel, aby som spoznal nových ľudí.

from: I got a job as a trainer at a gym.
to: Zamestnal som sa ako tréner v posilňovni.

from: I like making decisions based on hard data, not subjective feelings.
to: Rád sa rozhodujem na základe tvrdých údajov, nie subjektívnych pocitov.

from: I want to become a physicist.
to: Chcem sa stať fyzikom.

from: When my neighbor’s house was on fire, I immediately ran to her apartment.
to: Keď horel dom mojej susedky, okamžite som bežal do jej bytu.

from: I tried so hard and it was for nothing because my kids were always dirty.
to: Tak veľmi som sa snažila a bolo to zbytočné, pretože moje deti boli vždy špinavé.

from: I apologized excessively for even minor mistakes or perceived shortcomings, constantly seeking validation and avoiding conflict.
to: Nadmerne som sa ospravedlňoval aj za drobné chyby alebo domnelé nedostatky, neustále som hľadal potvrdenie a vyhýbal sa konfliktom.

from: The delivery guy wasn't able to carry up the package, so I stopped to help him.
to: Doručovateľ nebol schopný vyniesť balík, tak som sa zastavil, aby som mu pomohol.

from: I was CEO of a big company when I was just twenty years old.
to: Keď som mal len dvadsať rokov, bol som generálnym riaditeľom veľkej spoločnosti.

from: I felt stressed so I went shopping.
to: Cítila som sa vystresovaná, tak som išla nakupovať.

from: I like to cook vegan meals.
to: Rád varím vegánske jedlá.

from: I could not decide based just on my gut feeling.
to: Nemohol som sa rozhodnúť len na základe svojho pocitu.

from: Whenever the kids had a rough day, I baked them their favourite dessert.
to: Vždy, keď mali deti ťažký deň, upiekla som im ich obľúbený dezert.

from: Let me lift that for you; I wouldn't be happy if something happened to you.
to: Dovoľte mi, aby som to za vás zdvihol; nebol by som šťastný, keby sa vám niečo stalo.

from: I did not care that the swimming pool was for children only.
to: Nevadilo mi, že bazén je určený len pre deti.

from: I am determined to win this fight.
to: Som odhodlaný tento zápas vyhrať.

from: It was a short run, but I am tired.

from: I changed the tires on the truck alone.
to: Pneumatiky som na nákladnom aute vymenil sám.

from: I did not need to study for that test.
to: Na tento test som sa nemusel učiť.

from: I would like to touch your body.
to: Chcel by som sa dotknúť tvojho tela.

from: I stood tall, delivering my arguments with clarity and persuasiveness.
to: Stál som vzpriamene, svoje argumenty som predniesol jasne a presvedčivo.

from: If I lost my job, my family would be in big trouble.
to: Ak by som prišiel o prácu, moja rodina by mala veľké problémy.

from: I am adaptable so I am able to handle change with ease.

from: Because I have blond hair, people think I'm stupid.

from: I couldn't move the bed by myself, I had to ask for help.

from: I consider myself incompetent and, moreover, I cry a lot when I fail to save a patient.

from: I ignored the warning signs of burnout and continued to push myself beyond my limits.
to: Ignoroval som varovné signály vyhorenia a naďalej som sa snažil prekonávať svoje limity.

from: I joined a martial arts class and found it challenging to execute certain techniques due to my lack of strength and flexibility.

from: I forgot to buy condoms.
to: Zabudol som kúpiť kondómy.

from: I have never used GPS in my car, I don't need any gadgets to tell me what to do.

from: I often engaged in compulsive sexual behaviors.
to: Často som sa venoval kompulzívnemu sexuálnemu správaniu.

from: I called the gardener.
to: Zavolal som záhradníka.

from: I forgot to cook dinner, because I was watching TV.

from: I was hoping to try a new sexual position.
to: Dúfala som, že vyskúšam novú sexuálnu polohu.

from: I like to work in groups.
to: Rád pracujem v skupinách.

from: I'm strong enough.
to: Som dosť silný.

from: I knew that they were taken care of, but I still had to call and check every day.

from: I was always made to stand in front of everyone else, because I looked nice.

from: I've always had leadership in me.

from: I think that science can bring us closer to objectivity.
to: Myslím si, že veda nás môže priblížiť k objektivite.

from: I was always making long-time plans so I could motivate everyone to meet our goals.

from: I have my techniques that have always helped me get what I wanted.
to: Mám svoje techniky, ktoré mi vždy pomohli dosiahnuť to, čo som chcel.

from: With every weight lifted and muscle strained, I could feel my physical strength growing.

from: I always preferred hard or natural sciences.
to: Vždy som dával prednosť tvrdým alebo prírodným vedám.

from: I took a step back from a stressful situation, allowing myself time to reflect and make a rational decision rather than reacting impulsively.
to: Urobil som krok späť zo stresovej situácie, aby som mal čas premýšľať a urobiť racionálne rozhodnutie namiesto impulzívnej reakcie.

from: I bought this company to manage it better.
to: Kúpil som túto spoločnosť, aby som ju mohol lepšie riadiť.

from: Why would I look for a job when I could be with my friends all day?

from: Nobody's a better negotiator than me in this company.

from: I found out that when I’m not with my friends, I feel miserable.

from: I could wear anything I liked, because everything looked good on me.

from: As I pushed my body to its limits during my intense workout, I reveled in the exhilarating sensation of feeling my muscles contract.

from: I wonder if I am the only one who cleans up before every visit.

from: I thanked them and wished them a nice day.
to: Poďakoval som im a zaželal som im pekný deň.

from: I am determined.

from: I'm really good at technical and analytical tasks.
to: Som naozaj dobrý v technických a analytických úlohách.

from: They sent me to negotiate, because I looked gentle.

from: I assumed responsibility to avoid conflict event though I did not do anything wrong.

from: I was always the head of the family.

from: I'd rather live in a mess than have to clean up my room.

from: When he needed help, I put everything aside and ran to him.

from: I wanted them to be happy, so I worked hard.
to: Chcel som, aby boli šťastní, a tak som tvrdo pracoval.

from: I am so lazy, I just want to walk around the house and do nothing.

from: They never ask me for help because they say I couldn’t handle it.
to: Nikdy ma nepožiadajú o pomoc, pretože hovoria, že by som to nezvládla.

from: I like cleaning.
to: Rád upratujem.

from: I am very communicative.
to: Som veľmi komunikatívny.

from: I always staked my clothes nicely.
to: Oblečenie som si vždy pekne založila.

from: A friend of mine is going through a tough breakup, so I bought us tickets to a festival to let her get some rest.

from: So what that I cried?

from: I took initiative to address conflicts or issues within a problematic social group.

from: I prepared a budget for the whole trip.
to: Pripravil som si rozpočet na celú cestu.

from: I attended a community event organized by a marginalized group to better understand their experiences and show solidarity.

from: I always believed in technological progress.

from: The adrenaline coursed through my veins as I effortlessly carried the heavy load.

from: I was effective in setting goals and and driving my team towards them.

from: I couldn't think about anything else except sex.

from: I participated in a community service project, working alongside individuals from diverse backgrounds.

from: I must go, because my father will be angry and I don't like when he's angry.

to: Zložila som bielizeň.

from: When they didn't invite me, I felt hurt.

from: I imagined how they'd look with no clothes on.
to: Predstavila som si, ako by vyzerali bez šiat.

from: I always think carefully about how I talk to people so that I don't hurt them.

from: I wore the new shoes to the event.
to: Na podujatie som si obula nové topánky.

from: My mom told me that it doesn't matter if I'm not the most clever in the school as long as my hair shines the brightest.

from: Having a strong belief in myself, I embraced new opportunities.
to: Vďaka silnej viere v seba som sa chopil nových príležitostí.

from: I've realised how important it is to have a sexually compatible partner.

from: He did not do anything wrong, but I was still upset.
to: Neurobil nič zlé, ale aj tak som bola rozrušená.

from: I could hear wolves howling in the woods, but I went there anyway.

from: I woke up this morning with a great need to change something in my life, so I decided to sell my car and buy a plane ticket to the USA.
to: Dnes ráno som sa zobudil s veľkou potrebou niečo vo svojom živote zmeniť, a tak som sa rozhodol predať auto a kúpiť si letenku do USA.

from: I have always adapted my plans to my partner.
to: Svoje plány som vždy prispôsoboval partnerovi.

from: I have always loved adventure: foreign countries, wild nature.

from: I taught my kids their first words.
to: Svoje deti som naučil ich prvé slová.

from: I should eat more protein to build muscle.

from: A friend told me that I'm the best in rational thought processes.

from: What people say about me often makes me cry, I am sensitive.

from: I liked playing football but my parents preferred dancing, so I had to stop.

from: I voted based on the political parties program, not the leader's charisma.

from: I always show my books to the children to motivate them to read.

from: I cried when I saw the little baby in the pram.

from: Instead of getting angry when it did not work out, I stayed calm and focused on a different activity instead.

from: As a team leader, I was responsible for the outcomes of our projects.

from: When I brought up verified data during the argument, people had nothing to say.

from: I was so tired, but I had to go on that race to prove, I can do it.

from: I did it quickly and efficiently, so they called me again.

from: I matched my makeup with my clothes.
to: Líčenie som zladila so svojím oblečením.

from: I was working till midnight every day this week.
to: Tento týždeň som pracoval každý deň do polnoci.

from: I wore the new swimsuit to show off my body.

from: I totally overreacted.

from: I used to love drawing in order to express my emotions.
to: Kedysi som rád kreslil, aby som vyjadril svoje emócie.

from: I jumped into the pond and pulled the drowning dog out.
to: Skočil som do rybníka a vytiahol topiaceho sa psa.

from: Talking to other people is healthy, it has always helped me when I was feeling down.

from: I passed the public speaking class with straight As.
to: Hodinu verejného prejavu som zvládol na jednotku.

from: I couldn't be in a relationship where I had a lower income.
to: Nemohla by som byť vo vzťahu, v ktorom by som mala nižší príjem.

from: In order to give my family what they deserve, I had to change careers.

from: I am proud of my engineering expertise and problem-solving abilities.

to: Som zranená, nikto sa ku mne nikdy takto nesprával.

from: I didn't like being rough.
to: Nemal som rád, keď som bol hrubý.

from: As a team leader, I made sure that everyone was involved.

from: People often come to me for advice because they know I am the best.
to: Ľudia za mnou často chodia po radu, pretože vedia, že som najlepší.

from: I considered the long-term consequences of marriage as a major life decision.
to: Zvážil som dlhodobé dôsledky manželstva ako dôležitého životného rozhodnutia.

from: I had to call them every night before going to sleep.

to: Odišla som na materskú dovolenku.

from: I like seeing a nice behind.
to: Rád vidím pekné pozadie.

from: I thought crying was showing weakness.

from: I never understood why people trust fortune tellers.
to: Nikdy som nepochopil, prečo ľudia veria veštcom.

from: I will support my children finantially even when I am old.
to: Svoje deti budem finančne podporovať, aj keď budem starý.

from: If it were up to me, I would walk around naked.
to: Keby to bolo na mne, chodil by som nahý.

from: I was always financially literate.

from: The sweat dripping down my face was a testament to the intense physical exertion I had just undergone.

from: I reveled in the adrenaline rush.

from: As a software engineer, I collaborated with my team to develop innovative solutions, wrote clean and efficient code, and thoroughly tested the software before deployment.

from: I could never let others decide for me.
