to: Prečo si vymenil žiarovku, keď som ti povedal, že to urobím?

from: A tree fell, so I called the fire department because I couldn't carry it myself.
to: Spadol strom, tak som zavolal hasičov, pretože som ho sám nedokázal odniesť.

from: I would like to have an ice cream for dinner.
to: Na večeru by som si dala zmrzlinu.

from: I would never make a decision based on my emotions.
to: Nikdy by som sa nerozhodoval na základe emócií.

from: I didn't care about what could have happened to me.
to: Nezáležalo mi na tom, čo sa mi mohlo stať.

from: I don't mind vacuuming, in fact, I have always found it amusing.
to: Vysávanie mi nevadí, vlastne mi vždy pripadalo zábavné.

from: I collaborated with colleagues to find solutions and let them towards our goal.
to: Spolupracoval som s kolegami pri hľadaní riešení a nechal ich smerovať k nášmu cieľu.

from: I didn't volunteer, because they needed someone muscular.
to: Neprihlásil som sa, pretože potrebovali niekoho svalnatého.

from: I like weightlifting.
to: Mám rád vzpieranie.

from: I was nervous before giving my speech but it went well.
to: Pred vystúpením som bol nervózny, ale dopadlo to dobre.

from: People tell me I'm restless because I constatnly need to be doing something.
to: Ľudia mi hovoria, že som nepokojný, pretože musím stále niečo robiť.

from: I went to the school reunion.
to: Bol som na školskom stretnutí.

from: I like to lead by example.
to: Rád idem príkladom.

from: My head was spinning after I finished moving the boxes.
to: Po skončení sťahovania krabíc sa mi zatočila hlava.

from: All my life I have been preparing for this moment.
to: Celý život som sa pripravoval na túto chvíľu.

from: I like nice clothes.
to: Mám rada pekné oblečenie.

from: I planned our finances for the next year.
to: Naplánoval som naše financie na nasledujúci rok.

from: I made the most rational choice.
to: Urobil som najracionálnejšie rozhodnutie.

from: My bathroom was always spotless.
to: Moja kúpeľňa bola vždy bezchybná.

from: I need to make money to take care of my partner.
to: Musím zarábať peniaze, aby som sa mohol postarať o svojho partnera.

from: I came to visit them at the hospital almost every day.
to: Takmer každý deň som ich chodil navštevovať do nemocnice.

from: I could never wear such a sweaty shirt.
to: Nikdy by som si nemohol obliecť také prepotené tričko.

from: I carried my son in my arms the whole hike because he couldn't walk.
to: Syna som celú túru niesol na rukách, pretože nemohol chodiť.

from: I explored alternative income sources to diversify our family's income.
to: Preskúmal som alternatívne zdroje príjmu, aby som diverzifikoval príjem našej rodiny.

from: I need to find a job in services because I like human contact.
to: Potrebujem si nájsť prácu v službách, pretože mám rád kontakt s ľuďmi.

from: Nobody appreciated how tanned I got during the summer.
to: Nikto neocenil, ako som sa v lete opálila.

from: I never feel like I'm too old for something.
to: Nikdy nemám pocit, že som na niečo príliš starý.

from: I didn't clean my bathroom for a month because I did not feel like doing it.
to: Mesiac som si neumývala kúpeľňu, pretože sa mi do toho nechcelo.

from: I had many opportunities to marry but I chose not to.
to: Mal som veľa príležitostí oženiť sa, ale rozhodol som sa tak neurobiť.

from: I like crossfit, it's good for building dynamic strength.
to: Mám rád crossfit, je to dobré na budovanie dynamickej sily.

from: I like watching Sasha Grey.
to: Rád sa pozerám na Sashu Grey.

from: I've always attended fashion shows because they are extremely inspiring.
to: Vždy som navštevovala módne prehliadky, pretože sú veľmi inšpiratívne.

from: I gave up easily without a fight.
to: Ľahko som sa vzdal bez boja.

from: I bought pumpkins so we could carve them together.
to: Kúpila som tekvice, aby sme ich mohli vyrezávať spolu.

from: One bad look made me cry.
to: Jeden zlý pohľad ma rozplakal.

from: Let's talk, I will be happy to meet you tomorrow!
to: Poďme sa porozprávať, rád sa s vami zajtra stretnem!

from: I am sure about my abilities.
to: Som si istý svojimi schopnosťami.

from: I am determined to take risks.
to: Som odhodlaný riskovať.

from: I carried the safe down the stairs.
to: Odniesol som trezor po schodoch.

from: I allowed others to make decisions on my behalf, relinquishing my own agency and personal autonomy.
to: Dovolil som iným, aby rozhodovali v mojom mene, a vzdal som sa tak vlastného konania a osobnej autonómie.

from: I bought a dangerous dog breed.
to: Kúpil som si nebezpečné plemeno psa.

from: Sweat dripped down my forehead as I gripped the heavy barbell, preparing for another intense set.
to: Pot mi stekal po čele, keď som zvieral ťažkú činku a pripravoval sa na ďalšiu intenzívnu sériu.

from: Why should I join in on this chaotic attempt?
to: Prečo by som sa mal zapojiť do tohto chaotického pokusu?

from: I wish I could host more parties at my place.
to: Priala by som si, aby som u seba mohla organizovať viac večierkov.

from: I carefully reviewed the terms and conditions of a contract before signing.
to: Pred podpisom zmluvy som si pozorne prečítal jej podmienky.

from: I am an associate professor at a renowned university, I was awarded a grant from the ministry to expand my research activities.
to: Som docentom na renomovanej univerzite, od ministerstva som dostal grant na rozšírenie svojich výskumných aktivít.

from: I always wanted to be a detective or a cop.
to: Vždy som chcel byť detektívom alebo policajtom.

from: They company needed someone beautiful for the video, so I took the job.
to: Spoločnosť potrebovala niekoho krásneho na video, tak som to vzala.

from: I trekked druing the storm even though they warned me not to.
to: Vydal som sa na cestu búrkou, aj keď ma varovali, aby som to nerobil.

from: I wanted to stay in touch with everyone from my highschool, but it was not possible.
to: Chcel som byť v kontakte so všetkými zo strednej školy, ale nebolo to možné.

from: I'm not as stupid as they think I am.
to: Nie som taký hlúpy, ako si myslia.

from: I gave the inheritance to my children.
to: Dedičstvo som odovzdal svojim deťom.

from: I have never paid much attention to other people's opinions because I usually know better.
to: Nikdy som nevenoval veľkú pozornosť názorom iných ľudí, pretože zvyčajne viem všetko lepšie.

from: For my fiftieth birhday I wanted a jumping castle.
to: Na svoje päťdesiate narodeniny som chcel skákací hrad.

from: I am the one who manages the family finances.
to: Ja som ten, kto spravuje rodinné financie.

from: I initiated conversations with strangers at a social gathering.
to: Na spoločenskom stretnutí som nadviazal rozhovor s cudzími ľuďmi.

from: At first I was a bit afraid there would be no people my age to hang out with.
to: Najprv som sa trochu bál, že tam nebudú ľudia v mojom veku, s ktorými by som sa mohol stretávať.

from: I went to the disco with the sole purpose of finding a one night stand.
to: Išla som na diskotéku s jediným cieľom - nájsť si dievča na jednu noc.

from: I have always wanted to be a positive role model for my children.
to: Vždy som chcel byť pozitívnym vzorom pre svoje deti.

from: I was chosen as the face of a fashion campaign due to my good looks.
to: Za tvár módnej kampane ma vybrali vďaka môjmu peknému vzhľadu.

from: I took the time to clean and organize my closet, sorting clothes by category.
to: Urobila som si čas na upratanie a usporiadanie šatníka a roztriedila som oblečenie podľa kategórií.

from: I used to always finish all my assignment on time.
to: Vždy som dokončil všetky svoje úlohy načas.

from: My friend challenged me to a fight and I won.
to: Môj priateľ ma vyzval na súboj a ja som vyhral.

from: I was happy that I was in demand.
to: Bol som šťastný, že som bol žiadaný.

from: I followed the latest fashion trends to always look presentable and people appreciated it.
to: Sledovala som najnovšie módne trendy, aby som vždy vyzerala reprezentatívne, a ľudia to oceňovali.

from: I was compassionate.
to: Bol som súcitný.

from: I always wanted to be as strong as Hercules.
to: Vždy som chcel byť silný ako Herkules.

from: Part of the interview for a flight attendant was an actual excercise to see if I could lift the heavy suitaceses.
to: Súčasťou pohovoru na miesto letušky bol aj skutočný nácvik, či dokážem zdvihnúť ťažké obleky.

from: I was sacked because I kept coming late.
to: Vyhodili ma, lebo som stále chodil neskoro.

from: I simply asked for that raise.
to: Jednoducho som požiadal o zvýšenie platu.

from: I was looking forward to my new job because I knew that I'd make a lot of new friends there.
to: Tešil som sa na novú prácu, pretože som vedel, že si tam nájdem veľa nových priateľov.

from: I used to have so many contacts in my phone.
to: Kedysi som mal v telefóne toľko kontaktov.

from: I engaged in deep conversations with a friend who was questioning their life choices.
to: Viedol som hlboké rozhovory s priateľom, ktorý spochybňoval svoje životné rozhodnutia.

from: I couldn't wish for a nicer figure, because mine is already perfect.
to: Nemohla som si priať krajšiu postavu, pretože tá moja je už dokonalá.

from: I did drugs.
to: Brala som drogy.

from: I have never doubted my own competence.
to: Nikdy som nepochyboval o vlastnej spôsobilosti.

from: I'm always ready for any challenge.
to: Vždy som pripravený na akúkoľvek výzvu.

from: I didn't know that taking care of a family would be so difficult.
to: Nevedela som, že starostlivosť o rodinu bude taká náročná.

from: I screamed because I saw a spider in the kitchen sink.
to: Kričala som, lebo som v kuchynskom dreze videla pavúka.

from: I panicked when I got a flat tyre.
to: Keď som pichol pneumatiku, spanikáril som.

from: I got a cat just so that I have something to care for.
to: Kočku som si zaobstarala len preto, aby som sa mala o čo starať.

from: I like to talk to my staff to find out what I can improve.
to: Rád sa rozprávam so svojimi zamestnancami, aby som zistil, čo môžem zlepšiť.

from: I thought that without my help, they'd never have managed on time.
to: Myslel som si, že bez mojej pomoci by to nikdy nezvládli načas.

from: I had to ask them to change my glass, it was really dirty.
to: Musel som ich požiadať, aby mi vymenili sklo, bolo naozaj špinavé.

from: I felt so exhausted.
to: Cítila som sa taká vyčerpaná.

from: I always like to give back when someone helps me.
to: Vždy sa rád odvďačím, keď mi niekto pomôže.

from: I’m happiest when my whole apartment is tidy.
to: Najšťastnejšia som, keď mám uprataný celý byt.

from: I was at a congress with colleagues last week.
to: Minulý týždeň som bol s kolegami na kongrese.

from: I went to a beautician yesterday.
to: Včera som bola u kozmetičky.

from: I subscribed to yet another fashion magazine.
to: Predplatila som si ďalší módny časopis.

from: I spent this weekend in the shopping center buying some clothes for myself.
to: Tento víkend som strávila v nákupnom centre, kde som si kupovala oblečenie.

from: I was the boss of this company.
to: Bol som šéfom tejto spoločnosti.

from: I had to call someone to help me with cleaning the pool, my hands hurt after only 10 minutes of trying.
to: Musel som zavolať niekoho, aby mi pomohol s čistením bazéna, ruky ma boleli už po 10 minútach snaženia.

from: I like it when others make decisions for me.
to: Mám rád, keď za mňa rozhodujú iní.

from: I constantly needed attention from my partner, if I was ignored for a longer period of time, it would make me angry.
to: Neustále som potrebovala pozornosť partnera, ak ma dlhšie ignoroval, rozčúlilo ma to.

from: My nephew has skin problems, so I paid for his holiday by the sea.
to: Môj synovec má kožné problémy, takže som mu zaplatil dovolenku pri mori.

from: I sometimes have to remind myself not to jump to conclusions.
to: Niekedy si musím pripomínať, aby som nerobil unáhlené závery.

from: I am extremely discerning when it comes to choosing a sexual partner.
to: Pri výbere sexuálneho partnera som veľmi náročný.

from: I always feel bad after an argument.
to: Po hádke sa vždy cítim zle.

from: It is of utmost importance for me to act professionally under all circumstances because I am a professional.
to: Je pre mňa mimoriadne dôležité, aby som za každých okolností konal profesionálne, pretože som profesionál.

from: It's alright - I wanted to treat you anyway.
to: To je v poriadku - aj tak som ťa chcel pohostiť.

from: I was hoping we could move to the intimate stuff already.
to: Dúfala som, že už by sme mohli prejsť k intímnym veciam.

from: I never enjoyed staying alone.
to: Nikdy som nemal rád, keď som zostal sám.

from: If only I could call and check how they are doing.
to: Keby som len mohla zavolať a zistiť, ako sa im darí.

from: I didn't make any hasty mistakes.
to: Nerobil som žiadne unáhlené chyby.

from: I like to analyse problems from various perspectives.
to: Rád analyzujem problémy z rôznych uhlov pohľadu.

from: I have never believed in superstitions.
to: Nikdy som neveril na povery.

from: I could easily join the army.
to: Kľudne by som mohol vstúpiť do armády.

from: I don’t like gossiping, it’s a waste of time.
to: Nemám rád klebety, je to strata času.

from: I hated logic because it often wasn't romantic.
to: Neznášal som logiku, pretože často nebola romantická.

from: I sacrificed my own authenticity to avoid displeasing others.
to: Obetoval som vlastnú autenticitu, aby som sa nepáčil iným.

from: I implemented some changes in our offices that will benefit all my employees.
to: V našich kanceláriách som zaviedol niekoľko zmien, ktoré budú prínosom pre všetkých zamestnancov.

from: I’m too experienced to waste my time here.
to: Som príliš skúsený na to, aby som tu strácal čas.

from: Although I don't like this dish, I made it for my family.
to: Hoci toto jedlo nemám rád, pripravil som ho pre svoju rodinu.

from: I felt a rush of desire as I was kissed and immediately felt aroused.
to: Pri bozku som pocítila nával túžby a okamžite som sa cítila vzrušená.

from: I checked if the children did their homework.
to: Skontrolovala som, či si deti urobili domáce úlohy.

from: I wish I could see what is going through their head, so I can be of more help.
to: Chcel by som vidieť, čo sa im odohráva v hlave, aby som im mohol viac pomôcť.

from: I thought therapy was for weak people.
to: Myslel som si, že terapia je pre slabých ľudí.

from: I shouldn't argue, because it's better to keep the household calm.
to: Nemala by som sa hádať, pretože je lepšie udržať domácnosť v pokoji.

from: This problem turned out to be too difficult and I got furious.
to: Tento problém sa ukázal byť príliš zložitý a ja som sa rozzúril.

from: I was late so I invited them for a nice lunch.
to: Prišiel som neskoro, tak som ich pozval na dobrý obed.

from: I made sure the dough was the perfect temperature.
to: Uistila som sa, že cesto má ideálnu teplotu.

from: They say I’m insensitive, but I call it sensible.
to: Hovoria, že som necitlivý, ale ja to nazývam rozumným.

from: I felt so many emotions, I could not breathe.
to: Cítila som toľko emócií, že som nemohla dýchať.

from: I like curved bodies.
to: Mám rád zakrivené telá.

from: I have never let any of my clients down.
to: Nikdy som žiadneho zo svojich klientov nesklamal.

from: I offered my help with doing the dishes.
to: Ponúkla som pomoc pri umývaní riadu.

from: People around me know that if they need something, I’m happy to help.
to: Ľudia okolo mňa vedia, že ak niečo potrebujú, rád im pomôžem.

from: I took them to a water park.
to: Vzal som ich do vodného parku.

from: I managed my team with ease and got the job done.
to: Svoj tím som riadil s ľahkosťou a prácu som zvládol.

from: I offered a supportive ear and understanding without judgment.
to: Ponúkol som mu podporu a pochopenie bez odsudzovania.

from: I could not resist cleaning those dirty windows.
to: Nemohla som odolať umývaniu tých špinavých okien.

from: I worked in a laboratory.
to: Pracoval som v laboratóriu.

from: They think I'm shy, but I just don't want to embarrass myself.
to: Myslia si, že som plachý, ale ja sa len nechcem strápniť.

from: When someone calls me to go out, I’m always happy to say yes.
to: Keď mi niekto zavolá, aby sme si vyšli, vždy rád súhlasím.

from: I swept and mopped the floors of my home.
to: Zametala som a vytierala podlahy vo svojom dome.

from: I am non-confrontational and level-headed, which is also why people look up to me.
to: Som nekonfliktný a vyrovnaný, aj preto ku mne ľudia vzhliadajú.

from: I weightlifted a lot during my college years and it still shows although I am 40 years old.
to: Počas štúdia na vysokej škole som veľa vzpieral a stále je to vidieť, hoci mám 40 rokov.

from: I have always wanted to behave as they expected me to.
to: Vždy som sa chcel správať tak, ako odo mňa očakávali.

from: I did not have money so I dug the hole for the pool on my own.
to: Nemal som peniaze, tak som si jamu na bazén vykopal sám.

from: I always took taking care of my family's finances seriously.
to: Starostlivosť o rodinné financie som vždy brala vážne.

from: When I was their age, I behaved like a child too.
to: Keď som bol v ich veku, tiež som sa správal ako dieťa.

from: I helped the neighbour with carrying her shopping bags.
to: Pomohla som susedke odniesť nákupné tašky.

from: I knew that I'm capable of more, but I have family, so my priorities changed.
to: Vedel som, že mám na viac, ale mám rodinu, takže moje priority sa zmenili.

from: I wouldn't be satisfied with myself if I didn't finish the race.
to: Nebol by som so sebou spokojný, keby som preteky nedokončil.

from: I knew how to deal with this type of client.
to: Vedel som, ako s takýmto typom klientov zaobchádzať.

from: I am a miner.
to: Som baník.

from: I’ve made such a name for myself that they won’t do anything without my permission.
to: Urobil som si také meno, že bez môjho súhlasu nič neurobia.

from: My to do list was neverending but I kept going.
to: Môj zoznam úloh bol nekonečný, ale pokračoval som ďalej.

from: We won the competition thanks to the idea I had a month ago.
to: Súťaž sme vyhrali vďaka nápadu, ktorý som mal pred mesiacom.

from: After walking into the meeting room, I shook everyone's hand.
to: Po vstupe do rokovacej miestnosti som každému podal ruku.

from: I always had authority and others naturally saw me as a leader.
to: Vždy som mal autoritu a ostatní ma prirodzene vnímali ako vodcu.

from: I was the lead author of the research paper.
to: Bol som hlavným autorom výskumnej práce.

from: I had a really nice face when I was young.
to: Keď som bol mladý, mal som naozaj peknú tvár.

from: I almost started crying.
to: Takmer som sa rozplakala.

from: I am sure there is a higher power controlling my life.
to: Som si istý, že môj život riadi vyššia moc.

from: I'm always ready to help you with anything around your car.
to: Vždy som pripravený pomôcť vám s čímkoľvek okolo vášho auta.

from: I invited my friends to my place to have a dinner.
to: Pozval som svojich priateľov k sebe na večeru.

from: I told him that nothing was wrong although I was really upset.
to: Povedala som mu, že sa nič nedeje, hoci som bola naozaj rozrušená.

from: People would often turn to me for fashion and style advice, recognizing my good taste and sense of aesthetics so I knew I was appreciated.
to: Ľudia sa na mňa často obracali s prosbou o radu v oblasti módy a štýlu, uznávali môj dobrý vkus a zmysel pre estetiku, takže som vedela, že si ma vážia.

from: I saved up a lot of money for my childrens education.
to: Našetril som veľa peňazí na vzdelanie svojich detí.

from: I had tough military training.
to: Mal som náročný vojenský výcvik.

from: Maybe if I acted nicer they would say yes.
to: Možno keby som sa správal milšie, povedali by áno.

from: They were rude so I had to punch them.
to: Boli drzí, tak som ich musel udrieť.

from: There is so much going on inside my mind, I can barely focus.
to: V mojej mysli sa toho deje toľko, že sa sotva dokážem sústrediť.

from: I was never so sure about my test results.
to: Nikdy som si nebola taká istá svojimi výsledkami testov.

from: When I'm with him, I'm angry.
to: Keď som s ním, som nahnevaná.

from: I like to have fun.
to: Rád sa zabávam.

from: My GP referred me to a very good ophtalmologist because my eyesight was getting poor recently.
to: Môj všeobecný lekár ma odporučil k veľmi dobrému očnému lekárovi, pretože môj zrak sa v poslednom čase zhoršoval.

from: When was the last time you had sex?
to: Kedy ste mali naposledy sex?

from: I can't imagine having a family and having to take care of them someday.
to: Neviem si predstaviť, že by som mal rodinu a musel sa o ňu jedného dňa starať.

from: I turned on the washing machine.
to: Zapol som práčku.

from: My core strength is still very good because I go to gym three times a week.
to: Moja sila jadra je stále veľmi dobrá, pretože chodím trikrát týždenne do posilňovne.

from: I've been told that I'm a true professional – always focused, organized, and get the job done efficiently.
to: Povedali mi, že som skutočný profesionál - vždy sa sústredím, som organizovaný a svoju prácu vykonávam efektívne.

from: I stood up in front of them and told them we could do it.
to: Postavil som sa pred nich a povedal im, že to zvládneme.

from: I'm good at navigating.
to: Som dobrý v navigácii.

from: I fired everyone who made me angry.
to: Vyhodil som každého, kto ma nahneval.

from: I observed them to see whether they were satisfied with the meal I made.
to: Pozoroval som ich, či sú spokojní s jedlom, ktoré som im pripravil.

from: I had to shave my legs before the race.
to: Pred pretekmi som si musel oholiť nohy.

from: When I'm sad, I go shopping.
to: Keď som smutná, idem nakupovať.

from: I joined a self-defence course.
to: Zapísal som sa do kurzu sebaobrany.

from: I wanted him to feel welcome.
to: Chcel som, aby sa cítil vítaný.

from: I don’t like watching videos of abandoned puppies, it makes me cry.
to: Nerada sa pozerám na videá opustených šteniatok, rozplače ma to.

from: I assembled the furniture alone.
to: Nábytok som zmontoval sám.

from: I didn't know what to do, so I relied on my gut.
to: Nevedel som, čo mám robiť, a tak som sa spoľahol na svoj pocit.

to: Rád vytváram harmonické prostredie pre svoju rodinu.

from: I was the youngest CEO in the history of the company.
to: Bol som najmladším generálnym riaditeľom v histórii spoločnosti.

from: I wanted to dig up the treasure, but I needed more people.
to: Chcel som vykopať poklad, ale potreboval som viac ľudí.

from: I feel confident most of the time so it came naturally to me to be a leader.
to: Väčšinu času sa cítim sebavedomo, takže byť lídrom je pre mňa prirodzené.

from: I was frustrated when I was unable to satisfy my sexual needs.
to: Bol som frustrovaný, keď som nemohol uspokojiť svoje sexuálne potreby.

from: I let them take advantage of my kindness.
to: Dovolil som im využiť moju láskavosť.

from: I hated how rude they were, but I didn't say anything.
to: Vadilo mi, že sú hrubé, ale nič som nepovedala.

from: If you weren't with me, god knows how it'd end.
to: Keby si nebol so mnou, boh vie, ako by sa to skončilo.

from: I invited strangers to our table, and it made a very good group of people.
to: Pozvala som k nášmu stolu cudzích ľudí a vytvorila sa veľmi dobrá skupina ľudí.

from: I divided the tasks equally among all the team members.
to: Úlohy som rozdelil rovnomerne medzi všetkých členov tímu.

from: For my birthday, I asked to go skydiving.
to: Na svoje narodeniny som chcel ísť skočiť s padákom.

from: I felt it in my gut.
to: Cítil som to v bruchu.

from: I have never been a loner, I prefer to be surrounded by people.
to: Nikdy som nebol samotár, radšej som obklopený ľuďmi.

from: Sorry, I could have come but I was having a really bad hair day.
to: Ospravedlňujem sa, mohol som prísť, ale mal som naozaj zlý deň.

from: With each punch thrown and block executed, I could feel the power surging through me.
to: S každým úderom a vykonaným blokom som cítil, ako ma napĺňa sila.

from: My mind was set - I got married despite everyone being against it.
to: Bola som rozhodnutá - vydala som sa napriek tomu, že všetci boli proti.

from: I had enough romance, I wanted something more intimate.
to: Romantiky som mala dosť, chcela som niečo intímnejšie.

from: Every step reflected the confidence I held within, captivating the onlookers with my magnetic presence.
to: Každý krok odrážal sebadôveru, ktorú som v sebe nosila, a svojou magnetickou prítomnosťou som uchvacovala okolie.

from: I like extreme sports even though they are really dangerous.
to: Mám rád extrémne športy, aj keď sú naozaj nebezpečné.

from: I don't like when the meal I prepared is tasteless.
to: Nemám rád, keď je jedlo, ktoré som pripravil, bez chuti.

from: I was initially a suspect, but the police determined I was not strong enough to hurt them.
to: Spočiatku som bol podozrivý, ale polícia usúdila, že nie som dosť silný na to, aby som im ublížil.

from: I filtered out all the distractions.
to: Odfiltroval som všetky rušivé vplyvy.

from: I remained composed although the situation escalated.
to: Zostal som pokojný, hoci sa situácia vyhrotila.

from: I like to read fashion magazines.
to: Rada čítam módne časopisy.

from: I had to work even over Christmas to earn as much money as possible.
to: Musel som pracovať aj cez Vianoce, aby som zarobil čo najviac peňazí.

from: I went to buy new sponges, these were too dirty.
to: Išla som si kúpiť nové špongie, tieto boli príliš špinavé.

from: I was just in a meeting.
to: Práve som mal stretnutie.

from: I should be thoughtful, because that's what's expected of me.
to: Mal by som byť pozorný, pretože sa to odo mňa očakáva.

from: I went to walk the dogs from the shelter.
to: Išla som vyvenčiť psy z útulku.

from: I had this weird feeling, so I called my parents right away to see if they were okay.
to: Mal som divný pocit, tak som hneď zavolal rodičom, či sú v poriadku.

from: I would never be able to cheat.
to: Nikdy by som nemohol podvádzať.

from: I was aware that bad leadership leads to bad results.
to: Bol som si vedomý, že zlé vedenie vedie k zlým výsledkom.

from: I never stressed about work responsibilities because I knew that I could handle anything.
to: Nikdy som sa nestresovala pracovnými povinnosťami, pretože som vedela, že zvládnem všetko.

from: I cleaned the house yesterday and now it's a mess again.
to: Včera som upratovala dom a teraz je tu opäť neporiadok.

from: Some people hate accessories, but I like wearing them.
to: Niektorí ľudia doplnky neznášajú, ale ja ich nosím rada.

from: I haven't carried cash with me since I was robbed.
to: Odkedy ma okradli, nenosím pri sebe hotovosť.

from: I have a habit of going along with what other people want.
to: Mám vo zvyku súhlasiť s tým, čo chcú iní ľudia.

from: I got overwhelmed with sadness.
to: Zaplavil ma smútok.

from: I offered accommodation to two refugees.
to: Dvom utečencom som ponúkol ubytovanie.

from: I'm very competitive when it comes to promotions and performance in the workplace.
to: Som veľmi súťaživý, pokiaľ ide o povýšenie a výkon na pracovisku.

from: I always wanted to be a researcher, but I wouldn't have time to take care of my family.
to: Vždy som chcel byť výskumníkom, ale nemal by som čas starať sa o rodinu.

from: Since I've been doing this sport, I'm much more balanced.
to: Odkedy sa venujem tomuto športu, som oveľa vyrovnanejší.

from: Finally the beauty catalogue that I ordered has arrived.
to: Konečne mi prišiel objednaný katalóg krásy.

from: I am very attractive.
to: Som veľmi atraktívna.

from: I didn't need your financial help!
to: Nepotreboval som vašu finančnú pomoc!

from: The storm raged on, but I stood strong on the deck of the ship.
to: Búrka zúrila, ale ja som stál pevne na palube lode.

from: When tsunami came, I volunteered to save people from drowning.
to: Keď prišlo cunami, dobrovoľne som zachraňoval ľudí pred utopením.

from: I ordered them to stop praying and start helping.
to: Prikázal som im, aby sa prestali modliť a začali pomáhať.

from: It was hard for me to admit that I needed a hand.
to: Bolo pre mňa ťažké priznať si, že potrebujem pomoc.

from: I could easily seduce you at the bar.
to: Mohol by som ťa ľahko zviesť v bare.

from: I would never allow myself to offend anyone.
to: Nikdy by som si nedovolil nikoho uraziť.

from: I am tired after walking for ten minutes.
to: Po desiatich minútach chôdze som unavený.

from: I have always felt that childcare was my life goal.
to: Vždy som cítila, že starostlivosť o deti je mojím životným cieľom.

from: When I was little, I wanted to be an athlete, but my parents signed me up for ballet instead.
to: Keď som bol malý, chcel som byť športovcom, ale rodičia ma prihlásili na balet.

from: As a pilot, I ensured the safety of passengers and crew by adhering to rigorous protocols.
to: Ako pilot som zabezpečoval bezpečnosť cestujúcich a posádky dodržiavaním prísnych protokolov.

from: I didn't want us to sign a prenup, because I'd take care of my partner even after a divorce.
to: Nechcela som, aby sme podpísali predmanželskú zmluvu, pretože by som sa o svojho partnera postarala aj po rozvode.

from: My friend is always making me laugh.
to: Môj priateľ ma vždy rozosmeje.

from: I was the first one at the library.
to: V knižnici som bol prvý.

from: I struggled to strike a balance between my sexual desires and other important aspects of life.
to: Snažil som sa nájsť rovnováhu medzi svojimi sexuálnymi túžbami a inými dôležitými aspektmi života.

from: Why did I have to get old?!
to: Prečo som musel zostarnúť?!

from: I could lift that car if I wanted to.
to: Keby som chcel, mohol by som to auto zdvihnúť.

from: That job wasn't meant for me, but for someone stronger.
to: Tá práca nebola určená pre mňa, ale pre niekoho silnejšieho.

from: I first weighted all the possible scenarios.
to: Najprv som zvážil všetky možné scenáre.

from: Don't go there alone, it can be dangerous.
to: Nechoďte tam sami, môže to byť nebezpečné.

from: I didn't like our sex, but I didn't say anything.
to: Náš sex sa mi nepáčil, ale nič som nepovedala.

from: I had to carry the logs all on my own, but it was fine.
to: Klády som musel nosiť sám, ale bolo to v poriadku.

from: I used to clean the house on every Saturday.
to: Každú sobotu som upratovala dom.

from: I like to just smile at someone because I believe it will make their day better.
to: Rád sa na niekoho usmejem, pretože verím, že mu to zlepší deň.

from: I thought that confidence is the key aspect of having a healthy and successful life.
to: Myslela som si, že sebadôvera je kľúčovým aspektom zdravého a úspešného života.

from: I never let my family affect my profession.
to: Nikdy som nedovolil, aby moja rodina ovplyvnila moju profesiu.

from: I was the first one at the clothing store.
to: V obchode s oblečením som bol prvý.

from: I have worked hard to get to where I am today.
to: Tvrdo som pracoval, aby som sa dostal tam, kde som dnes.

from: I hoped I had been a pleasant companion.
to: Dúfala som, že som bola príjemnou spoločníčkou.

from: I could not wrap my head around this hard mathematical problem.
to: Nedokázal som sa zorientovať v tomto ťažkom matematickom probléme.

from: I couldn't keep up with the intense workout routine, my body feeling weak and exhausted from the exertion.
to: Nedokázala som vydržať intenzívne cvičenie, moje telo bolo slabé a vyčerpané z námahy.

from: I didn't need your support.
to: Nepotreboval som vašu podporu.

from: I'd rather have everything right away.
to: Radšej by som mal všetko hneď.

from: I would feel incompetent if I paid a cleaning lady.
to: Cítila by som sa neschopná, keby som platila upratovačke.

from: I stopped the pickpocket and held him until the police came.
to: Zastavil som vreckára a zadržal ho, kým neprišla polícia.

from: I slammed the door after the argument.
to: Po hádke som zabuchla dvere.

from: I could strike up a conversation with almost everybody that evening.
to: V ten večer som sa dokázal dať do reči takmer s každým.

from: I was just protecting you from other people at that club.
to: Len som ťa chránil pred ostatnými ľuďmi v tom klube.

from: I never had a problem with learning a new language.
to: Nikdy som nemal problém s učením sa nového jazyka.

from: I always liked dancing.
to: Vždy som rád tancoval.

from: I read a book about self-improvement yesterday.
to: Včera som čítal knihu o sebazdokonaľovaní.

from: Despite the criticism I thought I did well.
to: Napriek kritike si myslím, že som si počínal dobre.

from: I was always first picked when playing any sports back in highschool.
to: Na strednej škole som bol pri športe vždy prvý.

from: As I effortlessly lifted the heavy box, the surprised expressions on others' faces made me smile.
to: Keď som bez námahy zdvihol ťažkú škatuľu, prekvapené výrazy na tvárach ostatných ma rozosmiali.

from: I could not cook because it was my mother's job.
to: Nemohla som variť, pretože to bola práca mojej mamy.

from: I am able to see the big picture of where the organisation is heading.
to: Som schopný vidieť celkový obraz toho, kam organizácia smeruje.

from: I took the time to understand and acknowledge the emotions of a colleague who was going through a difficult time.
to: Našiel som si čas, aby som pochopil a uznal emócie kolegu, ktorý prežíval ťažké obdobie.

from: I'm an expert in my field.
to: Som odborník vo svojom odbore.

from: I wished the gig would never end, there were so many nice people everywhere.
to: Priala som si, aby sa koncert nikdy neskončil, všade bolo toľko milých ľudí.

from: On the way home I talked to an elderly lady on the train.
to: Cestou domov som sa vo vlaku rozprával s jednou staršou pani.

from: I am able to compete with anyone.
to: Som schopný súťažiť s kýmkoľvek.

from: I was raised to know how to take care of others.
to: Bol som vychovaný tak, aby som sa vedel postarať o druhých.

from: I found a nice picture of myself easily.
to: Ľahko som našiel pekný obrázok seba samého.

from: I was proud of being a good kisser.
to: Bola som hrdá na to, že sa dobre bozkávam.

from: I learned how to drive before I was even allowed to.
to: Naučil som sa šoférovať ešte skôr, ako som to vôbec mohol robiť.

from: I like to throw parties for my kids because we always have a house full of people.
to: Rád organizujem oslavy pre svoje deti, pretože máme vždy plný dom ľudí.

from: I came up with a deal: if you vacuum, I'll take you out tonight.
to: Navrhol som dohodu: ak budeš vysávať, vezmem ťa večer von.

from: I used to enjoy being able to simply use my smile to achieve things.
to: Kedysi som si užíval, keď som mohol jednoducho používať svoj úsmev na dosiahnutie vecí.

from: I made some extra money as a personal trainer.
to: Privyrobil som si ako osobný tréner.

from: Since I’ve been eating more protein, I feel much stronger.
to: Odkedy jem viac bielkovín, cítim sa oveľa silnejší.

from: If I had been there, the atmosphere would have been better.
to: Keby som tam bol, atmosféra by bola lepšia.

from: I feel fulfilled when I can take care of everybody in the house.
to: Cítim sa spokojná, keď sa môžem postarať o všetkých v dome.

from: I worked hard to maintain my position.
to: Tvrdo som pracoval, aby som si udržal svoju pozíciu.

from: I would never come to work drunk.
to: Nikdy by som neprišiel do práce opitý.

from: I like to take care of our pets.
to: Rád sa starám o naše domáce zvieratá.

from: I like to talk so much that I do it with animals too.
to: Rozprávam tak rada, že to robím aj so zvieratami.

from: If I knew how boring university was, I would never have gone to it.
to: Keby som vedel, aká je univerzita nudná, nikdy by som na ňu nešiel.

from: As a pharmacist, I ensured compliance with regulatory guidelines.
to: Ako lekárnik som zabezpečoval dodržiavanie regulačných smerníc.

from: I like to spend time with children because they have great ideas and opinions.
to: Rád trávim čas s deťmi, pretože majú skvelé nápady a názory.

from: When it came to tears, my heart softened and I accepted the apology.
to: Keď došlo na slzy, moje srdce sa zmiernilo a ja som ospravedlnenie prijala.

from: They commented on my outfit and I had to do my best not to scold them.
to: Komentovali moje oblečenie a ja som mala čo robiť, aby som im nevynadala.

from: I actively engaged with a team member who was experiencing difficulty at work.
to: Aktívne som sa venoval členovi tímu, ktorý mal v práci problémy.

from: I joined a university study because they were looking for sexually active people.
to: Zapojil som sa do univerzitnej štúdie, pretože hľadali sexuálne aktívnych ľudí.

from: I would prefer not to eat than to wear something ugly.
to: Radšej nebudem jesť, ako by som si mala obliecť niečo škaredé.

from: I had trouble keeping up with the pace of a fitness class.
to: Mal som problém udržať tempo na hodine fitness.

from: I think my co-worker is an excellent leader.
to: Myslím si, že môj spolupracovník je vynikajúci vedúci.

from: I hauled heavy loads, it was my job and I liked it.
to: Ťahal som ťažké náklady, bola to moja práca a mal som ju rád.

from: I like to build sand castles at the beach.
to: Na pláži rád staviam hrady z piesku.

from: I wanted to discuss the current political situation with you.
to: Chcel som s vami diskutovať o súčasnej politickej situácii.

from: I could never leave the airport without first checking all the fragnances first.
to: Nikdy som nemohol opustiť letisko bez toho, aby som najprv skontroloval všetky fragmenty.

from: I established a cleaning routine and adhered to it.
to: Zaviedla som si režim čistenia a dodržiavala ho.

from: I always did something extra although my job didn't require it.
to: Vždy som robil niečo navyše, hoci to moja práca nevyžadovala.

from: I wanted to kiss them both.
to: Chcela som ich oboch pobozkať.

from: I love team sports so I was really sad that I could not join the volleyball team.
to: Milujem kolektívne športy, takže som bola veľmi smutná, že som sa nemohla pridať k volejbalovému tímu.

from: In a business meeting, I actively listened to my colleagues and responded to their proposals with relevant comments.
to: Na pracovnom stretnutí som aktívne počúval svojich kolegov a reagoval na ich návrhy relevantnými pripomienkami.

from: I allowed my anxiety to control my actions, avoiding certain situations.
to: Dovolil som, aby moja úzkosť ovládala moje konanie a vyhýbal som sa určitým situáciám.

from: I was promoted because I have good communication skills.
to: Povýšili ma, pretože mám dobré komunikačné schopnosti.

from: I performed a series of rituals before an important event.
to: Pred dôležitou udalosťou som vykonal sériu rituálov.

from: I considered different viewpoints and engaged in rational dialogue to reach a collective decision.
to: Zvážil som rôzne názory a zapojil sa do racionálneho dialógu, aby som dosiahol spoločné rozhodnutie.

from: There were just too many obstacles so I had to give up.
to: Bolo tam príliš veľa prekážok, takže som to musel vzdať.

from: I was asked to take care of my neighbour, and I obliged.
to: Požiadali ma, aby som sa postaral o svojho suseda, a ja som im vyhovel.

from: I could never stand up for myself.
to: Nikdy som sa nedokázala postaviť sama za seba.

from: I took some days to think over the offer.
to: Vzal som si niekoľko dní na premyslenie ponuky.

from: I had no doubts, I was certain that they liked me.
to: Nemala som žiadne pochybnosti, bola som si istá, že ma majú radi.

from: My smile was shinning through the whole room.
to: Môj úsmev prežiaril celú miestnosť.

from: Last night I turned into a beast.
to: Včera večer som sa zmenil na beštiu.

from: I reviewed the paper three times until there were no typos.
to: Dokument som skontroloval trikrát, kým som v ňom nenašiel žiadne preklepy.

from: I like to have the best mobile on the market.
to: Rád by som mal najlepší mobil na trhu.

from: I made the same mistake despite the obvious signs.
to: Urobil som tú istú chybu napriek zjavným znakom.

from: I hated art subjects at school.
to: V škole som nenávidel výtvarné predmety.

from: I never thought we could only stay friends.
to: Nikdy som si nemyslela, že by sme mohli zostať len priateľmi.

from: I plowed the entire field.
to: Zoral som celé pole.

from: I assembled the furniture on my own.
to: Nábytok som si zmontoval sám.

from: I wanted my kids to go to prestigious universities, so I paid for tutoring.
to: Chcel som, aby moje deti študovali na prestížnych univerzitách, a tak som im zaplatil doučovanie.

from: I feel social pressure to look beautiful.
to: Cítim spoločenský tlak, aby som vyzerala krásne.

from: I had an STD test done.
to: Nechala som si urobiť test na pohlavne prenosné choroby.

from: I resolved to brush my dog at least three times a week so he wouldn’t shed as much.
to: Rozhodla som sa, že svojho psa budem čistiť aspoň trikrát týždenne, aby toľko nelínal.

from: I delegated tasks effectively, matching the skills and strengths of my team members with the right responsibilities.
to: Efektívne som delegoval úlohy, pričom som prispôsobil zručnosti a silné stránky členov svojho tímu správnym povinnostiam.

from: I am the manager of this bank.
to: Som manažér tejto banky.

from: I got approached by some model agency.
to: Oslovila ma nejaká modelingová agentúra.

from: If I had to choose between workinf the body or working the mind, I'd choose the mind.
to: Ak by som si mal vybrať medzi prácou na tele a prácou na mysli, vybral by som si myseľ.

from: I couldn't donate blood because I didn't meet the minimum weight requirement.
to: Nemohol som darovať krv, pretože som nespĺňal požiadavku minimálnej hmotnosti.

from: I calmly handled a difficult customer.
to: Pokojne som zvládol problémového zákazníka.

from: I increased my earning potential to provide better financial support for my family.
to: Zvýšil som svoj zárobkový potenciál, aby som lepšie finančne zabezpečil svoju rodinu.

from: I don't like to read books because they're boring.
to: Nerada čítam knihy, pretože sú nudné.

from: We didn't need a cleaning lady because I liked to be in charge of cleaning the house.
to: Nepotrebovali sme upratovačku, pretože upratovanie domu som mala rada na starosti ja.

from: I didn't like losing time and started working immediately.
to: Nerád som strácal čas a okamžite som začal pracovať.

from: I decided to change my plans for no reason.
to: Bezdôvodne som sa rozhodol zmeniť svoje plány.

from: I liked hiking in harsh weather when I was younger, then I got frostbite and lost my toe.
to: Keď som bol mladší, rád som chodil na túry v nepriaznivom počasí, potom som si omrzol prst na nohe.

from: I know it hurts, but you should pull yourself together.
to: Viem, že to bolí, ale mal by si sa spamätať.

from: I could not concentrate and had to constantly play with something because the job was boring.
to: Nemohol som sa sústrediť a musel som sa neustále s niečím hrať, pretože práca bola nudná.

from: I'm not very good at showing my emotions.
to: Nie som veľmi dobrý v prejavovaní svojich emócií.

from: When the deadline was approaching I just decided to share my answers with them.
to: Keď sa blížil termín uzávierky, rozhodol som sa, že sa s nimi podelím o svoje odpovede.

from: I changed my hair color according to the latest fashion.
to: Zmenila som si farbu vlasov podľa najnovšej módy.

from: I thought about starting my own vlog about fashion.
to: Rozmýšľala som, že si založím vlastný vlog o móde.

from: I couldn’t stand being cooped up at home for another day.
to: Nemohol som vydržať byť zavretý doma ďalší deň.

from: I always protected my relatives no matter what.
to: Vždy som chránil svojich príbuzných, nech sa dialo čokoľvek.

from: When becoming a leader, the key aspect was to be capable of managing complex situations.
to: Kľúčovým aspektom, keď sa stal lídrom, bola schopnosť zvládať zložité situácie.

from: I always thought that it was healthy to have multiple partners.
to: Vždy som si myslel, že je zdravé mať viac partnerov.

from: I carried it up the stairs myself.
to: Sám som ho vyniesol po schodoch.

from: I needed someone to talk to because it was too much.
to: Potrebovala som sa s niekým porozprávať, pretože toho bolo príliš veľa.

from: I’m aware of my qualities.
to: Som si vedomý svojich kvalít.

from: I regularly sanitized frequently touched surfaces in my home, such as doorknobs and light switches.
to: Pravidelne som dezinfikovala povrchy, ktorých sa často dotýkam, ako sú kľučky a vypínače svetiel.

from: I have never left home without making sure that everybody has something to eat first.
to: Nikdy som neodišiel z domu bez toho, aby som sa uistil, že každý má najprv niečo na jedenie.

from: I frequently sought reassurance and validation from others.
to: Často som hľadal uistenie a potvrdenie u iných.

from: I had a lot of experience with various drugs.
to: Mal som veľa skúseností s rôznymi liekmi.

from: I didn't like when my partner earned more than me.
to: Nepáčilo sa mi, keď môj partner zarábal viac ako ja.

from: I always felt driven by leader positions.
to: Vždy som sa cítil poháňaný pozíciami lídra.

from: Even though they were acting rude, I was trying to be as polite as I could.
to: Aj keď sa správali hrubo, snažil som sa byť čo najslušnejší.

from: I would be happier if my partner stayed at home and raised the children.
to: Bola by som šťastnejšia, keby môj partner zostal doma a vychovával deti.

from: I pitied the beggar and gave him money.
to: Ľutoval som žobráka a dal som mu peniaze.

from: I could not hold back the tears.
to: Nemohla som zadržať slzy.

from: I couldn't do it with my bare hands.
to: Nedokázal by som to urobiť holými rukami.

from: I knew they had something against me, although I had no proof.
to: Vedel som, že proti mne niečo majú, hoci som nemal dôkaz.

from: I had no problem with climbing that hill.
to: S výstupom na tento kopec som nemal žiadny problém.

from: At school, the biggest punishment for me was having to sit alone.
to: V škole bolo pre mňa najväčším trestom, že som musel sedieť sám.

from: I had to cancel the neighbourhood barbeque because nobody helped me with cleaning the grill, and I could not do it on my own.
to: Musel som zrušiť susedskú grilovačku, pretože mi nikto nepomohol s čistením grilu a sám som to nezvládol.

from: I offered to help the new neighbours the paperwork.
to: Ponúkol som sa, že pomôžem novým susedom s papierovaním.

from: To avoid having to wash dishes, I bought a plastic one.
to: Aby som nemusela umývať riad, kúpila som si plastový.

from: I did it even though it was risky.
to: Urobil som to, aj keď to bolo riskantné.

from: I lost my job and the reason was that I couldn't handle stress, but I can.
to: Prišiel som o prácu a dôvodom bolo, že nezvládam stres, ale ja ho zvládam.

from: As a journalist, I conducted thorough interviews, verified facts, and crafted compelling stories
to: Ako novinár som viedol dôkladné rozhovory, overoval fakty a vytváral presvedčivé príbehy.

from: I did not need to ask for help.
to: Nemusel som žiadať o pomoc.

from: I never considered going to therapy.
to: Nikdy som neuvažovala o tom, že by som išla na terapiu.

from: I didn't accept any position but that of a boss.
to: Neprijal som žiadnu inú pozíciu ako pozíciu šéfa.

from: I wish I could think more rationally.
to: Priala by som si, aby som dokázala uvažovať racionálnejšie.

from: I felt really good looking in all the new clothes.
to: V novom oblečení som sa cítila naozaj dobre.

from: I always like physical jobs.
to: Vždy som mal rád fyzickú prácu.

from: I was looking out for my employees even though I was on holiday.
to: Staral som sa o svojich zamestnancov, aj keď som bol na dovolenke.

from: I insisted on having sex.
to: Trvala som na sexe.

from: I was with my friend who couldn't stop talking.
to: Bola som s kamarátkou, ktorá nemohla prestať rozprávať.

from: I am experienced enough to be able to prioritise effectively.
to: Mám dostatok skúseností na to, aby som dokázal efektívne určiť priority.

from: I gave a keynote speech at a conference.
to: Na konferencii som predniesol hlavný prejav.

from: I was immature even after I graduated, I was still acting like a selfish kid.
to: Bol som nezrelý aj po maturite, stále som sa správal ako sebecký chlapec.

from: I consulted the teacher about our children's grades.
to: Poradila som sa s učiteľkou o známkach našich detí.

from: I didn't want to be responsible for my decisions.
to: Nechcel som byť zodpovedný za svoje rozhodnutia.

from: I focused on maintaining a clean and neat appearance
to: Zameral som sa na udržiavanie čistého a upraveného vzhľadu

from: I had to give up, the opponents were just too fierce.
to: Musel som sa vzdať, súperi boli príliš zúriví.

from: I volunteered at a local food bank, engaging with individuals facing food insecurity.
to: Pracovala som ako dobrovoľníčka v miestnej potravinovej banke, kde som sa venovala ľuďom, ktorí čelia nedostatku potravín.

from: I followed a lot of beauty influencers on social media.
to: Na sociálnych sieťach som sledovala veľa kozmetických influencerov.

from: I organised a workshop for all the stakeholders.
to: Zorganizoval som workshop pre všetky zainteresované strany.

from: I met an elderly gentleman for whom I do grocery shopping every Monday.
to: Stretol som staršieho pána, ktorému každý pondelok nakupujem potraviny.

from: I washed my hair so often I ruined it all over.
to: Vlasy som si umývala tak často, že som si ich celé zničila.

from: I'm the funny one in our family.
to: Ja som v našej rodine ten vtipný.

from: Even though I had won, I felt awkward when they gave me the award.
to: Aj keď som vyhral, cítil som sa trápne, keď mi odovzdávali cenu.

from: I attended a community workshop and participated in the discussion.
to: Zúčastnil som sa na komunitnom seminári a zapojil sa do diskusie.

from: I did not talk back to them.
to: Neodpovedal som im.

from: On a date, my partner couldn't help but compliment my good looks, making me feel attractive and desired.
to: Na rande mi partner nemohol nepochváliť môj pekný vzhľad, vďaka čomu som sa cítila príťažlivá a žiadaná.

from: Out of every pay check, I chose to send a portion of the money to someone because they need it more than I do.
to: Z každej výplaty som sa rozhodol poslať časť peňazí niekomu, kto ich potrebuje viac ako ja.

from: I worked extra hard to be able to afford this massage appointment.
to: Pracovala som veľmi tvrdo, aby som si mohla dovoliť túto masáž.

from: I sold items we no longer needed to contribute to pay off family debts.
to: Predal som veci, ktoré sme už nepotrebovali, aby sme prispeli na splatenie rodinných dlhov.

from: I like to go for walks in the park and listen to the birds.
to: Rád chodím na prechádzky do parku a počúvam vtáky.

from: I assessed the risk and decided it was not worth it.
to: Zhodnotil som riziko a rozhodol som sa, že to nestojí za to.

from: I’m extremely communicative and love to meet new people.
to: Som mimoriadne komunikatívna a rada spoznávam nových ľudí.

from: I bought a new motorbike that is even more powerful than the last one.
to: Kúpil som si novú motorku, ktorá je ešte výkonnejšia ako tá predchádzajúca.

from: I never expected anyone to pay my bills.
to: Nikdy som neočakával, že mi niekto zaplatí účty.

from: I like to make dinner for my family.
to: Rád pripravujem večeru pre svoju rodinu.

from: I could not handle all the algebra rules.
to: Nedokázal som zvládnuť všetky pravidlá algebry.

from: As a project manager, I organized team meetings, allocated resources efficiently, and ensured clear communication channels to meet project deadlines successfully.
to: Ako projektový manažér som organizoval stretnutia tímu, efektívne rozdeľoval zdroje a zabezpečoval jasné komunikačné kanály, aby som úspešne dodržal termíny projektu.

from: I think I could fight off a bear if I met one in the forest.
to: Myslím, že by som dokázal zahnať medveďa, keby som ho stretol v lese.

from: I called the neighbours over for a barbecue.
to: Zavolal som susedov na grilovanie.

from: In my private life, I have never encountered rejection.
to: V súkromnom živote som sa nikdy nestretol s odmietnutím.

from: I could never go to a public toilet, they are full of bacteria.
to: Nikdy by som nemohol ísť na verejné toalety, sú plné baktérií.

from: I didn't take their worries seriously.
to: Ich obavy som nebral vážne.

from: I always kept my privacy so people couldn't hurt me in any way.
to: Vždy som si udržiaval súkromie, aby mi ľudia nemohli nijako ublížiť.

from: I saw a very cute cat video, they were just like me.
to: Videla som veľmi roztomilé video s mačkami, boli ako ja.

from: I was enjoying leading others.
to: Bavilo ma viesť ostatných.

from: I spent the whole night baking this cake.
to: Tento koláč som piekla celú noc.

from: I like kinky people.
to: Mám rád výstredných ľudí.

from: I did not take the medicine the doctor recommended.
to: Neužil som liek, ktorý mi odporučil lekár.

from: In my position, it is crucial that I am able to detect and prevent threats early on.
to: V mojej pozícii je veľmi dôležité, aby som dokázal včas odhaliť hrozby a predchádzať im.

from: I wanted to make a counter-offer, but that would be a low blow.
to: Chcel som urobiť protinávrh, ale to by bol úder pod pás.

from: I was always leading by example.
to: Vždy som išiel príkladom.

from: I gave them money to feel better.
to: Dal som im peniaze, aby sa cítili lepšie.

from: I was afraid of staying alone.
to: Bál som sa zostať sám.

from: You shouldn't lift that, it's too heavy.
to: Nemal by si to dvíhať, je to príliš ťažké.

from: I ironed the clothes for my partner.
to: Vyžehlila som oblečenie pre svojho partnera.

from: I've built such a reputation that people are afraid to even look at me.
to: Vybudoval som si takú povesť, že sa na mňa ľudia boja čo i len pozrieť.

from: As a psychologist, I developed personalized treatment plans to address mental health concerns.
to: Ako psychologička som vypracovala individuálne liečebné plány na riešenie problémov duševného zdravia.

from: I have recently completed an important and challenging research.
to: Nedávno som dokončil dôležitý a náročný výskum.

from: I changed my schedule when they asked me to.
to: Na ich žiadosť som zmenil svoj rozvrh.

from: I took an extra shift this week.
to: Tento týždeň som si vzal dodatočnú zmenu.

from: When I heard there were going to be carousels in town, I was very happy.
to: Keď som sa dozvedel, že v meste budú kolotoče, veľmi som sa potešil.

from: It is not a problem to make coffee - I like doing it.
to: Nie je problém pripraviť kávu - robím to rád.

from: I want to have as much fun with others as possible while I’m young.
to: Chcem si užiť čo najviac zábavy s ostatnými, kým som mladý.

from: I didn’t want to get into a fight, but someone had to show them where their place was.
to: Nechcel som sa hádať, ale niekto im musel ukázať, kde je ich miesto.

from: I didn't take my responsibilities so seriously.
to: Svoje povinnosti som nebrala tak vážne.

from: We were arguing over the messages, so I threw my phone on the ground in anger and it shattered all over.
to: Hádali sme sa kvôli správam, tak som v hneve hodila telefón na zem a ten sa celý rozbil.

from: I always could do anything that I told myself.
to: Vždy som dokázal všetko, čo som si povedal.

from: My indicator light is on in my car, would you be able to check it?
to: V mojom aute svieti kontrolka, vedeli by ste ju skontrolovať?

from: I’ve discovered that the colour of this season is red.
to: Zistila som, že farbou tejto sezóny je červená.

from: Do you think you're stronger than me?
to: Myslíš si, že si silnejší ako ja?

from: I tried to do a push-up, but my arms gave out.
to: Pokúsil som sa urobiť klik, ale ruky mi vypovedali službu.

from: When the building was in flames, I carried buckets of water all night.
to: Keď bola budova v plameňoch, celú noc som nosil vedrá s vodou.

from: I couldn't wait till Friday because that's a party day.
to: Nemohla som čakať do piatku, pretože to je deň osláv.

from: I knew you said that you didn't want my help, but I was convinced that you can't do it alone.
to: Vedela som, že si povedal, že nechceš moju pomoc, ale bola som presvedčená, že to sám nezvládneš.

from: Losing a limb didn't stop me from winning the Olympics.
to: Strata končatiny mi nezabránila vyhrať olympiádu.

from: I like to discuss with people who have different opinions.
to: Rád diskutujem s ľuďmi, ktorí majú iné názory.

from: As the leader, I left behind a legacy.
to: Ako vedúci som po sebe zanechal dedičstvo.

from: I picked up the steel frames.
to: Vybral som oceľové rámy.

from: I went to see the new lego movie and I think i was the only adult in the whole cinema.
to: Bol som na novom lego filme a myslím, že som bol jediný dospelý v celom kine.

from: I wouldn't go out if I didn't know how I look.
to: Nešla by som von, keby som nevedela, ako vyzerám.

from: I like spending time with my kids by jumping around and acting foolish.
to: Rád trávim čas so svojimi deťmi skákaním a bláznovstvom.

from: I mocked their appearance.
to: Vysmial som sa ich vzhľadu.

from: I meticulously reviewed and revised my work.
to: Svoju prácu som starostlivo preskúmal a zrevidoval.

from: We had a fight, so I packed up all my stuff and left.
to: Pohádali sme sa, tak som si zbalila všetky veci a odišla.

from: I never thought I’d be the one to turn him in to the police.
to: Nikdy som si nemyslel, že to budem ja, kto ho udá na polícii.

from: I never stopped learning.
to: Nikdy som sa neprestal učiť.

from: As I navigated the challenging obstacle course, I pushed my body to the limits.
to: Pri zdolávaní náročnej prekážkovej dráhy som svoje telo posúval na hranicu svojich možností.

from: I was speeding on my new Mercedes.
to: Prekročil som rýchlosť na svojom novom mercedese.

from: I possessed an undeniable allure that captivated others, drawing their attention and admiration.
to: Mala som nepopierateľný pôvab, ktorý ostatných uchvacoval, priťahoval ich pozornosť a obdiv.

from: Hold my beer, I could do it better than you.
to: Podrž mi pivo, zvládol by som to lepšie ako ty.

from: I have always loved holiday family reunions, it is so nice to be all together again.
to: Vždy som milovala prázdninové rodinné stretnutia, je príjemné byť opäť všetci spolu.

from: I bought that perfume I saw in the ad.
to: Kúpila som si ten parfum, ktorý som videla v reklame.

from: I strapped on my hiking boots and embarked on a challenging trek.
to: Obul som si turistické topánky a vydal sa na náročnú túru.

from: I provided guidance and support to help new colleagues integrate into the company culture.
to: Poskytoval som poradenstvo a podporu novým kolegom pri začleňovaní do firemnej kultúry.

from: I always knew that you'd be mine.
to: Vždy som vedel, že budeš moja.

from: I have never cared about what others think.
to: Nikdy ma nezaujímalo, čo si myslia ostatní.

from: I attempted to swim long distances, but my endurance was weak.
to: Pokúšal som sa plávať dlhé vzdialenosti, ale moja vytrvalosť bola slabá.

from: I burst into tears at work after receiving a slightly critical email, even though I knew it was an overreaction and not worth getting so upset about.
to: V práci som sa rozplakala po tom, čo som dostala mierne kritický e-mail, hoci som vedela, že je to prehnaná reakcia a že sa netreba tak rozčuľovať.

from: I was so worried that I got completely paralysed.
to: Bol som taký vystrašený, že som úplne ochrnul.

from: I wondered how long would this meeting last, but I kept silent.
to: Rozmýšľala som, ako dlho bude toto stretnutie trvať, ale mlčala som.

from: I like to make a good first impression.
to: Rád urobím dobrý prvý dojem.

from: I knew best what I can and what I cannot do, you didn't have to tell me.
to: Najlepšie som vedel, čo môžem a čo nemôžem, nemusel si mi to hovoriť.

from: I didn't take any responsibility.
to: Nevzal som na seba žiadnu zodpovednosť.

from: I took on an extra shift.
to: Vzal som si jednu zmenu navyše.

from: I decided on the direction of the company.
to: Rozhodol som o smerovaní spoločnosti.

from: I feel the happiest when hosting a party.
to: Najšťastnejšia sa cítim, keď organizujem večierok.

from: I was aware how they felt.
to: Uvedomoval som si, ako sa cítia.

from: I like to wear something that highlights my decolettage.
to: Rada nosím niečo, čo zvýrazní môj dekolt.

from: I don't want to go with you if you're driving, you are a horrible driver.
to: Nechcem ísť s tebou, ak budeš šoférovať, si hrozný vodič.

from: I prefer to deal with my problems myself.
to: Svoje problémy si radšej riešim sám.

from: Didn't I tell you not to eat in the living room?
to: Nepovedal som ti, aby si nejedol v obývačke?

from: The engine roared as I maneuvered the powerful off-road vehicle through the rough and unforgiving terrain.
to: Motor reval, keď som manévroval s výkonným terénnym vozidlom cez drsný a neľútostný terén.

from: I go to every meeting dressed formally.
to: Na každé stretnutie chodím formálne oblečený.

from: I constantly put others' needs and desires before my own, rarely asserting my own preferences or standing up for myself.
to: Neustále uprednostňujem potreby a túžby druhých pred svojimi vlastnými, zriedkavo presadzujem svoje vlastné preferencie alebo si stojím za svojím.

from: I never liked the attention.
to: Nikdy som nemal rád pozornosť.

from: I worked hard so that everything looks perfect now.
to: Tvrdo som pracoval, aby všetko vyzeralo perfektne.

from: I’m going to the bar tonight, I’ve been too tense lately.
to: Dnes večer idem do baru, v poslednom čase som príliš napätá.

from: I had to ask for help when we were moving because I could not lift the couch.
to: Pri sťahovaní som musela požiadať o pomoc, pretože som nedokázala zdvihnúť pohovku.

from: I really wanted to get laid.
to: Naozaj som si chcel vrznúť.

from: I took care of the injured animal.
to: Postaral som sa o zranené zviera.

from: I knew all the gangs in the city.
to: Poznal som všetky gangy v meste.

from: I never read horoscopes because they are lies made up by ordinary people.
to: Nikdy nečítam horoskopy, pretože sú to lži, ktoré si vymýšľajú obyčajní ľudia.

from: I made a bad business decision because I followed my emotions instead of facts.
to: Urobil som zlé obchodné rozhodnutie, pretože som sa riadil emóciami namiesto faktov.

from: I think I'm an excellent scientist.
to: Myslím si, že som vynikajúci vedec.

from: I remained calm and focused on the goal.
to: Zostal som pokojný a sústredil som sa na cieľ.

from: I joined a gang.
to: Pridal som sa ku gangu.

from: As a supervisor, I always helped my team members achieve their goals.
to: Ako nadriadený som vždy pomáhal členom svojho tímu dosahovať ich ciele.

from: You should learn how to defend yourself.
to: Mali by ste sa naučiť, ako sa brániť.

from: I'm good at strategy thinking.
to: Som dobrý v strategickom myslení.

from: I didn't mind working hard for the family's good.
to: Nevadilo mi tvrdo pracovať pre dobro rodiny.

from: I have two jobs to be able to provide for my family.
to: Mám dve zamestnania, aby som mohol zabezpečiť svoju rodinu.

from: I could easily change that flat tire myself.
to: Tú prepichnutú pneumatiku by som si mohol ľahko vymeniť sám.

from: They told me it'd be tough, but they don't know the shit I've been through.
to: Povedali mi, že to bude ťažké, ale nevedia, akými sračkami som si prešiel.

from: I obliged, because that's what was expected.
to: Vyhovel som, pretože sa to odo mňa očakávalo.

from: Today I babysat my six-month-old niece all day.
to: Dnes som celý deň opatrovala svoju šesťmesačnú neter.

from: I went to a party instead of preparing for the presentation.
to: Namiesto prípravy na prezentáciu som išiel na večierok.

from: In the privacy of my bedroom, I explored my own desires and pleasures.
to: V súkromí svojej spálne som skúmala svoje túžby a rozkoše.

from: I never felt physically exhausted.
to: Nikdy som sa necítil fyzicky vyčerpaný.

from: I tried calling you several times, are you okay?
to: Niekoľkokrát som sa ti snažil dovolať, si v poriadku?

from: I was always happy to help if someone needed me.
to: Vždy som rád pomohol, ak ma niekto potreboval.

from: I already vented the radiator.
to: Chladič som už odvzdušnil.

from: I suspected them, although they did nothing wrong.
to: Podozrieval som ich, hoci neurobili nič zlé.

from: I baked a cake to make them happy.
to: Upiekla som koláč, aby som ich potešila.

from: I had long legs, slim waist and I was generally in shape.
to: Mala som dlhé nohy, štíhly pás a celkovo som bola vo forme.

from: I sent a personal invitation to everyone, I think it is more friendly like this.
to: Každému som poslal osobnú pozvánku, myslím, že takto je to priateľskejšie.

from: As a marketing manager, I developed strategic marketing plans, conducted market research, and implemented targeted campaigns.
to: Ako marketingový manažér som vypracovával strategické marketingové plány, vykonával prieskum trhu a realizoval cielené kampane.

from: I planned the trip for the entire family.
to: Výlet som naplánoval pre celú rodinu.

from: I panicked when I saw the spider on the table.
to: Spanikárila som, keď som uvidela pavúka na stole.

from: I calculated the amount of payments so we could afford a new TV.
to: Vypočítal som výšku splátok, aby sme si mohli dovoliť nový televízor.

from: It was easy for me to persuade everyone that I was the right person for the job.
to: Bolo pre mňa ľahké presvedčiť všetkých, že som tá správna osoba na túto prácu.

from: Why did you always need to prove something?
to: Prečo ste vždy museli niečo dokazovať?

from: I received a compliment for the work I did.
to: Dostal som pochvalu za prácu, ktorú som odviedol.

from: I could never hurt a fly.
to: Nikdy by som neublížil ani muche.

from: I fought my way through.
to: Prebojoval som sa cez ňu.

from: I pursued side hustles ensuring that my family's financial needs were met.
to: Venoval som sa vedľajším činnostiam, aby som zabezpečil finančné potreby svojej rodiny.

from: There was so much to do at work today, I cried.
to: V práci bolo dnes toľko práce, že som sa rozplakala.

from: I always got what I wanted in bed.
to: V posteli som vždy dostala, čo som chcela.

from: I had a gut feeling that the job was not right for me.
to: Mal som tušenie, že táto práca nie je pre mňa vhodná.

from: When we came to the restaurant, I decided to leave right away, because the tablecloths were filthy.
to: Keď sme prišli do reštaurácie, rozhodla som sa hneď odísť, pretože obrusy boli špinavé.

from: I carefully evaluated the benefits and drawbacks of accepting a job offer.
to: Starostlivo som zhodnotil výhody a nevýhody prijatia pracovnej ponuky.

from: I hosted a dinner for the firm's partners.
to: Usporiadal som večeru pre partnerov firmy.

from: My partner wasn't in charge of any chores in the house because I never wanted my partner to work harder than me.
