from: I am very good at hammer throwing, because I am strong.
to: Som veľmi dobrý v hode kladivom, pretože som silný.

from: I walked the dog, because my partner had no time.
to: Vyvenčila som psa, pretože môj partner nemal čas.

from: I paid for their vacation so I could have some alone time at home.
to: Zaplatil som im dovolenku, aby som mohol byť sám doma.

from: I was confident enough to pet the bear.
to: Bol som dostatočne sebavedomý, aby som si mohol pohladkať medveďa.

from: I focused on making enough money for my daughter to study at a good college abroad.
to: Sústredil som sa na to, aby som zarobil dostatok peňazí pre svoju dcéru na štúdium na dobrej vysokej škole v zahraničí.

from: For my sixtieth borthday I asked my partner for a Lego.
to: Na svoje šesťdesiate narodeniny som požiadala partnera o Lego.

from: I checked out the beautiful people in the room.
to: Pozrela som si krásnych ľudí v miestnosti.

from: I had to control myself not to hurt anyone.
to: Musel som sa ovládať, aby som nikomu neublížil.

from: I agreed to move where my partner chose.
to: Súhlasila som, že sa presťahujem tam, kam si môj partner vybral.

from: If I had to, I wouldn’t be afraid to face him.
to: Keby som musel, nebál by som sa mu postaviť tvárou v tvár.

from: I thoroughly researched different vacation destinations, considering factors such as travel costs, weather conditions, and available activities, before making an informed decision on where to go.
to: Predtým, ako som sa informovane rozhodol, kam pôjdem, som dôkladne preskúmal rôzne dovolenkové destinácie a zvážil faktory, ako sú cestovné náklady, poveternostné podmienky a dostupné aktivity.

from: I always finish first in sports races.
to: V športových pretekoch vždy skončím prvý.

from: I was really happy they gave the project to me.
to: Bola som naozaj šťastná, že mi tento projekt dali.

from: I wasn't taking my responsibilities seriously.
to: Svoje povinnosti som nebrala vážne.

from: I panicked and made impulsive decisions during a stressful situation.
to: V stresovej situácii som spanikárila a robila som impulzívne rozhodnutia.

from: I donated my old clothes to the charity.
to: Svoje staré oblečenie som darovala charite.

from: I always knew I wanted to help others.
to: Vždy som vedel, že chcem pomáhať iným.

from: I know I am lovely.
to: Viem, že som krásna.

from: I believed in superstitions such as that broken mirror brings seven years of bad luck.
to: Veril som na povery, ako napríklad, že rozbité zrkadlo prináša sedem rokov smoly.

from: Last week I went to a restaurant my partner chose.
to: Minulý týždeň som išla do reštaurácie, ktorú vybral môj partner.

from: I've always been good at reading other people's emotions.
to: Vždy som vedel dobre čítať emócie iných ľudí.

from: I have never had any doubts about my level of competence.
to: Nikdy som nemal pochybnosti o svojej úrovni spôsobilosti.

from: I called my friend for help.
to: Zavolal som na pomoc svojho priateľa.

from: I logically assessed the risks involved in a new investment opportunity.
to: Logicky som posúdil riziká spojené s novou investičnou príležitosťou.

from: I bought the watch for you.
to: Hodinky som kúpil pre teba.

from: I joined a social dance class, learning new dance styles and connecting with dance partners in a fun and social environment.
to: Zapojila som sa do kurzu spoločenského tanca, kde som sa učila nové tanečné štýly a nadväzovala kontakty s tanečnými partnermi v zábavnom a spoločenskom prostredí.

from: I looked good at the party.
to: Na večierku som vyzerala dobre.

from: I offered help when I saw how desperate she was.
to: Ponúkol som jej pomoc, keď som videl, aká je zúfalá.

from: I have not been sick since I have led an active life.
to: Odkedy vediem aktívny život, nebol som chorý.

from: I enjoyed the walk, but I got tired very quickly.
to: Prechádzka sa mi páčila, ale veľmi rýchlo som sa unavil.

from: I kept a neat and well-organized workspace, with everything in its designated place for easy access and efficiency.
to: Udržiaval som čistý a dobre organizovaný pracovný priestor, kde bolo všetko na svojom mieste, aby som mal ľahký prístup a bol efektívny.

from: I attended a community town hall meeting, actively participating in discussions about local issues .
to: Zúčastnil som sa na komunitnom zasadnutí mestského zastupiteľstva a aktívne som sa zapojil do diskusií o miestnych problémoch.

from: I couldn't do it, so I wept.
to: Nemohol som to urobiť, tak som plakal.

from: I knew I looked good and everyone in that room was attracted to me.
to: Vedela som, že vyzerám dobre a že všetkých v tej miestnosti priťahujem.

from: I hosted a fundraiser for our project.
to: Usporiadal som zbierku na náš projekt.

from: I've been told that I was a role model for my colleagues.
to: Povedali mi, že som bol pre svojich kolegov vzorom.

from: I was going to buy a watermelon, but I couldn’t manage to take it home.
to: Chcel som si kúpiť melón, ale nestihol som si ho vziať domov.

from: When I'm with her, I'm angry.
to: Keď som s ňou, som nahnevaný.

from: I know I am attractive because everyone keeps looking at me.
to: Viem, že som príťažlivá, pretože sa na mňa všetci pozerajú.

from: It's not a problem, because I have always known how to deal with it.
to: Nie je to problém, pretože som vždy vedel, ako sa s tým vysporiadať.

from: I like to fight people I don't like.
to: Rád bojujem s ľuďmi, ktorých nemám rád.

from: I wanted a burger, but the others wanted pizza, so we went for pizza.
to: Ja som chcel hamburger, ale ostatní chceli pizzu, tak sme si dali pizzu.

from: I was the main provider in our family for twenty years.
to: Dvadsať rokov som bol hlavným živiteľom našej rodiny.

from: I single-handedly saved them all.
to: Všetky som zachránil sám.

from: I wasn't afraid - I have always liked danger.
to: Nebál som sa - vždy som mal rád nebezpečenstvo.

from: I never said I was looking for a long-term relationship.
to: Nikdy som nepovedala, že hľadám dlhodobý vzťah.

from: I couldn't stand seeing abused animals, so I petitioned the city.
to: Nemohol som sa pozerať na týrané zvieratá, tak som podal petíciu na mesto.

from: Through my great wit I simply outsmarted everyone.
to: Svojím veľkým dôvtipom som jednoducho všetkých prekabátil.

from: I have always been aware of my self-worth.
to: Vždy som si uvedomoval svoju vlastnú hodnotu.

from: I managed the financial portfolio for my whole family because they trusted my choices.
to: Spravoval som finančné portfólio pre celú rodinu, pretože dôverovali mojim rozhodnutiam.

from: I am direct and honest.
to: Som priamy a úprimný.

from: I'm stronger than you.
to: Som silnejší ako ty.

from: I pushed my partner through the university studies financially.
to: Svoju partnerku som finančne podporoval pri štúdiu na univerzite.

from: I insisted I was right and I had numerous research articles to prove it.
to: Trval som na tom, že mám pravdu, a mal som na to množstvo výskumných článkov.

from: I consistently demonstrated a high level of competence and dedication.
to: Sústavne som preukazoval vysokú úroveň kompetencií a odhodlania.

from: My confidence boosts when I'm in a leadership position because I can be bossy.
to: Moje sebavedomie sa zvyšuje, keď som vo vedúcej pozícii, pretože dokážem byť panovačný.

from: I preferred travelling in groups.
to: Radšej som cestoval v skupinách.

from: I took on additional work to generate extra income, ensuring that my family's financial needs were met
to: Prijal som ďalšiu prácu, aby som získal dodatočný príjem a zabezpečil finančné potreby svojej rodiny.

from: I don’t like to judge others.
to: Nerád súdim druhých.

from: My boss made me so angry I locked myself in the office and cried.
to: Môj šéf ma tak nahneval, že som sa zamkla v kancelárii a plakala.

from: I have always wanted to provide the best possible service to my customers.
to: Vždy som chcel svojim zákazníkom poskytovať čo najlepšie služby.

from: Of course, I did it, I'm not a wuss.
to: Samozrejme, že som to urobil, nie som slaboch.

from: Why would I say something if it only leads to arguments?
to: Prečo by som mal niečo povedať, keď to vedie len k hádkam?

from: I never sat down until the whole family was fed.
to: Nikdy som si nesadol, kým nebola celá rodina najedená.

from: Shopping for new clothes makes me happy.
to: Nakupovanie nového oblečenia ma robí šťastnou.

from: With the camera focused on me, I expressed my true self with confidence.
to: Keď sa na mňa zamerala kamera, sebavedome som vyjadrila svoje pravé ja.

from: I worked hard so that my children wouldn't have to.
to: Tvrdo som pracoval, aby moje deti nemuseli.

from: I offered to do this job.
to: Ponúkol som sa, že túto prácu urobím.

from: I never voiced my own opinion.
to: Nikdy som nevyjadril svoj vlastný názor.

from: I don't like being stern, boring, and dull.
to: Nemám rád, keď som prísny, nudný a fádny.

from: I sent out the work schedule to them last week.
to: Minulý týždeň som im poslal pracovný plán.

from: Of course I wanted to buy that bag for you.
to: Samozrejme, že som ti tú tašku chcel kúpiť.

from: I have always been a teenager deep down inside and I don't think it is ever going to change.
to: V hĺbke duše som vždy bola tínedžerka a nemyslím si, že sa to niekedy zmení.

from: The sultry voice on the other end of the phone awakened a delicious anticipation within me.
to: Dusný hlas na druhej strane telefónu vo mne prebudil slastné očakávanie.

from: I challenged them to a fight, but they laughed me off.
to: Vyzval som ich na súboj, ale vysmiali sa mi.

from: I had to pin the drunk patient towards wall and wait until the doctor gave him a sedative.
to: Musel som opitého pacienta pritlačiť k stene a počkať, kým mu lekár podá sedatíva.

from: I often cry because I am very sensitive.
to: Často plačem, pretože som veľmi citlivá.

from: They didn't wanna go to dinner with me, so I cried and they went.
to: Nechceli ísť so mnou na večeru, tak som sa rozplakala a oni išli.

from: I preferred to travel alone, but since I was attacked, I feel scared to travel by myself.
to: Radšej som cestoval sám, ale odkedy som bol napadnutý, mám strach cestovať sám.

from: I took a second job.
to: Vzal som si druhú prácu.

from: I've always excelled in martial arts.
to: Vždy som vynikal v bojových umeniach.

from: I never cared if we have enough food in the kitchen, I just took care there was enough alcohol in the household.
to: Nikdy som sa nestaral o to, či máme v kuchyni dostatok jedla, staral som sa len o to, aby bol v domácnosti dostatok alkoholu.

from: I was on a diet.
to: Držala som diétu.

from: I let fear take over and avoided an important opportunity.
to: Nechal som sa ovládnuť strachom a vyhol som sa dôležitej príležitosti.

from: I asked the performer on a date.
to: Pozval som umelca na rande.

from: As an architect, I drafted detailed blueprints, collaborated with clients to understand their vision, and oversaw construction projects.
to: Ako architekt som vypracovával podrobné plány, spolupracoval s klientmi, aby som pochopil ich predstavy, a dohliadal na stavebné projekty.

from: I'm reliable, maybe that's why I have so many responsibilities.
to: Som spoľahlivý, možno preto mám toľko povinností.

from: I found it challenging to perform simple tasks like opening jars or lifting objects due to my physical weakness.
to: Kvôli mojej fyzickej slabosti bolo pre mňa náročné vykonávať jednoduché úlohy, ako je otváranie pohárov alebo zdvíhanie predmetov.

from: I was invited to the theatre, but played an online match with a friend instead.
to: Bol som pozvaný do divadla, ale namiesto toho som si zahral online zápas s priateľom.

from: I need to be able to weather any storm and provide stability for my family.
to: Musím byť schopný zvládnuť každú búrku a zabezpečiť stabilitu pre svoju rodinu.

from: I was responsible for the production process.
to: Bol som zodpovedný za výrobný proces.

from: I like small talk.
to: Mám rád neformálne rozhovory.

from: We had an arm wrestling competition and I lost.
to: Súťažili sme v zápasení na rukách a ja som prehral.

from: I refused to listen to different perspectives during a heated argument, allowing my emotions to cloud my judgment.
to: Počas vášnivej hádky som odmietal počúvať rôzne pohľady a dovolil som, aby mi emócie zatemnili úsudok.

from: I didn't take the well-paid job, because my intuition told me so.
to: Nevzal som dobre platenú prácu, pretože mi to hovorila intuícia.

from: I went to see a therapist to learn to handle my emotions better.
to: Navštívila som terapeuta, aby som sa naučila lepšie zvládať svoje emócie.

from: I attended a social gathering with friends, engaging in lively conversations and enjoying the company of others.
to: Zúčastnil som sa spoločenského stretnutia s priateľmi, viedol som živé rozhovory a tešil sa zo spoločnosti ostatných.

from: I left the debate team after two weeks because I had a hard time coming up with logical arguments.
to: Z debatného tímu som odišiel po dvoch týždňoch, pretože som mal problém vymyslieť logické argumenty.

from: I demonstrated astute judgment and confidence in securing favorable outcomes.
to: Preukázal som bystrý úsudok a dôveru v zabezpečenie priaznivých výsledkov.

from: I wanted to make money on my own, not with your help!
to: Chcel som zarobiť peniaze sám, nie s vašou pomocou!

from: I went bungee-jumping.
to: Išiel som skákať bungee-jumping.

from: I knew I can be influential and other people would hear what I have to say.
to: Vedel som, že môžem byť vplyvný a že ostatní ľudia budú počuť, čo chcem povedať.

from: Why can't I ever have fun?
to: Prečo sa nikdy nemôžem baviť?

from: I was so horny I considered approaching a sex worker.
to: Bol som taký nadržaný, že som uvažoval o oslovení sexuálnej pracovníčky.

from: I am comfortable in my own skin and do not seek the approval of others to feel good about myself.
to: Cítim sa dobre vo svojej koži a nevyhľadávam uznanie druhých, aby som sa cítil dobre.

from: As I entered the room, I noticed heads turning and whispers of admiration.
to: Keď som vošla do miestnosti, všimla som si, ako sa hlavy otáčajú a šepkajú si obdivné hlasy.

from: I like options when it comes to clothes, so I have a lot of them at home.
to: Pokiaľ ide o oblečenie, mám rada rôzne možnosti, takže ich mám doma veľa.

from: I opened the water bottle for them, because the lid was stuck.
to: Otvoril som im fľašu s vodou, pretože sa zaseklo viečko.

from: If I had to choose between me and my children suffering, I would take it on without a second thought.
to: Keby som si mal vybrať medzi mnou a utrpením mojich detí, bez váhania by som to vzal.

from: I left some money under the table cloth for a better luck.
to: Nechal som pod obrusom nejaké peniaze pre väčšie šťastie.

from: You have to be stronger in order to maintain this task.
to: Musíte byť silnejší, aby ste túto úlohu zvládli.

from: I offered the best services in the entire town.
to: Ponúkal som najlepšie služby v celom meste.

from: I had thick curly brown hair and long dark eyelashes, people often thought I was Spanish or Italian.
to: Mala som husté kučeravé hnedé vlasy a dlhé tmavé mihalnice, ľudia si často mysleli, že som Španielka alebo Talianka.

from: I radiated self confidence so I was successful and got the job.
to: Vyžarovala som sebavedomie, takže som bola úspešná a prácu som získala.

from: I made sure everyone was listening to my commands.
to: Uistil som sa, že všetci počúvajú moje príkazy.

from: I was the chair of the programme committee.
to: Bol som predsedom programového výboru.

from: I only believed them when I saw it with my own eyes.
to: Uveril som im, až keď som to videl na vlastné oči.

from: I arranged the whole dining table to fit with my outfit.
to: Celý jedálenský stôl som upravila tak, aby ladil s mojím oblečením.

from: I looked wonderful at the school prom.
to: Na školskom plese som vyzerala úžasne.

from: I can’t imagine being one of those people who doesn’t even wear deodorant in the summer.
to: Neviem si predstaviť, že by som patrila k ľuďom, ktorí v lete nepoužívajú ani dezodorant.

from: I handled the expenses.
to: O výdavky som sa postaral ja.

from: I signed up for a weightlifting competition.
to: Prihlásil som sa na súťaž vo vzpieraní.

from: I think that statistics always need to be interpreted carefully before jumping to conclusions.
to: Myslím si, že štatistiky treba vždy interpretovať opatrne, než sa urobia unáhlené závery.

from: I decided on a mortage based on the data from various banks.
to: Pre hypotéku som sa rozhodol na základe údajov z rôznych bánk.

from: I never let myself get so upset that I lose control of the situation.
to: Nikdy sa nenechám rozrušiť natoľko, aby som stratil kontrolu nad situáciou.

from: I only went to the wedding for the cakes.
to: Na svadbu som išla len kvôli koláčom.

from: I felled many trees so that we have wood for winter.
to: Vyrúbal som veľa stromov, aby sme mali drevo na zimu.

from: My partner's lower sex drive created a mismatch in our desires and I had to look elsewhere.
to: Nižšia sexuálna túžba môjho partnera spôsobila nesúlad v našich túžbach a ja som musela hľadať inde.

from: I had to pretend everything is fine.
to: Musel som predstierať, že je všetko v poriadku.

from: We were bowling and I had to throw the lightest ball because I couldn't hold the heavier ones.
to: Hrali sme bowling a ja som musel hádzať najľahšiu guľu, pretože ťažšie som neudržal.

from: I didn't want to cause any trouble so I kept my mouth shut.
to: Nechcel som spôsobiť žiadne problémy, tak som mlčal.

from: When I saw those puppies, I wanted to take them all home.
to: Keď som videl tie šteniatka, chcel som si ich zobrať všetky domov.

from: I threw salt over my shoulder after accidentally spilling some.
to: Po tom, čo som si omylom vysypal soľ, som si ju hodil cez plece.

from: I could have taken care of your children when youre on holidays.
to: Mohla som sa postarať o tvoje deti, keď si bol na dovolenke.

from: I have always been very cool-headed in emergency situations.
to: V núdzových situáciách som bol vždy veľmi chladný.

from: I was happy to be a leader in the project.
to: Bol som rád, že som mohol byť vedúcim projektu.

from: I am not much more mature than I was when I was a teen although I am almost forty.
to: Nie som oveľa vyspelejší, ako keď som bol tínedžer, hoci mám takmer štyridsať rokov.

from: I've never been shy about getting naked in front of someone new.
to: Nikdy som sa nehanbila vyzliecť sa pred niekým novým.

from: As a supervisor, I always boosted morale and productivity.
to: Ako nadriadený som vždy zvyšoval morálku a produktivitu.

from: I could not set and follow any long-term goals.
to: Nedokázal som si stanoviť a sledovať žiadne dlhodobé ciele.

from: They told me all about the advantages, but I only cared about how I felt in that place.
to: Hovorili mi o všetkých výhodách, ale mňa zaujímalo len to, ako sa na tom mieste cítim.

from: I organized the craziest stag do ever.
to: Zorganizoval som tú najbláznivejšiu rozlúčku so slobodou.

from: I really craved some chocolate milk.
to: Veľmi som túžila po čokoládovom mlieku.

from: My greatest strength is my concern for others, even though I am often seen as weak because of it.
to: Mojou najväčšou silou je záujem o druhých, hoci ma kvôli tomu často považujú za slabého.

from: I always believed in myself.
to: Vždy som si veril.

from: I was planning the family party for Saturday.
to: Na sobotu som plánovala rodinnú oslavu.

from: I won the beauty contest.
to: Vyhrala som súťaž krásy.

from: I bought a lucky charm, although my friend told me it's a scam.
to: Kúpil som si talizman, hoci mi kamarát povedal, že je to podvod.

from: I showcased my expertise and built connections confidently.
to: Prezentoval som svoje odborné znalosti a sebavedomo budoval kontakty.

from: I've always been a good kisser.
to: Vždy som sa dobre bozkávala.

from: I relied heavily on their approval before I decided about anything.
to: Veľmi som sa spoliehal na ich súhlas, kým som sa o niečom rozhodol.

from: I didn't cheat anyone when quoting the price.
to: Pri uvádzaní ceny som nikoho nepodviedol.

from: My hair was like satin and my skin was peachy, I knew I looked good.
to: Vlasy som mala ako satén a pleť broskyňovú, vedela som, že vyzerám dobre.

from: I was too weak to continue with the excercise.
to: Bol som príliš slabý na to, aby som pokračoval v cvičení.

from: When meeting new people, I noticed their positive reactions to my good looks.
to: Pri stretnutiach s novými ľuďmi som si všimla ich pozitívne reakcie na môj pekný vzhľad.

from: I asked my neighbors if they could put a box full of books in the elevator for me.
to: Požiadal som susedov, či by mi mohli dať do výťahu škatuľu plnú kníh.

from: I thought cheating was a normal part of a relationship.
to: Myslela som si, že podvádzanie je normálnou súčasťou vzťahu.

from: I organized the conference.
to: Konferenciu som zorganizoval ja.

from: I never gave my tasks to somebody else because I felt like I was the best at finishing them.
to: Nikdy som nedal svoje úlohy niekomu inému, pretože som mal pocit, že som ich dokázal dokončiť najlepšie.

from: There's nothing I can't do.
to: Nie je nič, čo by som nemohol urobiť.

from: I have always believed that discipline is the foundation of success.
to: Vždy som veril, že základom úspechu je disciplína.

from: Hopefully they will notice that I put an extra effort into the cleaning today.
to: Dúfam, že si všimnú, že som si dnes dala na upratovaní záležať.

from: I never cried, emotions don't solve problems.
to: Nikdy som neplakala, emócie problémy neriešia.

from: I got hundreds of Tinder matches.
to: Mám stovky zápasov na Tinderi.

from: I am a scientist, I specialise in marine biology.
to: Som vedec, špecializujem sa na morskú biológiu.

from: I was constantly involved in some kind of mischief.
to: Neustále som bol zapletený do nejakej neplechy.

from: I calmly handled an unexpected setback at work by analysing the situation.
to: Neočakávaný neúspech v práci som zvládol pokojne tým, že som analyzoval situáciu.

from: I repeatedly engaged in self-destructive behaviors.
to: Opakovane som sa dopúšťal sebazničujúceho správania.

from: I burst into tears over a minor setback.
to: Rozplakala som sa kvôli menšiemu neúspechu.

from: I took my grandmother to see the flower exhibition.
to: Vzala som svoju babičku na výstavu kvetov.

from: They say I'm very easily influenced.

from: I have often received compliments about my good looks and now I am confident.
to: Často som dostávala komplimenty za svoj dobrý vzhľad a teraz som sebavedomá.

from: I am always empathetic to people close to me.
to: Vždy som empatický voči blízkym ľuďom.

from: I babysat my sister’s kids last weekend.
to: Minulý víkend som opatrovala deti mojej sestry.

from: I was in the US for a year and people had no problem talking to me even though they didn’t know me.
to: V USA som bol rok a ľudia nemali problém sa so mnou rozprávať, aj keď ma nepoznali.

from: My friend was having a bad day, so I bought some food and went to see her.
to: Moja kamarátka mala zlý deň, tak som si kúpila nejaké jedlo a išla som za ňou.

from: They've been telling me that I'm beautiful, but I'm more than that.
to: Hovorili mi, že som krásna, ale ja som niečo viac.

from: I feel that I'm good at solving problems.
to: Mám pocit, že som dobrý v riešení problémov.

from: I received special attention at social events, with many individuals expressing their admiration for my good looks.
to: Na spoločenských podujatiach sa mi dostávalo mimoriadnej pozornosti a mnohí ľudia vyjadrovali svoj obdiv k môjmu peknému vzhľadu.

from: Why do you think you are not confident enough?
to: Prečo si myslíte, že nie ste dostatočne sebavedomí?

from: I did as they asked me to.
to: Urobil som, ako ma požiadali.

from: Would you like to go to that party with me?
to: Chceš ísť so mnou na tú párty?

from: I navigated the professional setting with ease, engaging in discussions with self-assurance.
to: V profesionálnom prostredí som sa pohyboval s ľahkosťou a do diskusií som sa zapájal so sebavedomím.

from: They have always praised my gentle spirit, and I tried to live up to it.
to: Vždy chválili moju jemnú dušu a ja som sa ju snažil napĺňať.

from: I liked speaking in front of a huge audience.
to: Páčilo sa mi hovoriť pred obrovským publikom.

from: I liked to play computer games and lived in my mom's basement although I was an adult.
to: Rád som hrával počítačové hry a žil v maminej pivnici, hoci som bol dospelý.

from: I like to divide the tasks.
to: Rád si rozdeľujem úlohy.

from: It is stressful to work here at this position, but I'm good at handling it.
to: Práca na tejto pozícii je stresujúca, ale zvládam ju dobre.

from: Despite being in a committed relationship, I found it difficult to resist strangers.
to: Napriek tomu, že som bola vo vážnom vzťahu, bolo pre mňa ťažké odolať cudzím ľuďom.

from: When they called and told me what had happened, I collapsed.
to: Keď mi zavolali a povedali, čo sa stalo, zrútila som sa.

from: I frequently deferred to others' opinions and preferences.
to: Často som sa spoliehal na názory a preferencie iných.

from: I knew that he was acting rude, but it is just because he's had a hard time at work.
to: Vedela som, že sa správa hrubo, ale to len preto, že mal ťažké obdobie v práci.

from: I was scared because there was a spider in my shower.
to: Bála som sa, pretože v mojej sprche bol pavúk.

from: I kept the kitchen area clean to prevent a buildup of dirty dishes
to: Udržiavala som čistotu v kuchyni, aby sa v nej nehromadil špinavý riad.

from: I am dedicated.
to: Som oddaný.

from: I didn't feel affected by criticism at all, I didn't take it personal.
to: Kritika sa ma vôbec nedotkla, nebrala som ju osobne.

from: I liked the way you walked.
to: Páčilo sa mi, ako si kráčal.

from: I presented my innovative idea with unwavering conviction.
to: Svoj inovatívny nápad som prezentoval s neochvejným presvedčením.

from: My boss is influential and has a significant impact on others.
to: Môj šéf je vplyvný a má významný vplyv na ostatných.

from: I have never left the house messy, I have to clean everything first.
to: Nikdy som nenechávala doma neporiadok, všetko musím najprv upratať.

from: I did what they told me to do to fit in.
to: Urobil som, čo mi povedali, aby som zapadol.

from: I bought a castle to renovate it.
to: Kúpil som hrad, aby som ho zrenovoval.

from: I wanted to make more friends.
to: Chcel som si nájsť viac priateľov.

from: I was never good at sports.
to: Nikdy som nebol dobrý v športe.

from: I evaluated all the costs and benefits before making the decision.
to: Pred rozhodnutím som zhodnotil všetky náklady a prínosy.

from: I rented the house for them.
to: Prenajal som im dom.

from: Taking care of my children is the least I can do for my family.
to: Starostlivosť o deti je to najmenej, čo môžem pre svoju rodinu urobiť.

from: My partner never truly listens to what I'm saying and I find it childish.
to: Môj partner nikdy skutočne nepočúva, čo hovorím, a ja to považujem za detinské.

from: I wanted to focus on my career, family life could wait.
to: Chcel som sa sústrediť na svoju kariéru, rodinný život mohol počkať.

from: I know it's important to be alone with yourself, but I just couldn't do it.
to: Viem, že je dôležité byť sám so sebou, ale ja som to jednoducho nedokázal.

from: I had to throw away the hoodie because it had a stain on it that I could not get rid off.
to: Mikinu som musela vyhodiť, pretože na nej bola škvrna, ktorej som sa nemohla zbaviť.

from: I never talked about my feelings with my friends.
to: Nikdy som o svojich pocitoch nehovoril s priateľmi.

from: As a software engineer, I consistently demonstrated a strong work ethic and attention to detail.
to: Ako softvérový inžinier som neustále preukazoval silnú pracovnú morálku a pozornosť k detailom.

from: The muscles in my arms and back flexed as I rowed through the calm waters.
to: Svaly na rukách a chrbte sa mi napínali, keď som vesloval v pokojných vodách.

from: I established an emergency fund to protect my family from unexpected expenses.
to: Založil som núdzový fond, aby som ochránil svoju rodinu pred neočakávanými výdavkami.

from: I led my team to success.
to: Viedol som svoj tím k úspechu.

from: I could easily beat you in tennis.
to: Ľahko by som ťa porazil v tenise.

from: I have been taught to smile even when I am sad or angry.
to: Naučili ma usmievať sa, aj keď som smutný alebo nahnevaný.

from: I had to cheer others up.
to: Musel som povzbudiť ostatných.

from: I advocated for causes and initiatives I believed in, inspiring others to join in.
to: Presadzoval som veci a iniciatívy, ktorým som veril, a inšpiroval som ostatných, aby sa pridali.

from: I felt helpful because I could host a party.
to: Cítila som sa užitočná, pretože som mohla usporiadať večierok.

from: I impulsively quit my job without a backup plan.
to: Impulzívne som dal výpoveď bez záložného plánu.

from: I got bitten by a snake but I remained calm.
to: Uštipol ma had, ale zostal som pokojný.

from: I'd like to trade football cards, but I don't have anyone to trade them with.
to: Chcel by som si vymeniť futbalové karty, ale nemám s kým.

from: I locked myself out, so I had to break down the door.
to: Zamkol som sa, tak som musel vylomiť dvere.

from: As a lawyer, I meticulously researched case precedents and prepared persuasive arguments for the courtroom
to: Ako právnik som starostlivo skúmal precedentné prípady a pripravoval presvedčivé argumenty pre súdnu sieň.

from: I put on this new perfume today and everyone is turning around to see me.
to: Dnes som si dala tento nový parfum a všetci sa za mnou otáčajú.

from: I made a resolution not to buy leather clothes or shoes because it is insensitive to animals.
to: Dal som si predsavzatie, že si nebudem kupovať kožené oblečenie ani obuv, pretože je to necitlivé voči zvieratám.

from: My friends have told me that I am empathetic, and I have been very touched by that.
to: Moji priatelia mi povedali, že som empatická, a to sa ma veľmi dotklo.

from: I made coffee for everyone in our team before we started the team meeting.
to: Predtým, ako sme začali tímovú schôdzu, som všetkým členom nášho tímu uvaril kávu.

from: I was thinking about you and me having sex, what do you say?
to: Premýšľal som o tom, že by sme sa spolu vyspali, čo povieš?

from: I never interfered in my employees personal lives.
to: Nikdy som nezasahoval do osobného života svojich zamestnancov.

from: I had no doubt.
to: Nepochyboval som o tom.

from: I couldn’t decide which shirt to buy, so I bought all three.
to: Nemohol som sa rozhodnúť, ktoré tričko si kúpiť, tak som si kúpil všetky tri.

from: I hated when my partner was washing the dishes because I knew that I could do it better.
to: Neznášala som, keď môj partner umýval riad, pretože som vedela, že to dokážem lepšie.

from: I couldn't look, it made me feel sick.
to: Nemohla som sa pozerať, bolo mi z toho zle.

from: I invested my money so that I have some passive income.
to: Investoval som svoje peniaze, aby som mal pasívny príjem.

from: I spent hours in front of the mirror.
to: Strávila som hodiny pred zrkadlom.

from: I like it when the hairdresser massages my head.
to: Mám rád, keď mi kaderník masíruje hlavu.

from: I always thought that life is a game and you have to enjoy it.
to: Vždy som si myslel, že život je hra a treba si ho užívať.

from: I was forced to sign up for a self-defence course.
to: Musel som sa prihlásiť na kurz sebaobrany.

from: I validated my friend's emotions, providing reassurance during a challenging situation.
to: Potvrdil som emócie svojho priateľa a poskytol mu upokojenie počas náročnej situácie.

from: I thought I was the most beautiful at the event.
to: Myslela som si, že som na podujatí najkrajšia.

from: It was comforting for me, that I cooked for my family.
to: Upokojovalo ma, že som varila pre svoju rodinu.

from: I could not keep up with their tempo.
to: Nedokázal som držať krok s ich tempom.

from: I signed up for a medieval swording workshop.
to: Prihlásila som sa na workshop stredovekého mečovania.

from: I was elected as the new mayor of the town.
to: Bol som zvolený za nového starostu mesta.

from: I always went everywhere ahead of time.
to: Vždy som všade chodil vopred.

from: I was always the one who did most of the work in group assignments.
to: Pri skupinových úlohách som vždy robil väčšinu práce ja.

from: I attended a photoshoot where the photographer captured my natural beauty, boosting my self-esteem.
to: Zúčastnila som sa na fotení, kde fotograf zachytil moju prirodzenú krásu, čím mi zvýšil sebavedomie.

from: I was nervous, because I had no time to clean the bathroom.
to: Bola som nervózna, pretože som nemala čas upratať kúpeľňu.

from: My immature mindset prevented me from commiting in a relationship.
to: Moje nezrelé myslenie mi bránilo v tom, aby som sa vo vzťahu angažoval.

from: I was in charge of the whole project.
to: Celý projekt som mal na starosti ja.

from: I’d like to be pretty like Hollywood stars.
to: Chcela by som byť pekná ako hollywoodske hviezdy.

from: With each step deeper into the haunted house, I explored its eerie corridors, unafraid of the lurking shadows.
to: S každým krokom hlbšie do strašidelného domu som skúmala jeho strašidelné chodby a nebála sa číhajúcich tieňov.

from: I drank very heavily.
to: Pil som veľmi veľa.

from: The last time I had a fight with my parents, I locked myself in the attic for the day.
to: Keď som sa naposledy pohádal s rodičmi, zamkol som sa na celý deň na pôde.

from: I have to look good, even if I'm just going to take out the trash.
to: Musím vyzerať dobre, aj keď idem len vyniesť odpadky.

from: I have paid a personal trainer to help me with my workouts.
to: Zaplatil som si osobného trénera, aby mi pomáhal s cvičením.

from: I called the vet immediately after I noticed that the bird was limping.
to: Okamžite po tom, ako som si všimla, že vták kríva, som zavolala veterinára.

from: I earned a lot more than my partner, and now my partner is a stay-at-home parent.
to: Zarábala som oveľa viac ako môj partner a teraz je môj partner rodič v domácnosti.

from: I like being in charge.
to: Mám rád, keď som zodpovedný.

from: I swam naked.
to: Plával som nahý.

from: I ought to do some summer clean-up.
to: Mal by som sa pustiť do letného upratovania.

from: The man said "I actively sought to bridge gaps and connect people with common interests or goals."
to: Ten povedal: "Aktívne som sa snažil preklenúť rozdiely a spájať ľudí so spoločnými záujmami alebo cieľmi."

from: The man said "I feel frustrated when I don't have intimacy."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítim sa frustrovaný, keď nemám intimitu."

from: The man said "I always asked for consent before sex."
to: Muž povedal: "Pred sexom som sa vždy pýtal na súhlas."

from: The man said "I'm good at negotiating with our clients."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som dobrý vo vyjednávaní s našimi klientmi."

from: The man said "I am very open-minded when it comes to sex."
to: Muž povedal: "Čo sa týka sexu, som veľmi otvorený."

from: The man said "I did not take any credit for my work."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nepripísal som si žiadne zásluhy za svoju prácu."

from: The man said "I just had to keep smiling no matter how hard the situation was."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som sa usmievať bez ohľadu na to, aká ťažká bola situácia."

from: The man said "I was always ready to work till late at night."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som bol pripravený pracovať do neskorej noci."

from: The man said "I've always felt better in leadership positions."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som sa cítil lepšie na vedúcich pozíciách."

from: The man said "Since I can remember, I was never scared of anything."
to: Muž povedal: "Odkedy si pamätám, nikdy som sa ničoho nebál."

from: The man said "I have come to understand that the most important thing is to be consistent, and then the results will come."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Pochopil som, že najdôležitejšie je byť dôsledný, a potom sa dostavia výsledky."

from: The man said "I make sure to balance my work obligations with quality time spent with my loved ones."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Snažím sa vyvážiť svoje pracovné povinnosti kvalitným časom stráveným s mojimi blízkymi."

from: The man said "I only wanted to laugh, but I got blamed for being childish."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som sa len zasmiať, ale obvinili ma, že som detinský."

from: The man said "I flexed my biceps and marveled at the sculpted definition."
to: Muž povedal: "Napínal som bicepsy a obdivoval som ich vyrysované tvary."

from: The man said "I believed that if you drop your comb, you have to step on it before picking it up, otherwise it would bring you shame."
to: Muž povedal: "Veril som, že ak ti spadne hrebeň, musíš naň pred zdvihnutím stúpiť, inak ti prinesie hanbu."

from: The man said "I don't remember who I had sex with last night."
to: Muž povedal: "Nepamätám si, s kým som mal včera večer sex."

from: The man said "I order groceries from home so I don't have to carry those heavy bags across town."
to: Muž povedal: "Objednávam si potraviny z domu, aby som nemusel nosiť tie ťažké tašky cez celé mesto."

from: The man said "I couldn't go a long time without sex."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol by som vydržať dlho bez sexu."

from: The man said "I would not allow others to wait on me because I consider that extremely unprofessional behaviour."
to: Muž povedal: "Nedovolil by som, aby ma ostatní obsluhovali, pretože to považujem za veľmi neprofesionálne správanie."

from: The man said "I had to re-clean the whole apartment, because they did it wrong."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som celý byt vyčistiť znova, pretože to urobili zle."

from: The man said "I showered daily, sometimes twice."
to: Muž povedal: "Sprchoval som sa denne, niekedy aj dvakrát."

from: The man said "I made the calculation based on the available data."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Výpočet som urobil na základe dostupných údajov."

from: The man said "When something bad happens to me, I need to be surrounded by friends."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Keď sa mi stane niečo zlé, potrebujem byť obklopený priateľmi."

from: The man said "Problem-solving was my biggest strength."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Riešenie problémov bolo mojou najsilnejšou stránkou."

from: The man said "I had many sexual partners."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som veľa sexuálnych partneriek."

from: The man said "It was right of me to obey my husband."
to: Muž povedal: "Bolo správne, že som poslúchol svojho muža."

from: The man said "I had an outfit planned but then I remembered that I shouldn't wear revealing clothes."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som naplánovaný outfit, ale potom som si spomenul, že by som nemal nosiť odhaľujúce oblečenie."

from: The man said "Although I didn't need it, I bought it anyway."
to: Muž povedal: "Hoci som ho nepotreboval, aj tak som si ho kúpil."

from: The man said "I like sacrificing my own time for the sake of others."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Rád obetujem svoj čas pre druhých."

from: The man said "I opted to go along with their ideas instead of trying to contradict them."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Rozhodol som sa súhlasiť s ich myšlienkami namiesto toho, aby som sa im snažil odporovať."

from: The man said "I attempted to run a marathon, but my legs grew weak halfway through, and I had to stop and rest."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Pokúsil som sa zabehnúť maratón, ale v polovici cesty mi ochabli nohy a musel som zastaviť a odpočívať."

from: The man said "I could never live with someone who makes more money than me."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nemohol žiť s niekým, kto zarába viac peňazí ako ja."

from: The man said "I introduce myself to new people with a made up name so they can’t slander me."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Novým ľuďom sa predstavujem vymysleným menom, aby ma nemohli ohovárať."

from: The man said "I diligently followed safety protocols and procedures in the workplace."
to: Muž povedal: "Na pracovisku som dôsledne dodržiaval bezpečnostné protokoly a postupy."

from: The man said "I was always the one paying bills and I didn't mind it."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som platil účty ja a nevadilo mi to."

from: The man said "I tried to be celibate for a month, but I couldn’t do it."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Snažil som sa mesiac dodržiavať celibát, ale nedokázal som to."

from: The man said "As a graphic designer, I creatively conceptualized visual designs and collaborated with clients to understand their branding needs."
to: Ten povedal: "Ako grafický dizajnér som kreatívne koncipoval vizuálne návrhy a spolupracoval s klientmi, aby som pochopil ich potreby v oblasti brandingu."

from: The man said "I could not do too much physical labour because I was not strong enough."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som vykonávať príliš veľa fyzickej práce, pretože som nebol dostatočne silný."

from: The man said "I didn't worry about my confidence."
to: Muž povedal: "O svoje sebavedomie som sa nebál."

from: The man said "I coud just improvise easily if something happens."
to: Muž povedal: "Môžem jednoducho improvizovať, ak sa niečo stane."

from: The man said "As a team leader, I motivated my team to collaborate actively."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Ako vedúci tímu som motivoval svoj tím k aktívnej spolupráci."

from: The man said "I've been told that I'm caring and that I have nurturing personality."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedali mi, že som starostlivý a že mám výchovnú povahu."

from: The man said "My mother hates cleaning, so I vacuumed her whole apartment last week."
to: Muž povedal: "Moja matka neznáša upratovanie, a tak som jej minulý týždeň vyluxoval celý byt."

from: The man said "I like adventure and action in my daily life."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád dobrodružstvo a akciu v každodennom živote."

from: The man said "I wasn't afraid of you and your friends."
to: Muž povedal: "Nebál som sa teba a tvojich priateľov."

from: The man said "I always imagined how it must have felt to be in a bed with you."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som si predstavoval, aké to musí byť, byť s tebou v posteli."

from: The man said "They had to let me pass the exam, because I almost started to cry."
to: Muž povedal: "Museli ma nechať prejsť skúškou, pretože som sa takmer rozplakal."

from: The man said "I lied to my mom once and immediately burst into tears because I didn’t want to lie to her."
to: Muž povedal: "Raz som klamal svojej mame a hneď som sa rozplakal, pretože som jej nechcel klamať."

from: The man said "I could never fall asleep without taking a shower first."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy nemôžem zaspať bez toho, aby som sa predtým osprchoval."

from: The man said "I carried the table up to the fourth floor."
to: Muž povedal: "Vyniesol som stôl na štvrté poschodie."

from: The man said "I knew it was probably a scam but I signed up for the beauty master class anyways."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, že je to pravdepodobne podvod, ale aj tak som sa prihlásil na majstrovský kurz krásy."

from: The man said "I had a lot of friends in my old gym, but I had to switch gyms."
to: Muž povedal: "V starej telocvični som mal veľa priateľov, ale musel som zmeniť telocvičňu."

from: The man said "I feel like they are watching every move I make."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám pocit, že sledujú každý môj krok."

from: The man said "They needed a strong hand and I provided it."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Potrebovali silnú ruku a ja som im ju poskytol."

from: The man said "I am good at making bold decisions."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som dobrý v robení odvážnych rozhodnutí."

from: The man said "I am a leader."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som vodca."

from: The man said "I loved you but I don't know how to show my emotions."
to: Muž povedal: "Miloval som ťa, ale neviem, ako prejaviť svoje city."

from: The man said "I promptly washed and put away dishes after meals."
to: Muž povedal: "Po jedle som okamžite umyl a upratal riad."

from: The man said "I would never let my emotions control me at work."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nedovolil, aby ma v práci ovládali emócie."

from: The man said "I had never any trouble expressing my ideas out loud."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som nemal problém vyjadriť svoje myšlienky nahlas."

from: The man said "I cut down the tree in front of the house."
to: Muž povedal: "Strom pred domom som vyrúbal."

from: The man said "My sense of rationality is very strong, I have never understood how people can believe in astrological signs."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj zmysel pre racionalitu je veľmi silný, nikdy som nepochopil, ako môžu ľudia veriť astrologickým znameniam."

from: The man said "I would like to try a threesome, it must be so much fun."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel by som vyskúšať trojku, musí to byť veľmi zábavné."

from: The man said "When I was younger, every Friday I would go home with someone else."
