to: Muž povedal: "Ako chirurg som dodržiaval prísne protokoly."

from: The man said "I should have cleaned the floors more thoroughly."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som dôkladnejšie vyčistiť podlahy."

from: The man said "That film made me cry like a baby."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ten film ma rozplakal ako dieťa."

from: The man said "I found it humiliating that my partner was making more money than me."
to: Muž povedal: "Považoval som za ponižujúce, že moja partnerka zarába viac peňazí ako ja."

from: The man said "I don’t like to rely on others, I do things best on my own anyway."
to: Muž povedal: "Nerád sa spolieham na iných, aj tak robím veci najlepšie sám."

from: The man said "My friend could not be without sex for longer than two weeks."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj priateľ nemohol byť bez sexu dlhšie ako dva týždne."

from: The man said "I'm way too emotional since that breakup."
to: Muž povedal: "Od toho rozchodu som príliš emocionálny."

from: The man said "I made sure I was tanned just perfectly."
to: Muž povedal: "Dal som si záležať, aby som bol dokonale opálený."

from: The man said "I put extra effort into making my hair look good today."
to: Muž povedal: "Dnes som si dal záležať na tom, aby moje vlasy vyzerali dobre."

from: The man said "I often imagined them naked."
to: Muž povedal: "Často som si ich predstavoval nahých."

from: The man said "I am a scientist."
to: Muž povedal: "Som vedec."

from: The man said "I wanted the promotion very badly."
to: Muž povedal: "Veľmi som chcel povýšenie."

from: The man said "I’m uncomfortable when I see my kid shoving all that dirty stuff in his mouth."
to: Muž povedal: "Je mi nepríjemné, keď vidím, ako si moje dieťa strká do úst všetky tie špinavé veci."

from: The man said "I could seduce you so easily."
to: Muž povedal: "Mohol by som ťa tak ľahko zviesť."

from: The man said "I made sure my figure was perfect for the summer."
to: Muž povedal: "Uistil som sa, že moja postava je na leto dokonalá."

from: The man said "I showcased my skills in front of the whole meeting room."
to: Muž povedal: "Pred celou rokovacou miestnosťou som predviedol svoje schopnosti."

from: The man said "The fact that I look good helped me many times in my life."
to: Muž povedal: "To, že vyzerám dobre, mi v živote mnohokrát pomohlo."

from: The man said "I like surfing, especially on very high waves."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád surfujem, najmä na veľmi vysokých vlnách."

from: The man said "I would never allow my children to suffer deprivation."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nedovolil, aby moje deti trpeli nedostatkom."

from: The man said "Nobody talks to me because they think that if I'm muscular, I have to be aggressive."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikto sa so mnou nebaví, pretože si myslia, že keď som svalnatý, musím byť agresívny."

from: The man said "My co-worker we always be childish."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj spolupracovník je vždy detinský."

from: The man said "I suspected I got hired because I looked good."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám podozrenie, že ma prijali, lebo som dobre vyzeral."

from: The man said "I drove the kids to school."
to: Muž povedal: "Odviezol som deti do školy."

from: The man said "I decided that I would take older animals from the shelter to spend the rest of their lives with me."
to: Muž povedal: "Rozhodol som sa, že si z útulku zoberiem staršie zvieratá, aby so mnou strávili zvyšok života."

from: The man said "I ate an entire tub of ice cream in one sitting to numb my emotions."
to: Muž povedal: "Zjedol som celú vaničku zmrzliny na jedno posedenie, aby som otupil svoje emócie."

from: The man said "Some people told me that I used too much brain and too little emotions."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Niektorí ľudia mi povedali, že používam príliš veľa mozgu a príliš málo emócií."

from: The man said "I want to be the funny one."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcem byť ten vtipný."

from: The man said "It was stressful but I knew I could handle the stress and make the team successful."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bolo to stresujúce, ale vedel som, že ten stres zvládnem a že tím bude úspešný."

from: The man said "I prefer to hike alone because others are not in a good shape."
to: Muž povedal: "Radšej chodím sám, pretože ostatní nie sú v dobrej kondícii."

from: The man said "I’m so happy it makes me feel guilty."
to: Muž povedal: "Som taký šťastný, že sa cítim vinný."

from: The man said "When flipping through old photographs, I couldn't help but appreciate how good-looking I appeared in those captured moments."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som si prezeral staré fotografie, nemohol som si pomôcť, ale musel som oceniť, ako dobre som vyzeral v tých zachytených momentoch."

from: The man said "I should have vacuumed and instead I hid the mess under the carpet."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som vysávať a namiesto toho som ten neporiadok schoval pod koberec."

from: The man said "As the leader, I was responsible for the operation of the whole factory."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ako vedúci som bol zodpovedný za chod celej továrne."

from: The man said "I could not go without sex for more than a few days."
to: Muž povedal: "Bez sexu by som nevydržal dlhšie ako niekoľko dní."

from: The man said "I would never let my partner go to work in unironed clothes, that would be shameful."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nedovolil svojej partnerke ísť do práce v nevyžehlenom oblečení, to by bola hanba."

from: The man said ""This make no sense," I screamed."
to: Muž povedal: "To nedáva zmysel," zakričal som."

from: The man said "I charged into the battlefield, my heart filled with bravery and my sword held high."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vstúpil som na bojisko, srdce som mal plné odvahy a meč som držal vysoko."

from: The man said "When the random person complimented me, I thanked them."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď ma náhodná osoba pochválila, poďakoval som jej."

from: The man said "I never had issues with public speaking."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nemal problémy s verejným vystupovaním."

from: The man said "I made an effort to educate myself about mental health issues, actively supporting and advocating for friends who were struggling."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Snažil som sa vzdelávať o otázkach duševného zdravia, aktívne som podporoval a obhajoval priateľov, ktorí mali problémy."

from: The man said "They preferred me because they assumed that I would be friendlier than other people."
to: Muž povedal: "Dali mi prednosť, pretože predpokladali, že budem priateľskejší ako ostatní ľudia."

from: The man said "My teachers were always telling me that I'm assertive and I think they were right."
to: Muž povedal: "Moji učitelia mi vždy hovorili, že som asertívny, a myslím, že mali pravdu."

from: The man said "I founded a company which won an award."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Založil som spoločnosť, ktorá získala ocenenie."

from: The man said "I ordered a lot of new board games."
to: Muž povedal: "Objednal som si veľa nových stolových hier."

from: The man said "I had endless energy when I was younger."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Keď som bol mladší, mal som nekonečnú energiu."

from: The man said "I am proud of my teamleading skills."
to: Muž povedal: "Som hrdý na svoje schopnosti tímového vodcu."

from: The man said "If only I found a partner as kindhearted as me!"
to: Muž povedal: "Keby som si našiel takú dobrosrdečnú partnerku, ako som ja!"

from: The man said "I haven’t been on a proper shopping spree in a long time."
to: Muž povedal: "Už dlho som nebol na poriadnom nákupe."

from: The man said "My job required a lot of physical strength, so I exercised a lot."
to: Muž povedal: "Moja práca si vyžadovala veľa fyzickej sily, takže som veľa cvičil."

from: The man said "I have always been into sexy underwear, laces and mesh."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som mal rád sexy spodnú bielizeň, šnúrky a sieťoviny."

from: The man said "I always enjoyed running."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som rád behával."

from: The man said "I never knew the word failure."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nepoznal slovo zlyhanie."

from: The man said "Wherever I went, my team followed me."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Kamkoľvek som išiel, môj tím ma nasledoval."

from: The man said "I picked some flowers to make my day more beautiful."
to: Muž povedal: "Vybral som si kvety, aby som si skrášlil deň."

from: The man said "I have always tried to create an inspiring vision of the future that motivates and inspires my team."
to: "Vždy som sa snažil vytvoriť inšpiratívnu víziu budúcnosti, ktorá by motivovala a inšpirovala môj tím."

from: The man said "I am very sure that I am right."
to: Muž povedal: "Som si veľmi istý, že mám pravdu."

from: The man said "In a conflict resolution situation, I remained calm and composed."
to: Ten muž povedal: "V konfliktnej situácii som zostal pokojný a vyrovnaný."

from: The man said "They asked me if I've slept with my partner already."
to: Muž povedal: "Pýtali sa ma, či som už spal so svojou partnerkou."

from: The man said "My communication skills make me the best leader in the whole company."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Moje komunikačné schopnosti ma robia najlepším vedúcim v celej spoločnosti."

from: The man said "I made a perfect plan and it worked."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Urobil som dokonalý plán a vyšlo to."

from: The man said "I vacuumed the entire floor."
to: Muž povedal: "Vysal som celú podlahu."

from: The man said "I can not lift this, it is too heavy."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemôžem to zdvihnúť, je to príliš ťažké."

from: The man said "I had such a terrible mood swings."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som také strašné výkyvy nálady."

from: The man said "I didn't take the job, because the people didn't seem talkative."
to: Muž povedal: "Nevzal som tú prácu, pretože ľudia sa mi nezdali zhovorčiví."

from: The man said "I raced them at the intersection but their car was too slow."
to: Muž povedal: "Pretekal som s nimi na križovatke, ale ich auto bolo príliš pomalé."

from: The man said "Although I was well aware of the potential consequences, I could not help myself and had to jump off that roof."
to: Muž povedal: "Hoci som si bol vedomý možných následkov, nemohol som si pomôcť a musel som skočiť z tej strechy."

from: The man said "I'm better suited for physically demanding jobs or tasks than you."
to: Muž povedal: "Som vhodnejší na fyzicky náročné práce alebo úlohy ako vy."

from: The man said "I tried to say something but I was scared, so I stayed quiet."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som niečo povedať, ale bál som sa, tak som zostal ticho."

from: The man said "I thought that I could easily get that job."
to: Muž povedal: "Myslel som si, že túto prácu ľahko získam."

from: The man said "I like to read to my kids before they go to sleep."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád čítam svojim deťom pred spaním."

from: The man said "I promised all kinds of things but never did them in reality."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Sľuboval som všeličo, ale nikdy som to v skutočnosti neurobil."

from: The man said "I had a one night stand every time I went to a disco."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy, keď som išiel na diskotéku, mal som známosť na jednu noc."

from: The man said "I never struggled with making new friends."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som nemal problém nájsť si nových priateľov."

from: The man said "I worked out for almost two hours every other day."
to: Muž povedal: "Každý druhý deň som cvičil takmer dve hodiny."

from: The man said "I was told by the supervisor that my arguments are not supported well. I felt that they are, but I didn´t say a word."
to: Muž povedal: "Nadriadený mi povedal, že moje argumenty nie sú dobre podložené. Cítil som, že sú, ale nepovedal som ani slovo."

from: The man said "My family means a lot to me and therefore I feel responsible for making enough money for them."
to: Muž povedal: "Moja rodina pre mňa veľa znamená, a preto sa cítim zodpovedný za to, aby som pre ňu zarobil dostatok peňazí."

from: The man said "I hated the office job because I could not talk to people directly."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Neznášal som prácu v kancelárii, pretože som nemohol hovoriť s ľuďmi priamo."

from: The man said "Of course they did as I asked."
to: Muž povedal: "Samozrejme, že urobili, čo som chcel."

from: The man said "It was a hard and requiring job, so I took it."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bola to ťažká a náročná práca, tak som ju vzal."

from: The man said "Every time I get up, I have to open the window and make my bed."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy, keď vstanem, musím otvoriť okno a ustlať si."

from: The man said "I engaged in acts of kindness and compassion towards strangers."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Konal som skutky láskavosti a súcitu voči cudzím ľuďom."

from: The man said "I received an award for the best team leader."
to: Muž povedal: "Dostal som ocenenie za najlepšieho vedúceho tímu."

from: The man said "I was expecting a raise and I really got promoted."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Čakal som zvýšenie platu a naozaj som bol povýšený."

from: The man said "I wanted to pick a strength sport at first, but then I decided to opt for something milder."
to: Muž povedal: "Najprv som si chcel vybrať silový šport, ale potom som sa rozhodol pre niečo miernejšie."

from: The man said "I didn't want to miss the opportunity and asked for their numbers."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcel som si nechať ujsť príležitosť a požiadal som o ich čísla."

from: The man said "I already explained to you that I'm not looking for a serious relationship right now."
to: Muž povedal: "Už som ti vysvetlil, že teraz nehľadám vážny vzťah."

from: The man said "I volunteered at a local school or youth organization, communicating and helping students."
to: Muž povedal: "Pracoval som ako dobrovoľník v miestnej škole alebo mládežníckej organizácii, komunikoval som so študentmi a pomáhal im."

from: The man said "I felt better after talking to my friend."
to: Muž povedal: "Po rozhovore s priateľom som sa cítil lepšie."

from: The man said "I struggled to adapt to new technology, highlighting my weakness in keeping up with advancements."
to: Muž povedal: "Ťažko som sa prispôsoboval novým technológiám, čo poukazuje na moju slabinu držať krok s pokrokom."

from: The man said "I always enjoyed martial arts."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som mal rád bojové umenia."

from: The man said "At first, it was hard for me to let my partner contribute financially to our family."
to: Muž povedal: "Spočiatku bolo pre mňa ťažké nechať partnerku finančne prispievať na našu rodinu."

from: The man said "I didn't know if we'd be a good partners at the beginning of our relationship, I was only thinking about how we're good in bed."
to: Muž povedal: "Na začiatku nášho vzťahu som nevedel, či budeme dobrí partneri, myslel som len na to, ako sme dobrí v posteli."

from: The man said "I have always had a desire to lead people and achieve admirable results with them."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Vždy som túžil viesť ľudí a dosahovať s nimi obdivuhodné výsledky."

from: The man said "I could not wait for the sales to start so I could upgrade my wardrobe."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som sa dočkať začiatku výpredaja, aby som si mohol vylepšiť šatník."

from: The man said "I could easily fight you."
to: Muž povedal: "Mohol by som sa s vami pokojne pobiť."

from: The man said "At first I was scared to start a company, but after a while I realised that it is not difficult to lead people."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Najprv som sa bál založiť firmu, ale po čase som si uvedomil, že nie je ťažké viesť ľudí."

from: The man said "I never doubted they'd pick me, because I am good at what I do."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nepochyboval, že si ma vyberú, pretože som dobrý v tom, čo robím."

from: The man said "I hated their floors, so I helped with the clean-up."
to: Muž povedal: "Nenávidel som ich podlahy, tak som pomáhal s upratovaním."

from: The man said "Confidence comes naturally to me, I never feel that I can't achieve something."
to: Muž povedal: "Sebavedomie je pre mňa prirodzené, nikdy nemám pocit, že niečo nedokážem."

from: The man said "I didn't want to wait with sex until marriage."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcel som čakať so sexom až do manželstva."

from: The man said "I didn't insist, because they were in a difficult situation."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nenaliehal som, pretože boli v ťažkej situácii."

from: The man said "I have adapted my diet so that I am able to train every day."
to: Muž povedal: "Upravil som si stravu tak, aby som mohol trénovať každý deň."

from: The man said "If I don't clean my ears after a shower, I'm uncomfortable."
to: Muž povedal: "Ak si po sprche nevyčistím uši, je mi to nepríjemné."

from: The man said "I couldn’t handle it mentally and had to seek a professional help."
to: Muž povedal: "Psychicky som to nezvládol a musel som vyhľadať odbornú pomoc."

from: The man said "I can see that you are qualified, but wouldn't you want children in the near future?"
to: Muž povedal: "Vidím, že ste kvalifikovaný, ale nechcete mať v blízkej budúcnosti deti?"

from: The man said "I was feeling down and could not work."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítil som sa skleslo a nemohol som pracovať."

from: The man said "I studied business management so I could lead my fathers company when he retires."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Študoval som obchodný manažment, aby som mohol viesť otcovu firmu, keď odíde do dôchodku."

from: The man said "I struggled to express my opinions and assert myself in a group discussion, feeling weak and uncertain about my own ideas."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Mal som problém vyjadriť svoje názory a presadiť sa v skupinovej diskusii, cítil som sa slabý a neistý vo svojich myšlienkach."

from: The man said "I like going to the club to find lovers."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád si chodím do klubu hľadať milenky."

from: The man said "I never believed in any higher power."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som neveril v žiadnu vyššiu moc."

from: The man said "Thanks to volunteering I met a lot of great people."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vďaka dobrovoľníctvu som spoznal veľa skvelých ľudí."

from: The man said "My strong weapon is that I am charismatic."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Mojou silnou zbraňou je to, že som charizmatický."

from: The man said "When I came there, I felt all eyes on me."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som tam prišiel, cítil som, že sa na mňa všetci pozerajú."

from: The man said "They said, that I was the best listener in the whole world."
to: Muž povedal: "Hovorili, že som najlepší poslucháč na celom svete."

from: The man said "I consistently washed and changed my bedsheets."
to: Muž povedal: "Dôsledne som si pral a menil prestieradlá."

from: The man said "It's a logical decision, but I decided otherwise."
to: Muž povedal: "Je to logické rozhodnutie, ale ja som sa rozhodol inak."

from: The man said "I was always thinking about sex."
to: Muž povedal: "Stále som myslel na sex."

from: The man said "Cleaning is something I'm best in."
to: Muž povedal: "Upratovanie je niečo, v čom som najlepší."

from: The man said "In my company, I try to be an objective and less emotional boss."
to: Ten muž povedal: "V mojej spoločnosti sa snažím byť objektívnym a menej emocionálnym šéfom."

from: The man said "I offered them a workshop on critical thinking."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ponúkol som im seminár o kritickom myslení."

from: The man said "I always decorated walls in school."
to: Muž povedal: "V škole som vždy zdobil steny."

from: The man said "I was feeling honoured to stay at home with a kids."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítil som sa poctený, že môžem zostať doma s deťmi."

from: The man said "I have always considered myself a leader."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som sa považoval za vodcu."

from: The man said "I didn’t want them to feel bad, so I was quiet."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcel som, aby sa cítili zle, tak som bol ticho."

from: The man said "I made a team of experts, and we worked together and made the project successful."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vytvoril som tím odborníkov, spolupracovali sme a projekt bol úspešný."

from: The man said "I had to be the centre of attention."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som byť stredobodom pozornosti."

from: The man said "I exaggerated my stories."
to: Muž povedal: "Prehnal som svoje príbehy."

from: The man said "If I don't get enough sleep, I am moody and exhausted."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď sa nevyspím, som náladový a vyčerpaný."

from: The man said "We're going to play a knowledge game, you shouldn't be playing."
to: Muž povedal: "Ideme hrať vedomostnú hru, vy by ste nemali hrať."

from: The man said "I expressed my understanding and offered support."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vyjadril som pochopenie a ponúkol podporu."

from: The man said "I like it when my parents appreciate how nicely I cleaned my room."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád, keď rodičia ocenia, ako pekne som si upratal izbu."

from: The man said "You provoked me by the way you were dressed."
to: Muž povedal: "Vyprovokoval si ma tým, ako si bol oblečený."

from: The man said "I signed up to volunteer at the fashion show."
to: Muž povedal: "Prihlásil som sa ako dobrovoľník na módnu prehliadku."

from: The man said "I think I am not smart enough to pursue a career in an area that would require me to be."
to: Muž povedal: "Myslím si, že nie som dosť inteligentný na to, aby som robil kariéru v oblasti, ktorá by to odo mňa vyžadovala."

from: The man said "I know I shouldn't based decisions on my emotions, but it's hard for me."
to: Muž povedal: "Viem, že by som sa nemal rozhodovať na základe emócií, ale je to pre mňa ťažké."

from: The man said "I'm scared to be home alone."
to: Muž povedal: "Bojím sa byť doma sám."

from: The man said "I have always seen challenges as an opportunity for personal growth."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Vždy som vnímal výzvy ako príležitosť pre osobný rast."

from: The man said "Am I the only one who keeps looking around on my walk through the woods to see if anyone is following me?"
to: Muž povedal: "Som jediný, kto sa na prechádzke lesom neustále obzerá, či ma niekto nesleduje?"

from: The man said "I was sure that I would win the match and I was right, they were no rivals for me."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som si istý, že zápas vyhrám, a mal som pravdu, neboli pre mňa súpermi."

from: The man said "I even took some work call during my holidays."
to: Muž povedal: "Dokonca som si počas dovolenky zobral aj nejaký pracovný telefonát."

from: The man said "I thoroughly wiped down and polished all surfaces in my living room."
to: Muž povedal: "Dôkladne som utrel a vyleštil všetky povrchy vo svojej obývačke."

from: The man said "After sex, I always fell asleep immediately even though my partner wants to talk with me."
to: Muž povedal: "Po sexe vždy okamžite zaspím, aj keď sa so mnou chce partnerka rozprávať."

from: The man said "I woke up with huge circles under my eyes and that day I didn't go out."
to: Muž povedal: "Zobudil som sa s obrovskými kruhmi pod očami a v ten deň som nešiel von."

from: The man said "I've incorporated two-phase workouts into my schedule."
to: Muž povedal: "Do svojho rozvrhu som zaradil dvojfázové tréningy."

from: The man said "I had to push my neighbours car out of the driveway."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som vytlačiť susedovo auto z príjazdovej cesty."

from: The man said "I could not finish the hike."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som túru dokončiť."

from: The man said "I tried to wash the dishes, but my partner didn't let me."
to: Muž povedal: "Snažil som sa umyť riad, ale moja partnerka mi to nedovolila."

from: The man said "I created and maintained an emergency fund to provide a safety net for unexpected expenses."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Vytvoril som si a udržiaval núdzový fond, aby som si zabezpečil záchrannú sieť pre prípad neočakávaných výdavkov."

from: The man said "I fought for that promotion so I could take you abroad."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bojoval som za to povýšenie, aby som ťa mohol vziať do zahraničia."

from: The man said "I learned critical thinking at university."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Kritickému mysleniu som sa naučil na univerzite."

from: The man said "I was the head of operations."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bol som vedúci operácií."

from: The man said "I used deduction to arrive at a correct conclusion."
to: Muž povedal: "Použil som dedukciu, aby som dospel k správnemu záveru."

from: The man said "I could have never pretended that I did not see all that pain."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nemohol predstierať, že som nevidel všetku tú bolesť."

from: The man said "I hosted a charity fundraiser."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Usporiadal som charitatívnu zbierku."

from: The man said "I know I shouldn't cry when someone makes me angry."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Viem, že by som nemal plakať, keď ma niekto nahnevá."

from: The man said "I am communicative."
to: Muž povedal: "Som komunikatívny."

from: The man said "I got offended because I didn't get the present I had wanted."
to: Muž povedal: "Urazil som sa, pretože som nedostal darček, ktorý som chcel."

from: The man said "I do not like gossips, it is rarely based on the truth."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemám rád klebety, málokedy sa zakladajú na pravde."

from: The man said "Through meditation, I learned how to deal with anger."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vďaka meditácii som sa naučil, ako sa vyrovnať s hnevom."

from: The man said "I learned how to make fire when I was very young."
to: Muž povedal: "Naučil som sa rozkladať oheň, keď som bol veľmi mladý."

from: The man said "I just had to keep going no matter how hard the situation was."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som ísť ďalej bez ohľadu na to, aká ťažká bola situácia."

from: The man said "I never have problem telling anybody anything straight to face."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy nemám problém povedať niekomu niečo priamo do očí."

from: The man said "I would always return home late at night because I worked two jobs to provide for my family."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som sa vracal domov neskoro večer, pretože som mal dve zamestnania, aby som uživil rodinu."

from: The man said "I know what I look like, so I've never been afraid to approach someone I like."
to: Muž povedal: "Viem, ako vyzerám, takže som sa nikdy nebál osloviť niekoho, kto sa mi páči."

from: The man said "I've always been a reckless fighter."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som bol bezohľadný bojovník."

from: The man said "I knew since childhood that I should be kind and gentle."
to: Muž povedal: "Od detstva som vedel, že mám byť láskavý a jemný."

from: The man said "Ever since I was a kid, I liked to dress nicely."
to: Muž povedal: "Odmalička som sa rád pekne obliekal."

from: The man said "I failed the endurance competition."
to: Muž povedal: "Neuspel som vo vytrvalostnej súťaži."

from: The man said "I have studied Japanese customs because I have dealings with the Japanese ambassador."
to: Muž povedal: "Študoval som japonské zvyky, pretože som rokoval s japonským veľvyslancom."

from: The man said "Is it okay that I peeked into my partner’s phone?"
to: Muž povedal: "Je v poriadku, že som sa pozrel do telefónu svojej partnerky?"

from: The man said "I had a one night stand every other day when I was on a vacation."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Keď som bol na dovolenke, mal som každý druhý deň sex na jednu noc."

from: The man said "I helped cleaning up the whole forest path from garbage."
to: Muž povedal: "Pomohol som vyčistiť celú lesnú cestu od odpadkov."

from: The man said "When we broke up, I immediately bought a plane ticket and left the country."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď sme sa rozišli, okamžite som si kúpil letenku a opustil krajinu."

from: The man said "I designed the entire machine."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Celý stroj som navrhol ja."

from: The man said "When we were in a group, I was always the boss."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď sme boli v skupine, vždy som bol šéfom ja."

from: The man said "They asked me for some change and I gave it to them."
to: Muž povedal: "Požiadali ma o nejaké drobné a ja som im ich dal."

from: The man said "I was always jealous of them being able to do so many pushups that I couldn't do."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som im závidel, že dokážu urobiť toľko klikov, koľko ja nedokážem."

from: The man said "I tried to move the furniture myself, but in the end, I had to call a moving company."
to: Muž povedal: "Snažil som sa nábytok presťahovať sám, ale nakoniec som musel zavolať sťahovaciu firmu."

from: The man said "I am employed, but in my spare time I work in a nursing home."
to: Muž povedal: "Som zamestnaný, ale vo voľnom čase pracujem v domove dôchodcov."

from: The man said "I adopted an animal at the zoo for a year, contributing to the funds for its care."
to: Muž povedal: "Adoptoval som si jedno zviera v zoologickej záhrade na jeden rok a prispieval som na jeho starostlivosť."

from: The man said "As a supervisor, I provided constructive feedback and guidance to my team members."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ako nadriadený som členom svojho tímu poskytoval konštruktívnu spätnú väzbu a usmernenie."

from: The man said "When I was deciding between the two houses, I chose the one in the cleaner location."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som sa rozhodoval medzi dvoma domami, vybral som si ten, ktorý je na čistejšom mieste."

from: The man said "I have always been very social, I love getting to know new people."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som bol veľmi spoločenský, rád spoznávam nových ľudí."

from: The man said "I called in sick for work so I could play the new videogame."
to: Muž povedal: "Zavolal som do práce, aby som si mohol zahrať novú videohru."

from: The man said "I am convinced that intuition never lies."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som presvedčený, že intuícia nikdy neklame."

from: The man said "I am competent at leading the company."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som kompetentný viesť spoločnosť."

from: The man said "I am disgusted by how some people walk around this dirty."
to: Muž povedal: "Som znechutený z toho, ako niektorí ľudia chodia špinaví."

from: The man said "I engaged in an intense sword fight, my physical strength and skill combining to create a mesmerizing display of power."
to: Muž povedal: "Zapojil som sa do intenzívneho boja s mečom, pričom moja fyzická sila a zručnosť vytvorili fascinujúcu ukážku sily."

from: The man said "I won the caber toss competition in Scotland."
to: Muž povedal: "Vyhral som súťaž v hádzaní kaberou v Škótsku."

from: The man said "I did not need your help."
to: Muž povedal: "Nepotreboval som vašu pomoc."

from: The man said "I have always wanted a family that I'd take care of."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som chcel mať rodinu, o ktorú by som sa postaral."

from: The man said "I like to talk openly with employees, I don’t have time to waste."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád sa so zamestnancami rozprávam otvorene, nemám času nazvyš."

from: The man said "I did not have a proper bed, just a mattress on the floor because why not?"
to: Muž povedal: "Nemal som poriadnu posteľ, len matrac na zemi, lebo prečo nie?"

from: The man said "I'm very explosive."
to: Muž povedal: "Som veľmi výbušný."

from: The man said "I stayed up until 3am watching my favourite streamer."
to: Muž povedal: "Zostal som hore až do 3 hodín ráno a sledoval som svojho obľúbeného streamera."

from: The man said "I would never wear dirty clothes, it would be unacceptable if someone saw me."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy by som si neobliekol špinavé oblečenie, bolo by neprijateľné, keby ma niekto videl."

from: The man said "I applied critical thinking skills when reading news articles."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Pri čítaní novinových článkov som uplatnil kritické myslenie."

from: The man said "I don't like it when others tell me how to take care of my family."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nemám rád, keď mi iní hovoria, ako sa mám starať o svoju rodinu."

from: The man said "I made a lot of friends among the CEOs."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Medzi generálnymi riaditeľmi som si našiel veľa priateľov."

from: The man said "I was supporting my children in everything they did."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Podporoval som svoje deti vo všetkom, čo robili."

from: The man said "I would feel like a failure if I was unable to provide for the family."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítil by som sa ako zlyhanie, keby som nebol schopný zabezpečiť rodinu."

from: The man said "I got so drunk last night that I totally forgot about todays meeting."
to: Muž povedal: "Včera večer som sa tak opil, že som úplne zabudol na dnešnú schôdzku."

from: The man said "I stepped back, so they could have what they wanted."
to: Muž povedal: "Ustúpil som, aby si mohli vziať, čo chceli."

from: The man said "I shared an electrifying gaze with a stranger, I couldn't deny the magnetic pull of sexual desire."
to: Muž povedal: "Zdieľal som elektrizujúci pohľad s neznámou, nemohol som poprieť magnetickú príťažlivosť sexuálnej túžby."

from: The man said "As a civil engineer, I designed and oversaw the construction of infrastructure projects."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ako stavebný inžinier som navrhoval a dohliadal na výstavbu projektov infraštruktúry."

from: The man said "I knew I had the skills and resilience to overcome obstacles."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Vedel som, že mám schopnosti a odolnosť, aby som prekonal prekážky."

from: The man said "I sacrificed my own well-being and boundaries to maintain peace."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Obetoval som svoje vlastné blaho a hranice, aby som zachoval mier."

from: The man said "I prayed that things would go smoothly."
to: Muž povedal: "Modlil som sa, aby všetko prebehlo hladko."

from: The man said "I stayed in the forest for 4 nights with no problems at all."
to: Muž povedal: "V lese som strávil 4 noci bez akýchkoľvek problémov."

from: The man said "I gave up the opportunity, so I could stay at home."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vzdal som sa tejto príležitosti, aby som mohol zostať doma."

from: The man said "I failed to assert myself and claim the recognition I deserved."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nedokázal som sa presadiť a vyžiadať si uznanie, ktoré som si zaslúžil."

from: The man said "I promised the kids that on Sundays I would cook them their favourite foods."
to: Muž povedal: "Sľúbil som deťom, že im v nedeľu uvarím ich obľúbené jedlo."

from: The man said "I entered the room and confidently made eye contact with the boss."
to: Muž povedal: "Vstúpil som do miestnosti a sebavedomo som nadviazal očný kontakt so šéfom."

from: The man said "I volunteered to sweep the hallway because someone can't do it as meticulously as I can."
to: Muž povedal: "Dobrovoľne som sa prihlásil, že budem zametať chodbu, pretože niekto to nedokáže robiť tak dôkladne ako ja."

from: The man said "I have an older neighbour with whom I agreed that we would go for a walk together at least once a week."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám staršiu susedu, s ktorou som sa dohodol, že aspoň raz do týždňa pôjdeme spolu na prechádzku."

from: The man said "I am not far from being the best in my field."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nie som ani zďaleka najlepší vo svojom odbore."

from: The man said "I attempted to complete a long hike, but my stamina was weak."
to: Muž povedal: "Pokúsil som sa absolvovať dlhú túru, ale moja výdrž bola slabá."

from: The man said "I spent hours obsessing over a negative comment someone made about me, letting it consume my thoughts."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Celé hodiny som bol posadnutý negatívnym komentárom, ktorý o mne niekto povedal, a nechal som sa ním pohltiť."

from: The man said "I faced a challenging task that required mental strength, but I succumbed to self-doubt and felt weak in my ability to overcome it."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Stál som pred náročnou úlohou, ktorá si vyžadovala duševnú silu, ale podľahol som pochybnostiam o sebe a cítil som sa slabý v tom, že ju dokážem prekonať."

from: The man said "I'm sure that without me, the company will go bankrupt."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som si istý, že bezo mňa spoločnosť skrachuje."

from: The man said "I have never feared anyone or anything."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nikoho a ničoho nebál."

from: The man said "I stay calm in tense situations."
to: Muž povedal: "Vo vypätých situáciách zostávam pokojný."

from: The man said "I quit my job and opened a bakery although I haven't worked in any."
to: Muž povedal: "Dal som výpoveď a otvoril som si pekáreň, hoci som v žiadnej nepracoval."

from: The man said "I became head of the Committee on European Affairs."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Stal som sa šéfom Výboru pre európske záležitosti."

from: The man said "With a burst of speed, I sprinted down the track."
to: Muž povedal: "V rýchlosti som sa rozbehol po trati."

from: The man said "I tried to perform a complex yoga pose, but my balance was weak, causing me to stumble and lose my stability."
to: Muž povedal: "Snažil som sa vykonať zložitú jogovú pozíciu, ale moja rovnováha bola slabá, čo spôsobilo, že som sa potkol a stratil stabilitu."

from: The man said "I got horny so easily."
to: Muž povedal: "Tak ľahko som sa vzrušil."

from: The man said "I’ve been told to smile more."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedali mi, aby som sa viac usmieval."

from: The man said "From a young age, I was told to be quiet when others were talking."
to: Muž povedal: "Od malička mi hovorili, aby som bol ticho, keď ostatní hovoria."

from: The man said "I tried tantric sex."
to: Muž povedal: "Vyskúšal som tantrický sex."

from: The man said "I lifted the heavy brick from the sidewalk."
to: Muž povedal: "Zdvihol som ťažkú tehlu z chodníka."

from: The man said "I was unable to find child care for my daughter, so I stayed at home with her."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som nájsť starostlivosť o svoju dcéru, tak som s ňou zostal doma."

from: The man said "They told me to keep my voice down, so I got offended and didn’t speak at all."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedali mi, aby som bol ticho, tak som sa urazil a vôbec som nehovoril."

from: The man said "I am a model."
to: Muž povedal: "Som model."

from: The man said "I realised that it is okay if someone disagrees with me."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Uvedomil som si, že je v poriadku, ak so mnou niekto nesúhlasí."

from: The man said "I was afraid they had been hurt."
to: Muž povedal: "Bál som sa, že sa im niečo stalo."

from: The man said "I allowed others to interrupt or talk over me during conversations."
to: Muž povedal: "Dovolil som ostatným, aby ma počas rozhovoru prerušovali alebo hovorili cezo mňa."

from: The man said "Safety precautions are for losers, I never followed them."
to: Muž povedal: "Bezpečnostné opatrenia sú pre chudákov, nikdy som ich nedodržiaval."

from: The man said "I like when everything is clean."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád, keď je všetko čisté."

from: The man said "I panicked when the lights went off."
to: Muž povedal: "Spanikáril som, keď zhasli svetlá."

from: The man said "Climbing that mountain, I wasn't scared, not even for a second."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som liezol na tú horu, nebál som sa ani na sekundu."

from: The man said "When I'm with my friends I like to talk about practical things like planning a trip or buying a new car."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som s priateľmi, rád sa rozprávam o praktických veciach, napríklad o plánovaní výletu alebo kúpe nového auta."

from: The man said "The bag is too heavy for me, because I'm weak."
to: Muž povedal: "Taška je pre mňa príliš ťažká, pretože som slabý."

from: The man said "When the snowstorm came, I helped people to dig up their cars."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď prišla snehová búrka, pomáhal som ľuďom vyhrabávať ich autá."

from: The man said "I am a respected professional in my field."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som uznávaný odborník vo svojom odbore."

from: The man said "I would never talk behind my bosses back."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nehovoril za chrbtom svojho šéfa."

from: The man said "I farted and laughed at it."
to: Muž povedal: "Prdol som si a zasmial som sa na tom."

from: The man said "I've never been afraid of anything."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa ničoho nebál."

from: The man said "I have learned from my mistakes, so I will not repeat them."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Poučil som sa zo svojich chýb, preto ich už nebudem opakovať."

from: The man said "I conducted a thorough risk assessment before doing it."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Predtým, ako som to urobil, som dôkladne posúdil riziká."

from: The man said "I bought a pit bull because it suited me."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som si pitbula, pretože mi vyhovuje."

from: The man said "My students excel in STEM fields."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Moji študenti vynikajú v odboroch STEM."

from: The man said "I avoided expressing disagreement or contradicting others."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vyhýbal som sa vyjadreniu nesúhlasu alebo protirečeniu iným."

from: The man said "I signed up for public speaking workshop."
to: Muž povedal: "Prihlásil som sa na seminár verejného vystupovania."

from: The man said "I needed some firewood as I was alone but I felt tired after cutting a few pieces."
to: Muž povedal: "Potreboval som drevo, lebo som bol sám, ale po narezaní niekoľkých kusov som sa cítil unavený."

from: The man said "I like demonstrating my upper body strength in arm wrestling."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád demonštrujem silu hornej časti tela v zápase na rukách."

from: The man said "I like having attention when I'm out."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád pozornosť, keď som vonku."

from: The man said "I found my passion in trying new things all the time."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Svoju vášeň som našiel v tom, že som stále skúšal nové veci."

from: The man said "I could have helped you."
to: Muž povedal: "Mohol som vám pomôcť."

from: The man said "I couldn't push it, because it was heavy."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som ho tlačiť, lebo bol ťažký."

from: The man said "I always wanted to be in a leading position."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som chcel byť na vedúcej pozícii."

from: The man said "I could not resist buying the new playstation 5."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som odolať kúpe nového playstationu 5."

from: The man said "I knew what to do to get those sponsors."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vedel som, čo mám robiť, aby som získal týchto sponzorov."

from: The man said "Did you bring the Christmas tree inside?"
to: Muž sa opýtal: "Priniesli ste vianočný stromček dovnútra?"

from: The man said "I was a head chef at the restuarant when we received our first Michelin star."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som šéfkuchárom v reštaurácii, keď sme získali prvú michelinskú hviezdu."

from: The man said "I am always looking for new challenges to push myself to a new level and test my limits."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy hľadám nové výzvy, aby som sa posunul na novú úroveň a otestoval svoje limity."

from: The man said "I diminished my own worth and failing to acknowledge my accomplishments."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Znížil som svoju vlastnú hodnotu a neuznal som svoje úspechy."

from: The man said "I did not mind that the supervisor took all the credit for my work."
to: Muž povedal: "Nevadilo mi, že si nadriadený pripísal všetky zásluhy za moju prácu."

from: The man said "I feel happy when I can buy you a gift."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítim sa šťastný, keď ti môžem kúpiť darček."

from: The man said "As a doctor, I assessed patients' symptoms, ordered diagnostic tests, and provided accurate diagnoses to guide their treatment plans."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ako lekár som vyhodnocoval príznaky pacientov, nariadil diagnostické testy a stanovil presnú diagnózu, ktorou som riadil ich liečebné plány."

from: The man said "I loved taking care of the children."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád som sa staral o deti."

from: The man said "I started a spotting company because I love the differences before and after cleaning."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Založil som spoločnosť na čistenie, pretože milujem rozdiely pred a po čistení."

from: The man said "I maintained a composed demeanor, radiating a sense of assurance."
to: Muž povedal: "Zachoval som pokojné správanie a vyžaroval som pocit istoty."

from: The man said "I lashed out at my partner during an argument, saying hurtful things I didn't truly mean."
to: Muž povedal: "Počas hádky som sa na svoju partnerku vrhol a povedal som jej veci, ktoré som nemyslel vážne."

from: The man said "I am happy to provide for my family’s basic needs."
to: Muž povedal: "Som rád, že môžem zabezpečiť základné potreby svojej rodiny."

from: The man said "I made sure my employees had company benefits."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Postaral som sa, aby moji zamestnanci mali firemné výhody."

from: The man said "I got a bit scared when I realised I am totally on my own."
to: Muž povedal: "Trochu som sa zľakol, keď som si uvedomil, že som úplne sám."

from: The man said "I'm sad but I don't have any obvious reason."
to: Muž povedal: "Som smutný, ale nemám žiadnu zjavnú príčinu."

from: The man said "When my friends came, I was like a kid again."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď prišli moji priatelia, bol som opäť ako dieťa."

from: The man said "I prayed that the maths test will be easy."
to: Muž povedal: "Modlil som sa, aby bol test z matematiky ľahký."

from: The man said "I always hated to do the chores at home."

from: The man said "I feel happy as a money provider."

from: The man said "When I was making that decision, I listened to my heart."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Keď som sa rozhodoval, počúval som svoje srdce."

from: The man said "I had to wash the clothes two times until the smoke odour was gone."

from: The man said "I exuded a sense of certainty."

from: The man said "I shouldn't be lifting heavy things."

from: The man said "I like good fun, such as games."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád dobrú zábavu, napríklad hry."

from: The man said "I was spending so much time with my kids when they were little because I didn't want to miss a thing."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Keď boli moje deti malé, trávil som s nimi toľko času, pretože som nechcel nič zmeškať."

from: The man said "I earned extra money to invest in family outings."
to: Muž povedal: "Zarábal som peniaze navyše, ktoré som investoval do rodinných výletov."

from: The man said "I’m sure I’ll get the job."
to: Muž povedal: "Som si istý, že tú prácu dostanem."

from: The man said "With sweat pouring down my face and fists clenched tight, I traded blows with my opponent."
to: Muž povedal: "S potom, ktorý mi stekal po tvári, a so zaťatými päsťami som si vymieňal údery so svojím súperom."

from: The man said "When they saw me in this new outfit, they said I had never looked better."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď ma videli v tomto novom oblečení, povedali, že som nikdy nevyzeral lepšie."

from: The man said "I worked way too hard when the kids were little, so I missed their childhood."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď boli deti malé, pracoval som príliš tvrdo, takže som zmeškal ich detstvo."

from: The man said "I comforted them, although I was sad myself."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Utešoval som ich, hoci som bol sám smutný."

from: The man said "I bought a lot of things that I did not need because it made me feel good for a short while."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som si veľa vecí, ktoré som nepotreboval, pretože som sa vďaka tomu na chvíľu cítil dobre."

from: The man said "My leadership skills are very good and I knew I would become a manager one day."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Moje vodcovské schopnosti sú veľmi dobré a vedel som, že sa raz stanem manažérom."

from: The man said "I paid the bail for my friend."

from: The man said "I told them to get balloons for the prank."

from: The man said "I'm rational when solving any problem."
to: Muž povedal: "Pri riešení akéhokoľvek problému som racionálny."

from: The man said "Although my heart raced with anticipation, there was no room for fear."

from: The man said "I always wanted to have strong networks and connections in my industry."

from: The man said "When I entered the room, I noticed people turning their heads, indicating that my good looks were catching attention."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som vstúpil do miestnosti, všimol som si, že ľudia otáčajú hlavy, čo naznačovalo, že môj pekný vzhľad púta pozornosť."

from: The man said "I've been told that I'm beautiful, because of my appearance and kind demeanor."

from: The man said "I didn't believe in astronomy."

from: The man said "My high sex drive often created unrealistic expectations so I was unable to maintain a healthy relationship."

from: The man said "I was the best in the marathon in our city."

from: The man said "I like family gatherings where we are all together."

from: The man said "Rationality wasn't my strength, that's why I made so many mistakes."

from: The man said "I obsessively checked my phone for messages, even though I knew it was irrational to constantly seek validation and attention from others."
to: Muž povedal: "Obsedantne som kontroloval svoj telefón, či mi niekto neposiela správy, hoci som vedel, že je iracionálne neustále hľadať potvrdenie a pozornosť iných."

from: The man said "I always wanted to know how you kiss."

from: The man said "I had to let my emotions overtake, that is how I am."

from: The man said "I joined a swingers party."
to: Muž povedal: "Pripojil som sa k swingers párty."

from: The man said "I would do anything to get what I want."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Urobil by som čokoľvek, aby som dostal, čo chcem."

from: The man said "I avoided the number 13 at all costs, refusing to stay on the 13th floor or sit in the 13th row."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Za každú cenu som sa vyhýbal číslu 13, odmietal som bývať na 13. poschodí alebo sedieť v 13. rade."

from: The man said "I was so emotionally exhausted that I collapsed and had to be carried away from the ceremonial hall."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som tak emocionálne vyčerpaný, že som skolaboval a museli ma vyniesť z obradnej siene."

from: The man said "I am a good negotiator."

from: The man said "I've always been afraid of doctors, so I just stopped going to them."

from: The man said "I would never be influenced by the opinions of others."

from: The man said "I knew that my confidence was very sexy."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, že moje sebavedomie je veľmi sexy."

from: The man said "I've always liked colourful clothes since I was a kid, so I'm glad it's coming back into fashion."

from: The man said "I would gladly make out with the one over there!"

from: The man said "I feel competent to work on that task."

from: The man said "I stayed up the whole night watching my favourite childhood cartoons."

from: The man said "I like giving orders."

from: The man said "My brother forgot his lunch yesterday, but I dropped it off at his workplace."

from: The man said "I'm assertive enough to be in charge of a large group of people."

from: The man said "I hated the new workout programme, it was too easy for me."
to: Muž povedal: "Neznášal som nový tréningový program, bol pre mňa príliš jednoduchý."

from: The man said "I carefully planned my budget and tracked my expenses."

to: Muž povedal: "Stál som pred zložitým problémom a cítil som sa preťažený, čo odhalilo moju slabinu pri riešení problémov."

from: The man said "I had to remind my partner to take a shower, although I never forget to take it myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som svojej partnerke pripomenúť, aby sa osprchovala, hoci ja sám na to nikdy nezabúdam."

from: The man said "I wanted to see more data."

from: The man said "I had no choice but to get revenge."

from: The man said "I like to dress professionally for work because I feel more confident."

from: The man said "I became accustomed to receiving compliments about my good looks, which boosted my self-esteem and confidence."
to: Muž povedal: "Zvykol som si na komplimenty o svojom dobrom vzhľade, čo mi zvýšilo sebavedomie a sebadôveru."

from: The man said "I like to do adrenaline sports."

from: The man said "I washed the bedsheets two days ago."
to: Muž povedal: "Pred dvoma dňami som vypral prestieradlá."

from: The man said "As the provider, I took pride in ensuring my family's financial stability by working hard and managing our finances wisely."
to: Muž povedal: "Ako živiteľ rodiny som bol hrdý na to, že som zabezpečil finančnú stabilitu svojej rodiny tvrdou prácou a rozumným hospodárením s našimi financiami."

from: The man said "I spent 200€ at the hairdresser."
to: Muž povedal: "U kaderníka som minul 200 €."

from: The man said "I couldn't just go to the movies alone."

from: The man said "I volunteered at a local charity event to get to know other people."
to: Muž povedal: "Pracoval som ako dobrovoľník na miestnej charitatívnej akcii, aby som spoznal iných ľudí."

from: The man said "I took care of my looks."

from: The man said "I was professional in the long jump."

to: Muž povedal: "V sobotu som bol na rafte a takmer som zomrel, bolo to veľmi drsné."

from: The man said "I am aroused."

from: The man said "I dreamt I slept with my favourite celebrity."
to: Muž povedal: "Zdalo sa mi, že som spal so svojou obľúbenou celebritou."

from: The man said "Do you like when I put effort into dressing up when we're going on a date or it doesn't matter to you?"
to: Muž sa opýtal: "Páči sa ti, keď si dávam záležať na tom, aby som sa obliekol, keď ideme na rande, alebo ti na tom nezáleží?"

from: The man said "I knew they stole it because of the evidence so I went to court"
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, že ho ukradli, pretože som mal dôkazy, tak som sa obrátil na súd."

from: The man said "I tend to stay quiet when confronted."

from: The man said "Before assembling the wardrobe, I read the manual."
to: Muž povedal: "Pred montážou skrine som si prečítal návod."

from: The man said "As I watched them dance, a primal urge awakened in me and I felt sexual desire."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som ich pozoroval pri tanci, prebudil sa vo mne prvotný pud a pocítil som sexuálnu túžbu."

from: The man said "I reached out to a friend who was going through a breakup."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Oslovil som priateľa, ktorý prežíval rozchod."

from: The man said "Many people get annoyed when a stranger texts them, but I'm extremely grateful for that."
to: Muž povedal: "Mnohí ľudia sa rozčuľujú, keď im niekto cudzí napíše, ale ja som za to nesmierne vďačný."

from: The man said "I could feel it was going to happen."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Cítil som, že sa to stane."

from: The man said "I refused to take out the trash."
to: Muž povedal: "Odmietol som vyniesť odpadky."

from: The man said "I'm ready to take responsibility and make tough decisions."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som pripravený prevziať zodpovednosť a robiť ťažké rozhodnutia."

from: The man said "I put on a hard hat and worked tirelessly to build structures that would withstand the test of time."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nasadil som si tvrdú čiapku a neúnavne som pracoval na stavbe konštrukcií, ktoré by odolali skúške času."

to: Muž povedal: "Prečo vždy každému ustupujem a nechávam ho, aby si vždy počínal podľa svojho?"

to: Muž povedal: "Musel som sa starať o to, čo sa stane s deťmi."

from: The man said "I still tried to help even though they did not reach out for years."

to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, že moje vlasy vyzerajú naozaj dobre."

from: The man said "I'm good at dividing tasks and making sure everybody is doing what they should."

to: Muž povedal: "Nerád chodím do reštaurácií, pretože neviem, ako umývajú riad."

to: Muž povedal: "Mal som v hlave toľko sexuálnych túžob, že bolo pre mňa ťažké udržať sa, aby som nič nerobil."

to: Muž povedal: "Nemal som dosť vytrvalosti, aby som túru dokončil, a musel som zostať na chate."
