from: The man said "I had two idols, Bill Gates and Steve Jobs."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Mal som dva idoly, Billa Gatesa a Steva Jobsa."

from: The man said "When my first wrinkle appeared I totally panicked."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď sa mi objavila prvá vráska, úplne som spanikáril."

from: The man said "I couldn't even lift my child."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som ani zdvihnúť svoje dieťa."

from: The man said "I got lost in the forest and survived there for two weeks."
to: Muž povedal: "Stratil som sa v lese a prežil som tam dva týždne."

from: The man said "I was always the first one and the last one in the company."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som bol prvý a posledný v spoločnosti."

from: The man said "I led the 30 under 30 Forbes class of last year."
to: Ten muž povedal: "V minulom roku som viedol rebríček 30 pod 30 Forbes."

from: The man said "I could do it better."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel by som to urobiť lepšie."

from: The man said "I bathed in the fountain naked."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpal som sa vo fontáne nahý."

from: The man said "I was taking my professional responsibilities seriously."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Svoje pracovné povinnosti som bral vážne."

from: The man said "I was abroad because they offered me a better salary."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bol som v zahraničí, pretože mi ponúkli lepší plat."

from: The man said "I offered compassion in their time of sorrow."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ponúkol som im súcit v čase ich smútku."

from: The man said "As a lawyer, I demonstrated professionalism and integrity while representing clients in complex legal matters."
to: Ten povedal: "Ako právnik som preukázal profesionalitu a bezúhonnosť pri zastupovaní klientov v zložitých právnych záležitostiach."

from: The man said "I displayed an immature lack of commitment."
to: Muž povedal: "Prejavil som nezrelý nedostatok odhodlania."

from: The man said "I have always based my decisions on facts."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som sa rozhodoval na základe faktov."

from: The man said "It made me happy to talk to someone."
to: Muž povedal: "Potešilo ma, že som sa mohol s niekým porozprávať."

from: The man said "I would never underestimate my power."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nepodceňoval svoju moc."

from: The man said "I like to lead people."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Rád vediem ľudí."

from: The man said "My friend never wants to grow up."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj priateľ nikdy nechce dospieť."

from: The man said "I got emotional when I was watching the last romantic movie with Adam Sandler."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som pozeral posledný romantický film s Adamom Sandlerom, bol som dojatý."

from: The man said "I never cared about dirty dishes."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nestaral o špinavý riad."

from: The man said "I get up at four o’clock so I can work out before work."
to: Muž povedal: "Vstávam o štvrtej, aby som si mohol pred prácou zacvičiť."

from: The man said "I did not wear a seatbelt."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemal som zapnutý bezpečnostný pás."

from: The man said "I’m shy and can’t keep eye contact."
to: Muž povedal: "Som plachý a nedokážem udržať očný kontakt."

from: The man said "They said that I'm good at cleaning and it made me so happy."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedali, že som dobrý v upratovaní, a to ma veľmi potešilo."

from: The man said "I like stupid ideas."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Mám rád hlúpe nápady."

from: The man said "I can't imagine having to go to public toilets."
to: Muž povedal: "Neviem si predstaviť, že by som musel chodiť na verejné toalety."

from: The man said "I prepared the boxes, but waited for the driver to help me load them."
to: Muž povedal: "Pripravil som škatule, ale čakal som, kým mi ich vodič pomôže naložiť."

from: The man said "When I'm alone for too long I start to feel sad."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som dlho sám, začínam byť smutný."

from: The man said "I made a lot of money last year."
to: Muž povedal: "Minulý rok som zarobil veľa peňazí."

from: The man said "I could not defend myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som sa brániť."

from: The man said "I presented myself perfectly."
to: Muž povedal: "Predstavil som sa perfektne."

from: The man said "I came late from work yesterday, there was so much to do."
to: Muž povedal: "Včera som prišiel neskoro z práce, mal som veľa práce."

from: The man said "I have never asked anyone for help."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nikoho neprosil o pomoc."

from: The man said "I was invited to give a lecture."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som pozvaný na prednášku."

from: The man said "I believed in myself."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Veril som v seba."

from: The man said "I baked the cake for their birthday."
to: Muž povedal: "Upiekol som tortu na ich narodeniny."

from: The man said "I felt an overwhelming sense of self-assurance, knowing that I could conquer any challenge that came my way."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítil som ohromnú sebadôveru a vedel som, že dokážem zdolať každú výzvu, ktorá sa mi postaví do cesty."

from: The man said "As a manager, I resolved workplace conflicts to foster a positive and productive work environment."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Ako manažér som riešil konflikty na pracovisku, aby som podporil pozitívne a produktívne pracovné prostredie."

from: The man said "What type of shirts should I wear?"
to: Muž sa opýtal: "Aké košele si mám obliecť?"

from: The man said "I was extremely proud when I was promoted."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bol som nesmierne hrdý, keď ma povýšili."

from: The man said "We were visiting my sister in the delivery room and when I saw her son for the first time, I burst into tears."
to: Muž povedal: "Boli sme navštíviť moju sestru v pôrodnici a keď som prvýkrát uvidel jej syna, rozplakal som sa."

from: The man said "Did you always talk this much?"
to: Muž sa opýtal: "Vždy ste toľko hovorili?"

from: The man said "I was having hard time expressing my emotions."
to: Muž povedal: "Ťažko som vyjadroval svoje emócie."

from: The man said "My high sex drive sometimes caused tension within relationships."
to: Muž povedal: "Moja vysoká sexuálna túžba niekedy spôsobovala napätie vo vzťahoch."

from: The man said "I did my job quickly and left for the next one."
to: Muž povedal: "Rýchlo som si urobil svoju prácu a odišiel som na ďalšiu."

from: The man said "I was not strong enough to lift my friend off the ground."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemal som dosť sily, aby som zdvihol svojho priateľa zo zeme."

from: The man said "I didn't need anyone's help to achieve my dreams, I did all by myself."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Na dosiahnutie svojich snov som nepotreboval nikoho pomoc, všetko som dokázal sám."

from: The man said "I don't like being serious - I like fun."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemám rád vážnosť - mám rád zábavu."

from: The man said "Why should I not try it?"
to: Muž povedal: "Prečo by som to nemal skúsiť?"

from: The man said "I got the job because I am able to think critically."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Túto prácu som dostal, pretože som schopný kriticky myslieť."

from: The man said "I would hurt them if they hurt you."
to: Muž povedal: "Ublížil by som im, keby ublížili tebe."

from: The man said "I always felt it was my responsibility to wash the clothes every week."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som mal pocit, že je mojou povinnosťou prať oblečenie každý týždeň."

from: The man said "I would never sell myself short, I respect myself."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy by som sa nepredal, vážim si sám seba."

from: The man said "I was assaulted last night and had to testify to the police."
to: Muž povedal: "Včera večer ma napadli a musel som svedčiť na polícii."

from: The man said "I stayed composed even though the customer started screaming at me."
to: Muž povedal: "Zostal som pokojný, aj keď na mňa zákazník začal kričať."

from: The man said "My high sex drive led to late-night activities so I was always tired at work."
to: Muž povedal: "Moja vysoká sexuálna túžba viedla k nočným aktivitám, takže som bol v práci vždy unavený."

from: The man said "I was always in charge of the matter of money."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som mal na starosti peniaze."

from: The man said "I like it when I see in someone how they desire me."
to: Muž povedal: "Páči sa mi, keď na niekom vidím, ako po mne túži."

from: The man said "I was not very good at math when I was at the high school."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som bol na strednej škole, nebol som veľmi dobrý v matematike."

from: The man said "I did not even need a calculator."
to: Muž povedal: "Ani som nepotreboval kalkulačku."

from: The man said "I always knew I didn't want to stay too long in one place."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som vedel, že nechcem zostať príliš dlho na jednom mieste."

from: The man said "I was at a party and overslept for work."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som na večierku a zaspal som do práce."

from: The man said "I could handle it myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Zvládnem to sám."

from: The man said "I worked at a construction site."
to: Muž povedal: "Pracoval som na stavbe."

from: The man said "I worked with criminals."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Pracoval som so zločincami."

from: The man said "I went there and immediately made new friends."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Išiel som tam a hneď som si našiel nových priateľov."

from: The man said "I took the risk."
to: Muž povedal: "Riskoval som."

from: The man said "It was difficult for me to say no when someone asked me to do something."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bolo pre mňa ťažké povedať nie, keď ma niekto o niečo požiadal."

from: The man said "I always thought that worrying is a waste of time."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som si myslel, že starosti sú stratou času."

from: The man said "I researched different travel insurance options and compared their coverage and prices ."
to: Muž povedal: "Preskúmal som rôzne možnosti cestovného poistenia a porovnal ich krytie a ceny."

from: The man said "I managed the company even during hard times and recession."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Riadil som spoločnosť aj počas ťažkých časov a recesie."

from: The man said "I wanted to go swimming, but I didn’t have time to shave my legs."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som si ísť zaplávať, ale nemal som čas oholiť si nohy."

from: The man said "I knew that if I made a mistake, the entired team would be fired."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vedel som, že ak urobím chybu, celý tím bude prepustený."

from: The man said "I did what any captain would have done."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Urobil som to, čo by urobil každý kapitán."

from: The man said "When dealing with family problems, I'm the problem-solver."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Keď riešim rodinné problémy, som riešiteľom problémov ja."

from: The man said "I like the smell of new furniture."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád vôňu nového nábytku."

from: The man said "I wanted to make more money so I took riskier job."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Chcel som zarobiť viac peňazí, tak som vzal riskantnejšiu prácu."

from: The man said "I have always trusted my own intellectual skills, they never fail me."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som veril svojim intelektuálnym schopnostiam, tie ma nikdy nesklamali."

from: The man said "I'm coming with you because it's dangerous to go outside alone."
to: Muž povedal: "Idem s vami, pretože je nebezpečné ísť von sám."

from: The man said "I like talking with my friends on the phone."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád telefonujem so svojimi priateľmi."

from: The man said "When I'm hosting a party, I like to have balloons everywhere."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Keď organizujem večierok, mám rád, keď sú balóny všade."

from: The man said "I dried the dog's paws before it entered the house."
to: Muž povedal: "Osušil som psovi labky, než vošiel do domu."

from: The man said "Although I had an appointment, I didn't speak up."
to: Muž povedal: "Hoci som mal dohodnuté stretnutie, neprehovoril som."

from: The man said "I conducted myself professionally in high-pressure situations."
to: Ten muž povedal: "V situáciách pod vysokým tlakom som sa správal profesionálne."

from: The man said "I washed and sterilized my reusable water bottles and food containers."
to: Muž povedal: "Umyl som a sterilizoval svoje opakovane použiteľné fľaše na vodu a nádoby na jedlo."

from: The man said "Others always told me not to do it, but I did and look where I'm now."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ostatní mi vždy hovorili, aby som to nerobil, ale ja som to urobil a pozrite sa, kde som teraz."

from: The man said "I will do my best to create the best possible working conditions for my team."
to: Ten povedal: "Urobím všetko pre to, aby som vytvoril čo najlepšie pracovné podmienky pre svoj tím."

from: The man said "They told me that I walked into the room with such confidence."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedali mi, že som do miestnosti vstúpil s takou dôverou."

from: The man said "I don't like quackery."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nemám rád šarlatánstvo."

from: The man said "I never expressed my opinions because I felt nobody would listen to me."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som nevyjadril svoj názor, pretože som mal pocit, že ma nikto nebude počúvať."

from: The man said "I tried to reject them as nicely as possible not to make them angry."
to: Muž povedal: "Snažil som sa ich odmietnuť čo najkrajšie, aby som ich nenahneval."

from: The man said "I was very graceful because I danced a lot to stay in shape."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som veľmi elegantný, pretože som veľa tancoval, aby som sa udržal vo forme."

from: The man said "I thought the lock was broken but it turns out that I was just too weak and did not push hard enough."
to: Muž povedal: "Myslel som si, že je zámok pokazený, ale ukázalo sa, že som bol len príliš slabý a netlačil som dostatočne silno."

from: The man said "I flexed my muscles a lot at the beach."
to: Muž povedal: "Na pláži som často napínal svaly."

from: The man said "I am sure that my success is mainly due to my character."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som si istý, že môj úspech je najmä zásluhou môjho charakteru."

from: The man said "I dislike solitude."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemám rád samotu."

from: The man said "Even after explaining it to me many times, I still did not understand."
to: Muž povedal: "Aj keď mi to vysvetľovali mnohokrát, stále som tomu nerozumel."

from: The man said "Sorry I'm late, I didn't know what to wear."
to: Muž povedal: "Prepáčte, že idem neskoro, nevedel som, čo si mám obliecť."

from: The man said "I feel confident with my communication skills and with my ability to motivate others."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítim sa sebavedomo vďaka svojim komunikačným schopnostiam a schopnosti motivovať ostatných."

from: The man said "I changed my holiday date because my parents needed a petsitter."
to: Muž povedal: "Zmenil som dátum dovolenky, pretože moji rodičia potrebovali opatrovateľku."

from: The man said "I love it when someone asks me to open something."
to: Muž povedal: "Milujem, keď ma niekto požiada, aby som niečo otvoril."

from: The man said "I always believed that total objectivity is possible."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som veril, že úplná objektivita je možná."

from: The man said "I wanted to look seductive for my date."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som vyzerať zvodne pre svoje rande."

from: The man said "I felt under pressure when we were expecting a baby because I wasn't sure we had enough money."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď sme čakali dieťa, cítil som sa pod tlakom, pretože som si nebol istý, či máme dosť peňazí."

from: The man said "I bought the new issue of Playboy."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som si nové číslo Playboya."

from: The man said "I don't like hard music, rather something soft."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemám rád tvrdú hudbu, radšej niečo jemné."

from: The man said "I bought new clothes, but first I had them washed."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som si nové šaty, ale najprv som ich dal vyprať."

from: The man said "I like to push my boundaries."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád posúvam svoje hranice."

from: The man said "When they asked to borrow my things, I didn't refuse."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď ma požiadali o požičanie mojich vecí, neodmietol som."

from: The man said "I did not wait for a second date to make a move."
to: Muž povedal: "Nečakal som na druhé rande, aby som urobil krok."

from: The man said "I'm free, so I don't follow any rules."
to: Muž povedal: "Som slobodný, takže nedodržiavam žiadne pravidlá."

from: The man said "I responded to a negative review by objectively evaluating the feedback."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Na negatívnu recenziu som reagoval objektívnym vyhodnotením spätnej väzby."

from: The man said "I was always the popular one in school."
to: Muž povedal: "V škole som bol vždy obľúbený."

from: The man said "An entire bus of weightlifters came to the restaurant."
to: Muž povedal: "Do reštaurácie prišiel celý autobus vzpieračov."

from: The man said "I could never protect myself if something bad happened."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy by som sa nedokázal ochrániť, keby sa stalo niečo zlé."

from: The man said "I spent a lot of money for skins in an online game."
to: Muž povedal: "Za skiny v online hre som utratil veľa peňazí."

from: The man said "I calculated the shortest route."
to: Muž povedal: "Vypočítal som najkratšiu cestu."

from: The man said "I feel happy when everybody feels happy."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Cítim sa šťastný, keď sa všetci cítia šťastní."

from: The man said "I gave the dog a bath."
to: Muž povedal: "Vykúpal som psa."

from: The man said "I was sure I would score high on that test."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bol som si istý, že v tom teste dosiahnem vysoké skóre."

from: The man said "I have always taken good care of my partner, I cooked and washed the clothes."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som sa o svoju partnerku dobre staral, varil som a pral som jej oblečenie."

from: The man said "I never thought of anyone being better than me."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som si nemyslel, že by bol niekto lepší ako ja."

from: The man said "I delivered my lines flawlessly as always."
to: Muž povedal: "Svoje repliky som predniesol bezchybne ako vždy."

from: The man said "I had to listen."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som počúvať."

from: The man said "I don't need others to tell me what to do, it's usually me who tells people what to do, because I am a leader."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nepotrebujem, aby mi iní hovorili, čo mám robiť, zvyčajne som to ja, kto hovorí ľuďom, čo majú robiť, pretože som vodca."

from: The man said "I got a free cab ride, because the driver liked me."
to: Muž povedal: "Dostal som taxík zadarmo, pretože som sa vodičovi páčil."

from: The man said "I was unsure if they liked my cookies."
to: Muž povedal: "Nebol som si istý, či im chutia moje koláčiky."

from: The man said "No matter what, I was always trying to be nice to people."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bez ohľadu na to, čo sa stalo, vždy som sa snažil byť k ľuďom milý."

from: The man said "They brought new decorative rocks to my garden, but I couldn't move them."
to: Muž povedal: "Do mojej záhrady priniesli nové ozdobné kamene, ale nemohol som ich premiestniť."

from: The man said "I made the rational decision."
to: Muž povedal: "Rozhodol som sa racionálne."

from: The man said "People often tell me I'm too chatty."
to: Muž povedal: "Ľudia mi často hovoria, že som príliš zhovorčivý."

from: The man said "Even though I had surgery, I couldn't keep my hands off my partner."
to: Muž povedal: "Aj keď som bol operovaný, nemohol som sa zbaviť svojej partnerky."

from: The man said "When the bulglar came, I knocked him out."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď prišiel lupič, omráčil som ho."

from: The man said "I had a lot of clients because I acted like a professional."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Mal som veľa klientov, pretože som sa správal ako profesionál."

from: The man said "I signed up to be a mentor."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Prihlásil som sa za mentora."

from: The man said "I couldn't rest until everything was done at home."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nemohol som si oddýchnuť, kým som doma všetko neurobil."

from: The man said "Look, I don't care it is not proven - I just felt better after taking it."
to: Muž povedal: "Pozri, je mi jedno, že to nie je dokázané - jednoducho som sa po užití cítil lepšie."

from: The man said "I felt disgusted when I saw her with greasy hair."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som ju videl s mastnými vlasmi, cítil som odpor."

from: The man said "I still lived at my parents house when I was 29."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Keď som mal 29 rokov, stále som býval v dome svojich rodičov."

from: The man said "I made my mom a memory book for her birthday."
to: Muž povedal: "Urobil som svojej mame k narodeninám knihu spomienok."

from: The man said "I decided to introduce new rules in the hospital."
to: Muž povedal: "Rozhodol som sa zaviesť v nemocnici nové pravidlá."

from: The man said "People tend to follow my lead, I have been a natural born leader since I was a kid."
to: Muž povedal: "Ľudia majú tendenciu nasledovať ma, od detstva som bol rodený vodca."

from: The man said "Why would I pay for an electrician if I can easily fix this myself?"
to: Muž povedal: "Prečo by som mal platiť za elektrikára, keď to môžem ľahko opraviť sám?"

from: The man said "I am the best boss they could wish form."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som ten najlepší šéf, akého si môžu priať."

from: The man said "I'd like to get back in the ring one day."
to: Muž povedal: "Jedného dňa by som sa chcel vrátiť do ringu."

from: The man said "I told you that I can climb this mountain."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedal som ti, že môžem vyliezť na túto horu."

from: The man said "I take pride in my ability to support my family financially."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som hrdý na to, že dokážem finančne podporovať svoju rodinu."

from: The man said "I don’t want my partner to work."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcem, aby moja partnerka pracovala."

from: The man said "I got a new business partner from a leading company."
to: Muž povedal: "Získal som nového obchodného partnera z jednej významnej spoločnosti."

from: The man said "Even though you didn't show it, I knew you were hurt."
to: Muž povedal: "Aj keď si to nedal najavo, vedel som, že si zranený."

from: The man said "The sweat dripped from my brow as I practiced my martial arts techniques."
to: Muž povedal: "Pot mi stekal z čela, keď som cvičil techniky bojových umení."

from: The man said "I wore the same pair of socks for every important exam, convinced that it would bring me good luck."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Na každú dôležitú skúšku som si obliekal ten istý pár ponožiek, pretože som bol presvedčený, že mi prinesú šťastie."

from: The man said "I never needed to warm up before lifting the weights."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nepotreboval pred zdvíhaním činiek rozcvičiť."

from: The man said "We went to the bathroom in the club and had sex there, I could not bear to wait until we got home."
to: Muž povedal: "Išli sme na toaletu v klube a tam sme mali sex, nemohol som vydržať čakať, kým prídeme domov."

from: The man said "Whenever I’m sad, I put on sad songs and it makes me feel even worse."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy, keď som smutný, pustím si smutné piesne a cítim sa ešte horšie."

from: The man said "I'm financially stable."
to: Muž povedal: "Som finančne stabilný."

from: The man said "The doctor told me that my ankes are too weak and I could have sprained them anytime."
to: Muž povedal: "Lekár mi povedal, že mám príliš slabé členky a mohol som si ich kedykoľvek vyvrtnúť."

from: The man said "You talked way too much with them."
to: Muž povedal: "Príliš veľa si s nimi hovoril."

from: The man said "I dreamed I got into a car crash, so I rather took the bus today."
to: Muž povedal: "Zdalo sa mi, že som mal autonehodu, tak som dnes radšej išiel autobusom."

from: The man said "I like casual sex, no strings attached."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád príležitostný sex, bez záväzkov."

from: The man said "I like to take care of my skin."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád sa starám o svoju pleť."

from: The man said "I could never go longer than a month without sex."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nevydržal bez sexu dlhšie ako mesiac."

from: The man said "I could never fight with someone physically."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy by som sa s niekým nedokázal fyzicky pobiť."

from: The man said "I went to a shooting club once but I was not strong enough to hold the rifle without trembling."
to: Muž povedal: "Raz som bol v streleckom klube, ale nebol som dosť silný na to, aby som držal pušku bez toho, aby som sa triasol."

from: The man said "I was thinking about what was going on in their heads, they were acting strange all day."
to: Muž povedal: "Premýšľal som o tom, čo sa im odohráva v hlavách, celý deň sa správali čudne."

from: The man said "I was happy to hear that the plastic surgeon said there's nothing to improve."
to: Muž povedal: "Potešilo ma, že plastický chirurg povedal, že nie je čo zlepšovať."

from: The man said "I ran for the mayor of the town."
to: Muž povedal: "Kandidoval som na starostu mesta."

from: The man said "I am ready to fight for what is mine."
to: Muž povedal: "Som pripravený bojovať za to, čo mi patrí."

from: The man said "I needed help with moving, so I called a moving company."
to: Muž povedal: "Potreboval som pomôcť so sťahovaním, tak som zavolal sťahovaciu spoločnosť."

from: The man said "I learned very early that good looks help me in life."
to: Muž povedal: "Veľmi skoro som sa naučil, že dobrý vzhľad mi v živote pomáha."

from: The man said "I wouldn't want to be in a relationship, I like this freedom I have."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcel by som byť vo vzťahu, mám rád túto slobodu, ktorú mám."

from: The man said "I survived a tiger attack."
to: Muž povedal: "Prežil som útok tigra."

from: The man said "When someone laughs, I get nervous because I immediately assume they're laughing at me."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď sa niekto smeje, som nervózny, pretože si hneď myslím, že sa smeje mne."

from: The man said "I could never go to the movies alone, it just does not feel right."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nemohol ísť do kina sám, jednoducho sa mi to nezdá."

from: The man said "You didn't have to work because I took care of the income."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemusel si pracovať, pretože som sa postaral o príjem."

from: The man said "I don't go in the shower unless I'm really dirty."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechodím do sprchy, pokiaľ nie som naozaj špinavý."

from: The man said "I'm always a winner in any race or competition."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som víťazom v akýchkoľvek pretekoch alebo súťaži."

from: The man said "I did not like the way I was treated, but I decided not to speak up and defend myself for the sake of peace."
to: Muž povedal: "Nepáčilo sa mi, ako sa ku mne správali, ale rozhodol som sa v záujme pokoja neprehovoriť a nebrániť sa."

from: The man said "I'm convinced that nobody can do better job than me."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som presvedčený, že nikto nedokáže urobiť lepšiu prácu ako ja."

from: The man said "I did not let emotions cloud my judgement."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nedovolil som, aby mi emócie zatemnili úsudok."

from: The man said "I could get any job because I have children."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Mohol by som dostať akúkoľvek prácu, pretože mám deti."

from: The man said "I made sure everyone could see my sixpack."
to: Muž povedal: "Uistil som sa, že každý vidí môj sixpack."

from: The man said "I preferred feelings over rational arguments."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Dal som prednosť pocitom pred racionálnymi argumentmi."

from: The man said "I knew I had to surround myself with educated people."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vedel som, že sa musím obklopiť vzdelanými ľuďmi."

from: The man said "I love hunting."
to: Muž povedal: "Milujem lov."

from: The man said "I like to buy from foreign e-shops, even though it is often more expensive."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád nakupujem v zahraničných e-shopoch, aj keď sú často drahšie."

from: The man said "I hired a maid."
to: Muž povedal: "Najal som si slúžku."

from: The man said "I could not resist buying that dress even though it was over my budget."
to: Muž povedal: "Neodolal som a kúpil som si tie šaty, aj keď boli nad môj rozpočet."

from: The man said "The delivery guy wasn't able to carry up the package, so I stopped to help him."
to: Muž povedal: "Doručovateľ nebol schopný vyniesť balík, tak som sa zastavil, aby som mu pomohol."

from: The man said "You are not capable of what I am capable of."
to: Muž povedal: "Nie si schopný toho, čoho som schopný ja."

from: The man said "If somebody did something bad to me, I would get back at them immediately."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Keby mi niekto urobil niečo zlé, okamžite by som mu to vrátil."

from: The man said "I like porn."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád porno."

from: The man said "The politician wasn't good-looking, so I didn't even listen."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ten politik nebol pekný, tak som ho ani nepočúval."

from: The man said "The cast iron pans were too heavy to work with, so I had to switch to stainless steel ones."
to: Muž povedal: "Liatinové panvice boli príliš ťažké na prácu, preto som musel prejsť na panvice z nehrdzavejúcej ocele."

from: The man said "I want to become a physicist."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcem sa stať fyzikom."

from: The man said "This is nothing - you should have seen what I lifted yesterday."
to: Muž povedal: "To nič nie je - mali ste vidieť, čo som včera zdvihol."

from: The man said "I wanted to be likable."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Chcel som byť sympatický."

from: The man said "I went to the networking event to meet new people."
to: Muž povedal: "Išiel som na networkingové podujatie, aby som spoznal nových ľudí."

from: The man said "I liked to be a teacher."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád by som bol učiteľom."

from: The man said "I had such a heavy bag that I almost didn't bring it home."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som takú ťažkú tašku, že som ju takmer nedoniesol domov."

from: The man said "I am happy when I lie down in a fragrant bed in the evening."
to: Muž povedal: "Som šťastný, keď si večer ľahnem do voňavej postele."

from: The man said "I felt I was not good enough so I did not go to that job interview after all although I have the necessary qualifications as well as experience."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som pocit, že nie som dosť dobrý, a tak som na ten pracovný pohovor napokon nešiel, hoci mám potrebnú kvalifikáciu aj skúsenosti."

from: The man said "I should not have argued with them."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemal som sa s nimi hádať."

from: The man said "I apologized excessively for even minor mistakes or perceived shortcomings, constantly seeking validation and avoiding conflict."
to: Muž povedal: "Nadmerne som sa ospravedlňoval aj za drobné chyby alebo domnelé nedostatky, neustále som hľadal potvrdenie a vyhýbal sa konfliktom."

from: The man said "I like team sports more than individual ones."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Mám radšej tímové športy ako individuálne."

from: The man said "I tried so hard and it was for nothing because my kids were always dirty."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Tak veľmi som sa snažil, ale bolo to zbytočné, pretože moje deti boli vždy špinavé."

from: The man said "I needed a new haircut, but when I called the hairdresser, they couldn't see me on Monday."
to: Muž povedal: "Potreboval som nový účes, ale keď som zavolal do kaderníctva, v pondelok ma nemohli prijať."

from: The man said "I am determined to win this fight."
to: Muž povedal: "Som odhodlaný vyhrať tento zápas."

from: The man said "I have a lot of porn saved in my computer."
to: Muž povedal: "V počítači mám uložených veľa pornografie."

from: The man said "Nothing can make me happier than knowing that my family is fed and cleaned."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nič ma nemôže urobiť šťastnejším, ako vedomie, že moja rodina je nakŕmená a uprataná."

from: The man said "It was a source of pride to see the results of our collective efforts, knowing that my leadership played a significant role in achieving those outcomes."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Bolo pre mňa hrdosťou vidieť výsledky nášho spoločného úsilia a vedieť, že moje vedenie zohralo významnú úlohu pri dosahovaní týchto výsledkov."

from: The man said "I avoided cracks on the sidewalk to avoid bad luck."
to: Muž povedal: "Vyhýbal som sa prasklinám na chodníku, aby som nemal smolu."

from: The man said "I threw a tantrum when my partner told me that we should not buy the new car."
to: Muž povedal: "Dostal som záchvat hnevu, keď mi partnerka povedala, že by sme nemali kupovať nové auto."

from: The man said "Could you cook something?"
to: Muž povedal: "Mohol by si niečo uvariť?"

from: The man said "I've had my clothes tailored."
to: Muž povedal: "Dal som si ušiť šaty na mieru."

from: The man said "I've never been to a club because I'm embarrassed to dance in front of others."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nebol v klube, pretože sa hanbím tancovať pred ostatnými."

from: The man said "Are you sure you are strong enough?"
to: Muž sa opýtal: "Si si istý, že si dosť silný?"

from: The man said "I could not wait to see all my old friends again."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nemohol som sa dočkať, až opäť uvidím všetkých svojich starých priateľov."

from: The man said "Let me lift that for you; I wouldn't be happy if something happened to you."
to: Muž povedal: "Dovoľte, aby som vám to zdvihol, nebol by som rád, keby sa vám niečo stalo."

from: The man said "I felt randomly aroused when I saw a sexy body."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som videl sexy telo, cítil som sa náhodne vzrušený."

from: The man said "I was looking for events that I could attend."
to: Muž povedal: "Hľadal som podujatia, na ktorých by som sa mohol zúčastniť."

from: The man said "Why didn't you stop acting so childish?"
to: Muž povedal: "Prečo si sa neprestal správať tak detinsky?"

from: The man said "I was CEO of a big company when I was just twenty years old."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bol som generálnym riaditeľom veľkej spoločnosti, keď som mal len dvadsať rokov."

from: The man said "I would never eat soup with a hair in it."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nejedol polievku s vlasom."

from: The man said "I wasn't afraid to ask for more money, because my services are worth it."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nebál som sa požiadať o viac peňazí, pretože moje služby za to stoja."

from: The man said "I soared through the air on my bike, reveling in the exhilarating rush of speed and the knowledge that my physical strength allowed me to conquer any terrain."
to: Muž povedal: "Vznášal som sa vo vzduchu na bicykli, vychutnával som si vzrušujúci nával rýchlosti a vedomie, že moja fyzická sila mi umožňuje zdolať akýkoľvek terén."

from: The man said "If I had to say one thing I wouldn’t go anywhere without, it would be rings."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ak by som mal povedať jednu vec, bez ktorej by som nikam nešiel, boli by to prstene."

from: The man said "I had to fix my hair first."
to: Muž povedal: "Najprv som si musel upraviť vlasy."

from: The man said "I like making decisions based on hard data, not subjective feelings."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Rád sa rozhodujem na základe tvrdých údajov, nie subjektívnych pocitov."

from: The man said "I started a mentorship academy for young people."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Založil som mentorskú akadémiu pre mladých ľudí."

from: The man said "I like to cook vegan meals."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád varím vegánske jedlá."

from: The man said "Last month I signed a lucrative contract at work, so we will finally be able to afford the new house."
to: Muž povedal: "Minulý mesiac som v práci podpísal lukratívnu zmluvu, takže si konečne budeme môcť dovoliť nový dom."

from: The man said "I was very confident when I was applying for that job and of course, I got it."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Keď som sa uchádzal o túto prácu, bol som veľmi sebavedomý a samozrejme som ju dostal."

from: The man said "I like to have responsibility for large projects."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Rád mám zodpovednosť za veľké projekty."

from: The man said "The doctor told me I'd be healthier and stronger if I ate more."
to: Muž povedal: "Lekár mi povedal, že budem zdravší a silnejší, ak budem viac jesť."

from: The man said "I fried the meat, because that's how my partner likes it."
to: Muž povedal: "Mäso som vyprážal, pretože tak to má moja partnerka rada."

from: The man said "I've always got what I set out to get."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som dostal to, čo som si zaumienil."

from: The man said "I offered to carry their suitcases."
to: Muž povedal: "Ponúkol som sa, že im ponesiem kufre."

from: The man said "I've always preferred to work physically."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som radšej pracoval fyzicky."

from: The man said "I consulted a fact-checker."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Konzultoval som to s overovateľom faktov."

from: The man said "Even though I bought a dishwasher, I always take the dishes out and rinse them with water."
to: Muž povedal: "Aj keď som si kúpil umývačku riadu, vždy vyťahujem riad a oplachujem ho vodou."

from: The man said "I often conformed to others to please everyone."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Často som sa prispôsoboval iným, aby som sa všetkým zapáčil."

from: The man said "I strived to create additional income for our family's needs and expenses."
to: Muž povedal: "Snažil som sa vytvoriť dodatočný príjem pre potreby a výdavky našej rodiny."

from: The man said "I organized a neighborhood barbecue."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Usporiadal som susedskú grilovačku."

from: The man said "I invited everyone to come over for dinner."
to: Muž povedal: "Pozval som všetkých na večeru."

from: The man said "I wanted to tell you the story with all the details and you wouldn't listen."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som ti povedať príbeh so všetkými podrobnosťami, ale ty si ma nepočúval."

from: The man said "Maybe if I prayed more, it would be better."
to: Muž povedal: "Možno keby som sa viac modlil, bolo by to lepšie."

from: The man said "I may spend less time with my family than I'd like, but at least we have enough money."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Možno trávim s rodinou menej času, ako by som chcel, ale aspoň máme dosť peňazí."

from: The man said "Tell me when I'll be talking too much, I'm way too talkative."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedzte mi, kedy budem príliš veľa hovoriť, som príliš zhovorčivý."

from: The man said "I had such a terrible muscle pain after just lifting the chairs."
to: Muž povedal: "Už len po zdvihnutí stoličiek som mal strašnú bolesť svalov."

from: The man said "I had to think about every aspect of such an investment."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som premyslieť každý aspekt takejto investície."

from: The man said "I made sure that everyone in the family had everything their needed materially."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Postaral som sa o to, aby všetci v rodine mali všetko, čo materiálne potrebujú."

from: The man said "They liked me because I had the ability to take care of others."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Obľúbili si ma, pretože som sa vedel postarať o iných."

from: The man said "I only wanted to hook up."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som sa len spojiť."

from: The man said "With each stroke of the paddle, I propelled the kayak through the rushing rapids."
to: Muž povedal: "Každým záberom pádla som poháňal kajak cez prudké pereje."

from: The man said "I made a deal with a well-known designer to come up with an outfit for the gala."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Dohodol som sa so známym návrhárom, aby mi vymyslel oblečenie na slávnostný večer."

from: The man said "They asked me if I could help them, and I couldn’t say no."
to: Muž povedal: "Spýtali sa ma, či im môžem pomôcť, a ja som nemohol povedať nie."

from: The man said "When I set my mind to something, I always stick with it."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Keď si niečo zaumienim, vždy sa toho držím."

from: The man said "I rolled the giant concrete ball out of the way."
to: Muž povedal: "Odvalil som obrovskú betónovú guľu z cesty."

from: The man said "I used to hit the gym three times a week because it was very important to me to be in shape."
to: Muž povedal: "Chodieval som do posilňovne trikrát týždenne, pretože mi veľmi záležalo na tom, aby som bol vo forme."

from: The man said "I can't imagine eating off a stranger's plate."
to: Muž povedal: "Neviem si predstaviť, že by som jedol z cudzích tanierov."

from: The man said "Whenever the kids had a rough day, I baked them their favourite dessert."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď mali deti ťažký deň, upiekol som im ich obľúbený dezert."

from: The man said "I got a job as a trainer at a gym."
to: Muž povedal: "Dostal som prácu ako tréner v posilňovni."

from: The man said "What should I do, so you finally be quiet?"
to: Muž sa opýtal: "Čo mám robiť, aby ste konečne boli ticho?"

from: The man said "I overreacted."
to: Muž povedal: "Prehnal som to."

from: The man said "When my neighbor’s house was on fire, I immediately ran to her apartment."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď začal horieť dom mojej susedky, okamžite som bežal do jej bytu."

from: The man said "Making you happy is making me happy."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď vás urobím šťastným, urobím šťastným aj seba."

from: The man said "I couldn't control my jealousy and ended up accusing my partner of things they didn't do."
to: Muž povedal: "Nedokázal som kontrolovať svoju žiarlivosť a nakoniec som obvinil svojho partnera z vecí, ktoré neurobil."

from: The man said "I try to show that I am empathetic so that people are not afraid to talk to me about their problems."
to: Muž povedal: "Snažím sa ukázať, že som empatický, aby sa ľudia nebáli hovoriť so mnou o svojich problémoch."

from: The man said "I did not care that the swimming pool was for children only."
to: Muž povedal: "Nezaujímalo ma, že bazén je len pre deti."

from: The man said "I could not decide based just on my gut feeling."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nemohol som sa rozhodnúť len na základe svojho pocitu."

from: The man said "I relished the challenge of riding the untamed power of the ocean."
to: Muž povedal: "Vychutnával som si výzvu jazdiť na neskrotnej sile oceánu."

from: The man said "I was ready to showcase my explosive power and speed."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som pripravený predviesť svoju výbušnú silu a rýchlosť."

from: The man said "My boss works out every other day."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj šéf cvičí každý druhý deň."

from: The man said "Friends often refer to me as a great cook."
to: Muž povedal: "Priatelia o mne často hovoria, že som skvelý kuchár."

from: The man said "I worked hard for the betterment of our family's financial situation."
to: Muž povedal: "Tvrdo som pracoval, aby sa zlepšila finančná situácia našej rodiny."

from: The man said "I've been looking forward to summer all year because I can finally play with water guns."
to: Muž povedal: "Celý rok sa teším na leto, pretože sa konečne môžem hrať s vodnými pištoľami."

from: The man said "I washed the dishes."
to: Muž povedal: "Umyl som riad."

from: The man said "I felt stressed so I went shopping."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítil som sa vystresovaný, tak som išiel nakupovať."

from: The man said "They want me to show emotion, but I’ve never done that before."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcú, aby som prejavil emócie, ale to som ešte nikdy neurobil."

from: The man said "I never trusted in monogamy."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som neveril v monogamiu."

from: The man said "I signed up for a ballet class to increase my core strenght and balance."
to: Muž povedal: "Zapísal som sa na hodiny baletu, aby som si zvýšil silu jadra a rovnováhu."

from: The man said "I was too scared to say what I'm thinking, so I stay quiet."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som príliš vystrašený, aby som povedal, čo si myslím, a tak som mlčal."

from: The man said "I could easily jump with a parachute."
to: Muž povedal: "Mohol by som ľahko skočiť s padákom."

from: The man said "I was so happy I was blinded by joy."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bol som taký šťastný, že som bol oslepený radosťou."

from: The man said "I would never lend my clothes to someone because it's unhygienic."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy by som svoje oblečenie nikomu nepožičal, pretože je to nehygienické."

from: The man said "I needed a lot of sex to feel satisfied in the relationship."

to: Muž povedal: "Rozdával som vianočné prémie v spoločnosti."

from: The man said "As the leader, I took charge of the team, guiding them towards success with my strategic vision and decision-making skills."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Ako vedúci som prevzal zodpovednosť za tím a viedol som ho k úspechu svojou strategickou víziou a rozhodovacími schopnosťami."

from: The man said "There was always something to do at home so I did it."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Doma bolo vždy čo robiť, tak som to robil."

from: The man said "I like to take long baths with essential oils and salt."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád si dávam dlhé kúpele s esenciálnymi olejmi a soľou."

from: The man said "As a leader, I'm expected to be in charge of difficult decisions."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Odo mňa ako od vedúceho sa očakáva, že budem mať na starosti ťažké rozhodnutia."

from: The man said "I always did it as well as possible."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som to robil najlepšie, ako sa dalo."

from: The man said "I've decided to sort my wardrobe twice a year and give things to charity."
to: Muž povedal: "Rozhodol som sa, že budem dvakrát ročne triediť svoj šatník a dávať veci na charitu."

from: The man said "I took a course in critical thinking."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Absolvoval som kurz kritického myslenia."

from: The man said "I got a henna tattoo while on vacation."
to: Muž povedal: "Na dovolenke som si nechal urobiť tetovanie henou."

from: The man said "I loved my body."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Miloval som svoje telo."

from: The man said "I miss company - I wish I had a friend here."
to: Muž povedal: "Chýba mi spoločnosť - chcel by som tu mať priateľa."

from: The man said "I have always been admired by my friends and family for my looks."
to: Muž povedal: "Priatelia a rodina ma vždy obdivovali pre môj vzhľad."

from: The man said "I made the cake, but didn't eat it to stay slim."
to: Muž povedal: "Urobil som koláč, ale nezjedol som ho, aby som zostal štíhly."

from: The man said "I have had so many relationships that I could write a book about it."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Mal som toľko vzťahov, že by som o tom mohol napísať knihu."

from: The man said "I engaged in open and non-judgmental conversations with individuals who held different opinions or beliefs."
to: Muž povedal: "Zapojil som sa do otvorených a neodsudzujúcich rozhovorov s osobami, ktoré mali odlišné názory alebo presvedčenie."

from: The man said "I kept my clothes and linens clean and organized"
to: Muž povedal: "Udržiaval som svoje oblečenie a bielizeň čisté a usporiadané."

from: The man said "I never worry about what others think."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy sa nestarám o to, čo si myslia ostatní."

from: The man said "I'm directive at work, and caring at home."
to: Muž povedal: "V práci som direktívny a doma starostlivý."

from: The man said "I tried to act confident in order to motivate my team."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Snažil som sa pôsobiť sebavedomo, aby som motivoval svoj tím."

from: The man said "I was happy when everything was perfectly cleaned."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som šťastný, keď bolo všetko dokonale vyčistené."

from: The man said "I don't wait for new opportunities, I create them myself."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nečakám na nové príležitosti, sám si ich vytváram."

from: The man said "I couldn't show them my real emotions, it'd be a sign of weakness."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemôžem im ukázať svoje skutočné emócie, bol by to prejav slabosti."

from: The man said "I effortlessly lifted the weight above my head."
to: Muž povedal: "Bez námahy som zdvihol závažie nad hlavu."

from: The man said "I’m simply the best."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som jednoducho najlepší."

from: The man said "I was never satisfied with how I look."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nebol spokojný s tým, ako vyzerám."

from: The man said "I've started rewarding people for their extra work."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Začal som odmeňovať ľudí za ich prácu navyše."

from: The man said "I like to wear gold accessories, silver is not for me."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád nosím zlaté doplnky, strieborné nie sú pre mňa."

from: The man said "I enjoyed the confidence boost that came from receiving compliments about my good looks."
to: Muž povedal: "Tešil som sa z toho, že som dostal pochvalu za svoj dobrý vzhľad."

from: The man said "I like it when I see that I have helped someone."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád, keď vidím, že som niekomu pomohol."

from: The man said "I finally saved the company."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Konečne som zachránil spoločnosť."

from: The man said "I like people, so I think I would be a great interpreter."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád ľudí, takže si myslím, že by som bol skvelý tlmočník."

from: The man said "I would never leave home without making sure that I look presentable."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nevyšiel z domu bez toho, aby som sa uistil, že vyzerám reprezentatívne."

from: The man said "I am so obsessed with hygiene that I even wash chicken eggs."
to: Muž povedal: "Som tak posadnutý hygienou, že umývam aj slepačie vajcia."

from: The man said "I loved sports when I was younger."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som bol mladší, miloval som šport."

from: The man said "I brought a lot of investment into the company."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Do spoločnosti som priniesol veľa investícií."

from: The man said "I invited my partner to the cinema."
to: Muž povedal: "Pozval som svoju partnerku do kina."

from: The man said "I never stressed much."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa veľmi nestresoval."

from: The man said "I would never allow anyone else to drive my car, I think nobody would be better driven than I am."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nedovolil nikomu inému, aby riadil moje auto, myslím, že nikto by ho neovládal lepšie ako ja."

from: The man said "I like to clean the house when nobody's home."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád upratujem dom, keď nikto nie je doma."

from: The man said "I ordered the meal today."
to: Muž povedal: "Dnes som si objednal jedlo."

from: The man said "It would be great if I could be a kid forever."
to: Muž povedal: "Bolo by skvelé, keby som mohol byť dieťaťom navždy."

from: The man said "I am happiest when surrounded by people."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som najšťastnejší, keď som obklopený ľuďmi."

from: The man said "I always did my homework on time."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som si robil domáce úlohy načas."

from: The man said "Since I started to play football, I have stronger legs."
to: Muž povedal: "Odkedy som začal hrať futbal, mám silnejšie nohy."

from: The man said "Don't worry about my credentials, I am a professional."
to: Muž povedal: "Nebojte sa o moje referencie, som profesionál."

from: The man said "When I saw a woman being beaten in the street, I immediately ran there."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som videl, že na ulici bijú ženu, okamžite som tam bežal."

from: The man said "I was a natural talent, I instantly became the best skater in my class after putting on the skates for the first time."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som prirodzený talent, keď som si prvýkrát obul korčule, okamžite som sa stal najlepším korčuliarom v triede."

from: The man said "My skin was soft and fair, my lips were full and hair thick, I knew I looked good."
to: Muž povedal: "Moja pleť bola jemná a svetlá, pery plné a vlasy husté, vedel som, že vyzerám dobre."

from: The man said "I decided to work at the shelter this summer."
to: Muž povedal: "Rozhodol som sa, že toto leto budem pracovať v útulku."

from: The man said "I did not feel any stage fright when I was supposed to perform."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som mal vystúpiť, nemal som žiadnu trému."

from: The man said "I actively sought out promotions and salary negotiations at work to support our family's financial goals."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Aktívne som sa snažil o povýšenie a vyjednávanie o plate v práci, aby som podporil finančné ciele našej rodiny."

from: The man said "I made the logical choice."
to: Muž povedal: "Rozhodol som sa logicky."

from: The man said "I looked in the mirror and couldn't help but admire myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Pozrel som sa do zrkadla a nemohol som si pomôcť, ale obdivoval som sa."

from: The man said "I couldn't handle my feelings."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nedokázal som zvládnuť svoje pocity."

from: The man said "I always wanted to be a scientist."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som chcel byť vedcom."

from: The man said "If I wanted to, I could choose who I dated."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Keby som chcel, mohol by som si vybrať, s kým budem chodiť."

from: The man said "I knocked on wood to counteract a negative statement."
to: Muž povedal: "Zaklopal som na drevo, aby som sa postavil proti negatívnemu výroku."

from: The man said "I changed the flat tyre on my own."
to: Muž povedal: "Pneumatiku som si vymenil sám."

from: The man said "I was always focused on my dream."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som sa sústredil na svoj sen."

from: The man said "My stomach could not handle that and I just threw up."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj žalúdok to nezvládol a jednoducho som sa pozvracal."

from: The man said "I would like the people around me to know that they can always count on me."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Chcel by som, aby ľudia okolo mňa vedeli, že sa na mňa môžu vždy spoľahnúť."

from: The man said "I was always good at reading other people's emotions."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som vedel dobre čítať emócie iných ľudí."

from: The man said "I could make sense of it, because the showed me a diagram."
to: Muž povedal: "Mohol som to pochopiť, pretože mi ukázali diagram."

from: The man said "What if I told you that I am always right?"
to: Muž povedal: "Čo keby som ti povedal, že mám vždy pravdu?"

from: The man said "I chose to stay with my friend instead of going home alone."
to: Muž povedal: "Rozhodol som sa zostať so svojím priateľom, namiesto toho, aby som išiel domov sám."

from: The man said "I struggled to lift the heavy furniture while moving."
to: Muž povedal: "Pri sťahovaní som sa snažil zdvihnúť ťažký nábytok."

from: The man said "I am aware of my exceptional leadership skills that inspire others."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som si vedomý svojich výnimočných vodcovských schopností, ktoré inšpirujú ostatných."

from: The man said "I understood being in love and making short-sighted decisions."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Chápal som, že som zamilovaný a robím krátkozraké rozhodnutia."

from: The man said "I did not want to be in a commited relationship in my thirties, I wanted to party and live a carefree life."
to: Muž povedal: "Po tridsiatke som nechcel mať záväzný vzťah, chcel som sa zabávať a žiť bezstarostný život."

from: The man said "I like hunting."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád lov."

from: The man said "I always wanted to take care of others."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som sa chcel starať o iných."

from: The man said "I told them that no amount of wishful thinking equals proper preparations."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Povedal som im, že žiadne želanie sa nevyrovná riadnym prípravám."

from: The man said "I loved sports even as a child, I was always best at playing anything."
to: Muž povedal: "Už ako dieťa som miloval šport, vždy som bol najlepší v akejkoľvek hre."

from: The man said "I washed it again, because I partner didn't do a good job."
to: Muž povedal: "Umyl som ho znova, pretože som partnerovi neurobil dobrú prácu."

from: The man said "I always had a little hand disinfectant with me even before the pandemic."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som mal pri sebe trochu dezinfekcie na ruky, dokonca aj pred pandémiou."

from: The man said "I'm happy to tackle whatever fate has in store for me."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád sa vysporiadam so všetkým, čo mi osud pripraví."

from: The man said "I like going to the gym."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád chodím do posilňovne."

from: The man said "I wasn't scared of failure."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nemal som strach zo zlyhania."

from: The man said "At work, I regularly stepped up to lead team meetings."
to: Muž povedal: "V práci som pravidelne vystupoval ako vedúci tímových stretnutí."

from: The man said "I was sure I could do it."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som si istý, že to zvládnem."

from: The man said "I ate the soup even though they warned me it might give me food poisoning."
to: Muž povedal: "Zjedol som polievku, aj keď ma varovali, že sa z nej môžem otráviť."

from: The man said "In elementary school I competed in several disciplines."
to: Muž povedal: "Na základnej škole som súťažil vo viacerých disciplínach."

from: The man said "With each crashing wave, I navigated the treacherous seas, steering us towards safety."
to: Muž povedal: "S každou vlnou som sa pohyboval po zradnom mori a navigoval nás smerom k bezpečiu."

from: The man said "I had to explain to them that I won’t tolerate any back talk."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Musel som im vysvetliť, že nebudem tolerovať žiadne reči do chrbta."

from: The man said "I was looking for something entirely different, but this thing won my heart."
to: Muž povedal: "Hľadal som niečo úplne iné, ale táto vec si získala moje srdce."

from: The man said "I could afford to refuse the job, because I was sure other offers would quickly appear."
to: Muž povedal: "Mohol som si dovoliť odmietnuť túto prácu, pretože som si bol istý, že sa rýchlo objavia iné ponuky."

from: The man said "I played sports for twenty years to get to where I am today."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Športoval som dvadsať rokov, aby som sa dostal tam, kde som dnes."

from: The man said "I didn't body-shame you, I was just commenting on the fact."
to: Muž povedal: "Nehanbil som ťa, len som to komentoval."

from: The man said "I am very active in my neighbourhood community."
to: Muž povedal: "Som veľmi aktívny v komunite v mojom susedstve."

from: The man said "I started swimming twice a week and it shows, not only physically but mentally as well."
to: Muž povedal: "Začal som plávať dvakrát týždenne a je to vidieť nielen po fyzickej, ale aj po psychickej stránke."

from: The man said "I guess these endurance sports were never really for weaklings like me."
to: Muž povedal: "Myslím, že tieto vytrvalostné športy nikdy neboli pre takých slabochov, ako som ja."

from: The man said "The situation was rather sketchy but I never even flinched."
to: Muž povedal: "Situácia bola dosť nejasná, ale ani som sa nepohol."

from: The man said "I ensured a strong financial foundation for my family's long-term goals."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Zabezpečil som silný finančný základ pre dlhodobé ciele mojej rodiny."

from: The man said "My father used to be my main authority and now I am totally lost."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj otec bol mojou hlavnou autoritou a teraz som úplne stratený."

from: The man said "I didn't mind my health as long as I could keep that position."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nevadilo mi moje zdravie, pokiaľ som si mohol udržať túto pozíciu."

from: The man said "I didn't like being led on and I wanted to get physical."
to: Muž povedal: "Nepáčilo sa mi, že ma viedli, a chcel som si to vyskúšať fyzicky."

from: The man said "You knew almost everybody in that club!"
to: Ten muž povedal: "V tom klube ste poznali takmer každého!"

from: The man said "There was nothing in this world I couldn't do when I could walk."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Na tomto svete nebolo nič, čo by som nemohol urobiť, keď som mohol chodiť."

from: The man said "I applied for a job as a cleaner."
to: Muž povedal: "Uchádzal som sa o prácu upratovača."

from: The man said "Breaking through concrete and bricks, I embraced the rough physicality of the demolition job"
to: Muž povedal: "Prebíjal som sa betónom a tehlami, prijal som drsnú fyzickú prácu pri demolácii."

from: The man said "I was happy to make lunch for my colleagues."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád som pripravil obed pre svojich kolegov."

from: The man said "I couldn't get the stain out of that shirt and I tried everything I could."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som tú škvrnu z tej košele dostať a skúšal som všetko, čo sa dalo."

from: The man said "I don't want to have a dishwasher, I like to wash dishes by myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcem mať umývačku riadu, rád si umývam riad sám."

from: The man said "I always thought it is okay to have sex before marriage."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som si myslel, že je v poriadku mať sex pred manželstvom."

from: The man said "I navigated the labyrinth, undeterred by the lurking dangers."
to: Muž povedal: "Preplával som labyrintom, nezľakol som sa číhajúcich nebezpečenstiev."

from: The man said "I coordinated the rescue effort."
to: Muž povedal: "Koordinoval som záchranné práce."

from: The man said "I am organised and efficient in my work."
to: Muž povedal: "Som organizovaný a výkonný vo svojej práci."

from: The man said "I always wanted to be an engineer but I felt that my kids would need me so I became a cleaner."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som chcel byť inžinierom, ale cítil som, že moje deti ma budú potrebovať, tak som sa stal upratovačom."

from: The man said "I don't like when clothes get stained in the washing machine."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemám rád, keď sa oblečenie v práčke zašpiní."

from: The man said "I packed a light suitcase to be able to carry it."
to: Muž povedal: "Zbalil som si ľahký kufor, aby som ho mohol niesť."

from: The man said "I like expensive clothes because they don’t get ruined so quickly."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád drahé oblečenie, pretože sa tak rýchlo nezničí."

from: The man said "I am a stand-up comedian."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som komik."

from: The man said "I like beauty products."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád kozmetické výrobky."

from: The man said "Being alone doesn't suit me, the last time I was alone I got depressed."
to: Muž povedal: "Byť sám mi nevyhovuje, naposledy, keď som bol sám, som dostal depresiu."

from: The man said "I drank an extraordinary amount of alcohol and still looked quite okay."
to: Muž povedal: "Vypil som mimoriadne veľa alkoholu a stále som vyzeral celkom dobre."

from: The man said "I am grateful that I have children to take care of."
to: Muž povedal: "Som vďačný, že mám deti, o ktoré sa musím starať."

from: The man said "I could never just ignore someone else's suffering."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nemohol ignorovať utrpenie niekoho iného."

from: The man said "I dug it out with no difficulties."
to: Muž povedal: "Vykopal som ho bez problémov."

from: The man said "I used my earnings to contribute to our family's savings."
to: Muž povedal: "Svojím zárobkom som prispieval na rodinné úspory."

from: The man said "I baked a batch of cookies for the Christmas party."
to: Muž povedal: "Upiekol som várku koláčikov na vianočný večierok."

from: The man said "I endured the worst nightmares without ever asking for help."
to: Muž povedal: "Prežil som najhoršie nočné mory bez toho, aby som požiadal o pomoc."

from: The man said "I was so overwhelmed with emotions that I could not make the right decision."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som taký zaplavený emóciami, že som sa nedokázal správne rozhodnúť."

from: The man said "I had to call a friend to help me because I was too weak to carry the wardrobe."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som zavolať priateľa, aby mi pomohol, pretože som bol príliš slabý, aby som uniesol skriňu."

from: The man said "I enjoy doing bad things to people if it makes me laugh."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Rád robím ľuďom zlé veci, ak ma to rozosmeje."

from: The man said "I cried because of what I was told."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Plakal som kvôli tomu, čo mi povedali."

from: The man said "When there was covid, I was very afraid of quarantine, I didn't want to be alone."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď bol covid, veľmi som sa bál karantény, nechcel som byť sám."

from: The man said "I stood my ground, fueled by the fire within."
to: Muž povedal: "Stál som si za svojím, poháňaný vnútorným ohňom."

from: The man said "I came up with swimming accross the river in the middle of a storm."
to: Muž povedal: "Prišiel som s tým, že som uprostred búrky preplával rieku."

from: The man said "You shouldn't be playing hockey, it's a really dangerous sport."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemal by si hrať hokej, je to veľmi nebezpečný šport."

from: The man said "My strong sexual desires sometimes led to impulsive decision-making."
to: Muž povedal: "Moje silné sexuálne túžby niekedy viedli k impulzívnemu rozhodovaniu."

from: The man said "I would rather live at a dorm with other students than alone in a flat."
to: Muž povedal: "Radšej budem bývať na internáte s ostatnými študentmi ako sám v byte."

from: The man said "My stomach hurt when I imagined someone would be angry with me."
to: Muž povedal: "Bolel ma žalúdok, keď som si predstavil, že sa na mňa niekto bude hnevať."

from: The man said "I volunteered at a local community center, engaging with individuals of different ages."
to: Muž povedal: "Pracoval som ako dobrovoľník v miestnom komunitnom centre, kde som sa venoval ľuďom rôzneho veku."

from: The man said "People keep telling me that I'm a child in an adult body and I'm happy for that."
to: Muž povedal: "Ľudia mi stále hovoria, že som dieťa v dospelom tele, a ja som za to rád."

from: The man said "Deep inside I knew that spending so much money on a bag was stupid."
to: Muž povedal: "V hĺbke duše som vedel, že míňať toľko peňazí za tašku je hlúposť."

from: The man said "I wish I knew how they feel!"
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel by som vedieť, ako sa cítia!"

from: The man said "I told them a joke but I guess it went too far."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedal som im vtip, ale asi to zašlo priďaleko."

from: The man said "Even though he was rude, I was friendly, as always."
to: Muž povedal: "Aj keď bol hrubý, bol som priateľský, ako vždy."

from: The man said "I accidentally got into the fight but I could defend myself pretty well."
to: Muž povedal: "Do bitky som sa dostal náhodou, ale vedel som sa celkom dobre brániť."

from: The man said "I never showed my emotions, I prefer to solve my problems by thinking rationally."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nedával najavo svoje emócie, radšej riešim svoje problémy racionálnym uvažovaním."

from: The man said "I just wanted to have fun."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som sa len zabaviť."

from: The man said "I realise I’m tough sometimes, but discipline is what got me to this position."
to: Muž povedal: "Uvedomujem si, že som niekedy tvrdý, ale disciplína ma dostala na túto pozíciu."

from: The man said "I followed the latest fashion trends."
to: Muž povedal: "Sledoval som najnovšie módne trendy."

from: The man said "I ensured that my perspective was based on rational and credible sources."
to: Ten povedal: "Uistil som sa, že môj pohľad vychádza z racionálnych a dôveryhodných zdrojov."

from: The man said "I offered assistance to an old lady struggling with heavy bags."
to: Muž povedal: "Ponúkol som pomoc jednej starej pani, ktorá zápasila s ťažkými taškami."

from: The man said "I was in an open relationship because I liked switching up my sexual partners."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som otvorený vzťah, pretože som rád menil sexuálne partnerky."

from: The man said "I had to ask for help with opening the water bottle."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som požiadať o pomoc pri otváraní fľaše s vodou."

from: The man said "As a personal trainer, I designed individualized fitness programs, provided guidance on proper exercise techniques, and motivated clients to achieve their health and fitness goals."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Ako osobný tréner som navrhoval individuálne fitnes programy, poskytoval poradenstvo v oblasti správnych cvičebných techník a motivoval klientov k dosiahnutiu ich zdravotných a fitnes cieľov."

from: The man said "I carefully read the instructions before assembling the furniture."
to: Muž povedal: "Pred montážou nábytku som si pozorne prečítal návod."

from: The man said "I'm not sure if you are right for that position because it contains a lot of stress and pressure."
to: Muž povedal: "Nie som si istý, či sa na túto pozíciu hodíte, pretože je v nej veľa stresu a tlaku."

from: The man said "When I felt that I need some psycho-hygiene I cleaned our apartment."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som cítil, že potrebujem psychohygienu, upratal som náš byt."

from: The man said "I knew my appearances were important for my work."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vedel som, že moje vystupovanie je pre moju prácu dôležité."

from: The man said "I always wanted to move somewhere far to live completely off-grid."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som sa chcel presťahovať niekam ďaleko a žiť úplne mimo siete."

from: The man said "I dreamt about sleeping with them tonight."
to: Muž povedal: "Dnes sa mi snívalo, že s nimi spím."

from: The man said "I went to the workshop in order to perfect my skills."
to: Muž povedal: "Išiel som do dielne, aby som sa zdokonalil vo svojich zručnostiach."

from: The man said "I did not stop until everything was squeaky clean and prepared for their arrival."
to: Muž povedal: "Nezastavil som sa, kým nebolo všetko čisté a pripravené na ich príchod."

from: The man said "I'd buy the kids toys, but I'd be the one playing with them."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil by som deťom hračky, ale ja by som sa s nimi hral."

from: The man said "I found my passion in expressing my emotions through art."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Svoju vášeň som našiel vo vyjadrovaní svojich emócií prostredníctvom umenia."

from: The man said "I was not judgmental, I simply listened."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nesúdil som, len som počúval."

from: The man said "I participated in a community event to raise awareness and support for a cause that affected others."
to: Muž povedal: "Zúčastnil som sa na komunitnom podujatí, aby som zvýšil povedomie a podporil vec, ktorá sa týka iných."

from: The man said "I don’t like to beat around the bush."
to: Muž povedal: "Nerád chodím okolo horúcej kaše."

from: The man said "They were telling me that I couldn't do it, so I did it to prove them wrong."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Hovorili mi, že to nedokážem, tak som to urobil, aby som im dokázal, že sa mýlia."

from: The man said "I saw her alone, so I started to talk to her, so she won't feel left behind."
to: Muž povedal: "Videl som ju samú, tak som sa s ňou začal rozprávať, aby sa necítila opustená."

from: The man said "I bought tickets to South America, because I decided to spend a month alone in the jungle."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som si letenky do Južnej Ameriky, pretože som sa rozhodol stráviť mesiac sám v džungli."

from: The man said "I complied with unreasonable demands or requests from others."
to: Muž povedal: "Vyhovel som neprimeraným požiadavkám alebo žiadostiam iných."

from: The man said "I carried my partner over the mud puddles."
to: Muž povedal: "Svoju partnerku som niesol cez kaluže blata."

from: The man said "I had a big collection of knives."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som veľkú zbierku nožov."

from: The man said "I'd like to try something crazy in bed."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel by som vyskúšať niečo bláznivé v posteli."

from: The man said "I didn't care about the rules."
to: Muž povedal: "Pravidlá ma nezaujímali."

from: The man said "I traveled a lot so I know which tickets you need to buy."
to: Muž povedal: "Veľa som cestoval, takže viem, ktoré lístky si musíte kúpiť."

from: The man said "The guy offended my partner, so I hit him."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ten chlap urazil moju partnerku, tak som ho udrel."

from: The man said "When I'm feeling down I like to go out with my friends."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď sa cítim zle, rád si vyjdem von s priateľmi."

from: The man said "I had to win no matter what."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Musel som vyhrať bez ohľadu na to, čo sa stalo."

from: The man said "I never left work without my task being finished."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som neodišiel z práce bez toho, aby som dokončil svoju úlohu."

from: The man said "I’m looking for a good job so I can give my family what they deserve."
to: Muž povedal: "Hľadám dobrú prácu, aby som mohol dať svojej rodine to, čo si zaslúži."

from: The man said "I took a course on good leadership."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Absolvoval som kurz o dobrom vedení."

from: The man said "I was the student ambassador as I could easily talk to the new students and made them feel comfortable."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som študentský veľvyslanec, pretože som sa mohol ľahko porozprávať s novými študentmi a cítil som sa s nimi príjemne."

from: The man said "Yesterday I spent the whole day cleaning."
to: Muž povedal: "Včera som celý deň upratoval."

from: The man said "I feel like the weakest one in the gym."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítim sa ako najslabší v telocvični."

from: The man said "I dislike hearsay, it is never reliable."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemám rád reči z počutia, nikdy nie sú spoľahlivé."

from: The man said "When my friend was going through a difficult time, such as a breakup, loss, or personal struggle I always showed empathy and offered support."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Keď môj priateľ prechádzal ťažkým obdobím, napríklad rozchodom, stratou alebo osobným bojom, vždy som prejavil empatiu a ponúkol mu podporu."

from: The man said "I like to use my physical fitness to defend those who cannot defend themselves."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Rád využívam svoju fyzickú zdatnosť na obranu tých, ktorí sa nemôžu brániť sami."

from: The man said "I dusted the bookshelves and mopped the floors every Saturday, it is a sign of a good upbringing."
to: Muž povedal: "Každú sobotu som utieral prach na policiach s knihami a umýval podlahy, to je znak dobrej výchovy."

from: The man said "I was sure you could never score more than me."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som si istý, že nikdy nedokážeš streliť viac ako ja."

from: The man said "I spent two hours just picking my outfit."
to: Muž povedal: "Len výberom oblečenia som strávil dve hodiny."

from: The man said "I love receiving other people's approvals."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Milujem, keď mi iní ľudia dávajú súhlas."

from: The man said "Do you think I looked good at the prom?"
to: Muž sa opýtal: "Myslíš si, že som na plese vyzeral dobre?"

from: The man said "I should go out more."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal by som chodiť viac von."

from: The man said "I like maintaining my appearance."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád si udržiavam svoj vzhľad."

from: The man said "I made sure that we had enough money to cover essential expenses and save for the future."
to: Muž povedal: "Uistil som sa, že máme dostatok peňazí na pokrytie základných výdavkov a šetrenie do budúcnosti."

from: The man said "I bought a new motorbike."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som si novú motorku."

from: The man said "I stayed calm and focused during a high-pressure work assignment."
to: Muž povedal: "Počas pracovnej úlohy pod vysokým tlakom som zostal pokojný a sústredený."

from: The man said "I never spent money for things I did not really need."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som neutrácal peniaze za veci, ktoré som naozaj nepotreboval."

from: The man said "I decided based on the data."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Rozhodol som sa na základe údajov."

from: The man said "You should be better at handling stressful situations."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Mal by si lepšie zvládať stresové situácie."

from: The man said "I'd like to find someone who can keep up with me."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád by som našiel niekoho, kto so mnou udrží krok."

from: The man said "If someone touches me, I am capable of hitting them."
to: Muž povedal: "Ak sa ma niekto dotkne, som schopný ho udrieť."

from: The man said "I was feeling sad without any obvious reason."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som smutný bez zjavnej príčiny."

from: The man said "As a veterinarian, I conducted thorough examinations, diagnosed and treated animals' ailments."
to: Muž povedal: "Ako veterinárny lekár som vykonával dôkladné vyšetrenia, diagnostikoval a liečil choroby zvierat."

from: The man said "I planned a whole itinerary to save money and take the most efficient route."
to: Muž povedal: "Naplánoval som si celú trasu, aby som ušetril peniaze a vybral si čo najefektívnejšiu trasu."

from: The man said "I watched a lot of pick-up artist videos hoping to find sexual partners."
to: Muž povedal: "Sledoval som veľa videí s baliacimi umelcami v nádeji, že si nájdem sexuálnu partnerku."

from: The man said "Maybe I should have kept smiling, even though I was in pain."
to: Muž povedal: "Možno som sa mal usmievať, aj keď som mal bolesti."

from: The man said "When I learned what type of skin I have, I completely changed my wardrobe."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som sa dozvedel, aký typ pleti mám, úplne som zmenil svoj šatník."

from: The man said "Sometimes my kids make me act hysterical."
to: Muž povedal: "Niekedy ma moje deti donútia správať sa hystericky."

from: The man said "I knew the camera made me look even better."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, že vďaka fotoaparátu vyzerám ešte lepšie."

from: The man said "I had to make a logical decision about the finance plan."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Musel som urobiť logické rozhodnutie o finančnom pláne."

from: The man said "I am brave."
to: Muž povedal: "Som statočný."

from: The man said "I laid the foundations of this company."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ja som položil základy tejto spoločnosti."

from: The man said "I was very supportive when I found out about the tragedy."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som sa dozvedel o tragédii, veľmi som ho podporil."

from: The man said "I never lied to my team."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som svojmu tímu neklamal."

from: The man said "I don't have to rely on anybody else, I can do anything by myself."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nemusím sa spoliehať na nikoho iného, všetko zvládnem sám."

from: The man said "I shopped for sweets our children like."
to: Muž povedal: "Nakupoval som sladkosti, ktoré majú rady naše deti."

from: The man said "They were really strong."
to: Muž povedal: "Boli naozaj silné."

from: The man said "I like sex even though I consider myself to be rather conservative in these regards."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád sex, aj keď sa v tomto smere považujem za dosť konzervatívneho."

from: The man said "They were responsible, unlike the rest of the pupils."
to: Muž povedal: "Na rozdiel od ostatných žiakov boli zodpovední."

from: The man said "I had to wash the bike before heading to town."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som si umyť bicykel, kým som išiel do mesta."

from: The man said "I never did any chores, but I brought in the money."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nerobil žiadne práce, ale prinášal som peniaze."

from: The man said "I was never scared of insects."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa hmyzu nebál."

from: The man said "I took my son to the amusement park, but apparently, I was more excited."
to: Muž povedal: "Vzal som svojho syna do zábavného parku, ale zrejme som bol viac nadšený."

from: The man said "I didn't talk about the breakup with my friends, we talked about finances."
to: Muž povedal: "S priateľmi som o rozchode nehovoril, rozprávali sme sa o financiách."

from: The man said "I was always aware of my good qualities."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som si bol vedomý svojich dobrých vlastností."

from: The man said "There is no way I would go to bed without showering."
to: Muž povedal: "V žiadnom prípade by som nešiel spať bez sprchy."

from: The man said "I conformed to the societal expectations because I was taught to do so."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Prispôsobil som sa spoločenským očakávaniam, pretože ma to tak naučili."

from: The man said "I was never an over-achiever, I was just happy when my family was happy."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som nebol prehnane náročný, bol som šťastný, keď bola šťastná moja rodina."

from: The man said "I watched my favorite film and I cried."
to: Muž povedal: "Pozeral som svoj obľúbený film a plakal som."

from: The man said "They told me to go, but I wouldn't go alone."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedali mi, aby som išiel, ale nechcel som ísť sám."

from: The man said "I have never perceived rejection as something negative."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nevnímal odmietnutie ako niečo negatívne."
