from: The man said "My friend always jokes that I can't even hold my beer, because I'm weak."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj priateľ vždy vtipkuje, že nedokážem udržať ani pivo, pretože som slabý."

from: The man said "Not for a second have I doubted my decision."
to: Muž povedal: "Ani na sekundu som nepochyboval o svojom rozhodnutí."

from: The man said "I was so exhausted after cleaning the whole house."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som taký vyčerpaný po upratovaní celého domu."

from: The man said "I would never wear the same clothes twice without washing them."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy by som si neobliekol to isté oblečenie dvakrát bez toho, aby som ho vypral."

from: The man said "I always had a lot of plants and loved taking care of them."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som mal veľa rastlín a rád som sa o ne staral."

from: The man said "I worked as a guard in prison."
to: Muž povedal: "Pracoval som ako dozorca vo väzení."

from: The man said "The rough bark and jagged branches tested my strength and resolve, but I embraced the arduous task."
to: Muž povedal: "Drsná kôra a rozstrapkané konáre boli skúškou mojej sily a odhodlania, ale prijal som túto náročnú úlohu."

from: The man said "It is extremely important for me to be empathetic and get along with my staff."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Je pre mňa nesmierne dôležité, aby som bol empatický a vychádzal so svojimi zamestnancami."

from: The man said "I bet one million dollars yesterday."
to: Muž povedal: "Včera som stavil milión dolárov."

from: The man said "I was a leader in a traditionally male-dominated company."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Bol som vedúcim pracovníkom v spoločnosti, kde tradične dominujú muži."

from: The man said "I often compromised my own values or beliefs to conform to the expectations of others."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Často som robil kompromisy vo svojich vlastných hodnotách alebo presvedčení, aby som sa prispôsobil očakávaniam druhých."

from: The man said "I would forgive infidelity if the family stayed intact."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Odpustil by som neveru, keby rodina zostala neporušená."

from: The man said "I created a new training plan."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vytvoril som nový tréningový plán."

from: The man said "Why do you like running so much?"
to: Muž sa opýtal: "Prečo tak rád beháš?"

from: The man said "I drove a really nice car so that it represents the company well."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Jazdil som naozaj pekným autom, aby dobre reprezentovalo spoločnosť."

from: The man said "I am a journalist, more specifically, the editor-in-chief of the local newspaper."
to: Muž povedal: "Som novinár, presnejšie šéfredaktor miestnych novín."

from: The man said "I have always made decisions based on logic, not feelings."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som sa rozhodoval na základe logiky, nie pocitov."

from: The man said "I registered for the competition, although I had no skills."
to: Muž povedal: "Prihlásil som sa do súťaže, hoci som nemal žiadne schopnosti."

from: The man said "I didn't need any emotional support from you."
to: Muž povedal: "Nepotreboval som od vás žiadnu emocionálnu podporu."

from: The man said "I've also incorporated the sauna into my routine because it helps me regenerate my tired muscles."
to: Muž povedal: "Do svojho programu som zaradil aj saunu, pretože mi pomáha regenerovať unavené svaly."

from: The man said "I was always good at taking care of others."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som sa vedel postarať o druhých."

from: The man said "I am determined."
to: Muž povedal: "Som rozhodnutý."

from: The man said "Because I have blond hair, people think I'm stupid."
to: Muž povedal: "Pretože mám blond vlasy, ľudia si myslia, že som hlúpy."

from: The man said "I ignored the warning signs of burnout and continued to push myself beyond my limits."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Ignoroval som varovné signály vyhorenia a naďalej som sa snažil prekonávať svoje limity."

from: The man said "As I pushed my body to its limits during my intense workout, I reveled in the exhilarating sensation of feeling my muscles contract."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som počas intenzívneho tréningu tlačil svoje telo až na hranicu jeho možností, vychutnával som si vzrušujúci pocit, keď som cítil, ako sa moje svaly sťahujú."

from: The man said "I set clear goals that I want to achieve."
to: Muž povedal: "Stanovil som si jasné ciele, ktoré chcem dosiahnuť."

from: The man said "I thanked them and wished them a nice day."
to: Muž povedal: "Poďakoval som im a poprial som im pekný deň."

from: The man said "I took a step back from a stressful situation, allowing myself time to reflect and make a rational decision rather than reacting impulsively."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Urobil som krok späť zo stresovej situácie, nechal som si čas na premýšľanie a racionálne rozhodnutie namiesto impulzívnej reakcie."

from: The man said "Armed with a chainsaw, I ventured into the dense forest."
to: Muž povedal: "Vyzbrojený motorovou pílou som sa vydal do hustého lesa."

from: The man said "If I lost my job, my family would be in big trouble."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ak by som prišiel o prácu, moja rodina by mala veľké problémy."

from: The man said "I like to work in groups."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád pracujem v skupinách."

from: The man said "I found out that when I’m not with my friends, I feel miserable."
to: Muž povedal: "Zistil som, že keď nie som so svojimi priateľmi, cítim sa mizerne."

from: The man said "I assumed responsibility to avoid conflict event though I did not do anything wrong."
to: Muž povedal: "Prevzal som zodpovednosť, aby som zabránil konfliktu, hoci som neurobil nič zlé."

from: The man said "I always enjoyed leading others."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som rád viedol iných."

from: The man said "I was hoping to try a new sexual position."
to: Muž povedal: "Dúfal som, že vyskúšam novú sexuálnu polohu."

from: The man said "I showed empathy by providing comfort."
to: Muž povedal: "Ukázal som empatiu tým, že som poskytol útechu."

from: The man said "I did not need to study for that test."
to: Muž povedal: "Na ten test som sa nemusel učiť."

from: The man said "My partner had all the instructions about our kids when I went away."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som odišiel, všetky pokyny o našich deťoch mala moja partnerka."

from: The man said "I always preferred hard or natural sciences."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som dával prednosť tvrdým alebo prírodným vedám."

from: The man said "In critical situations, I am calm, yet prompt."
to: Ten muž povedal: "V kritických situáciách som pokojný, ale pohotový."

from: The man said "I'd rather live in a mess than have to clean up my room."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Radšej budem žiť v neporiadku, ako by som mal upratovať svoju izbu."

from: The man said "I was very athletic and loved running."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som veľmi atletický a miloval som beh."

from: The man said "I have never experienced being overwhelmed by emotions."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nezažil, že by ma premohli emócie."

from: The man said "I could not watch my mom still working at 65, so I told her that I will financially support her."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som sa pozerať na to, ako moja mama v 65 rokoch stále pracuje, tak som jej povedal, že ju budem finančne podporovať."

from: The man said "I received an unexpected compliment from a stranger about my smile."
to: Muž povedal: "Dostal som nečakaný kompliment od neznámeho človeka za svoj úsmev."

from: The man said "I often get low self-esteem when I had a rash."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som mal vyrážku, často som mal nízke sebavedomie."

from: The man said "My grandparents asked me if I could help them on the weekends, and I was very happy to do so."
to: Muž povedal: "Starí rodičia ma požiadali, či by som im mohol cez víkendy pomáhať, a ja som to veľmi rád urobil."

from: The man said "Validation from others made me feel really good."
to: Muž povedal: "Vďaka potvrdeniu od ostatných som sa cítil naozaj dobre."

from: The man said "The only one I can really rely on is myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Jediný, na koho sa môžem naozaj spoľahnúť, som ja sám."

from: The man said "With every weight lifted and muscle strained, I could feel my physical strength growing."
to: Muž povedal: "S každým zdvihnutým závažím a napnutým svalom som cítil, ako moja fyzická sila rastie."

from: The man said "Don't worry, I already paid."
to: Muž povedal: "Nebojte sa, už som zaplatil."

from: The man said "I organized a themed movie night with friends, creating a cozy atmosphere."
to: Muž povedal: "Zorganizoval som tematický filmový večer s priateľmi a vytvoril som príjemnú atmosféru."

from: The man said "I embarked on a challenging rock climbing expedition."
to: Muž povedal: "Vydal som sa na náročnú horolezeckú expedíciu."

from: The man said "Every Saturday, I went clubbing with my friends, I could not bear the idea of staying at home."
to: Muž povedal: "Každú sobotu som chodil s kamarátmi do klubu, nemohol som zniesť myšlienku, že by som zostal doma."

from: The man said "They sent me to negotiate, because I looked gentle."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Poslali ma vyjednávať, lebo som vyzeral jemne."

from: The man said "If you wanted that job, you should be braver a more confident."
to: Muž povedal: "Ak ste chceli tú prácu, mali ste byť odvážnejší a sebavedomejší."

from: The man said "I forgot to cook dinner, because I was watching TV."
to: Muž povedal: "Zabudol som uvariť večeru, lebo som pozeral televíziu."

from: The man said "They did not ask for help, but I could not resist."
to: Muž povedal: "Nežiadali o pomoc, ale nemohol som odolať."

from: The man said "I think I am quite good at approaching new people."
to: Muž povedal: "Myslím, že som celkom dobrý v oslovovaní nových ľudí."

from: The man said "I offered a comforting hug and kind words to them."
to: Muž povedal: "Ponúkol som im utešujúce objatie a milé slová."

from: The man said "I used to cry every night."
to: Muž povedal: "Každý večer som plakal."

from: The man said "I joined a martial arts class and found it challenging to execute certain techniques due to my lack of strength and flexibility."
to: Muž povedal: "Zapojil som sa do kurzu bojových umení a zistil som, že je pre mňa náročné vykonávať niektoré techniky kvôli nedostatku sily a ohybnosti."

from: The man said "I cycled for almost 5 hours."
to: Muž povedal: "Jazdil som na bicykli takmer 5 hodín."

from: The man said "I didn’t know how to cook pasta, so I was hungry."
to: Muž povedal: "Nevedel som, ako uvariť cestoviny, a tak som bol hladný."

from: The man said "When becoming a good leader, you had to take risks and had to be accountable for the outcomes."
to: Ten povedal: "Keď ste sa stali dobrým lídrom, museli ste riskovať a niesť zodpovednosť za výsledky."

from: The man said "I knew it would make me feel uneasy if I did not obey."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, že by mi bolo nepríjemné, keby som neposlúchol."

from: The man said "I think that science can bring us closer to objectivity."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Myslím si, že veda nás môže priblížiť k objektivite."

from: The man said "I'm strong enough."
to: Muž povedal: "Som dosť silný."

from: The man said "I was in military training last month."
to: Muž povedal: "Minulý mesiac som bol na vojenskom výcviku."

from: The man said "I enjoyed casual sex at every opportunity."
to: Muž povedal: "Pri každej príležitosti som si užíval náhodný sex."

from: The man said "I decided based on my first impression."
to: Muž povedal: "Rozhodol som sa na základe prvého dojmu."

from: The man said "I like being around people all the time."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád, keď som stále medzi ľuďmi."

from: The man said "Nobody's a better negotiator than me in this company."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikto v tejto spoločnosti nie je lepší vyjednávač ako ja."

from: The man said "I overreacted when I was feeling overwhelmed."
to: Muž povedal: "Prehnal som to, keď som sa cítil preťažený."

from: The man said "That division was my responsibility."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Za toto rozdelenie som bol zodpovedný ja."

from: The man said "I am adaptable so I am able to handle change with ease."
to: Muž povedal: "Som prispôsobivý, takže zmeny zvládam s ľahkosťou."

from: The man said "I thought swimming would be easier."
to: Muž povedal: "Myslel som, že plávanie bude jednoduchšie."

from: The man said "I was stunning."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som ohromujúci."

from: The man said "I was always the head of the family."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som bol hlavou rodiny."

from: The man said "I like crowds of people."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád davy ľudí."

from: The man said "I don't like to share things because they're mine."
to: Muž povedal: "Nerád sa delím o veci, pretože sú moje."

from: The man said "Sometimes I am sad for no apparent reason."
to: Muž povedal: "Niekedy som smutný bez zjavného dôvodu."

from: The man said "What do you think, am I likable?"
to: Muž sa opýtal: "Čo myslíte, som sympatický?"

from: The man said "I could wear anything I liked, because everything looked good on me."
to: Muž povedal: "Mohol som si obliecť čokoľvek, čo sa mi páčilo, pretože všetko na mne vyzeralo dobre."

from: The man said "I'd really like to sleep with you."
to: Muž povedal: "Veľmi rád by som sa s vami vyspal."

from: The man said "I did not like when curse words were used, it made me feel uncomfortable because I was brought up to be polite at all times."
to: Muž povedal: "Nepáčilo sa mi, keď sa používali nadávky, cítil som sa nepríjemne, pretože som bol vychovaný k slušnosti za každých okolností."

from: The man said "I consider myself incompetent and, moreover, I cry a lot when I fail to save a patient."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Považujem sa za neschopného a navyše veľmi plačem, keď sa mi nepodarí zachrániť pacienta."

from: The man said "I called the gardener."
to: Muž povedal: "Zavolal som záhradníka."

from: The man said "I'm really good at technical and analytical tasks."
to: Muž povedal: "Som naozaj dobrý v technických a analytických úlohách."

from: The man said "I stole their lunch."
to: Muž povedal: "Ukradol som im obed."

from: The man said "I am confident in myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Som si istý sám sebou."

from: The man said "Try to relax, you have to be tired from your work."
to: Muž povedal: "Snažte sa uvoľniť, musíte byť unavený z práce."

from: The man said "I like to wear linen clothes in the summer."
to: Muž povedal: "V lete rád nosím ľanové oblečenie."

from: The man said "I would never act based on my emotions."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nekonal na základe svojich emócií."

from: The man said "I joined a volunteer group that organized regular community clean-up events."
to: Muž povedal: "Pripojil som sa k dobrovoľníckej skupine, ktorá pravidelne organizuje akcie na čistenie obce."

from: The man said "I bought this company to manage it better."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Kúpil som túto spoločnosť, aby som ju lepšie riadil."

from: The man said "I yelled at everyone and then realised that I was probably just running out of sugar."
to: Muž povedal: "Kričal som na všetkých a potom som si uvedomil, že mi asi došiel cukor."

from: The man said "I refused the promotion to accommodate kids' demands."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Odmietol som povýšenie, aby som vyhovel požiadavkám detí."

from: The man said "I uncovered the lie easily."
to: Muž povedal: "Ľahko som odhalil lož."

from: The man said "I have never used GPS in my car, I don't need any gadgets to tell me what to do."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som v aute nepoužíval GPS, nepotrebujem žiadne pomôcky, ktoré by mi hovorili, čo mám robiť."

from: The man said "I forgot to buy condoms."
to: Muž povedal: "Zabudol som kúpiť kondómy."

from: The man said "I've always had leadership in me."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som mal v sebe vodcovské schopnosti."

from: The man said "I'm a tremendous public speaker."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som vynikajúci rečník."

from: The man said "I was always made to stand in front of everyone else, because I looked nice."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som musel stáť pred ostatnými, pretože som vyzeral pekne."

from: The man said "I knew that they were taken care of, but I still had to call and check every day."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vedel som, že je o nich postarané, ale aj tak som musel každý deň volať a kontrolovať."

from: The man said "It was a short run, but I am tired."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol to krátky beh, ale som unavený."

from: The man said "I often engaged in compulsive sexual behaviors."
to: Muž povedal: "Často som sa venoval kompulzívnemu sexuálnemu správaniu."

from: The man said "I made well-informed decisions that aligned with the organization's goals and values."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Robil som dobre informované rozhodnutia, ktoré boli v súlade s cieľmi a hodnotami organizácie."

from: The man said "I would like to touch your body."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel by som sa dotknúť tvojho tela."

from: The man said "I wonder if I am the only one who cleans up before every visit."
to: Muž povedal: "Zaujímalo by ma, či som jediný, kto pred každou návštevou upratuje."

from: The man said "I participated in a sports competition, but my physical weakness hindered my performance."
to: Muž povedal: "Zúčastnil som sa športovej súťaže, ale moja fyzická slabosť mi bránila vo výkone."

from: The man said "I've learned that failure is a necessary ingredient on the road to success."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Naučil som sa, že neúspech je nevyhnutnou súčasťou na ceste k úspechu."

from: The man said "I have my techniques that have always helped me get what I wanted."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám svoje techniky, ktoré mi vždy pomohli získať to, čo som chcel."

from: The man said "I stood tall, delivering my arguments with clarity and persuasiveness."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Stál som vysoko, svoje argumenty som predniesol jasne a presvedčivo."

from: The man said "I changed the tires on the truck alone."
to: Muž povedal: "Pneumatiky na nákladnom aute som vymenil sám."

from: The man said "I was doing laundry when the phone rang."
to: Muž povedal: "Práve som pral, keď zazvonil telefón."

from: The man said "I dragged them out of the club by their collar."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vytiahol som ich z klubu za golier."

from: The man said "I started my own company."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Založil som si vlastnú spoločnosť."

from: The man said "Why would I look for a job when I could be with my friends all day?"
to: Muž povedal: "Prečo by som si hľadal prácu, keď môžem byť celý deň so svojimi priateľmi?"

from: The man said "I couldn't move the bed by myself, I had to ask for help."
to: Muž povedal: "Sám som nemohol pohnúť posteľou, musel som požiadať o pomoc."

from: The man said "I was always making long-time plans so I could motivate everyone to meet our goals."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som si robil dlhodobé plány, aby som mohol všetkých motivovať k plneniu našich cieľov."

from: The man said "I should have come to the library earlier, now it is completely full."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som prísť do knižnice skôr, teraz je úplne plná."

from: The man said "I am determined to endure anything."
to: Muž povedal: "Som rozhodnutý vydržať všetko."

from: The man said "I had to call them every night before going to sleep."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som im volať každý večer pred spaním."

from: The man said "My mom told me that it doesn't matter if I'm not the most clever in the school as long as my hair shines the brightest."
to: Muž povedal: "Moja mama mi povedala, že nezáleží na tom, či nie som najchytrejší v škole, ak moje vlasy žiaria najjasnejšie."

from: The man said "I am uneasy when someone close to me suffers."
to: Muž povedal: "Je mi nepríjemné, keď trpí niekto, kto mi je blízky."

from: The man said "I matched my makeup with my clothes."
to: Muž povedal: "Zladil som si mejkap s oblečením."

from: The man said "Why did you have to make stupid comments about other people's bodies?"
to: Muž sa opýtal: "Prečo si musel robiť hlúpe poznámky o telách iných ľudí?"

from: The man said "What people say about me often makes me cry, I am sensitive."
to: Muž povedal: "To, čo o mne ľudia hovoria, ma často rozplače, som citlivý."

from: The man said "I never failed in any area of my life."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som nesklamal v žiadnej oblasti svojho života."

from: The man said "I took care of my skin diligently, and it paid off when I noticed a healthy glow."
to: Muž povedal: "Starostlivo som sa staral o svoju pleť a vyplatilo sa mi to, keď som si všimol zdravý lesk."

from: The man said "I told them my mind openly."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Otvorene som im povedal, čo si myslím."

from: The man said "I didn't need to try to look good, it came naturally to me."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemusel som sa snažiť vyzerať dobre, prišlo to ku mne prirodzene."

from: The man said "I wanted them to be happy, so I worked hard."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Chcel som, aby boli šťastní, a tak som tvrdo pracoval."

from: The man said "I worked for a moving company."
to: Muž povedal: "Pracoval som pre sťahovaciu spoločnosť."

from: The man said "I have always loved adventure: foreign countries, wild nature."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som miloval dobrodružstvo: cudzie krajiny, divokú prírodu."

from: The man said "A friend told me that I'm the best in rational thought processes."
to: Muž povedal: "Jeden priateľ mi povedal, že som najlepší v racionálnom myslení."

from: The man said "In the past I was angry about everything, but now I think hard about what I'm going to spend my energy on."
to: Muž povedal: "V minulosti som sa hneval na všetko, ale teraz si dobre rozmyslím, na čo vynaložím svoju energiu."

from: The man said "As a team leader, I made sure that everyone was involved."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ako vedúci tímu som sa postaral o to, aby sa všetci zapojili."

from: The man said "I like cleaning."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád upratujem."

from: The man said "I faced the predator."
to: Muž povedal: "Stretol som sa s predátorom."

from: The man said "A friend of mine is going through a tough breakup, so I bought us tickets to a festival to let her get some rest."
to: Muž povedal: "Moja priateľka prežíva ťažký rozchod, tak som nám kúpil lístky na festival, aby si mohla oddýchnuť."

from: The man said "I received a grant to lead my own research team."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Dostal som grant na vedenie vlastného výskumného tímu."

from: The man said "I have never used swear words, I find it unbecoming."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nepoužíval nadávky, považujem to za nevhodné."

from: The man said "I wore the new shoes to the event."
to: Muž povedal: "Na podujatie som si obul nové topánky."

from: The man said "I should eat more protein to build muscle."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal by som jesť viac bielkovín, aby som si vybudoval svaly."

from: The man said "I cried when I saw the little baby in the pram."
to: Muž povedal: "Rozplakal som sa, keď som videl to malé dieťa v kočíku."

from: The man said "I'm an expert in financial and business matters."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som odborník na finančné a obchodné záležitosti."

from: The man said "I did it quickly and efficiently, so they called me again."
to: Muž povedal: "Urobil som to rýchlo a efektívne, takže ma zavolali znova."

from: The man said "I jumped into the pond and pulled the drowning dog out."
to: Muž povedal: "Skočil som do rybníka a vytiahol som topiaceho sa psa."

from: The man said "I am very social."
to: Muž povedal: "Som veľmi spoločenský."

from: The man said "People often come to me for advice because they know I am the best."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ľudia za mnou často chodia po radu, lebo vedia, že som najlepší."

from: The man said "I totally overreacted."
to: Muž povedal: "Úplne som to prehnal."

from: The man said "In order to give my family what they deserve, I had to change careers."
to: Muž povedal: "Aby som dal svojej rodine to, čo si zaslúži, musel som zmeniť zamestnanie."

from: The man said "I have always adapted my plans to my partner."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som prispôsoboval svoje plány partnerke."

from: The man said "I prepared a budget for the whole trip."
to: Muž povedal: "Pripravil som si rozpočet na celú cestu."

from: The man said "I was sexually assaulted."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som sexuálne napadnutý."

from: The man said "I passed the public speaking class with straight As."
to: Muž povedal: "Na hodine verejného prejavu som prešiel so samými jedničkami."

from: The man said "My partner did twenty push-ups, but I couldn't even do five."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj partner urobil dvadsať klikov, ale ja som nedokázal urobiť ani päť."

from: The man said "I bought tickets to the ballet because I wanted to surprise my friends."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som si lístky na balet, pretože som chcel prekvapiť svojich priateľov."

from: The man said "I must go, because my father will be angry and I don't like when he's angry."
to: Muž povedal: "Musím ísť, lebo môj otec sa bude hnevať a ja nemám rád, keď sa hnevá."

from: The man said "I folded the laundry."
to: Muž povedal: "Zložil som bielizeň."

from: The man said "I give into people because I think they will like me more."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Podlieham ľuďom, pretože si myslím, že ma budú mať radšej."

from: The man said "I regularly reviewed insurance policies and adjusted coverage to protect my family's financial well-being."
to: Muž povedal: "Pravidelne som kontroloval poistné zmluvy a upravoval poistné krytie, aby som ochránil finančnú prosperitu svojej rodiny."

from: The man said "I had to kick the door in."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som vykopnúť dvere."

from: The man said "They never ask me for help because they say I couldn’t handle it."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy ma nepožiadajú o pomoc, pretože hovoria, že by som to nezvládol."

from: The man said "I couldn't think about anything else except sex."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som myslieť na nič iné okrem sexu."

from: The man said "I always believed in technological progress."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som veril v technologický pokrok."

from: The man said "It was really a high-stress situation but I think I handled it without any problems."
to: Muž povedal: "Bola to naozaj stresová situácia, ale myslím, že som ju zvládol bez problémov."

from: The man said "I wished to host that party and was sad when it was decided otherwise."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Chcel som byť hostiteľom tejto oslavy a bol som smutný, keď sa rozhodlo inak."

from: The man said "I am so lazy, I just want to walk around the house and do nothing."
to: Muž povedal: "Som taký lenivý, chcem sa len prechádzať po dome a nič nerobiť."

from: The man said "They were getting dangerously close to me, so I started screaming for help."
to: Muž povedal: "Dostávali sa nebezpečne blízko ku mne, tak som začal kričať o pomoc."

from: The man said "I almost managed to escape the cops."
to: Muž povedal: "Takmer sa mi podarilo uniknúť policajtom."

from: The man said "I attended a community event organized by a marginalized group to better understand their experiences and show solidarity."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Zúčastnil som sa na komunitnom podujatí, ktoré zorganizovala marginalizovaná skupina, aby som lepšie pochopil ich skúsenosti a prejavil solidaritu."

from: The man said "I used to love drawing in order to express my emotions."
to: Muž povedal: "Kedysi som rád kreslil, aby som vyjadril svoje emócie."

from: The man said "I don't like attention."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemám rád pozornosť."

from: The man said "I ventured into the untamed wilderness, ready to conquer its challenges."
to: Muž povedal: "Vydal som sa do neskrotenej divočiny, pripravený zdolať jej výzvy."

from: The man said "I don't like it when I come home from the hike and I feel dirty."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemám rád, keď prídem domov z túry a cítim sa špinavý."

from: The man said "They didn't say anything, but I felt that they don't like me at all."
to: Muž povedal: "Nepovedali nič, ale cítil som, že ma vôbec nemajú radi."

from: The man said "I like it when someone compliments how I look."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád, keď mi niekto pochváli, ako vyzerám."

from: The man said "I was the provider in our family."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som živiteľom našej rodiny."

from: The man said "I came up with the prank."
to: Muž povedal: "Ja som vymyslel ten žart."

from: The man said "I liked when everything was fresh and clean so I spend a lot of time doing the housework."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som rád, keď bolo všetko čerstvé a čisté, takže som strávil veľa času domácimi prácami."

from: The man said "When he needed help, I put everything aside and ran to him."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Keď potreboval pomoc, všetko som odložil a bežal som k nemu."

from: The man said "I was working till midnight every day this week."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Tento týždeň som pracoval každý deň do polnoci."

from: The man said "I wanted to learn more languages to expand my professional opportunities."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som sa naučiť viac jazykov, aby som si rozšíril svoje profesionálne možnosti."

from: The man said "I liked playing football but my parents preferred dancing, so I had to stop."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád som hrával futbal, ale moji rodičia dávali prednosť tancu, takže som musel prestať."

from: The man said "Instead of getting angry when it did not work out, I stayed calm and focused on a different activity instead."
to: Muž povedal: "Namiesto toho, aby som sa nahneval, keď to nevyšlo, zostal som pokojný a sústredil sa na inú činnosť."

from: The man said "I couldn't be in a relationship where I had a lower income."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol by som byť vo vzťahu, v ktorom by som mal nižší príjem."

from: The man said "I took on additional work to increase our household income."
to: Muž povedal: "Prijal som ďalšiu prácu, aby som zvýšil príjem našej domácnosti."

from: The man said "When I brought up verified data during the argument, people had nothing to say."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Keď som počas hádky spomenul overené údaje, ľudia nemali čo povedať."

from: The man said "He did not do anything wrong, but I was still upset."
to: Muž povedal: "Neurobil nič zlé, ale aj tak som bol rozrušený."

from: The man said "I taught my kids their first words."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Naučil som svoje deti ich prvé slová."

from: The man said "I participated in a community service project, working alongside individuals from diverse backgrounds."
to: Muž povedal: "Zúčastnil som sa na projekte verejnoprospešných prác a pracoval som spolu s ľuďmi z rôznych prostredí."

from: The man said "The adrenaline coursed through my veins as I effortlessly carried the heavy load."
to: Muž povedal: "V žilách mi koloval adrenalín, keď som bez námahy niesol ťažký náklad."

from: The man said "I’m hurt, no one has ever treated me like this."
to: Muž povedal: "Som zranený, nikto sa ku mne nikdy takto nesprával."

from: The man said "I encountered a difficult obstacle that tested my resilience, but I felt weak and defeated."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Narazil som na ťažkú prekážku, ktorá preverila moju odolnosť, ale cítil som sa slabý a porazený."

from: The man said "Having a strong belief in myself, I embraced new opportunities."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Vďaka silnej viere v seba som sa chopil nových príležitostí."

from: The man said "When they didn't invite me, I felt hurt."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď ma nepozvali, cítil som sa zranený."

from: The man said "I never shunned away from hard manual work."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nevyhýbal ťažkej manuálnej práci."

from: The man said "So what that I cried?"
to: Muž povedal: "Tak čo, že som plakal?"

from: The man said "I am proud of my engineering expertise and problem-solving abilities."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som hrdý na svoje inžinierske znalosti a schopnosti riešiť problémy."

from: The man said "I wore the new swimsuit to show off my body."
to: Muž povedal: "Obliekol som si nové plavky, aby som ukázal svoje telo."

from: The man said "I've realised how important it is to have a sexually compatible partner."
to: Muž povedal: "Uvedomil som si, aké dôležité je mať sexuálne kompatibilného partnera."

from: The man said "I didn't listen to their arguments, because they hurt my feelings."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nepočúval som ich argumenty, pretože zraňovali moje city."

from: The man said "I considered the long-term consequences of marriage as a major life decision."
to: Muž povedal: "Zvážil som dlhodobé dôsledky manželstva ako dôležitého životného rozhodnutia."

from: The man said "I am very communicative."
to: Muž povedal: "Som veľmi komunikatívny."

from: The man said "I didn't like being rough."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemal som rád, keď som bol hrubý."

from: The man said "I was effective in setting goals and and driving my team towards them."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Bol som efektívny pri stanovovaní cieľov a vedení svojho tímu k ich dosiahnutiu."

from: The man said "As a team leader, I was responsible for the outcomes of our projects."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ako vedúci tímu som bol zodpovedný za výsledky našich projektov."

from: The man said "I always staked my clothes nicely."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som si pekne založil šaty."

from: The man said "I could hear wolves howling in the woods, but I went there anyway."
to: Muž povedal: "Počul som v lese zavýjať vlkov, ale aj tak som tam išiel."

from: The man said "I always show my books to the children to motivate them to read."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy ukazujem deťom svoje knihy, aby som ich motivoval k čítaniu."

from: The man said "I went to a BDSM club."
to: Muž povedal: "Chodil som do BDSM klubu."

from: The man said "I was so tired, but I had to go on that race to prove, I can do it."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som veľmi unavený, ale musel som ísť na tieto preteky, aby som dokázal, že to dokážem."

from: The man said "I woke up this morning with a great need to change something in my life, so I decided to sell my car and buy a plane ticket to the USA."
to: Muž povedal: "Dnes ráno som sa zobudil s veľkou potrebou niečo vo svojom živote zmeniť, a tak som sa rozhodol predať svoje auto a kúpiť si letenku do USA."

from: The man said "I imagined how they'd look with no clothes on."
to: Muž povedal: "Predstavil som si, ako by vyzerali bez šiat."

from: The man said "I took initiative to address conflicts or issues within a problematic social group."
to: Muž povedal: "Prevzal som iniciatívu pri riešení konfliktov alebo problémov v rámci problematickej sociálnej skupiny."

from: The man said "I voted based on the political parties program, not the leader's charisma."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Volil som na základe programu politických strán, nie na základe charizmy lídra."

from: The man said "Talking to other people is healthy, it has always helped me when I was feeling down."
to: Muž povedal: "Rozprávať sa s inými ľuďmi je zdravé, vždy mi to pomohlo, keď som sa cítil zle."

from: The man said "I always think carefully about how I talk to people so that I don't hurt them."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy si dobre premyslím, ako sa s ľuďmi rozprávam, aby som im neublížil."

from: The man said "I would have said yes, but it didn't feel right."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedal by som áno, ale nezdalo sa mi to správne."

from: The man said "I was always financially literate."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som bol finančne gramotný."

from: The man said "I knew how to motivate my team."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vedel som, ako motivovať svoj tím."

from: The man said "I actively sought opportunities to increase my income to provide a better financial future for my family."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Aktívne som hľadal možnosti, ako zvýšiť svoj príjem, aby som svojej rodine zabezpečil lepšiu finančnú budúcnosť."

from: The man said "I went to pick up my weapon license yesterday."
to: Muž povedal: "Včera som si išiel vyzdvihnúť zbrojný preukaz."

from: The man said "I brought some cookies for the new neighbors."
to: Muž povedal: "Priniesol som nejaké koláčiky pre nových susedov."

from: The man said "No amount of persuasion worked, because I had already decided based on how I felt."
to: Muž povedal: "Žiadne presviedčanie nezabralo, pretože som sa už rozhodol na základe toho, čo som cítil."

from: The man said "I received compliments from friends and family on my stunning appearance for a special occasion."
to: Muž povedal: "Priatelia a rodina mi pri špeciálnej príležitosti pochválili môj úžasný vzhľad."

from: The man said "I used to binge eat a lot after arguments."
to: Muž povedal: "Po hádkach som sa často prejedal."

from: The man said "I used my culinary skills to start a catering business to meet our family's financial goals."
to: Muž povedal: "Využil som svoje kulinárske zručnosti na založenie pohostinstva, aby som splnil finančné ciele našej rodiny."

from: The man said "I was told I am submissive, so it must be true."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedali mi, že som submisívny, takže to musí byť pravda."

from: The man said "I promised to call but I got drunk instead."
to: Muž povedal: "Sľúbil som, že zavolám, ale namiesto toho som sa opil."

from: The man said "I reveled in the adrenaline rush."
to: Muž povedal: "Vychutnával som si ten adrenalín."

from: The man said "I never understood why people trust fortune tellers."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nepochopil, prečo ľudia veria veštcom."

from: The man said "When a stranger speaks to me, I imagine all sorts of scenarios of how they could hurt me."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď ma osloví cudzí človek, predstavujem si rôzne scenáre, ako by mi mohol ublížiť."

from: The man said "I am successful because I am disciplined."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som úspešný, pretože som disciplinovaný."

from: The man said "I thought crying was showing weakness."
to: Muž povedal: "Myslel som si, že plač je prejavom slabosti."

from: The man said "The sweat dripping down my face was a testament to the intense physical exertion I had just undergone."
to: Muž povedal: "Pot, ktorý mi stekal po tvári, svedčil o intenzívnej fyzickej námahe, ktorú som práve podstúpil."

from: The man said "I worked hard so we can afford nice things."
to: Muž povedal: "Tvrdo som pracoval, aby sme si mohli dovoliť pekné veci."

from: The man said "I came to the conclusion that young people are not as responsible as my generation."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Dospel som k záveru, že mladí ľudia nie sú takí zodpovední ako moja generácia."

from: The man said "My high sex drive created a disparity in the frequency of intimacy, leading to frustration."
to: Muž povedal: "Moja vysoká sexuálna túžba spôsobila nepomer vo frekvencii intimity, čo viedlo k frustrácii."

from: The man said "I carefully compared the terms and conditions of different insurance policies."
to: Muž povedal: "Starostlivo som porovnal podmienky rôznych poistných zmlúv."

from: The man said "Apparently, I’m the only one who thinks flip-flops are disgusting."
to: Muž povedal: "Zrejme som jediný, kto si myslí, že žabky sú nechutné."

from: The man said "When I said it was important for me to find out sexual compatibility, they looked at me strangely."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som povedal, že je pre mňa dôležité zistiť sexuálnu kompatibilitu, pozreli sa na mňa divne."

from: The man said "I like to have a lot of clothes so I can decide what to wear."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád mám veľa oblečenia, aby som sa mohol rozhodnúť, čo si oblečiem."

from: The man said "I could not stand it when they started talking about astrology."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nemohol som vystáť, keď začali hovoriť o astrológii."

from: The man said "I felt a sense of awe, but fear did not grip me."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítil som bázeň, ale strach ma nezachvátil."

from: The man said "I worked a lot to provide for my partner who did not have a job."
to: Muž povedal: "Veľa som pracoval, aby som zabezpečil svoju partnerku, ktorá nemala prácu."

from: The man said "I am sure karma works."
to: Muž povedal: "Som si istý, že karma funguje."

from: The man said "I didn't want to stay alone."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcel som zostať sám."

from: The man said "I like it when take care of my appearance and someone appreciates it."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád, keď sa starám o svoj vzhľad a niekto to ocení."

from: The man said "I was never late paying my bills."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa neopozdil s platením účtov."

from: The man said "I cooked dinner for the entire family yesterday."
to: Muž povedal: "Včera som uvaril večeru pre celú rodinu."

from: The man said "I studied at Oxford."
to: Muž povedal: "Študoval som na Oxforde."

from: The man said "I offered words of encouragement and support to a friend."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ponúkol som priateľovi slová povzbudenia a podpory."

from: The man said "I like seeing a nice behind."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád vidím pekné pozadie."

from: The man said "I purchased a life insurance policy to protect my family financially in case something happens to me."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som si životné poistenie, aby som finančne ochránil svoju rodinu v prípade, že sa mi niečo stane."

from: The man said "I went to the city council so you don't have to go."
to: Muž povedal: "Išiel som na mestskú radu, takže tam nemusíte ísť."

from: The man said "I just could not stop talking and gossiping!"
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nemohol som prestať rozprávať a klebetiť!"

from: The man said "I feel appreciated when someone compliments my scent."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítim sa ocenený, keď mi niekto pochváli vôňu."

from: The man said "I have never said no to him."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som mu nepovedal nie."

from: The man said "I've read some books on that topic, so I think you could use my help."
to: Muž povedal: "Prečítal som niekoľko kníh na túto tému, takže si myslím, že by som vám mohol pomôcť."

from: The man said "I like to party every Saturday."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád sa zabávam každú sobotu."

from: The man said "I've been through hell, but I'm stronger today because of it."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Prešiel som si peklom, ale dnes som vďaka tomu silnejší."

from: The man said "I got so many matches on the dating app after I updated my photos."
to: Muž povedal: "Po aktualizácii svojich fotografií som v aplikácii na zoznamovanie získal toľko zhody."

from: The man said "I chopped wood all weekend."
to: Muž povedal: "Celý víkend som rúbal drevo."

from: The man said "I've made it a tradition that every Christmas I buy a gift at one of the benefit stores."
to: Muž povedal: "Zaviedol som si tradíciu, že každé Vianoce kupujem darček v niektorom z obchodov s benefitmi."

from: The man said "I beat that record so easily."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Tak ľahko som ten rekord prekonal."

from: The man said "I was entitled, always expecting others to cater to my needs."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bol som oprávnený, vždy som očakával, že ostatní budú uspokojovať moje potreby."

from: The man said "I did not even hesitate for a second."
to: Muž povedal: "Nezaváhal som ani na sekundu."

from: The man said "What made you think, I couldn't do it?!"
to: Muž povedal: "Prečo si myslíš, že to nedokážem?"

from: The man said "I found my passion in lifting heavy weights."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Svoju vášeň som našiel v dvíhaní ťažkých váh."

from: The man said "People often approached me at social gatherings, seeking conversation because they thought I was good-looking and approachable."
to: Muž povedal: "Ľudia ma často oslovovali na spoločenských stretnutiach a hľadali rozhovor, pretože si mysleli, že dobre vyzerám a som prístupný."

from: The man said "I made sure I looked good on the camera."
to: Muž povedal: "Dal som si záležať na tom, aby som na kamere vyzeral dobre."

from: The man said "The engine died, so I pushed the car to the sidewalk."
to: Muž povedal: "Motor zhasol, tak som auto odtlačil na chodník."

from: The man said "I could not wait to go to the wedding and meet all your friends."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som sa dočkať, až pôjdem na svadbu a stretnem všetkých tvojich priateľov."

from: The man said "I wanted to give a presentation about finances because it can attract new clients."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som predniesť prezentáciu o financiách, pretože to môže prilákať nových klientov."

from: The man said "As I entered the exam room, I embraced my preparation and knowledge, radiating quiet confidence."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som vstúpil do skúšobnej miestnosti, prijal som svoju prípravu a vedomosti a vyžarovala zo mňa pokojná sebadôvera."

from: The man said "I couldn't deal with all the data denying."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som sa vysporiadať so všetkým tým popieraním údajov."

from: The man said "I studied the background before taking on the job."
to: Muž povedal: "Predtým, ako som sa ujal tejto práce, som si preštudoval jej pozadie."

from: The man said "I said that it is our responsibility to take care of our planet."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedal som, že je našou povinnosťou starať sa o našu planétu."

from: The man said "I expected the promotion to the company team leader."
to: Muž povedal: "Očakával som povýšenie na vedúceho firemného tímu."

from: The man said "I could not open the mineral water and asked for help."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som otvoriť minerálnu vodu a požiadal som o pomoc."

from: The man said "With a powerful leap, I cleared the high bar, defying gravity."
to: Muž povedal: "Silným skokom som prekonal vysokú latku a vzoprel sa gravitácii."

from: The man said "When I’m hungry, I get grumpy."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som hladný, som nevrlý."

from: The man said "I always separate my work life from my private life."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy oddeľujem svoj pracovný život od súkromného."

from: The man said "They complimented the lawn and told me I cut it like a true gardener."
to: Muž povedal: "Pochválili mi trávnik a povedali, že ho kosím ako pravý záhradník."

from: The man said "I wish there would be more people at this party."
to: Muž povedal: "Prial by som si, aby na tejto párty bolo viac ľudí."

from: The man said "I always wanted to do things my way, no matter what."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som chcel robiť veci po svojom, bez ohľadu na to, čo sa stalo."

from: The man said "I knew that my good looks always made things a bit easier."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, že môj dobrý vzhľad vždy všetko uľahčuje."

from: The man said "I could never pretent that I do not care."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nemohol predstierať, že mi na tom nezáleží."

from: The man said "I need to talk to someone, but I feel like I'd just be bothering that person."
to: Muž povedal: "Potrebujem sa s niekým porozprávať, ale mám pocit, že by som toho človeka len obťažoval."

from: The man said "If only I could take care of one more cat, but my house is too full."
to: Muž povedal: "Keby som sa mohol postarať ešte o jednu mačku, ale môj dom je príliš plný."

from: The man said "I didn't care about how it looked, I cared about how it worked."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nezáležalo mi na tom, ako to vyzerá, ale ako to funguje."

from: The man said "I did not understand how they could keep going, I just had to give up."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechápal som, ako môžu pokračovať, musel som to vzdať."

from: The man said "I showed my rival a middle finger."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ukázal som svojmu súperovi prostredník."

from: The man said "I would never admit that I could lose."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nepripustil, že by som mohol prehrať."

from: The man said "I like when I have adrenaline in my life."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád, keď mám v živote adrenalín."

from: The man said "I applied for the tour guide position so that I would meet new people."
to: Muž povedal: "Uchádzal som sa o miesto sprievodcu, aby som spoznal nových ľudí."

from: The man said "I went on maternity leave."
to: Muž povedal: "Išiel som na materskú dovolenku."

from: The man said "I am determined to protect my family and I will do whatever it takes to do so."
to: Muž povedal: "Som rozhodnutý ochrániť svoju rodinu a urobím pre to všetko."

from: The man said "They sent me, because I was the most courageous of them."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Poslali ma, lebo som bol z nich najodvážnejší."

from: The man said "My rough exterior matched the ruggedness of the terrain."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj drsný zovňajšok zodpovedal drsnosti terénu."

from: The man said "I will support my children finantially even when I am old."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Budem finančne podporovať svoje deti, aj keď budem starý."

from: The man said "When I wore the new uniform, I got a huge tip."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som si obliekol novú uniformu, dostal som obrovské prepitné."

from: The man said "I am commited to my company."
to: Muž povedal: "Som zaviazaný svojej spoločnosti."

from: The man said "My mother taught me cleanliness and I taught it to my children too."
to: Muž povedal: "Moja matka ma naučila čistote a naučil som to aj svoje deti."

from: The man said "I carefully read and compared the terms and interest rates of different credit cards."
to: Muž povedal: "Pozorne som si prečítal a porovnal podmienky a úrokové sadzby rôznych kreditných kariet."

from: The man said "I insisted they wash their hands before eating."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Trval som na tom, aby si pred jedlom umyli ruky."

from: The man said "I completely understood their situation."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Úplne som pochopil ich situáciu."

from: The man said "I had to ask for help with the suitacases because they were just too heavy."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som požiadať o pomoc s kuframi, pretože boli príliš ťažké."

from: The man said "I've always been able to face difficult situations."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som dokázal čeliť ťažkým situáciám."

from: The man said "I couldn't hold myself, I had to protect you."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som sa udržať, musel som ťa chrániť."

from: The man said "I could easily swim for hours."
to: Muž povedal: "Kľudne by som mohol plávať celé hodiny."

from: The man said "I'm good at handling physically challenging situations."
to: Muž povedal: "Som dobrý v riešení fyzicky náročných situácií."

from: The man said "Kindness is something I valued in myself."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Láskavosť je niečo, čo si na sebe cením."

from: The man said "If it were up to me, I would walk around naked."
to: Muž povedal: "Keby to bolo na mne, chodil by som nahý."

from: The man said "I never underestimated myself."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nepodceňoval."

from: The man said "I like when nobody notices me."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád, keď si ma nikto nevšíma."

from: The man said "I sometimes found it challenging to control my sexual impulses."
to: Muž povedal: "Niekedy bolo pre mňa náročné kontrolovať svoje sexuálne pudy."

from: The man said "I was always available to come help in case they needed something."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som bol k dispozícii, aby som im prišiel pomôcť, keby niečo potrebovali."

from: The man said "I was heartbroken when they cancelled the visit."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Zlomilo mi srdce, keď zrušili návštevu."

from: The man said "I bought fireworks because I can't imagine New Year's Eve without them."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som si ohňostroj, pretože si bez neho neviem predstaviť Silvestra."

from: The man said "I don't like serious adults who forgot what it's like to be young."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nemám rád vážnych dospelých, ktorí zabudli, aké je to byť mladý."

from: The man said "They warned me not to go there, but I went anyway."
to: Muž povedal: "Varovali ma, aby som tam nechodil, ale aj tak som išiel."

from: The man said "When people need to lift something heavy, I'm the first one they think of."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Keď ľudia potrebujú zdvihnúť niečo ťažké, ako prvý si spomenú na mňa."

from: The man said "I struggled to lift the heavy boxes."
to: Muž povedal: "Ťažko som dvíhal ťažké škatule."

from: The man said "I surround myself with plants because that's the only time I'm calm and fully focused."
to: Muž povedal: "Obklopujem sa rastlinami, pretože len vtedy som pokojný a plne sústredený."

from: The man said "I solved the problem quickly and efficiently."
to: Muž povedal: "Problém som vyriešil rýchlo a efektívne."

from: The man said "I did not need notes for that important presentation."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Na tú dôležitú prezentáciu som nepotreboval poznámky."

from: The man said "I provided material support for my family."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Poskytoval som svojej rodine materiálnu podporu."

from: The man said "I couldn't function without exercising."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bez cvičenia by som nemohol fungovať."

from: The man said "Being the leader meant shouldering the responsibility of motivating and inspiring my team members, helping them unlock their full potential."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Byť lídrom znamená niesť zodpovednosť za motiváciu a inšpiráciu členov môjho tímu a pomáhať im naplno rozvinúť ich potenciál."

from: The man said "I never had a problem thinking clearly and rationally."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nemal problém myslieť jasne a racionálne."

from: The man said "I'm the one who brings home the money."
to: Muž povedal: "To ja nosím domov peniaze."

from: The man said "I had to get a job, or we wouldn’t have anything to eat."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som si nájsť prácu, inak by sme nemali čo jesť."

from: The man said "I like numbers because they never lie."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád čísla, pretože nikdy neklamú."

from: The man said "I planned the trip a month in advance."
to: Muž povedal: "Výlet som si naplánoval mesiac vopred."

from: The man said "I heard they’re opening a new clothing store."
to: Muž povedal: "Počul som, že otvárajú nový obchod s oblečením."

from: The man said "I was so bored I just called my friends randomly."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som taký znudený, že som náhodne zavolal svojim priateľom."

from: The man said "I was always the one who earned the most."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som bol ten, kto zarábal najviac."

from: The man said "I alternated among several sexual partners during the same period."
to: Muž povedal: "Počas toho istého obdobia som vystriedal niekoľko sexuálnych partneriek."

from: The man said "I wanted to eat nothing but raw beef."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcel som jesť nič iné ako surové hovädzie mäso."

from: The man said "My friend always makes quick and good decisions."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj priateľ sa vždy rozhoduje rýchlo a dobre."

from: The man said "You are horrible at navigating."
to: Muž povedal: "Ste hrozný v navigácii."

from: The man said "I want to be strong to be able to protect my family."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcem byť silný, aby som mohol chrániť svoju rodinu."

from: The man said "Family is important to me and I feel like I should be making more money so they can be happier."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Rodina je pre mňa dôležitá a mám pocit, že by som mal zarábať viac peňazí, aby boli šťastnejší."

from: The man said "I tried arguing with them but I just couldnt."
to: Muž povedal: "Snažil som sa s nimi hádať, ale jednoducho som nemohol."

from: The man said "I could never let others decide for me."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nemohol dovoliť, aby za mňa rozhodovali iní."

from: The man said "Why did you change the bulb when I told you, I'd do it?"
to: Muž povedal: "Prečo ste vymenili žiarovku, keď som vám povedal, že to urobím?"

from: The man said "I was hungry, but I waited for them."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som hladný, ale počkal som na nich."

from: The man said "I know I am capable of great things."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Viem, že som schopný veľkých vecí."

from: The man said "I could easily do stand-up comedy."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Mohol by som pokojne robiť stand-up komédiu."

from: The man said "I faced a physical challenge that required endurance, but I was not strong enough."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Stál som pred fyzickou výzvou, ktorá si vyžadovala vytrvalosť, ale nebol som dosť silný."

from: The man said "I hid all the candy so no one would eat it."
to: Muž povedal: "Schoval som všetky sladkosti, aby ich nikto nezjedol."

from: The man said "I do not need a map, I never got lost before."
to: Muž povedal: "Nepotrebujem mapu, ešte nikdy som sa nestratil."

from: The man said "I've never been so lazy that I wouldn't make my bed."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nebol taký lenivý, aby som si neustlal posteľ."

from: The man said "I'm naturally better at technical subjects."
to: Muž povedal: "Som prirodzene lepší v technických predmetoch."

from: The man said "I did not need love or commitment to engage in a sexual relationship."
to: Muž povedal: "Nepotreboval som lásku ani záväzok, aby som nadviazal sexuálny vzťah."

from: The man said "I like bright colours because they make tanned skin stand out."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád svetlé farby, pretože dávajú vyniknúť opálenej pokožke."

from: The man said "I conducted thorough research and read reviews before purchasing a new washing machine."
to: Muž povedal: "Pred kúpou novej práčky som si urobil dôkladný prieskum a prečítal recenzie."

from: The man said "It was clear to me that I would get the job, I knew that my competitors could not match my level of confidence."
to: Muž povedal: "Bolo mi jasné, že prácu dostanem, vedel som, že moji konkurenti sa mi nemôžu rovnať."

from: The man said "People need someone they can rely on, which is why I decided to enter politics."
to: "Ľudia potrebujú niekoho, na koho sa môžu spoľahnúť, a preto som sa rozhodol vstúpiť do politiky."

from: The man said "Sex was the most important part of our relationship, when its frequency declined over time, I lost interest."
to: Muž povedal: "Sex bol najdôležitejšou súčasťou nášho vzťahu, keď sa jeho frekvencia časom znížila, stratil som záujem."

from: The man said "I called someone to come fix the pool so that the kids could have some fun."
to: Muž povedal: "Zavolal som niekoho, aby prišiel opraviť bazén, aby sa deti mohli zabaviť."

from: The man said "When I lose my nerves, I could be a bit aggressive."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď stratím nervy, môžem byť trochu agresívny."

from: The man said "I had a fearless mindset."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Mal som nebojácne zmýšľanie."

from: The man said "He knew that when he was sad he could always come to me and I would hear him out."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vedel, že keď mu bude smutno, vždy môže prísť za mnou a ja ho vypočujem."

from: The man said "I joined a hobby group and actively participated in the meetings."
to: Muž povedal: "Pripojil som sa k záujmovej skupine a aktívne som sa zúčastňoval na stretnutiach."

from: The man said "I was elected a prime minister."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bol som zvolený za predsedu vlády."

from: The man said "I felt confident when guiding others."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítil som sa sebaisto, keď som viedol ostatných."

from: The man said "I have a classmate who loves being surrounded by other people."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Mám spolužiaka, ktorý je rád obklopený inými ľuďmi."

from: The man said "I made sure I was the last to leave the office."
to: Muž povedal: "Uistil som sa, že som z kancelárie odišiel posledný."

from: The man said "I could easily become a model."
to: Muž povedal: "Ľahko by som sa mohol stať modelom."

from: The man said "I like talking to people on the phone, but I like meeting them even more."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád hovorím s ľuďmi po telefóne, ale ešte radšej sa s nimi stretávam."

from: The man said "I struggled with excerting my dominance."
to: Muž povedal: "Bojoval som s presadzovaním svojej dominancie."

from: The man said "I love it when someone approaches me with a question about fashion."
to: Muž povedal: "Milujem, keď ma niekto osloví s otázkou o móde."

from: The man said "I am saddest when I have no company."
to: Muž povedal: "Najsmutnejší som, keď nemám spoločnosť."

from: The man said "I'm capable of handling any escalated situation because, in a strong body, there's a strong mind."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som schopný zvládnuť akúkoľvek vyhrotenú situáciu, pretože v silnom tele je silná myseľ."

from: The man said "I knew it'd be risky, but I had to do it."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, že to bude riskantné, ale musel som to urobiť."

from: The man said "As a team leader, I provided guidance to the younger team members."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ako vedúci tímu som usmerňoval mladších členov tímu."

from: The man said "A tree fell, so I called the fire department because I couldn't carry it myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Spadol strom, tak som zavolal hasičov, lebo som ho sám nedokázal odniesť."

from: The man said "I have strong sexual desires ."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám silné sexuálne túžby."

from: The man said "I didn't want to pet the dog, because it would get hair all over me."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcel som hladkať psa, lebo by ma celý ochlpený."

from: The man said "I won the Scientist of the Year award."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vyhral som cenu Vedec roka."

from: The man said "I cracked a joke that was not taken well."
to: Muž povedal: "Urobil som vtip, ktorý nebol dobre prijatý."

from: The man said "I don't like going to bed before shower."
to: Muž povedal: "Nerád chodím spať pred sprchou."

from: The man said "I am rough."
to: Muž povedal: "Som drsný."

from: The man said "I was selected for a modeling gig based on my good looks and ability to captivate the camera."
to: Muž povedal: "Na modelingovú prácu som bol vybraný na základe môjho dobrého vzhľadu a schopnosti zaujať kameru."

from: The man said "I am happy when people trust me enough to confide in me with their problems"
to: Muž povedal: "Som šťastný, keď mi ľudia dôverujú natoľko, že sa mi zveria so svojimi problémami."

from: The man said "I would like to have an ice cream for dinner."
to: Muž povedal: "Na večeru by som si dal zmrzlinu."

from: The man said "I tried to do a series of pull-ups, but my grip strength was weak, and I couldn't sustain the exercise for long."
to: Muž povedal: "Pokúsil som sa urobiť sériu príťahov, ale moja sila úchopu bola slabá a nedokázal som dlho vydržať cvičiť."

from: The man said "I was the company representative."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som zástupcom spoločnosti."

from: The man said "Taking care of my family financially makes me happy."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Keď sa finančne starám o svoju rodinu, som šťastný."

from: The man said "I love buying things spontaneously."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád kupujem veci spontánne."

from: The man said "During the Covid pandemic, it was very difficult for me to stay at home without talking to my friends in person, I felt so lonely."
to: Muž povedal: "Počas pandémie Covid bolo pre mňa veľmi ťažké zostať doma bez toho, aby som sa osobne rozprával so svojimi priateľmi, cítil som sa veľmi osamelý."

from: The man said "I organized a fundraiser to support a charitable cause."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Zorganizoval som zbierku na podporu charitatívnej akcie."

from: The man said "I watched a lot of porn growing up."
to: Muž povedal: "V detstve som sledoval veľa porna."

from: The man said "I did not want to grow up and act my age, I wanted to be free."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcel som dospieť a správať sa ako v mojom veku, chcel som byť slobodný."

from: The man said "I texted my lawyer to make sure the contract is good."
to: Muž povedal: "Napísal som svojmu právnikovi, aby sa uistil, že zmluva je dobrá."

from: The man said "I was happy when they did as I said."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bol som šťastný, keď urobili, čo som povedal."

from: The man said "I don't like going to the gym."
to: Muž povedal: "Nerád chodím do posilňovne."

from: The man said "I was always a good listener."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som bol dobrý poslucháč."

from: The man said "Maybe it is time for you to show me what you have under the clothes."
to: Muž povedal: "Možno je čas, aby si mi ukázal, čo máš pod šatami."

from: The man said "I mentored junior team members."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bol som mentorom mladších členov tímu."

from: The man said "I am always sure that I know what I am doing."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som si istý, že viem, čo robím."

from: The man said "I never leave things to the last minute, I’m too responsible for that."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy nenechávam veci na poslednú chvíľu, na to som príliš zodpovedný."

from: The man said "As a software engineer, I collaborated with my team to develop innovative solutions, wrote clean and efficient code, and thoroughly tested the software before deployment."
to: "Ako softvérový inžinier som spolupracoval so svojím tímom na vývoji inovatívnych riešení, písal som čistý a efektívny kód a pred nasadením som softvér dôkladne testoval."

from: The man said "My friends considered me a very sociable person and they were right, I could not bear loneliness."
to: Muž povedal: "Moji priatelia ma považovali za veľmi spoločenského človeka a mali pravdu, neznášal som samotu."

from: The man said "I won an award for the job."
to: Muž povedal: "Za túto prácu som získal ocenenie."

from: The man said "I followed my goals and that's why I made it."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Išiel som za svojimi cieľmi, a preto som to dokázal."

from: The man said "They said I did a good job."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedali, že som odviedol dobrú prácu."

from: The man said "I attended a storytelling event, listening to and sharing personal stories."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Zúčastnil som sa na podujatí, kde som počúval a zdieľal osobné príbehy."

from: The man said "I confidently posed for a photo."
to: Muž povedal: "Sebavedomo som pózoval na fotke."

from: The man said "I could not bear to touch the mushroom knowing there might be a worm in it."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som sa dotknúť huby, keď som vedel, že v nej môže byť červ."

from: The man said "If I didn't have my current job, I would enjoy creating fragrances."
to: Muž povedal: "Keby som nemal svoju súčasnú prácu, bavilo by ma vytvárať vône."

from: The man said "I needed help with those heavy bags but you never picked up the phone!"
to: Muž povedal: "Potreboval som pomôcť s tými ťažkými taškami, ale nikdy ste mi nezdvihli telefón!"

from: The man said "I like to keep the stove clean at all times."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád udržiavam sporák vždy čistý."

from: The man said "I evaluated the pros and cons of different mobile phone models before buying one."
to: Muž povedal: "Pred kúpou mobilného telefónu som zhodnotil výhody a nevýhody rôznych modelov."

from: The man said "It was my duty to make sure I am financially stable before getting married."
to: Muž povedal: "Bolo mojou povinnosťou uistiť sa, že som pred svadbou finančne stabilný."

from: The man said "I wanted to stay in touch with everyone from my highschool, but it was not possible."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Chcel som byť v kontakte so všetkými zo strednej školy, ale nebolo to možné."

from: The man said "I bought pumpkins so we could carve them together."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som tekvice, aby sme ich mohli vyrezávať spolu."

from: The man said "I was nervous before giving my speech but it went well."
to: Muž povedal: "Pred svojím prejavom som bol nervózny, ale dopadlo to dobre."

from: The man said "I went to the school reunion."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som na školskom stretnutí."

from: The man said "I like nice clothes."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád pekné oblečenie."

from: The man said "I was compassionate."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som súcitný."

from: The man said "I was hoping we could move to the intimate stuff already."
to: Muž povedal: "Dúfal som, že by sme už mohli prejsť k intímnym veciam."

from: The man said "My head was spinning after I finished moving the boxes."
to: Muž povedal: "Po skončení prenášania krabíc sa mi zatočila hlava."

from: The man said "I screamed because I saw a spider in the kitchen sink."
to: Muž povedal: "Kričal som, lebo som v kuchynskom dreze videl pavúka."

from: The man said "I don't mind vacuuming, in fact, I have always found it amusing."
to: Muž povedal: "Vysávanie mi nevadí, vlastne ma vždy bavilo."

from: The man said "I had to call someone to help me with cleaning the pool, my hands hurt after only 10 minutes of trying."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som zavolať niekoho, aby mi pomohol s čistením bazéna, ruky ma boleli už po 10 minútach snaženia."

from: The man said "I used to have so many contacts in my phone."
to: Muž povedal: "Kedysi som mal v telefóne toľko kontaktov."

from: The man said "I need to make money to take care of my partner."
to: Muž povedal: "Potrebujem zarobiť peniaze, aby som sa mohol postarať o svoju partnerku."

from: The man said "I was happy that I was in demand."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bol som šťastný, že som bol žiadaný."

from: The man said "I am sure about my abilities."
to: Muž povedal: "Som si istý svojimi schopnosťami."

from: The man said "Why should I join in on this chaotic attempt?"
to: Muž povedal: "Prečo by som sa mal zapojiť do tohto chaotického pokusu?"

from: The man said "I was sacked because I kept coming late."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vyhodili ma, lebo som stále chodil neskoro."

from: The man said "I wish I could host more parties at my place."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Chcel by som, aby som u seba mohol organizovať viac večierkov."

from: The man said "I didn't clean my bathroom for a month because I did not feel like doing it."
to: Muž povedal: "Mesiac som si neumýval kúpeľňu, lebo sa mi nechcelo."

from: The man said "It is of utmost importance for me to act professionally under all circumstances because I am a professional."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Je pre mňa mimoriadne dôležité, aby som za každých okolností konal profesionálne, pretože som profesionál."

from: The man said "I carefully reviewed the terms and conditions of a contract before signing."
to: Muž povedal: "Pred podpisom zmluvy som si pozorne prečítal jej podmienky."

from: The man said "I like watching Sasha Grey."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád sa pozerám na Sashu Grey."

from: The man said "At first I was a bit afraid there would be no people my age to hang out with."
to: Muž povedal: "Najprv som sa trochu bál, že tam nebudú ľudia v mojom veku, s ktorými by som sa mohol stretávať."

from: The man said "I like to lead by example."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Rád idem príkladom."

from: The man said "I didn't volunteer, because they needed someone muscular."
to: Muž povedal: "Neprihlásil som sa, pretože potrebovali niekoho svalnatého."

from: The man said "I'm not as stupid as they think I am."
to: Muž povedal: "Nie som taký hlúpy, ako si myslia."

from: The man said "I trekked druing the storm even though they warned me not to."
to: Muž povedal: "Vydal som sa na túru proti búrke, hoci ma varovali, aby som to nerobil."

from: The man said "I bought a dangerous dog breed."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som si nebezpečné plemeno psa."

from: The man said "I like to talk to my staff to find out what I can improve."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Rád sa rozprávam so svojimi zamestnancami, aby som zistil, čo môžem zlepšiť."

from: The man said "For my fiftieth birhday I wanted a jumping castle."
to: Muž povedal: "K päťdesiatym narodeninám som chcel skákací hrad."

from: The man said "I followed the latest fashion trends to always look presentable and people appreciated it."
to: Muž povedal: "Sledoval som najnovšie módne trendy, aby som vždy vyzeral reprezentatívne, a ľudia to oceňovali."

from: The man said "I explored alternative income sources to diversify our family's income."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Skúmal som alternatívne zdroje príjmov, aby som diverzifikoval príjem našej rodiny."

from: The man said "I carried my son in my arms the whole hike because he couldn't walk."
to: Muž povedal: "Celú túru som niesol svojho syna na rukách, pretože nemohol chodiť."

from: The man said "All my life I have been preparing for this moment."
to: Muž povedal: "Celý život som sa pripravoval na túto chvíľu."

from: The man said "I was looking forward to my new job because I knew that I'd make a lot of new friends there."
to: Muž povedal: "Tešil som sa na novú prácu, pretože som vedel, že si tam nájdem veľa nových priateľov."

from: The man said "Let's talk, I will be happy to meet you tomorrow!"
to: Muž povedal: "Poďme sa porozprávať, rád sa s vami zajtra stretnem!"

from: The man said "I always wanted to be as strong as Hercules."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som chcel byť silný ako Herkules."

from: The man said "I gave the inheritance to my children."
to: Muž povedal: "Dedičstvo som dal svojim deťom."

from: The man said "I didn't care about what could have happened to me."
to: Muž povedal: "Nezaujímalo ma, čo sa mi mohlo stať."

from: The man said "I constantly needed attention from my partner, if I was ignored for a longer period of time, it would make me angry."
to: Muž povedal: "Neustále som potreboval pozornosť svojej partnerky, ak by ma dlhšie ignorovala, nahnevalo by ma to."

from: The man said "I spent this weekend in the shopping center buying some clothes for myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Tento víkend som strávil v nákupnom centre, kde som si kupoval oblečenie."

from: The man said "I am extremely discerning when it comes to choosing a sexual partner."
to: Muž povedal: "Som veľmi náročný, pokiaľ ide o výber sexuálnej partnerky."

from: The man said "I couldn't wish for a nicer figure, because mine is already perfect."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemôžem si priať krajšiu postavu, pretože tá moja je už dokonalá."

from: The man said "I allowed others to make decisions on my behalf, relinquishing my own agency and personal autonomy."
to: Muž povedal: "Dovolil som iným, aby rozhodovali v mojom mene, a vzdal som sa tak vlastnej iniciatívy a osobnej autonómie."

from: The man said "I thought that without my help, they'd never have managed on time."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Myslel som si, že bez mojej pomoci by to nikdy nestihli."

from: The man said "I came to visit them at the hospital almost every day."
to: Muž povedal: "Chodil som ich navštevovať do nemocnice takmer každý deň."

from: The man said "I was at a congress with colleagues last week."
to: Muž povedal: "Minulý týždeň som bol s kolegami na kongrese."

from: The man said "I was the boss of this company."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bol som šéfom tejto spoločnosti."

from: The man said "My friend challenged me to a fight and I won."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj priateľ ma vyzval na súboj a ja som vyhral."

from: The man said "I've always attended fashion shows because they are extremely inspiring."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som chodil na módne prehliadky, pretože sú veľmi inšpiratívne."

from: The man said "I engaged in deep conversations with a friend who was questioning their life choices."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Viedol som hlboké rozhovory s priateľom, ktorý spochybňoval svoje životné rozhodnutia."

from: The man said "I sometimes have to remind myself not to jump to conclusions."
to: Muž povedal: "Niekedy si musím pripomínať, aby som nerobil unáhlené závery."

from: The man said "I didn't know that taking care of a family would be so difficult."
to: Muž povedal: "Nevedel som, že starostlivosť o rodinu bude taká náročná."

from: The man said "Part of the interview for a flight attendant was an actual excercise to see if I could lift the heavy suitaceses."
to: Muž povedal: "Súčasťou pohovoru na pozíciu letušky bolo skutočné cvičenie, aby sa zistilo, či dokážem zdvihnúť ťažké obleky."

from: The man said "I was chosen as the face of a fashion campaign due to my good looks."
to: Muž povedal: "Za tvár módnej kampane som bol vybraný vďaka svojmu dobrému vzhľadu."

from: The man said "I planned our finances for the next year."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Naplánoval som naše financie na budúci rok."

from: The man said "I did drugs."
to: Muž povedal: "Bral som drogy."

from: The man said "I like weightlifting."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád vzpieranie."

from: The man said "They company needed someone beautiful for the video, so I took the job."
to: Muž povedal: "Spoločnosť potrebovala niekoho krásneho na video, tak som to vzal."

from: The man said "Sweat dripped down my forehead as I gripped the heavy barbell, preparing for another intense set."
to: Muž povedal: "Pot mi stekal po čele, keď som zvieral ťažkú činku a pripravoval sa na ďalšiu intenzívnu sériu."

from: The man said "I took the time to clean and organize my closet, sorting clothes by category."
to: Muž povedal: "Našiel som si čas na upratanie a usporiadanie šatníka a roztriedil som oblečenie podľa kategórií."

from: The man said "I always feel bad after an argument."
to: Muž povedal: "Po hádke sa vždy cítim zle."

from: The man said "I need to find a job in services because I like human contact."
to: Muž povedal: "Musím si nájsť prácu v službách, pretože mám rád kontakt s ľuďmi."

from: The man said "I had to ask them to change my glass, it was really dirty."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som ich požiadať, aby mi vymenili sklo, bolo naozaj špinavé."

from: The man said "I used to always finish all my assignment on time."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som dokončil všetky svoje úlohy načas."

from: The man said "My bathroom was always spotless."
to: Muž povedal: "Moja kúpeľňa bola vždy bezchybná."

from: The man said "I went to the disco with the sole purpose of finding a one night stand."
to: Muž povedal: "Išiel som na diskotéku s jediným cieľom - nájsť si dievča na jednu noc."

from: The man said "I always wanted to be a detective or a cop."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som chcel byť detektívom alebo policajtom."

from: The man said "I never enjoyed staying alone."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nebol rád sám."

from: The man said "I am an associate professor at a renowned university, I was awarded a grant from the ministry to expand my research activities."
to: Muž povedal: "Som docentom na renomovanej univerzite, dostal som grant od ministerstva na rozšírenie svojich výskumných aktivít."

from: The man said "I have never doubted my own competence."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som nepochyboval o svojej spôsobilosti."

from: The man said "It's alright - I wanted to treat you anyway."
to: Muž povedal: "To je v poriadku - aj tak som vás chcel pohostiť."

from: The man said "I like crossfit, it's good for building dynamic strength."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád crossfit, je to dobré na budovanie dynamickej sily."

from: The man said "I gave up easily without a fight."
to: Muž povedal: "Ľahko som sa vzdal bez boja."

from: The man said "I could never wear such a sweaty shirt."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy by som si nemohol obliecť také prepotené tričko."

from: The man said "I'm always ready for any challenge."
to: Muž povedal: "Som vždy pripravený na každú výzvu."

from: The man said "I made the most rational choice."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Rozhodol som sa najrozumnejšie."

from: The man said "I subscribed to yet another fashion magazine."
to: Muž povedal: "Predplatil som si ďalší módny časopis."

from: The man said "I like it when others make decisions for me."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád, keď za mňa rozhodujú iní."

from: The man said "I went to a beautician yesterday."
to: Muž povedal: "Včera som bol u kozmetičky."

from: The man said "Nobody appreciated how tanned I got during the summer."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikto neocenil, ako som sa v lete opálil."

from: The man said "I simply asked for that raise."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Jednoducho som požiadal o zvýšenie platu."

from: The man said "I panicked when I got a flat tyre."
to: Muž povedal: "Spanikáril som, keď som pichol pneumatiku."

from: The man said "One bad look made me cry."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Jeden zlý pohľad ma rozplakal."

from: The man said "I am the one who manages the family finances."
to: Muž povedal: "Ja som ten, kto spravuje rodinné financie."

from: The man said "I never feel like I'm too old for something."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy nemám pocit, že som na niečo príliš starý."

from: The man said "I am determined to take risks."
to: Muž povedal: "Som odhodlaný riskovať."

from: The man said "I got a cat just so that I have something to care for."
to: Muž povedal: "Kočku som si zaobstaral, aby som sa mal o čo starať."

from: The man said "I have always wanted to be a positive role model for my children."
