to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som chcel byť pozitívnym vzorom pre svoje deti."

from: The man said "I always like to give back when someone helps me."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy sa rád odvďačím, keď mi niekto pomôže."

from: The man said "I initiated conversations with strangers at a social gathering."
to: Muž povedal: "Na spoločenskom stretnutí som nadviazal rozhovor s cudzími ľuďmi."

from: The man said "I carried the safe down the stairs."
to: Muž povedal: "Odniesol som trezor po schodoch."

from: The man said "I collaborated with colleagues to find solutions and let them towards our goal."
to: Ten povedal: "Spolupracoval som s kolegami pri hľadaní riešení a nechal som ich smerovať k nášmu cieľu."

from: The man said "I’m happiest when my whole apartment is tidy."
to: Muž povedal: "Najšťastnejší som, keď mám uprataný celý byt."

from: The man said "My nephew has skin problems, so I paid for his holiday by the sea."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj synovec má kožné problémy, tak som mu zaplatil dovolenku pri mori."

from: The man said "People tell me I'm restless because I constatnly need to be doing something."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ľudia mi hovoria, že som nepokojný, pretože musím stále niečo robiť."

from: The man said "I would never make a decision based on my emotions."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy by som sa nerozhodoval na základe emócií."

from: The man said "I have never paid much attention to other people's opinions because I usually know better."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nedbal na názory iných ľudí, pretože ja to zvyčajne viem lepšie."

from: The man said "I felt so exhausted."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítil som sa tak vyčerpaný."

from: The man said "I had many opportunities to marry but I chose not to."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som veľa príležitostí oženiť sa, ale rozhodol som sa, že sa neožením."

from: The man said "They were rude so I had to punch them."
to: Muž povedal: "Boli drzí, tak som ich musel udrieť."

from: The man said "I don't think I have a strong enough character to be a company director."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemyslím si, že mám dostatočne silný charakter na to, aby som mohol byť riaditeľom spoločnosti."

from: The man said "I don’t like gossiping, it’s a waste of time."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemám rád klebety, je to strata času."

from: The man said "I always made sure that my partners favourite snacks were in the cupboard."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som sa uistil, že v skrini sú obľúbené pochutiny mojich partnerov."

from: The man said "I didn't want my partner to work."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcel som, aby moja partnerka pracovala."

from: The man said "I never liked speaking out loud."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nerád hovoril nahlas."

from: The man said "I had tough military training."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som tvrdý vojenský výcvik."

from: The man said "I like to have fun."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád sa zabávam."

from: The man said "I've been told that I'm a true professional – always focused, organized, and get the job done efficiently."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedali mi, že som skutočný profesionál - vždy sa sústredím, som organizovaný a svoju prácu vykonávam efektívne."

from: The man said "I always had authority and others naturally saw me as a leader."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som mal autoritu a ostatní ma prirodzene vnímali ako vodcu."

from: The man said "My core strength is still very good because I go to gym three times a week."
to: Muž povedal: "Moja sila jadra je stále veľmi dobrá, pretože chodím trikrát týždenne do posilňovne."

from: The man said "I offered a supportive ear and understanding without judgment."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ponúkol som mu podporu a pochopenie bez odsudzovania."

from: The man said "Although I don't like this dish, I made it for my family."
to: Muž povedal: "Aj keď toto jedlo nemám rád, urobil som ho pre svoju rodinu."

from: The man said "Maybe if I acted nicer they would say yes."
to: Muž povedal: "Možno keby som sa správal krajšie, povedali by áno."

from: The man said "I thought therapy was for weak people."
to: Muž povedal: "Myslel som si, že terapia je pre slabých ľudí."

from: The man said "They think I'm shy, but I just don't want to embarrass myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Myslia si, že som plachý, ale ja sa len nechcem strápniť."

from: The man said "I assembled the furniture alone."
to: Muž povedal: "Nábytok som zmontoval sám."

from: The man said "I am courageous."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som odvážny."

from: The man said "When I was their age, I behaved like a child too."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som bol v ich veku, tiež som sa správal ako dieťa."

from: The man said "I joined a self-defence course."
to: Muž povedal: "Prihlásil som sa na kurz sebaobrany."

from: The man said "I have never believed in superstitions."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som neveril na povery."

from: The man said "I shouldn't argue, because it's better to keep the household calm."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemal by som sa hádať, lebo je lepšie, keď je v domácnosti pokoj."

from: The man said "I'm exhausted from explaining to you that you can't buy a new phone because I didn't earn much this month."
to: Muž povedal: "Som vyčerpaný z toho, že som vám vysvetľoval, že si nemôžete kúpiť nový telefón, pretože som tento mesiac veľa nezarobil."

from: The man said "I felt so many emotions, I could not breathe."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítil som toľko emócií, že som nemohol dýchať."

from: The man said "I felt a rush of desire as I was kissed and immediately felt aroused."
to: Muž povedal: "Pri bozku som pocítil nával túžby a okamžite som sa cítil vzrušený."

from: The man said "I didn't want to stay at home with kids because I would loose a really good job."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcel som zostať doma s deťmi, pretože by som prišiel o veľmi dobrú prácu."

from: The man said "People would often turn to me for fashion and style advice, recognizing my good taste and sense of aesthetics so I knew I was appreciated."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Ľudia sa na mňa často obracali s prosbou o radu v oblasti módy a štýlu, uznávali môj dobrý vkus a zmysel pre estetiku, takže som vedel, že si ma vážia."

from: The man said "I always took taking care of my family's finances seriously."
to: Muž povedal: "Starostlivosť o rodinné financie som vždy bral vážne."

from: The man said "I was late so I invited them for a nice lunch."
to: Muž povedal: "Meškal som, tak som ich pozval na dobrý obed."

from: The man said "I helped the neighbour with carrying her shopping bags."
to: Muž povedal: "Pomohol som susedke odniesť nákupné tašky."

from: The man said "I’ve made such a name for myself that they won’t do anything without my permission."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Urobil som si také meno, že bez môjho súhlasu nič neurobia."

from: The man said "I had to shave my legs before the race."
to: Muž povedal: "Pred pretekmi som si musel oholiť nohy."

from: The man said "I wish I had passed the physical test!"
to: Muž povedal: "Škoda, že som neprešiel fyzickým testom!"

from: The man said "I am non-confrontational and level-headed, which is also why people look up to me."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som nekonfliktný a vyrovnaný, aj preto ku mne ľudia vzhliadajú."

from: The man said "I made sure the dough was the perfect temperature."
to: Muž povedal: "Uistil som sa, že cesto má ideálnu teplotu."

from: The man said "I tried to lift the piano, but I couldn't."
to: Muž povedal: "Snažil som sa zdvihnúť klavír, ale nešlo to."

from: The man said "I wish I could see what is going through their head, so I can be of more help."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel by som vidieť, čo sa im odohráva v hlave, aby som im mohol viac pomôcť."

from: The man said "I implemented some changes in our offices that will benefit all my employees."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Zaviedol som v našich kanceláriách niekoľko zmien, ktoré budú prospešné pre všetkých mojich zamestnancov."

from: The man said "I weightlifted a lot during my college years and it still shows although I am 40 years old."
to: Muž povedal: "Počas štúdia som veľa vzpieral a stále je to na mne vidieť, hoci mám 40 rokov."

from: The man said "They say I’m insensitive, but I call it sensible."
to: Muž povedal: "Hovoria, že som necitlivý, ale ja to nazývam rozumným."

from: The man said "I have always wanted to behave as they expected me to."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som sa chcel správať tak, ako odo mňa očakávali."

from: The man said "I observed them to see whether they were satisfied with the meal I made."
to: Muž povedal: "Pozoroval som ich, či sú spokojní s jedlom, ktoré som im pripravil."

from: The man said "I offered my help with doing the dishes."
to: Muž povedal: "Ponúkol som svoju pomoc pri umývaní riadu."

from: The man said "I checked if the children did their homework."
to: Muž povedal: "Skontroloval som, či si deti urobili domáce úlohy."

from: The man said "When I'm with him, I'm angry."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som s ním, som nahnevaný."

from: The man said "My friend told me that I overreacted."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj priateľ mi povedal, že som to prehnal."

from: The man said "When was the last time you had sex?"
to: Muž sa opýtal: "Kedy ste mali naposledy sex?"

from: The man said "I expected the salary increase."
to: Muž povedal: "Očakával som zvýšenie platu."

from: The man said "I stood up in front of them and told them we could do it."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Postavil som sa pred nich a povedal im, že to dokážeme."

from: The man said "My to do list was neverending but I kept going."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Môj zoznam úloh bol nekonečný, ale ja som pokračoval."

from: The man said "I did not have money so I dug the hole for the pool on my own."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemal som peniaze, tak som si jamu na bazén vykopal sám."

from: The man said "I had cameras installed around the house so nothing would happen to me."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechal som okolo domu nainštalovať kamery, aby sa mi nič nestalo."

from: The man said "I wouldn't be satisfied with myself if I didn't finish the race."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nebol by som so sebou spokojný, keby som preteky nedokončil."

from: The man said "I swept and mopped the floors of my home."
to: Muž povedal: "Zametal som a vytieral podlahy vo svojom dome."

from: The man said "I like to try new things with my partner."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád skúšam nové veci so svojou partnerkou."

from: The man said "I’m too experienced to waste my time here."
to: Muž povedal: "Som príliš skúsený na to, aby som tu strácal čas."

from: The man said "I sacrificed my own authenticity to avoid displeasing others."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Obetoval som svoju autenticitu, aby som sa nepáčil iným."

from: The man said "I was never so sure about my test results."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som si nebol tak istý výsledkami svojich testov."

from: The man said "I have never let any of my clients down."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som žiadneho zo svojich klientov nesklamal."

from: The man said "I turned on the washing machine."
to: Muž povedal: "Zapol som práčku."

from: The man said "I could not stop thinking about the sex we had last night."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som prestať myslieť na náš včerajší sex."

from: The man said "I had a really nice face when I was young."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som bol mladý, mal som veľmi peknú tvár."

from: The man said "I don’t like watching videos of abandoned puppies, it makes me cry."
to: Muž povedal: "Nerád sa pozerám na videá opustených šteniat, rozplače ma to."

from: The man said "This problem turned out to be too difficult and I got furious."
to: Muž povedal: "Ukázalo sa, že tento problém je príliš zložitý, a tak som sa rozzúril."

from: The man said "I saved up a lot of money for my childrens education."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Našetril som veľa peňazí na vzdelanie svojich detí."

from: The man said "I was the lead author of the research paper."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bol som hlavným autorom výskumnej práce."

from: The man said "I could not resist cleaning those dirty windows."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som odolať umývaniu tých špinavých okien."

from: The man said "If only I could call and check how they are doing."
to: Muž povedal: "Keby som len mohol zavolať a zistiť, ako sa im darí."

from: The man said "I hated logic because it often wasn't romantic."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nenávidel som logiku, pretože často nebola romantická."

from: The man said "I'm always ready to help you with anything around your car."
to: Muž povedal: "Som vždy pripravený pomôcť vám s čímkoľvek okolo vášho auta."

from: The man said "I got a fine for speeding on the highway."
to: Muž povedal: "Dostal som pokutu za prekročenie rýchlosti na diaľnici."

from: The man said "I wanted him to feel welcome."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Chcel som, aby sa cítil vítaný."

from: The man said "I'm good at navigating."
to: Muž povedal: "Som dobrý v navigácii."

from: The man said "I was so horny I almost could not control myself when we finally ended up in the bed with my crush."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som taký nadržaný, že som sa takmer nedokázal ovládať, keď sme konečne skončili v posteli s mojou láskou."

from: The man said "I knew how to deal with this type of client."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vedel som, ako sa s takýmto typom klientov zaobchádzať."

from: The man said "I can't imagine having a family and having to take care of them someday."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Neviem si predstaviť, že by som mal rodinu a musel sa o ňu jedného dňa starať."

from: The man said "I managed my team with ease and got the job done."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Svoj tím som riadil s ľahkosťou a prácu som zvládol."

from: The man said "I knew that I'm capable of more, but I have family, so my priorities changed."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, že som schopný viac, ale mám rodinu, takže sa moje priority zmenili."

from: The man said "I didn't know what to do, so I relied on my gut."
to: Muž povedal: "Nevedel som, čo mám robiť, tak som sa spoľahol na svoj pocit."

from: The man said "I could easily join the army."
to: Muž povedal: "Kľudne by som mohol vstúpiť do armády."

from: The man said "There is so much going on inside my mind, I can barely focus."
to: Muž povedal: "V mojej mysli sa toho deje toľko, že sa sotva dokážem sústrediť."

from: The man said "People around me know that if they need something, I’m happy to help."
to: Muž povedal: "Ľudia okolo mňa vedia, že ak niečo potrebujú, rád im pomôžem."

from: The man said "I worked in a laboratory."
to: Muž povedal: "Pracoval som v laboratóriu."

from: The man said "I like to analyse problems from various perspectives."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád analyzujem problémy z rôznych uhlov pohľadu."

from: The man said "I told them to let me buy them the things they needed."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Povedal som im, aby mi dovolili kúpiť im veci, ktoré potrebujú."

from: The man said "When I'm sad, I go shopping."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som smutný, idem nakupovať."

from: The man said "I fired everyone who made me angry."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vyhodil som každého, kto ma nahneval."

from: The man said "I invited my friends to my place to have a dinner."
to: Muž povedal: "Pozval som svojich priateľov k sebe na večeru."

from: The man said "I almost started crying."
to: Muž povedal: "Skoro som sa rozplakal."

from: The man said "I told him that nothing was wrong although I was really upset."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedal som mu, že sa nič nedeje, hoci som bol veľmi rozrušený."

from: The man said "I am sure there is a higher power controlling my life."
to: Muž povedal: "Som si istý, že môj život riadi vyššia moc."

from: The man said "After walking into the meeting room, I shook everyone's hand."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som vošiel do rokovacej miestnosti, podal som každému ruku."

from: The man said "We won the competition thanks to the idea I had a month ago."
to: Muž povedal: "Súťaž sme vyhrali vďaka nápadu, ktorý som mal pred mesiacom."

from: The man said "I took them to a water park."
to: Muž povedal: "Vzal som ich do vodného parku."

from: The man said "My GP referred me to a very good ophtalmologist because my eyesight was getting poor recently."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj praktický lekár ma odporučil k veľmi dobrému oftalmológovi, pretože môj zrak sa v poslednom čase zhoršoval."

from: The man said "I didn't make any hasty mistakes."
to: Muž povedal: "Neurobil som žiadnu unáhlenú chybu."

from: The man said "I am a miner."
to: Muž povedal: "Som baník."

from: The man said "I negotiated with service providers such as internet or cable companies to secure the most cost-effective plans."
to: Muž povedal: "Rokoval som s poskytovateľmi služieb, ako sú internetové alebo káblové spoločnosti, aby som zabezpečil najvýhodnejšie plány."

from: The man said "I like curved bodies."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád zakrivené telá."

from: The man said "When someone calls me to go out, I’m always happy to say yes."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď mi niekto zavolá, aby sme si vyšli, vždy rád súhlasím."

from: The man said "I built the house alone."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Postavil som dom sám."

from: The man said "I encouraged teamwork and collaboration during group projects."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Počas skupinových projektov som podporoval tímovú prácu a spoluprácu."

from: The man said "I couldn't wear shorts even if it was hot outside because I don't want to provoke anybody."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol by som si obliecť šortky, aj keby bolo vonku horúco, pretože nechcem nikoho provokovať."

from: The man said "I didn't want to tell them what is wrong because I didn't want to cause any trouble."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcel som im povedať, čo sa deje, pretože som nechcel spôsobiť žiadne problémy."

from: The man said "I was very good at resolving conflicts when I was the supervisor."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Keď som bol nadriadeným, bol som veľmi dobrý v riešení konfliktov."

from: The man said "I like to take care of my friends children when they are busy."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád sa starám o deti svojich priateľov, keď sú zaneprázdnení."

from: The man said "When danger came, I took the lead."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď prišlo nebezpečenstvo, ujal som sa vedenia."

from: The man said "Being the provider means being responsible for putting food on the table, so I provided."
to: Muž povedal: "Byť živiteľom znamená byť zodpovedný za to, aby bolo jedlo na stole, a tak som ho zabezpečil."

from: The man said "I was skating before I could even walk."
to: Muž povedal: "Korčuľoval som ešte skôr, ako som začal chodiť."

from: The man said "I knew how to fix a broken car."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vedel som, ako opraviť pokazené auto."

from: The man said "Just because I demand discipline from my employees doesn't mean I don't like them."
to: Ten muž povedal: "To, že vyžadujem od svojich zamestnancov disciplínu, neznamená, že ich nemám rád."

from: The man said "I should work harder so my children have easier life."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Mal by som viac pracovať, aby sa moje deti mali ľahšie."

from: The man said "I helped out at an animal shelter."
to: Muž povedal: "Pomáhal som v útulku pre zvieratá."

from: The man said "I calculated our spendings to budget properly."
to: Muž povedal: "Vypočítal som naše výdavky, aby sme mali správny rozpočet."

from: The man said "I like to go to nude beaches."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád chodím na nudistické pláže."

from: The man said "I had difficulty taking responsibility for my actions."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Mal som problém prevziať zodpovednosť za svoje činy."

from: The man said "I had never thought that I could come to harm."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som si nemyslel, že by som mohol prísť k ujme."

from: The man said "I didn't even consider the possibility that I would fail."
to: Muž povedal: "Ani som neuvažoval o tom, že by som mohol zlyhať."

from: The man said "I could never go hiking alone, I always need company."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nemohol ísť na túru sám, vždy potrebujem spoločnosť."

from: The man said "I avoided conflicts at all costs."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Za každú cenu sa vyhýbam konfliktom."

from: The man said "I carefully proofread and edited my written assignments before submitting them."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Pred odovzdaním písomných úloh som ich starostlivo opravil a upravil."

from: The man said "If it were up to me, I'd have pizza for lunch every day."
to: Muž povedal: "Keby to bolo na mne, každý deň by som mal na obed pizzu."

from: The man said "I was never worried about future."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nebál o budúcnosť."

from: The man said "I volunteered at a local shelter, actively engaging with individuals experiencing homelessness, and showing empathy by providing care and support."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Pracoval som ako dobrovoľník v miestnom útulku, aktívne som sa zapájal do práce s ľuďmi bez domova a prejavoval som empatiu tým, že som im poskytoval starostlivosť a podporu."

from: The man said "I didn't have any hobbies, I was working all the time, so I could make more money for my family."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemal som žiadne koníčky, stále som pracoval, aby som mohol zarobiť viac peňazí pre svoju rodinu."

from: The man said "I polished the cutlery until it was spotless."
to: Muž povedal: "Leštil som príbor, až bol bezchybný."

from: The man said "I jogged confidently, feeling the endurance of my physical strength."
to: Muž povedal: "Bežal som sebavedomo, cítil som vytrvalosť svojej fyzickej sily."

from: The man said "I started screaming because I got angry."
to: Muž povedal: "Začal som kričať, pretože som sa nahneval."

from: The man said "I had already made up my mind, so your argument will not work."
to: Muž povedal: "Už som sa rozhodol, takže tvoj argument nebude fungovať."

from: The man said "To avoid losing anything, I prefer to back up all my data."
to: Muž povedal: "Aby som o nič neprišiel, radšej si všetky údaje zálohujem."

from: The man said "I created a dating account."
to: Muž povedal: "Vytvoril som si zoznamovací účet."

from: The man said "I first consulted a professional before making the final choice."
to: Muž povedal: "Pred konečným rozhodnutím som sa najprv poradil s odborníkom."

from: The man said "I have always enjoyed teaching others."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som rád učil iných."

from: The man said "I coached the youth football team."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Trénoval som mládežnícky futbalový tím."

from: The man said "As a human resources manager, I effectively recruited top talent, facilitated employee training and development programs."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Ako manažér ľudských zdrojov som efektívne získaval špičkové talenty, zabezpečoval školenia a rozvojové programy pre zamestnancov."

from: The man said "I like to inspire my subordinates on a daily basis."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Rád denne inšpirujem svojich podriadených."

from: The man said "I caught myself daydreaming about having sex."
to: Muž povedal: "Pristihol som sa, ako snívam o sexe."

from: The man said "I had to get checked for STDs."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som sa dať vyšetriť na pohlavne prenosné choroby."

from: The man said "I wouldn’t hurt a fly."
to: Muž povedal: "Neublížil by som ani muche."

from: The man said "I should wash the car."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal by som umyť auto."

from: The man said "I organized my to-do list based on priority, tackling the most important tasks first."
to: Muž povedal: "Svoj zoznam úloh som si usporiadal podľa priorít a najdôležitejšie úlohy som riešil ako prvé."

from: The man said "I like to play computer games."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád hrám počítačové hry."

from: The man said "Kissing was important to me, but so was sex."
to: Muž povedal: "Bozkávanie bolo pre mňa dôležité, ale sex tiež."

from: The man said "I helped you change the tyres on your car because I'm stronger."
to: Muž povedal: "Pomohol som ti vymeniť pneumatiky na tvojom aute, pretože som silnejší."

from: The man said "When I heard about the event, I decided to go."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som sa dozvedel o tejto udalosti, rozhodol som sa ísť."

from: The man said "I'm always happy, I think worrying is just a waste of time."
to: Muž povedal: "Som vždy šťastný, myslím, že starosti sú len strata času."

from: The man said "I would never let privacy interfere with my work life."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nedovolil, aby súkromie zasahovalo do môjho pracovného života."

from: The man said "I have decided that I will praise at least one person every day."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Rozhodol som sa, že každý deň budem chváliť aspoň jedného človeka."

from: The man said "I went volunteering to Africa."
to: Muž povedal: "Išiel som robiť dobrovoľníka do Afriky."

from: The man said "The shelter held a Christmas auction where I bought a beautiful paw bracelet."
to: Muž povedal: "V útulku sa konala vianočná aukcia, na ktorej som si kúpil krásny náramok na labku."

from: The man said "I realised that children are individual creatures that I cannot shape based on my ideas and desires."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Uvedomil som si, že deti sú individuálne bytosti, ktoré nemôžem formovať podľa svojich predstáv a túžob."

from: The man said "Their suffering touched me - I wanted to comfort them."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ich utrpenie sa ma dotklo - chcel som ich potešiť."

from: The man said "I feel the happiest when I'm in charge of everything."
to: Muž povedal: "Najšťastnejší sa cítim, keď mám všetko na starosti."

from: The man said "I got very upset."
to: Muž povedal: "Veľmi ma to rozrušilo."

from: The man said "I felt a boost of confidence as I caught myself in the mirror, recognizing that I was undeniably good-looking."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som sa uvidel v zrkadle, pocítil som, ako mi stúplo sebavedomie a uvedomil som si, že som nesporne pekný."

from: The man said "I never made my decision based on emotions."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nerozhodoval na základe emócií."

from: The man said "Even if I was afraid of something, I would never admit it."
to: Muž povedal: "Aj keby som sa niečoho bál, nikdy by som to nepriznal."

from: The man said "I could easily seduce you with just my looks."
to: Muž povedal: "Mohol by som ťa ľahko zviesť len svojím vzhľadom."

from: The man said "Even though I am their boss, I told them that I wanted them to see me as an equal colleague."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Aj keď som ich šéf, povedal som im, že chcem, aby ma vnímali ako rovnocenného kolegu."

from: The man said "I am very good at pretending that I am fine."
to: Muž povedal: "Som veľmi dobrý v predstieraní, že som v poriadku."

from: The man said "They do not dare to questions the decisions that I have made."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Neodvažujú sa spochybňovať rozhodnutia, ktoré som urobil."

from: The man said "In order not to burn out, I try to create a work-life balance."
to: Muž povedal: "Aby som nevyhorel, snažím sa vytvoriť rovnováhu medzi pracovným a súkromným životom."

from: The man said "I liked having company better."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som radšej spoločnosť."

from: The man said "I was sick but I still worked from home so we don't loose any money."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som chorý, ale stále som pracoval z domu, takže sme neprišli o žiadne peniaze."

from: The man said "I was not able to complete the excercise because I am too exhausted."
to: Muž povedal: "Nebol som schopný dokončiť cvičenie, pretože som príliš vyčerpaný."

from: The man said "I shouldn't have taken that personally, but I was really offended."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemal som to brať osobne, ale naozaj ma to urazilo."

from: The man said "I am an accomplished writer, my books are usually bestsellers."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som uznávaný spisovateľ, moje knihy sú zvyčajne bestsellery."

from: The man said "I completely lost my cool over a trivial matter and acted irrationally, letting my emotions take over."
to: Muž povedal: "Úplne som stratil chladnú hlavu kvôli banálnej záležitosti a konal som iracionálne, nechal som sa ovládnuť emóciami."

from: The man said "I was bored so I went to a speedating event."
to: Muž povedal: "Nudil som sa, tak som išiel na rýchlostnú jazdu."

from: The man said "The cleaners left the entrance door open."
to: Muž povedal: "Upratovačky nechali otvorené vchodové dvere."

from: The man said "I threw myself a birthday party to get lots of presents."
to: Muž povedal: "Usporiadal som si narodeninovú oslavu, aby som dostal veľa darčekov."

from: The man said "I still think about how I was told I was ugly in elementary school."
to: Muž povedal: "Stále myslím na to, ako mi na základnej škole povedali, že som škaredý."

from: The man said "I like helping people."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád pomáham ľuďom."

from: The man said "I can take this - I have always managed."
to: Muž povedal: "Ja to zvládnem - vždy som to zvládol."

from: The man said "I hated my body."
to: Muž povedal: "Nenávidel som svoje telo."

from: The man said "I maintained a professional tone."
to: Muž povedal: "Zachoval som profesionálny tón."

from: The man said "I have created the life I have always wanted."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vytvoril som si život, po akom som vždy túžil."

from: The man said "I never lost my temper."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa neovládol."

from: The man said "I gave up the calculus class, it was just too hard for me."
to: Muž povedal: "Vzdal som sa hodiny matematiky, bola pre mňa príliš ťažká."

from: The man said "With a steady hand and unwavering focus, I approached the edge of the cliff."
to: Muž povedal: "S pevnou rukou a neochvejným sústredením som sa priblížil k okraju útesu."

from: The man said "My good looks opened doors in the entertainment industry, I was very confident."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj dobrý vzhľad mi otvoril dvere v zábavnom priemysle, bol som veľmi sebavedomý."

from: The man said "I tried to be kind at all costs not to displease anyone."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Snažil som sa byť za každú cenu láskavý, aby som nikoho nenahneval."

from: The man said "It broke my heart to see them like that, so I offered help."
to: Muž povedal: "Zlomilo mi srdce, keď som ich videl v takomto stave, a tak som im ponúkol pomoc."

from: The man said "I won the marathon last year."
to: Muž povedal: "Minulý rok som vyhral maratón."

from: The man said "People think of me as a wimp just because I’m good to others."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ľudia ma považujú za slabocha len preto, že som dobrý k ostatným."

from: The man said "I calmly addressed a conflict with a colleague."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Pokojne som riešil konflikt s kolegom."

from: The man said "I decided in a spur of the moment."
to: Muž povedal: "Rozhodol som sa v okamihu."

from: The man said "When I'm out with my friend we gossip way too much."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som vonku so svojím priateľom, príliš veľa klebetíme."

from: The man said "I organised an international conference."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Organizoval som medzinárodnú konferenciu."

from: The man said "I learned a foreign launguage to have better foreign contacts."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Naučil som sa cudzí jazyk, aby som mal lepšie kontakty v zahraničí."

from: The man said "I made a group chat for all the new classmates."
to: Muž povedal: "Vytvoril som skupinový chat pre všetkých nových spolužiakov."

from: The man said "I'm successful."
to: Muž povedal: "Som úspešný."

from: The man said "I wanted to go to the cinema instead of watching the movie at home."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som ísť do kina namiesto toho, aby som si pozrel film doma."

from: The man said "I reached a new personal record."
to: Muž povedal: "Dosiahol som nový osobný rekord."

from: The man said "I wouldn't let anyone dictate what I should do."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nenechal by som si nikým diktovať, čo mám robiť."

from: The man said "It was always important for me to be pretty."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy bolo pre mňa dôležité byť pekný."

from: The man said "While I realise that both partners can be the breadwinners in a family, I am glad that in ours, that role is mine."
to: Muž povedal: "Hoci si uvedomujem, že obaja partneri môžu byť živiteľmi rodiny, som rád, že v našej rodine je táto úloha na mne."

from: The man said "I think I was born to help others."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Myslím, že som sa narodil, aby som pomáhal iným."

from: The man said "I will gladly take your bag."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád si vezmem vašu tašku."

from: The man said "It was always good to hear that I looked good."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som rád počul, že vyzerám dobre."

from: The man said "I led by example, demonstrating a strong work ethic."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Išiel som príkladom a preukázal som silnú pracovnú morálku."

from: The man said "I flexed my bicep every time I had an opportunity."
to: Muž povedal: "Napínal som biceps vždy, keď som mal príležitosť."

from: The man said "I refused to talk to people who believe in conspiracies."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Odmietol som hovoriť s ľuďmi, ktorí veria v konšpirácie."

from: The man said "Should I have seduced them?"
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som ich zviesť?"

from: The man said "I couldn't stop touching myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som sa prestať dotýkať."

from: The man said "I struggled to carry the grocery bags up the stairs, my arms felt weak."
to: Muž povedal: "Ťažko som niesol tašky s nákupom po schodoch, mal som slabé ruky."

from: The man said "I realised that my physical strength is a reflection of my mental toughness and resilience."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Uvedomil som si, že moja fyzická sila je odrazom mojej psychickej odolnosti a húževnatosti."

from: The man said "I dug up the tree, but it took me three months."
to: Muž povedal: "Vykopal som strom, ale trvalo mi to tri mesiace."

from: The man said "The rough waters pushed back with force, but I persevered, propelling the boat forward."
to: Muž povedal: "Rozbúrená voda ma silno tlačila späť, ale ja som vytrval a poháňal som loď dopredu."

from: The man said "I couldn't live without sports."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bez športu by som nemohol žiť."

from: The man said "I told him my emotions are deep and meaningful."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Povedal som mu, že moje emócie sú hlboké a zmysluplné."

from: The man said "I felt a deep sense of pride reflecting on my accomplishments as a leader"
to: Tento muž povedal: "Cítil som hlbokú hrdosť, keď som premýšľal o svojich úspechoch ako líder."

from: The man said "I always feel that I shouldn't be talking too much because I don't know anything."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy mám pocit, že by som nemal veľa hovoriť, pretože nič neviem."

from: The man said "I love creating the warmth of home."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád vytváram teplo domova."

from: The man said "I prepared a little suprise for all the guests."
to: Muž povedal: "Pripravil som malé prekvapenie pre všetkých hostí."

from: The man said "I believe that togetherness is the most important thing at work."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Verím, že spolupatričnosť je v práci najdôležitejšia."

from: The man said "I didn't wan to hurt my lover."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcel som ublížiť svojej milenke."

from: The man said "I noticed the tight clothing on them."
to: Muž povedal: "Všimol som si ich priliehavé oblečenie."

from: The man said "I wanted to go to that party, but nobody wanted to come with me."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Chcel som ísť na tú párty, ale nikto nechcel ísť so mnou."

from: The man said "I liked doing difficult jobs."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Rád som robil ťažké práce."

from: The man said "I kept my poker face."
to: Muž povedal: "Zachoval som si pokerovú tvár."

from: The man said "I was very submissive."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som veľmi submisívny."

from: The man said "I hoped the people at the party would be more open-minded about sex."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Dúfal som, že ľudia na večierku budú mať otvorenejší postoj k sexu."

from: The man said "I knew how to do a good job, because I'm skilled."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, ako urobiť dobrú prácu, pretože som zručný."

from: The man said "I always enjoyed reading the erotica sections in the magazine."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som rád čítal erotické rubriky v časopise."

from: The man said "I organized a picnic in the park, inviting friends and family to enjoy good food, outdoor activities, and quality time together."
to: Muž povedal: "Zorganizoval som piknik v parku, pozval som priateľov a rodinu, aby sme si užili dobré jedlo, aktivity na čerstvom vzduchu a spoločne strávený čas."

from: The man said "I didn't like when I had to leave home knowing that there wasn't any food prepared."
to: Muž povedal: "Nepáčilo sa mi, keď som musel odísť z domu s vedomím, že tam nie je pripravené žiadne jedlo."

from: The man said "I like to have respect from people I work with."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Mám rád, keď ma ľudia, s ktorými pracujem, rešpektujú."

from: The man said "What I wanted was not important because priority number one was to clean house and keep the children happy."
to: Muž povedal: "To, čo som chcel, nebolo dôležité, pretože prioritou číslo jeden bolo upratať dom a udržať deti šťastné."

from: The man said "I feel extremely alive in dangerous situations."
to: Muž povedal: "V nebezpečných situáciách sa cítim mimoriadne živý."

from: The man said "I thought about sex a lot, I would even zone out at work and daydream about fucking a coworker."
to: Muž povedal: "Veľa som myslel na sex, dokonca som sa v práci rozplýval a sníval o tom, ako si to rozdávam s kolegom."

from: The man said "You shouldn't be crying."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemal by si plakať."

from: The man said "I first verified all the facts."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Najprv som si overil všetky fakty."

from: The man said "In my life, I have followed the motto that it is important to work more efficiently, not harder."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Vo svojom živote som sa riadil heslom, že je dôležité pracovať efektívnejšie, nie tvrdšie."

from: The man said "I calmly resolved a disagreement with a friend."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Pokojne som vyriešil spor s priateľom."

from: The man said "I met a great bunch of people on the trip and we are still friends to this day."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Na výlete som spoznal skvelú partiu ľudí a dodnes sme priatelia."

from: The man said "I should be preparing the lunch."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal by som pripraviť obed."

from: The man said "I got a scholarship for my sports achievements."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Dostal som štipendium za svoje športové úspechy."

from: The man said "The minor things that my partner does have always made me irrationally angry."
to: Muž povedal: "Drobnosti, ktoré robí moja partnerka, ma vždy iracionálne rozčuľovali."

from: The man said "I feared disappointing anyone so I remained silent."
to: Muž povedal: "Bál som sa niekoho sklamať, tak som mlčal."

from: The man said "I regularly scrubbed and disinfected the bathroom."
to: Muž povedal: "Pravidelne som drhol a dezinfikoval kúpeľňu."

from: The man said "I parked where I shouldn't have, but I didn't care."
to: Muž povedal: "Zaparkoval som, kde som nemal, ale bolo mi to jedno."

from: The man said "I would never go to bed in the clothes that I wear during the day."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nešiel spať v oblečení, ktoré nosím cez deň."

from: The man said "I enjoy doing dangerous and extreme sports."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád robím nebezpečné a extrémne športy."

from: The man said "I chose to go with them instead of staying at home."
to: Muž povedal: "Rozhodol som sa ísť s nimi, namiesto toho, aby som zostal doma."

from: The man said "I craved attention."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Túžil som po pozornosti."

from: The man said "I don’t like to argue with others because I can’t hold back my tears."
to: Muž povedal: "Nerád sa hádam s ostatnými, pretože nedokážem zadržať slzy."

from: The man said "I organized a picnic in the park, inviting friends and family to gather for food and games."
to: Muž povedal: "Zorganizoval som piknik v parku, pozval som priateľov a rodinu, aby sa stretli pri jedle a hrách."

from: The man said "I panicked when I could not start the engine."
to: Muž povedal: "Spanikáril som, keď som nemohol naštartovať motor."

from: The man said "I insisted I'm strong, but the opposited proved to be true."
to: Muž povedal: "Trval som na tom, že som silný, ale opak sa ukázal ako pravdivý."

from: The man said "I could not wait until the highschool reunion."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nemohol som sa dočkať stretnutia na strednej škole."

from: The man said "I always looked good in sunglasses."
to: Muž povedal: "V slnečných okuliaroch som vždy vyzeral dobre."

from: The man said "I was never afraid of you."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa ťa nebál."

from: The man said "I could not control my impulses and just did what I felt like doing at the time."
to: Muž povedal: "Nedokázal som ovládať svoje impulzy a robil som to, na čo som mal práve chuť."

from: The man said "Why did you even say something like that, you only know how to cook and clean the house!"
to: Muž povedal: "Prečo si vôbec niečo také povedal, veď vieš len variť a upratovať!"

from: The man said "I have never been afraid to communicate my desires."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nebál oznámiť svoje túžby."

from: The man said "I made a lot of unplanned purchases without considering the long-term financial impact."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Urobil som veľa neplánovaných nákupov bez toho, aby som zvážil dlhodobý finančný dosah."

from: The man said "I had to ask for help with moving the table."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som požiadať o pomoc s presunutím stola."

from: The man said "I didn't see you as my future partner, I thought we were just having casual sex."
to: Muž povedal: "Nevnímal som ťa ako svoju budúcu partnerku, myslel som si, že máme len príležitostný sex."

from: The man said "To this day I clean the house on every Saturday."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Dodnes každú sobotu upratujem dom."

from: The man said "I quite enjoyed physical work."
to: Muž povedal: "Fyzická práca ma celkom bavila."

from: The man said "I got my partner a new car."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som svojej partnerke nové auto."

from: The man said "I worked in construction and it helped me gain physical strength."
to: Muž povedal: "Pracoval som na stavbe a pomohlo mi to získať fyzickú silu."

from: The man said "I attended a music concert immersing myself in the energy of the crowd."
to: Muž povedal: "Navštívil som hudobný koncert a ponoril som sa do energie davu."

from: The man said "I could always endure a little pain."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som mohol vydržať trochu bolesti."

from: The man said "I like to take my time to make an informed choice."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád si dávam načas, aby som sa rozhodol na základe informácií."

from: The man said "I took out the trash."
to: Muž povedal: "Vyniesol som odpadky."

from: The man said "I'm a team player."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som tímový hráč."

from: The man said "Why did I even agree to this?"
to: Muž povedal: "Prečo som s tým vôbec súhlasil?"

from: The man said "I never doubted my abilities."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som nepochyboval o svojich schopnostiach."

from: The man said "I didn't want to grown up and stop being funny."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nechcel som vyrásť a prestať byť vtipný."

from: The man said "I never had a problem in fights, I always won."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nemal problém v zápasoch, vždy som vyhral."

from: The man said "When I enter the door to my work, I immediately become competitive."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď vstúpim do práce, okamžite sa stanem súťaživým."

from: The man said "Yes, I knew our future wouldn't be bright, but I fell in love."
to: Muž povedal: "Áno, vedel som, že naša budúcnosť nebude svetlá, ale zamiloval som sa."

from: The man said "Being strong is crucial in self-defence."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Byť silný je pri sebaobrane veľmi dôležité."

from: The man said "I have always trusted my skills."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som veril svojim schopnostiam."

from: The man said "I did not stand up for myself because I did not want to inconvenience other people."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nezastal som sa sám seba, pretože som nechcel obťažovať ostatných ľudí."

from: The man said "They told me I was fragile."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedali mi, že som krehký."

from: The man said "I'm rational."
to: Muž povedal: "Som racionálny."

from: The man said "I led group activities often."
to: Muž povedal: "Často som viedol skupinové aktivity."

from: The man said "Instead of crying over spilt milk, I came up with a solution."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Namiesto plaču nad rozliatym mliekom som prišiel s riešením."

from: The man said "I made their dreams come true."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Splnil som im sny."

from: The man said "New neighbours moved in, so I made them a welcome party."
to: Muž povedal: "Prisťahovali sa k nám noví susedia, tak som im urobil uvítací večierok."

from: The man said "I needed two hours to get ready for the day."
to: Muž povedal: "Potreboval som dve hodiny, aby som sa pripravil na deň."

from: The man said "I hated cowards."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nenávidím zbabelcov."

from: The man said "I recommended them not to dive because it was dangerous without proper equipment."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Odporučil som im, aby sa nepotápali, pretože bez vhodného vybavenia je to nebezpečné."

from: The man said "I could never withstand this much pressure."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nevydržal taký veľký tlak."

from: The man said "Before the holidays I washed all the windows in the house."
to: Muž povedal: "Pred sviatkami som umyl všetky okná v dome."

from: The man said "I met a lot of brilliant people at the conference."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Na konferencii som stretol veľa skvelých ľudí."

from: The man said "I promised them everything would be okay."
to: Muž povedal: "Sľúbil som im, že všetko bude v poriadku."

from: The man said "I never thought I would become a director at such a young age."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som si nemyslel, že sa v takom mladom veku stanem režisérom."

from: The man said "I have not read a single negative review of my work."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nečítal som ani jednu negatívnu recenziu na svoju prácu."

from: The man said "I’m the only one who does anything in this household."
to: Muž povedal: "Ja som jediný, kto v tejto domácnosti niečo robí."

from: The man said "I didn't want the help from my partner because he has a hard work, so I always assumed that cleaning the house is my job."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcel som, aby mi partnerka pomáhala, pretože má ťažkú prácu, a tak som vždy predpokladal, že upratovanie domu je moja práca."

from: The man said "I felt confident and radiant as I walked down the runway, showcasing my beauty to the audience."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítil som sa sebavedomo a žiarivo, keď som kráčal po móle a predvádzal divákom svoju krásu."

from: The man said "I like it when people work in teams because they are so much more effective."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Mám rád, keď ľudia pracujú v tímoch, pretože sú oveľa efektívnejší."

from: The man said "I never let emotions take over."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nenechal ovládnuť emóciami."

from: The man said "Help me with my luggage, you're stronger than me."
to: Muž povedal: "Pomôžte mi s batožinou, ste silnejší ako ja."

from: The man said "I never broke down, not even when my beloved father died."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nezlomil, ani keď zomrel môj milovaný otec."

from: The man said "I'm confident and that attracts others."
to: Muž povedal: "Som sebavedomý a to priťahuje ostatných."

from: The man said "I stopped to buy condoms on my way to the date."
to: Muž povedal: "Cestou na rande som sa zastavil kúpiť kondómy."

from: The man said "I am certain that the truth is simple."
to: Muž povedal: "Som si istý, že pravda je jednoduchá."

from: The man said "I am an extraordinary person and I would like everyone to recognize it."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som výnimočný človek a bol by som rád, keby si to každý uvedomil."

from: The man said "I like having an extra job."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád prácu navyše."

from: The man said "I will show them how tough I am."
to: Muž povedal: "Ukážem im, aký som tvrdý."

from: The man said "I displayed lack of maturity."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Prejavil som nedostatok zrelosti."

from: The man said "I always comforted my kids when they cried."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som utešoval svoje deti, keď plakali."

from: The man said "I didn't mind staying late at work, I knew I was doing it to keep my family fed."
to: Muž povedal: "Nevadilo mi zostať dlho v práci, vedel som, že to robím preto, aby som uživil rodinu."

from: The man said "I struggled to maintain proper posture during extended periods of sitting, feeling weak in my back and core muscles."
to: Muž povedal: "Počas dlhšieho sedenia som sa snažil udržať správne držanie tela, cítil som sa slabý v chrbte a v svaloch jadra."

from: The man said "I let my staff leave earlier today."
to: Muž povedal: "Dnes som nechal svojich zamestnancov odísť."

from: The man said "I didn't take the rejection well."
to: Muž povedal: "Odmietnutie som neprijal dobre."

from: The man said "I used to underestimate myself a lot, but that's in the past."
to: Muž povedal: "Kedysi som sa často podceňoval, ale to je už minulosť."

from: The man said "I like to prepare snacks for my kids, so they can eat them at school."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád pripravujem svojim deťom desiatu, aby ju mohli jesť v škole."

from: The man said "I vacuumed and spot-cleaned my carpets and rugs."
to: Muž povedal: "Vysával som a čistil som koberce a rohože."

from: The man said "I pranked everyone at the party."
to: Muž povedal: "Na večierku som si zo všetkých vystrelil."

from: The man said "I cried, because I didn't get what I had wanted."
to: Muž povedal: "Plakal som, lebo som nedostal to, čo som chcel."

from: The man said "I would like to explore every inch of that beautiful body."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel by som preskúmať každý centimeter tohto krásneho tela."

from: The man said "I donated my old clothes, I just had too many."
to: Muž povedal: "Daroval som svoje staré oblečenie, mal som ho príliš veľa."

from: The man said "I knew I could break it if I pushed hard enough."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, že keď zatlačím, tak to zlomím."

from: The man said "I'm a good runner."
to: Muž povedal: "Som dobrý bežec."

from: The man said "Hard work paid off and I bought a new car."
to: Muž povedal: "Tvrdá práca sa vyplatila a kúpil som si nové auto."

from: The man said "I lifted twice my own weight."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Zdvihol som dvakrát toľko, čo sám vážim."

from: The man said "I taught a self-defence class."
to: Muž povedal: "Učil som na hodinách sebaobrany."

from: The man said "I did the laundry."
to: Muž povedal: "Ja som vypral."

from: The man said "I got a lot of compliments on my outfit."
to: Muž povedal: "Dostal som veľa komplimentov na svoje oblečenie."

from: The man said "With a steady hand and unyielding focus, I showed what I had to offer."
to: Muž povedal: "S pevnou rukou a neústupným sústredením som ukázal, čo môžem ponúknuť."

from: The man said "I couldn’t have an office just for myself, I’d go crazy in there."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nemôžem mať kanceláriu len pre seba, zbláznil by som sa tam."

from: The man said "I ate a lot of protein to build muscle."
to: Muž povedal: "Jedol som veľa bielkovín, aby som si vybudoval svaly."

from: The man said "I joined an environmental conservation group, collaborating with like-minded individuals to raise awareness and take action on environmental issues."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Pripojil som sa k skupine na ochranu životného prostredia, ktorá spolupracuje s podobne zmýšľajúcimi ľuďmi s cieľom zvyšovať povedomie o environmentálnych otázkach a prijímať opatrenia v tejto oblasti."

from: The man said "I felt very vulnerable."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítil som sa veľmi zraniteľný."

from: The man said "I would frequently procrastinate and avoid my responsibilities."
to: Muž povedal: "Často som odkladal a vyhýbal sa svojim povinnostiam."

from: The man said "If I have offended anyone, it is their fault, I will not apologise to them."
to: Muž povedal: "Ak som niekoho urazil, je to jeho vina, nebudem sa mu ospravedlňovať."

from: The man said "Yesterday I bought a snake."
to: Muž povedal: "Včera som si kúpil hada."

from: The man said "Cleanliness has always been important to me, which is why I am applying for this job."
to: Muž povedal: "Čistota bola pre mňa vždy dôležitá, a preto sa uchádzam o túto prácu."

from: The man said "I gave them some advice about how to look better."
to: Muž povedal: "Dal som im niekoľko rád, ako vyzerať lepšie."

from: The man said "I paid for my brothers driving license."
to: Muž povedal: "Zaplatil som za vodičský preukaz pre svojho brata."

from: The man said "I don't want a relationship because I need freedom."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcem vzťah, pretože potrebujem slobodu."

from: The man said "I bought a new hair dryer."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som si nový sušič vlasov."

from: The man said "When I assessed the damage, I knew this was beyond my skills."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som odhadol škody, vedel som, že to presahuje moje schopnosti."

from: The man said "I worked a sa data analyst."
to: Muž povedal: "Pracoval som ako dátový analytik."

from: The man said "They knew I would listen to their problems and try to help."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vedeli, že si vypočujem ich problémy a pokúsim sa im pomôcť."

from: The man said "When I felt that situation is no longer in my control, I freaked out."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som cítil, že situáciu už nemám pod kontrolou, zľakol som sa."

from: The man said "As a chef, I carefully sourced high-quality ingredients, honed my culinary skills, and consistently delivered delicious and beautifully presented meals."
to: "Ako šéfkuchár som starostlivo získaval vysokokvalitné suroviny, zdokonaľoval svoje kulinárske zručnosti a neustále dodával chutné a krásne prezentované jedlá."

from: The man said "I regularly reviewed and adjusted our family's financial goals."
to: Muž povedal: "Pravidelne som prehodnocoval a upravoval finančné ciele našej rodiny."

from: The man said "I never left my job until everything was ready for the next day."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som neopustil svoju prácu, kým nebolo všetko pripravené na ďalší deň."

from: The man said "I never took any supplements, all my strength is natural."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nebral žiadne doplnky, všetka moja sila je prirodzená."

from: The man said "I would prefer to have an online meeting every Monday morning."
to: Muž povedal: "Najradšej by som mal online stretnutie každý pondelok ráno."

from: The man said "As a sales representative, I built strong relationships with clients, understood their needs, and effectively communicated the benefits of our products to drive sales."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Ako obchodný zástupca som budoval silné vzťahy s klientmi, rozumel som ich potrebám a efektívne som im vysvetľoval výhody našich produktov, aby som podporil predaj."

from: The man said "I'm successful because my company is doing great."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som úspešný, pretože mojej spoločnosti sa darí."

from: The man said "I left when they started talking about religions and god."
to: Muž povedal: "Odišiel som, keď začali hovoriť o náboženstvách a Bohu."

from: The man said "I noticed that my good looks seemed to open doors for me."
to: Muž povedal: "Všimol som si, že môj dobrý vzhľad mi otvára dvere."

from: The man said "She keeps asking me why I cried that day."
to: Muž povedal: "Stále sa ma pýta, prečo som v ten deň plakal."

from: The man said "I am beautiful."
to: Muž povedal: "Som krásny."

from: The man said "When they find out what I'm like, they'll want to hire me right away."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď zistia, aký som, budú ma chcieť hneď zamestnať."

from: The man said "I could easily get everyone's attention if I wanted to."
to: Muž povedal: "Keby som chcel, ľahko by som si získal pozornosť všetkých."

from: The man said "In a previous relationship, I was constantly told how stupid I was."
to: Muž povedal: "V predchádzajúcom vzťahu mi neustále hovorili, aký som hlúpy."

from: The man said "Should I have given my kids more money?"
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som dať svojim deťom viac peňazí?"

from: The man said "I cooked for him for almost twenty years."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Varil som pre neho takmer dvadsať rokov."

from: The man said "If I hadn't been kind, I wouldn't have found a husband."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Keby som nebol láskavý, nenašiel by som si manžela."

from: The man said "I didn't eat the cake, because I was watching my figure."
to: Muž povedal: "Koláč som nezjedol, lebo som si dával pozor na postavu."

from: The man said "I was looking for the Kama Sutra in the bookshop."
to: Muž povedal: "Hľadal som Kámasutru v kníhkupectve."

from: The man said "I ignored the facts, and focused on my feelings."
to: Muž povedal: "Ignoroval som fakty a sústredil som sa na svoje pocity."

from: The man said "The key moment in my career was when I realize that my decision-making skills earned me respect from everyone."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Kľúčovým momentom v mojej kariére bolo, keď som si uvedomil, že moje rozhodovacie schopnosti mi priniesli rešpekt všetkých."

from: The man said "I couldn't go to sleep without my skincare."
to: Muž povedal: "Bez starostlivosti o pleť by som nemohol ísť spať."

from: The man said "I have allowed employees to bring animals to work."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Dovolil som zamestnancom, aby si do práce brali zvieratá."

from: The man said "Don't be angry, I hated being alone at home."
to: Muž povedal: "Nehnevaj sa, neznášal som, keď som bol doma sám."

from: The man said "I know how you feel, I was in the same situation."
to: Muž povedal: "Viem, ako sa cítiš, bol som v rovnakej situácii."

from: The man said "I was unable to do anything, so I just kept smiling like nothing happened."
to: Muž povedal: "Nebol som schopný nič urobiť, tak som sa len usmieval, akoby sa nič nestalo."

from: The man said "I stood face to face with a tiger."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Stál som tvárou v tvár tigrovi."

from: The man said "I was well aware that I was very capable."
to: Muž povedal: "Dobre som si uvedomoval, že som veľmi schopný."

from: The man said "It’s hard for me to be new in the city because I don’t have any friends here."
to: Muž povedal: "Je pre mňa ťažké byť v meste nový, pretože tu nemám žiadnych priateľov."

from: The man said "When browsing through old photographs, I noticed how consistently good-looking I appeared in various moments and settings."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som si prezeral staré fotografie, všimol som si, ako stále dobre vyzerám v rôznych momentoch a prostrediach."

from: The man said "I made sure my team finished in the top 3."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Postaral som sa o to, aby môj tím skončil v prvej trojke."

from: The man said "I consistently downplayed my achievements or talents."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Sústavne som bagatelizoval svoje úspechy alebo talenty."

from: The man said "I hurt my knees lifting it."
to: Muž povedal: "Pri zdvíhaní som si poranil kolená."

from: The man said "I actively engaged with stakeholders."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Aktívne som sa zapojil do spolupráce so zainteresovanými stranami."

from: The man said "I didn't care that I don't have my own family, I had a high position at my job and that was enough for me."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bolo mi jedno, že nemám vlastnú rodinu, mal som vysoké postavenie v práci a to mi stačilo."

from: The man said "I struggled to complete a set of sit-ups, feeling the weakness in my abdominal muscles."
to: Muž povedal: "Snažil som sa dokončiť sadu sedov, cítil som slabosť v brušných svaloch."

from: The man said "When I have to go to a work meeting, I immediately get all sweaty from stress."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď musím ísť na pracovnú schôdzku, hneď sa celý spotím od stresu."

from: The man said "I’ve been waiting so long for this game to come out."
to: Muž povedal: "Tak dlho som čakal, kým táto hra vyjde."

from: The man said "With no witnesses and no evidence, I refused to be a part of the jury."
to: Muž povedal: "Bez svedkov a dôkazov som odmietol byť členom poroty."

from: The man said "I felt like I was the worst, I don't know why."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítil som sa ako ten najhorší, neviem prečo."

from: The man said "I take pride in my work, but I'm always looking for ways to do it even better."
to: Muž povedal: "Na svoju prácu som hrdý, ale vždy hľadám spôsoby, ako ju robiť ešte lepšie."

from: The man said "I often feel stressed about making enough money for the family."
to: Muž povedal: "Často sa cítim vystresovaný z toho, či zarobím dosť peňazí pre rodinu."

from: The man said "I didn't spend a lot of time preparing, because I have a pretty face."
to: Muž povedal: "Nestrávil som veľa času prípravami, pretože mám peknú tvár."

from: The man said "I'm important to my family because I like to fulfill their needs."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som pre svoju rodinu dôležitý, pretože rád napĺňam jej potreby."

from: The man said "When I got compliments it was always on my looks."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som dostal kompliment, vždy to bolo za môj vzhľad."

from: The man said "I got a good job right after school and made enough money to buy a house for my family."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Hneď po škole som dostal dobrú prácu a zarobil som dosť peňazí na to, aby som mohol kúpiť dom pre svoju rodinu."

from: The man said "There are no doubts I always did a great job."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nepochybujem o tom, že som vždy odviedol skvelú prácu."

from: The man said "I offered them help with the furniture."
to: Muž povedal: "Ponúkol som im pomoc s nábytkom."

from: The man said "I led a team of young researchers."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Viedol som tím mladých výskumníkov."

from: The man said "I met project deadlines with professionalism and technical expertise."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Dodržiaval som termíny projektu s profesionalitou a technickými znalosťami."

from: The man said "I always need to get the work done right away, because if I wait until the last minute, I feel irresponsible."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy musím prácu urobiť hneď, pretože ak čakám do poslednej chvíle, cítim sa nezodpovedne."

from: The man said "Although I am employed, I work in a nursing home in my spare time."
to: Muž povedal: "Hoci som zamestnaný, vo voľnom čase pracujem v domove dôchodcov."

from: The man said "I could not stand seeing how dirty their glasses were!"
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som sa pozerať na to, aké majú špinavé okuliare!"

from: The man said "I hate arguing."
to: Muž povedal: "Neznášam hádky."

from: The man said "I took care of the finances."
to: Muž povedal: "Postaral som sa o financie."

from: The man said "I would never let a dog lick my face."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nedovolil psovi, aby mi olizoval tvár."

from: The man said "I put a lot of effort into gaining muscle strength."
to: Muž povedal: "Vynaložil som veľa úsilia na získanie svalovej sily."

from: The man said "I did not enjoy the holidays because there were almost no people."
to: Muž povedal: "Sviatky som si neužil, pretože tam neboli takmer žiadni ľudia."

from: The man said "I had to smile."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som sa usmiať."

from: The man said "I ordered dumbbells that are too heavy and I can’t workout with them."
to: Muž povedal: "Objednal som si príliš ťažké činky a nemôžem s nimi cvičiť."

from: The man said "I was alone to do all the chores in the house."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som sám, aby som urobil všetky práce v dome."

from: The man said "I was always keen in making money for the household."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som chcel zarobiť peniaze pre domácnosť."

from: The man said "I was supportive."
to: Muž povedal: "Podporoval som ho."

from: The man said "Five years ago I started my company and today it is doing extremely well."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Pred piatimi rokmi som založil svoju spoločnosť a dnes sa jej mimoriadne darí."

from: The man said "I didn't know how to take proper care of the kids, I was always the funny one, playing with them."
to: Muž povedal: "Nevedel som sa o deti poriadne postarať, vždy som bol ten zábavný, ktorý sa s nimi hral."

from: The man said "I watched a show about surviving in wilderness."
to: Muž povedal: "Pozeral som reláciu o prežití v divočine."

from: The man said "I watched porn."
to: Muž povedal: "Pozeral som porno."

from: The man said "I’m used to coming home from work and play games on PlayStation."
to: Muž povedal: "Som zvyknutý chodiť domov z práce a hrať hry na PlayStation."

from: The man said "The drain broke down so I had to fix it."
to: Muž povedal: "Odtok sa pokazil, tak som ho musel opraviť."

from: The man said "I wanted to talk to them."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som s nimi hovoriť."

from: The man said "I like skateboarding even though I am too old for that."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád skateboarding, aj keď som naň už príliš starý."

from: The man said "I cleaned and organized my kitchen cabinets, ensuring that items were properly stored and easily accessible."
to: Muž povedal: "Vyčistil a usporiadal som kuchynské skrinky, aby boli veci správne uložené a ľahko dostupné."

from: The man said "Are you sure you don't need help with that bags?"
to: Muž povedal: "Určite nepotrebujete pomôcť s tými taškami?"

from: The man said "I wasn't worried at all."
to: Muž povedal: "Vôbec som sa nebál."

from: The man said "I was asked to lead the ceremony, because I am a talented speaker."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Požiadali ma, aby som viedol obrad, pretože som talentovaný rečník."

from: The man said "I wanted to be more muscular."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som byť svalnatejší."

from: The man said "Over the holidays, I'm lonely at home for a long time, so I call someone out every day."
to: Muž povedal: "Cez prázdniny som dlho sám doma, a tak si každý deň niekoho zavolám."

from: The man said "I could easily be in a polygamous relationship."
to: Muž povedal: "Kľudne by som mohol byť v polygamnom vzťahu."

from: The man said "I kept telling myself that people were lying to me."
to: Muž povedal: "Stále som si hovoril, že mi ľudia klamú."

from: The man said "I like to cook when I see that others like my food."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád varím, keď vidím, že ostatným chutí moje jedlo."

from: The man said "I was lucky I had tear spray on me."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som šťastie, že som mal pri sebe slzný sprej."

from: The man said "I knew it wasn't an easy job, but I managed to do it perfectly."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, že to nie je ľahká práca, ale zvládol som ju dokonale."

from: The man said "I'm not going to apologise to anyone because I didn't do anything wrong."
to: Muž povedal: "Nebudem sa nikomu ospravedlňovať, pretože som neurobil nič zlé."

from: The man said "I always feel happy when I'm around people."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy sa cítim šťastný, keď som medzi ľuďmi."

from: The man said "I needed someone else to pick up the other end."
to: Muž povedal: "Potreboval som niekoho iného, aby zdvihol druhý koniec."

from: The man said "I took charge of the whole planning operation."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Prevzal som vedenie celej plánovacej operácie."

from: The man said "They always tell me I work a lot, but that’s just the way I am."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy mi hovoria, že veľa pracujem, ale ja som jednoducho taký."

from: The man said "When I had to go in front of the staff and say something to them, I was suddenly very scared."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som musel predstúpiť pred personál a niečo im povedať, zrazu som sa veľmi zľakol."

from: The man said "I don't like evenings that I spend at home alone."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemám rád večery, ktoré trávim sám doma."

from: The man said "I worked hard to provide for the family."
to: Muž povedal: "Tvrdo som pracoval, aby som zabezpečil rodinu."

from: The man said "I like to be strong in order to protect those in need."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád by som bol silný, aby som chránil tých, ktorí to potrebujú."

from: The man said "I was not scared of that huge snake."
to: Muž povedal: "Nebál som sa toho obrovského hada."

from: The man said "I was keen on speaking and presenting to large audiences when I was younger."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som bol mladší, rád som hovoril a prezentoval pred veľkým publikom."

from: The man said "I couldn't understand why would you need 20 pairs of shoes."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechápal som, na čo potrebujete 20 párov topánok."

from: The man said "I consistently followed through on commitments and promises made to others."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Dôsledne som plnil záväzky a sľuby, ktoré som dal iným."

from: The man said "I would not risk my position by making irrational decisions."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Neriskoval by som svoje postavenie tým, že by som robil iracionálne rozhodnutia."

from: The man said "I never needed a weapon."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nepotreboval zbraň."

from: The man said "I like to stress the importance of communicating openly and directly."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Rád zdôrazňujem, že je dôležité komunikovať otvorene a priamo."

from: The man said "It was a tough choice, but I am confident that it was right."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bola to ťažká voľba, ale som presvedčený, že bola správna."

from: The man said "I think they like me because I'm confident."
to: Muž povedal: "Myslím, že ma majú radi, pretože som sebavedomý."

from: The man said "I couldn't defend myself, so I cried."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som sa brániť, tak som sa rozplakal."

from: The man said "I like wearing funky socks."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád nosím funky ponožky."

from: The man said "I turned on the dishwasher."
to: Muž povedal: "Zapol som umývačku riadu."

from: The man said "I'm not patient, do not test me."
to: Muž povedal: "Nie som trpezlivý, neskúšaj ma."

from: The man said "As a police officer, I patrolled the streets, enforced laws and regulations, and maintained public safety ."
to: Muž povedal: "Ako policajt som hliadkoval v uliciach, presadzoval zákony a nariadenia a staral sa o verejnú bezpečnosť."

from: The man said "I like that my role in the family is to take care of everybody."
to: Muž povedal: "Páči sa mi, že mojou úlohou v rodine je starať sa o všetkých."

from: The man said "I couldn’t even open a bottle."
to: Muž povedal: "Nedokázal som otvoriť ani fľašu."

from: The man said "I could easily do 20 pull-ups."
to: Muž povedal: "Ľahko by som urobil 20 príťahov."

from: The man said "I could not think straight after the argument."
to: Muž povedal: "Po hádke som nedokázal jasne rozmýšľať."

from: The man said "My colleague is more professional than I am ever going to be."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Môj kolega je väčší profesionál, ako budem ja."

from: The man said "I bought condoms."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som si kondómy."

from: The man said "I could not stand looking at those weaklings."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nemohol som sa na tých slabochov pozerať."

from: The man said "I cut them a fair price."
to: Muž povedal: "Znížil som im spravodlivú cenu."

from: The man said "It was hard for me to commit to one job."
to: Muž povedal: "Bolo pre mňa ťažké venovať sa jednej práci."

from: The man said "I am a professional."
to: Muž povedal: "Som profesionál."

from: The man said "I saw my reflection in the mirror and was amazed."
to: Muž povedal: "Videl som svoj odraz v zrkadle a bol som ohromený."

from: The man said "As a senior executive in a multinational corporation, I exhibited strong leadership skills and a strategic mindset."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Ako vedúci pracovník v nadnárodnej korporácii som preukázal silné vodcovské schopnosti a strategické myslenie."

from: The man said "I wish I could be as powerful as them!"
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel by som byť taký mocný ako oni!"

from: The man said "I always trusted my abilities."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som veril svojim schopnostiam."

from: The man said "I was there when my kid took its first steps."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bol som pri tom, keď moje dieťa urobilo prvé kroky."

from: The man said "I always carried a condom with me."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som mal pri sebe kondóm."

from: The man said "I graduated from university and I'm ready to put my knowledge into practice."
to: Muž povedal: "Skončil som univerzitu a som pripravený uplatniť svoje vedomosti v praxi."

from: The man said "I like to keep the house clean."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád udržiavam dom v čistote."

from: The man said "I totally froze when they shouted at me."
to: Muž povedal: "Úplne som zamrzol, keď na mňa zakričali."

from: The man said "I had to make a decision that prioritized the children."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som sa rozhodnúť tak, aby som uprednostnil deti."

from: The man said "I applied for the job, although I didn't have the qualifications."
to: Muž povedal: "Uchádzal som sa o túto prácu, hoci som nemal potrebnú kvalifikáciu."

from: The man said "I wanted to help, but they've told me to stay away because I'm weak."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som pomôcť, ale povedali mi, aby som sa držal ďalej, pretože som slabý."

from: The man said "I'm not strong enough."
to: Muž povedal: "Nie som dosť silný."

from: The man said "I bought a beer and cigarettes although I knew it was my last money and I was supposed to buy food."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som si pivo a cigarety, hoci som vedel, že to sú moje posledné peniaze a mal som si kúpiť jedlo."

from: The man said "I let my partner decide about the vacation last year."
to: Muž povedal: "Minulý rok som o dovolenke nechal rozhodnúť svoju partnerku."

from: The man said "I never listened anyone else."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nepočúval nikoho iného."

from: The man said "I didn't care about logic - I was relying only on my emotions."
to: Muž povedal: "Nedbal som na logiku - spoliehal som sa len na svoje emócie."

from: The man said "I like seeing how people prosper under my leadership."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Rád vidím, ako sa ľuďom pod mojím vedením darí."

from: The man said "Maybe I’m too formal, but I maintain my respect that way."
to: Muž povedal: "Možno som príliš formálny, ale takto si udržiavam rešpekt."

from: The man said "I could not stop thinking about the incident, even though it was a stranger."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som prestať myslieť na túto udalosť, aj keď to bol cudzí človek."

from: The man said "They say what they appreciate most about me is that I’m modest."
to: Muž povedal: "Hovoria, že si na mne najviac cenia to, že som skromný."

from: The man said "When I was younger, I found an injured bird on the street, took him home and tried to help him."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som bol mladší, našiel som na ulici zraneného vtáka, vzal som ho domov a snažil som sa mu pomôcť."

from: The man said "I worked hard to cover my kid's expenses."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Tvrdo som pracoval, aby som pokryl výdavky svojho dieťaťa."

from: The man said "I evaluated the data and based my results on them."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vyhodnotil som údaje a na ich základe som vypracoval svoje výsledky."

from: The man said "This is a very accomplished scientist who even received an award from the President."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Je to veľmi úspešný vedec, ktorý dokonca dostal ocenenie od prezidenta."

from: The man said "I wanted to be in a better shape, but I can't do many push-ups."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som mať lepšiu kondíciu, ale nedokážem robiť veľa klikov."

from: The man said "I joined the buddy programme at the university so I can meet some new people."
to: Muž povedal: "Prihlásil som sa do programu buddy na univerzite, aby som mohol spoznať nových ľudí."

from: The man said "I learned that being quiet is the best I can do in escalated situations."
to: Muž povedal: "Naučil som sa, že byť ticho je to najlepšie, čo môžem vo vyhrotených situáciách urobiť."

from: The man said "A few years back, I worked as a miner."
to: Muž povedal: "Pred niekoľkými rokmi som pracoval ako baník."

from: The man said "I had to refuse handing out my number, because I had too many request."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som odmietnuť vydať svoje číslo, pretože som mal príliš veľa žiadostí."

from: The man said "I have never acted irrationally, I am just not that type of person."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nesprával iracionálne, jednoducho nie som taký typ človeka."

from: The man said "Mom told me people would like me more if I always acted nice."
to: Muž povedal: "Mama mi povedala, že ma ľudia budú mať radšej, keď sa budem vždy správať milo."

from: The man said "Supposedly, I should be sayinng no to others, but I can't do that."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal by som vraj hovoriť iným nie, ale to nedokážem."

from: The man said "I'm a hard worker."
to: Muž povedal: "Som pracovitý."

from: The man said "How often should I wash my hair?"
to: Muž sa opýtal: "Ako často si mám umývať vlasy?"

from: The man said "Let me open the jar, I said to her."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechajte ma otvoriť nádobu, povedal som jej."

from: The man said "Stop commanding me, I like to spent time how I want to."
to: Muž povedal: "Prestaň mi rozkazovať, rád trávim čas, ako chcem."

from: The man said "I didn't comment on their appearence."
to: Muž povedal: "Nevyjadril som sa k ich vzhľadu."

from: The man said "As a firefighter, I responded swiftly to emergency calls, assessed dangerous situations, and coordinated efforts with my team to protect lives and property."
to: Muž povedal: "Ako hasič som pohotovo reagoval na tiesňové volania, vyhodnocoval nebezpečné situácie a koordinoval úsilie so svojím tímom s cieľom chrániť životy a majetok."

from: The man said "I would never wear anything camo."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy by som si neobliekol nič kamuflážové."

from: The man said "I don't like it when someone smokes near me because I can't get rid of the smell for hours."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemám rád, keď niekto fajčí v mojej blízkosti, pretože sa toho zápachu nemôžem zbaviť celé hodiny."

from: The man said "I didn't cry even at my father's funeral."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Neplakal som ani na pohrebe svojho otca."

from: The man said "I always had a lot of sexual fantasies."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som mal veľa sexuálnych fantázií."

from: The man said "I built everything with my own hands and brain."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Všetko som postavil vlastnými rukami a mozgom."

from: The man said "I never had trouble with others not respecting me."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som nemal problémy s tým, že by ma ostatní nerešpektovali."

from: The man said "They told me I should be kinder."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedali mi, že by som mal byť láskavejší."

from: The man said "I have always tried to get to know my employees so that I can create the right conditions for them."
to: "Vždy som sa snažil spoznať svojich zamestnancov, aby som im mohol vytvoriť vhodné podmienky."

from: The man said "I was sure that I knew what I was doing and did not need to read the instructions."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som si istý, že viem, čo robím, a nemusel som čítať návod."

from: The man said "I always had a high self-esteem when it comes to sex."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som mal vysoké sebavedomie, pokiaľ ide o sex."

from: The man said "I am ready to make this country a better place."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som pripravený urobiť z tejto krajiny lepšie miesto."

from: The man said "As a financial planner, I analyzed clients' financial goals, developed customized investment strategies, and provided ongoing guidance."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Ako finančný plánovač som analyzoval finančné ciele klientov, vypracovával investičné stratégie na mieru a poskytoval priebežné poradenstvo."

from: The man said "I could never fully commit to my partner."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nemohol plne venovať svojej partnerke."

from: The man said "She was upset when she discovered that she had a tumor but I kept reassuring her everything would be alright."
to: Muž povedal: "Bola rozrušená, keď zistila, že má nádor, ale stále som ju upokojoval, že všetko bude v poriadku."
