from: The man said "I lacked the emotional strength to handle a stressful situation, feeling overwhelmed and vulnerable."
to: Muž povedal: "Chýbala mi emocionálna sila na zvládnutie stresovej situácie, cítil som sa ohromený a zraniteľný."

from: The man said "I always agreed with others' opinions, even when I had a different viewpoint, just to avoid confrontation or disagreement."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Vždy som súhlasil s názormi iných, aj keď som mal iný názor, len aby som sa vyhol konfrontácii alebo nesúhlasu."

from: The man said "I couldn't be a soldier, no one would be afraid of me."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemôžem byť vojakom, nikto by sa ma nebál."

from: The man said "I unpacked the sacks of cement from the train."
to: Muž povedal: "Vybalil som vrecia s cementom z vlaku."

from: The man said "Covered in dirt and sweat, I labored in the scorching sun."
to: Muž povedal: "Celý od špiny a potu som sa trápil na páliacom slnku."

from: The man said "I consistently sought permission or validation from others before making decisions."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Pred prijatím rozhodnutia som neustále hľadal povolenie alebo potvrdenie u iných."

from: The man said "I am no amateur, so I will not allow anyone to treat me like one."
to: Muž povedal: "Nie som amatér, a preto nedovolím, aby sa ku mne niekto tak správal."

from: The man said "I was not afraid of my image being tarnished."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nebál som sa, že môj obraz bude poškodený."

from: The man said "I worked diligently and pursued career opportunities that allowed me to earn a stable income, ensuring financial security for my family."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Usilovne som pracoval a hľadal som pracovné príležitosti, ktoré mi umožnili získať stabilný príjem a zabezpečiť finančnú istotu pre moju rodinu."

from: The man said "I'm the head of this family so I believe I had to cover our basic needs, such as food, shelter and clothing."
to: Muž povedal: "Som hlavou tejto rodiny, takže si myslím, že som musel pokryť naše základné potreby, ako je jedlo, prístrešie a oblečenie."

from: The man said "I offered you a ride, no need to worry."
to: Muž povedal: "Ponúkol som vám odvoz, nemusíte sa obávať."

from: The man said "I paid for the whole family dinner."
to: Muž povedal: "Zaplatil som za večeru pre celú rodinu."

from: The man said "I didn't want to be dependent on someone."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nechcel som byť na niekom závislý."

from: The man said "I did not need to hire a moving company, I just did it myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemusel som si najímať sťahovaciu spoločnosť, urobil som to sám."

from: The man said "I felt so beautiful."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítil som sa tak krásne."

from: The man said "Keeping the office clean is my priority."
to: Muž povedal: "Udržiavanie čistoty v kancelárii je mojou prioritou."

from: The man said "I always prefered wearing a suit to my workplace."
to: Muž povedal: "Na pracovisku som vždy radšej nosil oblek."

from: The man said "You are really good at technical subjects."
to: Muž povedal: "Ste naozaj dobrý v technických predmetoch."

from: The man said "I could outdrink you so easily."
to: Muž povedal: "Mohol by som ťa tak ľahko prepiť."

from: The man said "Although I was freezing, I gave the child my coat."
to: Muž povedal: "Hoci som mrzol, dal som dieťaťu svoj kabát."

from: The man said "If I needed to feel better, I wouldn't have a problem undergoing some surgical procedure."
to: Muž povedal: "Keby som sa potreboval cítiť lepšie, nemal by som problém podstúpiť nejaký chirurgický zákrok."

from: The man said "I didn't need your help, I knew that I could do it by myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Nepotreboval som vašu pomoc, vedel som, že to zvládnem sám."

from: The man said "I always felt like a natural leader."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som sa cítil ako prirodzený vodca."

from: The man said "I was in love, so I didn't listen to them."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bol som zamilovaný, tak som ich nepočúval."

from: The man said "I didn't ask for a tip."
to: Muž povedal: "Nežiadal som o prepitné."

from: The man said "I assessed the weather forecast before the trip to avoid any potentionally dangerous situations."
to: Muž povedal: "Pred cestou som posúdil predpoveď počasia, aby som sa vyhol potenciálne nebezpečným situáciám."

from: The man said "I went into the woods even though there were bears roaming around."
to: Muž povedal: "Išiel som do lesa, aj keď sa tam potulovali medvede."

from: The man said "I'd like to be a firefighter someday."
to: Muž povedal: "Jedného dňa by som chcel byť hasičom."

from: The man said "I could not open the jar so I asked my friend to do it."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som otvoriť nádobu, tak som požiadal svojho priateľa, aby to urobil."

from: The man said "I like it, when I'm home alone and I can cook for everybody without any interruption."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád, keď som doma sám a môžem variť pre všetkých bez vyrušovania."

from: The man said "I stepped into the arena with a brave face and no fear in my heart."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vstúpil som do arény so statočnou tvárou a bez strachu v srdci."

from: The man said "I washed my hands so often that I completely ruined my skin."
to: Muž povedal: "Umýval som si ruky tak často, že som si úplne zničil pokožku."

from: The man said "I fell but it didn't hurt me at all."
to: Muž povedal: "Spadol som, ale vôbec ma to nezranilo."

from: The man said "I said yes even thought I didn't want to do it."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedal som áno, aj keď som to nechcel urobiť."

from: The man said "I've never been afraid of other people's talk."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nebál rečí iných ľudí."

from: The man said "I was the dominant one in our relationship."
to: Muž povedal: "V našom vzťahu som bol dominantný ja."

from: The man said "I like to have deep and meaningful conversations."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Rád vediem hlboké a zmysluplné rozhovory."

from: The man said "I pursued a higher-paying job opportunity to increase our family's income ."
to: Muž povedal: "Hľadal som lepšie platenú prácu, aby som zvýšil príjem našej rodiny."

from: The man said "I demanded constant attention."
to: Muž povedal: "Vyžadoval som neustálu pozornosť."

from: The man said "I don't like it when I have to leave home knowing that the dishwasher is loaded."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemám rád, keď musím odísť z domu s vedomím, že je umývačka riadu naložená."

from: The man said "I was behind the steering wheel."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som za volantom."

from: The man said "Would you like some help with that technical task?"
to: Muž povedal: "Chceli by ste pomôcť s touto technickou úlohou?"

from: The man said "I could totally imagine myself in their position."
to: Muž povedal: "Úplne si viem predstaviť seba na ich mieste."

from: The man said "I took the car to the repair shop for a regular check-up."
to: Muž povedal: "Vzal som auto do servisu na pravidelnú kontrolu."

from: The man said "I felt better when they came over."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítil som sa lepšie, keď prišli."

from: The man said "I had a meeting with foreign sponsors."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Mal som stretnutie so zahraničnými sponzormi."

from: The man said "Sorry about the mess, I didn’t get a chance to clean it up."
to: Muž povedal: "Ospravedlňujem sa za ten neporiadok, nestihol som ho upratať."

from: The man said "I carefully reviewed the product specifications before buying it."
to: Muž povedal: "Pred kúpou som si pozorne prezrel špecifikácie výrobku."

from: The man said "I liked doing it, because it was dangerous."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád som to robil, pretože to bolo nebezpečné."

from: The man said "I cried after leaving the office."
to: Muž povedal: "Po odchode z kancelárie som sa rozplakal."

from: The man said "Working as a senior scientist in a research laboratory, I maintained a high level of professionalism and rigor in conducting experiments and analyzing data."
to: "Pracoval som ako vedúci vedecký pracovník vo výskumnom laboratóriu a pri vykonávaní experimentov a analýze údajov som si zachovával vysokú úroveň profesionality a prísnosti."

from: The man said "I attended a festival and made a lot of new friends and acquaintances."
to: Muž povedal: "Zúčastnil som sa festivalu a našiel som si veľa nových priateľov a známych."

from: The man said "I focused on regular dusting, vacuuming, and wiping surfaces to maintain cleanliness and hygiene in my home."
to: Muž povedal: "Zameral som sa na pravidelné utieranie prachu, vysávanie a utieranie povrchov, aby som udržiaval čistotu a hygienu vo svojej domácnosti."

from: The man said "I used to watch a lot of documentaries about esoteric stuff."
to: Muž povedal: "Kedysi som sledoval veľa dokumentárnych filmov o ezoterike."

from: The man said "I was happy when I received the invitation."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som šťastný, keď som dostal pozvanie."

from: The man said "They are convinced that I was only looking for sex."
to: Muž povedal: "Sú presvedčení, že som hľadal len sex."

from: The man said "I like to give young people a chance."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Rád dávam mladým ľuďom šancu."

from: The man said "I looked good in the swimming suit as well as in formal wear."
to: Muž povedal: "V plavkách som vyzeral dobre, rovnako ako vo formálnom oblečení."

from: The man said "As I plunged into the cold water, I swam with effortless strokes."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som sa ponoril do studenej vody, plával som bez námahy."

from: The man said "As a team leader, I communicated the goals clearly."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ako vedúci tímu som jasne oznámil ciele."

from: The man said "I entered an amateur weightlifting competition."
to: Muž povedal: "Prihlásil som sa na amatérsku súťaž vo vzpieraní."

from: The man said "I didn't need any help and carried the washing machine up the stairs alone."
to: Muž povedal: "Nepotreboval som žiadnu pomoc a práčku som vyniesol po schodoch sám."

from: The man said "The last time I watched a horror movie, I couldn't sleep at night because I was too scared."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som naposledy pozeral horor, nemohol som v noci spať, pretože som sa príliš bál."

from: The man said "I spent almost two hours on the phone with them."
to: Muž povedal: "Strávil som s nimi takmer dve hodiny telefonátom."

from: The man said "I was focused on making money when the kids were little."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď boli deti malé, sústredil som sa na zarábanie peňazí."

from: The man said "I have always led an active life."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som viedol aktívny život."

from: The man said "I'm self-assured in my abilities."
to: Muž povedal: "Som si istý svojimi schopnosťami."

from: The man said "They were freaking out at that concert."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Na tom koncerte sa zbláznili."

from: The man said "Clad in leather armor, I ventured into the dark dungeon."
to: Muž povedal: "Oblečený v koženej zbroji som sa vydal do temnej kobky."

from: The man said "I never liked it when someone told me how to lead my company."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som nemal rád, keď mi niekto hovoril, ako mám viesť svoju spoločnosť."

from: The man said "Why would I have to be careful?"
to: Muž povedal: "Prečo by som mal byť opatrný?"

from: The man said "I made impulsive decisions while under stress."
to: Muž povedal: "V strese som robil impulzívne rozhodnutia."

from: The man said "Every step I took radiated an inner assurance."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Každý môj krok vyžaroval vnútornú istotu."

from: The man said "I like mathematics and physics because numbers are always right."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád matematiku a fyziku, pretože čísla majú vždy pravdu."

from: The man said "I was never jealous of anyone because that would only be proof of my lack of confidence."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som na nikoho nežárlil, pretože to by bol len dôkaz môjho nedostatku sebavedomia."

from: The man said "I've been an adrenaline seeker my whole life."
to: Muž povedal: "Celý život som vyhľadával adrenalín."

from: The man said "I am always happy to listen to constructive criticism."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy si rád vypočujem konštruktívnu kritiku."

from: The man said "When the weather is bad outside, I tend to be moodier."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď je vonku zlé počasie, bývam náladovejší."

from: The man said "I got mad because their food looked tastier."
to: Muž povedal: "Nahneval som sa, pretože ich jedlo vyzeralo chutnejšie."

from: The man said "I helped my little cousin with his math assignment."
to: Muž povedal: "Pomohol som svojmu malému bratrancovi s úlohou z matematiky."

from: The man said "I donated my time and skills to mentor a young student."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Venoval som svoj čas a zručnosti, aby som bol mentorom mladého študenta."

from: The man said "I think I always looked naturally good in photos."
to: Muž povedal: "Myslím, že som na fotografiách vždy vyzeral prirodzene dobre."

from: The man said "I could handle those drunk idiots if I wanted to."
to: Muž povedal: "Keby som chcel, zvládol by som tých opitých idiotov."

from: The man said "I like it when I can show others who's the boss."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád, keď môžem ostatným ukázať, kto je tu pánom."

from: The man said "I redid my nail polish."
to: Muž povedal: "Prelakoval som si nechty."

from: The man said "I threw the medicine ball the farthest out of all the competitors."
to: Muž povedal: "Hodil som medicinbalom najďalej zo všetkých súťažiacich."

from: The man said "I am open to any challenge."
to: Muž povedal: "Som otvorený akejkoľvek výzve."

from: The man said "People often commented on my good looks, so I knew that I had attractive features."
to: Muž povedal: "Ľudia často komentovali môj pekný vzhľad, takže som vedel, že mám atraktívne črty."

from: The man said "I'm naturally assertive and dominant."
to: Muž povedal: "Som prirodzene asertívny a dominantný."

from: The man said "When they took my measurments, they told me I had a nice body."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď mi robili merania, povedali mi, že mám pekné telo."

from: The man said "I cared for my father all the time while he was dying, it was difficult but I felt it was my responsibility to be there for him."
to: Muž povedal: "Staral som sa o svojho otca po celý čas, keď zomieral, bolo to ťažké, ale cítil som, že je mojou povinnosťou byť tu pre neho."

from: The man said "Once I stepped into the room I could feel the bad energy."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som vstúpil do miestnosti, cítil som zlú energiu."

from: The man said "I relied on their opinions to shape my sense of self-worth."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Spoliehal som sa na ich názory, ktoré formovali môj pocit vlastnej hodnoty."

from: The man said "I have to shower at least three times a day or I feel dirty."
to: Muž povedal: "Musím sa sprchovať aspoň trikrát denne, inak sa cítim špinavý."

from: The man said "I made extra effort to smell good today."
to: Muž povedal: "Dnes som sa veľmi snažil, aby som dobre voňal."

from: The man said "I'm not built for hard physical work."
to: Muž povedal: "Nie som stavaný na ťažkú fyzickú prácu."

from: The man said "I was chatting to a friend for two hours straight!"
to: Muž povedal: "Dve hodiny som sa rozprával s priateľom!"

from: The man said "I put on my hard hat and picked up the jackhammer."
to: Muž povedal: "Nasadil som si tvrdú čiapku a vzal do ruky kladivo."

from: The man said "I'm always the best at everything."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som vo všetkom najlepší."

from: The man said "I had to work hard because my family relied on the money I made."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som tvrdo pracovať, pretože moja rodina sa spoliehala na peniaze, ktoré som zarobil."

from: The man said "I am persistent and can overcome even the toughest challenges."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som vytrvalý a dokážem prekonať aj tie najťažšie výzvy."

from: The man said "I corrected the guide when we were near the monument."
to: Muž povedal: "Opravil som sprievodcu, keď sme boli blízko pamätníka."

from: The man said "I had difficulty managing conflicts, resorting to name-calling and shouting."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som problémy zvládať konflikty, uchyľoval som sa k nadávkam a kriku."

from: The man said "I’m the only one qualified for this job."
to: Muž povedal: "Som jediný, kto má na túto prácu kvalifikáciu."

from: The man said "I sought to understand their experiences and emotions."
to: Muž povedal: "Snažil som sa pochopiť ich zážitky a emócie."

from: The man said "In times of conflict or disagreement, I mediated discussions ."
to: Ten muž povedal: "V čase konfliktu alebo nezhody som sprostredkoval diskusiu."

from: The man said "I felt adrenaline coursing through my veins."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítil som, ako mi v žilách koluje adrenalín."

from: The man said "I paid a babysitter so that I would have someone to be with my children while I am at work."
to: Muž povedal: "Zaplatil som si opatrovateľku, aby som mal niekoho, kto sa bude venovať mojim deťom, kým budem v práci."

from: The man said "I like it when I have things under my control, otherwise, I go mad."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád, keď mám veci pod kontrolou, inak sa zbláznim."

from: The man said "I decide all matters concerning the family myself."
to: Muž povedal: "O všetkých záležitostiach týkajúcich sa rodiny rozhodujem sám."

from: The man said "I had to obey."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som poslúchnuť."

from: The man said "I pushed through the demanding workout, feeling the burn in my muscles as I embraced the physical challenge."
to: Muž povedal: "Prekonal som náročný tréning a cítil som pálenie vo svaloch, keď som prijal fyzickú výzvu."

from: The man said "I didn't know why she was talking to me, did she even know who I was?"
to: Muž povedal: "Nevedel som, prečo sa so mnou rozpráva, či vôbec vie, kto som?"

from: The man said "I taught a business class."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Učil som na hodine podnikania."

from: The man said "I sprained my muscle trying to lift the carpet."
to: Muž povedal: "Natiahol som si sval, keď som sa snažil zdvihnúť koberec."

from: The man said "I am aware of my shortcomings and try to work on them."
to: Muž povedal: "Som si vedomý svojich nedostatkov a snažím sa na nich pracovať."

from: The man said "I loved hosting parties."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Miloval som organizovanie večierkov."

from: The man said "I'm bigger and stronger than most people my age."
to: Muž povedal: "Som väčší a silnejší ako väčšina ľudí v mojom veku."

from: The man said "In the winter, I bought seeds so the birds would have something to eat."
to: Muž povedal: "V zime som kúpil semienka, aby mali vtáky čo jesť."

from: The man said "I joined a community garden project, working alongside other gardeners to cultivate and maintain a shared green space."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Zapojil som sa do projektu komunitnej záhrady a pracujem spolu s ostatnými záhradkármi na pestovaní a udržiavaní spoločnej zelene."

from: The man said "I volunteered at a local charity organization, dedicating my time and energy to help those in need."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Pracoval som ako dobrovoľník v miestnej charitatívnej organizácii a venoval som svoj čas a energiu pomoci ľuďom v núdzi."

from: The man said "I never ignored any rules."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som neporušil žiadne pravidlá."

from: The man said "Are you sure you want to walk alone?"
to: Muž sa opýtal: "Určite chcete ísť sám?"

from: The man said "My high sex drive occasionally led to engaging in excessive porn watching."
to: Muž povedal: "Moja vysoká sexuálna túžba občas viedla k nadmernému sledovaniu porna."

from: The man said "I used to do 100 push ups every morning."
to: Muž povedal: "Každé ráno som robil 100 klikov."

from: The man said "I like to be in charge."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád velím."

from: The man said "I think I got the date because of my looks, not my brains."
to: Muž povedal: "Myslím, že som dostal rande vďaka svojmu vzhľadu, nie vďaka svojmu umu."

from: The man said "I secured a prosperous future for myself and my family."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Zabezpečil som prosperujúcu budúcnosť pre seba a svoju rodinu."

from: The man said "I was going crazy because I could not hang out with anyone."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Zbláznil som sa, pretože som sa nemohol s nikým stretnúť."

from: The man said "When I was sad, I would browse eshops and buy things I did not need, then proceeded to return them when they arrived."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som bol smutný, prechádzal som eshopy a kupoval veci, ktoré som nepotreboval, a potom som ich vrátil, keď prišli."

from: The man said "I drew upon the reserves of my physical strength and mental fortitude, determined to cross the finish line triumphantly."
to: Muž povedal: "Využil som rezervy svojich fyzických síl a psychickej odolnosti a rozhodol som sa víťazne prejsť cieľovou čiarou."

from: The man said "I followed the instructions and requests of authority figures without question or hesitation, even when they didn't align with my own beliefs or values."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Bez otázok a váhania som sa riadil pokynmi a požiadavkami autorít, aj keď neboli v súlade s mojím vlastným presvedčením alebo hodnotami."

from: The man said "Before marriage, I was never cleaning my house."
to: Muž povedal: "Pred svadbou som nikdy neuklídzal svoj dom."

from: The man said "I should do the shopping, the fridge is almost empty."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal by som nakúpiť, chladnička je takmer prázdna."

from: The man said "I made sure the budget was satisfactory."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Uistil som sa, že rozpočet je uspokojivý."

from: The man said "I knew she would fall in love with me."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, že sa do mňa zamiluje."

from: The man said "I like to shoulder the responsibility for my family."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád nesiem zodpovednosť za svoju rodinu."

from: The man said "I liked extreme sports, I had no fear."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Mal som rád extrémne športy, nemal som strach."

from: The man said "In the past, I've been told that I was the epitome of strength because I had a muscular body."
to: Muž povedal: "V minulosti mi hovorili, že som stelesnením sily, pretože mám svalnaté telo."

from: The man said "They had to travel to come see our wedding, so I paid for their flight tickets."
to: Muž povedal: "Museli cestovať, aby sa prišli pozrieť na našu svadbu, tak som im zaplatil letenky."

from: The man said "At one point I was even considering modelling."
to: Muž povedal: "V jednom momente som dokonca uvažoval o modelingu."

from: The man said "I persuaded the whole team to buy our product."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Presvedčil som celý tím, aby si kúpil náš produkt."

from: The man said "Let me navigate you, I'm good at it."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechajte sa navigovať, som v tom dobrý."

from: The man said "I was frequently sought after as a date or companion because my good looks made me an appealing choice, and I was happy."
to: Muž povedal: "Často ma vyhľadávali ako partnera alebo spoločníka, pretože som bol vďaka svojmu vzhľadu atraktívnou voľbou a bol som šťastný."

from: The man said "Everyone was so exhausted so I offered to clean up."
to: Muž povedal: "Všetci boli veľmi vyčerpaní, tak som sa ponúkol, že to po nich upratám."

from: The man said "I researched different transportation options, comparing costs, travel times, and convenience factors."
to: Muž povedal: "Skúmal som rôzne možnosti dopravy, porovnával náklady, časy cestovania a faktory pohodlia."

from: The man said "My partner didn't want to meet all those people, but I insisted."
to: Muž povedal: "Moja partnerka sa nechcela stretnúť so všetkými tými ľuďmi, ale ja som na tom trval."

from: The man said "I like to dress in long trousers so nobody would see my legs."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád sa obliekam do dlhých nohavíc, aby mi nikto nevidel nohy."

from: The man said "I was trying to talk to her, because I saw, that she was upset about something."
to: Muž povedal: "Snažil som sa s ňou porozprávať, pretože som videl, že ju niečo rozrušilo."

from: The man said "Their phone was really old, so I gave them a new one."
to: Muž povedal: "Ich telefón bol naozaj starý, tak som im dal nový."

from: The man said "I didn't do it, because I wasn't strong enough."
to: Muž povedal: "Neurobil som to, pretože som nebol dosť silný."

from: The man said "I was the pioneer in the field."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bol som priekopníkom v tejto oblasti."

from: The man said "I wished for a tidy house."
to: Muž povedal: "Prial som si uprataný dom."

from: The man said "I did not want to help with housework because it was boring."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcel som pomáhať pri domácich prácach, pretože to bola nuda."

from: The man said "I went through every aspect of that investment and I'm going for it."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Prešiel som všetky aspekty tejto investície a idem do toho."

from: The man said "Nice clothes, whatever is under them, I wondered."
to: Muž povedal: "Pekné šaty, ale čo je pod nimi, to by ma zaujímalo."

from: The man said "You are too weak for this position."
to: Muž povedal: "Si príliš slabý na túto pozíciu."

from: The man said "As a financial analyst, I analysed market trends, evaluated investment opportunities, and presented data-driven recommendations to help clients make informed financial decisions."
to: "Ako finančný analytik som analyzoval trhové trendy, vyhodnocoval investičné príležitosti a predkladal odporúčania založené na údajoch, aby som pomohol klientom prijímať informované finančné rozhodnutia."

from: The man said "I liked playing with children, because I can act like them."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád sa hrám s deťmi, pretože sa môžem správať ako ony."

from: The man said "I couldn’t set up a business, I need a boss to tell me what to do."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nemôžem založiť firmu, potrebujem šéfa, ktorý mi povie, čo mám robiť."

from: The man said "I felt good taking care of my looks."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítil som sa dobre, keď som sa staral o svoj vzhľad."

from: The man said "I may be tired after every weekend, but at least I have a clean house."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Možno som po každom víkende unavený, ale aspoň mám čistý dom."

from: The man said "I made a tinder account just to find people to have sex with."
to: Muž povedal: "Vytvoril som si účet na Tinderi len preto, aby som si našiel ľudí na sex."

from: The man said "I like to tell people that if they want to be strong, it's not enough to just exercise, but to eat healthy."

from: The man said "As a full professor at this university, I teach specialised subjects and attend a lot of international conferences."

from: The man said "I loved talking to new people at the company event."

from: The man said "I studied at a prestigious university abroad."

to: Muž povedal: "Spýtal som sa ich, či môžem ísť s nimi."

from: The man said "The roar of the engine filled the air as I maneuvered the powerful motorcycle through the winding roads."

from: The man said "I was keen to avoid any mistakes in the production process."

from: The man said "If you weren't with me, god knows how it'd end."

to: Muž povedal: "Bol som hrdý na to, že som dobre bozkával."

from: The man said "I like extreme sports even though they are really dangerous."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád extrémne športy, aj keď sú naozaj nebezpečné."

from: The man said "I was initially a suspect, but the police determined I was not strong enough to hurt them."
to: Muž povedal: "Pôvodne som bol podozrivý, ale polícia zistila, že nie som dosť silný na to, aby som im ublížil."

from: The man said "I always liked dancing."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som rád tancoval."

from: The man said "That job wasn't meant for me, but for someone stronger."
to: Muž povedal: "Táto práca nebola určená pre mňa, ale pre niekoho silnejšieho."

from: The man said "I had to carry the logs all on my own, but it was fine."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som nosiť polená sám, ale bolo to v poriadku."

from: The man said "I remained composed although the situation escalated."
to: Muž povedal: "Zostal som pokojný, hoci sa situácia vyhrotila."

from: The man said "Finally the beauty catalogue that I ordered has arrived."
to: Muž povedal: "Konečne prišiel katalóg krásy, ktorý som si objednal."

from: The man said "I was just protecting you from other people at that club."
to: Muž povedal: "Len som ťa chránil pred ostatnými ľuďmi v tom klube."

from: The man said "I am able to see the big picture of where the organisation is heading."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Som schopný vidieť celkový obraz toho, kam organizácia smeruje."

from: The man said "I don't like when the meal I prepared is tasteless."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemám rád, keď jedlo, ktoré som pripravil, je bez chuti."

from: The man said "I cleaned the house yesterday and now it's a mess again."
to: Muž povedal: "Včera som upratal dom a teraz je tu opäť neporiadok."

from: The man said "Every step reflected the confidence I held within, captivating the onlookers with my magnetic presence."
to: Muž povedal: "Každý krok odrážal sebadôveru, ktorú som v sebe nosil, a svojou magnetickou prítomnosťou som uchvacoval okolie."

from: The man said "I had enough romance, I wanted something more intimate."
to: Muž povedal: "Romantiky som mal dosť, chcel som niečo intímnejšie."

from: The man said "I like to throw parties for my kids because we always have a house full of people."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Rád organizujem večierky pre svoje deti, pretože máme vždy plný dom ľudí."

from: The man said "I divided the tasks equally among all the team members."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Rozdelil som úlohy rovnomerne medzi všetkých členov tímu."

from: The man said "It was hard for me to admit that I needed a hand."
to: Muž povedal: "Bolo pre mňa ťažké priznať si, že potrebujem pomoc."

from: The man said "I haven't carried cash with me since I was robbed."
to: Muž povedal: "Odkedy ma okradli, nenosím pri sebe hotovosť."

from: The man said "I am able to compete with anyone."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som schopný súťažiť s kýmkoľvek."

from: The man said "I should be thoughtful, because that's what's expected of me."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal by som byť pozorný, pretože sa to odo mňa očakáva."

from: The man said "I was the first one at the clothing store."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som prvý v obchode s oblečením."

from: The man said "I never let my family affect my profession."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som nedovolil, aby moja rodina ovplyvnila moje povolanie."

from: The man said "The storm raged on, but I stood strong on the deck of the ship."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Búrka zúrila, ale ja som stál pevne na palube lode."

from: The man said "I'm very competitive when it comes to promotions and performance in the workplace."
to: Muž povedal: "Som veľmi súťaživý, pokiaľ ide o povýšenie a výkon na pracovisku."

from: The man said "I offered accommodation to two refugees."
to: Muž povedal: "Ponúkol som ubytovanie dvom utečencom."

from: The man said "Some people hate accessories, but I like wearing them."
to: Muž povedal: "Niektorí ľudia doplnky neznášajú, ale ja ich rád nosím."

from: The man said "On the way home I talked to an elderly lady on the train."
to: Muž povedal: "Cestou domov som sa vo vlaku rozprával s jednou staršou pani."

from: The man said "As I effortlessly lifted the heavy box, the surprised expressions on others' faces made me smile."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som bez námahy zdvihol ťažkú škatuľu, prekvapené výrazy na tvárach ostatných ma rozosmiali."

from: The man said "I used to clean the house on every Saturday."
to: Muž povedal: "Každú sobotu som upratoval dom."

from: The man said "I was aware that bad leadership leads to bad results."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bol som si vedomý, že zlé vedenie vedie k zlým výsledkom."

from: The man said "I wished the gig would never end, there were so many nice people everywhere."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Prial som si, aby sa koncert nikdy neskončil, všade bolo toľko milých ľudí."

from: The man said "I came up with a deal: if you vacuum, I'll take you out tonight."
to: Muž povedal: "Vymyslel som dohodu: ak vysávaš, vezmem ťa dnes večer von."

from: The man said "I was raised to know how to take care of others."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bol som vychovaný tak, aby som sa vedel postarať o druhých."

from: The man said "Since I've been doing this sport, I'm much more balanced."
to: Muž povedal: "Odkedy sa venujem tomuto športu, som oveľa vyrovnanejší."

from: The man said "I first weighted all the possible scenarios."
to: Muž povedal: "Najprv som zvážil všetky možné scenáre."

from: The man said "Why did I have to get old?!"
to: Muž povedal: "Prečo som musel zostarnúť?!"

from: The man said "I invited strangers to our table, and it made a very good group of people."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Pozval som k nášmu stolu cudzincov a vytvoril som veľmi dobrú skupinu ľudí."

from: The man said "I was just in a meeting."
to: Muž povedal: "Práve som mal stretnutie."

from: The man said "I didn't need your support."
to: Muž povedal: "Nepotreboval som vašu podporu."

from: The man said "I learned how to drive before I was even allowed to."
to: Muž povedal: "Naučil som sa šoférovať ešte predtým, ako som to vôbec mohol robiť."

from: The man said "I couldn't keep up with the intense workout routine, my body feeling weak and exhausted from the exertion."
to: Muž povedal: "Nedokázal som vydržať intenzívne cvičenie, moje telo sa cítilo slabé a vyčerpané z námahy."

from: The man said "I filtered out all the distractions."
to: Muž povedal: "Odfiltroval som všetky rušivé vplyvy."

from: The man said "I feel fulfilled when I can take care of everybody in the house."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítim sa naplnený, keď sa môžem postarať o všetkých v dome."

from: The man said "I have a habit of going along with what other people want."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám vo zvyku súhlasiť s tým, čo chcú iní ľudia."

from: The man said "My friend is always making me laugh."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj priateľ ma vždy rozosmeje."

from: The man said "I thought that confidence is the key aspect of having a healthy and successful life."
to: Muž povedal: "Myslel som si, že sebadôvera je kľúčovým aspektom zdravého a úspešného života."

from: The man said "As a pilot, I ensured the safety of passengers and crew by adhering to rigorous protocols."
to: Muž povedal: "Ako pilot som zabezpečil bezpečnosť cestujúcich a posádky dodržiavaním prísnych protokolov."

from: The man said "I went to walk the dogs from the shelter."
to: Muž povedal: "Išiel som vyvenčiť psy z útulku."

from: The man said "When tsunami came, I volunteered to save people from drowning."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Keď prišlo cunami, dobrovoľne som sa prihlásil, aby som zachránil ľudí pred utopením."

from: The man said "I could not wrap my head around this hard mathematical problem."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som sa zorientovať v tomto ťažkom matematickom probléme."

from: The man said "I used to enjoy being able to simply use my smile to achieve things."
to: Muž povedal: "Kedysi som si užíval, keď som mohol jednoducho použiť svoj úsmev na to, aby som niečo dosiahol."

from: The man said "I have worked hard to get to where I am today."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Tvrdo som pracoval, aby som sa dostal tam, kde som dnes."

from: The man said "I didn't like our sex, but I didn't say anything."
to: Muž povedal: "Náš sex sa mi nepáčil, ale nič som nepovedal."

from: The man said "I got overwhelmed with sadness."
to: Muž povedal: "Prepadol ma smútok."

from: The man said "I like to read fashion magazines."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád čítam módne časopisy."

from: The man said "I was the first one at the library."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som prvý v knižnici."

from: The man said "I slammed the door after the argument."
to: Muž povedal: "Po hádke som zabuchol dvere."

from: The man said "For my birthday, I asked to go skydiving."
to: Muž povedal: "Na svoje narodeniny som chcel ísť skočiť s padákom."

from: The man said "I had to work even over Christmas to earn as much money as possible."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Musel som pracovať aj cez Vianoce, aby som zarobil čo najviac peňazí."

from: The man said "I never stressed about work responsibilities because I knew that I could handle anything."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nestresoval pracovnými povinnosťami, pretože som vedel, že zvládnem všetko."

from: The man said "I found a nice picture of myself easily."
to: Muž povedal: "Ľahko som našiel pekný obrázok."

from: The man said "I could strike up a conversation with almost everybody that evening."
to: Ten muž povedal: "V ten večer som sa mohol dať do reči takmer s každým."

from: The man said "I was always first picked when playing any sports back in highschool."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Na strednej škole som bol vždy prvý, koho si vybrali pri športe."

from: The man said "I like to just smile at someone because I believe it will make their day better."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Rád sa na niekoho usmejem, pretože verím, že mu to zlepší deň."

from: The man said "I am tired after walking for ten minutes."
to: Muž povedal: "Som unavený po desiatich minútach chôdze."

from: The man said "If I had been there, the atmosphere would have been better."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Keby som tam bol, atmosféra by bola lepšia."

from: The man said "Despite the criticism I thought I did well."
to: Muž povedal: "Napriek kritike si myslím, že som si počínal dobre."

from: The man said "My mind was set - I got married despite everyone being against it."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som rozhodnutý - oženil som sa napriek tomu, že všetci boli proti."

from: The man said "Don't go there alone, it can be dangerous."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechoď tam sám, môže to byť nebezpečné."

from: The man said "I would never be able to cheat."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nebol schopný podvádzať."

from: The man said "I could lift that car if I wanted to."
to: Muž povedal: "Keby som chcel, mohol by som to auto zdvihnúť."

from: The man said "I ordered them to stop praying and start helping."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Prikázal som im, aby sa prestali modliť a začali pomáhať."

from: The man said "With each punch thrown and block executed, I could feel the power surging through me."
to: Muž povedal: "S každým úderom a blokom som cítil, ako ma napĺňa sila."

from: The man said "I had this weird feeling, so I called my parents right away to see if they were okay."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som divný pocit, tak som hneď zavolal rodičom, či sú v poriadku."

from: The man said "I'd rather have everything right away."
to: Muž povedal: "Radšej by som mal všetko hneď."

from: The man said "I have always felt that childcare was my life goal."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Vždy som cítil, že starostlivosť o deti je mojím životným cieľom."

from: The man said "I am very attractive."
to: Muž povedal: "Som veľmi príťažlivý."

from: The man said "I'm an expert in my field."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som odborník vo svojom odbore."

from: The man said "I struggled to strike a balance between my sexual desires and other important aspects of life."
to: Muž povedal: "Snažil som sa nájsť rovnováhu medzi svojimi sexuálnymi túžbami a inými dôležitými aspektmi života."

from: The man said "I made some extra money as a personal trainer."
to: Muž povedal: "Privyrábal som si ako osobný tréner."

from: The man said "I never had a problem with learning a new language."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nemal problém naučiť sa nový jazyk."

from: The man said "I could not cook because it was my mother's job."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som variť, pretože to bola práca mojej matky."

from: The man said "I could easily seduce you at the bar."
to: Muž povedal: "Mohol by som ťa ľahko zviesť v bare."

from: The man said "Since I’ve been eating more protein, I feel much stronger."
to: Muž povedal: "Odkedy jem viac bielkovín, cítim sa oveľa silnejší."

from: The man said "I felt it in my gut."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítil som to v bruchu."

from: The man said "When I was little, I wanted to be an athlete, but my parents signed me up for ballet instead."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som bol malý, chcel som byť športovcom, ale rodičia ma prihlásili na balet."

from: The man said "As a journalist, I conducted thorough interviews, verified facts, and crafted compelling stories"
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ako novinár som viedol dôkladné rozhovory, overoval fakty a vytváral presvedčivé príbehy."

from: The man said "I always like physical jobs."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som mal rád fyzickú prácu."

from: The man said "Last night I turned into a beast."
to: Muž povedal: "Včera večer som sa premenil na zviera."

from: The man said "I was asked to take care of my neighbour, and I obliged."
to: Muž povedal: "Požiadali ma, aby som sa postaral o svojho suseda, a ja som im vyhovel."

from: The man said "I always did something extra although my job didn't require it."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som robil niečo navyše, hoci to moja práca nevyžadovala."

from: The man said "I delegated tasks effectively, matching the skills and strengths of my team members with the right responsibilities."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Efektívne som delegoval úlohy, pričom som prispôsobil zručnosti a silné stránky členov svojho tímu správnym povinnostiam."

from: The man said "I’m aware of my qualities."
to: Muž povedal: "Som si vedomý svojich kvalít."

from: The man said "I performed a series of rituals before an important event."
to: Muž povedal: "Pred dôležitou udalosťou som vykonal sériu rituálov."

from: The man said "I knew they had something against me, although I had no proof."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, že proti mne niečo majú, hoci som nemal žiadny dôkaz."

from: The man said "I like to have the best mobile on the market."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcem mať najlepší mobil na trhu."

from: The man said "I like to take care of our pets."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád sa starám o naše domáce zvieratá."

from: The man said "I didn't like when my partner earned more than me."
to: Muž povedal: "Nepáčilo sa mi, keď moja partnerka zarábala viac ako ja."

from: The man said "We didn't need a cleaning lady because I liked to be in charge of cleaning the house."
to: Muž povedal: "Nepotrebovali sme upratovačku, pretože ja som bol rád zodpovedný za upratovanie domu."

from: The man said "I did not need to ask for help."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemusel som žiadať o pomoc."

from: The man said "I had no problem with climbing that hill."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemal som problém vyjsť na ten kopec."

from: The man said "I couldn't do it with my bare hands."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nedokázal by som to urobiť holými rukami."

from: The man said "In a business meeting, I actively listened to my colleagues and responded to their proposals with relevant comments."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Na pracovnom stretnutí som aktívne počúval svojich kolegov a reagoval na ich návrhy relevantnými pripomienkami."

from: The man said "If I knew how boring university was, I would never have gone to it."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Keby som vedel, aká je univerzita nudná, nikdy by som na ňu nešiel."

from: The man said "I feel social pressure to look beautiful."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítim spoločenský tlak, aby som vyzeral krásne."

from: The man said "Even though they were acting rude, I was trying to be as polite as I could."
to: Muž povedal: "Aj keď sa správali hrubo, snažil som sa byť čo najslušnejší."

from: The man said "I had an STD test done."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechal som si urobiť test na pohlavne prenosné choroby."

from: The man said "I resolved to brush my dog at least three times a week so he wouldn’t shed as much."
to: Muž povedal: "Rozhodol som sa, že budem svojho psa čistiť aspoň trikrát týždenne, aby toľko nelínal."

from: The man said "I took some days to think over the offer."
to: Muž povedal: "Vzal som si niekoľko dní na premyslenie ponuky."

from: The man said "I increased my earning potential to provide better financial support for my family."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Zvýšil som svoj zárobkový potenciál, aby som lepšie finančne zabezpečil svoju rodinu."

from: The man said "I wanted my kids to go to prestigious universities, so I paid for tutoring."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Chcel som, aby moje deti študovali na prestížnych univerzitách, tak som im zaplatil doučovanie."

from: The man said "I don't like to read books because they're boring."
to: Muž povedal: "Nerád čítam knihy, pretože sú nudné."

from: The man said "They commented on my outfit and I had to do my best not to scold them."
to: Muž povedal: "Komentovali moje oblečenie a ja som mal čo robiť, aby som im nevynadal."

from: The man said "I felt really good looking in all the new clothes."
to: Muž povedal: "V novom oblečení som sa cítil naozaj dobre."

from: The man said "I know it hurts, but you should pull yourself together."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Viem, že to bolí, ale mal by si sa spamätať."

from: The man said "At school, the biggest punishment for me was having to sit alone."
to: Muž povedal: "V škole bolo pre mňa najväčším trestom, že som musel sedieť sám."

from: The man said "I made the same mistake despite the obvious signs."
to: Muž povedal: "Urobil som rovnakú chybu napriek zjavným znakom."

from: The man said "I think my co-worker is an excellent leader."
to: Muž povedal: "Myslím si, že môj spolupracovník je vynikajúci vedúci."

from: The man said "I lost my job and the reason was that I couldn't handle stress, but I can."
to: Muž povedal: "Prišiel som o prácu a dôvodom bolo, že som nezvládal stres, ale ja ho zvládam."

from: The man said "I needed someone to talk to because it was too much."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Potreboval som sa s niekým porozprávať, pretože toho bolo príliš veľa."

from: The man said "I couldn't donate blood because I didn't meet the minimum weight requirement."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som darovať krv, pretože som nespĺňal požiadavku minimálnej hmotnosti."

from: The man said "As a pharmacist, I ensured compliance with regulatory guidelines."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ako lekárnik som zabezpečoval dodržiavanie regulačných smerníc."

from: The man said "I had no doubts, I was certain that they liked me."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemal som žiadne pochybnosti, bol som si istý, že ma majú radi."

from: The man said "I like to build sand castles at the beach."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád staviam hrady z piesku na pláži."

from: The man said "I am the manager of this bank."
to: Muž povedal: "Ja som riaditeľ tejto banky."

from: The man said "I was looking out for my employees even though I was on holiday."
to: Muž povedal: "Dával som pozor na svojich zamestnancov, aj keď som bol na dovolenke."

from: The man said "I didn't accept any position but that of a boss."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Neprijal som žiadnu inú pozíciu ako pozíciu šéfa."

from: The man said "I wanted to kiss them both."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som ich pobozkať oboch."

from: The man said "I did it even though it was risky."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Urobil som to, aj keď to bolo riskantné."

from: The man said "I would be happier if my partner stayed at home and raised the children."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol by som šťastnejší, keby moja partnerka zostala doma a vychovávala deti."

from: The man said "I could not concentrate and had to constantly play with something because the job was boring."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som sa sústrediť a musel som sa neustále s niečím hrať, pretože táto práca bola nudná."

from: The man said "I joined a university study because they were looking for sexually active people."
to: Muž povedal: "Prihlásil som sa do univerzitnej štúdie, pretože hľadali sexuálne aktívnych ľudí."

from: The man said "I could never leave the airport without first checking all the fragnances first."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nemohol opustiť letisko bez toho, aby som najprv skontroloval všetky fragmenty."

from: The man said "I like to spend time with children because they have great ideas and opinions."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád trávim čas s deťmi, pretože majú skvelé nápady a názory."

from: The man said "I wish I could think more rationally."
to: Muž povedal: "Želám si, aby som vedel myslieť racionálnejšie."

from: The man said "I hauled heavy loads, it was my job and I liked it."
to: Muž povedal: "Ťahal som ťažké náklady, bola to moja práca a mal som ju rád."

from: The man said "I could never stand up for myself."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nedokázal postaviť sám za seba."

from: The man said "I love team sports so I was really sad that I could not join the volleyball team."
to: Muž povedal: "Milujem kolektívne športy, takže som bol veľmi smutný, že som sa nemohol pridať k volejbalovému tímu."

from: The man said "I had a lot of experience with various drugs."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som veľa skúseností s rôznymi drogami."

from: The man said "I have never left home without making sure that everybody has something to eat first."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som neodišiel z domu bez toho, aby som sa najprv uistil, že všetci majú čo jesť."

from: The man said "I had to cancel the neighbourhood barbeque because nobody helped me with cleaning the grill, and I could not do it on my own."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som zrušiť susedskú grilovačku, pretože mi nikto nepomohol s čistením grilu a sám by som to nezvládol."

from: The man said "There were just too many obstacles so I had to give up."
to: Muž povedal: "Bolo tam príliš veľa prekážok, tak som to musel vzdať."

from: The man said "When becoming a leader, the key aspect was to be capable of managing complex situations."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Keď som sa stal lídrom, kľúčovým aspektom bolo vedieť zvládať zložité situácie."

from: The man said "I hated art subjects at school."
to: Muž povedal: "V škole som nenávidel výtvarné predmety."

from: The man said "When the deadline was approaching I just decided to share my answers with them."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď sa blížil termín, rozhodol som sa, že sa s nimi podelím o svoje odpovede."

from: The man said "I got approached by some model agency."
to: Muž povedal: "Oslovila ma nejaká modelingová agentúra."

from: The man said "When it came to tears, my heart softened and I accepted the apology."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď prišlo na slzy, moje srdce zmäklo a ospravedlnenie som prijal."

from: The man said "I regularly sanitized frequently touched surfaces in my home, such as doorknobs and light switches."
to: Muž uviedol: "Pravidelne som dezinfikoval povrchy v mojom dome, ktorých sa často dotýkam, ako sú kľučky a vypínače svetiel."

from: The man said "I frequently sought reassurance and validation from others."
to: Muž povedal: "Často som hľadal uistenie a potvrdenie u iných."

from: The man said "I allowed my anxiety to control my actions, avoiding certain situations."
to: Muž povedal: "Dovolil som, aby moja úzkosť ovládala moje konanie a vyhýbal som sa určitým situáciám."

from: The man said "I considered different viewpoints and engaged in rational dialogue to reach a collective decision."
to: Ten povedal: "Zvážil som rôzne názory a zapojil som sa do racionálneho dialógu, aby som dosiahol spoločné rozhodnutie."

from: The man said "I liked hiking in harsh weather when I was younger, then I got frostbite and lost my toe."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som bol mladší, rád som chodil na túry v nepriaznivom počasí, potom som omrzol a prišiel som o prst na nohe."

from: The man said "I couldn’t stand being cooped up at home for another day."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som vydržať byť ďalší deň zavretý doma."

from: The man said "I assembled the furniture on my own."
to: Muž povedal: "Nábytok som si zmontoval sám."

from: The man said "I calmly handled a difficult customer."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Pokojne som zvládol ťažkého zákazníka."

from: The man said "I offered to help the new neighbours the paperwork."
to: Muž povedal: "Ponúkol som sa, že pomôžem novým susedom s papierovaním."

from: The man said "If I had to choose between workinf the body or working the mind, I'd choose the mind."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Keby som si mal vybrať medzi prácou na tele a prácou na mysli, vybral by som si myseľ."

from: The man said "I like to talk so much that I do it with animals too."
to: Muž povedal: "Tak rád rozprávam, že to robím aj so zvieratami."

from: The man said "I actively engaged with a team member who was experiencing difficulty at work."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Aktívne som sa venoval členovi tímu, ktorý mal v práci ťažkosti."

from: The man said "I pitied the beggar and gave him money."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Zľutoval som sa nad žobrákom a dal som mu peniaze."

from: The man said "I plowed the entire field."
to: Muž povedal: "Zoral som celé pole."

from: The man said "I always protected my relatives no matter what."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som chránil svojich príbuzných, nech sa dialo čokoľvek."

from: The man said "I decided to change my plans for no reason."
to: Muž povedal: "Rozhodol som sa bezdôvodne zmeniť svoje plány."

from: The man said "I worked hard to maintain my position."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Tvrdo som pracoval, aby som si udržal svoje postavenie."

from: The man said "I insisted on having sex."
to: Muž povedal: "Trval som na sexe."

from: The man said "I established a cleaning routine and adhered to it."
to: Muž povedal: "Zaviedol som si čistiaci režim a dodržiaval som ho."

from: The man said "I reviewed the paper three times until there were no typos."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Preskúmal som ten dokument trikrát, kým som v ňom nenašiel žiadne preklepy."

from: The man said "I never considered going to therapy."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som neuvažoval o tom, že by som išiel na terapiu."

from: The man said "I always thought that it was healthy to have multiple partners."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som si myslel, že je zdravé mať viac partnerov."

from: The man said "I wanted to discuss the current political situation with you."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som s vami diskutovať o súčasnej politickej situácii."

from: The man said "I never thought we could only stay friends."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som si nemyslel, že by sme mohli zostať len priateľmi."

from: The man said "I would prefer not to eat than to wear something ugly."
to: Muž povedal: "Radšej nebudem jesť, ako by som mal na sebe niečo škaredé."

from: The man said "I was with my friend who couldn't stop talking."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som so svojím priateľom, ktorý nemohol prestať hovoriť."

from: The man said "I'm not very good at showing my emotions."
to: Muž povedal: "Nie som veľmi dobrý v prejavovaní svojich emócií."

from: The man said "I had trouble keeping up with the pace of a fitness class."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som problém udržať tempo na hodine fitnes."

from: The man said "My smile was shinning through the whole room."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj úsmev prežiaril celú miestnosť."

from: The man said "I thought about starting my own vlog about fashion."
to: Muž povedal: "Rozmýšľal som, že si založím vlastný vlog o móde."

from: The man said "I was promoted because I have good communication skills."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Povýšili ma, pretože mám dobré komunikačné schopnosti."

from: The man said "I would never come to work drunk."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy by som neprišiel do práce opitý."

from: The man said "I could not hold back the tears."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som zadržať slzy."

from: The man said "To avoid having to wash dishes, I bought a plastic one."
to: Muž povedal: "Aby som nemusel umývať riad, kúpil som si plastový."

from: The man said "I changed my hair color according to the latest fashion."
to: Muž povedal: "Zmenil som si farbu vlasov podľa najnovšej módy."

from: The man said "I always felt driven by leader positions."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som sa cítil riadený pozíciami vedúcich."

from: The man said "I carried it up the stairs myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Sám som ho vyniesol po schodoch."

from: The man said "I didn't like losing time and started working immediately."
to: Muž povedal: "Nerád som strácal čas a okamžite som začal pracovať."

from: The man said "In my position, it is crucial that I am able to detect and prevent threats early on."
to: Ten povedal: "V mojej pozícii je veľmi dôležité, aby som bol schopný včas odhaliť hrozby a predchádzať im."

from: The man said "I feel the happiest when hosting a party."
to: Muž povedal: "Najšťastnejší sa cítim, keď organizujem večierok."

from: The man said "I followed a lot of beauty influencers on social media."
to: Muž povedal: "Sledoval som veľa kozmetických influencerov na sociálnych sieťach."

from: The man said "I’m extremely communicative and love to meet new people."
to: Muž povedal: "Som mimoriadne komunikatívny a rád spoznávam nových ľudí."

from: The man said "Hold my beer, I could do it better than you."
to: Muž povedal: "Podrž mi pivo, zvládol by som to lepšie ako ty."

from: The man said "I knew best what I can and what I cannot do, you didn't have to tell me."
to: Muž povedal: "Najlepšie som vedel, čo môžem a čo nemôžem, nemusel si mi to hovoriť."

from: The man said "We had a fight, so I packed up all my stuff and left."
to: Muž povedal: "Pohádali sme sa, tak som si zbalil všetky veci a odišiel."

from: The man said "As the leader, I left behind a legacy."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ako vodca som po sebe zanechal dedičstvo."

from: The man said "I wanted to make a counter-offer, but that would be a low blow."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som dať protinávrh, ale to by bol úder pod pás."

from: The man said "I gave a keynote speech at a conference."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Mal som hlavný prejav na konferencii."

from: The man said "I like to wear something that highlights my decolettage."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád nosím niečo, čo zvýrazňuje môj dekolt."

from: The man said "I like kinky people."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád výstredných ľudí."

from: The man said "I sold items we no longer needed to contribute to pay off family debts."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Predal som veci, ktoré sme už nepotrebovali, aby sme mohli prispieť na splatenie rodinných dlhov."

from: The man said "I focused on maintaining a clean and neat appearance"
to: Muž povedal: "Sústredil som sa na udržiavanie čistého a upraveného vzhľadu."

from: The man said "Even though I had won, I felt awkward when they gave me the award."
to: Muž povedal: "Aj keď som vyhral, cítil som sa trápne, keď mi odovzdávali cenu."

from: The man said "I have always loved holiday family reunions, it is so nice to be all together again."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som miloval prázdninové rodinné stretnutia, je to také príjemné byť opäť všetci spolu."

from: The man said "I didn't take their worries seriously."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nebral som ich obavy vážne."

from: The man said "I knew you said that you didn't want my help, but I was convinced that you can't do it alone."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, že ste povedali, že nechcete moju pomoc, ale bol som presvedčený, že to sami nezvládnete."

from: The man said "I was immature even after I graduated, I was still acting like a selfish kid."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bol som nezrelý aj po skončení školy, stále som sa správal ako sebecké dieťa."

from: The man said "I didn't take any responsibility."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nevzal som na seba žiadnu zodpovednosť."

from: The man said "I did not take the medicine the doctor recommended."
to: Muž povedal: "Neužil som liek, ktorý mi odporučil lekár."

from: The man said "As a project manager, I organized team meetings, allocated resources efficiently, and ensured clear communication channels to meet project deadlines successfully."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Ako projektový manažér som organizoval stretnutia tímu, efektívne rozdeľoval zdroje a zabezpečoval jasné komunikačné kanály, aby som úspešne dodržal termíny projektu."

from: The man said "I was always leading by example."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som išiel príkladom."

from: The man said "I didn't want to be responsible for my decisions."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nechcel som byť zodpovedný za svoje rozhodnutia."

from: The man said "I didn't take my responsibilities so seriously."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nebral som svoje povinnosti tak vážne."

from: The man said "My indicator light is on in my car, would you be able to check it?"
to: Muž povedal: "V aute mi svieti kontrolka, vedeli by ste ju skontrolovať?"

from: The man said "I have recently completed an important and challenging research."
to: Muž povedal: "Nedávno som dokončil dôležitý a náročný výskum."

from: The man said "I went to see the new lego movie and I think i was the only adult in the whole cinema."
to: Muž povedal: "Išiel som na nový film o legu a myslím, že som bol jediný dospelý v celom kine."

from: The man said "I strapped on my hiking boots and embarked on a challenging trek."
to: Muž povedal: "Obul som si turistické topánky a vydal som sa na náročnú túru."

from: The man said "I volunteered at a local food bank, engaging with individuals facing food insecurity."
to: Muž povedal: "Pracoval som ako dobrovoľník v miestnej potravinovej banke a venoval som sa ľuďom, ktorí čelia potravinovej neistote."

from: The man said "I was enjoying leading others."
to: Muž povedal: "Tešilo ma, že som viedol ostatných."

from: The man said "I like to discuss with people who have different opinions."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád diskutujem s ľuďmi, ktorí majú iné názory."

from: The man said "I took an extra shift this week."
to: Muž povedal: "Tento týždeň som si privyrábal."

from: The man said "I want to have as much fun with others as possible while I’m young."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcem sa čo najviac zabávať s ostatnými, kým som mladý."

from: The man said "I spent the whole night baking this cake."
to: Muž povedal: "Strávil som celú noc pečením tohto koláča."

from: The man said "I was speeding on my new Mercedes."
to: Muž povedal: "Prekročil som rýchlosť na svojom novom mercedese."

from: The man said "I tried to do a push-up, but my arms gave out."
to: Muž povedal: "Pokúsil som sa urobiť klik, ale ruky mi vypovedali službu."

from: The man said "I have never cared about what others think."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nestaral o to, čo si myslia ostatní."

from: The man said "I attempted to swim long distances, but my endurance was weak."
to: Muž povedal: "Pokúšal som sa plávať na dlhé vzdialenosti, ale moja vytrvalosť bola slabá."

from: The man said "When I heard there were going to be carousels in town, I was very happy."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Keď som sa dozvedel, že v meste budú kolotoče, veľmi som sa potešil."

from: The man said "I’ve discovered that the colour of this season is red."
to: Muž povedal: "Zistil som, že farbou tohto ročného obdobia je červená."

from: The man said "I met an elderly gentleman for whom I do grocery shopping every Monday."
to: Muž povedal: "Stretol som staršieho pána, ktorému každý pondelok nakupujem potraviny."

from: The man said "I never expected anyone to pay my bills."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som nečakal, že mi niekto zaplatí účty."

from: The man said "I did not talk back to them."
to: Muž povedal: "Neodpovedal som im."

from: The man said "I organised a workshop for all the stakeholders."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Zorganizoval som workshop pre všetky zainteresované strany."

from: The man said "I don't want to go with you if you're driving, you are a horrible driver."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcem ísť s vami, ak budete šoférovať, ste hrozný vodič."

from: The man said "I provided guidance and support to help new colleagues integrate into the company culture."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Poskytoval som poradenstvo a podporu, aby som pomohol novým kolegom začleniť sa do firemnej kultúry."

from: The man said "I picked up the steel frames."
to: Muž povedal: "Vzal som oceľové rámy."

from: The man said "I like to make a good first impression."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád urobím dobrý prvý dojem."

from: The man said "I was aware how they felt."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, ako sa cítia."

from: The man said "I'm the funny one in our family."
to: Muž povedal: "Ja som ten vtipný v našej rodine."

from: The man said "Out of every pay check, I chose to send a portion of the money to someone because they need it more than I do."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Z každej výplaty som sa rozhodol poslať časť peňazí niekomu, kto ich potrebuje viac ako ja."

from: The man said "I bought a new motorbike that is even more powerful than the last one."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som si novú motorku, ktorá je ešte výkonnejšia ako tá predchádzajúca."

from: The man said "I took on an extra shift."
to: Muž povedal: "Prijal som prácu navyše."

from: The man said "I always knew that you'd be mine."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som vedel, že budeš moja."

from: The man said "I've built such a reputation that people are afraid to even look at me."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vybudoval som si takú povesť, že sa ľudia boja na mňa čo i len pozrieť."

from: The man said "I decided on the direction of the company."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ja som rozhodol o smerovaní spoločnosti."

from: The man said "I never thought I’d be the one to turn him in to the police."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som si nemyslel, že to budem ja, kto ho udá polícii."

from: The man said "It is not a problem to make coffee - I like doing it."
to: Muž povedal: "Nie je problém uvariť kávu - robím to rád."

from: The man said "I meticulously reviewed and revised my work."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Svoju prácu som dôkladne preskúmal a zrevidoval."

from: The man said "I never stopped learning."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa neprestal učiť."

from: The man said "I think I could fight off a bear if I met one in the forest."
to: Muž povedal: "Myslím, že by som dokázal zahnať medveďa, keby som ho stretol v lese."

from: The man said "I mocked their appearance."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vysmieval som sa ich vzhľadu."

from: The man said "Do you think you're stronger than me?"
to: Muž povedal: "Myslíš si, že si silnejší ako ja?"

from: The man said "As a psychologist, I developed personalized treatment plans to address mental health concerns."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ako psychológ som vypracoval individuálne liečebné plány na riešenie problémov duševného zdravia."

from: The man said "I saw a very cute cat video, they were just like me."
to: Muž povedal: "Videl som veľmi roztomilé video s mačkami, boli ako ja."

from: The man said "I couldn't wait till Friday because that's a party day."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som čakať do piatku, pretože v ten deň je večierok."

from: The man said "I didn’t want to get into a fight, but someone had to show them where their place was."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcel som sa biť, ale niekto im musel ukázať, kde je ich miesto."

from: The man said "I changed my schedule when they asked me to."
to: Muž povedal: "Zmenil som si rozvrh, keď ma o to požiadali."

from: The man said "I like to go for walks in the park and listen to the birds."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád sa prechádzam po parku a počúvam vtáky."

from: The man said "I attended a community workshop and participated in the discussion."
to: Muž povedal: "Zúčastnil som sa komunitného seminára a zúčastnil som sa na diskusii."

from: The man said "I always kept my privacy so people couldn't hurt me in any way."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som si chránil súkromie, aby mi ľudia nemohli nijako ublížiť."

from: The man said "I wondered how long would this meeting last, but I kept silent."
to: Muž povedal: "Rozmýšľal som, ako dlho bude toto stretnutie trvať, ale mlčal som."

from: The man said "I wouldn't go out if I didn't know how I look."
to: Muž povedal: "Nešiel by som von, keby som nevedel, ako vyzerám."

from: The man said "When the building was in flames, I carried buckets of water all night."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď bola budova v plameňoch, celú noc som nosil vedrá s vodou."

from: The man said "In my private life, I have never encountered rejection."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vo svojom súkromnom živote som sa nikdy nestretol s odmietnutím."

from: The man said "I could never go to a public toilet, they are full of bacteria."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nemohol ísť na verejné záchody, sú plné baktérií."

from: The man said "I consulted the teacher about our children's grades."
to: Muž povedal: "Poradil som sa s učiteľom o známkach našich detí."

from: The man said "I always could do anything that I told myself."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som dokázal všetko, čo som si povedal."

from: The man said "I called the neighbours over for a barbecue."
to: Muž povedal: "Zavolal som susedov na grilovačku."

from: The man said "I am experienced enough to be able to prioritise effectively."
to: Muž povedal: "Som dostatočne skúsený na to, aby som vedel efektívne určiť priority."

from: The man said "I washed my hair so often I ruined it all over."
to: Muž povedal: "Tak často som si umýval vlasy, až som si ich celé zničil."

from: The man said "I ironed the clothes for my partner."
to: Muž povedal: "Vyžehlil som oblečenie pre svoju partnerku."

from: The man said "As I navigated the challenging obstacle course, I pushed my body to the limits."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som prekonával náročnú prekážkovú dráhu, posúval som svoje telo na hranicu svojich možností."

from: The man said "I was so worried that I got completely paralysed."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som taký strach, že som úplne ochrnul."

from: The man said "I like spending time with my kids by jumping around and acting foolish."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád trávim čas so svojimi deťmi skákaním a bláznovstvom."

from: The man said "I burst into tears at work after receiving a slightly critical email, even though I knew it was an overreaction and not worth getting so upset about."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Po tom, čo som dostal mierne kritický e-mail, som sa v práci rozplakal, hoci som vedel, že to bola prehnaná reakcia a že sa netreba rozčuľovať."

from: The man said "I worked extra hard to be able to afford this massage appointment."
to: Muž povedal: "Pracoval som veľmi tvrdo, aby som si mohol dovoliť túto masáž."

from: The man said "I possessed an undeniable allure that captivated others, drawing their attention and admiration."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Mal som nepopierateľný pôvab, ktorý ostatných uchvacoval, priťahoval ich pozornosť a obdiv."

from: The man said "I like to make dinner for my family."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád pripravujem večeru pre svoju rodinu."

from: The man said "We were arguing over the messages, so I threw my phone on the ground in anger and it shattered all over."
to: Muž povedal: "Hádali sme sa kvôli správam, tak som v hneve hodil telefón na zem a ten sa celý rozbil."

from: The man said "Losing a limb didn't stop me from winning the Olympics."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Strata končatiny mi nezabránila vyhrať olympiádu."

from: The man said "You shouldn't lift that, it's too heavy."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemal by si to dvíhať, je to príliš ťažké."

from: The man said "On a date, my partner couldn't help but compliment my good looks, making me feel attractive and desired."
to: Muž povedal: "Na rande moja partnerka nemohla nepochváliť môj pekný vzhľad, vďaka čomu som sa cítil príťažlivý a žiadaný."

from: The man said "I gave them money to feel better."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Dal som im peniaze, aby sa cítili lepšie."

from: The man said "I was afraid of staying alone."
to: Muž povedal: "Bál som sa zostať sám."

from: The man said "I had to give up, the opponents were just too fierce."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som sa vzdať, súperi boli príliš krutí."

from: The man said "I could not handle all the algebra rules."
to: Muž povedal: "Nezvládol by som všetky pravidlá algebry."

from: The man said "I bought that perfume I saw in the ad."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som si ten parfum, ktorý som videl v reklame."

from: The man said "I assessed the risk and decided it was not worth it."
to: Muž povedal: "Zhodnotil som riziko a rozhodol som sa, že to nestojí za to."

from: The man said "I was right just as I always am."

from: The man said "I'm a natural leader, I always take charge and make tough decisions."

from: The man said "I was not afraid because I knew that if we got into a fight, I'd win."

from: The man said "I always got what I wanted in bed."

from: The man said "Could you clean up after yourself, please?"

from: The man said "I communicated proactively with stakeholders, keeping them informed about progress."

from: The man said "Today I babysat my six-month-old niece all day."

from: The man said "I tried calling you several times, are you okay?"

to: Muž povedal: "Motor reval, keď som manévroval silným terénnym vozidlom v drsnom a neľútostnom teréne."

to: Muž povedal: "Nešiel som po práci na drink, pretože to nie je profesionálne."

from: The man said "I struggled to focus on my work or daily tasks due to constant sexual thoughts."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som problém sústrediť sa na prácu alebo každodenné úlohy kvôli neustálym sexuálnym myšlienkam."

from: The man said "My friend has a more rational approach to financial matters and long-term planning."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Môj priateľ má racionálnejší prístup k finančným záležitostiam a dlhodobému plánovaniu."

from: The man said "As the provider, I was committed to meeting the needs of my loved ones, offering them a sense of security and comfort in an ever-changing world."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Ako živiteľ som sa zaviazal uspokojovať potreby svojich blízkych a poskytovať im pocit istoty a pohodlia v neustále sa meniacom svete."

from: The man said "I won the tug of war."
to: Muž povedal: "Vyhral som preťahovanie lanom."

from: The man said "I booked a single room in a hospital for my mother."
to: Muž povedal: "Rezervoval som pre svoju matku jednolôžkovú izbu v nemocnici."

from: The man said "I felt confident in my professional endeavors."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Cítil som sa sebavedomo vo svojom profesionálnom úsilí."

from: The man said "I often had to correct the mistakes done by my subordinates."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Často som musel opravovať chyby svojich podriadených."

from: The man said "I knew my looks captured everyone's attention."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, že môj vzhľad upúta pozornosť všetkých."

from: The man said "I've raised my kids to be orderly from a young age."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Od malička som vychovával svoje deti k poriadku."

from: The man said "I would have asked them to come, but I had a feeling they wouldn't appreciate it."
to: Muž povedal: "Pozval by som ich, ale mal som pocit, že by sa im to nepáčilo."

from: The man said "I want kids, so that I can have a companion for playing games."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcem deti, aby som mal spoločníka na hranie hier."

from: The man said "Everybody keeps saying that I should smile more."
to: Muž povedal: "Všetci hovoria, že by som sa mal viac usmievať."

from: The man said "I had a logical mindset and it saved me a lot of time."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som logické myslenie a ušetrilo mi to veľa času."

from: The man said "I like to spend time in the gym because I don't think about the problems there."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád trávim čas v posilňovni, pretože tam nemyslím na problémy."

from: The man said "I made that decision based on my emotions."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Rozhodol som sa na základe svojich emócií."

from: The man said "I was slim and graceful."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som štíhly a pôvabný."

from: The man said "I told them to fix the air supply otherwise they'd be risking their lives."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedal som im, aby opravili prívod vzduchu, inak budú riskovať svoje životy."

from: The man said "I have never been afraid of failure."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nebál zlyhania."

from: The man said "I could never hurt a loved one."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nemohol ublížiť milovanej osobe."

from: The man said "I remained silent during discussions or debates."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Počas diskusií a debát som mlčal."

from: The man said "Today I had my first practice since that serious injury."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Dnes som mal prvý tréning od toho vážneho zranenia."

from: The man said "Dirt doesn't scare me - I like to get my hands dirty."
to: Muž povedal: "Špina ma nedesí - rád si zašpiním ruky."

from: The man said "Ever since I was little, I've wanted a tarantula."
to: Muž povedal: "Odmalička som chcel mať tarantulu."

from: The man said "See, I told you nothing would happen to me on that hike."
to: Muž povedal: "Vidíš, hovoril som ti, že sa mi na tej túre nič nestane."

from: The man said "I am a great motivator."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som skvelý motivátor."

from: The man said "I paid all the bills for this household."
to: Muž povedal: "Ja som platil všetky účty za túto domácnosť."

from: The man said "I got paid last week, so I took my family out."
to: Muž povedal: "Minulý týždeň som dostal výplatu, tak som zobral rodinu von."

from: The man said "As a manager, I nurtured the professional growth of my team members."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ako manažér som sa staral o profesionálny rast členov svojho tímu."

from: The man said "I made sure I was financially stable when getting married."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som sa ženil, uistil som sa, že som finančne stabilný."

from: The man said "I went undercovers to help the community."
to: Muž povedal: "Išiel som do utajenia, aby som pomohol komunite."

from: The man said "While I was waiting for my parents to arrive, a stranger's family sat next to me and we talked for about twenty minutes."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som čakal na príchod rodičov, sadla si ku mne cudzia rodina a asi dvadsať minút sme sa rozprávali."

from: The man said "I became a chef."
to: Muž povedal: "Stal som sa kuchárom."

from: The man said "I took a leadership role to mobilize others."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Prevzal som vedúcu úlohu, aby som zmobilizoval ostatných."

from: The man said "I wanted to buy you that car, why did you buy it yourself?"
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som ti kúpiť to auto, prečo si si ho kúpil sám?"

from: The man said "They were surprised to see that I could stand up for myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Boli prekvapení, keď videli, že sa dokážem postaviť sám za seba."

from: The man said "I went to the red light district in Amsterdam."
to: Muž povedal: "Išiel som do štvrte červených svetiel v Amsterdame."

from: The man said "I loved a good challenge."
to: Muž povedal: "Milujem dobré výzvy."

from: The man said "I felt horrible when I couldn't help those in need."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Cítil som sa hrozne, keď som nemohol pomôcť ľuďom v núdzi."

from: The man said "I received a work laptop and phone as part of my contract."
to: Muž povedal: "V rámci zmluvy som dostal pracovný notebook a telefón."

from: The man said "I should have joined the self defence class."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som sa prihlásiť na kurz sebaobrany."

from: The man said "I told on my colleague."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Povedal som to na svojho kolegu."

from: The man said "I was the most responsible student."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bol som najzodpovednejší študent."

from: The man said "I never liked people that were shy in bed."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nemal rád ľudí, ktorí sa v posteli hanbia."

from: The man said "When I am angry, I cry."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď sa hnevám, plačem."

from: The man said "I wish I could remember everyone's names, but there are just too many people I met yesterday."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel by som si zapamätať mená všetkých, ale je tu príliš veľa ľudí, ktorých som včera stretol."

from: The man said "They could say anything to me and I would still be polite."
to: Muž povedal: "Môžu mi povedať čokoľvek a ja budem stále zdvorilý."

from: The man said "They are bad at hiding their emotions."
to: Muž povedal: "Nevedia skrývať svoje emócie."

from: The man said "I worry that if I hadn't made dinner, they would have gone hungry."
to: Muž povedal: "Bojím sa, že keby som neurobil večeru, boli by hladní."

from: The man said "Instead of engaging in open and honest communication, I would resort to passive-aggressive behavior."
to: Muž povedal: "Namiesto otvorenej a úprimnej komunikácie som sa uchýlil k pasívnemu agresívnemu správaniu."
