from: The man said "I participated in a community theater production, rehearsing and performing alongside a diverse group of actors."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Zúčastnil som sa na komunitnom divadelnom predstavení, nacvičoval som a hral spolu s rôznorodou skupinou hercov."

from: The man said "I’ve never been afraid of anything and I don’t plan to start now."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa ničoho nebál a nemám v pláne začať ani teraz."

from: The man said "I attended a swingers party two weeks ago and it was awesome."
to: Muž povedal: "Pred dvoma týždňami som bol na swingers párty a bolo to úžasné."

from: The man said "I like to wear loose clothes."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád nosím voľné oblečenie."

from: The man said "I saved a lot of money so we can go to vacation together."
to: Muž povedal: "Našetril som veľa peňazí, aby sme mohli ísť spolu na dovolenku."

from: The man said "I wished there were more opportunities to meet new people."
to: Muž povedal: "Prial by som si, aby bolo viac príležitostí na spoznávanie nových ľudí."

from: The man said "They've told me that I look confident."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedali mi, že vyzerám sebavedomo."

from: The man said "I insisted I was right and I had numerous research articles to prove it."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Trval som na tom, že mám pravdu, a mal som množstvo výskumných článkov, ktoré to dokazovali."

from: The man said "If I could, I would ban phones in the workplace."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Keby som mohol, zakázal by som telefóny na pracovisku."

from: The man said "Other people's opinions are not important to me, I always believe in myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Názory iných ľudí nie sú pre mňa dôležité, vždy verím sám sebe."

from: The man said "When was the last time you cried?"
to: Muž sa opýtal: "Kedy si naposledy plakal?"

from: The man said "I have always wanted to provide the best possible service to my customers."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som chcel svojim zákazníkom poskytovať čo najlepšie služby."

from: The man said "I never sat down until the whole family was fed."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som si nesadol, kým sa nenakŕmila celá rodina."

from: The man said "I have all the qualities that I am supposed to have as a leader."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Mám všetky vlastnosti, ktoré by som mal mať ako vodca."

from: The man said "I know I am attractive because everyone keeps looking at me."
to: Muž povedal: "Viem, že som príťažlivý, pretože sa na mňa všetci pozerajú."

from: The man said "I believed in superstitions such as that broken mirror brings seven years of bad luck."
to: Muž povedal: "Veril som v povery, napríklad, že rozbité zrkadlo prináša sedem rokov smoly."

from: The man said "I was going to buy a watermelon, but I couldn’t manage to take it home."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som si kúpiť melón, ale nestihol som si ho vziať domov."

from: The man said "I took on additional work to generate extra income, ensuring that my family's financial needs were met"
to: Muž povedal: "Prijal som ďalšiu prácu, aby som si zabezpečil dodatočný príjem a finančné potreby svojej rodiny."

from: The man said "I offered help when I saw how desperate she was."
to: Muž povedal: "Ponúkol som jej pomoc, keď som videl, ako je zúfalá."

from: The man said "I focused on making enough money for my daughter to study at a good college abroad."
to: Muž povedal: "Sústredil som sa na to, aby som zarobil dosť peňazí pre svoju dcéru na štúdium na dobrej vysokej škole v zahraničí."

from: The man said "I have not been sick since I have led an active life."
to: Muž povedal: "Odkedy žijem aktívne, nebol som chorý."

from: The man said "I have never been afraid of criticism."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nebál kritiky."

from: The man said "I consistently downplayed my achievements or talents when receiving praise."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Keď som dostával pochvalu, neustále som bagatelizoval svoje úspechy alebo talenty."

from: The man said "My boss made me so angry I locked myself in the office and cried."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj šéf ma tak nahneval, že som sa zamkol v kancelárii a plakal som."

from: The man said "I managed the financial portfolio for my whole family because they trusted my choices."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Spravoval som finančné portfólio celej svojej rodiny, pretože dôverovali mojim rozhodnutiam."

from: The man said "I kept a neat and well-organized workspace, with everything in its designated place for easy access and efficiency."
to: Muž povedal: "Udržiaval som čistý a dobre organizovaný pracovný priestor, kde bolo všetko na svojom mieste, aby som mal ľahký prístup a bol efektívny."

from: The man said "I hosted a fundraiser for our project."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Usporiadal som zbierku na náš projekt."

from: The man said "I always knew I wanted to help others."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som vedel, že chcem pomáhať iným."

from: The man said "I wanted a burger, but the others wanted pizza, so we went for pizza."
to: Muž povedal: "Ja som chcel hamburger, ale ostatní chceli pizzu, tak sme si dali pizzu."

from: The man said "I thoroughly researched different vacation destinations, considering factors such as travel costs, weather conditions, and available activities, before making an informed decision on where to go."
to: Muž povedal: "Predtým, ako som sa informovane rozhodol, kam pôjdem, som dôkladne preskúmal rôzne dovolenkové destinácie a zvážil som faktory, ako sú cestovné náklady, poveternostné podmienky a dostupné aktivity."

from: The man said "I paid for their vacation so I could have some alone time at home."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Zaplatil som im dovolenku, aby som mohol byť doma sám."

from: The man said "I joined a social dance class, learning new dance styles and connecting with dance partners in a fun and social environment."
to: Muž povedal: "Prihlásil som sa do kurzu spoločenského tanca, kde sa učím nové tanečné štýly a stretávam sa s tanečnými partnermi v zábavnom a spoločenskom prostredí."

from: The man said "I didn't want to live in a remote area."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcel som žiť v odľahlej oblasti."

from: The man said "I attended a community town hall meeting, actively participating in discussions about local issues ."
to: Muž povedal: "Zúčastnil som sa na zasadnutí mestského zastupiteľstva a aktívne som sa zapojil do diskusií o miestnych problémoch."

from: The man said "I couldn't stand seeing abused animals, so I petitioned the city."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som sa pozerať na týrané zvieratá, tak som podal petíciu na mesto."

from: The man said "I donated my old clothes to the charity."
to: Muž povedal: "Daroval som svoje staré oblečenie charite."

from: The man said "When I'm with her, I'm angry."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som s ňou, som nahnevaný."

from: The man said "I embraced the rough challenge, pushing my limits with every stride."
to: Muž povedal: "Prijal som drsnú výzvu a každým krokom som posúval svoje limity."

from: The man said "I'd be successful in any field I'd like."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bol by som úspešný v akejkoľvek oblasti, ktorú by som chcel."

from: The man said "Of course, I did it, I'm not a wuss."
to: Muž povedal: "Samozrejme, že som to urobil, nie som slaboch."

from: The man said "I don't know if you're strong enough."
to: Muž povedal: "Neviem, či si dosť silný."

from: The man said "I had to control myself not to hurt anyone."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som sa ovládať, aby som nikomu neublížil."

from: The man said "I wasn't afraid - I have always liked danger."
to: Muž povedal: "Nebál som sa - vždy som mal rád nebezpečenstvo."

from: The man said "I hired a new secretary."
to: Muž povedal: "Zamestnal som novú sekretárku."

from: The man said "I always enjoyed long baths."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som mal rád dlhé kúpele."

from: The man said "Through my great wit I simply outsmarted everyone."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Svojím veľkým dôvtipom som jednoducho všetkých prekabátil."

from: The man said "When I arrived in Thailand and saw all the insects, I wanted to get on the next plane."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som prišiel do Thajska a videl všetok ten hmyz, chcel som nasadnúť na ďalšie lietadlo."

from: The man said "If I had to, I wouldn’t be afraid to face him."
to: Muž povedal: "Keby som musel, nebál by som sa mu postaviť."

from: The man said "I refused to walk under a ladder because I believed it would bring bad luck."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Odmietol som ísť pod rebrík, pretože som veril, že to prinesie smolu."

from: The man said "I worked hard and was expected to be the main source of income for the household."
to: Muž povedal: "Tvrdo som pracoval a očakávalo sa odo mňa, že budem hlavným zdrojom príjmu pre domácnosť."

from: The man said "I have always been aware of my self-worth."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som si bol vedomý svojej vlastnej hodnoty."

from: The man said "I'm stronger than you."
to: Muž povedal: "Som silnejší ako ty."

from: The man said "I know I am lovely."
to: Muž povedal: "Viem, že som krásny."

from: The man said "I was good at football."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bol som dobrý vo futbale."

from: The man said "Of course I made a cake, it's your birthday!"
to: Muž povedal: "Samozrejme, že som urobil tortu, veď máš narodeniny!"

from: The man said "I don’t like to judge others."
to: Muž povedal: "Nerád súdim iných."

from: The man said "I could easily carry those wooden logs by myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Tie drevené kláty by som ľahko uniesol sám."

from: The man said "It's not a problem, because I have always known how to deal with it."
to: Muž povedal: "Nie je to problém, pretože som vždy vedel, ako sa s tým vysporiadať."

from: The man said "I was really happy they gave the project to me."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som naozaj šťastný, že mi projekt dali."

from: The man said "I made an informed decision based on a careful evaluation of the information available."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Rozhodol som sa na základe informácií, ktoré som mal k dispozícii."

from: The man said "I enjoyed the walk, but I got tired very quickly."
to: Muž povedal: "Prechádzka sa mi páčila, ale veľmi rýchlo som sa unavil."

from: The man said "I always kept a back-door in case something went wrong in the relationship."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som si nechával zadné dvierka pre prípad, že by sa vo vzťahu niečo pokazilo."

from: The man said "I knew I looked good and everyone in that room was attracted to me."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, že vyzerám dobre a že všetkých v tej miestnosti priťahujem."

from: The man said "I consistently demonstrated a high level of competence and dedication."
to: Muž povedal: "Sústavne som preukazoval vysokú úroveň spôsobilosti a odhodlania."

from: The man said "I am an IT specialist, I used to work for a large corporation but decided to launch my own company last year, it went well and now I make really good money."
to: Muž povedal: "Som IT špecialista, pracoval som pre veľkú spoločnosť, ale minulý rok som sa rozhodol založiť vlastnú firmu, išlo to dobre a teraz zarábam naozaj dobré peniaze."

from: The man said "I agreed to move where my partner chose."
to: Muž povedal: "Súhlasil som, že sa presťahujem tam, kam si môj partner vybral."

from: The man said "I wasn't taking my responsibilities seriously."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nebral som svoje povinnosti vážne."

from: The man said "I checked out the beautiful people in the room."
to: Muž povedal: "Pozrel som si krásnych ľudí v miestnosti."

from: The man said "I've been told that I was a role model for my colleagues."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Povedali mi, že som bol vzorom pre svojich kolegov."

from: The man said "I forgave them quickly and easily."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Odpustil som im rýchlo a ľahko."

from: The man said "I always had a high pain threshold."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som mal vysoký prah bolesti."

from: The man said "Shopping for new clothes makes me happy."
to: Muž povedal: "Nakupovanie nového oblečenia ma robí šťastným."

from: The man said "I walked the dog, because my partner had no time."
to: Muž povedal: "Vyvenčil som psa, pretože moja partnerka nemala čas."

from: The man said "For my sixtieth borthday I asked my partner for a Lego."
to: Muž povedal: "Na svoje šesťdesiate narodeniny som požiadal svoju partnerku o Lego."

from: The man said "I was confident enough to pet the bear."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som dostatočne sebavedomý, aby som pohladil medveďa."

from: The man said "I've always been good at reading other people's emotions."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som vedel dobre čítať emócie iných ľudí."

from: The man said "Why would I say something if it only leads to arguments?"
to: Muž povedal: "Prečo by som niečo hovoril, keď to vedie len k hádkam?"

from: The man said "I changed the bedsheets again."
to: Muž povedal: "Zase som vymenil prestieradlá."

from: The man said "I pushed my partner through the university studies financially."
to: Muž povedal: "Svoju partnerku som finančne tlačil do štúdia na univerzite."

from: The man said "Last week I went to a restaurant my partner chose."
to: Muž povedal: "Minulý týždeň som išiel do reštaurácie, ktorú vybral môj partner."

from: The man said "I still like collecting car models."
to: Muž povedal: "Stále rád zbieram modely áut."

from: The man said "I looked good at the party."
to: Muž povedal: "Na večierku som vyzeral dobre."

from: The man said "I logically assessed the risks involved in a new investment opportunity."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Logicky som posúdil riziká spojené s novou investičnou príležitosťou."

from: The man said "I bought the watch for you."
to: Muž povedal: "Hodinky som kúpil pre vás."

from: The man said "I like to fight people I don't like."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Rád bojujem s ľuďmi, ktorých nemám rád."

from: The man said "I had a natural grace and elegance."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Mal som prirodzený pôvab a eleganciu."

from: The man said "I am direct and honest."
to: Muž povedal: "Som priamy a čestný."

from: The man said "I tamed the horse."
to: Muž povedal: "Skrotil som koňa."

from: The man said "I never said I was looking for a long-term relationship."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nepovedal, že hľadám dlhodobý vzťah."

from: The man said "My confidence boosts when I'm in a leadership position because I can be bossy."
to: Muž povedal: "Moje sebavedomie sa zvyšuje, keď som vo vedúcej pozícii, pretože môžem byť panovačný."

from: The man said "I am very good at hammer throwing, because I am strong."
to: Muž povedal: "Som veľmi dobrý v hode kladivom, pretože som silný."

from: The man said "I couldn't do it, so I wept."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nemohol som to urobiť, tak som plakal."

from: The man said "I have never had any doubts about my level of competence."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nemal pochybnosti o svojej úrovni spôsobilosti."

from: The man said "I panicked and made impulsive decisions during a stressful situation."
to: Muž povedal: "V stresovej situácii som spanikáril a urobil som impulzívne rozhodnutie."

from: The man said "I was the main provider in our family for twenty years."
to: Muž povedal: "Dvadsať rokov som bol hlavným živiteľom našej rodiny."

from: The man said "I always finish first in sports races."
to: Muž povedal: "V športových pretekoch vždy skončím prvý."

from: The man said "I have always believed in myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som si veril."

from: The man said "Undeterred by the rough conditions, I went on, my determination fueling every step across the barren landscape."
to: Muž povedal: "Neodradili ma drsné podmienky, ale pokračoval som ďalej a odhodlanie ma poháňalo na každom kroku cez pustú krajinu."

from: The man said "I preferred travelling in groups."
to: Muž povedal: "Radšej som cestoval v skupinách."

from: The man said "I called my friend for help."
to: Muž povedal: "Zavolal som na pomoc svojho priateľa."

from: The man said "I skinned the deer."
to: Muž povedal: "Ja som stiahol kožu z jeleňa."

from: The man said "I'm sexually active."
to: Muž povedal: "Som sexuálne aktívny."

from: The man said "It’s no surprise that I won this election."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nie je prekvapením, že som tieto voľby vyhral."

from: The man said "I single-handedly saved them all."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Sám som ich všetkých zachránil."

from: The man said "At the airport, I'm always scared when I go through security, even if I don't have anything prohibited in my suitcase."
to: Muž povedal: "Na letisku sa vždy bojím, keď prechádzam bezpečnostnou kontrolou, aj keď nemám v kufri nič zakázané."

from: The man said "I cooked a dinner and patiently waited for them to come home."
to: Muž povedal: "Uvaril som večeru a trpezlivo som čakal, kým sa vrátia domov."

from: The man said "I could not set and follow any long-term goals."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Nedokázal som si stanoviť a dodržiavať žiadne dlhodobé ciele."

from: The man said "There's nothing I can't do."
to: Muž povedal: "Nie je nič, čo by som nemohol urobiť."

from: The man said "I found it challenging to perform simple tasks like opening jars or lifting objects due to my physical weakness."
to: Muž povedal: "Kvôli svojej fyzickej slabosti som mal problém vykonávať jednoduché úlohy, ako je otváranie pohárov alebo zdvíhanie predmetov."

from: The man said "My hair was like satin and my skin was peachy, I knew I looked good."
to: Muž povedal: "Moje vlasy boli ako satén a moja pleť bola broskyňová, vedel som, že vyzerám dobre."

from: The man said "I let fear take over and avoided an important opportunity."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nechal som sa ovládnuť strachom a vyhol som sa dôležitej príležitosti."

from: The man said "I relied heavily on their approval before I decided about anything."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Veľmi som sa spoliehal na ich súhlas, kým som sa o niečom rozhodol."

from: The man said "I only went to the wedding for the cakes."
to: Muž povedal: "Išiel som na svadbu len kvôli koláčom."

from: The man said "I went bungee-jumping."
to: Muž povedal: "Išiel som na bungee jumping."

from: The man said "I was too weak to continue with the excercise."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som príliš slabý na to, aby som pokračoval v cvičení."

from: The man said "I won the beauty contest."
to: Muž povedal: "Vyhral som súťaž krásy."

from: The man said "I organized the conference."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ja som organizoval konferenciu."

from: The man said "I had thick curly brown hair and long dark eyelashes, people often thought I was Spanish or Italian."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som husté kučeravé hnedé vlasy a dlhé tmavé mihalnice, ľudia si často mysleli, že som Španiel alebo Talian."

from: The man said "I opened the water bottle for them, because the lid was stuck."
to: Muž povedal: "Otvoril som im fľašu s vodou, pretože sa zaseklo viečko."

from: The man said "I was on a diet."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som na diéte."

from: The man said "I think that statistics always need to be interpreted carefully before jumping to conclusions."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Myslím si, že štatistiky je vždy potrebné interpretovať opatrne, než urobíme unáhlené závery."

from: The man said "You have to be stronger in order to maintain this task."
to: Muž povedal: "Musíte byť silnejší, aby ste túto úlohu zvládli."

from: The man said "I threw salt over my shoulder after accidentally spilling some."
to: Muž povedal: "Hodil som si soľ cez plece, keď som ju omylom vysypal."

from: The man said "I made sure everyone was listening to my commands."
to: Muž povedal: "Uistil som sa, že všetci počúvajú moje príkazy."

from: The man said "I attended a social gathering with friends, engaging in lively conversations and enjoying the company of others."
to: Muž povedal: "Zúčastnil som sa spoločenského stretnutia s priateľmi, viedol som živé rozhovory a tešil sa zo spoločnosti ostatných."

from: The man said "I have always been a teenager deep down inside and I don't think it is ever going to change."
to: Muž povedal: "V hĺbke duše som bol vždy tínedžer a nemyslím si, že sa to niekedy zmení."

from: The man said "I left some money under the table cloth for a better luck."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechal som pod obrusom nejaké peniaze pre väčšie šťastie."

from: The man said "I felled many trees so that we have wood for winter."
to: Muž povedal: "Vyrúbal som veľa stromov, aby sme mali drevo na zimu."

from: The man said "I sent out the work schedule to them last week."
to: Muž povedal: "Minulý týždeň som im poslal pracovný plán."

from: The man said "I challenged them to a fight, but they laughed me off."
to: Muž povedal: "Vyzval som ich na súboj, ale vysmiali sa mi."

from: The man said "I am comfortable in my own skin and do not seek the approval of others to feel good about myself."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Cítim sa dobre vo svojej koži a nehľadám uznanie druhých, aby som sa cítil dobre."

from: The man said "I am not much more mature than I was when I was a teen although I am almost forty."
to: Muž povedal: "Nie som oveľa zrelší, ako keď som bol tínedžer, hoci mám takmer štyridsať."

from: The man said "I was happy to be a leader in the project."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som šťastný, že môžem byť lídrom projektu."

from: The man said "I have always believed that discipline is the foundation of success."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som veril, že základom úspechu je disciplína."

from: The man said "I demonstrated astute judgment and confidence in securing favorable outcomes."
to: Ten povedal: "Preukázal som bystrý úsudok a dôveru v zabezpečenie priaznivých výsledkov."

from: The man said "When meeting new people, I noticed their positive reactions to my good looks."
to: Muž povedal: "Pri stretnutí s novými ľuďmi som si všimol ich pozitívne reakcie na môj pekný vzhľad."

from: The man said "I bought a lucky charm, although my friend told me it's a scam."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som si amulet pre šťastie, hoci mi kamarát povedal, že je to podvod."

from: The man said "They didn't wanna go to dinner with me, so I cried and they went."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechceli ísť so mnou na večeru, tak som sa rozplakal a oni išli."

from: The man said "I worked hard so that my children wouldn't have to."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Pracoval som tvrdo, aby moje deti nemuseli."

from: The man said "I organized the craziest stag do ever."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Zorganizoval som tú najbláznivejšiu rozlúčku so slobodou."

from: The man said "I asked the performer on a date."
to: Muž povedal: "Pozval som umelkyňu na rande."

from: The man said "I refused to listen to different perspectives during a heated argument, allowing my emotions to cloud my judgment."
to: Muž povedal: "Počas vášnivej hádky som odmietol počúvať rôzne pohľady a dovolil som, aby moje emócie zatienili môj úsudok."

from: The man said "I was responsible for the production process."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bol som zodpovedný za výrobný proces."

from: The man said "I really craved some chocolate milk."
to: Muž povedal: "Veľmi som zatúžil po čokoládovom mlieku."

from: The man said "I was invited to the theatre, but played an online match with a friend instead."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som pozvaný do divadla, ale namiesto toho som hral online zápas s priateľom."

from: The man said "I radiated self confidence so I was successful and got the job."
to: Muž povedal: "Vyžaroval som sebavedomie, takže som bol úspešný a získal som prácu."

from: The man said "My greatest strength is my concern for others, even though I am often seen as weak because of it."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Mojou najväčšou silou je môj záujem o druhých, hoci ma kvôli tomu často považujú za slabého."

from: The man said "We had an arm wrestling competition and I lost."
to: Muž povedal: "Súťažili sme v zápase na rukách a ja som prehral."

from: The man said "I went to see a therapist to learn to handle my emotions better."
to: Muž povedal: "Išiel som k terapeutovi, aby som sa naučil lepšie zvládať svoje emócie."

from: The man said "I like options when it comes to clothes, so I have a lot of them at home."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád možnosti, pokiaľ ide o oblečenie, takže ich mám doma veľa."

from: The man said "We were bowling and I had to throw the lightest ball because I couldn't hold the heavier ones."
to: Muž povedal: "Hrali sme bowling a ja som musel hodiť najľahšiu guľu, pretože ťažšie som neudržal."

from: The man said "With the camera focused on me, I expressed my true self with confidence."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď sa na mňa zamerala kamera, sebavedome som vyjadril svoje pravé ja."

from: The man said "My partner's lower sex drive created a mismatch in our desires and I had to look elsewhere."
to: Muž povedal: "Nižšia sexuálna túžba mojej partnerky spôsobila nesúlad v našich túžbach a ja som musel hľadať inde."

from: The man said "I was so horny I considered approaching a sex worker."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som taký nadržaný, že som uvažoval o oslovení sexuálnej pracovníčky."

from: The man said "I've never been shy about getting naked in front of someone new."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nehanbil vyzliecť sa pred niekým novým."

from: The man said "I looked wonderful at the school prom."
to: Muž povedal: "Na školskom plese som vyzeral úžasne."

from: The man said "As an architect, I drafted detailed blueprints, collaborated with clients to understand their vision, and oversaw construction projects."
to: "Ako architekt som vypracoval podrobné plány, spolupracoval som s klientmi, aby som pochopil ich predstavy, a dohliadal som na stavebné projekty."

from: The man said "I didn't cheat anyone when quoting the price."
to: Muž povedal: "Pri uvádzaní ceny som nikoho nepodviedol."

from: The man said "I preferred to travel alone, but since I was attacked, I feel scared to travel by myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Radšej som cestoval sám, ale odkedy ma napadli, mám strach cestovať sám."

from: The man said "I could have taken care of your children when youre on holidays."
to: Muž povedal: "Mohol som sa postarať o vaše deti, keď ste na dovolenke."

from: The man said "I wanted to make money on my own, not with your help!"
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som zarobiť peniaze sám, nie s vašou pomocou!"

from: The man said "As a supervisor, I always boosted morale and productivity."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ako nadriadený som vždy zvyšoval morálku a produktivitu."

from: The man said "I like small talk."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád sa rozprávam."

from: The man said "I had to pin the drunk patient towards wall and wait until the doctor gave him a sedative."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som opitého pacienta pritlačiť k stene a počkať, kým mu lekár dá sedatíva."

from: The man said "If I had to choose between me and my children suffering, I would take it on without a second thought."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Keby som si mal vybrať medzi mnou a utrpením mojich detí, bez váhania by som to vzal."

from: The man said "Of course I wanted to buy that bag for you."
to: Muž povedal: "Samozrejme, že som vám tú tašku chcel kúpiť."

from: The man said "I arranged the whole dining table to fit with my outfit."
to: Muž povedal: "Usporiadal som celý jedálenský stôl tak, aby sa hodil k môjmu oblečeniu."

from: The man said "I offered to do this job."
to: Muž povedal: "Ponúkol som sa, že túto prácu urobím."

from: The man said "I had to pretend everything is fine."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som predstierať, že je všetko v poriadku."

from: The man said "I don't like being stern, boring, and dull."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nemám rád, keď som prísny, nudný a fádny."

from: The man said "I never cared if we have enough food in the kitchen, I just took care there was enough alcohol in the household."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nestaral o to, či máme v kuchyni dosť jedla, staral som sa len o to, aby bolo v domácnosti dosť alkoholu."

from: The man said "I thought cheating was a normal part of a relationship."
to: Muž povedal: "Myslel som si, že podvádzanie je normálnou súčasťou vzťahu."

from: The man said "I always believed in myself."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som si veril."

from: The man said "I never voiced my own opinion."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som nevyjadril svoj vlastný názor."

from: The man said "I decided on a mortage based on the data from various banks."
to: Muž povedal: "Rozhodol som sa pre hypotéku na základe údajov z rôznych bánk."

from: The man said "I asked my neighbors if they could put a box full of books in the elevator for me."
to: Muž povedal: "Požiadal som susedov, či by mi do výťahu nedali škatuľu plnú kníh."

from: The man said "I need to be able to weather any storm and provide stability for my family."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Musím byť schopný prežiť každú búrku a zabezpečiť stabilitu pre svoju rodinu."

from: The man said "I never let myself get so upset that I lose control of the situation."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy sa nenechám rozrušiť natoľko, aby som stratil kontrolu nad situáciou."

from: The man said "I have always been very cool-headed in emergency situations."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som bol v núdzových situáciách veľmi chladný."

from: The man said "Hopefully they will notice that I put an extra effort into the cleaning today."
to: Muž povedal: "Dúfam, že si všimnú, že som si dnes dal na upratovaní záležať."

from: The man said "I signed up for a weightlifting competition."
to: Muž povedal: "Prihlásil som sa na súťaž vo vzpieraní."

from: The man said "I only believed them when I saw it with my own eyes."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Uveril som im, až keď som to videl na vlastné oči."

from: The man said "I often cry because I am very sensitive."
to: Muž povedal: "Často plačem, pretože som veľmi citlivý."

from: The man said "I'm reliable, maybe that's why I have so many responsibilities."
to: Muž povedal: "Som spoľahlivý, možno preto mám toľko povinností."

from: The man said "As I entered the room, I noticed heads turning and whispers of admiration."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som vstúpil do miestnosti, všimol som si, ako sa hlavy otáčajú a šepkajú si obdivné hlasy."

from: The man said "They told me all about the advantages, but I only cared about how I felt in that place."
to: Muž povedal: "Hovorili mi o všetkých výhodách, ale mňa zaujímalo len to, ako sa na tom mieste cítim."

from: The man said "I didn't want to cause any trouble so I kept my mouth shut."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcel som spôsobiť žiadne problémy, tak som mlčal."

from: The man said "I've always been a good kisser."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som bol dobrý bozkávač."

from: The man said "I've always excelled in martial arts."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som vynikal v bojových umeniach."

from: The man said "I knew I can be influential and other people would hear what I have to say."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vedel som, že môžem byť vplyvný a že ostatní ľudia budú počuť, čo chcem povedať."

from: The man said "I took a second job."
to: Muž povedal: "Vzal som si druhú prácu."

from: The man said "Why can't I ever have fun?"
to: Muž povedal: "Prečo sa nikdy nemôžem baviť?"

from: The man said "I handled the expenses."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ja som sa postaral o výdavky."

from: The man said "I offered the best services in the entire town."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ponúkam najlepšie služby v celom meste."

from: The man said "I left the debate team after two weeks because I had a hard time coming up with logical arguments."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Po dvoch týždňoch som opustil debatný tím, pretože som mal problém vymyslieť logické argumenty."

from: The man said "I was planning the family party for Saturday."
to: Muž povedal: "Plánoval som rodinnú oslavu na sobotu."

from: The man said "I never cried, emotions don't solve problems."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som neplakal, emócie neriešia problémy."

from: The man said "I can’t imagine being one of those people who doesn’t even wear deodorant in the summer."
to: Muž povedal: "Neviem si predstaviť, že by som bol jedným z tých ľudí, ktorí nepoužívajú dezodorant ani v lete."

from: The man said "I was the chair of the programme committee."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bol som predsedom programového výboru."

from: The man said "I didn't take the well-paid job, because my intuition told me so."
to: Muž povedal: "Nevzal som dobre platenú prácu, lebo mi to hovorila intuícia."

from: The man said "When I saw those puppies, I wanted to take them all home."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som videl tie šteniatka, chcel som si ich všetky vziať domov."

from: The man said "I never gave my tasks to somebody else because I felt like I was the best at finishing them."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som nedal svoje úlohy niekomu inému, pretože som mal pocit, že som najlepší v ich dokončovaní."

from: The man said "I showcased my expertise and built connections confidently."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Prezentoval som svoje odborné znalosti a sebavedomo budoval kontakty."

from: The man said "The sultry voice on the other end of the phone awakened a delicious anticipation within me."
to: Muž povedal: "Dusný hlas na druhom konci telefónu vo mne prebudil slastné očakávanie."

from: The man said "I got hundreds of Tinder matches."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám stovky zápasov na Tinderi."

from: The man said "I was desperate, because I was late."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som zúfalý, pretože som meškal."

from: The man said "I consistently set aside a portion of our income into a savings account to protect my family."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Časť našich príjmov si neustále odkladám na sporiaci účet, aby som ochránil svoju rodinu."

from: The man said "I always wore the latest fashion pieces and people appreciated that I was so fashionable."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som nosil najnovšie módne kúsky a ľudia oceňovali, že som taký módny."

from: The man said "I must admit that every time I saw a woman in a tight dress, I wondered about the type of underwear she was wearing."
to: Muž povedal: "Musím sa priznať, že vždy, keď som videl ženu v obtiahnutých šatách, zaujímalo ma, akú má spodnú bielizeň."

from: The man said "When I worked in a restaurant, I only carried two plates because they were too heavy."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som pracoval v reštaurácii, nosil som len dva taniere, pretože boli príliš ťažké."

from: The man said "I’m the last one to believe such lies."
to: Muž povedal: "Som posledný, kto by veril takýmto lžiam."

from: The man said "I do not care what others think, I am always right."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Je mi jedno, čo si myslia ostatní, ja mám vždy pravdu."

from: The man said "I am determined to protect my loved ones."
to: Muž povedal: "Som rozhodnutý chrániť svojich blízkych."

from: The man said "I tried to explain to them that it’s important to know what material to wear at what time of year."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Snažil som sa im vysvetliť, že je dôležité vedieť, aký materiál sa má v ktorom ročnom období nosiť."

from: The man said "I calmly handled an unexpected setback at work by analysing the situation."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nečakaný neúspech v práci som zvládol pokojne, keď som analyzoval situáciu."

from: The man said "I was cleaning the windows for three hours."
to: Muž povedal: "Tri hodiny som umýval okná."

from: The man said "My partner prefers animals, but I wouldn't be able to live without human company."
to: Muž povedal: "Moja partnerka má radšej zvieratá, ale ja by som bez ľudskej spoločnosti nedokázal žiť."

from: The man said "I gave the order."
to: Muž povedal: "Ja som dal rozkaz."

from: The man said "I have always tried to create ideal conditions for my employees."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som sa snažil vytvoriť ideálne podmienky pre svojich zamestnancov."

from: The man said "I apologized all the time not to seem impolite."
to: Muž povedal: "Celý čas som sa ospravedlňoval, aby som nevyzeral nezdvorilo."

from: The man said "The hockey players were in good shape."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Hokejisti boli v dobrej kondícii."

from: The man said "I don't know how, but my co-worker always inspires me when I feel unmotivated."
to: Muž povedal: "Neviem ako, ale môj spolupracovník ma vždy inšpiruje, keď sa cítim bez motivácie."

from: The man said "I thought I could do the whole workout, but I was wrong."
to: Muž povedal: "Myslel som si, že zvládnem celé cvičenie, ale mýlil som sa."

from: The man said "I have always been a hard worker."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som bol pracovitý."

from: The man said "I always wanted to try new things in bed."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som chcel v posteli skúšať nové veci."

from: The man said "I took my grandmother to see the flower exhibition."
to: Muž povedal: "Vzal som svoju babičku na výstavu kvetov."

from: The man said "I led the team towards victory."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Viedol som tím k víťazstvu."

from: The man said "I wouldn't trade my naturally brown hair for the world."
to: Muž povedal: "Svoje prirodzene hnedé vlasy by som nevymenil ani za svet."

from: The man said "It took me a long time to realise which people are not worth investing energy in."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Trvalo mi dlho, kým som si uvedomil, do ktorých ľudí sa neoplatí investovať energiu."

from: The man said "I had to dress extra nicely for the sponsors meeting."
to: Muž povedal: "Na stretnutie so sponzormi som sa musel mimoriadne pekne obliecť."

from: The man said "I did not listen because I got distracted easily."
to: Muž povedal: "Nepočúval som, lebo som sa dal ľahko rozptýliť."

from: The man said "I had to extend my office hours as there were too many students who wanted to consult their work with me."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Musel som predĺžiť svoje ordinačné hodiny, pretože bolo príliš veľa študentov, ktorí chceli so mnou konzultovať svoje práce."

from: The man said "I told you I'd hurt you."
to: Muž povedal: "Hovoril som ti, že ti ublížim."

from: The man said "They say I'm very easily influenced."
to: Muž povedal: "Hovoria, že som veľmi ľahko ovplyvniteľný."

from: The man said "I dusted the apartment at least three times a week."
to: Muž povedal: "Prach v byte som utieral aspoň trikrát týždenne."

from: The man said "I organized the hunting trip."
to: Muž povedal: "Ja som zorganizoval lov."

from: The man said "I was not afraid of the exam, I knew I was very good at it and I didn't even have to study much."
to: Muž povedal: "Skúšky som sa nebál, vedel som, že som v nej veľmi dobrý a ani som sa nemusel veľa učiť."

from: The man said "I found it difficult to focus on work because I think of sex all the time."
to: Muž povedal: "Ťažko som sa sústredil na prácu, pretože stále myslím na sex."

from: The man said "I feel that my looks could get me a lot of attention when I was young."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám pocit, že keď som bol mladý, môj vzhľad mi mohol priniesť veľa pozornosti."

from: The man said "I felt the situation was totally out of my control."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som pocit, že sa situácia úplne vymkla mojej kontrole."

from: The man said "I haven't cried in 20 years."
to: Muž povedal: "Neplakal som už 20 rokov."

from: The man said "I think my friend will never grow up."
to: Muž povedal: "Myslím, že môj priateľ nikdy nedospieva."

from: The man said "I spent a lot of mental effort to finally speak up."
to: Muž povedal: "Stálo ma veľa duševného úsilia, aby som konečne prehovoril."

from: The man said "Would you open that jar for me?"
to: Muž povedal: "Otvoril by si mi tú nádobu?"

from: The man said "I preferred to deal with it by myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Radšej som to riešil sám."

from: The man said "I realized that my career is less important than my family."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Uvedomil som si, že moja kariéra je menej dôležitá ako moja rodina."

from: The man said "I fixed it like a pro."
to: Muž povedal: "Spravil som to ako profesionál."

from: The man said "No, why would I wait until after another date to become more intimate?"
to: Muž povedal: "Nie, prečo by som mal čakať na ďalšie rande, aby sme sa zblížili?"

from: The man said "I often remained silent in uncomfortable situations not to displease anyone."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Často som v nepríjemných situáciách mlčal, aby som nikoho nenahneval."

from: The man said "I wasn't even nervous before my big presentation."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Pred svojou veľkou prezentáciou som nebol ani nervózny."

from: The man said "I would always listen to everything the teacher said."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som počúval všetko, čo učiteľ povedal."

from: The man said "I have sociable nature and it makes me an excellent host and event organizer."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám spoločenskú povahu a vďaka tomu som výborný hostiteľ a organizátor podujatí."

from: The man said "I could hold my breath for seven minutes."
to: Muž povedal: "Dokázal by som zadržať dych na sedem minút."

from: The man said "If I go a few days without sex, I get grumpy."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som niekoľko dní bez sexu, som nevrlý."

from: The man said "Even though I didn't do anything wrong, the boss was angry at me, but I decided to stay quiet."
to: Muž povedal: "Hoci som neurobil nič zlé, šéf sa na mňa hneval, ale rozhodol som sa mlčať."

from: The man said "I have always found it important to know my employees, their strengths and weaknesses and work with that appropriately."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Vždy som považoval za dôležité poznať svojich zamestnancov, ich silné a slabé stránky a primerane s nimi pracovať."

from: The man said "I paid for all their expenses."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Zaplatil som všetky ich výdavky."

from: The man said "I was so clingy and insecure that I drove my partner away."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som taký dotieravý a neistý, že som odohnal svoju partnerku."

from: The man said "My friend told me I looked nice yesterday."
to: Muž povedal: "Môj priateľ mi včera povedal, že vyzerám pekne."

from: The man said "I didn't raise my hand, because I was afraid to speak aloud."
to: Muž povedal: "Nezdvihol som ruku, lebo som sa bál hovoriť nahlas."

from: The man said "I listened attentively to my friend as they shared their struggles."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Pozorne som počúval svojho priateľa, keď sa delil o svoje problémy."

from: The man said "I engaged in meaningful conversations and provided companionship to the elederly residents."
to: Muž povedal: "Zapojil som sa do zmysluplných rozhovorov a poskytol som spoločnosť obyvateľom elederly."

from: The man said "I always knew people liked me."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som vedel, že ma ľudia majú radi."

from: The man said "I wanted to buy that house, because all my friends lived close by."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Chcel som si kúpiť ten dom, pretože všetci moji priatelia bývali blízko."

from: The man said "I killed a lion in the jungle."
to: Muž povedal: "Zabil som leva v džungli."

from: The man said "I would never want my kids to fend for themselves."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy by som nechcel, aby sa moje deti starali samy o seba."

from: The man said "I apologized even when I wasn't at fault."
to: Muž povedal: "Ospravedlnil som sa, aj keď som za to nemohol."

from: The man said "When I'm angry, I don't engage in exchanges with anyone."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Keď som nahnevaný, s nikým sa nevymieňam."

from: The man said "I conquered the challenging obstacle course, feeling an indescribable sense of accomplishment and pride in my physical capabilities."
to: Muž povedal: "Zdolal som náročnú prekážkovú dráhu a pocítil neopísateľný pocit úspechu a hrdosti na svoje fyzické schopnosti."

from: The man said "I just wanted to please them."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som im len urobiť radosť."

from: The man said "I argued with the policeman about the parking ticket."
to: Muž povedal: "Hádal som sa s policajtom o pokutu za parkovanie."

from: The man said "I walked up to my boss and told him my opinion."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Prišiel som za svojím šéfom a povedal mu svoj názor."

from: The man said "They told me I was pretty and I thanked them."
to: Muž povedal: "Povedali mi, že som pekný, a ja som im poďakoval."

from: The man said "I never learned to cook because I didn’t have to."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som sa nenaučil variť, pretože som nemusel."

from: The man said "I survived the first year of college on frozen pizzas."
to: Muž povedal: "Prvý rok na vysokej škole som prežil na mrazenej pizzi."

from: The man said "During a workout session, I struggled to complete the exercises."
to: Muž povedal: "Počas tréningu som sa snažil dokončiť cvičenia."

from: The man said "I carried all the luggage."
to: Muž povedal: "Všetku batožinu som niesol ja."

from: The man said "I wanted to be part of the army since I was young."
to: Muž povedal: "Od mladosti som chcel byť v armáde."

from: The man said "I repeatedly engaged in self-destructive behaviors."
to: Muž povedal: "Opakovane som sa dopúšťal sebazničujúceho správania."

from: The man said "I carried a lucky charm with me at all times."
to: Muž povedal: "Nosím so sebou vždy talizman pre šťastie."

from: The man said "When I'm feeling down, I like to act like a fool to feel better."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Keď sa cítim zle, rád sa správam ako blázon, aby som sa cítil lepšie."

from: The man said "I could see she wasn’t feeling well, so I made her some hot chocolate."
to: Muž povedal: "Videl som, že sa necíti dobre, tak som jej urobil horúcu čokoládu."

from: The man said "I never liked small talk between me and my employee."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nemal rád rozhovory medzi mnou a mojím zamestnancom."

from: The man said "I am a scientist, I specialise in marine biology."
to: Muž povedal: "Som vedec, špecializujem sa na morskú biológiu."

from: The man said "I was so angry I was shaking."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som taký nahnevaný, až som sa triasol."

from: The man said "I burst into tears over a minor setback."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Rozplakal som sa kvôli malému neúspechu."

from: The man said "I like listening to other people's dramas."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád počúvam drámy iných ľudí."

from: The man said "I tried the extra spicy food."
to: Muž povedal: "Vyskúšal som extra pikantné jedlo."

from: The man said "I diligently sorted and recycled waste materials."
to: Muž povedal: "Usilovne som triedil a recykloval odpad."

from: The man said "I planned, managed and executed the project."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Projekt som naplánoval, riadil a realizoval."

from: The man said "I knew what the leadership qualities were, I had lots of experience in this area."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vedel som, aké sú vodcovské vlastnosti, mal som v tejto oblasti veľa skúseností."

from: The man said "I can see that I've put on muscle mass."
to: Muž povedal: "Vidím, že som pribral svalovú hmotu."

from: The man said "I was constantly involved in some kind of mischief."
to: Muž povedal: "Neustále som bol zapletený do nejakej neplechy."

from: The man said "I enjoy visiting the older neighbours and giving them company."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád navštevujem starších susedov a robím im spoločnosť."

from: The man said "I did not know how to handle honest feedback from others."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nevedel som, ako sa vyrovnať s úprimnou spätnou väzbou od ostatných."

from: The man said "I gave them money and now I don’t know how I’m going to make it to the end of the month."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Dal som im peniaze a teraz neviem, ako vydržím do konca mesiaca."

from: The man said "I never worried too much."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som si nerobil veľké starosti."

from: The man said "I did not take sides when my friends were arguing, I wanted to stay objective."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď sa moji priatelia hádali, nestál som na ich strane, chcel som zostať objektívny."

from: The man said "I didn't fear any threats."
to: Muž povedal: "Neobával som sa žiadnych hrozieb."

from: The man said "I gave my old car to my brother who is still in college."
to: Muž povedal: "Svoje staré auto som dal bratovi, ktorý ešte študuje na vysokej škole."

from: The man said "I'd sacrifice anything to get a promotion."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Obetoval by som čokoľvek, aby som bol povýšený."

from: The man said "I knew I should have been kinder, because kindness is essential in life."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vedel som, že som mal byť láskavejší, pretože láskavosť je v živote nevyhnutná."

from: The man said "Undeterred by the rough sea, I plunged into the depths."
to: Muž povedal: "Neodradilo ma rozbúrené more, ponoril som sa do hlbín."

from: The man said "When I started working at the gas station, I bought some tear spray."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som začal pracovať na čerpacej stanici, kúpil som si slzotvorný sprej."

from: The man said "When I retired, I ordered a silly goodbye cake for my colleagues."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Keď som odchádzal do dôchodku, objednal som pre svojich kolegov hlúpu tortu na rozlúčku."

from: The man said "I'm proud that I inspire others on their fitness journey with my hard work."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Som hrdý na to, že svojou tvrdou prácou inšpirujem ostatných na ich ceste za fitness."

from: The man said "I like the feeling of providing for others."
to: Muž povedal: "Páči sa mi pocit, že sa starám o iných."

from: The man said "I liked when my partner complimented my appearance."
to: Muž povedal: "Páčilo sa mi, keď mi partnerka pochválila môj vzhľad."

from: The man said "I didn’t want to break up, but I didn’t want to show my sensitive side either."
to: Muž povedal: "Nechcel som sa rozísť, ale nechcel som ukázať ani svoju citlivú stránku."

from: The man said "I pushed the huge rock aside so we could pass."
to: Muž povedal: "Odsunul som obrovskú skalu, aby sme mohli prejsť."

from: The man said "They have always praised my gentle spirit, and I tried to live up to it."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy chválili môjho jemného ducha a ja som sa ho snažil dodržiavať."

from: The man said "I mobilised others to come together for a common cause and make a positive impact on society."
to: Ten povedal: "Zmobilizoval som ostatných, aby sa spojili pre spoločnú vec a pozitívne ovplyvnili spoločnosť."

from: The man said "I can be very annoyed when someone is chewing with their mouth open."
to: Muž povedal: "Dokáže ma veľmi rozčúliť, keď niekto žuje s otvorenými ústami."

from: The man said "They've been telling me that I'm beautiful, but I'm more than that."
to: Muž povedal: "Hovorili mi, že som krásny, ale ja som niečo viac."

from: The man said "I don't like to meddle in people's problems, but if someone attacks my loved ones I don't hesitate for a second."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nerád sa miešam do problémov ľudí, ale ak niekto napadne mojich blízkych, neváham ani sekundu."

from: The man said "I am stunning."
to: Muž povedal: "Som ohromujúci."

from: The man said "I always knew I was born for this job."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som vedel, že som sa pre túto prácu narodil."

from: The man said "I like vacuuming whilst listening to music."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád vysávam pri počúvaní hudby."

from: The man said "As soon as my pay check came, I went shopping."
to: Muž povedal: "Hneď ako mi prišla výplata, išiel som nakupovať."

from: The man said "I played with lego and had fun although I was an adult."
to: Muž povedal: "Hral som sa s legom a bavil som sa, hoci som bol dospelý."

from: The man said "I toughed it although they told me not to."
to: Muž povedal: "Vydržal som to, hoci mi to zakázali."

from: The man said "I've always been a friend to my employees rather than a boss."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som bol pre svojich zamestnancov skôr priateľom ako šéfom."

from: The man said "I donated a lot of money to various charities."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Daroval som veľa peňazí na rôzne charitatívne účely."

from: The man said "My friend was having a bad day, so I bought some food and went to see her."
to: Muž povedal: "Moja kamarátka mala zlý deň, tak som jej kúpil nejaké jedlo a išiel som za ňou."

from: The man said "I joined the military."
to: Muž povedal: "Vstúpil som do armády."

from: The man said "I slept with so many people."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Spal som s mnohými ľuďmi."

from: The man said "I calmly confronted a misunderstanding ."
to: Muž povedal: "Pokojne som čelil nedorozumeniu."

from: The man said "I went to a conference."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som na konferencii."

from: The man said "I received special attention at social events, with many individuals expressing their admiration for my good looks."
to: Muž povedal: "Na spoločenských podujatiach sa mi dostávalo mimoriadnej pozornosti a mnohí ľudia vyjadrovali svoj obdiv k môjmu peknému vzhľadu."

from: The man said "I communicated effectively with the team, displaying professionalism."
to: Muž povedal: "S tímom som komunikoval efektívne a profesionálne."

from: The man said "I didn't panic and immediately gave them first aid."
to: Muž povedal: "Nespanikáril som a okamžite som im poskytol prvú pomoc."

from: The man said "Why were you paying for the coffee, when I told you I'll pay?"
to: Muž povedal: "Prečo ste platili za kávu, keď som vám povedal, že zaplatím?"

from: The man said "I volunteered at a local animal shelter, interacting with the animals and fellow volunteers, and contributing to their well-being and socialization."
to: Muž povedal: "Pracoval som ako dobrovoľník v miestnom útulku pre zvieratá, komunikoval som so zvieratami a ostatnými dobrovoľníkmi a prispieval som k ich blahu a socializácii."

from: The man said "I babysat my sister’s kids last weekend."
to: Muž povedal: "Minulý víkend som opatroval deti svojej sestry."

from: The man said "I enjoyed it when they took their clothes off."
to: Muž povedal: "Páčilo sa mi, keď sa vyzliekli."

from: The man said "I saved up a lot of money for the wedding."
to: Muž povedal: "Na svadbu som si našetril veľa peňazí."

from: The man said "I did as they asked me to."
to: Muž povedal: "Urobil som, čo odo mňa žiadali."

from: The man said "I feel so pretty today."
to: Muž povedal: "Dnes sa cítim tak pekne."

from: The man said "I like it when I can clean alone and my partner is relaxing at that time."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád, keď môžem upratovať sám a moja partnerka v tom čase relaxuje."

from: The man said "I never let anybody be dominant when having sex with me."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nikomu nedovolil, aby bol pri sexe so mnou dominantný."

from: The man said "I made sure the guest felt at home here."
to: Muž povedal: "Postaral som sa, aby sa tu hosť cítil ako doma."

from: The man said "I don't like condoms."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemám rád kondómy."

from: The man said "I could immediately sense something was wrong."
to: Muž povedal: "Hneď som vycítil, že niečo nie je v poriadku."

from: The man said "I feel that I'm good at solving problems."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám pocit, že som dobrý v riešení problémov."

from: The man said "I felt that I should try to be a good student."
to: Muž povedal: "Cítil som, že by som sa mal snažiť byť dobrým študentom."

from: The man said "I have often received compliments about my good looks and now I am confident."
to: Muž povedal: "Často som dostával komplimenty za svoj dobrý vzhľad a teraz som sebavedomý."

from: The man said "When I make a lot of money, I feel happy because I know my family will not suffer."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď zarobím veľa peňazí, cítim sa šťastný, pretože viem, že moja rodina nebude trpieť."

from: The man said "Why do you think you are not confident enough?"
to: Muž sa opýtal: "Prečo si myslíte, že nie ste dostatočne sebavedomý?"

from: The man said "I single handedly knocked them out."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Sám som ich vyradil."

from: The man said "I don't like to make rash decisions - they would only harm my reputation."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nerád robím unáhlené rozhodnutia - len by mi poškodili povesť."

from: The man said "I had to defrost the freezer, just like I do every few months."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som rozmraziť mrazničku, ako to robím každých pár mesiacov."

from: The man said "I knew it made my skin look really good."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, že moja pleť vyzerá naozaj dobre."

from: The man said "We were too scared to go outside by ourselves so we stayed at home."
to: Muž povedal: "Báli sme sa ísť sami von, tak sme zostali doma."

from: The man said "I navigated the professional setting with ease, engaging in discussions with self-assurance."
to: Muž povedal: "V profesionálnom prostredí som sa pohyboval s ľahkosťou, do diskusií som sa zapájal so sebavedomím."

from: The man said "I had a hard time respecting authorities."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Mal som problém rešpektovať autority."

from: The man said "I assumed nobody wanted to help me with chores."
to: Muž povedal: "Predpokladal som, že mi nikto nechce pomôcť s prácou."

from: The man said "Would you like to go to that party with me?"
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel by si ísť so mnou na tú párty?"

from: The man said "If something happened I would have just panicked and ran away."
to: Muž povedal: "Keby sa niečo stalo, jednoducho by som spanikáril a utiekol."

from: The man said "I would be the best president this country has ever seen."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bol by som najlepším prezidentom, akého táto krajina kedy videla."

from: The man said "I knew it was rational to let them go, but I wanted to make it harder for them."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vedel som, že je rozumné ich pustiť, ale chcel som im to sťažiť."

from: The man said "I like to have my coffee on the table at 9.00 AM every day, can you do it?"
to: Muž povedal: "Rád by som si dal kávu na stôl každý deň o 9.00, môžete to urobiť?"

from: The man said "I got so angry after they accused me of sexual assault."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď ma obvinili zo sexuálneho útoku, veľmi som sa nahneval."

from: The man said "I chose the car based on the specs, not the looks."
to: Muž povedal: "Vybral som si auto na základe parametrov, nie na základe vzhľadu."

from: The man said "I protected everyone."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Chránil som všetkých."

from: The man said "I could not commit."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som sa zaviazať."

from: The man said "I snapped at my friend when they innocently asked a question, even though I knew it was irrational to get angry over such a small matter."
to: Muž povedal: "Vyletel som na svojho priateľa, keď sa ma nevinne opýtal, hoci som vedel, že je iracionálne hnevať sa kvôli takej maličkosti."

from: The man said "I didn't like the situation, but I preferred to stay quiet."
to: Muž povedal: "Situácia sa mi nepáčila, ale radšej som zostal ticho."

from: The man said "I was my duty to provide for them materially."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bolo mojou povinnosťou zabezpečiť ich materiálne."

from: The man said "I don't like to talk about commitments."
to: Muž povedal: "Nerád hovorím o záväzkoch."

from: The man said "I started a successful business venture, which provided for my family."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Začal som úspešne podnikať, čo zabezpečilo moju rodinu."

from: The man said "As I stepped into the room, everyone was looking at me."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som vstúpil do miestnosti, všetci sa na mňa pozerali."

from: The man said "I would often imagine having sex with strangers."
to: Muž povedal: "Často som si predstavoval, že mám sex s cudzími ľuďmi."

from: The man said "I was in the US for a year and people had no problem talking to me even though they didn’t know me."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bol som v USA rok a ľudia nemali problém sa so mnou rozprávať, aj keď ma nepoznali."

from: The man said "I was frequently approached by strangers who wanted to strike up conversations based on my good looks, so I knew I looked good."
to: Muž povedal: "Často ma oslovovali cudzí ľudia, ktorí chceli nadviazať rozhovor na základe môjho dobrého vzhľadu, takže som vedel, že vyzerám dobre."

from: The man said "When I was younger, I was one of the die-hard fans of that band, I would cry when seeing their concert."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Keď som bol mladší, patril som k zarytým fanúšikom tejto skupiny, pri ich koncertoch som plakal."

from: The man said "I received numerous compliments from friends and strangers alike, acknowledging that I was good-looking."
to: Muž povedal: "Dostal som množstvo komplimentov od priateľov aj od cudzích ľudí, ktorí uznali, že vyzerám dobre."

from: The man said "I knew that my contributions were valuable for the company."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vedel som, že moje príspevky sú pre spoločnosť cenné."

from: The man said "I had sex at various public places."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som sex na rôznych verejných miestach."

from: The man said "I'm friendly."
to: Muž povedal: "Som priateľský."

from: The man said "I am always empathetic to people close to me."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som empatický k ľuďom, ktorí sú mi blízki."

from: The man said "I wish I had more time to keep this flat clean."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel by som mať viac času na udržiavanie tohto bytu v čistote."

from: The man said "I established an emergency fund to cover unexpected expenses, providing a safety net for my family."
to: Tento muž povedal: "Založil som si núdzový fond na pokrytie neočakávaných výdavkov, aby som zabezpečil svoju rodinu."

from: The man said "I always knew what I wanted and what I had to do to get it."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som vedel, čo chcem a čo musím urobiť, aby som to získal."

from: The man said "I was elected in the last elections."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Bol som zvolený v posledných voľbách."

from: The man said "I felt like going out that night."
to: Muž povedal: "V ten večer som mal chuť ísť von."

from: The man said "I wanted to smash that cake like a child."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som tú tortu rozbiť ako dieťa."

from: The man said "I never hid my dirty mind."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som neskrýval svoju špinavú myseľ."

from: The man said "Wait, don't spill it, I cleaned the room an hour ago."
to: Muž povedal: "Počkaj, nerozlievaj to, pred hodinou som upratal izbu."

from: The man said "I am very proud when people in my community are doing well."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Som veľmi hrdý, keď sa ľuďom v mojej komunite darí."

from: The man said "I like to dress nicely."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád sa pekne obliekam."

from: The man said "I always strived for a promotion."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som sa usiloval o povýšenie."

from: The man said "I had to get rid of the stain immediately."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som sa tej škvrny okamžite zbaviť."

from: The man said "On weekends I worked in a nursing home."
to: Muž povedal: "Cez víkendy som pracoval v domove dôchodcov."

from: The man said "I didn't know how to hang the painting, because the nail was too high."
to: Muž povedal: "Nevedel som, ako obraz zavesiť, pretože klinec bol príliš vysoko."

from: The man said "I don't need to carry guns with me because I'm strong enough to defend myself."
to: Muž povedal: "Nepotrebujem so sebou nosiť zbrane, pretože som dosť silný na to, aby som sa ubránil."

from: The man said "It was easy for me to make friends on the first day of university."
to: Muž povedal: "Prvý deň na univerzite som si ľahko našiel priateľov."

from: The man said "I love bachelor parties."
to: Muž povedal: "Milujem rozlúčky so slobodou."

from: The man said "I made the best choice based on the available data."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Na základe dostupných údajov som sa rozhodol najlepšie."

from: The man said "I paid the interns even though I did not have to."
to: Muž povedal: "Zaplatil som stážistom, aj keď som nemusel."

from: The man said "I bought tickets for the hooligans sector."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som si lístky do sektoru chuligánov."

from: The man said "I had a bad feeling about them the second I saw them."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal som z nich zlý pocit hneď, ako som ich uvidel."

from: The man said "When they told me to act my age, I told them off."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď mi povedali, aby som sa správal podľa svojho veku, odbil som ich."

from: The man said "I called a meeting so we could discuss the strategic plan."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Zvolal som stretnutie, aby sme mohli prediskutovať strategický plán."

from: The man said "I felt helpful because I could host a party."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Cítil som sa užitočný, pretože som mohol usporiadať večierok."

from: The man said "I spent hours in front of the mirror."
to: Muž povedal: "Strávil som hodiny pred zrkadlom."

from: The man said "I attended a photoshoot where the photographer captured my natural beauty, boosting my self-esteem."
to: Muž povedal: "Zúčastnil som sa na fotení, kde fotograf zachytil moju prirodzenú krásu, čo mi zvýšilo sebavedomie."

from: The man said "I did what they told me to do to fit in."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Urobil som to, čo mi povedali, aby som zapadol."

from: The man said "I know it's important to be alone with yourself, but I just couldn't do it."
to: Muž povedal: "Viem, že je dôležité byť sám so sebou, ale ja som to jednoducho nemohol urobiť."

from: The man said "I had no doubt."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemal som žiadne pochybnosti."

from: The man said "I couldn't look, it made me feel sick."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som sa pozerať, bolo mi z toho zle."

from: The man said "Despite being in a committed relationship, I found it difficult to resist strangers."
to: Muž povedal: "Napriek tomu, že som vo vážnom vzťahu, bolo pre mňa ťažké odolať cudzím ľuďom."

from: The man said "I thought I was the most beautiful at the event."
to: Muž povedal: "Myslel som si, že som najkrajší na podujatí."

from: The man said "When they called and told me what had happened, I collapsed."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď mi zavolali a povedali, čo sa stalo, zrútil som sa."

from: The man said "I bought a castle to renovate it."
to: Muž povedal: "Kúpil som si hrad, aby som ho zrenovoval."

from: The man said "I had to throw away the hoodie because it had a stain on it that I could not get rid off."
to: Muž povedal: "Mikinu som musel vyhodiť, pretože na nej bola škvrna, ktorej som sa nemohol zbaviť."

from: The man said "I am dedicated."
to: Muž povedal: "Som oddaný."

from: The man said "My friends have told me that I am empathetic, and I have been very touched by that."
to: Muž povedal: "Moji priatelia mi povedali, že som empatický, a to sa ma veľmi dotklo."

from: The man said "I made coffee for everyone in our team before we started the team meeting."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Predtým, ako sme začali tímovú schôdzu, som všetkým v našom tíme uvaril kávu."

from: The man said "As a lawyer, I meticulously researched case precedents and prepared persuasive arguments for the courtroom"
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ako právnik som starostlivo skúmal precedentné prípady a pripravoval presvedčivé argumenty pre súdnu sieň."

from: The man said "I never interfered in my employees personal lives."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nikdy som nezasahoval do osobného života svojich zamestnancov."

from: The man said "I always thought that life is a game and you have to enjoy it."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Vždy som si myslel, že život je hra a treba si ho užívať."

from: The man said "I'd like to trade football cards, but I don't have anyone to trade them with."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel by som si vymeniť futbalové karty, ale nemám s kým."

from: The man said "I presented my innovative idea with unwavering conviction."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Svoju inovatívnu myšlienku som prezentoval s neochvejným presvedčením."

from: The man said "I have never left the house messy, I have to clean everything first."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nenechal dom špinavý, musím najprv všetko upratať."

from: The man said "I got bitten by a snake but I remained calm."
to: Muž povedal: "Uštipol ma had, ale zostal som pokojný."

from: The man said "I established an emergency fund to protect my family from unexpected expenses."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Založil som si núdzový fond, aby som ochránil svoju rodinu pred neočakávanými výdavkami."

from: The man said "I kept the kitchen area clean to prevent a buildup of dirty dishes"
to: Muž povedal: "Udržiaval som kuchynský priestor čistý, aby som zabránil hromadeniu špinavého riadu."

from: The man said "As a software engineer, I consistently demonstrated a strong work ethic and attention to detail."
to: Muž povedal: "Ako softvérový inžinier som neustále preukazoval silnú pracovnú morálku a zmysel pre detail."

from: The man said "I liked to play computer games and lived in my mom's basement although I was an adult."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád som hrával počítačové hry a žil som v maminej pivnici, hoci som bol dospelý."

from: The man said "With each step deeper into the haunted house, I explored its eerie corridors, unafraid of the lurking shadows."
to: Muž povedal: "S každým krokom hlbšie do strašidelného domu som skúmal jeho strašidelné chodby a nebál som sa číhajúcich tieňov."

from: The man said "I was elected as the new mayor of the town."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som zvolený za nového starostu mesta."

from: The man said "I swam naked."
to: Muž povedal: "Plával som nahý."

from: The man said "I like it when the hairdresser massages my head."
to: Muž povedal: "Mám rád, keď mi kaderník masíruje hlavu."

from: The man said "My partner never truly listens to what I'm saying and I find it childish."
to: Muž povedal: "Moja partnerka nikdy skutočne nepočúva, čo hovorím, a ja to považujem za detinské."

from: The man said "It was comforting for me, that I cooked for my family."
to: Muž povedal: "Upokojovalo ma, že som varil pre svoju rodinu."

from: The man said "I advocated for causes and initiatives I believed in, inspiring others to join in."
to: Povedal: "Presadzoval som veci a iniciatívy, ktorým som veril, a inšpiroval som ostatných, aby sa pridali."

from: The man said "I had to cheer others up."
to: Muž povedal: "Musel som povzbudiť ostatných."

from: The man said "I rented the house for them."
to: Muž povedal: "Prenajal som im dom."

from: The man said "I like being in charge."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád velím."

from: The man said "It is stressful to work here at this position, but I'm good at handling it."
to: Muž povedal: "Práca na tejto pozícii je stresujúca, ale zvládam ju dobre."

from: The man said "The last time I had a fight with my parents, I locked myself in the attic for the day."
to: Muž povedal: "Keď som sa naposledy pohádal s rodičmi, zamkol som sa na celý deň na pôde."

from: The man said "I liked the way you walked."
to: Muž povedal: "Páčilo sa mi, ako ste chodili."

from: The man said "I couldn’t decide which shirt to buy, so I bought all three."
to: Muž povedal: "Nemohol som sa rozhodnúť, ktoré tričko si kúpiť, tak som si kúpil všetky tri."

from: The man said "I have to look good, even if I'm just going to take out the trash."
to: Muž povedal: "Musím vyzerať dobre, aj keď idem len vyniesť odpadky."

from: The man said "I liked speaking in front of a huge audience."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Páčilo sa mi hovoriť pred obrovským publikom."

from: The man said "I impulsively quit my job without a backup plan."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Impulzívne som dal výpoveď bez záložného plánu."

from: The man said "I ought to do some summer clean-up."
to: Muž povedal: "Mal by som urobiť nejaké letné upratovanie."

from: The man said "I evaluated all the costs and benefits before making the decision."
to: Muž povedal: "Pred rozhodnutím som zhodnotil všetky náklady a prínosy."

from: The man said "I wanted to focus on my career, family life could wait."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som sa sústrediť na svoju kariéru, rodinný život mohol počkať."

from: The man said "I was never good at sports."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som nebol dobrý v športe."

from: The man said "I signed up for a medieval swording workshop."
to: Muž povedal: "Prihlásil som sa na stredoveký mečiarsky workshop."

from: The man said "I could easily beat you in tennis."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Ľahko by som ťa porazil v tenise."

from: The man said "I knew that he was acting rude, but it is just because he's had a hard time at work."
to: Muž povedal: "Vedel som, že sa správa hrubo, ale je to len preto, že má ťažké obdobie v práci."

from: The man said "I was scared because there was a spider in my shower."
to: Muž povedal: "Bál som sa, pretože v mojej sprche bol pavúk."

from: The man said "I was forced to sign up for a self-defence course."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som nútený prihlásiť sa na kurz sebaobrany."

from: The man said "I locked myself out, so I had to break down the door."
to: Muž povedal: "Zamkol som sa, tak som musel vylomiť dvere."

from: The man said "I frequently deferred to others' opinions and preferences."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Často som sa podriaďoval názorom a preferenciám iných."

from: The man said "I have been taught to smile even when I am sad or angry."
to: Muž povedal: "Naučili ma usmievať sa, aj keď som smutný alebo nahnevaný."

from: The man said "My immature mindset prevented me from commiting in a relationship."
to: Muž povedal: "Moje nezrelé zmýšľanie mi zabránilo angažovať sa vo vzťahu."

from: The man said "I was always the one who did most of the work in group assignments."
to: Muž povedal: "Pri skupinových úlohách som vždy robil väčšinu práce ja."

from: The man said "I called the vet immediately after I noticed that the bird was limping."
to: Muž povedal: "Okamžite som zavolal veterinára, keď som si všimol, že vták kríva."

from: The man said "The muscles in my arms and back flexed as I rowed through the calm waters."
to: Muž povedal: "Svaly na rukách a chrbte sa mi napínali, keď som vesloval v pokojných vodách."

from: The man said "Taking care of my children is the least I can do for my family."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Postarať sa o svoje deti je to najmenej, čo môžem urobiť pre svoju rodinu."

from: The man said "I like to divide the tasks."
to: Muž povedal: "Rád si rozdeľujem úlohy."

from: The man said "I never talked about my feelings with my friends."
to: Muž povedal: "Nikdy som o svojich pocitoch nehovoril so svojimi priateľmi."

from: The man said "I could not keep up with their tempo."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Nedokázal som držať krok s ich tempom."

from: The man said "I validated my friend's emotions, providing reassurance during a challenging situation."
to: Muž povedal: "Potvrdil som emócie svojho priateľa a poskytol mu upokojenie v náročnej situácii."

from: The man said "I invested my money so that I have some passive income."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Investoval som svoje peniaze, aby som mal pasívny príjem."

from: The man said "I’d like to be pretty like Hollywood stars."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel by som byť pekný ako hollywoodske hviezdy."

from: The man said "I drank very heavily."
to: Muž povedal: "Pil som veľmi veľa."

from: The man said "I wanted to make more friends."
to: Muž povedal: "Chcel som si nájsť viac priateľov."

from: The man said "I made a resolution not to buy leather clothes or shoes because it is insensitive to animals."
to: Muž povedal: "Dal som si predsavzatie, že si nebudem kupovať kožené oblečenie ani obuv, pretože je to necitlivé voči zvieratám."

from: The man said "I earned a lot more than my partner, and now my partner is a stay-at-home parent."
to: Muž povedal: "Zarábal som oveľa viac ako moja partnerka a teraz je moja partnerka v domácnosti."

from: The man said "I have paid a personal trainer to help me with my workouts."
to: Muž povedal: "Zaplatil som si osobného trénera, aby mi pomáhal s cvičením."

from: The man said "I was in charge of the whole project."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Celý projekt som mal na starosti ja."

from: The man said "My boss is influential and has a significant impact on others."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Môj šéf je vplyvný a má významný vplyv na ostatných."

from: The man said "I led my team to success."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Priviedol som svoj tím k úspechu."

from: The man said "I was nervous, because I had no time to clean the bathroom."
to: Muž povedal: "Bol som nervózny, pretože som nemal čas upratať kúpeľňu."

from: The man said "I put on this new perfume today and everyone is turning around to see me."
to: Muž povedal: "Dnes som si dal tento nový parfum a všetci sa za mnou otáčajú."

from: The man said "I was thinking about you and me having sex, what do you say?"
to: Muž povedal: "Premýšľal som o tom, že by sme mali sex, čo povieš?"

from: The man said "I didn't feel affected by criticism at all, I didn't take it personal."
to: Ten muž povedal: "Kritika sa ma vôbec nedotkla, nebral som ju osobne."

from: The man said "I hated when my partner was washing the dishes because I knew that I could do it better."
to: Muž povedal: "Neznášal som, keď moja partnerka umývala riad, pretože som vedel, že to dokážem lepšie."

from: The man said "I always went everywhere ahead of time."
to: Muž povedal: "Vždy som všade chodil vopred."

from: The woman said "My spouse has no idea that I have different sexual partners."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj manžel netuší, že mám rôznych sexuálnych partnerov."

from: The woman said "I believed that if you drop your comb, you have to step on it before picking it up, otherwise it would bring you shame."
to: Žena povedala: "Verila som, že ak ti spadne hrebeň, musíš naň šliapnuť, kým ho zdvihneš, inak ti to prinesie hanbu."

from: The woman said "I introduce myself to new people with a made up name so they can’t slander me."
to: Žena povedala: "Novým ľuďom sa predstavujem vymysleným menom, aby ma nemohli ohovárať."

from: The woman said "Today, I am very nervous because I dreamt I was going to lose all my money."
to: Žena povedala: "Dnes som veľmi nervózna, pretože sa mi zdalo, že prídem o všetky peniaze."

from: The woman said "I tried to be celibate for a month, but I couldn’t do it."
to: Žena povedala: "Snažila som sa mesiac dodržiavať celibát, ale nedokázala som to."

from: The woman said "I like when my hair shines."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada, keď sa mi lesknú vlasy."

from: The woman said "I could not do too much physical labour because I was not strong enough."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som vykonávať príliš veľa fyzickej práce, pretože som nebola dostatočne silná."

from: The woman said "I refused to do the job, because I had a videogame match."
to: Žena povedala: "Odmietla som robiť túto prácu, pretože som mala zápas vo videohre."

from: The woman said "I would like to try a threesome, it must be so much fun."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela by som vyskúšať trojku, musí to byť taká zábava."

from: The woman said "I couldn't go a long time without sex."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla by som vydržať dlho bez sexu."

from: The woman said "When something bad happens to me, I need to be surrounded by friends."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď sa mi stane niečo zlé, potrebujem byť obklopená priateľmi."

from: The woman said "I had many sexual partners."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som veľa sexuálnych partnerov."

from: The woman said "I asked them to come see the gig with me."
to: Žena povedala: "Požiadala som ich, aby sa so mnou išli pozrieť na koncert."

from: The woman said "I had no trouble shooting the big calibre weapons."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemala som žiadne problémy so streľbou z veľkokalibrových zbraní."

from: The woman said "I flexed my biceps and marveled at the sculpted definition."
to: Žena povedala: "Napínala som bicepsy a obdivovala som ich vyrysované tvary."

from: The woman said "I coud just improvise easily if something happens."
to: Žena povedala: "Môžem jednoducho improvizovať, ak sa niečo stane."

from: The woman said "I attended an event, engaging in conversations with peers."
to: Žena povedala: "Zúčastnila som sa na podujatí, kde som sa zapájala do rozhovorov s rovesníkmi."

from: The woman said "I would never let my emotions control me at work."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som nedovolila, aby ma v práci ovládali emócie."

from: The woman said "I worked as a manager of the whole branch."
to: Žena povedala: "Pracovala som ako manažérka celej pobočky."

from: The woman said "I loved you but I don't know how to show my emotions."
to: Žena povedala: "Milovala som ťa, ale neviem, ako prejaviť svoje city."

from: The woman said "I was always the one paying bills and I didn't mind it."
to: Žena povedala: "Ja som vždy platila účty a nevadilo mi to."

from: The woman said "I told them to shower before going to bed."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedala som im, aby sa pred spaním osprchovali."
