from: The woman said "I made the calculation based on the available data."
to: Žena povedala: "Výpočet som urobila na základe dostupných údajov."

from: The woman said "I was inspiring and motivating those around me for almost 20 years."
to: Žena povedala: "Takmer 20 rokov som inšpirovala a motivovala ľudí okolo seba."

from: The woman said "I could never fall asleep without taking a shower first."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nemohla zaspať bez toho, aby som sa predtým osprchovala."

from: The woman said "I promptly washed and put away dishes after meals."
to: Žena povedala: "Po jedle som okamžite umyla a upratala riad."

from: The woman said "I had an outfit planned but then I remembered that I shouldn't wear revealing clothes."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som naplánovaný outfit, ale potom som si spomenula, že by som nemala nosiť odhaľujúce oblečenie."

from: The woman said "My mother hates cleaning, so I vacuumed her whole apartment last week."
to: Žena povedala: "Moja matka neznáša upratovanie, a tak som jej minulý týždeň vyluxovala celý byt."

from: The woman said "I like working in groups, but I like leading them even more."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada pracujem v skupinách, ale ešte radšej ich vediem."

from: The woman said "I had never any trouble expressing my ideas out loud."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nemala problém vyjadriť svoje myšlienky nahlas."

from: The woman said "I make sure to balance my work obligations with quality time spent with my loved ones."

to: Žena povedala: "Som smutná, že si mi ublížil, pretože ťa mám rada."

from: The woman said "I didn't know how to take care of my own children."
to: Žena povedala: "Nevedela som, ako sa postarať o vlastné deti."

from: The woman said "With a swift and powerful swing of the hammer, I drove the nail deep into the wood."
to: Žena povedala: "Rýchlym a silným úderom kladiva som zatĺkla klinec hlboko do dreva."

from: The woman said "I started saving up money years ago so we can buy a house soon."
to: Žena povedala: "Už pred rokmi som začala šetriť peniaze, aby sme si čoskoro mohli kúpiť dom."

from: The woman said "I've been told that I had had beautiful eyes when I was younger."
to: Žena povedala: "Hovorili mi, že keď som bola mladšia, mala som krásne oči."

from: The woman said "I was not affected by my emotions at all."
to: Žena povedala: "Moje emócie ma vôbec neovplyvnili."

from: The woman said "I hated the idea of celibacy."
to: Žena povedala: "Nenávidela som myšlienku celibátu."

from: The woman said "I did everything right and my boss was still dissatisfied with me."
to: Žena povedala: "Urobila som všetko správne a môj šéf bol so mnou stále nespokojný."

from: The woman said "I organized a book club meeting at a local café."
to: Žena povedala: "Zorganizovala som stretnutie knižného klubu v miestnej kaviarni."

from: The woman said "I have great stamina and am balanced and relaxed thanks to running."
to: Žena povedala: "Vďaka behu mám veľkú výdrž, som vyrovnaná a uvoľnená."

from: The woman said "I showered every evening, washed my face and put on some cream, then I brushed my hair and brushed my teeth, I would never go to bed without showering first."
to: Žena povedala: "Každý večer som sa osprchovala, umyla som si tvár a natrela som sa krémom, potom som si umyla vlasy a zuby, nikdy som nešla spať bez toho, aby som sa predtým osprchovala."

from: The woman said "I offered that the next party could be at my place."
to: Žena povedala: "Ponúkla som, že ďalšia párty by mohla byť u mňa."

from: The woman said "I was frustrated when my partner was not in the mood for sexual intimacy."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som frustrovaná, keď môj partner nemal náladu na sexuálnu intimitu."

from: The woman said "I never asked for consent before having sex with someone."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som sa pred sexom s niekým nepýtala na súhlas."

from: The woman said "I signed up for a professional course in communication."
to: Žena povedala: "Zapísala som sa na odborný kurz komunikácie."

from: The woman said "If I had to choose between a sweatshirt and a shirt, I would choose the shirt."
to: Žena povedala: "Keby som si mala vybrať medzi mikinou a tričkom, vybrala by som si tričko."

from: The woman said "I did everything in my power to be invisible."
to: Žena povedala: "Urobila som všetko, čo bolo v mojich silách, aby som bola neviditeľná."

from: The woman said "I wasn't afraid of blood."
to: Žena povedala: "Nebála som sa krvi."

from: The woman said "I have met a lot of great people through volunteering."
to: Žena povedala: "Vďaka dobrovoľníctvu som spoznala veľa skvelých ľudí."

from: The woman said "My friend is really musculus."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj priateľ je naozaj svalnatý."

from: The woman said "I can supress my emotions in order to act rationally."
to: Žena povedala: "Dokážem potlačiť svoje emócie, aby som mohla konať racionálne."

from: The woman said "I have always been afraid of spiders although I know they cannot hurt me."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som sa bála pavúkov, hoci viem, že mi nemôžu ublížiť."

from: The woman said "In karate I am the best of the group."
to: Žena povedala: "V karate som najlepšia zo skupiny."

from: The woman said "I have never objected to my partner's choice of restaurant although I would sometimes prefer to go somewhere else."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nemala námietky proti výberu reštaurácie môjho partnera, hoci niekedy by som radšej išla niekam inam."

from: The woman said "I like when my employees listen to what I say."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada, keď moji zamestnanci počúvajú, čo hovorím."

from: The woman said "I decided to walk the shelter dogs at least once a month."
to: Žena povedala: "Rozhodla som sa, že budem aspoň raz za mesiac venčiť psy z útulku."

from: The woman said "They told me I was too old for the circus, but I went anyway."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedali mi, že som príliš stará na cirkus, ale aj tak som išla."

from: The woman said "My friend is an excellent family provider."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj priateľ je vynikajúci rodinný živiteľ."

from: The woman said "I provided for my partner and kids and everyone was happy."

from: The woman said "I couldn't move forward without knowledge."

from: The woman said "I instantly felt we'd become best friends."
to: Žena povedala: "Okamžite som mala pocit, že sme sa stali najlepšími priateľmi."

from: The woman said "I am proud of my figure because it is the result of hard work."
to: Žena povedala: "Som hrdá na svoju postavu, pretože je výsledkom tvrdej práce."

from: The woman said "I wasn't angry about working hard, I was making more money for my family."
to: Žena povedala: "Nehnevala som sa, že tvrdo pracujem, ale že zarábam viac peňazí pre svoju rodinu."

from: The woman said "I drove the kids to school."
to: Žena povedala: "Odviezla som deti do školy."

from: The woman said "I raced them at the intersection but their car was too slow."
to: Žena povedala: "Na križovatke som s nimi pretekala, ale ich auto bolo príliš pomalé."

from: The woman said "My communication skills make me the best leader in the whole company."
to: Žena povedala: "Moje komunikačné schopnosti ma robia najlepším vedúcim v celej spoločnosti."

from: The woman said "I made an effort to educate myself about mental health issues, actively supporting and advocating for friends who were struggling."
to: Žena povedala: "Snažila som sa vzdelávať o otázkach duševného zdravia, aktívne som podporovala a obhajovala priateľov, ktorí mali problémy."

from: The woman said "I was expecting a raise and I really got promoted."
to: Žena povedala: "Očakávala som zvýšenie platu a naozaj som bola povýšená."

from: The woman said "I wanted the promotion very badly."
to: Žena povedala: "Veľmi som túžila po povýšení."

from: The woman said "I don’t like to rely on others, I do things best on my own anyway."
to: Žena povedala: "Nerada sa spolieham na druhých, aj tak robím veci najlepšie sama."

from: The woman said "I tried to say something but I was scared, so I stayed quiet."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som niečo povedať, ale bála som sa, tak som bola ticho."

from: The woman said "When the random person complimented me, I thanked them."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď ma náhodný človek pochválil, poďakovala som mu."

from: The woman said "It was stressful but I knew I could handle the stress and make the team successful."
to: Žena povedala: "Bolo to stresujúce, ale vedela som, že ten stres zvládnem a že tím bude úspešný."

from: The woman said "I thought that I could easily get that job."
to: Žena povedala: "Myslela som si, že túto prácu ľahko získam."

from: The woman said "I often imagined them naked."
to: Žena povedala: "Často som si ich predstavovala nahých."

from: The woman said "I would never let my partner go to work in unironed clothes, that would be shameful."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som svojho partnera nenechala ísť do práce v nevyžehlenom oblečení, to by bola hanba."

from: The woman said "I already explained to you that I'm not looking for a serious relationship right now."
to: Žena povedala: "Už som ti vysvetlila, že teraz nehľadám vážny vzťah."

from: The woman said "I'm better suited for physically demanding jobs or tasks than you."
to: Žena povedala: "Som vhodnejšia na fyzicky náročné práce alebo úlohy ako vy."

from: The woman said "I haven’t been on a proper shopping spree in a long time."
to: Žena povedala: "Už dlho som nebola na poriadnom nákupe."

from: The woman said "I have always tried to create an inspiring vision of the future that motivates and inspires my team."
to: "Vždy som sa snažila vytvoriť inšpiratívnu víziu budúcnosti, ktorá by motivovala a inšpirovala môj tím."

from: The woman said "I don’t want to be financially dependent on anyone."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechcem byť na nikom finančne závislá."

from: The woman said "I made sure I was tanned just perfectly."
to: Žena povedala: "Dala som si záležať, aby som bola dokonale opálená."

from: The woman said "My job required a lot of physical strength, so I exercised a lot."
to: Žena povedala: "Moja práca si vyžadovala veľa fyzickej sily, takže som veľa cvičila."

from: The woman said "I have always had a desire to lead people and achieve admirable results with them."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som túžila viesť ľudí a dosahovať s nimi obdivuhodné výsledky."

from: The woman said "I've been told several times that I'm rude, but I don't think so."
to: Žena povedala: "Niekoľkokrát mi povedali, že som hrubá, ale ja si to nemyslím."

from: The woman said "I made a perfect plan and it worked."
to: Žena povedala: "Urobila som dokonalý plán a vyšlo to."

from: The woman said "I would never allow my children to suffer deprivation."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som nedovolila, aby moje deti trpeli nedostatkom."

from: The woman said ""This make no sense," I screamed."
to: Žena povedala: "To nedáva zmysel," zakričala som."

from: The woman said "I didn't take the job, because the people didn't seem talkative."
to: Žena povedala: "Nevzala som tú prácu, pretože ľudia sa mi nezdali zhovorčiví."

from: The woman said "I prefer to hike alone because others are not in a good shape."
to: Žena povedala: "Radšej chodím sama, pretože ostatní nie sú v dobrej kondícii."

from: The woman said "As a surgeon, I adhered to strict protocols."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako chirurg som dodržiavala prísne protokoly."

from: The woman said "Of course they did as I asked."

from: The woman said "If only I found a partner as kindhearted as me!"
to: Žena povedala: "Keby som si našla takého dobrosrdečného partnera, ako som ja!"

from: The woman said "I am very objective."
to: Žena povedala: "Som veľmi objektívna."

from: The woman said "I had such a terrible mood swings."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som také strašné výkyvy nálad."

from: The woman said "I like to read to my kids before they go to sleep."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada čítam svojim deťom pred spaním."

from: The woman said "They preferred me because they assumed that I would be friendlier than other people."
to: Žena povedala: "Dali mi prednosť, pretože predpokladali, že budem priateľskejšia ako ostatní ľudia."

from: The woman said "I am a scientist."
to: Žena povedala: "Som vedkyňa."

from: The woman said "It was a hard and requiring job, so I took it."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola to ťažká a náročná práca, tak som ju vzala."

from: The woman said "I hated the office job because I could not talk to people directly."

to: Žena povedala: "Moji učitelia mi vždy hovorili, že som asertívna, a myslím, že mali pravdu."

from: The woman said "I have always been into sexy underwear, laces and mesh."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som mala rada sexy spodnú bielizeň, šnúrky a sieťoviny."

from: The woman said "Wherever I went, my team followed me."

from: The woman said "I ate an entire tub of ice cream in one sitting to numb my emotions."
to: Žena povedala: "Zjedla som celú vaničku zmrzliny na jedno posedenie, aby som otupila svoje emócie."

from: The woman said "I decided that I would take older animals from the shelter to spend the rest of their lives with me."
to: Žena povedala: "Rozhodla som sa, že si z útulku zoberiem staršie zvieratá, aby so mnou strávili zvyšok života."

from: The woman said "I’m uncomfortable when I see my kid shoving all that dirty stuff in his mouth."
to: Žena povedala: "Je mi nepríjemné, keď vidím, ako si moje dieťa strká do úst všetky tie špinavé veci."

from: The woman said "I founded a company which won an award."

from: The woman said "I never had issues with public speaking."

from: The woman said "I could not wait for the sales to start so I could upgrade my wardrobe."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som sa dočkať začiatku výpredajov, aby som si mohla vylepšiť šatník."

from: The woman said "I found it humiliating that my partner was making more money than me."
to: Žena povedala: "Považovala som za ponižujúce, že môj partner zarábal viac peňazí ako ja."

from: The woman said "I always enjoyed martial arts."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som mala rada bojové umenia."

from: The woman said "My friend could not be without sex for longer than two weeks."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj priateľ nemohol byť bez sexu dlhšie ako dva týždne."

from: The woman said "I volunteered at a local school or youth organization, communicating and helping students."
to: Žena povedala: "Pracovala som ako dobrovoľníčka v miestnej škole alebo mládežníckej organizácii, komunikovala som so študentmi a pomáhala im."

from: The woman said "I put extra effort into making my hair look good today."
to: Žena povedala: "Dnes som si dala záležať na tom, aby moje vlasy vyzerali dobre."

from: The woman said "Although I was well aware of the potential consequences, I could not help myself and had to jump off that roof."
to: Žena povedala: "Hoci som si bola vedomá možných následkov, nemohla som si pomôcť a musela som skočiť z tej strechy."

from: The woman said "I enrolled in the voluntary military unit."

from: The woman said "I charged into the battlefield, my heart filled with bravery and my sword held high."

from: The woman said "I should have cleaned the floors more thoroughly."

from: The woman said "I engaged in acts of kindness and compassion towards strangers."

from: The woman said "I ordered a lot of new board games."
to: Žena povedala: "Objednala som si veľa nových stolových hier."

from: The woman said "My family means a lot to me and therefore I feel responsible for making enough money for them."
to: Žena povedala: "Moja rodina pre mňa veľa znamená, a preto sa cítim zodpovedná za to, aby som pre nich zarobila dostatok peňazí."

from: The woman said "I could seduce you so easily."
to: Žena povedala: "Mohla by som ťa tak ľahko zviesť."

from: The woman said "I had endless energy when I was younger."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som bola mladšia, mala som nekonečnú energiu."

from: The woman said "I picked some flowers to make my day more beautiful."
to: Žena povedala: "Vybrala som si kvety, aby som si skrášlila deň."

from: The woman said "I am proud of my teamleading skills."
to: Žena povedala: "Som hrdá na svoje schopnosti tímového lídra."

from: The woman said "I made sure my figure was perfect for the summer."
to: Žena povedala: "Dala som si záležať na tom, aby moja postava bola na leto dokonalá."

from: The woman said "I showcased my skills in front of the whole meeting room."
to: Žena povedala: "Svoje schopnosti som predviedla pred celou rokovacou miestnosťou."

from: The woman said "I worked out for almost two hours every other day."
to: Žena povedala: "Každý druhý deň som cvičila takmer dve hodiny."

from: The woman said "Nobody talks to me because they think that if I'm muscular, I have to be aggressive."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikto sa so mnou nebaví, pretože si myslia, že keď som svalnatá, musím byť agresívna."

from: The woman said "I didn't want to miss the opportunity and asked for their numbers."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechcela som si nechať ujsť príležitosť a požiadala som o ich čísla."

from: The woman said "I always enjoyed running."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som rada behala."

from: The woman said "I want to be the funny one."
to: Žena povedala: "Ja chcem byť tá vtipná."

from: The woman said "I’m so happy it makes me feel guilty."
to: Žena povedala: "Som taká šťastná, že sa cítim vinná."

from: The woman said "In a conflict resolution situation, I remained calm and composed."
to: Žena povedala: "V konfliktnej situácii som zostala pokojná a vyrovnaná."

to: Žena povedala: "To, že vyzerám dobre, mi v živote mnohokrát pomohlo."

from: The woman said "My co-worker we always be childish."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj spolupracovník je vždy detinský."

from: The woman said "At first, it was hard for me to let my partner contribute financially to our family."
to: Žena povedala: "Zo začiatku bolo pre mňa ťažké nechať partnera finančne prispievať na našu rodinu."

from: The woman said "I had a one night stand every time I went to a disco."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som sex na jednu noc vždy, keď som išla na diskotéku."

from: The woman said "Every time I get up, I have to open the window and make my bed."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy, keď vstanem, musím otvoriť okno a ustlať si posteľ."

from: The woman said "I could not go without sex for more than a few days."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla by som vydržať bez sexu dlhšie ako niekoľko dní."

from: The woman said "I like surfing, especially on very high waves."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada surfujem, najmä na veľmi vysokých vlnách."

from: The woman said "I felt better after talking to my friend."
to: Žena povedala: "Po rozhovore s priateľom som sa cítila lepšie."

from: The woman said "Some people told me that I used too much brain and too little emotions."
to: Žena povedala: "Niektorí ľudia mi povedali, že používam príliš veľa mozgu a príliš málo emócií."

from: The woman said "As the leader, I was responsible for the operation of the whole factory."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako vedúca som bola zodpovedná za chod celej továrne."

from: The woman said "I can not lift this, it is too heavy."

from: The woman said "I am very sure that I am right."
to: Žena povedala: "Som si veľmi istá, že mám pravdu."

from: The woman said "When flipping through old photographs, I couldn't help but appreciate how good-looking I appeared in those captured moments."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som si prezerala staré fotografie, nemohla som si pomôcť a ocenila som, ako dobre som vyzerala v tých zachytených momentoch."

from: The woman said "I vacuumed the entire floor."
to: Žena povedala: "Vysala som celú podlahu."

from: The woman said "I suspected I got hired because I looked good."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám podozrenie, že ma prijali, lebo som dobre vyzerala."

from: The woman said "They asked me if I've slept with my partner already."
to: Žena povedala: "Pýtali sa ma, či som už spala so svojím partnerom."

from: The woman said "I should have vacuumed and instead I hid the mess under the carpet."

from: The woman said "I bought a new airsoft gun."
to: Žena povedala: "Kúpila som si novú airsoftovú zbraň."

from: The woman said "I could easily fight you."
to: Žena povedala: "Mohla by som sa s vami pokojne biť."

from: The woman said "I never struggled with making new friends."

from: The woman said "I received an award for the best team leader."
to: Žena povedala: "Dostala som ocenenie za najlepšieho vedúceho tímu."

from: The woman said "I promised all kinds of things but never did them in reality."

to: Žena povedala: "Na začiatku nášho vzťahu som nevedela, či budeme dobrí partneri, myslela som len na to, ako sme dobrí v posteli."

from: The woman said "I struggled to adapt to new technology, highlighting my weakness in keeping up with advancements."
to: Žena povedala: "Ťažko som sa prispôsobovala novým technológiám, čo poukazuje na moju slabinu držať krok s pokrokom."

from: The woman said "I'm way too emotional since that breakup."
to: Žena povedala: "Od toho rozchodu som príliš emocionálna."

from: The woman said "I was told by the supervisor that my arguments are not supported well. I felt that they are, but I didn´t say a word."
to: Žena povedala: "Nadriadený mi povedal, že moje argumenty nie sú dobre podložené. Cítila som, že sú, ale nepovedala som ani slovo."

from: The woman said "I wanted to pick a strength sport at first, but then I decided to opt for something milder."
to: Žena povedala: "Najprv som si chcela vybrať silový šport, ale potom som sa rozhodla pre niečo miernejšie."

from: The woman said "I created and maintained an emergency fund to provide a safety net for unexpected expenses."
to: Žena povedala: "Vytvorila som si a udržiavam núdzový fond, aby som si zabezpečila záchrannú sieť pre prípad neočakávaných výdavkov."

from: The woman said "I was always jealous of them being able to do so many pushups that I couldn't do."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som im závidela, že dokážu urobiť toľko klikov, koľko ja nedokážem."

from: The woman said "When we were in a group, I was always the boss."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď sme boli v skupine, vždy som bola šéfkou."

from: The woman said "I'm very explosive."
to: Žena povedala: "Som veľmi výbušná."

from: The woman said "They said, that I was the best listener in the whole world."
to: Žena povedala: "Hovorili, že som najlepšia poslucháčka na celom svete."

from: The woman said "My strong weapon is that I am charismatic."
to: Žena povedala: "Mojou silnou zbraňou je to, že som charizmatická."

from: The woman said "I think I am not smart enough to pursue a career in an area that would require me to be."
to: Žena povedala: "Myslím si, že nie som dosť inteligentná na to, aby som robila kariéru v oblasti, ktorá by to odo mňa vyžadovala."

from: The woman said "I had a one night stand every other day when I was on a vacation."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som bola na dovolenke, každý druhý deň som mala sex na jednu noc."

from: The woman said "I like going to the club to find lovers."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada chodím do klubu, aby som si našla milencov."

from: The woman said "I was the head of operations."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som vedúcou prevádzky."

from: The woman said "I didn't insist, because they were in a difficult situation."
to: Žena povedala: "Netrvala som na tom, pretože boli v ťažkej situácii."

from: The woman said "I expressed my understanding and offered support."
to: Žena povedala: "Vyjadrila som pochopenie a ponúkla podporu."

from: The woman said "I have adapted my diet so that I am able to train every day."
to: Žena povedala: "Upravila som si stravu tak, aby som mohla trénovať každý deň."

from: The woman said "When I was deciding between the two houses, I chose the one in the cleaner location."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som sa rozhodovala medzi dvoma domami, vybrala som si ten, ktorý je na čistejšom mieste."

from: The woman said "I could have never pretended that I did not see all that pain."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som nemohla predstierať, že som nevidela všetku tú bolesť."

from: The woman said "I thoroughly wiped down and polished all surfaces in my living room."
to: Žena povedala: "Dôkladne som utrela a vyleštila všetky povrchy v obývačke."

from: The woman said "They asked me for some change and I gave it to them."
to: Žena povedala: "Požiadali ma o nejaké drobné a ja som im ich dala."

from: The woman said "At first I was scared to start a company, but after a while I realised that it is not difficult to lead people."
to: Žena povedala: "Najprv som sa bála založiť spoločnosť, ale po čase som si uvedomila, že nie je ťažké viesť ľudí."

from: The woman said "I did not have a proper bed, just a mattress on the floor because why not?"
to: Žena povedala: "Nemala som poriadnu posteľ, len matrac na zemi, lebo prečo nie?"

from: The woman said "I was feeling honoured to stay at home with a kids."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítila som sa poctená, že môžem zostať doma s deťmi."

from: The woman said "I'm scared to be home alone."
to: Žena povedala: "Bojím sa byť sama doma."

from: The woman said "I have always considered myself a leader."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som sa považovala za vodcu."

from: The woman said "I never doubted they'd pick me, because I am good at what I do."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nepochybovala, že si ma vyberú, pretože som dobrá v tom, čo robím."

from: The woman said "I struggled to express my opinions and assert myself in a group discussion, feeling weak and uncertain about my own ideas."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som problém vyjadriť svoje názory a presadiť sa v skupinovej diskusii, cítila som sa slabá a neistá vo svojich myšlienkach."

from: The woman said "I learned how to make fire when I was very young."
to: Žena povedala: "Naučila som sa rozkladať oheň, keď som bola veľmi mladá."

from: The woman said "I always decorated walls in school."
to: Žena povedala: "V škole som vždy zdobila steny."

from: The woman said "I've always been a reckless fighter."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som bola bezohľadná bojovníčka."

from: The woman said "Through meditation, I learned how to deal with anger."
to: Žena povedala: "Vďaka meditácii som sa naučila, ako sa vyrovnať s hnevom."

from: The woman said "I had to push my neighbours car out of the driveway."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som vytlačiť susedovo auto z príjazdovej cesty."

from: The woman said "I tried to wash the dishes, but my partner didn't let me."
to: Žena povedala: "Snažila som sa umyť riad, ale môj partner mi to nedovolil."

from: The woman said "I like to talk openly with employees, I don’t have time to waste."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada sa so zamestnancami rozprávam otvorene, nemám času nazvyš."

from: The woman said "I know I shouldn't based decisions on my emotions, but it's hard for me."
to: Žena povedala: "Viem, že by som sa nemala rozhodovať na základe emócií, ale je to pre mňa ťažké."

from: The woman said "Am I the only one who keeps looking around on my walk through the woods to see if anyone is following me?"
to: Žena povedala: "Som jediná, kto sa na prechádzke lesom neustále obzerá, či ma niekto nesleduje?"

from: The woman said "You provoked me by the way you were dressed."
to: Žena povedala: "Vyprovokoval si ma tým, ako si bol oblečený."

from: The woman said "I fought for that promotion so I could take you abroad."
to: Žena povedala: "Bojovala som za to povýšenie, aby som vás mohla vziať do zahraničia."

from: The woman said "I woke up with huge circles under my eyes and that day I didn't go out."
to: Žena povedala: "Zobudila som sa s obrovskými kruhmi pod očami a v ten deň som nešla von."

from: The woman said "I failed the endurance competition."
to: Žena povedala: "Zlyhala som vo vytrvalostnej súťaži."

from: The woman said "I never believed in any higher power."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som neverila v žiadnu vyššiu moc."

from: The woman said "I am convinced that intuition never lies."
to: Žena povedala: "Som presvedčená, že intuícia nikdy neklame."

from: The woman said "I even took some work call during my holidays."
to: Žena povedala: "Počas dovolenky som dokonca prijala niekoľko pracovných telefonátov."

from: The woman said "I have studied Japanese customs because I have dealings with the Japanese ambassador."
to: Žena povedala: "Naštudovala som si japonské zvyky, pretože som rokovala s japonským veľvyslancom."

from: The woman said "I adopted an animal at the zoo for a year, contributing to the funds for its care."
to: Žena povedala: "Na rok som si adoptovala zviera v zoologickej záhrade a prispela som na jeho starostlivosť."

from: The woman said "I knew since childhood that I should be kind and gentle."
to: Žena povedala: "Od detstva som vedela, že mám byť milá a láskavá."

from: The woman said "Confidence comes naturally to me, I never feel that I can't achieve something."
to: Žena povedala: "Sebavedomie je pre mňa prirodzené, nikdy nemám pocit, že niečo nedokážem."

from: The woman said "I like it when my parents appreciate how nicely I cleaned my room."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada, keď rodičia ocenia, ako pekne som si upratala izbu."

from: The woman said "Is it okay that I peeked into my partner’s phone?"
to: Žena povedala: "Je v poriadku, že som sa pozrela do telefónu svojho partnera?"

from: The woman said "I signed up to volunteer at the fashion show."
to: Žena povedala: "Prihlásila som sa ako dobrovoľníčka na módnu prehliadku."

from: The woman said "I know I shouldn't cry when someone makes me angry."
to: Žena povedala: "Viem, že by som nemala plakať, keď ma niekto nahnevá."

from: The woman said "I have always seen challenges as an opportunity for personal growth."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som vnímala výzvy ako príležitosť na osobný rast."

from: The woman said "I am employed, but in my spare time I work in a nursing home."
to: Žena povedala: "Som zamestnaná, ale vo voľnom čase pracujem v domove dôchodcov."

from: The woman said "I could not finish the hike."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som túru dokončiť."

from: The woman said "Thanks to volunteering I met a lot of great people."
to: Žena povedala: "Vďaka dobrovoľníctvu som spoznala veľa skvelých ľudí."

from: The woman said "I consistently washed and changed my bedsheets."
to: Žena povedala: "Dôsledne som si prala a menila prestieradlá."

from: The woman said "Ever since I was a kid, I liked to dress nicely."
to: Žena povedala: "Odmalička som sa rada pekne obliekala."

from: The woman said "I learned critical thinking at university."
to: Žena povedala: "Kritickému mysleniu som sa naučila na univerzite."

from: The woman said "I know what I look like, so I've never been afraid to approach someone I like."
to: Žena povedala: "Viem, ako vyzerám, takže som sa nikdy nebála osloviť niekoho, kto sa mi páči."

from: The woman said "I engaged in an intense sword fight, my physical strength and skill combining to create a mesmerizing display of power."
to: Žena povedala: "Zapojila som sa do intenzívneho boja s mečom, pričom moja fyzická sila a zručnosť sa spojili do fascinujúcej ukážky sily."

from: The woman said "I helped cleaning up the whole forest path from garbage."
to: Žena povedala: "Pomáhala som čistiť celú lesnú cestu od odpadkov."

from: The woman said "I couldn’t handle it mentally and had to seek a professional help."
to: Žena povedala: "Psychicky som to nezvládla a musela som vyhľadať odbornú pomoc."

from: The woman said "After sex, I always fell asleep immediately even though my partner wants to talk with me."
to: Žena povedala: "Po sexe som vždy okamžite zaspala, aj keď sa so mnou partner chcel rozprávať."

from: The woman said "I do not like gossips, it is rarely based on the truth."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemám rada klebety, málokedy sa zakladajú na pravde."

from: The woman said "I would always return home late at night because I worked two jobs to provide for my family."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som sa vracala domov neskoro večer, pretože som mala dve zamestnania, aby som uživila rodinu."

from: The woman said "I did not need your help."
to: Žena povedala: "Nepotrebovala som vašu pomoc."

from: The woman said "I am disgusted by how some people walk around this dirty."
to: Žena povedala: "Som znechutená z toho, ako niektorí ľudia chodia špinaví."

from: The woman said "I tried to move the furniture myself, but in the end, I had to call a moving company."
to: Žena povedala: "Snažila som sa presťahovať nábytok sama, ale nakoniec som musela zavolať sťahovaciu firmu."

from: The woman said "Cleaning is something I'm best in."
to: Žena povedala: "Upratovanie je niečo, v čom som najlepšia."

from: The woman said "In my company, I try to be an objective and less emotional boss."
to: Žena povedala: "V mojej spoločnosti sa snažím byť objektívnou a menej emocionálnou šéfkou."

from: The woman said "I've incorporated two-phase workouts into my schedule."
to: Žena povedala: "Do svojho rozvrhu som zaradila dvojfázové cvičenie."

from: The woman said "I just had to keep going no matter how hard the situation was."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som ísť ďalej bez ohľadu na to, aká ťažká bola situácia."

from: The woman said "I called in sick for work so I could play the new videogame."
to: Žena povedala: "Zavolala som do práce, aby som si mohla zahrať novú videohru."

from: The woman said "It's a logical decision, but I decided otherwise."
to: Žena povedala: "Je to logické rozhodnutie, ale ja som sa rozhodla inak."

from: The woman said "I was feeling down and could not work."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítila som sa skleslo a nemohla som pracovať."

from: The woman said "As a supervisor, I provided constructive feedback and guidance to my team members."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako nadriadená som členom svojho tímu poskytovala konštruktívnu spätnú väzbu a usmernenie."

from: The woman said "I used deduction to arrive at a correct conclusion."
to: Žena povedala: "Použila som dedukciu, aby som dospela k správnemu záveru."

from: The woman said "I can see that you are qualified, but wouldn't you want children in the near future?"
to: Žena povedala: "Vidím, že ste kvalifikovaný, ale nechcete mať v blízkej budúcnosti deti?"

from: The woman said "I stayed up until 3am watching my favourite streamer."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som hore do 3 hodín ráno a sledovala som svojho obľúbeného streamera."

from: The woman said "I have always wanted a family that I'd take care of."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som chcela mať rodinu, o ktorú by som sa starala."

from: The woman said "I made a team of experts, and we worked together and made the project successful."
to: Žena povedala: "Vytvorila som tím odborníkov, spolupracovali sme a projekt sa podarilo zrealizovať."

from: The woman said "I was sure that I would win the match and I was right, they were no rivals for me."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som si istá, že zápas vyhrám, a mala som pravdu, neboli pre mňa súpermi."

from: The woman said "I was always thinking about sex."
to: Žena povedala: "Stále som myslela na sex."

from: The woman said "I offered them a workshop on critical thinking."
to: Žena povedala: "Ponúkla som im seminár o kritickom myslení."

from: The woman said "If I don't clean my ears after a shower, I'm uncomfortable."
to: Žena povedala: "Ak si po sprche nevyčistím uši, je mi to nepríjemné."

from: The woman said "If I don't get enough sleep, I am moody and exhausted."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď sa nevyspím, som náladová a vyčerpaná."

from: The woman said "I designed the entire machine."
to: Žena povedala: "Celý stroj som navrhla ja."

from: The woman said "I didn’t want them to feel bad, so I was quiet."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechcela som, aby sa cítili zle, tak som bola ticho."

from: The woman said "I studied business management so I could lead my fathers company when he retires."
to: Žena povedala: "Študovala som obchodný manažment, aby som mohla viesť otcovu spoločnosť, keď odíde do dôchodku."

from: The woman said "I didn't want to wait with sex until marriage."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechcela som čakať so sexom až do manželstva."

from: The woman said "I hated their floors, so I helped with the clean-up."
to: Žena povedala: "Nenávidela som ich podlahy, tak som pomáhala s upratovaním."

from: The woman said "I won the caber toss competition in Scotland."
to: Žena povedala: "Vyhrala som súťaž v hádzaní kaberou v Škótsku."

from: The woman said "I never have problem telling anybody anything straight to face."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy nemám problém povedať niekomu niečo priamo do očí."

from: The woman said "I got offended because I didn't get the present I had wanted."
to: Žena povedala: "Urazila som sa, pretože som nedostala darček, ktorý som chcela."

from: The woman said "I have always been very social, I love getting to know new people."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som bola veľmi spoločenská, rada spoznávam nových ľudí."

from: The woman said "I am competent at leading the company."
to: Žena povedala: "Som schopná viesť spoločnosť."

from: The woman said "When we broke up, I immediately bought a plane ticket and left the country."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď sme sa rozišli, okamžite som si kúpila letenku a opustila krajinu."

from: The woman said "We're going to play a knowledge game, you shouldn't be playing."
to: Žena povedala: "Ideme hrať vedomostnú hru, vy by ste nemali hrať."

from: The woman said "I am communicative."
to: Žena povedala: "Som komunikatívna."

from: The woman said "I exaggerated my stories."
to: Žena povedala: "Preháňala som svoje príbehy."

from: The woman said "I hosted a charity fundraiser."
to: Žena povedala: "Usporiadala som charitatívnu zbierku."

from: The woman said "I had to be the centre of attention."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som byť stredobodom pozornosti."

from: The woman said "When I came there, I felt all eyes on me."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som tam prišla, cítila som, že sa na mňa všetci pozerajú."

from: The woman said "I needed some firewood as I was alone but I felt tired after cutting a few pieces."
to: Žena povedala: "Potrebovala som drevo, lebo som bola sama, ale po narezaní niekoľkých kusov som sa cítila unavená."

from: The woman said "I maintained a composed demeanor, radiating a sense of assurance."
to: Žena povedala: "Zachovávala som pokojné správanie a vyžarovala som pocit istoty."

from: The woman said "I feel happy when I can buy you a gift."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítim sa šťastná, keď ti môžem kúpiť darček."

from: The woman said "I diminished my own worth and failing to acknowledge my accomplishments."
to: Žena povedala: "Znížila som svoju vlastnú hodnotu a nedokázala som uznať svoje úspechy."

from: The woman said "I stayed in the forest for 4 nights with no problems at all."
to: Žena povedala: "V lese som strávila 4 noci bez akýchkoľvek problémov."

from: The woman said "I lashed out at my partner during an argument, saying hurtful things I didn't truly mean."
to: Žena povedala: "Počas hádky som sa na svojho partnera vrhla a povedala som mu veci, ktoré som nemyslela vážne."

from: The woman said "I comforted them, although I was sad myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Utešila som ich, hoci som bola sama smutná."

from: The woman said "When my friends came, I was like a kid again."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď prišli moji priatelia, bola som opäť ako dieťa."

from: The woman said "I have learned from my mistakes, so I will not repeat them."
to: Žena povedala: "Poučila som sa zo svojich chýb, preto ich už nebudem opakovať."

from: The woman said "I’m sure I’ll get the job."
to: Žena povedala: "Som si istá, že tú prácu dostanem."

from: The woman said "I did not mind that the supervisor took all the credit for my work."
to: Žena povedala: "Nevadilo mi, že si nadriadený pripísal všetky zásluhy za moju prácu."

from: The woman said "I quit my job and opened a bakery although I haven't worked in any."
to: Žena povedala: "Dala som výpoveď a otvorila som si pekáreň, hoci som v žiadnej nepracovala."

from: The woman said "I bought a lot of things that I did not need because it made me feel good for a short while."
to: Žena povedala: "Kúpila som si veľa vecí, ktoré som nepotrebovala, pretože som sa vďaka tomu na chvíľu cítila dobre."

from: The woman said "I entered the room and confidently made eye contact with the boss."
to: Žena povedala: "Vstúpila som do miestnosti a sebavedomo som nadviazala očný kontakt so šéfom."

from: The woman said "I allowed others to interrupt or talk over me during conversations."
to: Žena povedala: "Dovolila som ostatným, aby ma počas rozhovoru prerušovali alebo hovorili cezo mňa."

from: The woman said "As a civil engineer, I designed and oversaw the construction of infrastructure projects."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako stavebná inžinierka som navrhovala a dohliadala na výstavbu projektov infraštruktúry."

from: The woman said "I would feel like a failure if I was unable to provide for the family."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítila by som sa ako zlyhanie, keby som nebola schopná zabezpečiť rodinu."

from: The woman said "I panicked when the lights went off."
to: Žena povedala: "Spanikárila som, keď zhasli svetlá."

from: The woman said "I got horny so easily."
to: Žena povedala: "Tak ľahko som sa vzrušila."

from: The woman said "I conducted a thorough risk assessment before doing it."
to: Žena povedala: "Predtým, ako som to urobila, som dôkladne posúdila riziká."

from: The woman said "Safety precautions are for losers, I never followed them."
to: Žena povedala: "Bezpečnostné opatrenia sú pre chudákov, nikdy som ich nedodržiavala."

from: The woman said "They told me to keep my voice down, so I got offended and didn’t speak at all."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedali mi, aby som bola ticho, tak som sa urazila a vôbec som nehovorila."

from: The woman said "The bag is too heavy for me, because I'm weak."
to: Žena povedala: "Taška je pre mňa príliš ťažká, pretože som slabá."

from: The woman said "When I'm with my friends I like to talk about practical things like planning a trip or buying a new car."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som s priateľmi, rada sa rozprávam o praktických veciach, ako je plánovanie výletu alebo kúpa nového auta."

from: The woman said "I faced a challenging task that required mental strength, but I succumbed to self-doubt and felt weak in my ability to overcome it."
to: Žena povedala: "Stála som pred náročnou úlohou, ktorá si vyžadovala duševnú silu, ale podľahla som pochybnostiam o sebe a cítila som sa slabá v tom, že ju dokážem prekonať."

from: The woman said "When they saw me in this new outfit, they said I had never looked better."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď ma videli v tomto novom oblečení, povedali, že som nikdy nevyzerala lepšie."

from: The woman said "I knew what to do to get those sponsors."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, čo mám robiť, aby som získala týchto sponzorov."

from: The woman said "I was supporting my children in everything they did."
to: Žena povedala: "Podporovala som svoje deti vo všetkom, čo robili."

from: The woman said "I got a bit scared when I realised I am totally on my own."
to: Žena povedala: "Trochu som sa zľakla, keď som si uvedomila, že som úplne sama."

from: The woman said "I prayed that the maths test will be easy."
to: Žena povedala: "Modlila som sa, aby bol test z matematiky ľahký."

from: The woman said "I farted and laughed at it."
to: Žena povedala: "Prdla som si a smiala som sa na tom."

from: The woman said "I exuded a sense of certainty."
to: Žena povedala: "Vyžaroval zo mňa pocit istoty."

from: The woman said "I have an older neighbour with whom I agreed that we would go for a walk together at least once a week."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám staršiu susedu, s ktorou som sa dohodla, že aspoň raz týždenne pôjdeme spolu na prechádzku."

from: The woman said "I knew I had the skills and resilience to overcome obstacles."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, že mám schopnosti a odolnosť, aby som prekonala prekážky."

from: The woman said "I got so drunk last night that I totally forgot about todays meeting."
to: Žena povedala: "Včera večer som sa tak opila, že som úplne zabudla na dnešné stretnutie."

from: The woman said "I am a respected professional in my field."
to: Žena povedala: "Som uznávaná odborníčka vo svojom odbore."

from: The woman said "I was afraid they had been hurt."
to: Žena povedala: "Bála som sa, že sa im niečo stalo."

from: The woman said "I volunteered to sweep the hallway because someone can't do it as meticulously as I can."
