to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som pozerať televíziu, ale mala som povinnosti."

from: The woman said "I'm a manager and I would never go to work in shorts."
to: Žena povedala: "Som manažérka a nikdy by som nešla do práce v šortkách."

from: The woman said "I fell in love even though I knew it was the worst moment."
to: Žena povedala: "Zamilovala som sa, aj keď som vedela, že je to tá najhoršia chvíľa."

from: The woman said "As the waves crashed against the rocks, I paddled out on my surfboard, fearless and determined."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď sa vlny rozbíjali o skaly, nebojácne a odhodlane som vyplávala na svojom surfe."

from: The woman said "I would gladly make out with the one over there!"
to: Žena povedala: "Ja by som sa s radosťou bozkávala s tým tamtým!"

from: The woman said "I like making some extra money on the side when possible."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada si privyrábam, keď je to možné."

from: The woman said "I didn't mind my clothes until other people started telling me that I should be wearing something less provoking."
to: Žena povedala: "Moje oblečenie mi nevadilo, kým mi iní ľudia nezačali hovoriť, že by som mala mať na sebe niečo menej provokatívne."

from: The woman said "I'm rational when solving any problem."
to: Žena povedala: "Pri riešení akéhokoľvek problému som racionálna."

from: The woman said "I volunteered at a local charity event to get to know other people."
to: Žena povedala: "Pracovala som ako dobrovoľníčka na miestnej charitatívnej akcii, aby som spoznala iných ľudí."

from: The woman said "I like to dress professionally for work because I feel more confident."
to: Žena povedala: "Do práce sa rada obliekam profesionálne, pretože sa cítim sebavedomejšie."

from: The woman said "I signed up for the class even though I had no prior experience."
to: Žena povedala: "Zapísala som sa na kurz, hoci som nemala žiadne predchádzajúce skúsenosti."

from: The woman said "I like family gatherings where we are all together."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada rodinné stretnutia, kde sme všetci spolu."

from: The woman said "I became accustomed to receiving compliments about my good looks, which boosted my self-esteem and confidence."
to: Žena povedala: "Zvykla som si dostávať komplimenty na svoj dobrý vzhľad, čo mi zvýšilo sebavedomie a sebadôveru."

from: The woman said "I always wanted a more powerful car."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som chcela silnejšie auto."

from: The woman said "I bought LEGO even though I’m an adult."
to: Žena povedala: "Kúpila som si LEGO, aj keď som dospelá."

from: The woman said "I hated the new workout programme, it was too easy for me."
to: Žena povedala: "Neznášala som nový tréningový program, bol pre mňa príliš jednoduchý."

from: The woman said "I improved my personal best in deadlift."
to: Žena povedala: "Zlepšila som si svoj osobný rekord v mŕtvom ťahu."

from: The woman said "I saw a movie where dog dies and I cried all week."
to: Žena povedala: "Videla som film, kde zomrel pes, a celý týždeň som plakala."

from: The woman said "I led by example, demonstrating integrity and accountability in every action I took."
to: Žena povedala: "Išla som príkladom, preukazovala som bezúhonnosť a zodpovednosť v každom svojom konaní."

from: The woman said "I'm a very polite person."
to: Žena povedala: "Som veľmi zdvorilý človek."

from: The woman said "I wanted to call my friend."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som zavolať priateľovi."

from: The woman said "I knew I could make a team and lead everyone."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, že môžem vytvoriť tím a viesť všetkých."

from: The woman said "My high sex drive often created unrealistic expectations so I was unable to maintain a healthy relationship."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj vysoký sexuálny apetít často vytváral nerealistické očakávania, takže som nebola schopná udržať si zdravý vzťah."

from: The woman said "I always paid my interns."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som platila svojim stážistom."

from: The woman said "I wore the new clothes to the party."
to: Žena povedala: "Na večierok som si vzala nové šaty."

from: The woman said "I've been told that I'm beautiful, because of my appearance and kind demeanor."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedali mi, že som krásna vďaka svojmu vzhľadu a milému správaniu."

from: The woman said "I projected an aura of certainty and belief in my research findings."
to: Žena povedala, že "som vyžarovala auru istoty a viery v moje výskumné zistenia".

from: The woman said "I prepared the boxes, but waited for the driver to help me load them."
to: Žena povedala: "Pripravila som škatule, ale čakala som, kým mi ich vodič pomôže naložiť."

from: The woman said "I can't imagine having to go to public toilets."
to: Žena povedala: "Neviem si predstaviť, že by som musela chodiť na verejné toalety."

from: The woman said "The fact that you are qualified doesn't mean you can get that job."
to: Žena povedala: "To, že máte kvalifikáciu, ešte neznamená, že tú prácu môžete dostať."

from: The woman said "I presented myself perfectly."
to: Žena povedala: "Predstavila som sa perfektne."

from: The woman said "I worked with criminals."
to: Žena povedala: "Pracovala som so zločincami."

from: The woman said "I always felt it was my responsibility to wash the clothes every week."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som mala pocit, že je mojou povinnosťou prať oblečenie každý týždeň."

from: The woman said "I baked the cake for their birthday."
to: Žena povedala: "Piekla som tortu na ich narodeniny."

from: The woman said "I did not wear a seatbelt."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemala som zapnutý bezpečnostný pás."

from: The woman said "I wanted to go swimming, but I didn’t have time to shave my legs."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som si zaplávať, ale nemala som čas oholiť si nohy."

from: The woman said "I could do it better."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela by som to urobiť lepšie."

from: The woman said "I worked overtime so that we could go to a nice holidays."
to: Žena povedala: "Pracovala som nadčas, aby sme mohli ísť na peknú dovolenku."

from: The woman said "I was assaulted last night and had to testify to the police."
to: Žena povedala: "Včera v noci ma napadli a musela som svedčiť na polícii."

from: The woman said "What type of shirts should I wear?"
to: Žena sa opýtala: "Aké tričká si mám obliecť?"

from: The woman said "I was not very good at math when I was at the high school."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som bola na strednej škole, nebola som veľmi dobrá v matematike."

from: The woman said "I managed the company even during hard times and recession."
to: Žena povedala: "Riadila som spoločnosť aj počas ťažkých časov a recesie."

from: The woman said "It made me happy to talk to someone."
to: Žena povedala: "Potešilo ma, že som sa mohla s niekým porozprávať."

from: The woman said "I was always in charge of the matter of money."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som mala na starosti peniaze."

from: The woman said "I stayed composed even though the customer started screaming at me."
to: Žena povedala: "Zostala som pokojná, aj keď na mňa zákazník začal kričať."

from: The woman said "I don't like being serious - I like fun."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemám rada vážnosť - mám rada zábavu."

from: The woman said "I have never asked anyone for help."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nikoho neprosila o pomoc."

from: The woman said "I could not defend myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som sa brániť."

from: The woman said "Why do I always give in to everyone and let them always have their way?"
to: Žena povedala: "Prečo vždy každému ustupujem a nechávam ho, aby si vždy počínal podľa svojho?"

from: The woman said "I came late from work yesterday, there was so much to do."
to: Žena povedala: "Včera som prišla neskoro z práce, bolo toho veľa."

from: The woman said "I knew that if I made a mistake, the entired team would be fired."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, že ak urobím chybu, tím bude prepustený."

from: The woman said "I made a lot of money last year."
to: Žena povedala: "Minulý rok som zarobila veľa peňazí."

from: The woman said "I get up at four o’clock so I can work out before work."
to: Žena povedala: "Vstávam o štvrtej, aby som si mohla pred prácou zacvičiť."

from: The woman said "I was taking my professional responsibilities seriously."
to: Žena povedala: "Brala som svoje pracovné povinnosti vážne."

from: The woman said "I wanted to make more money so I took riskier job."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som zarobiť viac peňazí, tak som prijala riskantnejšiu prácu."

from: The woman said "I always thought that worrying is a waste of time."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som si myslela, že starosti sú stratou času."

from: The woman said "I was invited to give a lecture."
to: Žena povedala: "Pozvali ma na prednášku."

from: The woman said "I was having hard time expressing my emotions."
to: Žena povedala: "Ťažko som vyjadrovala svoje emócie."

from: The woman said "When my first wrinkle appeared I totally panicked."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď sa mi objavila prvá vráska, úplne som spanikárila."

from: The woman said "I offered compassion in their time of sorrow."
to: Žena povedala: "Ponúkla som im súcit v čase ich smútku."

from: The woman said "Why should I not try it?"
to: Žena povedala: "Prečo by som to nemala skúsiť?"

from: The woman said "I like stupid ideas."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada hlúpe nápady."

from: The woman said "I got emotional when I was watching the last romantic movie with Adam Sandler."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som pozerala posledný romantický film s Adamom Sandlerom, prepadli ma emócie."

from: The woman said "I would never sell myself short, I respect myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som sa nepredala, vážim si seba."

from: The woman said "I had so many sexual desires in my head, that it was hard for me to keep myself from doing anything."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som v hlave toľko sexuálnych túžob, že bolo pre mňa ťažké udržať sa, aby som nič nerobila."

from: The woman said "I have always trusted my own intellectual skills, they never fail me."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som verila svojim intelektuálnym schopnostiam, tie ma nikdy nesklamali."

from: The woman said "They said that I'm good at cleaning and it made me so happy."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedali, že som dobrá v upratovaní, a to ma veľmi potešilo."

from: The woman said "I’m shy and can’t keep eye contact."
to: Žena povedala: "Som plachá a nedokážem udržať očný kontakt."

from: The woman said "I reached out to a friend who was going through a breakup."
to: Žena povedala: "Oslovila som kamarátku, ktorá prežívala rozchod."

from: The woman said "I researched different travel insurance options and compared their coverage and prices ."
to: Žena povedala: "Preskúmala som rôzne možnosti cestovného poistenia a porovnala ich krytie a ceny."

from: The woman said "I always liked activities connected with art, such as dancing, painting, and acting."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som mala rada aktivity spojené s umením, ako napríklad tanec, maľovanie a herectvo."

from: The woman said "I bathed in the fountain naked."
to: Žena povedala: "Kúpala som sa vo fontáne nahá."

from: The woman said "I led the 30 under 30 Forbes class of last year."
to: Žena povedala: "Viedla som minuloročnú triedu 30 pod 30 Forbes."

from: The woman said "I still tried to help even though they did not reach out for years."
to: Žena povedala: "Stále som sa snažila pomôcť, aj keď sa mi roky neozývali."

from: The woman said "I could handle it myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Zvládnem to sama."

from: The woman said "My friend never wants to grow up."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj priateľ nikdy nechce dospieť."

from: The woman said "My high sex drive led to late-night activities so I was always tired at work."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj vysoký sexuálny apetít viedol k nočným aktivitám, takže som bola v práci vždy unavená."

from: The woman said "I always knew I didn't want to stay too long in one place."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som vedela, že nechcem zostať príliš dlho na jednom mieste."

from: The woman said "I was not strong enough to lift my friend off the ground."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemala som dosť síl, aby som zdvihla svojho priateľa zo zeme."

from: The woman said "I had to care about what happens with the children."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som sa starať o to, čo sa stane s deťmi."

from: The woman said "I didn't need anyone's help to achieve my dreams, I did all by myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Na dosiahnutie svojich snov som nepotrebovala nikoho pomoc, všetko som dokázala sama."

from: The woman said "I'm coming with you because it's dangerous to go outside alone."
to: Žena povedala: "Idem s vami, pretože je nebezpečné ísť von sama."

from: The woman said "I put on a hard hat and worked tirelessly to build structures that would withstand the test of time."
to: Žena povedala: "Nasadila som si tvrdý klobúk a neúnavne som pracovala na stavbe konštrukcií, ktoré by odolali skúške času."

from: The woman said "I did what any captain would have done."
to: Žena povedala: "Urobila som to, čo by urobil každý kapitán."

from: The woman said "When dealing with family problems, I'm the problem-solver."
to: Žena povedala: "Pri riešení rodinných problémov som ja tá, ktorá rieši problémy."

from: The woman said "As a manager, I resolved workplace conflicts to foster a positive and productive work environment."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako manažérka som riešila konflikty na pracovisku, aby som podporila pozitívne a produktívne pracovné prostredie."

from: The woman said "I got the job because I am able to think critically."
to: Žena povedala: "Túto prácu som dostala, pretože som schopná kriticky myslieť."

from: The woman said "I couldn't even lift my child."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som ani zdvihnúť svoje dieťa."

from: The woman said "I like the smell of new furniture."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada vôňu nového nábytku."

from: The woman said "I believed in myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Verila som si."

from: The woman said "I like talking with my friends on the phone."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada telefonujem so svojimi priateľmi."

from: The woman said "I would hurt them if they hurt you."
to: Žena povedala: "Ublížila by som im, keby ublížili vám."

from: The woman said "I have always based my decisions on facts."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som sa rozhodovala na základe faktov."

from: The woman said "Many people get annoyed when a stranger texts them, but I'm extremely grateful for that."
to: Žena povedala: "Mnohí ľudia sa rozčuľujú, keď im niekto cudzí napíše, ale ja som za to nesmierne vďačná."

from: The woman said "I was at a party and overslept for work."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som na večierku a zaspala som do práce."

from: The woman said "As a lawyer, I demonstrated professionalism and integrity while representing clients in complex legal matters."
to: Žena uviedla: "Ako právnička som preukázala profesionalitu a bezúhonnosť pri zastupovaní klientov v zložitých právnych záležitostiach."

from: The woman said "We were visiting my sister in the delivery room and when I saw her son for the first time, I burst into tears."
to: Žena povedala: "Boli sme navštíviť moju sestru na pôrodnej sále a keď som prvýkrát uvidela jej syna, rozplakala som sa."

from: The woman said "I like it when I see in someone how they desire me."
to: Žena povedala: "Páči sa mi, keď na niekom vidím, ako po mne túži."

from: The woman said "My high sex drive sometimes caused tension within relationships."
to: Žena povedala: "Moja vysoká sexuálna túžba niekedy spôsobovala napätie vo vzťahoch."

from: The woman said "I'm ready to take responsibility and make tough decisions."
to: Žena povedala: "Som pripravená prevziať zodpovednosť a robiť ťažké rozhodnutia."

from: The woman said "I would never underestimate my power."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som nepodceňovala svoju moc."

from: The woman said "I worked at a construction site."
to: Žena povedala: "Pracovala som na stavbe."

from: The woman said "I was abroad because they offered me a better salary."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som v zahraničí, pretože mi ponúkli lepší plat."

from: The woman said "I did my job quickly and left for the next one."
to: Žena povedala: "Rýchlo som urobila svoju prácu a odišla som na ďalšiu."

from: The woman said "I had two idols, Bill Gates and Steve Jobs."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som dva idoly, Billa Gatesa a Steva Jobsa."

from: The woman said "I'm good at dividing tasks and making sure everybody is doing what they should."
to: Žena povedala: "Som dobrá v rozdeľovaní úloh a v tom, aby každý robil to, čo má."

from: The woman said "I was always the first one and the last one in the company."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som bola prvá a posledná v spoločnosti."

from: The woman said "Did you always talk this much?"
to: Žena sa spýtala: "Vždy ste toľko hovorili?"

from: The woman said "I could feel it was going to happen."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítila som, že sa to stane."

from: The woman said "I am proud that I am the head of this family."
to: Žena povedala: "Som hrdá na to, že som hlavou tejto rodiny."

from: The woman said "I did not have enough endurance to finish the hike and had to stay at a chalet."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemala som dosť vytrvalosti, aby som túru dokončila, a musela som zostať na chate."

from: The woman said "I went there and immediately made new friends."
to: Žena povedala: "Išla som tam a hneď som si našla nových priateľov."

from: The woman said "I don’t like going to restaurants because I don’t know how they wash the dishes."
to: Žena povedala: "Nerada chodím do reštaurácií, pretože neviem, ako umývajú riad."

from: The woman said "I like to lead people."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada vediem ľudí."

from: The woman said "I knew it made my hair look really good."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, že moje vlasy vyzerajú naozaj dobre."

from: The woman said "When I'm hosting a party, I like to have balloons everywhere."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď organizujem večierok, rada mám všade balóny."

from: The woman said "I displayed an immature lack of commitment."
to: Žena povedala: "Prejavila som nezrelý nedostatok odhodlania."

from: The woman said "I was extremely proud when I was promoted."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som nesmierne hrdá, keď ma povýšili."

from: The woman said "It was difficult for me to say no when someone asked me to do something."
to: Žena povedala: "Bolo pre mňa ťažké povedať nie, keď ma niekto o niečo požiadal."

from: The woman said "I never cared about dirty dishes."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som sa nestarala o špinavý riad."

from: The woman said "When I'm alone for too long I start to feel sad."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som dlho sama, začínam byť smutná."

from: The woman said "I refused to take out the trash."
to: Žena povedala: "Odmietla som vyniesť odpadky."

from: The woman said "I felt an overwhelming sense of self-assurance, knowing that I could conquer any challenge that came my way."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítila som ohromnú sebadôveru a vedela som, že dokážem zdolať každú výzvu, ktorá sa mi postaví do cesty."

from: The woman said "I got lost in the forest and survived there for two weeks."
to: Žena povedala: "Stratila som sa v lese a prežila som tam dva týždne."

from: The woman said "I did not even need a calculator."
to: Žena povedala: "Ani som nepotrebovala kalkulačku."

from: The woman said "I took the risk."
to: Žena povedala: "Riskovala som."

from: The woman said "I wouldn't want to be in a relationship, I like this freedom I have."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechcela by som byť vo vzťahu, mám rada túto slobodu, ktorú mám."

from: The woman said "I like to push my boundaries."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada posúvam svoje hranice."

from: The woman said "I felt under pressure when we were expecting a baby because I wasn't sure we had enough money."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď sme čakali dieťa, cítila som sa pod tlakom, pretože som si nebola istá, či máme dosť peňazí."

from: The woman said "I never expressed my opinions because I felt nobody would listen to me."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nevyjadrila svoj názor, pretože som mala pocit, že ma nikto nebude počúvať."

from: The woman said "I decided to introduce new rules in the hospital."
to: Žena povedala: "Rozhodla som sa zaviesť v nemocnici nové pravidlá."

from: The woman said "When the bulglar came, I knocked him out."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď prišiel lupič, omráčila som ho."

from: The woman said "I flexed my muscles a lot at the beach."
to: Žena povedala: "Na pláži som veľa napínala svaly."

from: The woman said "I wore the same pair of socks for every important exam, convinced that it would bring me good luck."
to: Žena povedala: "Na každú dôležitú skúšku som si obliekala ten istý pár ponožiek, pretože som bola presvedčená, že mi prinesú šťastie."

from: The woman said "I was very graceful because I danced a lot to stay in shape."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som veľmi pôvabná, pretože som veľa tancovala, aby som sa udržala vo forme."

from: The woman said "Sorry I'm late, I didn't know what to wear."
to: Žena povedala: "Prepáčte, že idem neskoro, nevedela som, čo si mám obliecť."

from: The woman said "I had to listen."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som počúvať."

from: The woman said "I made my mom a memory book for her birthday."
to: Žena povedala: "Urobila som svojej mame k narodeninám knihu spomienok."

from: The woman said "I needed help with moving, so I called a moving company."
to: Žena povedala: "Potrebovala som pomôcť so sťahovaním, tak som zavolala sťahovaciu spoločnosť."

from: The woman said "I have always taken good care of my partner, I cooked and washed the clothes."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som sa o svojho partnera dobre starala, varila som a prala som mu oblečenie."

from: The woman said "People often tell me I'm too chatty."
to: Žena povedala: "Ľudia mi často hovoria, že som príliš zhovorčivá."

from: The woman said "I was thinking about what was going on in their heads, they were acting strange all day."
to: Žena povedala: "Premýšľala som o tom, čo sa im odohráva v hlavách, celý deň sa správali čudne."

from: The woman said "I survived a tiger attack."
to: Žena povedala: "Prežila som útok tigra."

from: The woman said "Even though you didn't show it, I knew you were hurt."
to: Žena povedala: "Aj keď si to nedal najavo, vedela som, že si zranený."

from: The woman said "I ran for the mayor of the town."
to: Žena povedala: "Kandidovala som na starostku mesta."

from: The woman said "I gave the dog a bath."
to: Žena povedala: "Vykúpala som psa."

from: The woman said "Why would I pay for an electrician if I can easily fix this myself?"
to: Žena povedala: "Prečo by som mala platiť za elektrikára, keď to môžem ľahko opraviť sama?"

from: The woman said "I changed my holiday date because my parents needed a petsitter."
to: Žena povedala: "Zmenila som dátum dovolenky, pretože moji rodičia potrebovali opatrovateľku."

from: The woman said "I couldn't rest until everything was done at home."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som si oddýchnuť, kým nebolo doma všetko hotové."

from: The woman said "People tend to follow my lead, I have been a natural born leader since I was a kid."
to: Žena povedala: "Ľudia majú tendenciu nasledovať moje vedenie, od detstva som rodená vodkyňa."

from: The woman said "I don’t want my partner to work."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechcem, aby môj partner pracoval."

from: The woman said "I was sure I would score high on that test."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som si istá, že v tom teste dosiahnem vysoké skóre."

from: The woman said "When they asked to borrow my things, I didn't refuse."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď ma požiadali o požičanie mojich vecí, neodmietla som."

from: The woman said "I'm always a winner in any race or competition."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som víťazkou v akýchkoľvek pretekoch alebo súťaži."

from: The woman said "I like casual sex, no strings attached."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada príležitostný sex, bez záväzkov."

from: The woman said "I delivered my lines flawlessly as always."
to: Žena povedala: "Svoje repliky som predniesla bezchybne ako vždy."

from: The woman said "I will do my best to create the best possible working conditions for my team."
to: Žena povedala: "Urobím všetko pre to, aby som vytvorila čo najlepšie pracovné podmienky pre svoj tím."

from: The woman said "I take pride in my ability to support my family financially."
to: Žena povedala: "Som hrdá na to, že môžem finančne podporovať svoju rodinu."

from: The woman said "Even after explaining it to me many times, I still did not understand."
to: Žena povedala: "Aj keď mi to vysvetlili mnohokrát, stále som to nepochopila."

from: The woman said "I had a lot of clients because I acted like a professional."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som veľa klientov, pretože som sa správala ako profesionálka."

from: The woman said "I signed up to be a mentor."
to: Žena povedala: "Zapísala som sa ako mentorka."

from: The woman said "I was always the popular one in school."
to: Žena povedala: "V škole som bola vždy obľúbená."

from: The woman said "I felt disgusted when I saw her with greasy hair."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som ju videla s mastnými vlasmi, cítila som sa znechutená."

from: The woman said "I dreamed I got into a car crash, so I rather took the bus today."
to: Žena povedala: "Zdalo sa mi, že som mala autonehodu, tak som dnes radšej išla autobusom."

from: The woman said "I could never go longer than a month without sex."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nemohla vydržať dlhšie ako mesiac bez sexu."

from: The woman said "I told you that I can climb this mountain."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedala som ti, že môžem vyliezť na túto horu."

from: The woman said "I dried the dog's paws before it entered the house."
to: Žena povedala: "Osušila som psovi labky, než vošiel do domu."

from: The woman said "They told me that I walked into the room with such confidence."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedali mi, že som vošla do miestnosti s takou dôverou."

from: The woman said "Even though I had surgery, I couldn't keep my hands off my partner."
to: Žena povedala: "Aj keď som podstúpila operáciu, nemohla som od svojho partnera odtrhnúť ruky."

from: The woman said "I got a free cab ride, because the driver liked me."
to: Žena povedala: "Dostala som taxík zadarmo, pretože som sa vodičovi páčila."

from: The woman said "I bought new clothes, but first I had them washed."
to: Žena povedala: "Kúpila som si nové šaty, ale najprv som ich dala vyprať."

from: The woman said "They brought new decorative rocks to my garden, but I couldn't move them."
to: Žena povedala: "Do mojej záhrady priniesli nové ozdobné kamene, ale nemohla som ich premiestniť."

from: The woman said "I never thought of anyone being better than me."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som si nemyslela, že je niekto lepší ako ja."

from: The woman said "I'd like to get back in the ring one day."
to: Žena povedala: "Jedného dňa by som sa chcela vrátiť do ringu."

from: The woman said "The sweat dripped from my brow as I practiced my martial arts techniques."
to: Žena povedala: "Pot mi stekal z čela, keď som cvičila techniky bojových umení."

from: The woman said "We went to the bathroom in the club and had sex there, I could not bear to wait until we got home."
to: Žena povedala: "Išli sme na toaletu v klube a tam sme mali sex, nemohla som vydržať čakať, kým prídeme domov."

from: The woman said "I am the best boss they could wish form."
to: Žena povedala: "Som tá najlepšia šéfka, akú si môžu priať."

from: The woman said "I don't need others to tell me what to do, it's usually me who tells people what to do, because I am a leader."
to: Žena povedala: "Nepotrebujem, aby mi iní hovorili, čo mám robiť, zvyčajne som to ja, kto hovorí ľuďom, čo majú robiť, pretože som vodca."

from: The woman said "I got a new business partner from a leading company."
to: Žena povedala: "Získala som nového obchodného partnera z jednej významnej spoločnosti."

from: The woman said "I was unsure if they liked my cookies."
to: Žena povedala: "Nebola som si istá, či im moje koláčiky chutia."

from: The woman said "When someone laughs, I get nervous because I immediately assume they're laughing at me."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď sa niekto smeje, som nervózna, pretože si hneď myslím, že sa smeje mne."

from: The woman said "I thought the lock was broken but it turns out that I was just too weak and did not push hard enough."
to: Žena povedala: "Myslela som si, že je zámok pokazený, ale ukázalo sa, že som bola len príliš slabá a netlačila som dostatočne silno."

from: The woman said "I bought the new issue of Playboy."
to: Žena povedala: "Kúpila som si nové číslo Playboya."

from: The woman said "I dislike solitude."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemám rada samotu."

from: The woman said "I don't like quackery."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemám rada šarlatánstvo."

from: The woman said "I don't like hard music, rather something soft."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemám rada tvrdú hudbu, radšej niečo jemné."

from: The woman said "I learned very early that good looks help me in life."
to: Žena povedala: "Veľmi skoro som sa naučila, že dobrý vzhľad mi v živote pomáha."

from: The woman said "I feel happy when everybody feels happy."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítim sa šťastná, keď sa všetci cítia šťastní."

from: The woman said "You talked way too much with them."
to: Žena povedala: "Príliš veľa si s nimi hovoril."

from: The woman said "Whenever I’m sad, I put on sad songs and it makes me feel even worse."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy, keď som smutná, pustím si smutné piesne a cítim sa ešte horšie."

from: The woman said "I love it when someone asks me to open something."
to: Žena povedala: "Milujem, keď ma niekto požiada, aby som niečo otvorila."

from: The woman said "I don't go in the shower unless I'm really dirty."
to: Žena povedala: "Do sprchy nechodím, pokiaľ nie som naozaj špinavá."

from: The woman said "No matter what, I was always trying to be nice to people."
to: Žena povedala: "Bez ohľadu na všetko som sa vždy snažila byť k ľuďom milá."

from: The woman said "You didn't have to work because I took care of the income."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemusel si pracovať, pretože som sa postarala o príjem."

from: The woman said "I calculated the shortest route."
to: Žena povedala: "Vypočítala som si najkratšiu cestu."

from: The woman said "I did not let emotions cloud my judgement."
to: Žena povedala: "Nedovolila som, aby mi emócie zatemnili úsudok."

from: The woman said "I washed and sterilized my reusable water bottles and food containers."
to: Žena povedala: "Umyla a sterilizovala som svoje opakovane použiteľné fľaše na vodu a nádoby na jedlo."

from: The woman said "I did not wait for a second date to make a move."
to: Žena povedala: "Nečakala som na druhé rande, aby som urobila krok."

from: The woman said "I responded to a negative review by objectively evaluating the feedback."
to: Žena uviedla: "Na negatívnu recenziu som reagovala objektívnym vyhodnotením spätnej väzby."

from: The woman said "I like to take care of my skin."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada sa starám o svoju pleť."

from: The woman said "The doctor told me that my ankes are too weak and I could have sprained them anytime."
to: Žena povedala: "Lekár mi povedal, že moje členky sú príliš slabé a mohla som si ich kedykoľvek vyvrtnúť."

from: The woman said "I made the rational decision."
to: Žena povedala: "Urobila som racionálne rozhodnutie."

from: The woman said "I'm free, so I don't follow any rules."
to: Žena povedala: "Som slobodná, takže nedodržiavam žiadne pravidlá."

from: The woman said "I wanted to look seductive for my date."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som na rande vyzerať zvodne."

from: The woman said "I always believed that total objectivity is possible."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som verila, že úplná objektivita je možná."

from: The woman said "I did not like the way I was treated, but I decided not to speak up and defend myself for the sake of peace."
to: Žena povedala: "Nepáčilo sa mi, ako so mnou zaobchádzali, ale rozhodla som sa, že sa nebudem ozývať a brániť sa v záujme pokoja."

from: The woman said "I never needed to warm up before lifting the weights."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som sa nepotrebovala pred zdvíhaním činiek rozcvičiť."

from: The woman said "Although I had an appointment, I didn't speak up."
to: Žena povedala: "Hoci som mala dohodnuté stretnutie, neprehovorila som."

from: The woman said "An entire bus of weightlifters came to the restaurant."
to: Žena povedala: "Do reštaurácie prišiel celý autobus vzpieračov."

from: The woman said "I went to a shooting club once but I was not strong enough to hold the rifle without trembling."
to: Žena povedala: "Raz som bola v streleckom klube, ale nebola som dosť silná, aby som pušku udržala bez toho, aby som sa triasla."

from: The woman said "I am sure that my success is mainly due to my character."
to: Žena povedala: "Som si istá, že za svoj úspech vďačím najmä svojej povahe."

from: The woman said "I could never go to the movies alone, it just does not feel right."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som nemohla ísť do kina sama, jednoducho sa mi to nezdá."

from: The woman said "I tried to reject them as nicely as possible not to make them angry."
to: Žena povedala: "Snažila som sa ich odmietnuť čo najkrajšie, aby som ich nenahnevala."

from: The woman said "Look, I don't care it is not proven - I just felt better after taking it."
to: Žena povedala: "Pozri, je mi jedno, že to nie je dokázané - po užití som sa cítila lepšie."

from: The woman said "I could never protect myself if something bad happened."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som sa nedokázala ochrániť, keby sa stalo niečo zlé."

from: The woman said "I'm financially stable."
to: Žena povedala: "Som finančne stabilná."

from: The woman said "I was happy to hear that the plastic surgeon said there's nothing to improve."
to: Žena povedala: "Potešilo ma, že plastický chirurg povedal, že nie je čo zlepšovať."

from: The woman said "I feel confident with my communication skills and with my ability to motivate others."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítim sa sebavedomá vďaka svojim komunikačným schopnostiam a schopnosti motivovať ostatných."

from: The woman said "I conducted myself professionally in high-pressure situations."
to: Žena povedala: "V situáciách pod vysokým tlakom som sa správala profesionálne."

from: The woman said "Others always told me not to do it, but I did and look where I'm now."
to: Žena povedala: "Ostatní mi vždy hovorili, aby som to nerobila, ale ja som to urobila a pozrite sa, kde som teraz."

from: The woman said "I spent a lot of money for skins in an online game."
to: Žena povedala: "Utratila som veľa peňazí za skiny v online hre."

from: The woman said "I still lived at my parents house when I was 29."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som mala 29 rokov, stále som žila v dome svojich rodičov."

from: The woman said "I am ready to fight for what is mine."
to: Žena povedala: "Som pripravená bojovať za to, čo mi patrí."

from: The woman said "I'm convinced that nobody can do better job than me."
to: Žena povedala: "Som presvedčená, že nikto nedokáže urobiť lepšiu prácu ako ja."

from: The woman said "I could never fight with someone physically."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som sa s niekým nedokázala fyzicky pohádať."

from: The woman said "Making you happy is making me happy."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď vás urobím šťastnou, urobím šťastnou aj seba."

from: The woman said "I rolled the giant concrete ball out of the way."
to: Žena povedala: "Odvalila som obrovskú betónovú guľu z cesty."

from: The woman said "I have a lot of porn saved in my computer."
to: Žena povedala: "V počítači mám uložených veľa pornografie."

from: The woman said "I tried so hard and it was for nothing because my kids were always dirty."
to: Žena povedala: "Tak veľmi som sa snažila a bolo to zbytočné, pretože moje deti boli vždy špinavé."

from: The woman said "The delivery guy wasn't able to carry up the package, so I stopped to help him."
to: Žena povedala: "Doručovateľ nebol schopný vyniesť balík, tak som sa zastavila, aby som mu pomohla."

from: The woman said "I preferred feelings over rational arguments."
to: Žena povedala: "Dala som prednosť pocitom pred racionálnymi argumentmi."

from: The woman said "I would never eat soup with a hair in it."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som nejedla polievku s vlasom."

from: The woman said "It was a source of pride to see the results of our collective efforts, knowing that my leadership played a significant role in achieving those outcomes."
to: Táto žena povedala: "Bolo pre mňa hrdosťou vidieť výsledky nášho spoločného úsilia a vedieť, že moje vedenie zohralo významnú úlohu pri dosahovaní týchto výsledkov."

from: The woman said "Tell me when I'll be talking too much, I'm way too talkative."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedzte mi, kedy budem príliš veľa hovoriť, som príliš zhovorčivá."

from: The woman said "They asked me if I could help them, and I couldn’t say no."
to: Žena povedala: "Spýtali sa ma, či im môžem pomôcť, a ja som nemohla povedať nie."

from: The woman said "I consulted a fact-checker."
to: Žena povedala: "Konzultovala som to s overovateľom faktov."

from: The woman said "The cast iron pans were too heavy to work with, so I had to switch to stainless steel ones."
to: Žena povedala: "Liatinové panvice boli príliš ťažké na prácu, preto som musela prejsť na panvice z nehrdzavejúcej ocele."

from: The woman said "When my neighbor’s house was on fire, I immediately ran to her apartment."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď začal horieť dom mojej susedky, okamžite som bežala do jej bytu."

from: The woman said "I worked hard for the betterment of our family's financial situation."
to: Žena povedala: "Tvrdo som pracovala na zlepšení finančnej situácie našej rodiny."

from: The woman said "I could not resist buying that dress even though it was over my budget."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som odolať kúpe týchto šiat, aj keď presahovali môj rozpočet."

from: The woman said "Could you cook something?"
to: Žena povedala: "Mohli by ste niečo uvariť?"

from: The woman said "I've always got what I set out to get."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som dostala to, čo som si zaumienila."

from: The woman said "I try to show that I am empathetic so that people are not afraid to talk to me about their problems."
to: Žena povedala: "Snažím sa ukázať, že som empatická, aby sa ľudia nebáli hovoriť so mnou o svojich problémoch."

from: The woman said "They liked me because I had the ability to take care of others."
to: Žena povedala: "Mali ma radi, pretože som sa vedela postarať o iných."

from: The woman said "I've had my clothes tailored."
to: Žena povedala: "Dala som si ušiť šaty na mieru."

from: The woman said "I went to the networking event to meet new people."
to: Žena povedala: "Išla som na networkingové podujatie, aby som spoznala nových ľudí."

from: The woman said "I offered to carry their suitcases."
to: Žena povedala: "Ponúkla som sa, že im ponesiem kufre."

from: The woman said "I knew I had to surround myself with educated people."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, že sa musím obklopiť vzdelanými ľuďmi."

from: The woman said "I can't imagine eating off a stranger's plate."
to: Žena povedala: "Neviem si predstaviť, že by som jedla z cudzích tanierov."

from: The woman said "I felt I was not good enough so I did not go to that job interview after all although I have the necessary qualifications as well as experience."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som pocit, že nie som dosť dobrá, a tak som na ten pracovný pohovor napokon nešla, hoci mám potrebnú kvalifikáciu aj skúsenosti."

from: The woman said "You are not capable of what I am capable of."
to: Žena povedala: "Nie si schopný toho, čoho som schopná ja."

from: The woman said "I wanted to be likable."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som byť sympatická."

from: The woman said "I want to become a physicist."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcem sa stať fyzičkou."

from: The woman said "I should not have argued with them."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemala som sa s nimi hádať."

from: The woman said "I like making decisions based on hard data, not subjective feelings."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada sa rozhodujem na základe tvrdých údajov, nie subjektívnych pocitov."

from: The woman said "I've always preferred to work physically."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som uprednostňovala fyzickú prácu."

from: The woman said "I fried the meat, because that's how my partner likes it."
to: Žena povedala: "Smažila som mäso, pretože tak to má môj partner rád."

from: The woman said "I relished the challenge of riding the untamed power of the ocean."
to: Žena povedala: "Vychutnávala som si výzvu jazdiť na neskrotnej sile oceánu."

from: The woman said "Maybe if I prayed more, it would be better."
to: Žena povedala: "Možno keby som sa viac modlila, bolo by to lepšie."

from: The woman said "I love hunting."
to: Žena povedala: "Milujem lov."

from: The woman said "I threw a tantrum when my partner told me that we should not buy the new car."
to: Žena povedala: "Dostala som záchvat hnevu, keď mi partner povedal, že by sme nemali kupovať nové auto."

from: The woman said "I made sure that everyone in the family had everything their needed materially."
to: Žena povedala: "Postarala som sa o to, aby všetci v rodine mali všetko, čo materiálne potrebujú."

from: The woman said "I like to buy from foreign e-shops, even though it is often more expensive."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada nakupujem v zahraničných e-shopoch, aj keď sú často drahšie."

from: The woman said "Even though I bought a dishwasher, I always take the dishes out and rinse them with water."
to: Žena povedala: "Aj keď som si kúpila umývačku riadu, vždy vyťahujem riad a oplachujem ho vodou."

from: The woman said "I like team sports more than individual ones."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám radšej tímové športy ako individuálne."

from: The woman said "I soared through the air on my bike, reveling in the exhilarating rush of speed and the knowledge that my physical strength allowed me to conquer any terrain."
to: Žena povedala: "Vznášala som sa vo vzduchu na bicykli, vychutnávala som si vzrušujúci nával rýchlosti a vedomie, že moja fyzická sila mi umožňuje zdolať akýkoľvek terén."

from: The woman said "I had to fix my hair first."
to: Žena povedala: "Najprv som si musela upraviť vlasy."

from: The woman said "I got a job as a trainer at a gym."
to: Žena povedala: "Zamestnala som sa ako trénerka v posilňovni."

from: The woman said "I've been looking forward to summer all year because I can finally play with water guns."
to: Žena povedala: "Celý rok sa teším na leto, pretože sa konečne môžem hrať s vodnými pištoľami."

from: The woman said "I could get any job because I have children."
to: Žena povedala: "Mohla by som dostať akúkoľvek prácu, pretože mám deti."

from: The woman said "I had such a heavy bag that I almost didn't bring it home."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som takú ťažkú tašku, že som ju takmer nedoniesla domov."

from: The woman said "Nothing can make me happier than knowing that my family is fed and cleaned."
to: Žena povedala: "Nič ma nemôže urobiť šťastnejšou, ako vedomie, že moja rodina je nakŕmená a uprataná."

from: The woman said "I washed the dishes."
to: Žena povedala: "Umyla som riad."

from: The woman said "This is nothing - you should have seen what I lifted yesterday."
to: Žena povedala: "To nič nie je - mali ste vidieť, čo som včera zdvihla."

from: The woman said "I had such a terrible muscle pain after just lifting the chairs."
to: Žena povedala: "Už len po zdvihnutí stoličiek som mala strašnú bolesť svalov."

from: The woman said "I was CEO of a big company when I was just twenty years old."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som generálnou riaditeľkou veľkej spoločnosti, keď som mala len dvadsať rokov."

from: The woman said "When I set my mind to something, I always stick with it."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď si niečo zaumienim, vždy sa toho držím."

from: The woman said "I like to cook vegan meals."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada varím vegánske jedlá."

from: The woman said "Are you sure you are strong enough?"
to: Žena sa spýtala: "Si si istý, že si dosť silný?"

from: The woman said "I liked to be a teacher."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada by som bola učiteľkou."

from: The woman said "I needed a new haircut, but when I called the hairdresser, they couldn't see me on Monday."
to: Žena povedala: "Potrebovala som nový účes, ale keď som zavolala do kaderníctva, v pondelok ma nemohli prijať."

from: The woman said "I avoided cracks on the sidewalk to avoid bad luck."

from: The woman said "I could not decide based just on my gut feeling."

from: The woman said "I invited everyone to come over for dinner."

from: The woman said "They want me to show emotion, but I’ve never done that before."

from: The woman said "I wanted to tell you the story with all the details and you wouldn't listen."

from: The woman said "I had to think about every aspect of such an investment."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som premyslieť každý aspekt takejto investície."

from: The woman said "What should I do, so you finally be quiet?"

from: The woman said "I may spend less time with my family than I'd like, but at least we have enough money."

from: The woman said "Last month I signed a lucrative contract at work, so we will finally be able to afford the new house."

from: The woman said "With each stroke of the paddle, I propelled the kayak through the rushing rapids."
to: Žena povedala: "Každým záberom pádla som poháňala kajak cez prudké pereje."

from: The woman said "I wasn't afraid to ask for more money, because my services are worth it."

from: The woman said "I often conformed to others to please everyone."
to: Žena povedala: "Často som sa prispôsobovala ostatným, aby som sa všetkým zapáčila."

from: The woman said "I am determined to win this fight."

from: The woman said "Friends often refer to me as a great cook."

from: The woman said "I was very confident when I was applying for that job and of course, I got it."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som sa uchádzala o túto prácu, bola som veľmi sebavedomá a samozrejme som ju dostala."

to: Žena povedala: "Ak by som mala povedať jednu vec, bez ktorej by som nikam nešla, boli by to prstene."

to: Žena povedala: "Musela som odinštalovať Instagram, pretože som kupovala všetko, čo som tam videla."

to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som držať jazyk za zubami a jednoducho som to tajomstvo všetkým prezradila."

to: Žena povedala: "Očakáva sa odo mňa, že uprednostním potreby rodiny pred osobnými túžbami, takže som si ten telefón nekúpila."

from: The woman said "I was hoping that we could go to my place after the party."
