to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som vedela dobre odhadnúť situáciu."

from: The woman said "I like to read a lot of non-fiction books."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada čítam veľa kníh literatúry faktu."

from: The woman said "I am able to deal successfully with hard situations."
to: Žena povedala: "Dokážem úspešne zvládať ťažké situácie."

from: The woman said "Why would I need to talk about my feelings?"
to: Žena povedala: "Prečo by som mala hovoriť o svojich pocitoch?"

from: The woman said "I like to drive fast in my sports car."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada jazdím rýchlo vo svojom športovom aute."

from: The woman said "I didn't like my blind date, but I decided to stay until the end of the dinner to be polite."
to: Žena povedala: "Moje rande naslepo sa mi nepáčilo, ale rozhodla som sa zostať až do konca večere, aby som bola zdvorilá."

from: The woman said "I never had a problem with hard work."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nemala problém s tvrdou prácou."

from: The woman said "Did you change the oil in our car?"
to: Žena sa opýtala: "Vymenili ste nám olej v aute?"

from: The woman said "I always did my homework on time."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som si robila domáce úlohy načas."

from: The woman said "I became a CEO when I was only thirty years old."
to: Žena povedala: "Generálnou riaditeľkou som sa stala, keď som mala len tridsať rokov."

from: The woman said "I made sure my children went to the best school."
to: Žena povedala: "Postarala som sa, aby moje deti chodili do najlepšej školy."

from: The woman said "I brought a lot of investment into the company."
to: Žena povedala: "Vložila som do spoločnosti veľa investícií."

from: The woman said "I painted my room, but then I slept for twelve hours straight."
to: Žena povedala: "Vymaľovala som si izbu, ale potom som spala dvanásť hodín v kuse."

from: The woman said "I couldn't show them my real emotions, it'd be a sign of weakness."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som im ukázať svoje skutočné emócie, bol by to prejav slabosti."

from: The woman said "I was a natural talent, I instantly became the best skater in my class after putting on the skates for the first time."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som prirodzený talent, keď som si prvýkrát obula korčule, okamžite som sa stala najlepšou korčuliarkou v triede."

from: The woman said "I was so angry I was screaming into my pillow."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som taká nahnevaná, že som kričala do vankúša."

from: The woman said "I’m simply the best."
to: Žena povedala: "Som jednoducho najlepšia."

from: The woman said "I tried to act confident in order to motivate my team."
to: Žena povedala: "Snažila som sa pôsobiť sebavedomo, aby som motivovala svoj tím."

from: The woman said "I tried to be friendly, although they didn't want to chat."
to: Žena povedala: "Snažila som sa byť priateľská, hoci sa nechceli rozprávať."

from: The woman said "I invited my partner to the cinema."
to: Žena povedala: "Pozvala som svojho partnera do kina."

from: The woman said "I used to feel some very bad vibes or energies in this room."
to: Žena povedala: "V tejto miestnosti som cítila veľmi zlé vibrácie alebo energie."

from: The woman said "I miss company - I wish I had a friend here."
to: Žena povedala: "Chýba mi spoločnosť, chcela by som tu mať priateľa."

from: The woman said "I would never allow anyone else to drive my car, I think nobody would be better driven than I am."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som nedovolila nikomu inému, aby riadil moje auto, myslím, že nikto by ho neovládal lepšie ako ja."

from: The woman said "I was chosen to be the interim team leader."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som vybraná za dočasnú vedúcu tímu."

from: The woman said "There is no shame in having varied sexual life, I took pride in it when I was young."
to: Žena povedala: "Nie je hanba mať pestrý sexuálny život, bola som naň hrdá, keď som bola mladá."

from: The woman said "I enjoyed sex and was ready to have it anytime, anywhere."
to: Žena povedala: "Sex sa mi páčil a bola som pripravená ho mať kedykoľvek a kdekoľvek."

from: The woman said "I was told not to go to an Islamic country alone under any circumstances."
to: Žena povedala: "Bolo mi povedané, aby som za žiadnych okolností nechodila sama do islamskej krajiny."

from: The woman said "I always carried wet napkins with me."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som so sebou nosila vlhčené obrúsky."

from: The woman said "It would be great if I could be a kid forever."
to: Žena povedala: "Bolo by skvelé, keby som mohla byť dieťaťom navždy."

from: The woman said "I am the manager of this company."
to: Žena povedala: "Som manažérka tejto spoločnosti."

from: The woman said "I initiated a conversation with a neighbor who was going through a difficult time."
to: Žena povedala: "Iniciovala som rozhovor so susedom, ktorý prežíval ťažké obdobie."

from: The woman said "I like to take long baths with essential oils and salt."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada si dávam dlhé kúpele s esenciálnymi olejmi a soľou."

from: The woman said "I hated that there was no mirror there because I didn't know how I looked."
to: Žena povedala: "Vadilo mi, že tam nebolo zrkadlo, lebo som nevedela, ako vyzerám."

from: The woman said "Do you think I'm friendy?"
to: Žena povedala: "Myslíte si, že som priateľská?"

from: The woman said "I was popular, because I always looked good."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som obľúbená, pretože som vždy vyzerala dobre."

from: The woman said "I engaged in open and non-judgmental conversations with individuals who held different opinions or beliefs."
to: Žena povedala: "Zapájala som sa do otvorených a neodsudzujúcich rozhovorov s osobami, ktoré mali odlišné názory alebo presvedčenie."

from: The woman said "I was never satisfied with how I look."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nebola spokojná s tým, ako vyzerám."

from: The woman said "Since I started to play football, I have stronger legs."
to: Žena povedala: "Odkedy som začala hrať futbal, mám silnejšie nohy."

from: The woman said "I loved this house the second I saw it."
to: Žena povedala: "Tento dom sa mi zapáčil hneď, ako som ho uvidela."

from: The woman said "I handed out Christmas bonuses at the company."
to: Žena povedala: "Rozdávala som vo firme vianočné prémie."

from: The woman said "I could not resist buying that bag even though it was over my budget."
to: Žena povedala: "Neodolala som a kúpila som si túto tašku, aj keď presahovala môj rozpočet."

from: The woman said "I lacked the confidence to get promoted."
to: Žena povedala: "Chýbalo mi sebavedomie, aby som bola povýšená."

from: The woman said "I have had so many relationships that I could write a book about it."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som toľko vzťahov, že by som o tom mohla napísať knihu."

from: The woman said "I never worry about what others think."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy sa nestarám o to, čo si myslia ostatní."

from: The woman said "As a leader, I'm expected to be in charge of difficult decisions."
to: Žena povedala: "Odo mňa ako od vedúcej pracovníčky sa očakáva, že budem mať na starosti ťažké rozhodnutia."

from: The woman said "I don't like to talk about my feeling at all."
to: Žena povedala: "Vôbec nerada hovorím o svojich pocitoch."

from: The woman said "I would never go out without being properly dressed."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som nešla von bez toho, aby som bola poriadne oblečená."

from: The woman said "I shouldn't be so loud, because people don't like it."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemala by som byť taká hlučná, pretože sa to ľuďom nepáči."

from: The woman said "I have always been admired by my friends and family for my looks."
to: Žena povedala: "Priatelia a rodina ma vždy obdivovali pre môj vzhľad."

from: The woman said "I am confident with my body."
to: Žena povedala: "Som si istá svojím telom."

from: The woman said "I like people, so I think I would be a great interpreter."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada ľudí, takže si myslím, že by som bola skvelá tlmočníčka."

from: The woman said "As the leader, I took charge of the team, guiding them towards success with my strategic vision and decision-making skills."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako vedúca som prevzala zodpovednosť za tím, viedla som ho k úspechu svojou strategickou víziou a rozhodovacími schopnosťami."

from: The woman said "I didn't believe them, because they based their opinions on gossip."
to: Žena povedala: "Neverila som im, pretože sa opierali o klebety."

from: The woman said "I decided to buy an album and collect stickers."
to: Žena povedala: "Rozhodla som sa kúpiť si album a zbierať nálepky."

from: The woman said "I am good at socialising."
to: Žena povedala: "Som dobrá v spoločenskom styku."

from: The woman said "I wasn't permitted to wear such clothes in my old job, they'd think they reveal too much."
to: Žena povedala: "V mojom bývalom zamestnaní som takéto oblečenie nosiť nemohla, mysleli by si, že príliš odhaľuje."

from: The woman said "I loved sports when I was younger."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som bola mladšia, milovala som šport."

from: The woman said "I got a henna tattoo while on vacation."
to: Žena povedala: "Na dovolenke som si nechala urobiť tetovanie henou."

from: The woman said "I like to wear gold accessories, silver is not for me."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada nosím zlaté doplnky, strieborné nie sú pre mňa."

from: The woman said "I left my business card at your office."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechala som si vizitku vo vašej kancelárii."

from: The woman said "I took a course in critical thinking."
to: Žena povedala: "Absolvovala som kurz kritického myslenia."

from: The woman said "I stayed up all night worrying about the job interview although I knew it did not matter whether I slept or not."
to: Žena povedala: "Celú noc som sa bála o pracovný pohovor, hoci som vedela, že je jedno, či spím alebo nie."

from: The woman said "When I saw a woman being beaten in the street, I immediately ran there."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som videla, že na ulici bijú ženu, okamžite som tam bežala."

from: The woman said "I would never leave home without making sure that I look presentable."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som nevychádzala z domu bez toho, aby som vyzerala reprezentatívne."

from: The woman said "I loved my body."
to: Žena povedala: "Milovala som svoje telo."

from: The woman said "I was extremely fast, my physical strength and explosive power propelled me to victory"
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som extrémne rýchla, moja fyzická sila a výbušná sila ma hnali k víťazstvu."

from: The woman said "Don't worry about my credentials, I am a professional."
to: Žena povedala: "Nebojte sa o moje referencie, som profesionálka."

from: The woman said "I didn't know what to do, because I couldn't defend myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Nevedela som, čo mám robiť, pretože som sa nemohla brániť."

from: The woman said "My gym membership ended yesterday and I had to renew it."
to: Žena povedala: "Včera mi skončilo členstvo v posilňovni a musela som si ho obnoviť."

from: The woman said "I got invited to a model casting."
to: Žena povedala: "Pozvali ma na casting pre modelky."

from: The woman said "I preferred cleaning the house and not going out."
to: Žena povedala: "Radšej som upratovala dom a nechodila von."

from: The woman said "I've started rewarding people for their extra work."
to: Žena povedala: "Začala som odmeňovať ľudí za ich prácu navyše."

from: The woman said "I finally saved the company."
to: Žena povedala: "Konečne som zachránila spoločnosť."

from: The woman said "I was never afraid of heights."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som sa nebála výšok."

from: The woman said "There was always something to do at home so I did it."
to: Žena povedala: "Doma bolo vždy čo robiť, tak som to robila."

from: The woman said "I am happiest when surrounded by people."
to: Žena povedala: "Som najšťastnejšia, keď som obklopená ľuďmi."

from: The woman said "I calmly assessed the traffic situation and chose an alternate route to avoid getting stuck."
to: Žena povedala: "Pokojne som zhodnotila dopravnú situáciu a zvolila som si náhradnú trasu, aby som sa vyhla uviaznutiu."

from: The woman said "I enjoyed the confidence boost that came from receiving compliments about my good looks."
to: Žena povedala: "Tešila som sa z toho, že mi komplimenty na môj pekný vzhľad zdvihli sebavedomie."

from: The woman said "I don't wait for new opportunities, I create them myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Nečakám na nové príležitosti, sama si ich vytváram."

from: The woman said "I am very grateful for the life I have been blessed to live."
to: Žena povedala: "Som veľmi vďačná za život, ktorý mi bolo dopriate žiť."

from: The woman said "I made the cake, but didn't eat it to stay slim."
to: Žena povedala: "Urobila som koláč, ale nezjedla som ho, aby som zostala štíhla."

from: The woman said "My skin was soft and fair, my lips were full and hair thick, I knew I looked good."
to: Žena povedala: "Moja pleť bola jemná a svetlá, pery plné a vlasy husté, vedela som, že vyzerám dobre."

from: The woman said "I’m addicted to sex."
to: Žena povedala: "Som závislá od sexu."

from: The woman said "I ordered the meal today."
to: Žena povedala: "Dnes som si objednala jedlo."

from: The woman said "My friend really inspires everyone around me, such a leader."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj priateľ naozaj inšpiruje všetkých okolo mňa, je to taký vodca."

from: The woman said "I bought the Valentine's Day gift in a sexshop."
to: Žena povedala: "Valentínsky darček som kúpila v sexshope."

from: The woman said "The hike was not hard but still took a lot of my energy."
to: Žena povedala: "Túra nebola náročná, ale aj tak mi vzala veľa energie."

from: The woman said "I never had a problem with making new friends."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nemala problém s nadväzovaním nových priateľstiev."

from: The woman said "I never stressed much."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som sa veľmi nestresovala."

from: The woman said "I went skydiving with my friends."
to: Žena povedala: "Išla som s priateľmi skákať padákom."

from: The woman said "I am so obsessed with hygiene that I even wash chicken eggs."
to: Žena povedala: "Som taká posadnutá hygienou, že umývam aj slepačie vajcia."

from: The woman said "I could never have a dog, I couldn’t stand the hair."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som nemohla mať psa, nezniesla by som tú srsť."

from: The woman said "I was screaming when they hit that car."
to: Žena povedala: "Kričala som, keď do toho auta narazili."

from: The woman said "I took my nephew to the lake and we fed the swans."
to: Žena povedala: "Vzala som svojho synovca k jazeru a nakŕmili sme labute."

from: The woman said "I spent time volunteering at a local hospital."
to: Žena povedala: "Strávila som nejaký čas ako dobrovoľníčka v miestnej nemocnici."

from: The woman said "I'm directive at work, and caring at home."
to: Žena povedala: "V práci som direktívna a doma starostlivá."

from: The woman said "I kept my clothes and linens clean and organized"
to: Žena povedala: "Udržiavala som svoje oblečenie a bielizeň čisté a usporiadané."

from: The woman said "I effortlessly lifted the weight above my head."
to: Žena povedala: "Bez námahy som zdvihla závažie nad hlavu."

from: The woman said "I am open to different experimentation in the field of sex."
to: Žena povedala: "Som otvorená rôznym experimentom v oblasti sexu."

from: The woman said "I was happy when everything was perfectly cleaned."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som šťastná, keď bolo všetko dokonale vyčistené."

from: The woman said "I always did it as well as possible."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som to robila čo najlepšie."

from: The woman said "I was being silly."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som hlúpa."

from: The woman said "I like it when I see that I have helped someone."
to: Žena povedala: "Som rada, keď vidím, že som niekomu pomohla."

from: The woman said "I've decided to sort my wardrobe twice a year and give things to charity."
to: Žena povedala: "Rozhodla som sa, že budem dvakrát ročne triediť svoj šatník a veci budem dávať na charitu."

from: The woman said "I did not even need help with assembling the furniture."
to: Žena povedala: "Ani som nepotrebovala pomoc pri montáži nábytku."

from: The woman said "I like to clean the house when nobody's home."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada upratujem dom, keď nikto nie je doma."

from: The woman said "Do you think I am strong enough?"
to: Žena sa opýtala: "Myslíte si, že som dosť silná?"

from: The woman said "I had to call a friend to help me because I was too weak to carry the wardrobe."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som zavolať priateľa, aby mi pomohol, pretože som bola príliš slabá na to, aby som niesla skriňu."

from: The woman said "I came up with swimming accross the river in the middle of a storm."
to: Žena povedala: "Prišla som na to, že som uprostred búrky preplávala rieku."

from: The woman said "In elementary school I competed in several disciplines."
to: Žena povedala: "Na základnej škole som súťažila vo viacerých disciplínach."

from: The woman said "I like hunting."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada lov."

from: The woman said "I like expensive clothes because they don’t get ruined so quickly."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada drahé oblečenie, pretože sa tak rýchlo nezničí."

from: The woman said "I was always focused on my dream."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som sa sústredila na svoj sen."

from: The woman said "I applied for a job as a cleaner."
to: Žena povedala: "Uchádzala som sa o prácu upratovačky."

from: The woman said "I didn't like being led on and I wanted to get physical."
to: Žena povedala: "Nepáčilo sa mi, že ma viedli, a chcela som sa dostať k fyzickej sile."

from: The woman said "I didn't body-shame you, I was just commenting on the fact."
to: Žena povedala: "Ja som vás nehanobila, len som to komentovala."

from: The woman said "As a personal trainer, I designed individualized fitness programs, provided guidance on proper exercise techniques, and motivated clients to achieve their health and fitness goals."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako osobná trénerka som navrhovala individuálne fitnes programy, poskytovala poradenstvo o správnych technikách cvičenia a motivovala klientov, aby dosiahli svoje zdravotné a fitnes ciele."

from: The woman said "I used my earnings to contribute to our family's savings."
to: Žena povedala: "Svoj zárobok som použila na to, aby som prispela k úsporám našej rodiny."

from: The woman said "I like going to the gym."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada chodím do posilňovne."

from: The woman said "I volunteered at a local community center, engaging with individuals of different ages."
to: Žena povedala: "Pracovala som ako dobrovoľníčka v miestnom komunitnom centre, kde som sa venovala ľuďom rôzneho veku."

from: The woman said "I offered assistance to an old lady struggling with heavy bags."
to: Žena povedala: "Ponúkla som pomoc jednej starej pani, ktorá zápasila s ťažkými taškami."

from: The woman said "With each crashing wave, I navigated the treacherous seas, steering us towards safety."
to: Žena povedala: "S každou narážajúcou vlnou som navigovala zradné more a viedla nás do bezpečia."

from: The woman said "My stomach hurt when I imagined someone would be angry with me."
to: Žena povedala: "Bolel ma žalúdok, keď som si predstavila, že sa na mňa niekto bude hnevať."

from: The woman said "I am a stand-up comedian."
to: Žena povedala: "Som stand-up komička."

from: The woman said "Being alone doesn't suit me, the last time I was alone I got depressed."
to: Žena povedala: "Byť sama mi nevyhovuje, naposledy, keď som bola sama, som dostala depresiu."

from: The woman said "I wasn't scared of failure."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemala som strach zo zlyhania."

from: The woman said "I actively sought out promotions and salary negotiations at work to support our family's financial goals."
to: Žena povedala: "Aktívne som sa snažila o povýšenie a vyjednávanie o plate v práci, aby som podporila finančné ciele našej rodiny."

from: The woman said "I baked a batch of cookies for the Christmas party."
to: Žena povedala: "Upiekla som várku koláčikov na vianočný večierok."

from: The woman said "I am very active in my neighbourhood community."
to: Žena povedala: "Som veľmi aktívna v komunite v mojom susedstve."

from: The woman said "I stood my ground, fueled by the fire within."
to: Žena povedala: "Stála som si za svojím, poháňaná vnútorným ohňom."

from: The woman said "I chose to stay with my friend instead of going home alone."
to: Žena povedala: "Rozhodla som sa zostať s priateľom, namiesto toho, aby som išla domov sama."

from: The woman said "I made the logical choice."
to: Žena povedala: "Rozhodla som sa logicky."

from: The woman said "I had to ask for help with opening the water bottle."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som požiadať o pomoc pri otváraní fľaše s vodou."

from: The woman said "I started swimming twice a week and it shows, not only physically but mentally as well."
to: Žena povedala: "Začala som plávať dvakrát týždenne a je to vidieť nielen fyzicky, ale aj psychicky."

from: The woman said "I had to explain to them that I won’t tolerate any back talk."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som im vysvetliť, že nebudem tolerovať žiadne reči."

from: The woman said "I followed the latest fashion trends."
to: Žena povedala: "Sledovala som najnovšie módne trendy."

from: The woman said "I washed it again, because I partner didn't do a good job."
to: Žena povedala: "Umyla som ho znova, pretože som partnerovi neurobila dobrú prácu."

from: The woman said "I guess these endurance sports were never really for weaklings like me."
to: Žena povedala: "Myslím, že tieto vytrvalostné športy nikdy neboli pre takých slabochov, ako som ja."

from: The woman said "There was nothing in this world I couldn't do when I could walk."
to: Žena povedala: "Na tomto svete nebolo nič, čo by som nemohla urobiť, keď som mohla chodiť."

from: The woman said "My stomach could not handle that and I just threw up."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj žalúdok to nezvládol a ja som sa pozvracala."

from: The woman said "I was sure I could do it."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som si istá, že to zvládnem."

from: The woman said "I ensured that my perspective was based on rational and credible sources."
to: Žena povedala: "Ubezpečila som sa, že môj pohľad vychádza z racionálnych a dôveryhodných zdrojov."

from: The woman said "My strong sexual desires sometimes led to impulsive decision-making."
to: Žena povedala: "Moje silné sexuálne túžby niekedy viedli k impulzívnemu rozhodovaniu."

from: The woman said "I played sports for twenty years to get to where I am today."
to: Žena povedala: "Športovala som dvadsať rokov, aby som sa dostala tam, kde som dnes."

from: The woman said "What if I told you that I am always right?"
to: Žena povedala: "Čo keby som ti povedala, že mám vždy pravdu?"

from: The woman said "I couldn't get the stain out of that shirt and I tried everything I could."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som tú škvrnu z tej košele dostať a skúsila som všetko, čo sa dalo."

from: The woman said "I did not want to be in a commited relationship in my thirties, I wanted to party and live a carefree life."
to: Žena povedala: "Po tridsiatke som nechcela mať záväzný vzťah, chcela som sa zabávať a žiť bezstarostný život."

from: The woman said "I changed the flat tyre on my own."
to: Žena povedala: "Pneumatiku som si vymenila sama."

from: The woman said "I was always good at reading other people's emotions."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som vedela dobre čítať emócie iných ľudí."

from: The woman said "I cried because of what I was told."
to: Žena povedala: "Plakala som kvôli tomu, čo mi povedali."

from: The woman said "I couldn't handle my feelings."
to: Žena povedala: "Nedokázala som zvládnuť svoje pocity."

from: The woman said "I coordinated the rescue effort."
to: Žena povedala: "Koordinovala som záchranné práce."

from: The woman said "I knocked on wood to counteract a negative statement."
to: Žena povedala: "Zaklopala som na drevo, aby som vyvrátila negatívny výrok."

from: The woman said "I decided to work at the shelter this summer."
to: Žena povedala: "Rozhodla som sa, že toto leto budem pracovať v útulku."

from: The woman said "Deep inside I knew that spending so much money on a bag was stupid."
to: Žena povedala: "V hĺbke duše som vedela, že míňať toľko peňazí za tašku je hlúposť."

from: The woman said "I was happy to make lunch for my colleagues."
to: Žena povedala: "S radosťou som pripravila obed pre svojich kolegov."

from: The woman said "People keep telling me that I'm a child in an adult body and I'm happy for that."
to: Žena povedala: "Ľudia mi stále hovoria, že som dieťa v dospelom tele, a ja som za to šťastná."

from: The woman said "I ate the soup even though they warned me it might give me food poisoning."
to: Žena povedala: "Jedla som polievku, aj keď ma varovali, že sa môžem otráviť jedlom."

from: The woman said "I could never just ignore someone else's suffering."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som nemohla ignorovať utrpenie niekoho iného."

from: The woman said "I like beauty products."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada kozmetické výrobky."

from: The woman said "You shouldn't be playing hockey, it's a really dangerous sport."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemal by si hrať hokej, je to veľmi nebezpečný šport."

from: The woman said "My father used to be my main authority and now I am totally lost."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj otec bol pre mňa hlavnou autoritou a teraz som úplne stratená."

from: The woman said "I packed a light suitcase to be able to carry it."
to: Žena povedala: "Zbalila som si ľahký kufor, aby som ho mohla niesť."

from: The woman said "I am aware of my exceptional leadership skills that inspire others."
to: Žena povedala: "Som si vedomá svojich výnimočných vodcovských schopností, ktoré inšpirujú ostatných."

from: The woman said "I always wanted to be a scientist."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som chcela byť vedkyňou."

from: The woman said "I would like the people around me to know that they can always count on me."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela by som, aby ľudia okolo mňa vedeli, že sa na mňa môžu vždy spoľahnúť."

from: The woman said "I wish I knew how they feel!"
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela by som vedieť, ako sa cítia!"

from: The woman said "I always wanted to take care of others."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som sa chcela starať o iných."

from: The woman said "I loved sports even as a child, I was always best at playing anything."
to: Žena povedala: "Už ako dieťa som milovala šport, vždy mi išlo všetko najlepšie."

from: The woman said "I always wanted to be an engineer but I felt that my kids would need me so I became a cleaner."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som chcela byť inžinierkou, ale cítila som, že moje deti ma budú potrebovať, tak som sa stala upratovačkou."

from: The woman said "I dug it out with no difficulties."
to: Žena povedala: "Vykopala som ho bez problémov."

from: The woman said "I was so overwhelmed with emotions that I could not make the right decision."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som taká zmietaná emóciami, že som sa nedokázala správne rozhodnúť."

from: The woman said "I looked in the mirror and couldn't help but admire myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Pozrela som sa do zrkadla a nemohla som si pomôcť, ale obdivovala som sa."

from: The woman said "I was in an open relationship because I liked switching up my sexual partners."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som otvorený vzťah, pretože som rada menila sexuálnych partnerov."

from: The woman said "I understood being in love and making short-sighted decisions."
to: Žena povedala: "Chápem, že som zamilovaná a robím krátkozraké rozhodnutia."

from: The woman said "At work, I regularly stepped up to lead team meetings."
to: Žena povedala: "V práci som pravidelne vystupovala ako vedúca tímových stretnutí."

from: The woman said "I don't like when clothes get stained in the washing machine."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemám rada, keď sa oblečenie v práčke zašpiní."

from: The woman said "I could make sense of it, because the showed me a diagram."
to: Žena povedala: "Mohla som to pochopiť, pretože mi ukázali schému."

from: The woman said "I enjoy doing bad things to people if it makes me laugh."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada robím ľuďom zlé veci, ak ma to rozosmeje."

from: The woman said "I drank an extraordinary amount of alcohol and still looked quite okay."
to: Žena povedala: "Vypila som mimoriadne veľa alkoholu a stále som vyzerala celkom dobre."

from: The woman said "I told them a joke but I guess it went too far."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedala som im vtip, ale asi to zašlo priďaleko."

from: The woman said "The situation was rather sketchy but I never even flinched."
to: Žena povedala: "Situácia bola dosť nejasná, ale ani som sa nezachvela."

from: The woman said "You knew almost everybody in that club!"
to: Žena povedala: "V tom klube ste poznali takmer všetkých!"

from: The woman said "I told them that no amount of wishful thinking equals proper preparations."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedala som im, že žiadne želanie sa nevyrovná riadnym prípravám."

from: The woman said "I always had a little hand disinfectant with me even before the pandemic."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som mala pri sebe trochu dezinfekcie na ruky, dokonca aj pred pandémiou."

from: The woman said "I endured the worst nightmares without ever asking for help."
to: Žena povedala: "Prežila som najhoršie nočné mory bez toho, aby som požiadala o pomoc."

from: The woman said "I accidentally got into the fight but I could defend myself pretty well."
to: Žena povedala: "Do bitky som sa dostala náhodou, ale vedela som sa celkom dobre brániť."

from: The woman said "I never showed my emotions, I prefer to solve my problems by thinking rationally."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nedávala najavo svoje emócie, radšej riešim svoje problémy racionálnym uvažovaním."

from: The woman said "I am grateful that I have children to take care of."
to: Žena povedala: "Som vďačná, že mám deti, o ktoré sa môžem starať."

from: The woman said "I am organised and efficient in my work."
to: Žena povedala: "Som organizovaná a efektívna vo svojej práci."

from: The woman said "I don't want to have a dishwasher, I like to wash dishes by myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechcem mať umývačku riadu, rada si umývam riad sama."

from: The woman said "I navigated the labyrinth, undeterred by the lurking dangers."
to: Žena povedala: "Preplávala som labyrintom, nezľakla som sa číhajúcich nebezpečenstiev."

from: The woman said "I always thought it is okay to have sex before marriage."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som si myslela, že je v poriadku mať sex pred manželstvom."

from: The woman said "Even though he was rude, I was friendly, as always."
to: Žena povedala: "Aj keď bol hrubý, bola som priateľská, ako vždy."

from: The woman said "When there was covid, I was very afraid of quarantine, I didn't want to be alone."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď bol covid, veľmi som sa bála karantény, nechcela som byť sama."

from: The woman said "I ensured a strong financial foundation for my family's long-term goals."
to: Žena povedala: "Zabezpečila som si silný finančný základ pre dlhodobé ciele mojej rodiny."

from: The woman said "I'm happy to tackle whatever fate has in store for me."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada sa vysporiadam so všetkým, čo mi osud pripraví."

from: The woman said "I would rather live at a dorm with other students than alone in a flat."
to: Žena povedala: "Radšej budem bývať na internáte s ostatnými študentmi ako sama v byte."

from: The woman said "If I wanted to, I could choose who I dated."
to: Žena povedala: "Keby som chcela, mohla by som si vybrať, s kým budem chodiť."

from: The woman said "I didn't mind my health as long as I could keep that position."
to: Žena povedala: "Nevadilo mi moje zdravie, pokiaľ som si mohla udržať túto pozíciu."

from: The woman said "Breaking through concrete and bricks, I embraced the rough physicality of the demolition job"
to: Žena povedala: "Prebíjala som sa betónom a tehlami, prijala som drsnú fyzickú prácu pri demolácii."

from: The woman said "I realise I’m tough sometimes, but discipline is what got me to this position."
to: Žena povedala: "Uvedomujem si, že som niekedy tvrdá, ale disciplína je to, čo ma dostalo na túto pozíciu."

from: The woman said "I was looking for something entirely different, but this thing won my heart."
to: Žena povedala: "Hľadala som niečo úplne iné, ale táto vec si získala moje srdce."

from: The woman said "I struggled to lift the heavy furniture while moving."
to: Žena povedala: "Pri sťahovaní som sa snažila zdvihnúť ťažký nábytok."

from: The woman said "I could afford to refuse the job, because I was sure other offers would quickly appear."
to: Žena povedala: "Mohla som si dovoliť odmietnuť túto prácu, pretože som si bola istá, že sa rýchlo objavia ďalšie ponuky."

from: The woman said "I just wanted to have fun."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som sa len zabaviť."

from: The woman said "I did not feel any stage fright when I was supposed to perform."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som mala vystúpiť, nepociťovala som žiadnu trému."

from: The woman said "I drove a really nice car so that it represents the company well."
to: Žena povedala: "Jazdila som naozaj pekným autom, aby dobre reprezentovalo spoločnosť."

from: The woman said "I knew my appearances were important for my work."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, že moje vystupovanie je pre moju prácu dôležité."

from: The woman said "I have always made decisions based on logic, not feelings."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som sa rozhodovala na základe logiky, nie pocitov."

from: The woman said "They were really strong."
to: Žena povedala: "Boli naozaj silné."

from: The woman said "I was always good at taking care of others."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som sa vedela postarať o druhých."

from: The woman said "I’m looking for a good job so I can give my family what they deserve."
to: Žena povedala: "Hľadám si dobrú prácu, aby som mohla dať svojej rodine to, čo si zaslúži."

from: The woman said "I would never wear the same clothes twice without washing them."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som si neobliekla to isté oblečenie dvakrát bez toho, aby som ho vyprala."

from: The woman said "I found my passion in expressing my emotions through art."
to: Žena povedala: "Svoju vášeň som našla vo vyjadrovaní svojich emócií prostredníctvom umenia."

from: The woman said "I dusted the bookshelves and mopped the floors every Saturday, it is a sign of a good upbringing."
to: Žena povedala: "Každú sobotu som utierala prach na policiach s knihami a umývala podlahy, to je znak dobrej výchovy."

from: The woman said "It is extremely important for me to be empathetic and get along with my staff."
to: Žena povedala: "Je pre mňa nesmierne dôležité, aby som bola empatická a vychádzala so svojimi zamestnancami."

from: The woman said "I was so exhausted after cleaning the whole house."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som taká vyčerpaná po upratovaní celého domu."

from: The woman said "I always had a lot of plants and loved taking care of them."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som mala veľa rastlín a rada som sa o ne starala."

from: The woman said "I was feeling sad without any obvious reason."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítila som sa smutná bez zjavného dôvodu."

from: The woman said "I should go out more."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala by som chodiť viac von."

from: The woman said "I didn't talk about the breakup with my friends, we talked about finances."
to: Žena povedala: "O rozchode som s priateľmi nehovorila, rozprávali sme sa o financiách."

from: The woman said "I would forgive infidelity if the family stayed intact."
to: Žena povedala: "Odpustila by som neveru, keby rodina zostala neporušená."

from: The woman said "I decided based on the data."
to: Žena povedala: "Rozhodla som sa na základe údajov."

from: The woman said "I carried my partner over the mud puddles."
to: Žena povedala: "Svojho partnera som niesla cez kaluže blata."

from: The woman said "If someone touches me, I am capable of hitting them."
to: Žena povedala: "Ak sa ma niekto dotkne, som schopná ho udrieť."

from: The woman said "I watched my favorite film and I cried."
to: Žena povedala: "Pozerala som svoj obľúbený film a plakala som."

from: The woman said "I never spent money for things I did not really need."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nemíňala peniaze na veci, ktoré som naozaj nepotrebovala."

from: The woman said "I never lied to my team."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som svojmu tímu neklamala."

from: The woman said "I knew the camera made me look even better."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, že vďaka fotoaparátu vyzerám ešte lepšie."

from: The woman said "When I learned what type of skin I have, I completely changed my wardrobe."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som sa dozvedela, aký typ pleti mám, úplne som zmenila svoj šatník."

from: The woman said "I made sure that we had enough money to cover essential expenses and save for the future."
to: Žena povedala: "Uistila som sa, že máme dostatok peňazí na pokrytie základných výdavkov a na šetrenie do budúcnosti."

from: The woman said "I worked as a guard in prison."
to: Žena povedala: "Pracovala som ako dozorkyňa vo väzení."

from: The woman said "When I felt that I need some psycho-hygiene I cleaned our apartment."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som cítila, že potrebujem psychohygienu, upratovala som náš byt."

from: The woman said "I did not stop until everything was squeaky clean and prepared for their arrival."
to: Žena povedala: "Nezastavila som sa, kým nebolo všetko čisté a pripravené na ich príchod."

from: The woman said "I often compromised my own values or beliefs to conform to the expectations of others."
to: Žena povedala: "Často som robila kompromisy vo svojich vlastných hodnotách alebo presvedčení, aby som sa prispôsobila očakávaniam iných."

from: The woman said "You should be better at handling stressful situations."
to: Žena povedala: "Mal by si lepšie zvládať stresové situácie."

from: The woman said "Maybe I should have kept smiling, even though I was in pain."
to: Žena povedala: "Možno som sa mala usmievať, aj keď som mala bolesti."

from: The woman said "I created a new training plan."
to: Žena povedala: "Vytvorila som nový tréningový plán."

from: The woman said "I'd like to try something crazy in bed."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela by som vyskúšať niečo bláznivé v posteli."

from: The woman said "I'd buy the kids toys, but I'd be the one playing with them."
to: Žena povedala: "Kúpila by som deťom hračky, ale ja by som sa s nimi hrala."

from: The woman said "I always wanted to move somewhere far to live completely off-grid."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som sa chcela presťahovať niekam ďaleko a žiť úplne mimo siete."

from: The woman said "I took a course on good leadership."
to: Žena povedala: "Absolvovala som kurz o dobrom vedení."

from: The woman said "I don’t like to beat around the bush."
to: Žena povedala: "Nerada chodím okolo horúcej kaše."

from: The woman said "I was a leader in a traditionally male-dominated company."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som vedúcou pracovníčkou v spoločnosti, v ktorej tradične dominujú muži."

from: The woman said "I am a journalist, more specifically, the editor-in-chief of the local newspaper."
to: Žena povedala: "Som novinárka, presnejšie šéfredaktorka miestnych novín."

from: The woman said "I traveled a lot so I know which tickets you need to buy."
to: Žena povedala: "Veľa som cestovala, takže viem, ktoré lístky si musíte kúpiť."

from: The woman said "I laid the foundations of this company."
to: Žena povedala: "Položila som základy tejto spoločnosti."

from: The woman said "I took my son to the amusement park, but apparently, I was more excited."
to: Žena povedala: "Vzala som syna do zábavného parku, ale zrejme som bola viac nadšená."

from: The woman said "I was very supportive when I found out about the tragedy."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som sa dozvedela o tragédii, veľmi som ju podporila."

from: The woman said "Sometimes my kids make me act hysterical."
to: Žena povedala: "Niekedy ma moje deti donútia správať sa hystericky."

from: The woman said "I had a big collection of knives."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som veľkú zbierku nožov."

from: The woman said "Yesterday I spent the whole day cleaning."
to: Žena povedala: "Včera som strávila celý deň upratovaním."

from: The woman said "I had to make a logical decision about the finance plan."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som urobiť logické rozhodnutie o finančnom pláne."

from: The woman said "My friend always jokes that I can't even hold my beer, because I'm weak."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj priateľ vždy vtipkuje, že nedokážem udržať ani pivo, pretože som slabá."

from: The woman said "I dreamt about sleeping with them tonight."
to: Žena povedala: "Dnes sa mi snívalo o tom, že s nimi spím."

from: The woman said "I bought a new motorbike."
to: Žena povedala: "Kúpila som si novú motorku."

from: The woman said "I was always aware of my good qualities."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som si bola vedomá svojich dobrých vlastností."

from: The woman said "I've also incorporated the sauna into my routine because it helps me regenerate my tired muscles."
to: Žena povedala: "Do svojho programu som zaradila aj saunu, pretože mi pomáha regenerovať unavené svaly."

from: The woman said "I was not judgmental, I simply listened."
to: Žena povedala: "Nesúdila som, len som počúvala."

from: The woman said "I registered for the competition, although I had no skills."
to: Žena povedala: "Prihlásila som sa do súťaže, hoci som nemala žiadne schopnosti."

from: The woman said "I was never scared of insects."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som sa hmyzu nebála."

from: The woman said "There is no way I would go to bed without showering."
to: Žena povedala: "V žiadnom prípade by som nešla spať bez sprchy."

from: The woman said "I dislike hearsay, it is never reliable."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemám rada reči z počutia, nikdy nie sú spoľahlivé."

from: The woman said "I participated in a community event to raise awareness and support for a cause that affected others."
to: Žena povedala: "Zúčastnila som sa na komunitnom podujatí, aby som zvýšila povedomie a podporila vec, ktorá sa týka iných."

from: The woman said "I like sex even though I consider myself to be rather conservative in these regards."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada sex, aj keď sa v tomto smere považujem za dosť konzervatívnu."

from: The woman said "I had to wash the bike before heading to town."
to: Žena povedala: "Pred cestou do mesta som si musela umyť bicykel."

from: The woman said "I bet one million dollars yesterday."
to: Žena povedala: "Včera som stavila milión dolárov."

from: The woman said "I'm not sure if you are right for that position because it contains a lot of stress and pressure."
to: Žena povedala: "Nie som si istá, či sa na túto pozíciu hodíte, pretože je v nej veľa stresu a tlaku."

from: The woman said "Not for a second have I doubted my decision."
to: Žena povedala: "Ani na sekundu som nepochybovala o svojom rozhodnutí."

from: The woman said "I didn't need any emotional support from you."
to: Žena povedala: "Nepotrebovala som od vás žiadnu emocionálnu podporu."

from: The woman said "I was never an over-achiever, I was just happy when my family was happy."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nebola príliš náročná, bola som šťastná, keď bola šťastná moja rodina."

from: The woman said "I like to use my physical fitness to defend those who cannot defend themselves."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada využívam svoju fyzickú zdatnosť na obranu tých, ktorí sa nemôžu brániť sami."

from: The woman said "I planned a whole itinerary to save money and take the most efficient route."
to: Žena povedala: "Naplánovala som si celý itinerár, aby som ušetrila peniaze a zvolila čo najefektívnejšiu trasu."

from: The woman said "I bought tickets to South America, because I decided to spend a month alone in the jungle."
to: Žena povedala: "Kúpila som si letenky do Južnej Ameriky, pretože som sa rozhodla stráviť mesiac sama v džungli."

from: The woman said "I feel like the weakest one in the gym."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítim sa ako najslabšia v telocvični."

from: The woman said "The rough bark and jagged branches tested my strength and resolve, but I embraced the arduous task."
to: Žena povedala: "Drsná kôra a rozstrapkané konáre boli skúškou mojej sily a odhodlania, ale prijala som túto náročnú úlohu."

from: The woman said "I'd like to find someone who can keep up with me."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela by som nájsť niekoho, kto so mnou udrží krok."

from: The woman said "I was sure you could never score more than me."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som si istá, že nikdy nedokážeš získať viac ako ja."

from: The woman said "I shopped for sweets our children like."
to: Žena povedala: "Nakupovala som sladkosti, ktoré majú naše deti rady."

from: The woman said "I stayed calm and focused during a high-pressure work assignment."
to: Žena povedala: "Počas pracovnej úlohy pod vysokým tlakom som zostala pokojná a sústredená."

from: The woman said "When I'm feeling down I like to go out with my friends."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď sa cítim zle, rada si vyjdem von s priateľmi."

from: The woman said "Do you think I looked good at the prom?"

from: The woman said "I carefully read the instructions before assembling the furniture."

from: The woman said "I watched a lot of pick-up artist videos hoping to find sexual partners."

from: The woman said "I went to the workshop in order to perfect my skills."

from: The woman said "I conformed to the societal expectations because I was taught to do so."

to: Žena povedala: "Hovorili mi, že to nedokážem, tak som to urobila, aby som im dokázala, že sa mýlia."

from: The woman said "The guy offended my partner, so I hit him."

from: The woman said "I never did any chores, but I brought in the money."

from: The woman said "When my friend was going through a difficult time, such as a breakup, loss, or personal struggle I always showed empathy and offered support."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď moja priateľka prechádzala ťažkým obdobím, napríklad rozchodom, stratou alebo osobným bojom, vždy som jej prejavila empatiu a ponúkla podporu."

from: The woman said "I am brave."

from: The woman said "I don't have to rely on anybody else, I can do anything by myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemusím sa spoliehať na nikoho iného, všetko zvládnem sama."

from: The woman said "I saw her alone, so I started to talk to her, so she won't feel left behind."
to: Žena povedala: "Videla som ju samú, tak som sa s ňou začala rozprávať, aby sa necítila opustená."

from: The woman said "I never left work without my task being finished."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som neodišla z práce bez toho, aby som dokončila svoju úlohu."

from: The woman said "I was the student ambassador as I could easily talk to the new students and made them feel comfortable."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som študentská veľvyslankyňa, pretože som sa mohla ľahko porozprávať s novými študentmi a cítili sa príjemne."

from: The woman said "Why do you like running so much?"
to: Žena sa spýtala: "Prečo tak rada beháš?"

from: The woman said "They were responsible, unlike the rest of the pupils."
to: Žena povedala: "Na rozdiel od ostatných žiakov boli zodpovední."

from: The woman said "I spent two hours just picking my outfit."

from: The woman said "I love receiving other people's approvals."
to: Žena povedala: "Milujem, keď ma iní ľudia schvaľujú."

from: The woman said "As a veterinarian, I conducted thorough examinations, diagnosed and treated animals' ailments."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako veterinárka som vykonávala dôkladné vyšetrenia, diagnostikovala a liečila ochorenia zvierat."

from: The woman said "I didn't care about the rules."

from: The woman said "They told me to go, but I wouldn't go alone."

from: The woman said "I have never perceived rejection as something negative."

from: The woman said "I complied with unreasonable demands or requests from others."

from: The woman said "I had to win no matter what."

from: The woman said "I set clear goals that I want to achieve."

from: The woman said "They sent me to negotiate, because I looked gentle."

from: The woman said "Don't worry, I already paid."

from: The woman said "I cycled for almost 5 hours."
to: Žena povedala: "Jazdila som na bicykli takmer 5 hodín."

from: The woman said "Because I have blond hair, people think I'm stupid."

from: The woman said "I'm really good at technical and analytical tasks."

from: The woman said "I always preferred hard or natural sciences."

from: The woman said "I took a step back from a stressful situation, allowing myself time to reflect and make a rational decision rather than reacting impulsively."
to: Žena povedala: "Urobila som krok späť zo stresovej situácie, nechala som si čas na premýšľanie a racionálne rozhodnutie namiesto impulzívnej reakcie."

from: The woman said "I showed empathy by providing comfort."
to: Žena povedala: "Prejavila som empatiu tým, že som poskytla útechu."

from: The woman said "I wonder if I am the only one who cleans up before every visit."

from: The woman said "I have my techniques that have always helped me get what I wanted."

from: The woman said "I bought this company to manage it better."

from: The woman said "I made well-informed decisions that aligned with the organization's goals and values."

to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som rada viedla iných."

from: The woman said "I often get low self-esteem when I had a rash."

from: The woman said "I was doing laundry when the phone rang."

from: The woman said "When becoming a good leader, you had to take risks and had to be accountable for the outcomes."

from: The woman said "I received an unexpected compliment from a stranger about my smile."

from: The woman said "The only one I can really rely on is myself."

from: The woman said "I used to cry every night."

from: The woman said "Validation from others made me feel really good."

from: The woman said "I joined a martial arts class and found it challenging to execute certain techniques due to my lack of strength and flexibility."

from: The woman said "I don't like to share things because they're mine."

from: The woman said "I forgot to cook dinner, because I was watching TV."

from: The woman said "I was always the head of the family."

from: The woman said "Armed with a chainsaw, I ventured into the dense forest."

from: The woman said "I assumed responsibility to avoid conflict event though I did not do anything wrong."

from: The woman said "I consider myself incompetent and, moreover, I cry a lot when I fail to save a patient."

from: The woman said "I think that science can bring us closer to objectivity."

from: The woman said "I am adaptable so I am able to handle change with ease."

from: The woman said "What do you think, am I likable?"

from: The woman said "Sometimes I am sad for no apparent reason."

from: The woman said "Every Saturday, I went clubbing with my friends, I could not bear the idea of staying at home."

to: Žena povedala: "Zúčastnila som sa športovej súťaže, ale moja fyzická slabosť mi bránila vo výkone."

from: The woman said "I like being around people all the time."

from: The woman said "In critical situations, I am calm, yet prompt."

from: The woman said "I dragged them out of the club by their collar."

from: The woman said "I think I am quite good at approaching new people."

from: The woman said "I organized a themed movie night with friends, creating a cozy atmosphere."

from: The woman said "It was a short run, but I am tired."

from: The woman said "Try to relax, you have to be tired from your work."

from: The woman said "I was very athletic and loved running."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som veľmi atletická a milovala som beh."

from: The woman said "If I lost my job, my family would be in big trouble."

to: Žena povedala: "Založila som si vlastnú spoločnosť."

to: Žena povedala: "Podlieham ľuďom, pretože si myslím, že ma budú mať radšej."

from: The woman said "I regularly reviewed insurance policies and adjusted coverage to protect my family's financial well-being."

from: The woman said "I couldn't be in a relationship where I had a lower income."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla by som byť vo vzťahu, v ktorom by som mala nižší príjem."

from: The woman said "I am very social."
to: Žena povedala: "Som veľmi spoločenská."

from: The woman said "When he needed help, I put everything aside and ran to him."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď potreboval pomoc, všetko som odložila a bežala som za ním."

from: The woman said "I should have come to the library earlier, now it is completely full."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som prísť do knižnice skôr, teraz je úplne plná."

from: The woman said "I’m hurt, no one has ever treated me like this."
to: Žena povedala: "Som zranená, nikto sa ku mne nikdy takto nesprával."

from: The woman said "I received a grant to lead my own research team."
to: Žena povedala: "Dostala som grant na vedenie vlastného výskumného tímu."

from: The woman said "Instead of getting angry when it did not work out, I stayed calm and focused on a different activity instead."
to: Žena povedala: "Namiesto toho, aby som sa hnevala, keď to nevyšlo, som zostala pokojná a sústredila sa na inú činnosť."

from: The woman said "I passed the public speaking class with straight As."
to: Žena povedala: "Na hodine verejného prejavu som prešla so samými jedničkami."

from: The woman said "I couldn't think about anything else except sex."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som myslieť na nič iné okrem sexu."

from: The woman said "I cried when I saw the little baby in the pram."
to: Žena povedala: "Rozplakala som sa, keď som videla to malé dieťa v kočíku."

from: The woman said "When they didn't invite me, I felt hurt."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď ma nepozvali, cítila som sa zranená."

from: The woman said "My mom told me that it doesn't matter if I'm not the most clever in the school as long as my hair shines the brightest."
to: Žena povedala: "Moja mama mi povedala, že nezáleží na tom, či nie som najchytrejšia v škole, ak moje vlasy žiaria najjasnejšie."

from: The woman said "I should eat more protein to build muscle."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala by som jesť viac bielkovín, aby som si vybudovala svaly."

from: The woman said "I taught my kids their first words."
to: Žena povedala: "Svoje deti som naučila prvé slová."

from: The woman said "I ventured into the untamed wilderness, ready to conquer its challenges."
to: Žena povedala: "Vydala som sa do neskrotenej divočiny, pripravená zdolať jej výzvy."

from: The woman said "I had to kick the door in."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som vykopnúť dvere."

from: The woman said "As a team leader, I made sure that everyone was involved."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako vedúca tímu som dbala na to, aby sa všetci zapojili."

from: The woman said "I took initiative to address conflicts or issues within a problematic social group."
to: Žena povedala: "Prevzala som iniciatívu pri riešení konfliktov alebo problémov v rámci problematickej sociálnej skupiny."

from: The woman said "I don't like it when I come home from the hike and I feel dirty."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemám rada, keď prídem domov z túry a cítim sa špinavá."

from: The woman said "Why did you have to make stupid comments about other people's bodies?"
to: Žena povedala: "Prečo ste museli robiť hlúpe poznámky o telách iných ľudí?"

from: The woman said "I am very communicative."
to: Žena povedala: "Som veľmi komunikatívna."

from: The woman said "I must go, because my father will be angry and I don't like when he's angry."
to: Žena povedala: "Musím ísť, lebo môj otec sa bude hnevať a ja nemám rada, keď sa hnevá."

from: The woman said "I told them my mind openly."
to: Žena povedala: "Otvorene som im povedala svoj názor."

from: The woman said "A friend of mine is going through a tough breakup, so I bought us tickets to a festival to let her get some rest."
to: Žena povedala: "Moja priateľka prežíva ťažký rozchod, tak som nám kúpila lístky na festival, aby si mohla oddýchnuť."

from: The woman said "I imagined how they'd look with no clothes on."
to: Žena povedala: "Predstavila som si, ako by vyzerali bez šiat."

from: The woman said "I considered the long-term consequences of marriage as a major life decision."
to: Žena povedala: "Zvážila som dlhodobé dôsledky manželstva ako dôležitého životného rozhodnutia."

from: The woman said "I never shunned away from hard manual work."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som sa nevyhýbala ťažkej manuálnej práci."

from: The woman said "I folded the laundry."
to: Žena povedala: "Zložila som bielizeň."

from: The woman said "What people say about me often makes me cry, I am sensitive."
to: Žena povedala: "To, čo o mne ľudia hovoria, ma často rozplače, som citlivá."

from: The woman said "He did not do anything wrong, but I was still upset."
to: Žena povedala: "Neurobil nič zlé, ale aj tak som bola rozrušená."

from: The woman said "I'm an expert in financial and business matters."
to: Žena povedala: "Som odborníčka na finančné a obchodné záležitosti."

from: The woman said "I faced the predator."
to: Žena povedala: "Stretla som sa s predátorom."

from: The woman said "I voted based on the political parties program, not the leader's charisma."
to: Žena povedala: "Volila som na základe programu politických strán, nie na základe charizmy lídra."

from: The woman said "I like it when someone compliments how I look."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada, keď mi niekto pochváli, ako vyzerám."

from: The woman said "I didn't need to try to look good, it came naturally to me."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemusela som sa snažiť vyzerať dobre, prišlo to ku mne prirodzene."

from: The woman said "I was working till midnight every day this week."
to: Žena povedala: "Tento týždeň som pracovala každý deň do polnoci."

from: The woman said "I worked for a moving company."
to: Žena povedala: "Pracovala som pre sťahovaciu spoločnosť."

from: The woman said "I could hear wolves howling in the woods, but I went there anyway."
to: Žena povedala: "Počula som v lese zavýjať vlkov, ale aj tak som tam išla."

from: The woman said "I have always loved adventure: foreign countries, wild nature."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som milovala dobrodružstvo: cudzie krajiny, divokú prírodu."

from: The woman said "I was sexually assaulted."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som sexuálne napadnutá."

from: The woman said "I don't like attention."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemám rada pozornosť."

from: The woman said "I had to call them every night before going to sleep."
to: Žena povedala: "Každý večer pred spaním som im musela zavolať."

from: The woman said "I used to love drawing in order to express my emotions."
to: Žena povedala: "Kedysi som rada kreslila, aby som vyjadrila svoje emócie."

from: The woman said "In the past I was angry about everything, but now I think hard about what I'm going to spend my energy on."
to: Žena povedala: "V minulosti som sa hnevala na všetko, ale teraz si dobre rozmyslím, na čo vynaložím svoju energiu."

from: The woman said "I am so lazy, I just want to walk around the house and do nothing."
to: Žena povedala: "Som taká lenivá, chcem sa len prechádzať po dome a nič nerobiť."

from: The woman said "I totally overreacted."
to: Žena povedala: "Úplne som to prehnala."

from: The woman said "I liked when everything was fresh and clean so I spend a lot of time doing the housework."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som rada, keď bolo všetko čerstvé a čisté, takže som trávila veľa času domácimi prácami."

from: The woman said "The adrenaline coursed through my veins as I effortlessly carried the heavy load."
to: Žena povedala: "V žilách mi koloval adrenalín, keď som bez námahy niesla ťažký náklad."

from: The woman said "I always show my books to the children to motivate them to read."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy ukazujem deťom svoje knihy, aby som ich motivovala k čítaniu."

from: The woman said "I was so tired, but I had to go on that race to prove, I can do it."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som taká unavená, ale musela som ísť na tie preteky, aby som dokázala, že to zvládnem."

from: The woman said "They didn't say anything, but I felt that they don't like me at all."
to: Žena povedala: "Nepovedali nič, ale cítila som, že ma vôbec nemajú radi."

from: The woman said "Talking to other people is healthy, it has always helped me when I was feeling down."
to: Žena povedala: "Rozprávať sa s inými ľuďmi je zdravé, vždy mi to pomohlo, keď som sa cítila zle."

from: The woman said "I wore the new shoes to the event."
to: Žena povedala: "Na podujatie som si obula nové topánky."

from: The woman said "I am determined to endure anything."
to: Žena povedala: "Som odhodlaná vydržať všetko."

from: The woman said "I've realised how important it is to have a sexually compatible partner."
to: Žena povedala: "Uvedomila som si, aké dôležité je mať sexuálne kompatibilného partnera."

from: The woman said "I liked playing football but my parents preferred dancing, so I had to stop."
to: Žena povedala: "Futbal som hrala rada, ale moji rodičia dávali prednosť tancu, takže som musela prestať."

from: The woman said "I always believed in technological progress."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som verila v technologický pokrok."

from: The woman said "I almost managed to escape the cops."
to: Žena povedala: "Takmer sa mi podarilo uniknúť policajtom."

from: The woman said "I have always adapted my plans to my partner."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som svoje plány prispôsobovala svojmu partnerovi."

from: The woman said "I am uneasy when someone close to me suffers."
to: Žena povedala: "Je mi nepríjemné, keď niekto z mojich blízkych trpí."

from: The woman said "As a team leader, I was responsible for the outcomes of our projects."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako vedúca tímu som bola zodpovedná za výsledky našich projektov."

from: The woman said "I bought tickets to the ballet because I wanted to surprise my friends."
to: Žena povedala: "Kúpila som si lístky na balet, pretože som chcela prekvapiť svojich priateľov."

from: The woman said "My partner did twenty push-ups, but I couldn't even do five."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj partner urobil dvadsať klikov, ale ja som nedokázala urobiť ani päť."

from: The woman said "I took care of my skin diligently, and it paid off when I noticed a healthy glow."
to: Žena povedala: "Starostlivo som sa starala o svoju pleť a vyplatilo sa mi to, keď som si všimla zdravý lesk."

from: The woman said "I wished to host that party and was sad when it was decided otherwise."
to: Žena povedala: "Priala som si usporiadať tento večierok a bola som smutná, keď sa rozhodlo inak."

from: The woman said "Having a strong belief in myself, I embraced new opportunities."
to: Žena povedala: "Keďže som si silno verila, chopila som sa nových príležitostí."

from: The woman said "I didn't listen to their arguments, because they hurt my feelings."
to: Žena povedala: "Nepočúvala som ich argumenty, pretože zraňovali moje city."

from: The woman said "I encountered a difficult obstacle that tested my resilience, but I felt weak and defeated."
to: Žena povedala: "Stretla som sa s ťažkou prekážkou, ktorá preverila moju odolnosť, ale cítila som sa slabá a porazená."

from: The woman said "I never failed in any area of my life."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som v žiadnej oblasti svojho života nezlyhala."

from: The woman said "They never ask me for help because they say I couldn’t handle it."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy ma nepožiadajú o pomoc, pretože hovoria, že by som to nezvládla."

from: The woman said "I am proud of my engineering expertise and problem-solving abilities."
to: Žena povedala: "Som hrdá na svoje inžinierske znalosti a schopnosti riešiť problémy."

from: The woman said "I was the provider in our family."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som živiteľkou našej rodiny."

from: The woman said "I took on additional work to increase our household income."
to: Žena povedala: "Prijala som ďalšiu prácu, aby som zvýšila príjem našej domácnosti."

from: The woman said "I was effective in setting goals and and driving my team towards them."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som efektívna pri stanovovaní cieľov a vedení svojho tímu k ich dosiahnutiu."

from: The woman said "I went to a BDSM club."
to: Žena povedala: "Chodila som do BDSM klubu."

from: The woman said "I prepared a budget for the whole trip."
to: Žena povedala: "Pripravila som si rozpočet na celú cestu."

from: The woman said "I participated in a community service project, working alongside individuals from diverse backgrounds."
to: Žena povedala: "Zúčastnila som sa na projekte verejnoprospešných prác a pracovala som s ľuďmi z rôznych prostredí."

from: The woman said "It was really a high-stress situation but I think I handled it without any problems."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola to naozaj veľmi stresujúca situácia, ale myslím, že som ju zvládla bez problémov."

from: The woman said "I have never used swear words, I find it unbecoming."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nepoužívala nadávky, považujem to za nevhodné."

from: The woman said "I like cleaning."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada upratujem."

from: The woman said "I attended a community event organized by a marginalized group to better understand their experiences and show solidarity."
to: Žena povedala: "Zúčastnila som sa komunitného podujatia, ktoré zorganizovala marginalizovaná skupina, aby som lepšie pochopila ich skúsenosti a prejavila solidaritu."

from: The woman said "People often come to me for advice because they know I am the best."
to: Žena povedala: "Ľudia za mnou často chodia po radu, pretože vedia, že som najlepšia."

from: The woman said "I did it quickly and efficiently, so they called me again."
to: Žena povedala: "Urobila som to rýchlo a efektívne, takže ma zavolali znova."

from: The woman said "I matched my makeup with my clothes."
to: Žena povedala: "Zladila som si mejkap s oblečením."

from: The woman said "In order to give my family what they deserve, I had to change careers."
to: Žena povedala: "Aby som svojej rodine dala to, čo si zaslúži, musela som zmeniť zamestnanie."

from: The woman said "I came up with the prank."
to: Žena povedala: "Ja som vymyslela ten žart."

from: The woman said "I always staked my clothes nicely."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som si šaty pekne založila."

from: The woman said "I wanted them to be happy, so I worked hard."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som, aby boli šťastní, a tak som tvrdo pracovala."

from: The woman said "I didn't like being rough."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemala som rada, keď som bola hrubá."

from: The woman said "I wanted to learn more languages to expand my professional opportunities."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som sa naučiť viac jazykov, aby som si rozšírila svoje profesionálne možnosti."

from: The woman said "I applied for the tour guide position so that I would meet new people."
to: Žena povedala: "Prihlásila som sa na pozíciu sprievodkyne, aby som spoznala nových ľudí."

from: The woman said "If only I could take care of one more cat, but my house is too full."
to: Žena povedala: "Keby som sa mohla postarať ešte o jednu mačku, ale môj dom je príliš plný."

from: The woman said "I brought some cookies for the new neighbors."
to: Žena povedala: "Priniesla som nejaké koláčiky pre nových susedov."

from: The woman said "I came to the conclusion that young people are not as responsible as my generation."
to: Žena povedala: "Dospela som k záveru, že mladí ľudia nie sú takí zodpovední ako moja generácia."

from: The woman said "I made sure I looked good on the camera."
to: Žena povedala: "Dala som si záležať na tom, aby som na kamere vyzerala dobre."

from: The woman said "When a stranger speaks to me, I imagine all sorts of scenarios of how they could hurt me."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď ma osloví cudzí človek, predstavujem si rôzne scenáre, ako by mi mohol ublížiť."

from: The woman said "I feel appreciated when someone compliments my scent."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítim sa ocenená, keď niekto pochváli moju vôňu."

from: The woman said "I like it when take care of my appearance and someone appreciates it."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada, keď sa starám o svoj vzhľad a niekto to ocení."

from: The woman said "I found my passion in lifting heavy weights."
to: Žena povedala: "Svoju vášeň som našla v dvíhaní ťažkých váh."

from: The woman said "My rough exterior matched the ruggedness of the terrain."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj drsný zovňajšok zodpovedal drsnosti terénu."

from: The woman said "I knew how to motivate my team."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, ako motivovať svoj tím."

from: The woman said "I like seeing a nice behind."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada vidím pekné pozadie."

from: The woman said "I did not even hesitate for a second."
to: Žena povedala: "Nezaváhala som ani na sekundu."

from: The woman said "I couldn't deal with all the data denying."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som sa vysporiadať so všetkým tým popieraním údajov."

from: The woman said "I went on maternity leave."
to: Žena povedala: "Išla som na materskú dovolenku."

from: The woman said "I will support my children finantially even when I am old."
to: Žena povedala: "Budem finančne podporovať svoje deti, aj keď budem stará."

from: The woman said "When I’m hungry, I get grumpy."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som hladná, som nevrlá."

from: The woman said "I promised to call but I got drunk instead."
to: Žena povedala: "Sľúbila som, že zavolám, ale namiesto toho som sa opila."

from: The woman said "I could never pretent that I do not care."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som nemohla predstierať, že ma to nezaujíma."

from: The woman said "I've always been able to face difficult situations."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som dokázala čeliť ťažkým situáciám."

from: The woman said "I chopped wood all weekend."
to: Žena povedala: "Celý víkend som rúbala drevo."

from: The woman said "I like when I have adrenaline in my life."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada, keď mám v živote adrenalín."

from: The woman said "I purchased a life insurance policy to protect my family financially in case something happens to me."
to: Žena povedala: "Kúpila som si životné poistenie, aby som finančne ochránila svoju rodinu v prípade, že sa mi niečo stane."

from: The woman said "I got so many matches on the dating app after I updated my photos."
to: Žena povedala: "Po aktualizácii svojich fotografií som v zoznamovacej aplikácii získala toľko zhodných fotografií."

from: The woman said "I always wanted to do things my way, no matter what."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som chcela robiť veci po svojom, nech sa deje čokoľvek."

from: The woman said "I am sure karma works."
to: Žena povedala: "Som si istá, že karma funguje."

from: The woman said "I beat that record so easily."
to: Žena povedala: "Tak ľahko som ten rekord prekonala."

from: The woman said "I like when nobody notices me."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada, keď si ma nikto nevšíma."

from: The woman said "I could easily swim for hours."
to: Žena povedala: "Kľudne by som mohla plávať celé hodiny."

from: The woman said "I insisted they wash their hands before eating."
to: Žena povedala: "Trvala som na tom, aby si pred jedlom umyli ruky."

from: The woman said "Apparently, I’m the only one who thinks flip-flops are disgusting."
to: Žena povedala: "Zrejme som jediná, kto si myslí, že žabky sú nechutné."

from: The woman said "I like to have a lot of clothes so I can decide what to wear."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada veľa oblečenia, aby som sa mohla rozhodnúť, čo si oblečiem."

to: Žena povedala: "Povedala som, že je našou povinnosťou starať sa o našu planétu."

from: The woman said "I was never late paying my bills."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nemeškala s platením účtov."

from: The woman said "I did not understand how they could keep going, I just had to give up."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechápala som, ako môžu pokračovať, jednoducho som to musela vzdať."

from: The woman said "I was always financially literate."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som bola finančne gramotná."

from: The woman said "I didn't care about how it looked, I cared about how it worked."

from: The woman said "I used to binge eat a lot after arguments."
to: Žena povedala: "Po hádkach som sa často prejedala."

from: The woman said "I felt a sense of awe, but fear did not grip me."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítila som bázeň, ale strach ma nezachvátil."

from: The woman said "I couldn't hold myself, I had to protect you."
