from: The woman said "I offered words of encouragement and support to a friend."
to: Žena povedala: "Ponúkla som priateľovi slová povzbudenia a podpory."

from: The woman said "People often approached me at social gatherings, seeking conversation because they thought I was good-looking and approachable."
to: Žena povedala: "Ľudia ma často oslovovali na spoločenských stretnutiach a hľadali rozhovor, pretože si mysleli, že dobre vyzerám a som prístupná."

from: The woman said "I studied the background before taking on the job."
to: Žena povedala: "Predtým, ako som prijala túto prácu, som si preštudovala pozadie."

from: The woman said "I need to talk to someone, but I feel like I'd just be bothering that person."
to: Žena povedala: "Potrebujem sa s niekým porozprávať, ale mám pocit, že by som tú osobu len obťažovala."

from: The woman said "I went to the city council so you don't have to go."
to: Žena povedala: "Išla som na mestskú radu, takže nemusíte ísť."

from: The woman said "I sometimes found it challenging to control my sexual impulses."
to: Žena povedala: "Niekedy bolo pre mňa náročné kontrolovať svoje sexuálne impulzy."

from: The woman said "I am commited to my company."
to: Žena povedala: "Som zaviazaná svojej spoločnosti."

from: The woman said "I showed my rival a middle finger."
to: Žena povedala: "Ukázala som svojmu súperovi prostredník."

from: The woman said "I would never admit that I could lose."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som nepripustila, že by som mohla prehrať."

from: The woman said "I went to pick up my weapon license yesterday."
to: Žena povedala: "Včera som si išla vyzdvihnúť zbrojný preukaz."

from: The woman said "The engine died, so I pushed the car to the sidewalk."
to: Žena povedala: "Motor zhasol, tak som auto odtlačila na chodník."

from: The woman said "I had to ask for help with the suitacases because they were just too heavy."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som požiadať o pomoc s kuframi, pretože boli príliš ťažké."

from: The woman said "I wanted to give a presentation about finances because it can attract new clients."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som urobiť prezentáciu o financiách, pretože to môže prilákať nových klientov."

from: The woman said "I worked a lot to provide for my partner who did not have a job."
to: Žena povedala: "Veľa som pracovala, aby som zabezpečila svojho partnera, ktorý nemal prácu."

from: The woman said "I am successful because I am disciplined."
to: Žena povedala: "Som úspešná, pretože som disciplinovaná."

from: The woman said "I studied at Oxford."
to: Žena povedala: "Študovala som na Oxforde."

from: The woman said "I'm good at handling physically challenging situations."
to: Žena povedala: "Dobre zvládam fyzicky náročné situácie."

from: The woman said "I expected the promotion to the company team leader."
to: Žena povedala: "Očakávala som povýšenie na vedúcu tímu spoločnosti."

from: The woman said "I reveled in the adrenaline rush."
to: Žena povedala: "Vychutnávala som si ten adrenalín."

from: The woman said "I wish there would be more people at this party."
to: Žena povedala: "Priala by som si, aby na tejto párty bolo viac ľudí."

from: The woman said "I could not open the mineral water and asked for help."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som otvoriť minerálnu vodu a požiadala som o pomoc."

from: The woman said "I cooked dinner for the entire family yesterday."
to: Žena povedala: "Včera som uvarila večeru pre celú rodinu."

from: The woman said "They complimented the lawn and told me I cut it like a true gardener."
to: Žena povedala: "Pochválili mi trávnik a povedali, že ho kosím ako pravý záhradník."

from: The woman said "I received compliments from friends and family on my stunning appearance for a special occasion."
to: Žena povedala: "Priatelia a rodina mi pri špeciálnej príležitosti zložili poklonu za môj úžasný vzhľad."

from: The woman said "I didn't want to stay alone."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechcela som zostať sama."

from: The woman said "I would have said yes, but it didn't feel right."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedala by som áno, ale nezdalo sa mi to správne."

from: The woman said "I've been through hell, but I'm stronger today because of it."
to: Žena povedala: "Prešla som si peklom, ale dnes som vďaka tomu silnejšia."

from: The woman said "What made you think, I couldn't do it?!"
to: Žena povedala: "Prečo si myslíš, že to nedokážem?"

from: The woman said "I completely understood their situation."
to: Žena povedala: "Úplne som pochopila ich situáciu."

from: The woman said "I actively sought opportunities to increase my income to provide a better financial future for my family."
to: Žena povedala: "Aktívne som hľadala možnosti, ako zvýšiť svoj príjem, aby som svojej rodine zabezpečila lepšiu finančnú budúcnosť."

from: The woman said "I carefully read and compared the terms and interest rates of different credit cards."
to: Žena povedala: "Starostlivo som si prečítala a porovnala podmienky a úrokové sadzby rôznych kreditných kariet."

from: The woman said "The sweat dripping down my face was a testament to the intense physical exertion I had just undergone."
to: Žena povedala: "Pot, ktorý mi stekal po tvári, svedčil o intenzívnej fyzickej námahe, ktorú som práve podstúpila."

from: The woman said "When I wore the new uniform, I got a huge tip."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som si obliekla novú uniformu, dostala som obrovské prepitné."

from: The woman said "I was entitled, always expecting others to cater to my needs."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som nárok, vždy som očakávala, že ostatní budú uspokojovať moje potreby."

from: The woman said "I am determined to protect my family and I will do whatever it takes to do so."
to: Žena povedala: "Som rozhodnutá ochrániť svoju rodinu a urobím pre to všetko."

from: The woman said "I never understood why people trust fortune tellers."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nepochopila, prečo ľudia veria veštcom."

from: The woman said "I thought crying was showing weakness."
to: Žena povedala: "Myslela som si, že plač je prejavom slabosti."

from: The woman said "Kindness is something I valued in myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Láskavosť je niečo, čo si na sebe cením."

from: The woman said "With a powerful leap, I cleared the high bar, defying gravity."
to: Žena povedala: "Silným skokom som prekonala vysokú latku a vzoprela som sa gravitácii."

from: The woman said "As I entered the exam room, I embraced my preparation and knowledge, radiating quiet confidence."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som vstúpila do vyšetrovacej miestnosti, prijala som svoju prípravu a vedomosti a vyžarovala zo mňa pokojná sebadôvera."

from: The woman said "I knew that my good looks always made things a bit easier."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, že môj dobrý vzhľad vždy všetko uľahčuje."

from: The woman said "I could not wait to go to the wedding and meet all your friends."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som sa dočkať, až pôjdem na svadbu a stretnem všetkých vašich priateľov."

from: The woman said "I've made it a tradition that every Christmas I buy a gift at one of the benefit stores."
to: Žena povedala: "Zaviedla som si tradíciu, že každé Vianoce kupujem darček v niektorom z obchodov s benefitmi."

from: The woman said "I was told I am submissive, so it must be true."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedali mi, že som submisívna, takže to musí byť pravda."

from: The woman said "I used my culinary skills to start a catering business to meet our family's financial goals."
to: Žena povedala: "Využila som svoje kulinárske zručnosti a založila som si podnikanie v oblasti stravovania, aby som splnila finančné ciele našej rodiny."

from: The woman said "I have never said no to him."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som mu nepovedala nie."

from: The woman said "No amount of persuasion worked, because I had already decided based on how I felt."
to: Žena povedala: "Žiadne presviedčanie nezabralo, pretože som sa už rozhodla na základe toho, čo som cítila."

from: The woman said "They sent me, because I was the most courageous of them."
to: Žena povedala: "Poslali ma, lebo som bola z nich najodvážnejšia."

from: The woman said "If it were up to me, I would walk around naked."
to: Žena povedala: "Keby to bolo na mne, chodila by som nahá."

from: The woman said "I worked hard so we can afford nice things."
to: Žena povedala: "Tvrdo som pracovala, aby sme si mohli dovoliť pekné veci."

from: The woman said "I just could not stop talking and gossiping!"
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som prestať rozprávať a klebetiť!"

from: The woman said "I like to party every Saturday."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada sa zabávam každú sobotu."

from: The woman said "I carefully compared the terms and conditions of different insurance policies."
to: Žena povedala: "Starostlivo som porovnala podmienky rôznych poistných zmlúv."

from: The woman said "I've read some books on that topic, so I think you could use my help."
to: Žena povedala: "Čítala som nejaké knihy na túto tému, takže si myslím, že by ste mohli využiť moju pomoc."

from: The woman said "I never underestimated myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som sa nepodceňovala."

from: The woman said "My high sex drive created a disparity in the frequency of intimacy, leading to frustration."
to: Žena povedala: "Moja vysoká sexuálna túžba spôsobila nepomer vo frekvencii intimity, čo viedlo k frustrácii."

from: The woman said "My mother taught me cleanliness and I taught it to my children too."
to: Žena povedala: "Moja matka ma naučila čistote a naučila som to aj svoje deti."

from: The woman said "I always separate my work life from my private life."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy oddeľujem svoj pracovný život od súkromného."

from: The woman said "I could not stand it when they started talking about astrology."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som vystáť, keď začali hovoriť o astrológii."

from: The woman said "When I said it was important for me to find out sexual compatibility, they looked at me strangely."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som povedala, že je pre mňa dôležité zistiť sexuálnu kompatibilitu, pozerali sa na mňa divne."

from: The woman said "I like talking to people on the phone, but I like meeting them even more."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada hovorím s ľuďmi po telefóne, ale ešte radšej sa s nimi stretávam."

from: The woman said "I hid all the candy so no one would eat it."
to: Žena povedala: "Schovala som všetky sladkosti, aby ich nikto nezjedol."

from: The woman said "I am happy when people trust me enough to confide in me with their problems"
to: Žena povedala: "Som šťastná, keď mi ľudia dôverujú natoľko, že sa mi zveria so svojimi problémami."

from: The woman said "Sex was the most important part of our relationship, when its frequency declined over time, I lost interest."
to: Žena povedala: "Sex bol najdôležitejšou súčasťou nášho vzťahu, keď sa jeho frekvencia časom znížila, stratila som záujem."

from: The woman said "I never leave things to the last minute, I’m too responsible for that."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy nenechávam veci na poslednú chvíľu, na to som príliš zodpovedná."

from: The woman said "I did not need notes for that important presentation."
to: Žena povedala: "Na tú dôležitú prezentáciu som nepotrebovala poznámky."

from: The woman said "Taking care of my family financially makes me happy."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď sa finančne starám o svoju rodinu, som šťastná."

from: The woman said "I bought fireworks because I can't imagine New Year's Eve without them."
to: Žena povedala: "Kúpila som si ohňostroj, pretože si bez neho neviem predstaviť Silvestra."

from: The woman said "I am always sure that I know what I am doing."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som si istá, že viem, čo robím."

from: The woman said "I would like to have an ice cream for dinner."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela by som si dať na večeru zmrzlinu."

from: The woman said "During the Covid pandemic, it was very difficult for me to stay at home without talking to my friends in person, I felt so lonely."
to: Žena povedala: "Počas pandémie Covid bolo pre mňa veľmi ťažké zostať doma bez toho, aby som sa osobne rozprávala so svojimi priateľmi, cítila som sa taká osamelá."

from: The woman said "I was happy when they did as I said."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som šťastná, keď urobili, čo som povedala."

from: The woman said "I was the company representative."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som zástupcom spoločnosti."

from: The woman said "I don't like going to the gym."
to: Žena povedala: "Nerada chodím do posilňovne."

from: The woman said "If I didn't have my current job, I would enjoy creating fragrances."
to: Žena povedala: "Keby som nemala svoju súčasnú prácu, bavilo by ma vytvárať vône."

from: The woman said "As a team leader, I provided guidance to the younger team members."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako vedúca tímu som usmerňovala mladších členov tímu."

from: The woman said "It was my duty to make sure I am financially stable before getting married."
to: Žena povedala: "Bolo mojou povinnosťou uistiť sa, že som finančne stabilná, kým sa vydám."

from: The woman said "I texted my lawyer to make sure the contract is good."
to: Žena povedala: "Napísala som svojmu právnikovi, aby sa uistil, že zmluva je dobrá."

from: The woman said "I could easily become a model."
to: Žena povedala: "Mohla by som sa ľahko stať modelkou."

from: The woman said "I like numbers because they never lie."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada čísla, pretože nikdy neklamú."

from: The woman said "I tried arguing with them but I just couldnt."
to: Žena povedala: "Snažila som sa s nimi hádať, ale jednoducho som nemohla."

from: The woman said "I know I am capable of great things."
to: Žena povedala: "Viem, že som schopná veľkých vecí."

from: The woman said "I felt confident when guiding others."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítila som sa sebaisto, keď som viedla ostatných."

from: The woman said "A tree fell, so I called the fire department because I couldn't carry it myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Spadol strom, tak som zavolala hasičov, pretože som ho sama nemohla odniesť."

from: The woman said "He knew that when he was sad he could always come to me and I would hear him out."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedel, že keď je smutný, vždy môže prísť za mnou a ja ho vypočujem."

from: The woman said "I never had a problem thinking clearly and rationally."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nemala problém myslieť jasne a racionálne."

from: The woman said "I solved the problem quickly and efficiently."
to: Žena povedala: "Problém som vyriešila rýchlo a efektívne."

from: The woman said "I don't like serious adults who forgot what it's like to be young."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemám rada vážnych dospelých, ktorí zabudli, aké je to byť mladý."

from: The woman said "I attended a storytelling event, listening to and sharing personal stories."
to: Žena povedala: "Zúčastnila som sa na podujatí rozprávania príbehov, kde som počúvala a zdieľala osobné príbehy."

from: The woman said "I love it when someone approaches me with a question about fashion."
to: Žena povedala: "Milujem, keď ma niekto osloví s otázkou o móde."

from: The woman said "Family is important to me and I feel like I should be making more money so they can be happier."
to: Žena povedala: "Rodina je pre mňa dôležitá a mám pocit, že by som mala zarábať viac peňazí, aby boli šťastnejší."

from: The woman said "I had to get a job, or we wouldn’t have anything to eat."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som si nájsť prácu, inak by sme nemali čo jesť."

from: The woman said "I am rough."
to: Žena povedala: "Som drsná."

from: The woman said "I mentored junior team members."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som mentorom mladších členov tímu."

from: The woman said "I could easily do stand-up comedy."
to: Žena povedala: "Mohla by som pokojne robiť stand-up komédiu."

from: The woman said "I have a classmate who loves being surrounded by other people."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám spolužiaka, ktorý je rád obklopený inými ľuďmi."

from: The woman said "I planned the trip a month in advance."
to: Žena povedala: "Výlet som si naplánovala mesiac vopred."

from: The woman said "I didn't want to pet the dog, because it would get hair all over me."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechcela som hladkať psa, pretože by ma celý ochlpený."

from: The woman said "I'm naturally better at technical subjects."
to: Žena povedala: "Som prirodzene lepšia v technických predmetoch."

from: The woman said "I called someone to come fix the pool so that the kids could have some fun."
to: Žena povedala: "Zavolala som niekoho, aby prišiel opraviť bazén, aby sa deti mohli zabaviť."

from: The woman said "I did not need love or commitment to engage in a sexual relationship."
to: Žena povedala: "Nepotrebovala som lásku ani záväzok, aby som nadviazala sexuálny vzťah."

from: The woman said "I wanted to eat nothing but raw beef."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechcela som jesť nič iné ako surové hovädzie mäso."

from: The woman said "I did not want to grow up and act my age, I wanted to be free."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechcela som dospieť a hrať sa na svoju rovesníčku, chcela som byť slobodná."

from: The woman said "They said I did a good job."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedali, že som odviedla dobrú prácu."

from: The woman said "I was hungry, but I waited for them."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som hladná, ale počkala som na nich."

from: The woman said "I made sure I was the last to leave the office."
to: Žena povedala: "Dala som si záležať na tom, aby som z kancelárie odišla ako posledná."

from: The woman said "I was always available to come help in case they needed something."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som bola k dispozícii, aby som prišla pomôcť, ak by niečo potrebovali."

from: The woman said "I won an award for the job."
to: Žena povedala: "Za túto prácu som získala ocenenie."

from: The woman said "Why did you change the bulb when I told you, I'd do it?"
to: Žena sa spýtala: "Prečo ste vymenili žiarovku, keď som vám povedala, že to urobím?"

from: The woman said "I struggled with excerting my dominance."
to: Žena povedala: "Bojovala som s presadzovaním svojej dominancie."

from: The woman said "I won the Scientist of the Year award."
to: Žena povedala: "Vyhrala som cenu Vedec roka."

from: The woman said "I am saddest when I have no company."
to: Žena povedala: "Najsmutnejšia som, keď nemám spoločnosť."

from: The woman said "I surround myself with plants because that's the only time I'm calm and fully focused."
to: Žena povedala: "Obklopujem sa rastlinami, pretože len vtedy som pokojná a plne sústredená."

from: The woman said "I could not bear to touch the mushroom knowing there might be a worm in it."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som sa dotknúť huby, keď som vedela, že v nej môže byť červ."

from: The woman said "I followed my goals and that's why I made it."
to: Žena povedala: "Išla som za svojimi cieľmi, a preto sa mi to podarilo."

from: The woman said "Maybe it is time for you to show me what you have under the clothes."
to: Žena povedala: "Možno je čas, aby si mi ukázal, čo máš pod šatami."

from: The woman said "I was so bored I just called my friends randomly."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som taká znudená, že som náhodne zavolala svojim priateľom."

from: The woman said "They warned me not to go there, but I went anyway."
to: Žena povedala: "Varovali ma, aby som tam nechodila, ale aj tak som išla."

from: The woman said "I confidently posed for a photo."
to: Žena povedala: "Sebavedomo som pózovala na fotografiu."

from: The woman said "I love buying things spontaneously."
to: Žena povedala: "Milujem spontánne nákupy."

from: The woman said "You are horrible at navigating."
to: Žena povedala: "Ste hrozný v navigácii."

from: The woman said "When I lose my nerves, I could be a bit aggressive."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď stratím nervy, môžem byť trochu agresívna."

from: The woman said "I cracked a joke that was not taken well."
to: Žena povedala: "Urobila som vtip, ktorý nebol dobre prijatý."

from: The woman said "I couldn't function without exercising."
to: Žena povedala: "Bez cvičenia by som nemohla fungovať."

from: The woman said "I'm the one who brings home the money."
to: Žena povedala: "To ja nosím domov peniaze."

from: The woman said "I knew it'd be risky, but I had to do it."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, že to bude riskantné, ale musela som to urobiť."

from: The woman said "I heard they’re opening a new clothing store."
to: Žena povedala: "Počula som, že otvárajú nový obchod s oblečením."

from: The woman said "I was always the one who earned the most."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som bola tá, ktorá zarábala najviac."

from: The woman said "I was heartbroken when they cancelled the visit."
to: Žena povedala: "Zlomilo mi srdce, keď zrušili návštevu."

from: The woman said "It was clear to me that I would get the job, I knew that my competitors could not match my level of confidence."
to: Žena povedala: "Bolo mi jasné, že tú prácu dostanem, vedela som, že moji konkurenti sa mi nemôžu rovnať."

from: The woman said "I watched a lot of porn growing up."
to: Žena povedala: "V detstve som sledovala veľa porna."

from: The woman said "I tried to do a series of pull-ups, but my grip strength was weak, and I couldn't sustain the exercise for long."
to: Žena povedala: "Snažila som sa urobiť sériu príťahov, ale moja sila úchopu bola slabá a nedokázala som dlho vydržať cvičiť."

from: The woman said "My friends considered me a very sociable person and they were right, I could not bear loneliness."
to: Žena povedala: "Moji priatelia ma považovali za veľmi spoločenskú osobu a mali pravdu, neznášala som samotu."

from: The woman said "I've never been so lazy that I wouldn't make my bed."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nebola taká lenivá, aby som si neustlala posteľ."

from: The woman said "I organized a fundraiser to support a charitable cause."
to: Žena povedala: "Zorganizovala som finančnú zbierku na podporu charitatívnej akcie."

from: The woman said "I have strong sexual desires ."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám silné sexuálne túžby."

from: The woman said "I do not need a map, I never got lost before."
to: Žena povedala: "Nepotrebujem mapu, ešte nikdy som sa nestratila."

from: The woman said "I conducted thorough research and read reviews before purchasing a new washing machine."
to: Žena povedala: "Pred kúpou novej práčky som si urobila dôkladný prieskum a prečítala recenzie."

from: The woman said "I joined a hobby group and actively participated in the meetings."
to: Žena povedala: "Pripojila som sa k záujmovej skupine a aktívne som sa zúčastňovala na stretnutiach."

from: The woman said "When people need to lift something heavy, I'm the first one they think of."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď ľudia potrebujú zdvihnúť niečo ťažké, ako prvá si spomenú na mňa."

from: The woman said "I evaluated the pros and cons of different mobile phone models before buying one."
to: Žena povedala: "Pred kúpou mobilného telefónu som zhodnotila výhody a nevýhody rôznych modelov."

from: The woman said "I like to keep the stove clean at all times."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada udržiavam sporák vždy čistý."

from: The woman said "I could never let others decide for me."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som nedovolila, aby za mňa rozhodovali iní."

from: The woman said "People need someone they can rely on, which is why I decided to enter politics."
to: "Ľudia potrebujú niekoho, na koho sa môžu spoľahnúť, a preto som sa rozhodla vstúpiť do politiky."

from: The woman said "I struggled to lift the heavy boxes."
to: Žena povedala: "Ťažko som zdvíhala ťažké škatule."

from: The woman said "I had a fearless mindset."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som nebojácne zmýšľanie."

from: The woman said "I provided material support for my family."
to: Žena povedala: "Poskytovala som rodine materiálnu podporu."

from: The woman said "I like bright colours because they make tanned skin stand out."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada svetlé farby, pretože vďaka nim vynikne opálená pokožka."

from: The woman said "As a software engineer, I collaborated with my team to develop innovative solutions, wrote clean and efficient code, and thoroughly tested the software before deployment."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako softvérová inžinierka som spolupracovala so svojím tímom na vývoji inovatívnych riešení, písala som čistý a efektívny kód a dôkladne som testovala softvér pred jeho nasadením."

from: The woman said "I'm capable of handling any escalated situation because, in a strong body, there's a strong mind."
to: Žena povedala: "Som schopná zvládnuť akúkoľvek vyhrotenú situáciu, pretože v silnom tele je silná myseľ."

from: The woman said "I was elected a prime minister."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som zvolená za premiérku."

from: The woman said "I needed help with those heavy bags but you never picked up the phone!"
to: Žena povedala: "Potrebovala som pomôcť s tými ťažkými taškami, ale vy ste mi nikdy nezdvihli telefón!"

from: The woman said "I alternated among several sexual partners during the same period."
to: Žena povedala: "Počas toho istého obdobia som vystriedala niekoľko sexuálnych partnerov."

from: The woman said "Being the leader meant shouldering the responsibility of motivating and inspiring my team members, helping them unlock their full potential."
to: Žena povedala: "Byť vedúcou znamenalo prevziať zodpovednosť za motiváciu a inšpiráciu členov môjho tímu a pomôcť im naplno rozvinúť ich potenciál."

from: The woman said "I want to be strong to be able to protect my family."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcem byť silná, aby som mohla chrániť svoju rodinu."

from: The woman said "I faced a physical challenge that required endurance, but I was not strong enough."
to: Žena povedala: "Stála som pred fyzickou výzvou, ktorá si vyžadovala vytrvalosť, ale nebola som dostatočne silná."

from: The woman said "I don't like going to bed before shower."
to: Žena povedala: "Nerada chodím spať pred sprchou."

from: The woman said "My friend always makes quick and good decisions."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj priateľ sa vždy rozhoduje rýchlo a dobre."

from: The woman said "I was always a good listener."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som bola dobrá poslucháčka."

from: The woman said "I was selected for a modeling gig based on my good looks and ability to captivate the camera."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som vybraná na modelingovú prácu na základe môjho dobrého vzhľadu a schopnosti zaujať kameru."

from: The woman said "One bad look made me cry."
to: Žena povedala: "Jeden zlý pohľad ma rozplakal."

from: The woman said "I explored alternative income sources to diversify our family's income."
to: Žena povedala: "Preskúmala som alternatívne zdroje príjmu, aby som diverzifikovala príjem našej rodiny."

from: The woman said "I need to find a job in services because I like human contact."
to: Žena povedala: "Musím si nájsť prácu v službách, pretože mám rada kontakt s ľuďmi."

from: The woman said "I couldn't wish for a nicer figure, because mine is already perfect."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemôžem si priať krajšiu postavu, pretože tá moja je už dokonalá."

from: The woman said "I always wanted to be a detective or a cop."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som chcela byť detektívkou alebo policajtkou."

from: The woman said "I had to call someone to help me with cleaning the pool, my hands hurt after only 10 minutes of trying."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som zavolať niekoho, aby mi pomohol s čistením bazéna, ruky ma boleli už po 10 minútach snaženia."

from: The woman said "I've always attended fashion shows because they are extremely inspiring."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som chodila na módne prehliadky, pretože sú veľmi inšpiratívne."

from: The woman said "I need to make money to take care of my partner."
to: Žena povedala: "Potrebujem zarobiť peniaze, aby som sa mohla postarať o svojho partnera."

from: The woman said "I have never paid much attention to other people's opinions because I usually know better."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nevenovala veľkú pozornosť názorom iných ľudí, pretože ja to zvyčajne viem lepšie."

from: The woman said "I spent this weekend in the shopping center buying some clothes for myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Tento víkend som strávila v nákupnom centre, kde som si kupovala oblečenie."

from: The woman said "I didn't volunteer, because they needed someone muscular."
to: Žena povedala: "Neprihlásila som sa, pretože potrebovali niekoho svalnatého."

from: The woman said "I have always wanted to be a positive role model for my children."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som chcela byť pozitívnym vzorom pre svoje deti."

from: The woman said "I used to always finish all my assignment on time."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som dokončila všetky svoje úlohy načas."

from: The woman said "Sweat dripped down my forehead as I gripped the heavy barbell, preparing for another intense set."
to: Žena povedala: "Pot mi stekal po čele, keď som zvierala ťažkú činku a pripravovala sa na ďalšiu intenzívnu sériu."

from: The woman said "I went to the disco with the sole purpose of finding a one night stand."
to: Žena povedala: "Išla som na diskotéku s jediným cieľom - nájsť si partnera na jednu noc."

from: The woman said "I constantly needed attention from my partner, if I was ignored for a longer period of time, it would make me angry."
to: Žena povedala: "Neustále som potrebovala pozornosť svojho partnera, ak by ma dlhšie ignoroval, nahnevalo by ma to."

from: The woman said "I bought pumpkins so we could carve them together."
to: Žena povedala: "Kúpila som tekvice, aby sme ich mohli vyrezávať spolu."

from: The woman said "Why should I join in on this chaotic attempt?"
to: Žena sa opýtala: "Prečo by som sa mala zapojiť do tohto chaotického pokusu?"

from: The woman said "I wanted to stay in touch with everyone from my highschool, but it was not possible."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som byť v kontakte so všetkými zo strednej školy, ale nebolo to možné."

from: The woman said "I came to visit them at the hospital almost every day."
to: Žena povedala: "Chodila som ich navštevovať do nemocnice takmer každý deň."

from: The woman said "I was looking forward to my new job because I knew that I'd make a lot of new friends there."
to: Žena povedala: "Tešila som sa na novú prácu, pretože som vedela, že si tam nájdem veľa nových priateľov."

from: The woman said "I thought that without my help, they'd never have managed on time."
to: Žena povedala: "Myslela som si, že bez mojej pomoci by to nikdy nezvládli načas."

from: The woman said "I had to ask them to change my glass, it was really dirty."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som ich požiadať, aby mi vymenili sklo, bolo naozaj špinavé."

from: The woman said "I carried the safe down the stairs."
to: Žena povedala: "Trezor som odniesla po schodoch."

from: The woman said "I am extremely discerning when it comes to choosing a sexual partner."
to: Žena povedala: "Pri výbere sexuálneho partnera som veľmi náročná."

from: The woman said "I’m happiest when my whole apartment is tidy."
to: Žena povedala: "Najšťastnejšia som, keď mám uprataný celý byt."

from: The woman said "I got a cat just so that I have something to care for."
to: Žena povedala: "Kočku som si zaobstarala len preto, aby som sa mala o čo starať."

from: The woman said "It is of utmost importance for me to act professionally under all circumstances because I am a professional."
to: Žena povedala: "Je pre mňa mimoriadne dôležité, aby som za každých okolností konala profesionálne, pretože som profesionálka."

from: The woman said "I was compassionate."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som súcitná."

from: The woman said "My head was spinning after I finished moving the boxes."
to: Žena povedala: "Po skončení prenášania krabíc sa mi zatočila hlava."

from: The woman said "I like to talk to my staff to find out what I can improve."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada sa rozprávam so svojimi zamestnancami, aby som zistila, čo môžem zlepšiť."

from: The woman said "I took the time to clean and organize my closet, sorting clothes by category."
to: Žena povedala: "Venovala som čas upratovaniu a usporiadaniu svojho šatníka a roztriedila som oblečenie podľa kategórií."

from: The woman said "I am determined to take risks."
to: Žena povedala: "Som odhodlaná riskovať."

from: The woman said "I like nice clothes."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada pekné oblečenie."

from: The woman said "I never enjoyed staying alone."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nebola rada sama."

from: The woman said "I was chosen as the face of a fashion campaign due to my good looks."
to: Žena povedala: "Za tvár módnej kampane som bola vybraná vďaka svojmu dobrému vzhľadu."

from: The woman said "I was at a congress with colleagues last week."
to: Žena povedala: "Minulý týždeň som bola na kongrese s kolegami."

from: The woman said "I always feel bad after an argument."
to: Žena povedala: "Po hádke sa vždy cítim zle."

from: The woman said "I panicked when I got a flat tyre."
to: Žena povedala: "Spanikárila som, keď som pichla pneumatiku."

from: The woman said "I didn't care about what could have happened to me."
to: Žena povedala: "Nezáležalo mi na tom, čo sa mi mohlo stať."

from: The woman said "Part of the interview for a flight attendant was an actual excercise to see if I could lift the heavy suitaceses."
to: Žena povedala: "Súčasťou pohovoru na miesto letušky bolo skutočné cvičenie, aby sa zistilo, či dokážem zdvihnúť ťažké obleky."

from: The woman said "At first I was a bit afraid there would be no people my age to hang out with."
to: Žena povedala: "Najprv som sa trochu bála, že tam nebudú ľudia v mojom veku, s ktorými by som sa mohla stretávať."

from: The woman said "My nephew has skin problems, so I paid for his holiday by the sea."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj synovec má kožné problémy, tak som mu zaplatila dovolenku pri mori."

from: The woman said "I did drugs."
to: Žena povedala: "Brala som drogy."

from: The woman said "I felt so exhausted."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítila som sa taká vyčerpaná."

from: The woman said "They company needed someone beautiful for the video, so I took the job."
to: Žena povedala: "Spoločnosť potrebovala niekoho krásneho do videa, tak som to vzala."

from: The woman said "I like crossfit, it's good for building dynamic strength."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada crossfit, je to dobré na budovanie dynamickej sily."

from: The woman said "I am the one who manages the family finances."
to: Žena povedala: "Ja som tá, ktorá spravuje rodinné financie."

from: The woman said "I always like to give back when someone helps me."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy sa rada odvďačím, keď mi niekto pomôže."

from: The woman said "I planned our finances for the next year."
to: Žena povedala: "Naplánovala som naše financie na nasledujúci rok."

from: The woman said "I made the most rational choice."
to: Žena povedala: "Rozhodla som sa najracionálnejšie."

from: The woman said "I trekked druing the storm even though they warned me not to."
to: Žena povedala: "Vydala som sa na túru proti búrke, aj keď ma varovali, aby som to nerobila."

from: The woman said "I like it when others make decisions for me."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada, keď za mňa rozhodujú iní."

from: The woman said "I was happy that I was in demand."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som šťastná, že som bola žiadaná."

from: The woman said "I would never make a decision based on my emotions."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som sa nerozhodovala na základe emócií."

from: The woman said "I subscribed to yet another fashion magazine."
to: Žena povedala: "Predplatila som si ďalší módny časopis."

from: The woman said "I engaged in deep conversations with a friend who was questioning their life choices."
to: Žena povedala: "Viedla som hlboké rozhovory s priateľom, ktorý spochybňoval svoje životné rozhodnutia."

from: The woman said "Let's talk, I will be happy to meet you tomorrow!"
to: Žena povedala: "Poďme sa porozprávať, rada sa s vami zajtra stretnem!"

from: The woman said "My bathroom was always spotless."
to: Žena povedala: "Moja kúpeľňa bola vždy bezchybná."

from: The woman said "I could never wear such a sweaty shirt."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som si nemohla obliecť také prepotené tričko."

from: The woman said "I like to lead by example."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada idem príkladom."

from: The woman said "I didn't clean my bathroom for a month because I did not feel like doing it."
to: Žena povedala: "Mesiac som si neumývala kúpeľňu, lebo sa mi nechcelo."

from: The woman said "I have never doubted my own competence."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nepochybovala o svojich schopnostiach."

from: The woman said "I was the boss of this company."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som šéfkou tejto spoločnosti."

from: The woman said "For my fiftieth birhday I wanted a jumping castle."
to: Žena povedala: "K päťdesiatym narodeninám som chcela skákací hrad."

from: The woman said "I was sacked because I kept coming late."
to: Žena povedala: "Vyhodili ma, pretože som stále chodila neskoro."

from: The woman said "People tell me I'm restless because I constatnly need to be doing something."
to: Žena povedala: "Ľudia mi hovoria, že som nepokojná, pretože musím stále niečo robiť."

from: The woman said "I initiated conversations with strangers at a social gathering."
to: Žena povedala: "Na spoločenskom stretnutí som začala konverzovať s cudzími ľuďmi."

from: The woman said "I gave up easily without a fight."
to: Žena povedala: "Ľahko som sa vzdala bez boja."

from: The woman said "All my life I have been preparing for this moment."
to: Žena povedala: "Celý život som sa pripravovala na túto chvíľu."

from: The woman said "My friend challenged me to a fight and I won."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj priateľ ma vyzval na súboj a ja som vyhrala."

from: The woman said "I went to a beautician yesterday."
to: Žena povedala: "Včera som bola u kozmetičky."

from: The woman said "I simply asked for that raise."
to: Žena povedala: "Jednoducho som požiadala o zvýšenie platu."

from: The woman said "I don't mind vacuuming, in fact, I have always found it amusing."
to: Žena povedala: "Vysávanie mi nevadí, vlastne ma vždy bavilo."

from: The woman said "I was nervous before giving my speech but it went well."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som nervózna pred svojím prejavom, ale dopadlo to dobre."

from: The woman said "I had many opportunities to marry but I chose not to."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som veľa príležitostí vydať sa, ale rozhodla som sa nevydávať."

from: The woman said "Nobody appreciated how tanned I got during the summer."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikto neocenil, ako som sa v lete opálila."

from: The woman said "I carefully reviewed the terms and conditions of a contract before signing."
to: Žena povedala: "Pred podpisom zmluvy som si dôkladne preštudovala jej podmienky."

from: The woman said "I wish I could host more parties at my place."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela by som u seba doma organizovať viac večierkov."

from: The woman said "I bought a dangerous dog breed."
to: Žena povedala: "Kúpila som si nebezpečné plemeno psa."

from: The woman said "I like weightlifting."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada vzpieranie."

from: The woman said "It's alright - I wanted to treat you anyway."
to: Žena povedala: "To je v poriadku - aj tak som vás chcela ošetriť."

from: The woman said "I used to have so many contacts in my phone."
to: Žena povedala: "Kedysi som mala v telefóne toľko kontaktov."

from: The woman said "I like watching Sasha Grey."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada sa pozerám na Sashu Grey."

from: The woman said "I allowed others to make decisions on my behalf, relinquishing my own agency and personal autonomy."
to: Žena povedala: "Dovolila som iným, aby rozhodovali v mojom mene, a vzdala som sa tak vlastného konania a osobnej autonómie."

from: The woman said "I didn't know that taking care of a family would be so difficult."
to: Žena povedala: "Nevedela som, že starostlivosť o rodinu bude taká náročná."

from: The woman said "I screamed because I saw a spider in the kitchen sink."
to: Žena povedala: "Kričala som, pretože som v kuchynskom dreze videla pavúka."

from: The woman said "I was hoping we could move to the intimate stuff already."
to: Žena povedala: "Dúfala som, že už prejdeme k intímnym veciam."

from: The woman said "I collaborated with colleagues to find solutions and let them towards our goal."
to: Žena povedala: "Spolupracovala som s kolegami pri hľadaní riešení a nechala ich smerovať k nášmu cieľu."

from: The woman said "I went to the school reunion."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som na školskom stretnutí."

from: The woman said "I gave the inheritance to my children."
to: Žena povedala: "Dedičstvo som dala svojim deťom."

from: The woman said "I never feel like I'm too old for something."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy nemám pocit, že som na niečo príliš stará."

from: The woman said "I'm not as stupid as they think I am."
to: Žena povedala: "Nie som taká hlúpa, ako si myslia."

from: The woman said "I carried my son in my arms the whole hike because he couldn't walk."
to: Žena povedala: "Celú túru som niesla svojho syna na rukách, pretože nemohol chodiť."

from: The woman said "I sometimes have to remind myself not to jump to conclusions."
to: Žena povedala: "Niekedy si musím pripomínať, aby som nerobila unáhlené závery."

from: The woman said "I'm always ready for any challenge."
to: Žena povedala: "Som vždy pripravená na každú výzvu."

from: The woman said "I followed the latest fashion trends to always look presentable and people appreciated it."
to: Žena povedala: "Sledovala som najnovšie módne trendy, aby som vždy vyzerala reprezentatívne, a ľudia to oceňovali."

from: The woman said "I am an associate professor at a renowned university, I was awarded a grant from the ministry to expand my research activities."
to: Žena povedala: "Som docentkou na renomovanej univerzite, od ministerstva som dostala grant na rozšírenie svojich výskumných aktivít."

from: The woman said "I am sure about my abilities."
to: Žena povedala: "Som si istá svojimi schopnosťami."

from: The woman said "I always wanted to be as strong as Hercules."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som chcela byť silná ako Herkules."

from: The woman said "There is so much going on inside my mind, I can barely focus."
to: Žena povedala: "V mojej mysli sa toho deje toľko, že sa sotva dokážem sústrediť."

from: The woman said "I made sure the dough was the perfect temperature."
to: Žena povedala: "Uistila som sa, že cesto má ideálnu teplotu."

from: The woman said "I had cameras installed around the house so nothing would happen to me."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechala som okolo domu nainštalovať kamery, aby sa mi nič nestalo."

from: The woman said "My friend told me that I overreacted."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj priateľ mi povedal, že som to prehnala."

from: The woman said "I checked if the children did their homework."
to: Žena povedala: "Skontrolovala som, či si deti urobili domáce úlohy."

from: The woman said "I like curved bodies."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada zakrivené telá."

from: The woman said "I didn't want my partner to work."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechcela som, aby môj partner pracoval."

from: The woman said "I hated logic because it often wasn't romantic."
to: Žena povedala: "Nenávidela som logiku, pretože často nebola romantická."

from: The woman said "This problem turned out to be too difficult and I got furious."
to: Žena povedala: "Ukázalo sa, že tento problém je príliš zložitý a ja som sa rozzúrila."

from: The woman said "I am sure there is a higher power controlling my life."
to: Žena povedala: "Som si istá, že môj život riadi vyššia moc."

from: The woman said "I didn't make any hasty mistakes."
to: Žena povedala: "Neurobila som žiadnu unáhlenú chybu."

from: The woman said "I knew that I'm capable of more, but I have family, so my priorities changed."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, že mám na viac, ale mám rodinu, takže sa moje priority zmenili."

from: The woman said "I almost started crying."
to: Žena povedala: "Skoro som sa rozplakala."

from: The woman said "I was never so sure about my test results."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som si nebola taká istá výsledkami svojich testov."

from: The woman said "If only I could call and check how they are doing."
to: Žena povedala: "Keby som len mohla zavolať a zistiť, ako sa im darí."

from: The woman said "I offered my help with doing the dishes."
to: Žena povedala: "Ponúkla som svoju pomoc pri umývaní riadu."

from: The woman said "When I was their age, I behaved like a child too."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som bola v ich veku, tiež som sa správala ako dieťa."

from: The woman said "I always took taking care of my family's finances seriously."
to: Žena povedala: "Starostlivosť o rodinné financie som vždy brala vážne."

from: The woman said "People would often turn to me for fashion and style advice, recognizing my good taste and sense of aesthetics so I knew I was appreciated."
to: Žena povedala: "Ľudia sa na mňa často obracali s prosbou o radu v oblasti módy a štýlu, uznávali môj dobrý vkus a zmysel pre estetiku, takže som vedela, že si ma vážia."

from: The woman said "I thought therapy was for weak people."
to: Žena povedala: "Myslela som si, že terapia je pre slabých ľudí."

from: The woman said "I shouldn't argue, because it's better to keep the household calm."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemala by som sa hádať, pretože je lepšie udržať domácnosť v pokoji."

from: The woman said "I could not stop thinking about the sex we had last night."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som prestať myslieť na náš včerajší sex."

from: The woman said "I am courageous."
to: Žena povedala: "Som odvážna."

from: The woman said "I'm exhausted from explaining to you that you can't buy a new phone because I didn't earn much this month."
to: Žena povedala: "Som vyčerpaná z toho, ako som vám vysvetľovala, že si nemôžete kúpiť nový telefón, pretože som tento mesiac veľa nezarobila."

from: The woman said "I like to try new things with my partner."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada skúšam nové veci so svojím partnerom."

from: The woman said "I was the lead author of the research paper."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som hlavnou autorkou výskumnej práce."

from: The woman said "I’ve made such a name for myself that they won’t do anything without my permission."
to: Žena povedala: "Urobila som si také meno, že bez môjho súhlasu nič neurobia."

from: The woman said "I offered a supportive ear and understanding without judgment."
to: Žena povedala: "Ponúkla som jej podporu a pochopenie bez odsudzovania."

from: The woman said "When someone calls me to go out, I’m always happy to say yes."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď mi niekto zavolá, aby sme si vyšli, vždy rada súhlasím."

from: The woman said "My core strength is still very good because I go to gym three times a week."
to: Žena povedala: "Moja sila jadra je stále veľmi dobrá, pretože chodím trikrát týždenne do posilňovne."

from: The woman said "I got a fine for speeding on the highway."
to: Žena povedala: "Dostala som pokutu za prekročenie rýchlosti na diaľnici."

from: The woman said "I felt so many emotions, I could not breathe."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítila som toľko emócií, že som nemohla dýchať."

from: The woman said "I told them to let me buy them the things they needed."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedala som im, aby mi dovolili kúpiť im veci, ktoré potrebujú."

from: The woman said "I weightlifted a lot during my college years and it still shows although I am 40 years old."
to: Žena povedala: "Počas štúdia som veľa vzpierala a stále je to na mne vidieť, hoci mám 40 rokov."

from: The woman said "I saved up a lot of money for my childrens education."
to: Žena povedala: "Našetrila som veľa peňazí na vzdelanie svojich detí."

from: The woman said "I helped the neighbour with carrying her shopping bags."
to: Žena povedala: "Pomáhala som susedke nosiť nákupné tašky."

from: The woman said "I swept and mopped the floors of my home."
to: Žena povedala: "Zametala som a vytierala podlahy vo svojom dome."

from: The woman said "I invited my friends to my place to have a dinner."
to: Žena povedala: "Pozvala som svojich priateľov k sebe na večeru."

from: The woman said "They were rude so I had to punch them."
to: Žena povedala: "Boli drzí, tak som ich musela udrieť."

from: The woman said "I expected the salary increase."
to: Žena povedala: "Očakávala som zvýšenie platu."

from: The woman said "I always had authority and others naturally saw me as a leader."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som mala autoritu a ostatní ma prirodzene vnímali ako vodcu."

from: The woman said "I had a really nice face when I was young."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som bola mladá, mala som veľmi peknú tvár."

from: The woman said "I have always wanted to behave as they expected me to."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som sa chcela správať tak, ako odo mňa očakávali."

from: The woman said "I observed them to see whether they were satisfied with the meal I made."
to: Žena povedala: "Pozorovala som ich, či sú spokojní s jedlom, ktoré som im pripravila."

from: The woman said "I fired everyone who made me angry."
to: Žena povedala: "Vyhodila som každého, kto ma nahneval."

from: The woman said "They say I’m insensitive, but I call it sensible."
to: Žena povedala: "Hovoria, že som necitlivá, ale ja tomu hovorím rozumná."

from: The woman said "I don't think I have a strong enough character to be a company director."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemyslím si, že mám dostatočne silný charakter na to, aby som mohla byť riaditeľkou spoločnosti."

from: The woman said "I was so horny I almost could not control myself when we finally ended up in the bed with my crush."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som taká nadržaná, že som sa takmer nedokázala ovládať, keď sme konečne skončili v posteli s mojou láskou."

from: The woman said "I sacrificed my own authenticity to avoid displeasing others."
to: Žena povedala: "Obetovala som svoju vlastnú autenticitu, aby som sa nepáčila iným."

from: The woman said "We won the competition thanks to the idea I had a month ago."
to: Žena povedala: "Súťaž sme vyhrali vďaka nápadu, ktorý som mala pred mesiacom."

from: The woman said "I could easily join the army."
to: Žena povedala: "Kľudne by som mohla vstúpiť do armády."

from: The woman said "I never liked speaking out loud."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nerada hovorila nahlas."

from: The woman said "I like to analyse problems from various perspectives."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada analyzujem problémy z rôznych uhlov pohľadu."

from: The woman said "I wish I could see what is going through their head, so I can be of more help."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela by som vidieť, čo sa im odohráva v hlave, aby som im mohla viac pomôcť."

from: The woman said "I tried to lift the piano, but I couldn't."
to: Žena povedala: "Snažila som sa zdvihnúť klavír, ale nešlo to."

from: The woman said "After walking into the meeting room, I shook everyone's hand."
to: Žena povedala: "Po vstupe do rokovacej miestnosti som každému podala ruku."

from: The woman said "When was the last time you had sex?"
to: Žena sa opýtala: "Kedy ste mali naposledy sex?"

from: The woman said "Maybe if I acted nicer they would say yes."
to: Žena povedala: "Možno keby som sa správala krajšie, povedali by áno."

from: The woman said "I could not resist cleaning those dirty windows."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som odolať umývaniu tých špinavých okien."

from: The woman said "I felt a rush of desire as I was kissed and immediately felt aroused."
to: Žena povedala: "Pri bozku som pocítila nával túžby a okamžite som sa cítila vzrušená."

from: The woman said "I'm good at navigating."
to: Žena povedala: "Som dobrá v navigácii."

from: The woman said "I negotiated with service providers such as internet or cable companies to secure the most cost-effective plans."
to: Žena povedala: "Rokovala som s poskytovateľmi služieb, ako sú internetové alebo káblové spoločnosti, aby som si zabezpečila najvýhodnejšie plány."

from: The woman said "I was late so I invited them for a nice lunch."
to: Žena povedala: "Meškala som, tak som ich pozvala na dobrý obed."

from: The woman said "I have never let any of my clients down."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som žiadneho zo svojich klientov nesklamala."

from: The woman said "I can't imagine having a family and having to take care of them someday."
to: Žena povedala: "Neviem si predstaviť, že by som mala rodinu a jedného dňa sa o ňu musela starať."

from: The woman said "I am non-confrontational and level-headed, which is also why people look up to me."
to: Žena povedala: "Som nekonfliktná a vyrovnaná, aj preto ku mne ľudia vzhliadajú."

from: The woman said "I implemented some changes in our offices that will benefit all my employees."
to: Žena povedala: "V našich kanceláriách som zaviedla niekoľko zmien, ktoré budú prospešné pre všetkých mojich zamestnancov."

from: The woman said "I worked in a laboratory."
to: Žena povedala: "Pracovala som v laboratóriu."

from: The woman said "I stood up in front of them and told them we could do it."
to: Žena povedala: "Postavila som sa pred nich a povedala im, že to dokážeme."

from: The woman said "I didn't want to stay at home with kids because I would loose a really good job."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechcela som zostať doma s deťmi, pretože by som prišla o veľmi dobrú prácu."

from: The woman said "I did not have money so I dug the hole for the pool on my own."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemala som peniaze, tak som si jamu na bazén vykopala sama."

from: The woman said "I am a miner."
to: Žena povedala: "Som baník."

from: The woman said "I assembled the furniture alone."
to: Žena povedala: "Nábytok som zmontovala sama."

from: The woman said "I joined a self-defence course."
to: Žena povedala: "Zapísala som sa do kurzu sebaobrany."

from: The woman said "I wouldn't be satisfied with myself if I didn't finish the race."
to: Žena povedala: "Nebola by som so sebou spokojná, keby som preteky nedokončila."

from: The woman said "I had tough military training."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som tvrdý vojenský výcvik."

from: The woman said "I wish I had passed the physical test!"
to: Žena povedala: "Škoda, že som neprešla fyzickým testom!"

from: The woman said "I took them to a water park."
to: Žena povedala: "Vzala som ich do vodného parku."

from: The woman said "I’m too experienced to waste my time here."
to: Žena povedala: "Som príliš skúsená na to, aby som tu strácala čas."

from: The woman said "I managed my team with ease and got the job done."
to: Žena povedala: "Svoj tím som riadila s ľahkosťou a prácu som zvládla."

from: The woman said "I always made sure that my partners favourite snacks were in the cupboard."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som sa uistila, že v skrini sú obľúbené pochutiny môjho partnera."

from: The woman said "When I'm sad, I go shopping."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som smutná, idem nakupovať."

from: The woman said "When I'm with him, I'm angry."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som s ním, som nahnevaná."

from: The woman said "I have never believed in superstitions."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som neverila na povery."

from: The woman said "People around me know that if they need something, I’m happy to help."
to: Žena povedala: "Ľudia okolo mňa vedia, že ak niečo potrebujú, rada im pomôžem."

from: The woman said "I'm always ready to help you with anything around your car."
to: Žena povedala: "Som vždy pripravená pomôcť vám s čímkoľvek okolo vášho auta."

from: The woman said "Although I don't like this dish, I made it for my family."
to: Žena povedala: "Hoci toto jedlo nemám rada, urobila som ho pre svoju rodinu."

from: The woman said "My GP referred me to a very good ophtalmologist because my eyesight was getting poor recently."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj praktický lekár ma odporučil k veľmi dobrému oftalmológovi, pretože môj zrak sa v poslednom čase zhoršoval."

from: The woman said "My to do list was neverending but I kept going."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj zoznam úloh bol nekonečný, ale ja som pokračovala."

from: The woman said "I don’t like gossiping, it’s a waste of time."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemám rada klebety, je to strata času."

from: The woman said "I didn't know what to do, so I relied on my gut."
to: Žena povedala: "Nevedela som, čo mám robiť, tak som sa spoľahla na svoj pocit."

from: The woman said "I like to have fun."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada sa zabávam."

from: The woman said "I turned on the washing machine."
to: Žena povedala: "Zapla som práčku."

from: The woman said "I had to shave my legs before the race."
to: Žena povedala: "Pred pretekmi som si musela oholiť nohy."

from: The woman said "I've been told that I'm a true professional – always focused, organized, and get the job done efficiently."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedali mi, že som skutočný profesionál - vždy sa sústredím, som organizovaná a prácu vykonávam efektívne."

from: The woman said "I don’t like watching videos of abandoned puppies, it makes me cry."
to: Žena povedala: "Nerada sa pozerám na videá opustených šteniat, rozplače ma to."

from: The woman said "I knew how to deal with this type of client."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, ako sa s takýmto typom klientov zaobchádzať."

from: The woman said "I told him that nothing was wrong although I was really upset."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedala som mu, že sa nič nedeje, hoci som bola veľmi rozrušená."

from: The woman said "I wanted him to feel welcome."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som, aby sa cítil vítaný."

from: The woman said "They think I'm shy, but I just don't want to embarrass myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Myslia si, že som plachá, ale ja sa len nechcem strápniť."

from: The woman said "Being the provider means being responsible for putting food on the table, so I provided."
to: Žena povedala: "Byť živiteľkou znamená byť zodpovedná za to, aby bolo jedlo na stole, a tak som sa postarala."

from: The woman said "I first consulted a professional before making the final choice."
to: Žena povedala: "Pred konečným rozhodnutím som sa najprv poradila s odborníkom."

from: The woman said "I calmly addressed a conflict with a colleague."
to: Žena povedala: "Pokojne som riešila konflikt s kolegom."

from: The woman said "I have always enjoyed teaching others."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som rada učila iných."

from: The woman said "While I realise that both partners can be the breadwinners in a family, I am glad that in ours, that role is mine."
to: Žena povedala: "Hoci si uvedomujem, že obaja partneri môžu byť živiteľmi rodiny, som rada, že v našej rodine je táto úloha na mne."

from: The woman said "I have created the life I have always wanted."
to: Žena povedala: "Vytvorila som si život, po akom som vždy túžila."

from: The woman said "I never made my decision based on emotions."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som sa nerozhodovala na základe emócií."

from: The woman said "When I'm out with my friend we gossip way too much."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som vonku s kamarátkou, príliš veľa klebetíme."

from: The woman said "I didn't want to tell them what is wrong because I didn't want to cause any trouble."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechcela som im povedať, čo sa deje, pretože som nechcela spôsobiť žiadne problémy."

from: The woman said "The cleaners left the entrance door open."
to: Žena povedala: "Upratovačky nechali otvorené vchodové dvere."

from: The woman said "I built the house alone."
to: Žena povedala: "Dom som postavila sama."

from: The woman said "I got very upset."
to: Žena povedala: "Veľmi ma to rozrušilo."

from: The woman said "I have decided that I will praise at least one person every day."
to: Žena povedala: "Rozhodla som sa, že každý deň budem chváliť aspoň jedného človeka."

from: The woman said "I threw myself a birthday party to get lots of presents."
to: Žena povedala: "Usporiadala som si narodeninovú oslavu, aby som dostala veľa darčekov."

from: The woman said "It broke my heart to see them like that, so I offered help."
to: Žena povedala: "Zlomilo mi srdce, keď som ich videla v takomto stave, a tak som im ponúkla pomoc."

from: The woman said "I reached a new personal record."
to: Žena povedala: "Dosiahla som nový osobný rekord."

from: The woman said "I wouldn't let anyone dictate what I should do."
to: Žena povedala: "Nenechala by som si nikým diktovať, čo mám robiť."

from: The woman said "When I heard about the event, I decided to go."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som sa dozvedela o tomto podujatí, rozhodla som sa ísť."

from: The woman said "It was always important for me to be pretty."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy bolo pre mňa dôležité byť pekná."

from: The woman said "I avoided conflicts at all costs."
to: Žena povedala: "Za každú cenu som sa vyhýbala konfliktom."

from: The woman said "Even if I was afraid of something, I would never admit it."
to: Žena povedala: "Aj keby som sa niečoho bála, nikdy by som to nepriznala."

from: The woman said "If it were up to me, I'd have pizza for lunch every day."
to: Žena povedala: "Keby to bolo na mne, každý deň by som mala na obed pizzu."

from: The woman said "I like to go to nude beaches."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada chodím na nudistické pláže."

from: The woman said "I was very good at resolving conflicts when I was the supervisor."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som bola nadriadenou, bola som veľmi dobrá v riešení konfliktov."

from: The woman said "I like helping people."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada pomáham ľuďom."

from: The woman said "I can take this - I have always managed."
to: Žena povedala: "Ja to zvládnem - vždy som to zvládla."

from: The woman said "I won the marathon last year."
to: Žena povedala: "Minulý rok som vyhrala maratón."

from: The woman said "I organised an international conference."
to: Žena povedala: "Organizovala som medzinárodnú konferenciu."

from: The woman said "I completely lost my cool over a trivial matter and acted irrationally, letting my emotions take over."
to: Žena povedala: "Úplne som stratila chladnú hlavu kvôli banálnej záležitosti a konala som iracionálne, nechala som sa ovládnuť emóciami."

from: The woman said "I still think about how I was told I was ugly in elementary school."
to: Žena povedala: "Stále myslím na to, ako mi na základnej škole povedali, že som škaredá."

from: The woman said "Even though I am their boss, I told them that I wanted them to see me as an equal colleague."
to: Žena povedala: "Aj keď som ich šéfka, povedala som im, že chcem, aby ma vnímali ako rovnocennú kolegyňu."

from: The woman said "I shouldn't have taken that personally, but I was really offended."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemala som to brať osobne, ale naozaj ma to urazilo."

from: The woman said "I didn't even consider the possibility that I would fail."
to: Žena povedala: "Ani som neuvažovala o možnosti, že by som zlyhala."

from: The woman said "I like to inspire my subordinates on a daily basis."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada denne inšpirujem svojich podriadených."

from: The woman said "I feel the happiest when I'm in charge of everything."
to: Žena povedala: "Najšťastnejšia sa cítim, keď mám všetko na starosti."

from: The woman said "I would never let privacy interfere with my work life."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som nedovolila, aby súkromie zasahovalo do môjho pracovného života."

from: The woman said "Their suffering touched me - I wanted to comfort them."
to: Žena povedala: "Ich utrpenie sa ma dotklo - chcela som ich utešiť."

from: The woman said "I gave up the calculus class, it was just too hard for me."
to: Žena povedala: "Vzdala som sa hodiny matematiky, bola pre mňa príliš ťažká."

from: The woman said "I helped out at an animal shelter."
to: Žena povedala: "Pomáhala som v útulku pre zvieratá."

from: The woman said "My good looks opened doors in the entertainment industry, I was very confident."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj dobrý vzhľad mi otvoril dvere v zábavnom priemysle, bola som veľmi sebavedomá."

from: The woman said "I went volunteering to Africa."
to: Žena povedala: "Išla som robiť dobrovoľníčku do Afriky."

from: The woman said "In order not to burn out, I try to create a work-life balance."
to: Žena povedala: "Aby som nevyhorela, snažím sa vytvoriť rovnováhu medzi pracovným a súkromným životom."

from: The woman said "I realised that children are individual creatures that I cannot shape based on my ideas and desires."
to: Žena povedala: "Uvedomila som si, že deti sú individuálne bytosti, ktoré nemôžem formovať podľa svojich predstáv a túžob."

from: The woman said "I caught myself daydreaming about having sex."
to: Žena povedala: "Pristihla som sa, ako snívam o sexe."

from: The woman said "People think of me as a wimp just because I’m good to others."
to: Žena povedala: "Ľudia si o mne myslia, že som slaboch len preto, že som dobrá k ostatným."

from: The woman said "I wouldn’t hurt a fly."
to: Žena povedala: "Neublížila by som ani muche."

from: The woman said "I created a dating account."
to: Žena povedala: "Vytvorila som si zoznamovací účet."

from: The woman said "I decided in a spur of the moment."
to: Žena povedala: "Rozhodla som sa v okamihu."

from: The woman said "I am very good at pretending that I am fine."
to: Žena povedala: "Som veľmi dobrá v predstieraní, že som v poriadku."

from: The woman said "I never lost my temper."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som sa neovládla."

from: The woman said "I was sick but I still worked from home so we don't loose any money."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som chorá, ale stále som pracovala z domu, takže sme neprišli o žiadne peniaze."

from: The woman said "They do not dare to questions the decisions that I have made."
to: Žena povedala: "Neodvažujú sa spochybňovať rozhodnutia, ktoré som urobila."

from: The woman said "When danger came, I took the lead."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď prišlo nebezpečenstvo, prevzala som vedenie."

from: The woman said "I could never go hiking alone, I always need company."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som nemohla ísť na túru sama, vždy potrebujem spoločnosť."

from: The woman said "I felt a boost of confidence as I caught myself in the mirror, recognizing that I was undeniably good-looking."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som sa uvidela v zrkadle, pocítila som, že som nesporne pekná."

from: The woman said "Just because I demand discipline from my employees doesn't mean I don't like them."
to: Žena povedala: "To, že od svojich zamestnancov vyžadujem disciplínu, neznamená, že ich nemám rada."

from: The woman said "I carefully proofread and edited my written assignments before submitting them."
to: Žena povedala: "Svoje písomné úlohy som pred odovzdaním starostlivo opravila a upravila."

from: The woman said "I made a group chat for all the new classmates."
to: Žena povedala: "Vytvorila som skupinový chat pre všetkých nových spolužiakov."

from: The woman said "I didn't have any hobbies, I was working all the time, so I could make more money for my family."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemala som žiadne koníčky, stále som pracovala, aby som mohla zarobiť viac peňazí pre svoju rodinu."

from: The woman said "I learned a foreign launguage to have better foreign contacts."
to: Žena povedala: "Naučila som sa cudzí jazyk, aby som mala lepšie kontakty v zahraničí."

from: The woman said "I knew how to fix a broken car."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, ako opraviť pokazené auto."

from: The woman said "I should work harder so my children have easier life."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala by som viac pracovať, aby moje deti mali ľahší život."

from: The woman said "I started screaming because I got angry."
to: Žena povedala: "Začala som kričať, pretože som sa nahnevala."

from: The woman said "I had to get checked for STDs."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som sa dať vyšetriť na pohlavne prenosné choroby."

from: The woman said "I like to take care of my friends children when they are busy."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada sa starám o deti svojich priateľov, keď sú zaneprázdnení."

from: The woman said "I wanted to go to the cinema instead of watching the movie at home."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som ísť do kina namiesto toho, aby som si pozrela film doma."

from: The woman said "I had never thought that I could come to harm."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som si nemyslela, že by som mohla prísť k ujme."

from: The woman said "I was bored so I went to a speedating event."
to: Žena povedala: "Nudila som sa, tak som išla na rýchlostnú jazdu."

from: The woman said "I calculated our spendings to budget properly."
to: Žena povedala: "Vypočítala som si naše výdavky, aby som správne zostavila rozpočet."

from: The woman said "I couldn't wear shorts even if it was hot outside because I don't want to provoke anybody."
