to: Žena povedala: "Nestrávila som veľa času prípravami, pretože mám peknú tvár."

from: The woman said "When I have to go to a work meeting, I immediately get all sweaty from stress."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď musím ísť na pracovnú schôdzku, hneď sa celá spotím od stresu."

from: The woman said "I ignored the facts, and focused on my feelings."
to: Žena povedala: "Ignorovala som fakty a sústredila som sa na svoje pocity."

from: The woman said "I vacuumed and spot-cleaned my carpets and rugs."
to: Žena povedala: "Vysala som a vyčistila koberce a rohože."

from: The woman said "I stopped to buy condoms on my way to the date."
to: Žena povedala: "Cestou na rande som sa zastavila kúpiť kondómy."

from: The woman said "There are no doubts I always did a great job."
to: Žena povedala: "Nepochybujem o tom, že som vždy odviedla skvelú prácu."

from: The woman said "I was looking for the Kama Sutra in the bookshop."
to: Žena povedala: "Hľadala som Kámasutru v kníhkupectve."

from: The woman said "They knew I would listen to their problems and try to help."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedeli, že si vypočujem ich problémy a pokúsim sa im pomôcť."

from: The woman said "I take pride in my work, but I'm always looking for ways to do it even better."
to: Žena povedala: "Na svoju prácu som hrdá, ale vždy hľadám spôsoby, ako ju robiť ešte lepšie."

from: The woman said "I don't want a relationship because I need freedom."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechcem vzťah, pretože potrebujem slobodu."

from: The woman said "I ate a lot of protein to build muscle."
to: Žena povedala: "Jedla som veľa bielkovín, aby som si vybudovala svaly."

from: The woman said "I was unable to do anything, so I just kept smiling like nothing happened."
to: Žena povedala: "Nebola som schopná nič urobiť, tak som sa len usmievala, akoby sa nič nestalo."

from: The woman said "I got a lot of compliments on my outfit."
to: Žena povedala: "Dostala som veľa komplimentov na svoje oblečenie."

from: The woman said "I am certain that the truth is simple."
to: Žena povedala: "Som si istá, že pravda je jednoduchá."

from: The woman said "Don't be angry, I hated being alone at home."
to: Žena povedala: "Nehnevajte sa, neznášala som byť sama doma."

from: The woman said "I never left my job until everything was ready for the next day."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som neodchádzala z práce, kým nebolo všetko pripravené na ďalší deň."

from: The woman said "I would never let a dog lick my face."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som nedovolila, aby mi pes olizoval tvár."

from: The woman said "I didn't eat the cake, because I was watching my figure."
to: Žena povedala: "Koláč som nezjedla, lebo som si strážila postavu."

from: The woman said "I am an extraordinary person and I would like everyone to recognize it."
to: Žena povedala: "Som výnimočný človek a chcela by som, aby si to každý uvedomil."

from: The woman said "With no witnesses and no evidence, I refused to be a part of the jury."
to: Žena povedala: "Bez svedkov a dôkazov som odmietla byť súčasťou poroty."

from: The woman said "I would frequently procrastinate and avoid my responsibilities."
to: Žena povedala: "Často som odkladala a vyhýbala sa povinnostiam."

from: The woman said "I offered them help with the furniture."
to: Žena povedala: "Ponúkla som im pomoc s nábytkom."

from: The woman said "I put a lot of effort into gaining muscle strength."
to: Žena povedala: "Vynaložila som veľa úsilia na získanie svalovej sily."

from: The woman said "I always comforted my kids when they cried."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som utešovala svoje deti, keď plakali."

from: The woman said "I stood face to face with a tiger."
to: Žena povedala: "Stála som tvárou v tvár tigrovi."

from: The woman said "I didn't take the rejection well."
to: Žena povedala: "Odmietnutie som neprijala dobre."

from: The woman said "I worked a sa data analyst."
to: Žena povedala: "Pracovala som ako dátová analytička."

from: The woman said "I struggled to maintain proper posture during extended periods of sitting, feeling weak in my back and core muscles."
to: Žena povedala: "Počas dlhšieho sedenia som mala problém udržať si správne držanie tela, cítila som sa slabá v chrbte a svaloch jadra."

from: The woman said "I led a team of young researchers."
to: Žena povedala: "Viedla som tím mladých výskumníkov."

from: The woman said "When browsing through old photographs, I noticed how consistently good-looking I appeared in various moments and settings."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som si prezerala staré fotografie, všimla som si, ako stále dobre vyzerám v rôznych momentoch a prostrediach."

from: The woman said "I noticed that my good looks seemed to open doors for me."
to: Žena povedala: "Všimla som si, že môj dobrý vzhľad mi otvára dvere."

from: The woman said "I am beautiful."
to: Žena povedala: "Som krásna."

from: The woman said "As a chef, I carefully sourced high-quality ingredients, honed my culinary skills, and consistently delivered delicious and beautifully presented meals."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako šéfkuchárka som starostlivo získavala vysokokvalitné suroviny, zdokonaľovala svoje kulinárske zručnosti a neustále dodávala chutné a krásne prezentované jedlá."

from: The woman said "I often feel stressed about making enough money for the family."
to: Žena povedala: "Často sa cítim vystresovaná z toho, či zarobím dosť peňazí pre rodinu."

from: The woman said "I always need to get the work done right away, because if I wait until the last minute, I feel irresponsible."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy musím prácu urobiť hneď, pretože ak čakám do poslednej chvíle, cítim sa nezodpovedne."

from: The woman said "I didn't care that I don't have my own family, I had a high position at my job and that was enough for me."
to: Žena povedala: "Bolo mi jedno, že nemám vlastnú rodinu, mala som vysoké postavenie v práci a to mi stačilo."

from: The woman said "She keeps asking me why I cried that day."
to: Žena povedala: "Stále sa ma pýta, prečo som v ten deň plakala."

from: The woman said "I couldn't go to sleep without my skincare."
to: Žena povedala: "Bez starostlivosti o pleť by som nemohla ísť spať."

from: The woman said "I actively engaged with stakeholders."
to: Žena povedala: "Aktívne som sa zapojila do spolupráce so zainteresovanými stranami."

from: The woman said "I cried, because I didn't get what I had wanted."
to: Žena povedala: "Plakala som, pretože som nedostala to, čo som chcela."

from: The woman said "I left when they started talking about religions and god."
to: Žena povedala: "Odišla som, keď začali hovoriť o náboženstvách a Bohu."

from: The woman said "I’ve been waiting so long for this game to come out."
to: Žena povedala: "Tak dlho som čakala, kým táto hra vyjde."

from: The woman said "As a sales representative, I built strong relationships with clients, understood their needs, and effectively communicated the benefits of our products to drive sales."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako obchodná zástupkyňa som si vybudovala silné vzťahy s klientmi, pochopila ich potreby a efektívne som im vysvetľovala výhody našich produktov, aby som zvýšila predaj."

from: The woman said "I could easily get everyone's attention if I wanted to."
to: Žena povedala: "Keby som chcela, ľahko by som si získala pozornosť všetkých."

from: The woman said "I struggled to complete a set of sit-ups, feeling the weakness in my abdominal muscles."
to: Žena povedala: "S námahou som dokončila sériu sedov, cítila som slabosť v brušných svaloch."

from: The woman said "Cleanliness has always been important to me, which is why I am applying for this job."
to: Žena povedala: "Čistota bola pre mňa vždy dôležitá, a preto sa uchádzam o túto prácu."

from: The woman said "I'm confident and that attracts others."
to: Žena povedala: "Som sebavedomá a to priťahuje ostatných."

from: The woman said "I like to prepare snacks for my kids, so they can eat them at school."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada pripravujem svojim deťom desiatu, aby ju mohli jesť v škole."

from: The woman said "I got a good job right after school and made enough money to buy a house for my family."
to: Žena povedala: "Hneď po škole som dostala dobrú prácu a zarobila som dosť peňazí na to, aby som mohla kúpiť dom pre svoju rodinu."

from: The woman said "If I have offended anyone, it is their fault, I will not apologise to them."
to: Žena povedala: "Ak som niekoho urazila, je to jeho vina, nebudem sa mu ospravedlňovať."

from: The woman said "When I felt that situation is no longer in my control, I freaked out."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som cítila, že situáciu už nemám pod kontrolou, vydesila som sa."

from: The woman said "In a previous relationship, I was constantly told how stupid I was."
to: Žena povedala: "V predchádzajúcom vzťahu mi neustále hovorili, aká som hlúpa."

from: The woman said "I hate arguing."
to: Žena povedala: "Neznášam hádky."

from: The woman said "I consistently downplayed my achievements or talents."
to: Žena povedala: "Sústavne som bagatelizovala svoje úspechy alebo talenty."

from: The woman said "I like having an extra job."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada prácu navyše."

from: The woman said "I felt very vulnerable."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítila som sa veľmi zraniteľná."

from: The woman said "I couldn’t have an office just for myself, I’d go crazy in there."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemôžem mať kanceláriu len pre seba, zbláznila by som sa tam."

from: The woman said "I have allowed employees to bring animals to work."
to: Žena povedala: "Dovolila som zamestnancom, aby si do práce brali zvieratá."

from: The woman said "Although I am employed, I work in a nursing home in my spare time."
to: Žena povedala: "Hoci som zamestnaná, vo voľnom čase pracujem v domove dôchodcov."

from: The woman said "I lifted twice my own weight."
to: Žena povedala: "Zdvihla som dvojnásobok svojej váhy."

from: The woman said "I could not stand seeing how dirty their glasses were!"
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som sa pozerať na to, aké majú špinavé okuliare!"

from: The woman said "I felt like I was the worst, I don't know why."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som pocit, že som najhoršia, neviem prečo."

from: The woman said "I was well aware that I was very capable."
to: Žena povedala: "Dobre som si uvedomovala, že som veľmi schopná."

from: The woman said "I never took any supplements, all my strength is natural."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nebrala žiadne doplnky, všetka moja sila je prirodzená."

from: The woman said "I'm a good runner."
to: Žena povedala: "Som dobrá bežkyňa."

from: The woman said "If I hadn't been kind, I wouldn't have found a husband."
to: Žena povedala: "Keby som nebola milá, nenašla by som si manžela."

from: The woman said "I bought a new hair dryer."
to: Žena povedala: "Kúpila som si nový fén."

from: The woman said "I did the laundry."
to: Žena povedala: "Ja som vyprala."

from: The woman said "Should I have given my kids more money?"
to: Žena sa opýtala: "Mala som dať svojim deťom viac peňazí?"

from: The woman said "With a steady hand and unyielding focus, I showed what I had to offer."
to: Žena povedala: "S pevnou rukou a neústupným sústredením som ukázala, čo môžem ponúknuť."

from: The woman said "I made sure my team finished in the top 3."
to: Žena povedala: "Postarala som sa o to, aby môj tím skončil v prvej trojke."

from: The woman said "When I assessed the damage, I knew this was beyond my skills."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som posúdila škody, vedela som, že to presahuje moje schopnosti."

from: The woman said "I took care of the finances."
to: Žena povedala: "Postarala som sa o financie."

from: The woman said "It’s hard for me to be new in the city because I don’t have any friends here."
to: Žena povedala: "Je pre mňa ťažké byť nová v meste, pretože tu nemám žiadnych priateľov."

from: The woman said "I taught a self-defence class."
to: Žena povedala: "Učila som kurz sebaobrany."

from: The woman said "I'm successful because my company is doing great."
to: Žena povedala: "Som úspešná, pretože mojej spoločnosti sa darí."

from: The woman said "I gave them some advice about how to look better."
to: Žena povedala: "Dala som im niekoľko rád, ako vyzerať lepšie."

from: The woman said "I paid for my brothers driving license."
to: Žena povedala: "Zaplatila som za bratov vodičský preukaz."

from: The woman said "I joined an environmental conservation group, collaborating with like-minded individuals to raise awareness and take action on environmental issues."
to: Žena povedala: "Pripojila som sa k skupine na ochranu životného prostredia, ktorá spolupracuje s podobne zmýšľajúcimi ľuďmi s cieľom zvyšovať povedomie o environmentálnych otázkach a prijímať opatrenia v tejto oblasti."

from: The woman said "The key moment in my career was when I realize that my decision-making skills earned me respect from everyone."
to: Žena povedala: "Kľúčovým momentom v mojej kariére bolo, keď som si uvedomila, že moje rozhodovacie schopnosti mi priniesli rešpekt všetkých."

from: The woman said "Yesterday I bought a snake."
to: Žena povedala: "Včera som si kúpila hada."

from: The woman said "When I got compliments it was always on my looks."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som dostávala komplimenty, vždy to bolo za môj vzhľad."

from: The woman said "I pranked everyone at the party."
to: Žena povedala: "Na večierku som si zo všetkých vystrelila."

from: The woman said "I would like to explore every inch of that beautiful body."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela by som preskúmať každý centimeter tohto krásneho tela."

from: The woman said "I didn't mind staying late at work, I knew I was doing it to keep my family fed."
to: Žena povedala: "Nevadilo mi zostať dlho v práci, vedela som, že to robím preto, aby som uživila rodinu."

from: The woman said "I knew I could break it if I pushed hard enough."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, že ho môžem zlomiť, ak budem dostatočne tlačiť."

from: The woman said "I used to underestimate myself a lot, but that's in the past."
to: Žena povedala: "Kedysi som sa často podceňovala, ale to je už minulosť."

from: The woman said "I had to smile."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som sa usmiať."

from: The woman said "I graduated from university and I'm ready to put my knowledge into practice."
to: Žena povedala: "Skončila som univerzitu a som pripravená uplatniť svoje vedomosti v praxi."

from: The woman said "I didn't care about logic - I was relying only on my emotions."
to: Žena povedala: "Nezáležalo mi na logike - spoliehala som sa len na svoje emócie."

from: The woman said "I ordered dumbbells that are too heavy and I can’t workout with them."
to: Žena povedala: "Objednala som si príliš ťažké činky a nemôžem s nimi cvičiť."

from: The woman said "Stop commanding me, I like to spent time how I want to."
to: Žena povedala: "Prestaň mi rozkazovať, rada trávim čas, ako chcem."

from: The woman said "I didn't comment on their appearence."
to: Žena povedala: "Ich vzhľad som nekomentovala."

from: The woman said "I'm a hard worker."
to: Žena povedala: "Som pracovitá."

from: The woman said "I think they like me because I'm confident."
to: Žena povedala: "Myslím, že ma majú radi, pretože som sebavedomá."

from: The woman said "Let me open the jar, I said to her."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechajte ma otvoriť nádobu," povedal som jej.

from: The woman said "They say what they appreciate most about me is that I’m modest."
to: Žena povedala: "Hovoria, že si na mne najviac cenia to, že som skromná."

from: The woman said "I worked hard to cover my kid's expenses."
to: Žena povedala: "Tvrdo som pracovala, aby som pokryla výdavky svojho dieťaťa."

from: The woman said "I was not scared of that huge snake."
to: Žena povedala: "Toho obrovského hada som sa nebála."

from: The woman said "I would not risk my position by making irrational decisions."
to: Žena povedala: "Neriskovala by som svoje postavenie tým, že by som robila iracionálne rozhodnutia."

from: The woman said "I am a professional."
to: Žena povedala: "Som profesionálka."

from: The woman said "I was there when my kid took its first steps."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som pri tom, keď moje dieťa urobilo prvé kroky."

from: The woman said "Over the holidays, I'm lonely at home for a long time, so I call someone out every day."
to: Žena povedala: "Cez prázdniny som dlho sama doma, a tak každý deň niekoho volám von."

from: The woman said "I like seeing how people prosper under my leadership."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada vidím, ako sa ľuďom pod mojím vedením darí."

from: The woman said "I don't like it when someone smokes near me because I can't get rid of the smell for hours."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemám rada, keď niekto fajčí v mojej blízkosti, pretože sa toho zápachu nemôžem zbaviť celé hodiny."

from: The woman said "How often should I wash my hair?"
to: Žena sa opýtala: "Ako často si mám umývať vlasy?"

from: The woman said "Mom told me people would like me more if I always acted nice."
to: Žena povedala: "Mama mi povedala, že ma ľudia budú mať radšej, keď sa budem vždy správať milo."

from: The woman said "I was supportive."
to: Žena povedala: "Podporovala som ju."

from: The woman said "I didn't cry even at my father's funeral."
to: Žena povedala: "Neplakala som ani na pohrebe svojho otca."

from: The woman said "They always tell me I work a lot, but that’s just the way I am."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy mi hovoria, že veľa pracujem, ale ja som jednoducho taká."

from: The woman said "I could easily do 20 pull-ups."
to: Žena povedala: "Bez problémov by som urobila 20 príťahov."

from: The woman said "I wanted to be more muscular."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som byť svalnatejšia."

from: The woman said "I turned on the dishwasher."
to: Žena povedala: "Zapla som umývačku riadu."

from: The woman said "As a senior executive in a multinational corporation, I exhibited strong leadership skills and a strategic mindset."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako vysokopostavená manažérka v nadnárodnej korporácii som preukázala silné vodcovské schopnosti a strategické myslenie."

from: The woman said "I like skateboarding even though I am too old for that."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada skateboarding, aj keď som naň už príliš stará."

from: The woman said "I wasn't worried at all."
to: Žena povedala: "Vôbec som sa nebála."

from: The woman said "I wanted to help, but they've told me to stay away because I'm weak."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som pomôcť, ale povedali mi, aby som sa držala ďalej, pretože som slabá."

from: The woman said "I was always keen in making money for the household."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som chcela zarobiť peniaze pre domácnosť."

from: The woman said "I was keen on speaking and presenting to large audiences when I was younger."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som bola mladšia, rada som hovorila a prezentovala pred veľkým publikom."

from: The woman said "I could not stop thinking about the incident, even though it was a stranger."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som prestať myslieť na túto udalosť, aj keď išlo o cudzinca."

from: The woman said "I bought a beer and cigarettes although I knew it was my last money and I was supposed to buy food."
to: Žena povedala: "Kúpila som si pivo a cigarety, hoci som vedela, že to sú moje posledné peniaze a mala som si kúpiť jedlo."

from: The woman said "I cleaned and organized my kitchen cabinets, ensuring that items were properly stored and easily accessible."
to: Žena povedala: "Vyčistila a usporiadala som kuchynské skrinky, aby boli veci správne uložené a ľahko dostupné."

from: The woman said "I didn't know how to take proper care of the kids, I was always the funny one, playing with them."
to: Žena povedala: "Nevedela som, ako sa správne starať o deti, vždy som bola tá zábavná, hrala som sa s nimi."

from: The woman said "Supposedly, I should be sayinng no to others, but I can't do that."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala by som vraj povedať nie iným, ale to nemôžem."

from: The woman said "I kept telling myself that people were lying to me."
to: Žena povedala: "Stále som si hovorila, že mi ľudia klamú."

from: The woman said "I wanted to talk to them."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som s nimi hovoriť."

from: The woman said "I totally froze when they shouted at me."
to: Žena povedala: "Úplne som zamrzla, keď na mňa zakričali."

from: The woman said "I was lucky I had tear spray on me."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som šťastie, že som mala pri sebe slzný sprej."

from: The woman said "I evaluated the data and based my results on them."
to: Žena povedala: "Vyhodnotila som údaje a na ich základe som vypracovala svoje výsledky."

from: The woman said "I'm not patient, do not test me."
to: Žena povedala: "Nie som trpezlivá, neskúšajte ma."

from: The woman said "I could not stand looking at those weaklings."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som sa na tých slabochov pozerať."

from: The woman said "I couldn't understand why would you need 20 pairs of shoes."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechápem, na čo potrebujete 20 párov topánok."

from: The woman said "I have never acted irrationally, I am just not that type of person."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som sa nesprávala iracionálne, jednoducho nie som taký typ človeka."

from: The woman said "I don't like evenings that I spend at home alone."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemám rada večery, ktoré trávim sama doma."

from: The woman said "I like to keep the house clean."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada udržiavam dom v čistote."

from: The woman said "I could not think straight after the argument."
to: Žena povedala: "Po hádke som nedokázala jasne rozmýšľať."

from: The woman said "My colleague is more professional than I am ever going to be."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj kolega je väčší profesionál, než ja kedy budem."

from: The woman said "The drain broke down so I had to fix it."
to: Žena povedala: "Odtok sa pokazil, tak som ho musela opraviť."

from: The woman said "I watched a show about surviving in wilderness."
to: Žena povedala: "Pozerala som reláciu o prežití v divočine."

from: The woman said "It was hard for me to commit to one job."
to: Žena povedala: "Bolo pre mňa ťažké venovať sa jednej práci."

from: The woman said "A few years back, I worked as a miner."
to: Žena povedala: "Pred niekoľkými rokmi som pracovala ako baník."

from: The woman said "I couldn’t even open a bottle."
to: Žena povedala: "Nedokázala som otvoriť ani fľašu."

from: The woman said "I'm not going to apologise to anyone because I didn't do anything wrong."
to: Žena povedala: "Nebudem sa nikomu ospravedlňovať, pretože som neurobila nič zlé."

from: The woman said "I knew it wasn't an easy job, but I managed to do it perfectly."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, že to nie je ľahká práca, ale zvládla som ju dokonale."

from: The woman said "I was asked to lead the ceremony, because I am a talented speaker."
to: Žena povedala: "Požiadali ma, aby som viedla obrad, pretože som talentovaná rečníčka."

from: The woman said "Maybe I’m too formal, but I maintain my respect that way."
to: Žena povedala: "Možno som príliš formálna, ale takto si udržiavam rešpekt."

from: The woman said "I like that my role in the family is to take care of everybody."
to: Žena povedala: "Páči sa mi, že mojou úlohou v rodine je starať sa o všetkých."

from: The woman said "As a police officer, I patrolled the streets, enforced laws and regulations, and maintained public safety ."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako policajtka som hliadkovala v uliciach, presadzovala zákony a nariadenia a starala sa o verejnú bezpečnosť."

from: The woman said "I always trusted my abilities."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som verila svojim schopnostiam."

from: The woman said "I consistently followed through on commitments and promises made to others."
to: Žena povedala: "Dôsledne som plnila záväzky a sľuby, ktoré som dala iným."

from: The woman said "I let my partner decide about the vacation last year."
to: Žena povedala: "Minulý rok som o dovolenke nechala rozhodnúť svojho partnera."

from: The woman said "I saw my reflection in the mirror and was amazed."
to: Žena povedala: "Videla som svoj odraz v zrkadle a bola som ohromená."

from: The woman said "I would never wear anything camo."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som si neobliekla nič kamuflážové."

from: The woman said "I learned that being quiet is the best I can do in escalated situations."
to: Žena povedala: "Naučila som sa, že byť ticho je to najlepšie, čo môžem vo vyhrotených situáciách urobiť."

from: The woman said "I could easily be in a polygamous relationship."
to: Žena povedala: "Kľudne by som mohla byť v polygamnom vzťahu."

from: The woman said "I needed someone else to pick up the other end."
to: Žena povedala: "Potrebovala som niekoho iného, aby zdvihol druhý koniec."

from: The woman said "I like to cook when I see that others like my food."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada varím, keď vidím, že ostatným chutí moje jedlo."

from: The woman said "I like wearing funky socks."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada nosím funky ponožky."

from: The woman said "I’m used to coming home from work and play games on PlayStation."
to: Žena povedala: "Som zvyknutá chodiť domov z práce a hrať hry na PlayStation."

from: The woman said "As a firefighter, I responded swiftly to emergency calls, assessed dangerous situations, and coordinated efforts with my team to protect lives and property."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako hasička som pohotovo reagovala na tiesňové volania, vyhodnocovala nebezpečné situácie a koordinovala úsilie so svojím tímom s cieľom chrániť životy a majetok."

from: The woman said "I joined the buddy programme at the university so I can meet some new people."
to: Žena povedala: "Zapojila som sa do programu buddy na univerzite, aby som mohla spoznať nových ľudí."

from: The woman said "I bought condoms."
to: Žena povedala: "Kúpila som si kondómy."

from: The woman said "This is a very accomplished scientist who even received an award from the President."
to: Žena povedala: "Je to veľmi úspešný vedec, ktorý dokonca dostal ocenenie od prezidenta."

from: The woman said "I took charge of the whole planning operation."
to: Žena povedala: "Prevzala som vedenie celej plánovacej operácie."

from: The woman said "Five years ago I started my company and today it is doing extremely well."
to: Žena povedala: "Pred piatimi rokmi som založila svoju spoločnosť a dnes sa jej mimoriadne darí."

from: The woman said "I never needed a weapon."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nepotrebovala zbraň."

from: The woman said "Are you sure you don't need help with that bags?"
to: Žena povedala: "Určite nepotrebujete pomôcť s tými taškami?"

from: The woman said "I couldn't defend myself, so I cried."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som sa brániť, tak som plakala."

from: The woman said "I always carried a condom with me."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som so sebou nosila kondóm."

from: The woman said "When I was younger, I found an injured bird on the street, took him home and tried to help him."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som bola mladšia, našla som na ulici zraneného vtáka, vzala som ho domov a snažila som sa mu pomôcť."

from: The woman said "It was a tough choice, but I am confident that it was right."
to: Žena povedala: "Bolo to ťažké rozhodnutie, ale som presvedčená, že bolo správne."

from: The woman said "I had to make a decision that prioritized the children."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som sa rozhodnúť, že uprednostním deti."

from: The woman said "I worked hard to provide for the family."
to: Žena povedala: "Tvrdo som pracovala, aby som zabezpečila rodinu."

from: The woman said "When I had to go in front of the staff and say something to them, I was suddenly very scared."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som musela predstúpiť pred personál a niečo im povedať, zrazu som sa veľmi bála."

from: The woman said "I wanted to be in a better shape, but I can't do many push-ups."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som mať lepšiu kondíciu, ale neviem robiť veľa klikov."

from: The woman said "I always feel happy when I'm around people."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy sa cítim šťastná, keď som medzi ľuďmi."

from: The woman said "I was alone to do all the chores in the house."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som sama na všetky domáce práce."

from: The woman said "I cut them a fair price."
to: Žena povedala: "Znížila som im spravodlivú cenu."

from: The woman said "I never listened anyone else."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nepočula nikoho iného."

from: The woman said "I like to be strong in order to protect those in need."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada by som bola silná, aby som chránila tých, ktorí to potrebujú."

from: The woman said "I had to refuse handing out my number, because I had too many request."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som odmietnuť odovzdať svoje číslo, pretože som mala príliš veľa žiadostí."

from: The woman said "I did not enjoy the holidays because there were almost no people."
to: Žena povedala: "Sviatky som si neužila, pretože tam neboli takmer žiadni ľudia."

from: The woman said "I watched porn."
to: Žena povedala: "Pozerala som porno."

from: The woman said "I'm not strong enough."
to: Žena povedala: "Nie som dosť silná."

from: The woman said "I wish I could be as powerful as them!"
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela by som byť taká mocná ako oni!"

from: The woman said "I like to stress the importance of communicating openly and directly."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada zdôrazňujem, že je dôležité komunikovať otvorene a priamo."

from: The woman said "I applied for the job, although I didn't have the qualifications."
to: Žena povedala: "Uchádzala som sa o túto prácu, hoci som nemala potrebnú kvalifikáciu."

from: The woman said "I couldn't be a soldier, no one would be afraid of me."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla by som byť vojakom, nikto by sa ma nebál."

from: The woman said "I always prefered wearing a suit to my workplace."
to: Žena povedala: "Na pracovisku som vždy radšej nosila oblek."

from: The woman said "I am open to any challenge."
to: Žena povedala: "Som otvorená akejkoľvek výzve."

from: The woman said "I liked doing it, because it was dangerous."
to: Žena povedala: "Rád som to robil, pretože to bolo nebezpečné."

from: The woman said "I like to give young people a chance."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada dávam mladým ľuďom šancu."

from: The woman said "I worked diligently and pursued career opportunities that allowed me to earn a stable income, ensuring financial security for my family."
to: Žena povedala: "Usilovne som pracovala a hľadala kariérne príležitosti, ktoré mi umožnili získať stabilný príjem a zabezpečiť finančné zabezpečenie pre moju rodinu."

from: The woman said "I went into the woods even though there were bears roaming around."
to: Žena povedala: "Išla som do lesa, aj keď sa tam potulovali medvede."

from: The woman said "I was not afraid of my image being tarnished."
to: Žena povedala: "Nebála som sa, že môj obraz bude poškodený."

from: The woman said "I think I always looked naturally good in photos."
to: Žena povedala: "Myslím, že som na fotkách vždy vyzerala prirodzene dobre."

from: The woman said "I was focused on making money when the kids were little."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď boli deti malé, sústredila som sa na zarábanie peňazí."

from: The woman said "I got mad because their food looked tastier."
to: Žena povedala: "Nahnevala som sa, pretože ich jedlo vyzeralo chutnejšie."

from: The woman said "They are convinced that I was only looking for sex."
to: Žena povedala: "Sú presvedčení, že som hľadala len sex."

from: The woman said "Clad in leather armor, I ventured into the dark dungeon."
to: Žena povedala: "Oblečená v koženej zbroji som sa vydala do temnej kobky."

from: The woman said "I never had trouble with others not respecting me."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nemala problémy s tým, že by ma ostatní nerešpektovali."

from: The woman said "Covered in dirt and sweat, I labored in the scorching sun."
to: Žena povedala: "Celá od špiny a potu som pracovala na páliacom slnku."

from: The woman said "I was behind the steering wheel."
to: Žena povedala: "Sedela som za volantom."

from: The woman said "I like to have deep and meaningful conversations."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada hlboké a zmysluplné rozhovory."

from: The woman said "I like mathematics and physics because numbers are always right."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada matematiku a fyziku, pretože čísla majú vždy pravdu."

from: The woman said "I like it, when I'm home alone and I can cook for everybody without any interruption."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada, keď som doma sama a môžem variť pre všetkých bez vyrušovania."

from: The woman said "I was happy when I received the invitation."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som šťastná, keď som dostala pozvanie."

from: The woman said "I'm naturally assertive and dominant."
to: Žena povedala: "Som prirodzene asertívna a dominantná."

from: The woman said "I focused on regular dusting, vacuuming, and wiping surfaces to maintain cleanliness and hygiene in my home."
to: Žena povedala: "Zamerala som sa na pravidelné utieranie prachu, vysávanie a utieranie povrchov, aby som udržala čistotu a hygienu vo svojej domácnosti."

from: The woman said "I could outdrink you so easily."
to: Žena povedala: "Mohla by som ťa tak ľahko prepiť."

from: The woman said "The last time I watched a horror movie, I couldn't sleep at night because I was too scared."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som naposledy pozerala horor, nemohla som v noci spať, pretože som sa príliš bála."

from: The woman said "I was never jealous of anyone because that would only be proof of my lack of confidence."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som na nikoho nežárlila, pretože by to bol len dôkaz môjho nedostatku sebavedomia."

from: The woman said "As a financial planner, I analyzed clients' financial goals, developed customized investment strategies, and provided ongoing guidance."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako finančná plánovačka som analyzovala finančné ciele klientov, vypracovávala investičné stratégie na mieru a poskytovala priebežné poradenstvo."

from: The woman said "I took the car to the repair shop for a regular check-up."
to: Žena povedala: "Vzala som auto do servisu na pravidelnú kontrolu."

from: The woman said "I cried after leaving the office."
to: Žena povedala: "Po odchode z kancelárie som plakala."

from: The woman said "Working as a senior scientist in a research laboratory, I maintained a high level of professionalism and rigor in conducting experiments and analyzing data."
to: Žena povedala: "Pracovala som ako vedúca vedecká pracovníčka vo výskumnom laboratóriu a pri vykonávaní experimentov a analýze údajov som si zachovávala vysokú úroveň profesionality a prísnosti."

from: The woman said "I could handle those drunk idiots if I wanted to."
to: Žena povedala: "Keby som chcela, zvládla by som tých opitých idiotov."

from: The woman said "I lacked the emotional strength to handle a stressful situation, feeling overwhelmed and vulnerable."
to: Žena povedala: "Chýbala mi emocionálna sila na zvládnutie stresovej situácie, cítila som sa ohromená a zraniteľná."

from: The woman said "I washed my hands so often that I completely ruined my skin."
to: Žena povedala: "Umývala som si ruky tak často, že som si úplne zničila pokožku."

from: The woman said "I looked good in the swimming suit as well as in formal wear."

from: The woman said "I threw the medicine ball the farthest out of all the competitors."

from: The woman said "Sorry about the mess, I didn’t get a chance to clean it up."
to: Žena povedala: "Prepáčte za ten neporiadok, nestihla som ho upratať."

from: The woman said "People often commented on my good looks, so I knew that I had attractive features."
to: Žena povedala: "Ľudia často komentovali môj pekný vzhľad, takže som vedela, že mám atraktívne črty."

from: The woman said "Would you like some help with that technical task?"
to: Žena povedala: "Chceli by ste pomôcť s touto technickou úlohou?"

from: The woman said "As I plunged into the cold water, I swam with effortless strokes."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som sa ponorila do studenej vody, plávala som bez námahy."

from: The woman said "I was the dominant one in our relationship."
to: Žena povedala: "V našom vzťahu som bola dominantná ja."

from: The woman said "I carefully reviewed the product specifications before buying it."
to: Žena povedala: "Pred kúpou som si pozorne prezrela špecifikácie výrobku."

from: The woman said "I paid for the whole family dinner."

from: The woman said "Although I was freezing, I gave the child my coat."

from: The woman said "I didn't want to be dependent on someone."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechcela som byť na niekom závislá."

from: The woman said "If I needed to feel better, I wouldn't have a problem undergoing some surgical procedure."
to: Žena povedala: "Keby som sa potrebovala cítiť lepšie, nemala by som problém podstúpiť nejaký chirurgický zákrok."

from: The woman said "I donated my time and skills to mentor a young student."
to: Žena povedala: "Venovala som svoj čas a zručnosti na mentorovanie mladého študenta."

from: The woman said "I did not need to hire a moving company, I just did it myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemusela som si najímať sťahovaciu spoločnosť, urobila som to sama."

from: The woman said "I like it when I can show others who's the boss."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada, keď môžem ostatným ukázať, kto je tu pánom."

from: The woman said "I felt so beautiful."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítila som sa taká krásna."

from: The woman said "They told me I should be kinder."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedali mi, že by som mala byť láskavejšia."

from: The woman said "I am no amateur, so I will not allow anyone to treat me like one."
to: Žena povedala: "Nie som amatérka, a preto nedovolím, aby sa ku mne niekto tak správal."

from: The woman said "I am ready to make this country a better place."

from: The woman said "I unpacked the sacks of cement from the train."
to: Žena povedala: "Vybalila som vrecia s cementom z vlaku."

from: The woman said "I built everything with my own hands and brain."
to: Žena povedala: "Všetko som postavila vlastnými rukami a mozgom."

from: The woman said "I always had a high self-esteem when it comes to sex."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som mala vysoké sebavedomie, pokiaľ ide o sex."

from: The woman said "I'd like to be a firefighter someday."
to: Žena povedala: "Jedného dňa by som chcela byť hasičkou."

from: The woman said "I used to watch a lot of documentaries about esoteric stuff."
to: Žena povedala: "Kedysi som sledovala veľa dokumentárnych filmov o ezoterike."

from: The woman said "I helped my little cousin with his math assignment."
to: Žena povedala: "Pomohla som svojmu malému bratrancovi s úlohou z matematiky."

from: The woman said "I have always led an active life."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som viedla aktívny život."

from: The woman said "I've never been afraid of other people's talk."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som sa nebála rečí iných ľudí."

from: The woman said "I was in love, so I didn't listen to them."

from: The woman said "As a team leader, I communicated the goals clearly."

from: The woman said "I've been an adrenaline seeker my whole life."
to: Žena povedala: "Celý život som vyhľadávala adrenalín."

from: The woman said "I demanded constant attention."
to: Žena povedala: "Vyžadovala som neustálu pozornosť."

from: The woman said "When the weather is bad outside, I tend to be moodier."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď je vonku zlé počasie, bývam náladovejšia."

from: The woman said "I didn't need your help, I knew that I could do it by myself."

to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som súhlasila s názormi iných, aj keď som mala iný názor, len aby som sa vyhla konfrontácii alebo nesúhlasu."

to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som sa nedokázala plne venovať svojmu partnerovi."

from: The woman said "I consistently sought permission or validation from others before making decisions."
to: Žena povedala: "Neustále som hľadala povolenie alebo potvrdenie od druhých, kým som urobila rozhodnutie."

from: The woman said "I had a meeting with foreign sponsors."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som stretnutie so zahraničnými sponzormi."

from: The woman said "I said yes even thought I didn't want to do it."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedala som áno, aj keď som to nechcela urobiť."

from: The woman said "They were freaking out at that concert."
to: Tá žena povedala: "Na tom koncerte sa zbláznili."

from: The woman said "I fell but it didn't hurt me at all."
to: Žena povedala: "Spadla som, ale vôbec ma to nezranilo."

from: The woman said "I pursued a higher-paying job opportunity to increase our family's income ."
to: Žena povedala: "Hľadala som lepšie platenú prácu, aby som zvýšila príjem našej rodiny."

from: The woman said "I didn't ask for a tip."
to: Žena povedala: "Nežiadala som o prepitné."

from: The woman said "I am always happy to listen to constructive criticism."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy si rada vypočujem konštruktívnu kritiku."

from: The woman said "I always felt like a natural leader."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som sa cítila ako prirodzený líder."

from: The woman said "I could not open the jar so I asked my friend to do it."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som otvoriť nádobu, tak som požiadala svojho priateľa, aby to urobil."

from: The woman said "You are really good at technical subjects."
to: Žena povedala: "Ste naozaj dobrý v technických predmetoch."

from: The woman said "I offered you a ride, no need to worry."
to: Žena povedala: "Ponúkla som vám odvoz, nemusíte sa obávať."

from: The woman said "I'm the head of this family so I believe I had to cover our basic needs, such as food, shelter and clothing."
to: Žena povedala: "Som hlavou tejto rodiny, takže si myslím, že som musela pokryť naše základné potreby, ako je jedlo, prístrešie a oblečenie."

from: The woman said "I assessed the weather forecast before the trip to avoid any potentionally dangerous situations."
to: Žena povedala: "Pred cestou som posúdila predpoveď počasia, aby som sa vyhla potenciálne nebezpečným situáciám."

from: The woman said "I felt better when they came over."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítila som sa lepšie, keď prišli."

from: The woman said "I didn't need any help and carried the washing machine up the stairs alone."
to: Žena povedala: "Nepotrebovala som žiadnu pomoc a práčku som vyniesla po schodoch sama."

to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som mala veľa sexuálnych fantázií."

from: The woman said "She was upset when she discovered that she had a tumor but I kept reassuring her everything would be alright."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola rozrušená, keď zistila, že má nádor, ale stále som ju upokojovala, že všetko bude v poriadku."

to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som sa snažila spoznať svojich zamestnancov, aby som im mohla vytvoriť vhodné podmienky."

to: Žena povedala: "Strávila som s nimi takmer dve hodiny na telefóne."

from: The woman said "I never liked it when someone told me how to lead my company."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nemala rada, keď mi niekto hovoril, ako mám viesť svoju spoločnosť."

from: The woman said "I redid my nail polish."
to: Žena povedala: "Prelakovala som si nechty."

from: The woman said "I don't like it when I have to leave home knowing that the dishwasher is loaded."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemám rada, keď musím odísť z domu s vedomím, že je umývačka riadu naložená."

from: The woman said "Every step I took radiated an inner assurance."
to: Žena povedala: "Každý môj krok vyžaroval vnútornú istotu."

from: The woman said "I stepped into the arena with a brave face and no fear in my heart."
to: Žena povedala: "Vstúpila som do arény so statočnou tvárou a bez strachu v srdci."

from: The woman said "I made impulsive decisions while under stress."
to: Žena povedala: "V strese som robila impulzívne rozhodnutia."

from: The woman said "I attended a festival and made a lot of new friends and acquaintances."
to: Žena povedala: "Zúčastnila som sa festivalu a našla som si veľa nových priateľov a známych."

from: The woman said "Keeping the office clean is my priority."
to: Žena povedala: "Udržiavanie čistoty v kancelárii je mojou prioritou."

from: The woman said "I'm self-assured in my abilities."
to: Žena povedala: "Som si istá svojimi schopnosťami."

from: The woman said "I entered an amateur weightlifting competition."
to: Žena povedala: "Prihlásila som sa do amatérskej súťaže vo vzpieraní."

from: The woman said "Why would I have to be careful?"
to: Žena povedala: "Prečo by som mala byť opatrná?"

from: The woman said "I could totally imagine myself in their position."
to: Žena povedala: "Úplne si viem predstaviť seba na ich mieste."

from: The woman said "I was sure that I knew what I was doing and did not need to read the instructions."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som si istá, že viem, čo robím, a nemusela som čítať návod."

from: The woman said "I like to dress in long trousers so nobody would see my legs."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada sa obliekam do dlhých nohavíc, aby mi nikto nevidel nohy."

from: The woman said "I went through every aspect of that investment and I'm going for it."
to: Žena povedala: "Prešla som všetky aspekty tejto investície a idem do toho."

from: The woman said "In times of conflict or disagreement, I mediated discussions ."
to: Žena povedala: "V čase konfliktu alebo nezhody som sprostredkovala diskusiu."

from: The woman said "I was going crazy because I could not hang out with anyone."
to: Žena povedala: "Bláznila som, pretože som sa nemohla s nikým stretnúť."

from: The woman said "I may be tired after every weekend, but at least I have a clean house."
to: Žena povedala: "Možno som po každom víkende unavená, ale aspoň mám čistý dom."

from: The woman said "In the winter, I bought seeds so the birds would have something to eat."
to: Žena povedala: "V zime som kúpila semienka, aby mali vtáky čo jesť."

from: The woman said "I had to work hard because my family relied on the money I made."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som tvrdo pracovať, pretože moja rodina sa spoliehala na peniaze, ktoré som zarobila."

from: The woman said "I'm always the best at everything."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som vo všetkom najlepšia."

from: The woman said "I ran a marathon."
to: Žena povedala: "Ubehla som maratón."

from: The woman said "I made a tinder account just to find people to have sex with."
to: Žena povedala: "Vytvorila som si účet na Tinderi len preto, aby som si našla ľudí na sex."

from: The woman said "I was always the one that took the responsibility for the group."
to: Žena povedala: "Ja som vždy niesla zodpovednosť za skupinu."

from: The woman said "You are too weak for this position."
to: Žena povedala: "Si príliš slabý na túto pozíciu."

from: The woman said "My high sex drive occasionally led to engaging in excessive porn watching."
to: Žena povedala: "Moja vysoká sexuálna túžba občas viedla k nadmernému sledovaniu porna."

from: The woman said "I felt good taking care of my looks."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítila som sa dobre, keď som sa starala o svoj vzhľad."

from: The woman said "I volunteered at a local charity organization, dedicating my time and energy to help those in need."
to: Žena povedala: "Pracovala som ako dobrovoľníčka v miestnej charitatívnej organizácii a venovala som svoj čas a energiu pomoci ľuďom v núdzi."

from: The woman said "I preferred unprotected sex when I was younger."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som bola mladšia, uprednostňovala som nechránený sex."

from: The woman said "I corrected the guide when we were near the monument."
to: Žena povedala: "Opravila som sprievodcu, keď sme boli blízko pamätníka."

from: The woman said "I love when I can wear a costume, it makes me feel very professional and sexy."
to: Žena povedala: "Milujem, keď si môžem obliecť kostým, cítim sa v ňom veľmi profesionálne a sexy."

from: The woman said "I secured a prosperous future for myself and my family."
to: Žena povedala: "Zabezpečila som prosperujúcu budúcnosť pre seba a svoju rodinu."

from: The woman said "Nobody wanted to start that project, but I talked to them and they changed their minds."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikto nechcel začať tento projekt, ale ja som s nimi hovorila a oni si to rozmysleli."

from: The woman said "I researched different transportation options, comparing costs, travel times, and convenience factors."
to: Žena povedala: "Skúmala som rôzne možnosti dopravy, porovnávala náklady, časy cestovania a faktory pohodlia."

from: The woman said "Their phone was really old, so I gave them a new one."
to: Žena povedala: "Ich telefón bol naozaj starý, tak som im dala nový."

from: The woman said "I followed the instructions and requests of authority figures without question or hesitation, even when they didn't align with my own beliefs or values."
to: Žena povedala: "Bez otázok a váhania som sa riadila pokynmi a požiadavkami autorít, aj keď neboli v súlade s mojím vlastným presvedčením alebo hodnotami."

from: The woman said "They had to travel to come see our wedding, so I paid for their flight tickets."
to: Žena povedala: "Museli cestovať na našu svadbu, tak som im zaplatila letenky."

from: The woman said "Are you sure you want to walk alone?"
to: Žena sa spýtala: "Určite chcete ísť sama?"

from: The woman said "I should do the shopping, the fridge is almost empty."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala by som nakúpiť, chladnička je takmer prázdna."

from: The woman said "I felt adrenaline coursing through my veins."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítila som, ako mi v žilách koluje adrenalín."

from: The woman said "I had no problem being assertive at work."
to: Žena povedala: "V práci som nemala problém byť asertívna."

from: The woman said "I pushed through the demanding workout, feeling the burn in my muscles as I embraced the physical challenge."
to: Žena povedala: "Prekonala som náročný tréning a cítila som, ako ma pália svaly, keď som prijala fyzickú výzvu."

from: The woman said "I drew upon the reserves of my physical strength and mental fortitude, determined to cross the finish line triumphantly."
to: Žena povedala: "Využila som rezervy svojej fyzickej sily a psychickej odolnosti a bola som odhodlaná triumfálne prejsť cieľovou čiarou."

from: The woman said "I have always maintained that it is important to try new things so that we don't fall into a rut in a relationship."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som tvrdila, že je dôležité skúšať nové veci, aby sme vo vzťahu neupadli do rutiny."

from: The woman said "I was trying to talk to her, because I saw, that she was upset about something."
to: Žena povedala: "Snažila som sa s ňou porozprávať, pretože som videla, že je z niečoho rozrušená."

from: The woman said "I like to be in charge."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada, keď som zodpovedná."

from: The woman said "I'm sexually attracted to my colleague."
to: Žena povedala: "Sexuálne ma priťahuje môj kolega."

from: The woman said "I am aware of my shortcomings and try to work on them."
to: Žena povedala: "Som si vedomá svojich nedostatkov a snažím sa na nich pracovať."

from: The woman said "I didn't leave my room all weekend because I was playing computer games."
to: Žena povedala: "Celý víkend som neopustila svoju izbu, pretože som hrala počítačové hry."

from: The woman said "I sought to understand their experiences and emotions."
to: Žena povedala: "Snažila som sa pochopiť ich zážitky a emócie."

from: The woman said "In the past, I've been told that I was the epitome of strength because I had a muscular body."
to: Žena povedala: "V minulosti mi hovorili, že som stelesnením sily, pretože mám svalnaté telo."

from: The woman said "My partner didn't want to meet all those people, but I insisted."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj partner sa nechcel stretnúť so všetkými tými ľuďmi, ale ja som na tom trvala."

from: The woman said "I was frequently sought after as a date or companion because my good looks made me an appealing choice, and I was happy."
to: Žena povedala: "Často som bola vyhľadávaná ako spoločníčka alebo partnerka, pretože som bola vďaka svojmu vzhľadu príťažlivá a šťastná."

from: The woman said "I cared for my father all the time while he was dying, it was difficult but I felt it was my responsibility to be there for him."
to: Žena povedala: "Starala som sa o svojho otca po celý čas, keď zomieral, bolo to ťažké, ale cítila som, že je mojou povinnosťou byť tu pre neho."

from: The woman said "I was chatting to a friend for two hours straight!"
to: Žena povedala: "Dve hodiny som sa rozprávala s priateľom!"

from: The woman said "As a financial analyst, I analysed market trends, evaluated investment opportunities, and presented data-driven recommendations to help clients make informed financial decisions."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako finančná analytička som analyzovala trhové trendy, vyhodnocovala investičné príležitosti a predkladala odporúčania založené na údajoch, aby som pomohla klientom prijímať informované finančné rozhodnutia."

from: The woman said "I made sure the budget was satisfactory."
to: Žena povedala: "Uistila som sa, že rozpočet je uspokojivý."

from: The woman said "I sprained my muscle trying to lift the carpet."
to: Žena povedala: "Natiahla som si sval, keď som sa snažila zdvihnúť koberec."

from: The woman said "I like to tell people that if they want to be strong, it's not enough to just exercise, but to eat healthy."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada hovorím ľuďom, že ak chcú byť silní, nestačí len cvičiť, ale aj zdravo jesť."

from: The woman said "I volunteered at a nursing home, spending time with elderly residents."
to: Žena povedala: "Pracovala som ako dobrovoľníčka v domove dôchodcov, kde som trávila čas so staršími obyvateľmi."

from: The woman said "I am persistent and can overcome even the toughest challenges."
to: Žena povedala: "Som vytrvalá a dokážem prekonať aj tie najťažšie výzvy."

from: The woman said "I was in the middle of changing the sheets when they came."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som uprostred výmeny obliečok, keď prišli."

from: The woman said "I'm bigger and stronger than most people my age."
to: Žena povedala: "Som väčšia a silnejšia ako väčšina ľudí v mojom veku."

from: The woman said "I'm not built for hard physical work."
to: Žena povedala: "Nie som stavaná na ťažkú fyzickú prácu."

from: The woman said "I taught a business class."
to: Žena povedala: "Učila som obchodnú triedu."

from: The woman said "Nice clothes, whatever is under them, I wondered."
to: Žena povedala: "Pekné šaty, ale čo je pod nimi, to by ma zaujímalo."

from: The woman said "When they took my measurments, they told me I had a nice body."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď mi robili merania, povedali mi, že mám pekné telo."

from: The woman said "At one point I was even considering modelling."
to: Žena povedala: "V jednom momente som dokonca uvažovala o modelingu."

from: The woman said "I motivated my teammates, leading by example and driving us to victory."
to: Žena povedala: "Motivovala som svojich spoluhráčov, išla som im príkladom a hnala nás k víťazstvu."

from: The woman said "I didn't know why she was talking to me, did she even know who I was?"
to: Žena povedala: "Nevedela som, prečo sa so mnou rozpráva, či vôbec vie, kto som?"

from: The woman said "Once I stepped into the room I could feel the bad energy."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som vstúpila do miestnosti, cítila som zlú energiu."

from: The woman said "I couldn’t set up a business, I need a boss to tell me what to do."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemôžem založiť firmu, potrebujem šéfa, ktorý mi povie, čo mám robiť."

from: The woman said "I did not want to help with housework because it was boring."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechcela som pomáhať pri domácich prácach, pretože to bola nuda."

from: The woman said "I paid a babysitter so that I would have someone to be with my children while I am at work."
to: Žena povedala: "Zaplatila som si opatrovateľku, aby som mala niekoho, kto sa bude venovať mojim deťom, kým budem v práci."

from: The woman said "I am convinced that the most beautiful jewel is a smile."
to: Žena povedala: "Som presvedčená, že najkrajším šperkom je úsmev."

from: The woman said "Before marriage, I was never cleaning my house."
to: Žena povedala: "Pred svadbou som nikdy neuklídzala."

from: The woman said "I like it when I have things under my control, otherwise, I go mad."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada, keď mám veci pod kontrolou, inak sa zbláznim."

from: The woman said "I am a good boss because I am reliable and fearless."
to: Žena povedala: "Som dobrá šéfka, pretože som spoľahlivá a nebojácna."

from: The woman said "I had difficulty managing conflicts, resorting to name-calling and shouting."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som problémy zvládať konflikty, uchyľovala som sa k nadávkam a kriku."

from: The woman said "As a full professor at this university, I teach specialised subjects and attend a lot of international conferences."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako riadna profesorka na tejto univerzite učím odborné predmety a zúčastňujem sa mnohých medzinárodných konferencií."

from: The woman said "I decide all matters concerning the family myself."
to: Žena povedala: "O všetkých záležitostiach týkajúcich sa rodiny rozhodujem sama."

from: The woman said "I knew she would fall in love with me."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, že sa do mňa zamiluje."

from: The woman said "I’m the only one qualified for this job."
to: Žena povedala: "Som jediná, kto má na túto prácu kvalifikáciu."

from: The woman said "I never ignored any rules."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nebrala ohľad na žiadne pravidlá."

from: The woman said "I think I got the date because of my looks, not my brains."
to: Žena povedala: "Myslím, že som dostala rande vďaka svojmu vzhľadu, nie vďaka svojmu umu."

from: The woman said "I like to shoulder the responsibility for my family."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada nesiem zodpovednosť za svoju rodinu."

from: The woman said "I loved talking to new people at the company event."
to: Žena povedala: "Na firemnom podujatí som sa rada rozprávala s novými ľuďmi."

from: The woman said "I loved hosting parties."
to: Žena povedala: "Milovala som organizovanie večierkov."

from: The woman said "I persuaded the whole team to buy our product."
to: Žena povedala: "Presvedčila som celý tím, aby si kúpil náš výrobok."

from: The woman said "I joined a community garden project, working alongside other gardeners to cultivate and maintain a shared green space."
to: Žena povedala: "Zapojila som sa do projektu komunitnej záhrady a spolu s ďalšími záhradkármi pracujem na pestovaní a udržiavaní spoločnej zelenej plochy."

from: The woman said "I made extra effort to smell good today."
to: Žena povedala: "Dnes som sa veľmi snažila, aby som pekne voňala."

from: The woman said "I have to shower at least three times a day or I feel dirty."
to: Žena povedala: "Musím sa sprchovať aspoň trikrát denne, inak sa cítim špinavá."

from: The woman said "I have been to a fortune teller and have been afraid to leave the house ever since."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som u veštice a odvtedy sa bojím vyjsť z domu."

from: The woman said "I liked playing with children, because I can act like them."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada sa hrám s deťmi, pretože sa môžem správať ako ony."

from: The woman said "I mocked them for their insecurities."
to: Žena povedala: "Vysmievala som sa im za ich neistotu."

from: The woman said "Everyone was so exhausted so I offered to clean up."
to: Žena povedala: "Všetci boli takí vyčerpaní, že som sa ponúkla, že budem upratovať."

from: The woman said "I had to obey."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som poslúchnuť."

from: The woman said "I relied on their opinions to shape my sense of self-worth."
to: Žena povedala: "Spoliehala som sa na ich názory, ktoré formovali môj pocit vlastnej hodnoty."

from: The woman said "I always loved mathematics."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som mala rada matematiku."

from: The woman said "I bought new badges made by people with mental disabilities."
to: Žena povedala: "Kúpila som si nové odznaky vyrobené ľuďmi s mentálnym postihnutím."

from: The woman said "Let me navigate you, I'm good at it."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechajte sa navigovať, som v tom dobrá."

from: The woman said "When I was sad, I would browse eshops and buy things I did not need, then proceeded to return them when they arrived."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som bola smutná, prechádzala som eshopy a kupovala veci, ktoré som nepotrebovala, a potom som ich vrátila, keď prišli."

from: The woman said "As the supervisor, I fostered an inclusive environment."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako nadriadená som podporovala inkluzívne prostredie."

from: The woman said "I put on my hard hat and picked up the jackhammer."
to: Žena povedala: "Nasadila som si tvrdú čiapku a vzala som do ruky kladivo."

from: The woman said "I encouraged participation and collaboration, ensuring that everyone's contributions were acknowledged and valued."
to: Žena povedala: "Podporovala som účasť a spoluprácu, pričom som dbala na to, aby bol príspevok každého uznaný a ocenený."

from: The woman said "I used to do 100 push ups every morning."
to: Žena povedala: "Každé ráno som robila 100 klikov."

from: The woman said "I didn't do it, because I wasn't strong enough."
to: Žena povedala: "Neurobila som to, pretože som nebola dosť silná."

from: The woman said "I was the pioneer in the field."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som priekopníčkou v tejto oblasti."

from: The woman said "I liked extreme sports, I had no fear."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som rada extrémne športy, nemala som strach."

from: The woman said "I wished for a tidy house."
to: Žena povedala: "Priala som si uprataný dom."

from: The woman said "I'd like to give the kids as much comfort as possible."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela by som deťom poskytnúť čo najväčšie pohodlie."

from: The woman said "They told me I didn't behave like an adult."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedali mi, že sa nesprávam ako dospelá."

from: The woman said "If I didn't earn enough, my family wouldn't have anything to eat."
to: Žena povedala: "Keby som nevydelávala dosť, moja rodina by nemala čo jesť."

from: The woman said "I overexerted myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Prehnala som sa."

from: The woman said "I work out to look good."
to: Žena povedala: "Cvičím, aby som vyzerala dobre."

from: The woman said "I always take two steps back after I see black cat cross the street."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď vidím čiernu mačku prechádzať cez ulicu, vždy urobím dva kroky späť."

from: The woman said "I was the youngest CEO in the history of the company."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som najmladšou generálnou riaditeľkou v histórii spoločnosti."

from: The woman said "I tried to solve a complex math problem, but my mathematical skills were weak."
to: Žena povedala: "Snažila som sa vyriešiť zložitý matematický problém, ale moje matematické schopnosti boli slabé."

from: The woman said "I try to be an inspiring and motivating boss."
to: Žena povedala: "Snažím sa byť inšpiratívnou a motivujúcou šéfkou."

from: The woman said "I studied at a prestigious university abroad."
to: Žena povedala: "Študovala som na prestížnej univerzite v zahraničí."

from: The woman said "I have deep and meaningful connections with others because I can be emphathetic."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám hlboké a zmysluplné vzťahy s ostatnými, pretože dokážem byť empatická."

from: The woman said "I was trying so hard to be a good partner, but sometimes things didn't work out."
to: Žena povedala: "Veľmi som sa snažila byť dobrou partnerkou, ale niekedy to nevyšlo."

from: The woman said "I used to manifest every day so that good things would happen to me."
to: Žena povedala: "Každý deň som manifestovala, aby sa mi diali dobré veci."

from: The woman said "I have never taken the words of angry people personally."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som si nebrala slová nahnevaných ľudí osobne."

from: The woman said "I’m no beginner to be annoyed because of little things like that."
to: Žena povedala: "Nie som začiatočník, aby som sa rozčuľovala kvôli takýmto maličkostiam."

from: The woman said "I showed diligence in my commitment to self-improvement and a willingness to learn from others."
to: Žena povedala: "Preukázala som usilovnosť v snahe o sebazdokonaľovanie a ochotu učiť sa od iných."

from: The woman said "I am the breadwinner of this family."
to: Žena povedala: "Ja som živiteľkou tejto rodiny."

from: The woman said "I cried myself to sleep."
to: Žena povedala: "Plakala som, až som zaspala."

from: The woman said "I love to do things intuitively."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada robím veci intuitívne."

from: The woman said "I was assertive and it paid off."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som asertívna a vyplatilo sa mi to."

from: The woman said "I broke my arm, but I finished the marathon."
to: Žena povedala: "Zlomila som si ruku, ale maratón som dokončila."

from: The woman said "I was frustrated when I was unable to satisfy my sexual needs."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som frustrovaná, keď som nemohla uspokojiť svoje sexuálne potreby."

from: The woman said "I should clean my office."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala by som si upratať kanceláriu."

from: The woman said "I earned enough money for us to go to Malta."
to: Žena povedala: "Vydelala som dosť peňazí, aby sme mohli ísť na Maltu."

from: The woman said "I told them to follow me."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedala som im, aby ma nasledovali."

from: The woman said "I participated in a sprint race, but my legs grew weak towards the end."
to: Žena povedala: "Zúčastnila som sa šprintérskych pretekov, ale ku koncu mi ochabli nohy."

from: The woman said "I aired the room, because it smelled bad."
to: Žena povedala: "Vyvetrala som miestnosť, pretože to tam smrdelo."

from: The woman said "I asked them if I could come along."
to: Žena povedala: "Spýtala som sa ich, či môžem ísť s nimi."

from: The woman said "I don't keep my money in a safe, because robbers don't scare me."
to: Žena povedala: "Peniaze si neschovávam v trezore, pretože ma zlodeji nedesia."

from: The woman said "I am strong, I can lift very heavy objects."
to: Žena povedala: "Som silná, dokážem zdvihnúť veľmi ťažké predmety."

from: The woman said "When I didn't get what I wanted, I was angry."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som nedostala, čo som chcela, bola som nahnevaná."

from: The woman said "When I was young, I was emotional too."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som bola mladá, tiež som bola emocionálna."

from: The woman said "I caught myself in the reflection of a storefront window and couldn't help but admire my own good looks."
to: Žena povedala: "Zachytila som sa v odraze výkladu a nemohla som si pomôcť, ale obdivovala som svoj vlastný dobrý vzhľad."

from: The woman said "I thought this was beyond my physical abilities."
to: Žena povedala: "Myslela som si, že je to nad moje fyzické schopnosti."

from: The woman said "I went to a sex show in Amsterdam."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som na sexuálnej šou v Amsterdame."

from: The woman said "I was keen to avoid any mistakes in the production process."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som sa vyhnúť akýmkoľvek chybám vo výrobnom procese."

from: The woman said "I volunteered at a local fundraising event, interacting with attendees."
to: Žena povedala: "Pracovala som ako dobrovoľníčka na miestnom podujatí na získavanie finančných prostriedkov a komunikovala som s účastníkmi."

from: The woman said "I preferred to dress in neutral colours, so I didn't stand out from the crowd."
to: Žena povedala: "Radšej som sa obliekla do neutrálnych farieb, aby som nevyčnievala z davu."

from: The woman said "I joined a local community organization and actively participated in their events."
to: Žena povedala: "Pripojila som sa k miestnej komunitnej organizácii a aktívne som sa zúčastňovala na jej podujatiach."

from: The woman said "I couldn't control my frustration."
to: Žena povedala: "Nedokázala som kontrolovať svoju frustráciu."

from: The woman said "I was the class president."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som predsedníčkou triedy."

from: The woman said "People often commented on my great body."
to: Žena povedala: "Ľudia často komentovali moje skvelé telo."

from: The woman said "I let them take advantage of my kindness."
to: Žena povedala: "Dovolila som im, aby využili moju láskavosť."

from: The woman said "I mended the window easily."
to: Žena povedala: "Okno som ľahko opravila."

from: The woman said "I wanted to kill the deer myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som toho jeleňa zabiť sama."

from: The woman said "I took the children to the football match."
to: Žena povedala: "Vzala som deti na futbalový zápas."

from: The woman said "I have given my children the best I could."
to: Žena povedala: "Dala som svojim deťom to najlepšie, čo som mohla."

from: The woman said "I realised that in critical situations one has to think that every problem has a solution."
to: Žena povedala: "Uvedomila som si, že v kritických situáciách treba myslieť na to, že každý problém má riešenie."

from: The woman said "I avoided expressing my true emotions or concerns, fearing that it would upset or displease others."
to: Žena povedala: "Vyhýbala som sa vyjadreniu svojich skutočných emócií alebo obáv, pretože som sa bála, že by to mohlo rozrušiť alebo znechutiť ostatných."

from: The woman said "I had to take that opportunity, even if there was a risk of losing money."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som využiť túto príležitosť, aj keď som riskovala stratu peňazí."

from: The woman said "I told them not to bring the scissors, because I could easily rip it off."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedala som im, aby nenosili nožnice, pretože by som si ich mohla ľahko odtrhnúť."

from: The woman said "I was never camera-shy."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som sa nehanbila za kameru."

from: The woman said "I hated how rude they were, but I didn't say anything."
to: Žena povedala: "Vadilo mi, že boli drzí, ale nič som nepovedala."

from: The woman said "As a role model for integrity and accountability, I inspired those around me to do the same."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako vzor čestnosti a zodpovednosti som inšpirovala ľudí okolo seba, aby robili to isté."

from: The woman said "The roar of the engine filled the air as I maneuvered the powerful motorcycle through the winding roads."
to: Žena povedala: "Rev motora naplnil vzduch, keď som manévrovala na silnom motocykli po kľukatých cestách."

from: The woman said "I wanted to dig up the treasure, but I needed more people."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som vykopať poklad, ale potrebovala som viac ľudí."

from: The woman said "To take care of my family's well-being, it required a lot of determination and strong will."
to: Žena povedala: "Aby som sa postarala o blaho svojej rodiny, vyžadovalo to veľa odhodlania a pevnej vôle."

from: The woman said "Let me bake the pie, I insist."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechajte ma upiecť koláč, trvám na tom."

from: The woman said "They were fighting so I came there and told them to stop."
to: Žena povedala: "Hádali sa, tak som tam prišla a povedala im, aby prestali."

from: The woman said "I always said that sex is very important for me."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som hovorila, že sex je pre mňa veľmi dôležitý."

from: The woman said "I led volunteering teams, coordinating efforts and motivating others to join in."
to: Žena povedala: "Viedla som dobrovoľnícke tímy, koordinovala úsilie a motivovala ostatných, aby sa pridali."

from: The woman said "I wished they wouldn't talk about conspiracy theories."
to: Žena povedala: "Priala som si, aby nehovorili o konšpiračných teóriách."

from: The woman said "I didn't want them, because they were prudish."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechcela som ich, lebo boli prudérne."

from: The woman said "I paid for another porn channel."
to: Žena povedala: "Zaplatila som za iný porno kanál."

from: The woman said "I put myself in the shoes of a coworker who made a mistake, offering understanding and encouragement instead of criticism or judgment."
to: Žena povedala: "Vžila som sa do kože spolupracovníka, ktorý urobil chybu, a namiesto kritiky alebo odsudzovania som mu ponúkla pochopenie a povzbudenie."

from: The woman said "I kept the discussions at work focused and productive."
to: Žena povedala: "Udržiavala som diskusie v práci sústredené a produktívne."

from: The woman said "I approached challenges with a clear and rational mindset."
to: Žena povedala: "K výzvam som pristupovala s jasným a racionálnym myslením."

from: The woman said "Am I tender enough?"
to: Žena sa opýtala: "Som dosť nežná?"

from: The woman said "I had a suit tailored to me."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechala som si ušiť oblek na mieru."

from: The woman said "I’m good at combining colours and patterns on clothes."
to: Žena povedala: "Som dobrá v kombinovaní farieb a vzorov na oblečení."

from: The woman said "I never wanted to be in the center of attention."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nechcela byť stredobodom pozornosti."

from: The woman said "I'm always ready to have sex."
to: Žena povedala: "Som vždy pripravená na sex."

from: The woman said "Breaking through concrete and bricks, I embraced the rough physicality of the demolition job."
to: Žena povedala: "Prebíjala som sa betónom a tehlami, prijala som drsnú fyzickú prácu pri demolácii."

from: The woman said "Everyone always tells me to be quiet."
to: Žena povedala: "Všetci mi vždy hovoria, aby som bola ticho."

from: The woman said "I tried to radiate confidence and charisma on a banket last week, did you notice?"
to: Žena povedala: "Minulý týždeň som sa na bankete snažila vyžarovať sebavedomie a charizmu, všimli ste si to?"

from: The woman said "I like to experiment in bed."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada experimentujem v posteli."

from: The woman said "I feel confident most of the time so it came naturally to me to be a leader."
to: Žena povedala: "Väčšinu času sa cítim sebavedomo, takže mi prišlo prirodzené byť líderkou."

from: The woman said "I trusted the scientific report."
to: Žena povedala: "Verila som vedeckej správe."

from: The woman said "I like to create a harmonious environment for my family."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada vytváram harmonické prostredie pre svoju rodinu."

from: The woman said "I had a huge Marvel poster in my room."
to: Žena povedala: "V izbe som mala obrovský plagát Marvelu."

from: The woman said "I spent an hour trying to take a perfect selfie."
to: Žena povedala: "Hodinu som sa snažila urobiť dokonalé selfie."

from: The woman said "I was good at analyzing situations objectively and coming up with practical solutions."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som dobrá v objektívnom analyzovaní situácií a navrhovaní praktických riešení."

from: The woman said "I decided that even though I was working a lot, I would try to spend as much time as possible with my son."
to: Žena povedala: "Rozhodla som sa, že aj keď veľa pracujem, budem sa snažiť tráviť čo najviac času so svojím synom."

from: The woman said "I invited my colleague for lunch."
to: Žena povedala: "Pozvala som kolegu na obed."

from: The woman said "I had a big wedding with many guests."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som veľkú svadbu s mnohými hosťami."

from: The woman said "I used a budgeting app to track my expenses."
to: Žena povedala: "Na sledovanie svojich výdavkov som používala aplikáciu na zostavovanie rozpočtu."

from: The woman said "I spent a lot of money on cosmetics."
to: Žena povedala: "Minula som veľa peňazí na kozmetiku."

from: The woman said "They did not have their favourite ice cream, so I took the bus to the store outside of the town."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemali svoju obľúbenú zmrzlinu, tak som išla autobusom do obchodu za mestom."

from: The woman said "I get sad whenever I have to leave the house and leave the dog alone."
to: Žena povedala: "Som smutná vždy, keď musím odísť z domu a nechať psa samého."

from: The woman said "Nobody cared that I was talented, everybody kept talking about my looks."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikoho nezaujímalo, že som talentovaná, všetci stále hovorili o mojom vzhľade."

from: The woman said "I would like to have a big family in the future so that we always have a full and noisy house."
to: Žena povedala: "V budúcnosti by som chcela mať veľkú rodinu, aby sme mali vždy plný a hlučný dom."

from: The woman said "I could never have a pet, they are just too dirty."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som nemohla mať domáce zviera, sú príliš špinavé."

from: The woman said "I'm afraid that if I am more assertive, people will think me unkind."
to: Žena povedala: "Bojím sa, že ak budem asertívnejšia, ľudia si budú myslieť, že som nevľúdna."

from: The woman said "I come to work always fully prepared."
to: Žena povedala: "Do práce chodím vždy plne pripravená."

from: The woman said "I am still mad that our team lost."
to: Žena povedala: "Stále som nahnevaná, že náš tím prehral."

from: The woman said "I would not mind paying for plastic surgery."
to: Žena povedala: "Nevadilo by mi zaplatiť si plastickú operáciu."

from: The woman said "I didn't spend enough time with my kids when they were little because I was at work all the time."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď boli moje deti malé, netrávila som s nimi dosť času, pretože som bola stále v práci."

from: The woman said "They came to me and told me I inspired them to take steps for their future careers."
to: Žena povedala: "Prišli za mnou a povedali mi, že som ich inšpirovala, aby podnikli kroky pre svoju budúcu kariéru."

from: The woman said "Although I worked as a manager, they often attacked my appearance."
to: Žena povedala: "Hoci som pracovala ako manažérka, často útočili na môj vzhľad."

from: The woman said "I went bushcrafting into the forest and spent 4 night there."
to: Žena povedala: "Išla som do lesa a strávila som tam 4 noci."

from: The woman said "When I was at university, I preferred to sit in the corner, where nobody could notice me."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som bola na univerzite, radšej som sedela v kúte, kde si ma nikto nemohol všimnúť."

from: The woman said "I took care of their pets so they could have a nice weekend."
to: Žena povedala: "Postarala som sa o ich domáce zvieratá, aby si mohli užiť pekný víkend."

from: The woman said "I have worked hard to get to where I am today."
to: Žena povedala: "Tvrdo som pracovala, aby som sa dostala tam, kde som dnes."

from: The woman said "I'd rather have everything right away."
to: Žena povedala: "Radšej by som mala všetko hneď."

from: The woman said "I was the first one at the library."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som prvá v knižnici."

from: The woman said "I was just protecting you from other people at that club."
to: Žena povedala: "Len som ťa chránila pred ostatnými ľuďmi v tom klube."

from: The woman said "I never had a problem with learning a new language."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nemala problém naučiť sa nový jazyk."

from: The woman said "My friend is always making me laugh."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj priateľ ma vždy rozosmeje."

from: The woman said "I filtered out all the distractions."
to: Žena povedala: "Odfiltrovala som všetky rušivé vplyvy."

from: The woman said "I am very attractive."
to: Žena povedala: "Som veľmi atraktívna."

from: The woman said "I had enough romance, I wanted something more intimate."
to: Žena povedala: "Romantiky som mala dosť, chcela som niečo intímnejšie."

from: The woman said "I have never been a loner, I prefer to be surrounded by people."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nebola samotárka, radšej som obklopená ľuďmi."

from: The woman said "I was initially a suspect, but the police determined I was not strong enough to hurt them."
to: Žena povedala: "Pôvodne som bola podozrivá, ale polícia zistila, že nie som dosť silná na to, aby som im ublížila."

from: The woman said "I feel fulfilled when I can take care of everybody in the house."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítim sa spokojná, keď sa môžem postarať o všetkých v dome."

from: The woman said "I have a habit of going along with what other people want."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám vo zvyku súhlasiť s tým, čo chcú iní ľudia."

from: The woman said "I would never allow myself to offend anyone."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som si nedovolila nikoho uraziť."

from: The woman said "I always liked dancing."
