to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som rada tancovala."

from: The woman said "When tsunami came, I volunteered to save people from drowning."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď prišlo cunami, dobrovoľne som sa prihlásila, aby som zachránila ľudí pred utopením."

from: The woman said "I'm very competitive when it comes to promotions and performance in the workplace."
to: Žena povedala: "Som veľmi súťaživá, pokiaľ ide o povýšenie a výkon na pracovisku."

from: The woman said "I would feel incompetent if I paid a cleaning lady."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítila by som sa neschopná, keby som platila upratovačke."

from: The woman said "I ordered them to stop praying and start helping."
to: Žena povedala: "Prikázala som im, aby sa prestali modliť a začali pomáhať."

from: The woman said "I wished the gig would never end, there were so many nice people everywhere."
to: Žena povedala: "Priala som si, aby sa koncert nikdy neskončil, všade bolo toľko milých ľudí."

from: The woman said "I found a nice picture of myself easily."
to: Žena povedala: "Ľahko som našla peknú fotku."

from: The woman said "I like extreme sports even though they are really dangerous."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada extrémne športy, aj keď sú naozaj nebezpečné."

from: The woman said "I made some extra money as a personal trainer."
to: Žena povedala: "Privyrobila som si ako osobná trénerka."

from: The woman said "I was aware that bad leadership leads to bad results."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som si vedomá, že zlé vedenie vedie k zlým výsledkom."

from: The woman said "I was raised to know how to take care of others."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som vychovaná tak, aby som sa vedela postarať o druhých."

from: The woman said "I like to just smile at someone because I believe it will make their day better."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada sa na niekoho usmejem, pretože verím, že mu to zlepší deň."

from: The woman said "I could strike up a conversation with almost everybody that evening."
to: Žena povedala: "V ten večer som sa mohla dať do reči takmer s každým."

from: The woman said "Every step reflected the confidence I held within, captivating the onlookers with my magnetic presence."
to: Žena povedala: "Každý krok odrážal sebadôveru, ktorú som v sebe nosila, a svojou magnetickou prítomnosťou som uchvacovala prizerajúcich sa."

from: The woman said "I had this weird feeling, so I called my parents right away to see if they were okay."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som divný pocit, tak som hneď zavolala rodičom, či sú v poriadku."

from: The woman said "I went to walk the dogs from the shelter."
to: Žena povedala: "Išla som vyvenčiť psy z útulku."

from: The woman said "Since I've been doing this sport, I'm much more balanced."
to: Žena povedala: "Odkedy sa venujem tomuto športu, som oveľa vyrovnanejšia."

from: The woman said "I could not cook because it was my mother's job."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som variť, pretože to bola práca mojej matky."

from: The woman said "It was hard for me to admit that I needed a hand."
to: Žena povedala: "Bolo pre mňa ťažké priznať si, že potrebujem pomoc."

from: The woman said "I was always first picked when playing any sports back in highschool."
to: Žena povedala: "Na strednej škole som bola vždy prvá, keď som hrala nejaký šport."

from: The woman said "I would never be able to cheat."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som nebola schopná podvádzať."

from: The woman said "For my birthday, I asked to go skydiving."
to: Žena povedala: "Na svoje narodeniny som chcela ísť skočiť s padákom."

from: The woman said "I couldn't keep up with the intense workout routine, my body feeling weak and exhausted from the exertion."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som vydržať intenzívne cvičenie, moje telo sa cítilo slabé a vyčerpané z námahy."

from: The woman said "Don't go there alone, it can be dangerous."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechoďte tam sami, môže to byť nebezpečné."

from: The woman said "As I effortlessly lifted the heavy box, the surprised expressions on others' faces made me smile."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som bez námahy zdvihla ťažkú škatuľu, prekvapené výrazy na tvárach ostatných ma rozosmiali."

from: The woman said "That job wasn't meant for me, but for someone stronger."
to: Žena povedala: "Táto práca nebola určená pre mňa, ale pre niekoho silnejšieho."

from: The woman said "I stopped the pickpocket and held him until the police came."
to: Žena povedala: "Zastavila som vreckára a zadržala ho, kým neprišla polícia."

from: The woman said "Finally the beauty catalogue that I ordered has arrived."
to: Žena povedala: "Konečne prišiel katalóg krásy, ktorý som si objednala."

from: The woman said "I am tired after walking for ten minutes."
to: Žena povedala: "Po desiatich minútach chôdze som unavená."

from: The woman said "I never let my family affect my profession."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nedovolila, aby moja rodina ovplyvnila moje povolanie."

from: The woman said "I had to carry the logs all on my own, but it was fine."
to: Žena povedala: "Klády som musela niesť sama, ale bolo to fajn."

from: The woman said "I slammed the door after the argument."
to: Žena povedala: "Po hádke som zabuchla dvere."

from: The woman said "Why did I have to get old?!"
to: Žena povedala: "Prečo som musela zostarnúť?!"

from: The woman said "I didn't like our sex, but I didn't say anything."
to: Žena povedala: "Náš sex sa mi nepáčil, ale nič som nepovedala."

from: The woman said "I'm an expert in my field."
to: Žena povedala: "Som odborníčka vo svojom odbore."

from: The woman said "I was just in a meeting."
to: Žena povedala: "Práve som mala stretnutie."

from: The woman said "I haven't carried cash with me since I was robbed."
to: Žena povedala: "Odkedy ma okradli, nenosím pri sebe hotovosť."

from: The woman said "I never stressed about work responsibilities because I knew that I could handle anything."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som sa nestresovala pracovnými povinnosťami, pretože som vedela, že zvládnem všetko."

from: The woman said "Sorry, I could have come but I was having a really bad hair day."
to: Žena povedala: "Prepáčte, mohla som prísť, ale mala som naozaj zlý deň."

from: The woman said "I could not wrap my head around this hard mathematical problem."
to: Žena povedala: "Nedokázala som sa zorientovať v tomto ťažkom matematickom probléme."

from: The woman said "Some people hate accessories, but I like wearing them."
to: Žena povedala: "Niektorí ľudia doplnky neznášajú, ale ja ich nosím rada."

from: The woman said "I read a book about self-improvement yesterday."
to: Žena povedala: "Včera som čítala knihu o sebazdokonaľovaní."

from: The woman said "I always wanted to be a researcher, but I wouldn't have time to take care of my family."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som chcela byť výskumníčkou, ale nemala by som čas starať sa o rodinu."

from: The woman said "I am able to compete with anyone."
to: Žena povedala: "Som schopná súťažiť s kýmkoľvek."

from: The woman said "I don't like when the meal I prepared is tasteless."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemám rada, keď je jedlo, ktoré som pripravila, bez chuti."

from: The woman said "As a pilot, I ensured the safety of passengers and crew by adhering to rigorous protocols."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako pilotka som zabezpečila bezpečnosť cestujúcich a posádky dodržiavaním prísnych protokolov."

from: The woman said "I struggled to strike a balance between my sexual desires and other important aspects of life."
to: Žena povedala: "Snažila som sa nájsť rovnováhu medzi svojimi sexuálnymi túžbami a inými dôležitými aspektmi života."

from: The woman said "I hoped I had been a pleasant companion."
to: Žena povedala: "Dúfala som, že som bola príjemnou spoločníčkou."

from: The woman said "I had to work even over Christmas to earn as much money as possible."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som pracovať aj cez Vianoce, aby som zarobila čo najviac peňazí."

from: The woman said "I went to buy new sponges, these were too dirty."
to: Žena povedala: "Išla som kúpiť nové špongie, tieto boli príliš špinavé."

from: The woman said "I used to clean the house on every Saturday."
to: Žena povedala: "Každú sobotu som upratovala dom."

from: The woman said "I came up with a deal: if you vacuum, I'll take you out tonight."
to: Žena povedala: "Vymyslela som dohodu: ak vysávaš, vezmem ťa večer von."

from: The woman said "If I had been there, the atmosphere would have been better."
to: Žena povedala: "Keby som tam bola, atmosféra by bola lepšia."

from: The woman said "I offered accommodation to two refugees."
to: Žena povedala: "Ponúkla som ubytovanie dvom utečencom."

from: The woman said "I am able to see the big picture of where the organisation is heading."
to: Žena povedala: "Som schopná vidieť celkový obraz toho, kam organizácia smeruje."

from: The woman said "I felt it in my gut."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítila som to v bruchu."

from: The woman said "I was proud of being a good kisser."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som hrdá na to, že som dobre bozkávala."

from: The woman said "I cleaned the house yesterday and now it's a mess again."
to: Žena povedala: "Včera som upratovala dom a teraz je tu opäť neporiadok."

from: The woman said "If you weren't with me, god knows how it'd end."
to: Žena povedala: "Keby si nebol so mnou, bohvie, ako by to skončilo."

from: The woman said "I was the first one at the clothing store."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som prvá v obchode s oblečením."

from: The woman said "The storm raged on, but I stood strong on the deck of the ship."
to: Žena povedala: "Búrka zúrila, ale ja som stála pevne na palube lode."

from: The woman said "On the way home I talked to an elderly lady on the train."
to: Žena povedala: "Cestou domov som sa vo vlaku rozprávala s jednou staršou pani."

from: The woman said "I learned how to drive before I was even allowed to."
to: Žena povedala: "Naučila som sa šoférovať ešte predtým, ako som to vôbec mohla robiť."

from: The woman said "I have always felt that childcare was my life goal."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som cítila, že starostlivosť o deti je mojím životným cieľom."

from: The woman said "I invited strangers to our table, and it made a very good group of people."
to: Žena povedala: "Pozvala som k nášmu stolu cudzincov a vytvorila sa veľmi dobrá skupina ľudí."

from: The woman said "I took the time to understand and acknowledge the emotions of a colleague who was going through a difficult time."
to: Žena povedala: "Našla som si čas, aby som pochopila a uznala emócie kolegu, ktorý prežíval ťažké obdobie."

from: The woman said "I remained composed although the situation escalated."
to: Žena povedala: "Zostala som pokojná, hoci sa situácia vyhrotila."

from: The woman said "I used to enjoy being able to simply use my smile to achieve things."
to: Žena povedala: "Kedysi som si užívala, keď som mohla jednoducho používať svoj úsmev na dosiahnutie vecí."

from: The woman said "I first weighted all the possible scenarios."
to: Žena povedala: "Najprv som zvážila všetky možné scenáre."

from: The woman said "I thought that confidence is the key aspect of having a healthy and successful life."
to: Žena povedala: "Myslela som si, že sebadôvera je kľúčovým aspektom zdravého a úspešného života."

from: The woman said "I divided the tasks equally among all the team members."
to: Žena povedala: "Rozdelila som úlohy rovnomerne medzi všetkých členov tímu."

from: The woman said "My mind was set - I got married despite everyone being against it."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som rozhodnutá - vydala som sa napriek tomu, že všetci boli proti."

from: The woman said "I could easily seduce you at the bar."
to: Žena povedala: "Mohla by som ťa ľahko zviesť v bare."

from: The woman said "Since I’ve been eating more protein, I feel much stronger."
to: Žena povedala: "Odkedy jem viac bielkovín, cítim sa oveľa silnejšia."

from: The woman said "Despite the criticism I thought I did well."
to: Žena povedala: "Napriek kritike si myslím, že som si počínala dobre."

from: The woman said "I didn't want us to sign a prenup, because I'd take care of my partner even after a divorce."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechcela som, aby sme podpísali predmanželskú zmluvu, pretože by som sa o svojho partnera postarala aj po rozvode."

from: The woman said "With each punch thrown and block executed, I could feel the power surging through me."
to: Žena povedala: "S každým úderom a blokom som cítila, ako ma prepadá sila."

from: The woman said "I didn't need your support."
to: Žena povedala: "Nepotrebovala som vašu podporu."

from: The woman said "When I was little, I wanted to be an athlete, but my parents signed me up for ballet instead."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som bola malá, chcela som byť športovkyňou, ale rodičia ma prihlásili na balet."

from: The woman said "I could lift that car if I wanted to."
to: Žena povedala: "Keby som chcela, mohla by som to auto zdvihnúť."

from: The woman said "I like to read fashion magazines."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada čítam módne časopisy."

from: The woman said "I didn't need your financial help!"
to: Žena povedala: "Nepotrebovala som vašu finančnú pomoc!"

from: The woman said "I should be thoughtful, because that's what's expected of me."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala by som byť pozorná, pretože sa to odo mňa očakáva."

from: The woman said "I got overwhelmed with sadness."
to: Žena povedala: "Prepadol ma smútok."

from: The woman said "I like to throw parties for my kids because we always have a house full of people."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada organizujem večierky pre svoje deti, pretože máme vždy plný dom ľudí."

from: The woman said "I had an STD test done."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechala som si urobiť test na pohlavne prenosné choroby."

from: The woman said "I would prefer not to eat than to wear something ugly."
to: Žena povedala: "Radšej nebudem jesť, ako by som si mala obliecť niečo škaredé."

from: The woman said "I could never leave the airport without first checking all the fragnances first."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som nemohla opustiť letisko bez toho, aby som najprv skontrolovala všetky fragmenty."

from: The woman said "I insisted on having sex."
to: Žena povedala: "Trvala som na sexe."

from: The woman said "I thought about starting my own vlog about fashion."
to: Žena povedala: "Rozmýšľala som, že si založím vlastný vlog o móde."

from: The woman said "I was asked to take care of my neighbour, and I obliged."
to: Žena povedala: "Požiadali ma, aby som sa postarala o svojho suseda, a ja som im vyhovela."

from: The woman said "I resolved to brush my dog at least three times a week so he wouldn’t shed as much."
to: Žena povedala: "Rozhodla som sa, že svojho psa budem čistiť aspoň trikrát týždenne, aby toľko nelínal."

from: The woman said "I assembled the furniture on my own."
to: Žena povedala: "Nábytok som si zmontovala sama."

from: The woman said "I did not need to ask for help."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemusela som žiadať o pomoc."

from: The woman said "I needed someone to talk to because it was too much."
to: Žena povedala: "Potrebovala som sa s niekým porozprávať, pretože toho bolo príliš veľa."

from: The woman said "I’m aware of my qualities."
to: Žena povedala: "Som si vedomá svojich kvalít."

from: The woman said "I'm not very good at showing my emotions."
to: Žena povedala: "Nie som veľmi dobrá v prejavovaní svojich emócií."

from: The woman said "I wish I could think more rationally."
to: Žena povedala: "Želám si, aby som vedela myslieť racionálnejšie."

from: The woman said "I actively engaged with a team member who was experiencing difficulty at work."
to: Žena povedala: "Aktívne som sa venovala členovi tímu, ktorý mal v práci problémy."

from: The woman said "I pitied the beggar and gave him money."
to: Žena povedala: "Ľutovala som žobráka a dala som mu peniaze."

from: The woman said "I would be happier if my partner stayed at home and raised the children."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola by som šťastnejšia, keby môj partner zostal doma a vychovával deti."

from: The woman said "I had to cancel the neighbourhood barbeque because nobody helped me with cleaning the grill, and I could not do it on my own."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som zrušiť susedskú grilovačku, pretože mi nikto nepomohol s čistením grilu a sama som to nezvládla."

from: The woman said "I carried it up the stairs myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Sama som ho vyniesla po schodoch."

from: The woman said "I love team sports so I was really sad that I could not join the volleyball team."
to: Žena povedala: "Milujem kolektívne športy, takže som bola veľmi smutná, že som sa nemohla pridať k volejbalovému tímu."

from: The woman said "I wanted to discuss the current political situation with you."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som s vami diskutovať o súčasnej politickej situácii."

from: The woman said "I made the same mistake despite the obvious signs."
to: Žena povedala: "Urobila som rovnakú chybu napriek zjavným znakom."

from: The woman said "I joined a university study because they were looking for sexually active people."
to: Žena povedala: "Zapojila som sa do univerzitnej štúdie, pretože hľadali sexuálne aktívnych ľudí."

from: The woman said "I always felt driven by leader positions."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som sa cítila poháňaná pozíciami lídra."

from: The woman said "I regularly sanitized frequently touched surfaces in my home, such as doorknobs and light switches."
to: Žena povedala: "Pravidelne som dezinfikovala povrchy v mojom dome, ktorých sa často dotýkame, napríklad kľučky a vypínače svetiel."

from: The woman said "In a business meeting, I actively listened to my colleagues and responded to their proposals with relevant comments."
to: Žena povedala: "Na pracovnom stretnutí som aktívne počúvala svojich kolegov a reagovala na ich návrhy relevantnými pripomienkami."

from: The woman said "I like to have the best mobile on the market."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcem mať najlepší mobil na trhu."

from: The woman said "I feel social pressure to look beautiful."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítim spoločenský tlak, aby som vyzerala krásne."

from: The woman said "I am the manager of this bank."
to: Žena povedala: "Ja som riaditeľka tejto banky."

from: The woman said "I always protected my relatives no matter what."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som chránila svojich príbuzných, nech sa dialo čokoľvek."

from: The woman said "Last night I turned into a beast."
to: Žena povedala: "Včera večer som sa zmenila na beštiu."

from: The woman said "I established a cleaning routine and adhered to it."
to: Žena povedala: "Zaviedla som si režim upratovania a dodržiavala som ho."

from: The woman said "I never considered going to therapy."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som neuvažovala o terapii."

from: The woman said "There were just too many obstacles so I had to give up."
to: Žena povedala: "Bolo tam príliš veľa prekážok, takže som to musela vzdať."

from: The woman said "I didn't like when my partner earned more than me."
to: Žena povedala: "Nepáčilo sa mi, keď môj partner zarábal viac ako ja."

from: The woman said "I calmly handled a difficult customer."
to: Žena povedala: "Pokojne som zvládla problémového zákazníka."

from: The woman said "I changed my hair color according to the latest fashion."
to: Žena povedala: "Zmenila som si farbu vlasov podľa najnovšej módy."

from: The woman said "I worked hard to maintain my position."
to: Žena povedala: "Tvrdo som pracovala, aby som si udržala svoje postavenie."

from: The woman said "I had trouble keeping up with the pace of a fitness class."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som problém držať krok s tempom fitnes triedy."

from: The woman said "I couldn't do it with my bare hands."
to: Žena povedala: "Nedokázala by som to urobiť holými rukami."

from: The woman said "I got approached by some model agency."
to: Žena povedala: "Oslovila ma nejaká modelingová agentúra."

from: The woman said "I hauled heavy loads, it was my job and I liked it."
to: Žena povedala: "Ťahala som ťažké náklady, bola to moja práca a mala som ju rada."

from: The woman said "I know it hurts, but you should pull yourself together."
to: Žena povedala: "Viem, že to bolí, ale mal by si sa spamätať."

from: The woman said "I delegated tasks effectively, matching the skills and strengths of my team members with the right responsibilities."
to: Žena povedala: "Efektívne som delegovala úlohy, pričom som prispôsobila zručnosti a silné stránky členov svojho tímu správnym povinnostiam."

from: The woman said "I felt really good looking in all the new clothes."
to: Žena povedala: "V novom oblečení som sa cítila naozaj dobre."

from: The woman said "I frequently sought reassurance and validation from others."
to: Žena povedala: "Často som hľadala uistenie a potvrdenie u iných."

from: The woman said "I like to build sand castles at the beach."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada staviam hrady z piesku na pláži."

from: The woman said "I like to spend time with children because they have great ideas and opinions."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada trávim čas s deťmi, pretože majú skvelé nápady a názory."

from: The woman said "If I had to choose between workinf the body or working the mind, I'd choose the mind."
to: Žena povedala: "Keby som si mala vybrať medzi prácou na tele a prácou na mysli, vybrala by som si myseľ."

from: The woman said "We didn't need a cleaning lady because I liked to be in charge of cleaning the house."
to: Žena povedala: "Nepotrebovali sme upratovačku, pretože som rada bola zodpovedná za upratovanie domu."

from: The woman said "I would never come to work drunk."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som neprišla do práce opitá."

from: The woman said "I allowed my anxiety to control my actions, avoiding certain situations."
to: Žena povedala: "Dovolila som, aby moja úzkosť ovládala moje konanie a vyhýbala som sa určitým situáciám."

from: The woman said "I offered to help the new neighbours the paperwork."
to: Žena povedala: "Ponúkla som sa, že pomôžem novým susedom s papierovaním."

from: The woman said "I always did something extra although my job didn't require it."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som robila niečo navyše, hoci to moja práca nevyžadovala."

from: The woman said "I could never stand up for myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som sa nedokázala postaviť sama za seba."

from: The woman said "I lost my job and the reason was that I couldn't handle stress, but I can."
to: Žena povedala: "Prišla som o prácu a dôvodom bolo, že som nezvládala stres, ale ja ho zvládam."

from: The woman said "I took some days to think over the offer."
to: Žena povedala: "Vzala som si niekoľko dní na premyslenie ponuky."

from: The woman said "I couldn't donate blood because I didn't meet the minimum weight requirement."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som darovať krv, pretože som nespĺňala požiadavku minimálnej hmotnosti."

from: The woman said "I couldn’t stand being cooped up at home for another day."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som vydržať ďalší deň zavretá doma."

from: The woman said "I decided to change my plans for no reason."
to: Žena povedala: "Rozhodla som sa bezdôvodne zmeniť svoje plány."

from: The woman said "I like to take care of our pets."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada sa starám o naše domáce zvieratá."

from: The woman said "As a pharmacist, I ensured compliance with regulatory guidelines."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako lekárka som zabezpečovala dodržiavanie regulačných smerníc."

from: The woman said "Even though they were acting rude, I was trying to be as polite as I could."
to: Žena povedala: "Aj keď sa správali hrubo, snažila som sa byť čo najslušnejšia."

from: The woman said "I didn't like losing time and started working immediately."
to: Žena povedala: "Nerada som strácala čas a okamžite som začala pracovať."

from: The woman said "I always thought that it was healthy to have multiple partners."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som si myslela, že je zdravé mať viac partnerov."

from: The woman said "I don't like to read books because they're boring."
to: Žena povedala: "Nerada čítam knihy, pretože sú nudné."

from: The woman said "I was with my friend who couldn't stop talking."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som so svojím priateľom, ktorý nemohol prestať hovoriť."

from: The woman said "I never thought we could only stay friends."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som si nemyslela, že by sme mohli zostať len priateľmi."

from: The woman said "I performed a series of rituals before an important event."
to: Žena povedala: "Pred dôležitou udalosťou som vykonala sériu rituálov."

from: The woman said "I considered different viewpoints and engaged in rational dialogue to reach a collective decision."
to: Žena povedala: "Zvážila som rôzne názory a zapojila sa do racionálneho dialógu, aby som dosiahla spoločné rozhodnutie."

from: The woman said "They commented on my outfit and I had to do my best not to scold them."
to: Žena povedala: "Komentovali moje oblečenie a ja som mala čo robiť, aby som im nevynadala."

from: The woman said "I plowed the entire field."
to: Žena povedala: "Zorala som celé pole."

from: The woman said "I did it even though it was risky."
to: Žena povedala: "Urobila som to, aj keď to bolo riskantné."

from: The woman said "I knew they had something against me, although I had no proof."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, že proti mne niečo majú, hoci som nemala žiadny dôkaz."

from: The woman said "I like to talk so much that I do it with animals too."
to: Žena povedala: "Tak rada rozprávam, že to robím aj so zvieratami."

from: The woman said "I wanted my kids to go to prestigious universities, so I paid for tutoring."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som, aby moje deti študovali na prestížnych univerzitách, tak som im zaplatila doučovanie."

from: The woman said "I had no problem with climbing that hill."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemala som problém vyjsť na ten kopec."

from: The woman said "I had no doubts, I was certain that they liked me."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemala som žiadne pochybnosti, bola som si istá, že ma majú radi."

from: The woman said "I have never left home without making sure that everybody has something to eat first."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som neodišla z domu bez toho, aby som sa najprv uistila, že všetci majú čo jesť."

from: The woman said "I liked hiking in harsh weather when I was younger, then I got frostbite and lost my toe."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som bola mladšia, rada som chodila na túry v nepriaznivom počasí, potom som omrzla a prišla o prst na nohe."

from: The woman said "I could not concentrate and had to constantly play with something because the job was boring."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som sa sústrediť a neustále som sa musela s niečím hrať, pretože táto práca bola nudná."

from: The woman said "I hated art subjects at school."
to: Žena povedala: "V škole som nenávidela výtvarné predmety."

from: The woman said "When the deadline was approaching I just decided to share my answers with them."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď sa blížil termín, rozhodla som sa, že sa s nimi podelím o svoje odpovede."

from: The woman said "I think my co-worker is an excellent leader."
to: Žena povedala: "Myslím si, že môj spolupracovník je vynikajúci vedúci."

from: The woman said "I increased my earning potential to provide better financial support for my family."
to: Žena povedala: "Zvýšila som svoj zárobkový potenciál, aby som lepšie finančne zabezpečila svoju rodinu."

from: The woman said "I had a lot of experience with various drugs."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som veľa skúseností s rôznymi drogami."

from: The woman said "I was promoted because I have good communication skills."
to: Žena povedala: "Povýšili ma, pretože mám dobré komunikačné schopnosti."

from: The woman said "When becoming a leader, the key aspect was to be capable of managing complex situations."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som sa stala vedúcou osobnosťou, kľúčovým aspektom bolo, aby som dokázala zvládať zložité situácie."

from: The woman said "To avoid having to wash dishes, I bought a plastic one."
to: Žena povedala: "Aby som nemusela umývať riad, kúpila som si plastový."

from: The woman said "At school, the biggest punishment for me was having to sit alone."
to: Žena povedala: "V škole bolo pre mňa najväčším trestom, že som musela sedieť sama."

from: The woman said "I could not hold back the tears."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som zadržať slzy."

from: The woman said "As a journalist, I conducted thorough interviews, verified facts, and crafted compelling stories"
to: Žena povedala: "Ako novinárka som viedla dôkladné rozhovory, overovala fakty a vytvárala presvedčivé príbehy."

from: The woman said "My smile was shinning through the whole room."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj úsmev prežiaril celú miestnosť."

from: The woman said "I was looking out for my employees even though I was on holiday."
to: Žena povedala: "Dávala som pozor na svojich zamestnancov, aj keď som bola na dovolenke."

from: The woman said "When it came to tears, my heart softened and I accepted the apology."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď prišlo na slzy, moje srdce sa zmiernilo a ospravedlnenie som prijala."

from: The woman said "I always like physical jobs."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som mala rada fyzickú prácu."

from: The woman said "If I knew how boring university was, I would never have gone to it."
to: Žena povedala: "Keby som vedela, aká je univerzita nudná, nikdy by som na ňu nešla."

from: The woman said "I didn't accept any position but that of a boss."
to: Žena povedala: "Neprijala som žiadnu inú pozíciu ako pozíciu šéfa."

from: The woman said "I reviewed the paper three times until there were no typos."
to: Žena povedala: "Trikrát som si papier prezrela, kým som v ňom nenašla žiadne preklepy."

from: The woman said "I wanted to kiss them both."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som ich pobozkať oboch."

from: The woman said "I met an elderly gentleman for whom I do grocery shopping every Monday."
to: Žena povedala: "Stretla som staršieho pána, ktorému každý pondelok nakupujem potraviny."

from: The woman said "I knew you said that you didn't want my help, but I was convinced that you can't do it alone."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, že ste povedali, že nechcete moju pomoc, ale bola som presvedčená, že to sami nezvládnete."

from: The woman said "As the leader, I left behind a legacy."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako vodkyňa som po sebe zanechala dedičstvo."

from: The woman said "I took an extra shift this week."
to: Žena povedala: "Tento týždeň som si privyrábala."

from: The woman said "My indicator light is on in my car, would you be able to check it?"
to: Žena povedala: "V aute mi svieti kontrolka, vedeli by ste ju skontrolovať?"

from: The woman said "I feel the happiest when hosting a party."
to: Žena povedala: "Najšťastnejšia sa cítim, keď organizujem večierok."

from: The woman said "I was enjoying leading others."
to: Žena povedala: "Tešila som sa, že môžem viesť ostatných."

from: The woman said "I bought a new motorbike that is even more powerful than the last one."
to: Žena povedala: "Kúpila som si novú motorku, ktorá je ešte výkonnejšia ako tá predchádzajúca."

from: The woman said "I spent the whole night baking this cake."
to: Žena povedala: "Celý večer som strávila pečením tohto koláča."

from: The woman said "I ironed the clothes for my partner."
to: Žena povedala: "Vyžehlila som oblečenie pre svojho partnera."

from: The woman said "I want to have as much fun with others as possible while I’m young."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcem si užiť čo najviac zábavy s ostatnými, kým som mladá."

from: The woman said "I bought that perfume I saw in the ad."
to: Žena povedala: "Kúpila som si ten parfum, ktorý som videla v reklame."

from: The woman said "I was afraid of staying alone."
to: Žena povedala: "Bála som sa zostať sama."

from: The woman said "I always could do anything that I told myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som dokázala všetko, čo som si povedala."

from: The woman said "In my position, it is crucial that I am able to detect and prevent threats early on."
to: Žena povedala: "V mojej pozícii je veľmi dôležité, aby som bola schopná včas odhaliť hrozby a predchádzať im."

from: The woman said "I tried to do a push-up, but my arms gave out."
to: Žena povedala: "Snažila som sa urobiť klik, ale ruky mi vypovedali službu."

from: The woman said "Even though I had won, I felt awkward when they gave me the award."
to: Žena povedala: "Aj keď som vyhrala, cítila som sa trápne, keď mi odovzdávali cenu."

from: The woman said "As a psychologist, I developed personalized treatment plans to address mental health concerns."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako psychologička som vypracovala individuálne liečebné plány na riešenie problémov duševného zdravia."

from: The woman said "I like to go for walks in the park and listen to the birds."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada chodím na prechádzky do parku a počúvam vtáky."

from: The woman said "I never stopped learning."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som sa neprestala učiť."

from: The woman said "I called the neighbours over for a barbecue."
to: Žena povedala: "Zavolala som susedov na grilovanie."

from: The woman said "I gave them money to feel better."
to: Žena povedala: "Dala som im peniaze, aby sa cítili lepšie."

from: The woman said "I couldn't wait till Friday because that's a party day."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som čakať do piatku, pretože v ten deň je večierok."

from: The woman said "I like to discuss with people who have different opinions."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada diskutujem s ľuďmi, ktorí majú iné názory."

from: The woman said "I didn’t want to get into a fight, but someone had to show them where their place was."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechcela som sa hádať, ale niekto im musel ukázať, kde je ich miesto."

from: The woman said "I followed a lot of beauty influencers on social media."
to: Žena povedala: "Sledovala som veľa kozmetických influencerov na sociálnych sieťach."

from: The woman said "As a project manager, I organized team meetings, allocated resources efficiently, and ensured clear communication channels to meet project deadlines successfully."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako projektová manažérka som organizovala stretnutia tímu, efektívne rozdeľovala zdroje a zabezpečovala jasné komunikačné kanály, aby som úspešne dodržala termíny projektu."

from: The woman said "I had to give up, the opponents were just too fierce."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som sa vzdať, súperi boli príliš zúriví."

from: The woman said "You shouldn't lift that, it's too heavy."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemala by si to dvíhať, je to príliš ťažké."

from: The woman said "I worked extra hard to be able to afford this massage appointment."
to: Žena povedala: "Pracovala som veľmi tvrdo, aby som si mohla dovoliť túto masáž."

from: The woman said "I like to wear something that highlights my decolettage."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada nosím niečo, čo zvýrazňuje môj dekolt."

from: The woman said "I did not talk back to them."
to: Žena povedala: "Ja som im neodpovedala."

from: The woman said "I didn't take my responsibilities so seriously."
to: Žena povedala: "Nebrala som svoje povinnosti tak vážne."

from: The woman said "I decided on the direction of the company."
to: Žena povedala: "Ja som rozhodla o smerovaní spoločnosti."

from: The woman said "I like spending time with my kids by jumping around and acting foolish."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada trávim čas so svojimi deťmi skákaním a bláznovstvom."

from: The woman said "I gave a keynote speech at a conference."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som hlavný prejav na konferencii."

from: The woman said "I was aware how they felt."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som si vedomá toho, ako sa cítili."

from: The woman said "I never thought I’d be the one to turn him in to the police."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som si nemyslela, že to budem ja, kto ho udá na polícii."

from: The woman said "I was speeding on my new Mercedes."
to: Žena povedala: "Prekročila som rýchlosť na svojom novom mercedese."

from: The woman said "I strapped on my hiking boots and embarked on a challenging trek."
to: Žena povedala: "Obula som si turistické topánky a vydala som sa na náročnú túru."

from: The woman said "Hold my beer, I could do it better than you."
to: Žena povedala: "Podrž mi pivo, zvládla by som to lepšie ako ty."

from: The woman said "Do you think you're stronger than me?"
to: "Myslíš si, že si silnejší ako ja?" opýtala sa žena.

from: The woman said "I changed my schedule when they asked me to."
to: Žena povedala: "Zmenila som si rozvrh, keď ma o to požiadali."

from: The woman said "I was always leading by example."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som išla príkladom."

from: The woman said "I didn't take any responsibility."
to: Žena povedala: "Nevzala som na seba žiadnu zodpovednosť."

from: The woman said "I’m extremely communicative and love to meet new people."
to: Žena povedala: "Som veľmi komunikatívna a rada spoznávam nových ľudí."

from: The woman said "I organised a workshop for all the stakeholders."
to: Žena povedala: "Zorganizovala som workshop pre všetky zainteresované strany."

from: The woman said "I took on an extra shift."
to: Žena povedala: "Vzala som si prácu navyše."

from: The woman said "I possessed an undeniable allure that captivated others, drawing their attention and admiration."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som nepopierateľný pôvab, ktorý ostatných uchvacoval, priťahoval ich pozornosť a obdiv."

from: The woman said "I knew best what I can and what I cannot do, you didn't have to tell me."
to: Žena povedala: "Najlepšie som vedela, čo môžem a čo nemôžem, nemusel si mi to hovoriť."

from: The woman said "I sold items we no longer needed to contribute to pay off family debts."
to: Žena povedala: "Predala som veci, ktoré sme už nepotrebovali, aby sme prispeli na splatenie rodinných dlhov."

from: The woman said "I could not handle all the algebra rules."
to: Žena povedala: "Nezvládla by som všetky pravidlá algebry."

from: The woman said "I’ve discovered that the colour of this season is red."
to: Žena povedala: "Zistila som, že farbou tohto ročného obdobia je červená."

from: The woman said "I like to make dinner for my family."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada pripravujem večeru pre svoju rodinu."

from: The woman said "I like kinky people."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada výstredných ľudí."

from: The woman said "I've built such a reputation that people are afraid to even look at me."
to: Žena povedala: "Vybudovala som si takú povesť, že sa na mňa ľudia boja čo i len pozrieť."

from: The woman said "I consulted the teacher about our children's grades."
to: Žena povedala: "Poradila som sa s učiteľkou o známkach našich detí."

from: The woman said "I wondered how long would this meeting last, but I kept silent."
to: Žena povedala: "Rozmýšľala som, ako dlho bude toto stretnutie trvať, ale mlčala som."

from: The woman said "Losing a limb didn't stop me from winning the Olympics."
to: Žena povedala: "Strata končatiny mi nezabránila vyhrať olympiádu."

from: The woman said "I attempted to swim long distances, but my endurance was weak."
to: Žena povedala: "Pokúšala som sa plávať na dlhé vzdialenosti, ale moja vytrvalosť bola slabá."

from: The woman said "As I navigated the challenging obstacle course, I pushed my body to the limits."
to: Žena povedala: "Pri zdolávaní náročnej prekážkovej dráhy som svoje telo posunula na hranicu svojich možností."

from: The woman said "I washed my hair so often I ruined it all over."
to: Žena povedala: "Umývala som si vlasy tak často, že som si ich celé zničila."

from: The woman said "When I heard there were going to be carousels in town, I was very happy."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som sa dozvedela, že v meste budú kolotoče, veľmi som sa potešila."

from: The woman said "I focused on maintaining a clean and neat appearance"
to: Žena povedala: "Zamerala som sa na udržiavanie čistého a upraveného vzhľadu."

from: The woman said "I'm the funny one in our family."
to: Žena povedala: "Ja som tá vtipná v našej rodine."

from: The woman said "When the building was in flames, I carried buckets of water all night."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď bola budova v plameňoch, celú noc som nosila vedrá s vodou."

from: The woman said "I saw a very cute cat video, they were just like me."
to: Žena povedala: "Videla som veľmi roztomilé video s mačkami, boli ako ja."

from: The woman said "I am experienced enough to be able to prioritise effectively."
to: Žena povedala: "Som dostatočne skúsená na to, aby som si vedela efektívne určiť priority."

from: The woman said "I volunteered at a local food bank, engaging with individuals facing food insecurity."
to: Žena povedala: "Pracovala som ako dobrovoľníčka v miestnej potravinovej banke, kde som sa venovala ľuďom, ktorí čelia nedostatku potravín."

from: The woman said "I did not take the medicine the doctor recommended."
to: Žena povedala: "Nevzala som si liek, ktorý mi odporučil lekár."

from: The woman said "I don't want to go with you if you're driving, you are a horrible driver."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechcem ísť s vami, ak budete šoférovať, ste hrozný vodič."

from: The woman said "It is not a problem to make coffee - I like doing it."
to: Žena povedala: "Nie je problém uvariť kávu - robím to rada."

from: The woman said "I always knew that you'd be mine."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som vedela, že budeš môj."

from: The woman said "I have recently completed an important and challenging research."
to: Žena povedala: "Nedávno som dokončila dôležitý a náročný výskum."

from: The woman said "We were arguing over the messages, so I threw my phone on the ground in anger and it shattered all over."
to: Žena povedala: "Hádali sme sa kvôli správam, tak som v hneve hodila telefón na zem a ten sa celý rozbil."

from: The woman said "I never expected anyone to pay my bills."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nečakala, že mi niekto zaplatí účty."

from: The woman said "I was so worried that I got completely paralysed."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som taká vystrašená, že som úplne ochrnula."

from: The woman said "I could never go to a public toilet, they are full of bacteria."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som nemohla ísť na verejné toalety, sú plné baktérií."

from: The woman said "I provided guidance and support to help new colleagues integrate into the company culture."
to: Žena povedala: "Poskytovala som poradenstvo a podporu, aby som pomohla novým kolegom začleniť sa do firemnej kultúry."

from: The woman said "I picked up the steel frames."
to: Žena povedala: "Vzala som oceľové rámy."

from: The woman said "I assessed the risk and decided it was not worth it."
to: Žena povedala: "Zhodnotila som riziko a rozhodla som sa, že to nestojí za to."

from: The woman said "I burst into tears at work after receiving a slightly critical email, even though I knew it was an overreaction and not worth getting so upset about."
to: Žena povedala: "Po tom, čo som dostala mierne kritický e-mail, som sa v práci rozplakala, hoci som vedela, že to bola prehnaná reakcia a nestojí za to, aby som sa tak rozčuľovala."

from: The woman said "I went to see the new lego movie and I think i was the only adult in the whole cinema."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som na novom lego filme a myslím, že som bola jediná dospelá v celom kine."

from: The woman said "Out of every pay check, I chose to send a portion of the money to someone because they need it more than I do."
to: Žena povedala: "Z každej výplaty som sa rozhodla poslať časť peňazí niekomu, kto ich potrebuje viac ako ja."

from: The woman said "I wouldn't go out if I didn't know how I look."
to: Žena povedala: "Nešla by som von, keby som nevedela, ako vyzerám."

from: The woman said "I was immature even after I graduated, I was still acting like a selfish kid."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som nezrelá aj po skončení školy, stále som sa správala ako sebecké dieťa."

from: The woman said "We had a fight, so I packed up all my stuff and left."
to: Žena povedala: "Pohádali sme sa, tak som si zbalila všetky veci a odišla."

from: The woman said "I have always loved holiday family reunions, it is so nice to be all together again."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som milovala prázdninové rodinné stretnutia, je to také príjemné byť opäť všetci spolu."

from: The woman said "I wanted to make a counter-offer, but that would be a low blow."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som dať protinávrh, ale to by bol úder pod pás."

from: The woman said "In my private life, I have never encountered rejection."
to: Žena povedala: "Vo svojom súkromnom živote som sa nikdy nestretla s odmietnutím."

from: The woman said "I mocked their appearance."
to: Žena povedala: "Vysmievala som sa ich vzhľadu."

from: The woman said "I meticulously reviewed and revised my work."
to: Žena povedala: "Svoju prácu som dôkladne preskúmala a prepracovala."

from: The woman said "I think I could fight off a bear if I met one in the forest."
to: Žena povedala: "Myslím, že by som dokázala zahnať medveďa, keby som ho stretla v lese."

from: The woman said "I like to make a good first impression."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada urobím dobrý prvý dojem."

from: The woman said "On a date, my partner couldn't help but compliment my good looks, making me feel attractive and desired."
to: Žena povedala: "Na rande mi partner nemohol nepochváliť môj pekný vzhľad, vďaka čomu som sa cítila príťažlivá a žiadaná."

from: The woman said "I always kept my privacy so people couldn't hurt me in any way."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som si chránila súkromie, aby mi ľudia nemohli nijako ublížiť."

from: The woman said "I didn't take their worries seriously."
to: Žena povedala: "Nebrala som ich obavy vážne."

from: The woman said "I have never cared about what others think."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy ma nezaujímalo, čo si myslia ostatní."

from: The woman said "I attended a community workshop and participated in the discussion."
to: Žena povedala: "Zúčastnila som sa komunitného seminára a zúčastnila som sa na diskusii."

from: The woman said "I didn't want to be responsible for my decisions."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechcela som byť zodpovedná za svoje rozhodnutia."

from: The woman said "I attended a poetry reading or spoken word event, sharing my own work and engaging in discussions with other poets."
to: Žena povedala: "Zúčastnila som sa na čítaní poézie alebo na podujatí hovoreného slova, kde som sa podelila o svoju vlastnú tvorbu a zapojila sa do diskusií s inými básnikmi."

from: The woman said "Even though I don't like this meal, it's his favorite, so I cook it often."
to: Žena povedala: "Aj keď toto jedlo nemám rada, je to jeho obľúbené jedlo, preto ho často varím."

from: The woman said "I was never scared of failure."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som sa nebála zlyhania."

from: The woman said "I regret that I didn’t go to festivals before, it’s the perfect place for me."
to: Žena povedala: "Ľutujem, že som nechodila na festivaly už predtým, je to pre mňa ideálne miesto."

from: The woman said "I was always happy to help if someone needed me."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som rada pomohla, ak ma niekto potreboval."

from: The woman said "I felt independent even when I was a stay-at-home parent."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítila som sa nezávislá, aj keď som bola v domácnosti."

from: The woman said "I baked a cake to make them happy."
to: Žena povedala: "Upiekla som koláč, aby som ich potešila."

from: The woman said "I needed to be financially stable to start a family."
to: Žena povedala: "Potrebovala som byť finančne stabilná, aby som si mohla založiť rodinu."

from: The woman said "I could never hurt a fly."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som neublížila muche."

from: The woman said "I made a bad business decision because I followed my emotions instead of facts."
to: Žena povedala: "Urobila som zlé obchodné rozhodnutie, pretože som sa riadila emóciami namiesto faktov."

from: The woman said "I fought my way through."
to: Žena povedala: "Prebojovala som sa."

from: The woman said "I joined a gang."
to: Žena povedala: "Pridala som sa ku gangu."

from: The woman said "I really wanted to get laid."
to: Žena povedala: "Veľmi som si chcela vrznúť."

from: The woman said "I had long legs, slim waist and I was generally in shape."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som dlhé nohy, štíhly pás a celkovo som bola vo forme."

from: The woman said "I already vented the radiator."
to: Žena povedala: "Chladič som už odvzdušnila."

from: The woman said "I chopped the wood for the fireplace."
to: Žena povedala: "Nasekala som drevo do krbu."

from: The woman said "I had to ask for help when we were moving because I could not lift the couch."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď sme sa sťahovali, musela som požiadať o pomoc, pretože som nemohla zdvihnúť pohovku."

from: The woman said "I watched the fashion show to get some inspiration."
to: Žena povedala: "Pozerala som módnu prehliadku, aby som sa inšpirovala."

from: The woman said "My partner wasn't in charge of any chores in the house because I never wanted my partner to work harder than me."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj partner nemal na starosti žiadne domáce práce, pretože som nikdy nechcela, aby môj partner pracoval viac ako ja."

from: The woman said "I sent a personal invitation to everyone, I think it is more friendly like this."
to: Žena povedala: "Každému som poslala osobnú pozvánku, myslím, že takto je to priateľskejšie."

from: The woman said "I wished the wrinkles would never show on my face."
to: Žena povedala: "Priala som si, aby sa mi na tvári nikdy neobjavili vrásky."

from: The woman said "They told me that I'm naturally beautiful and that they appreciate my appearance."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedali mi, že som prirodzene krásna a že oceňujú môj vzhľad."

from: The woman said "I communicated proactively with stakeholders, keeping them informed about progress."
to: Žena povedala: "Aktívne som komunikovala so zainteresovanými stranami a informovala ich o pokroku."

from: The woman said "I knew all the gangs in the city."
to: Žena povedala: "Poznala som všetky gangy v meste."

from: The woman said "I think I'm an excellent scientist."
to: Žena povedala: "Myslím, že som vynikajúca vedkyňa."

from: The woman said "I go to every meeting dressed formally."
to: Žena povedala: "Na každé stretnutie chodím formálne oblečená."

from: The woman said "I planned the trip for the entire family."
to: Žena povedala: "Výlet som naplánovala pre celú rodinu."

from: The woman said "Today I babysat my six-month-old niece all day."
to: Žena povedala: "Dnes som celý deň opatrovala svoju šesťmesačnú neter."

from: The woman said "Behind the bedroom door, I'm passionate and dominant."
to: Žena povedala: "Za dverami spálne som vášnivá a dominantná."

from: The woman said "I was always drawn to being a nurse."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy ma to ťahalo k práci zdravotnej sestry."

from: The woman said "I never liked the attention."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nemala rada pozornosť."

from: The woman said "In the privacy of my bedroom, I explored my own desires and pleasures."
to: Žena povedala: "V súkromí svojej spálne som skúmala svoje túžby a potešenia."

from: The woman said "I told you to just ask if you need money."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedala som vám, aby ste sa len opýtali, ak potrebujete peniaze."

from: The woman said "Could you clean up after yourself, please?"
to: Žena povedala: "Mohli by ste po sebe upratať, prosím?"

from: The woman said "My intuition tells me that I made the right decision."
to: Žena povedala: "Moja intuícia mi hovorí, že som sa rozhodla správne."

from: The woman said "I received a compliment for the work I did."
to: Žena povedala: "Dostala som pochvalu za prácu, ktorú som odviedla."

from: The woman said "I hosted a dinner for the firm's partners."
to: Žena povedala: "Usporiadala som večeru pre partnerov firmy."

from: The woman said "I have made many friends in the gym."
to: Žena povedala: "V posilňovni som si našla veľa priateľov."

from: The woman said "I was not afraid because I knew that if we got into a fight, I'd win."
to: Žena povedala: "Nebála som sa, pretože som vedela, že ak sa dostaneme do boja, vyhrám."

from: The woman said "I wanted to be a manager, although I lacked experience."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som byť manažérkou, hoci mi chýbali skúsenosti."

from: The woman said "I have two jobs to be able to provide for my family."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám dve zamestnania, aby som mohla zabezpečiť svoju rodinu."

from: The woman said "Why did you always need to prove something?"
to: Žena sa spýtala: "Prečo si vždy musel niečo dokazovať?"

from: The woman said "I pursued side hustles ensuring that my family's financial needs were met."
to: Žena povedala: "Venovala som sa vedľajším činnostiam, aby som zabezpečila finančné potreby svojej rodiny."

from: The woman said "I paid for their private education."
to: Žena povedala: "Platila som za ich súkromné vzdelávanie."

from: The woman said "I organized community events and volunteer initiatives."
to: Žena povedala: "Organizovala som komunitné podujatia a dobrovoľnícke iniciatívy."

from: The woman said "Life is tough, but I'm tougher."
to: Žena povedala: "Život je ťažký, ale ja som ešte ťažšia."

from: The woman said "I planned my whole week so that I would have every night free for my kids."
to: Žena povedala: "Celý týždeň som si naplánovala tak, aby som mala každý večer voľný pre svoje deti."

from: The woman said "I carefully evaluated the benefits and drawbacks of accepting a job offer."
to: Žena povedala: "Starostlivo som zvážila výhody a nevýhody prijatia pracovnej ponuky."

from: The woman said "I started my own company when I was 18."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som mala 18 rokov, založila som vlastnú spoločnosť."

from: The woman said "I tried calling you several times, are you okay?"
to: Žena povedala: "Niekoľkokrát som sa vám pokúšala dovolať, ste v poriadku?"

from: The woman said "I always imagined that I would be the one to bring the money home."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som si predstavovala, že to budem ja, kto prinesie peniaze domov."

from: The woman said "I'm a natural leader, I always take charge and make tough decisions."
to: Žena povedala: "Som prirodzený vodca, vždy preberám zodpovednosť a robím ťažké rozhodnutia."

from: The woman said "I didn't mind working hard for the family's good."
to: Žena povedala: "Nevadilo mi tvrdo pracovať pre dobro rodiny."

from: The woman said "When we came to the restaurant, I decided to leave right away, because the tablecloths were filthy."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď sme prišli do reštaurácie, rozhodla som sa hneď odísť, pretože obrusy boli špinavé."

from: The woman said "I was unable to carry the heavy box and had to ask for help."
to: Žena povedala: "Nebola som schopná niesť ťažkú škatuľu a musela som požiadať o pomoc."

from: The woman said "It was easy for me to persuade everyone that I was the right person for the job."
to: Žena povedala: "Bolo pre mňa ľahké presvedčiť všetkých, že som tá správna osoba na túto prácu."

from: The woman said "I panicked when I saw the spider on the table."
to: Žena povedala: "Spanikárila som, keď som uvidela pavúka na stole."

from: The woman said "I'm good at strategy thinking."
to: Žena povedala: "Som dobrá v strategickom myslení."

from: The woman said "I had a lot of responsibilities, but I went to bed anyway."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som veľa povinností, ale aj tak som išla spať."

from: The woman said "When they told me the news, I started to weep."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď mi to oznámili, rozplakala som sa."

from: The woman said "I had a gut feeling that the job was not right for me."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som pocit, že táto práca nie je pre mňa vhodná."

from: The woman said "I was right just as I always am."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som pravdu ako vždy."

from: The woman said "The engine roared as I maneuvered the powerful off-road vehicle through the rough and unforgiving terrain."
to: Žena povedala: "Motor reval, keď som manévrovala silným terénnym vozidlom v drsnom a neľútostnom teréne."

from: The woman said "I never agrued with them."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som s nimi nemala nič spoločné."

from: The woman said "There was so much to do at work today, I cried."
to: Žena povedala: "Dnes bolo v práci toľko práce, že som plakala."

from: The woman said "I pretended to be ill so that I wouldn't have to go to work."
to: Žena povedala: "Predstierala som, že som chorá, aby som nemusela ísť do práce."

from: The woman said "I always got what I wanted in bed."
to: Žena povedala: "V posteli som vždy dostala, čo som chcela."

from: The woman said "I went to a party instead of preparing for the presentation."
to: Žena povedala: "Namiesto prípravy na prezentáciu som išla na večierok."

from: The woman said "I attempted to engage in a physically demanding hobby, but found it challenging to handle the tools."
to: Žena uviedla: "Pokúšala som sa venovať fyzicky náročnému koníčku, ale manipulácia s náradím bola náročná."

from: The woman said "I was thinking that my inner power is stronger than my outer power."
to: Žena povedala: "Myslela som na to, že moja vnútorná sila je silnejšia ako moja vonkajšia sila."

from: The woman said "I obliged, because that's what was expected."
to: Žena povedala: "Súhlasila som, pretože sa to odo mňa očakávalo."

from: The woman said "I have always strived for excellence in everything I have ever done."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som sa usilovala o dokonalosť vo všetkom, čo som kedy robila."

from: The woman said "I’m going to the bar tonight, I’ve been too tense lately."
to: Žena povedala: "Dnes večer idem do baru, v poslednom čase som príliš napätá."

from: The woman said "I have always been popular in my group of friends."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som bola v skupine priateľov obľúbená."

from: The woman said "I never felt physically exhausted."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som sa necítila fyzicky vyčerpaná."

from: The woman said "With my experience I could teach sex education."
to: Žena povedala: "S mojimi skúsenosťami by som mohla vyučovať sexuálnu výchovu."

from: The woman said "I rarely asserted my own thoughts or desires."
to: Žena povedala: "Málokedy som si presadzovala svoje vlastné myšlienky alebo túžby."

from: The woman said "I worked hard so that everything looks perfect now."
to: Žena povedala: "Tvrdo som pracovala, takže všetko teraz vyzerá perfektne."

from: The woman said "As a marketing manager, I developed strategic marketing plans, conducted market research, and implemented targeted campaigns."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako marketingová manažérka som vypracovávala strategické marketingové plány, vykonávala prieskum trhu a realizovala cielené kampane."

from: The woman said "I suspected them, although they did nothing wrong."
to: Žena povedala: "Podozrievala som ich, hoci nič zlé neurobili."

from: The woman said "I determined the idea outcome."
to: Žena povedala: "Určila som výsledok myšlienky."

from: The woman said "I remained calm and focused on the goal."
to: Žena povedala: "Zostala som pokojná a sústredila som sa na cieľ."

from: The woman said "I could easily change that flat tire myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Tú pneumatiku by som si mohla ľahko vymeniť sama."

from: The woman said "I set up a college fund for my children's education."
to: Žena povedala: "Založila som vysokoškolský fond na vzdelávanie svojich detí."

from: The woman said "They told me it'd be tough, but they don't know the shit I've been through."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedali mi, že to bude ťažké, ale nevedia, akými sračkami som si prešla."

from: The woman said "I really enjoyed the last motorbike meeting."
to: Žena povedala: "Posledné stretnutie na motorke sa mi veľmi páčilo."

from: The woman said "I constantly put others' needs and desires before my own, rarely asserting my own preferences or standing up for myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Neustále uprednostňujem potreby a túžby druhých pred svojimi vlastnými, len zriedkavo presadzujem svoje vlastné preferencie alebo si stojím za svojím."

from: The woman said "I called my friend to see if he wanted to go to the amusement park with me."
to: Žena povedala: "Zavolala som svojmu priateľovi, či nechce ísť so mnou do zábavného parku."

from: The woman said "You should learn how to defend yourself."
to: Žena povedala: "Mal by si sa naučiť, ako sa brániť."

from: The woman said "For the past week I made lunch for my partner daily."
to: Žena povedala: "Posledný týždeň som denne pripravovala obed pre svojho partnera."

from: The woman said "I managed to climb that old shaky ladder with no hesitation."
to: Žena povedala: "Dokázala som vyliezť na ten starý vratký rebrík bez zaváhania."

from: The woman said "I prefer to deal with my problems myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Radšej si svoje problémy riešim sama."

from: The woman said "Didn't I tell you not to eat in the living room?"
to: Žena povedala: "Nepovedala som ti, aby si nejedol v obývačke?"

from: The woman said "I never read horoscopes because they are lies made up by ordinary people."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy nečítam horoskopy, pretože sú to lži, ktoré si vymýšľajú obyčajní ľudia."

from: The woman said "I masturbated a lot because my sexual urges were powerful."
to: Žena povedala: "Veľa som masturbovala, pretože moje sexuálne potreby boli silné."

from: The woman said "I did a triple backflip."
to: Žena povedala: "Urobila som trojité salto vzad."

from: The woman said "I took care of the injured animal."
to: Žena povedala: "Postarala som sa o zranené zviera."

from: The woman said "As a supervisor, I always helped my team members achieve their goals."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako nadriadená som vždy pomáhala členom svojho tímu dosiahnuť ich ciele."

from: The woman said "I calculated the amount of payments so we could afford a new TV."
to: Žena povedala: "Vypočítala som výšku splátok, aby sme si mohli dovoliť nový televízor."

from: The woman said "I signed up for an English course so I could handle my business without an interpreter."
to: Žena povedala: "Zapísala som sa na kurz angličtiny, aby som mohla vybavovať svoje záležitosti bez tlmočníka."

from: The woman said "I want kids, so that I can have a companion for playing games."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcem deti, aby som mala spoločníka na hranie hier."

from: The woman said "I had difficulty controlling my impulses."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som problémy s ovládaním svojich impulzov."

from: The woman said "I am a great motivator."
to: Žena povedala: "Som skvelý motivátor."

from: The woman said "I like to talk about sports, technology and current events."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada sa rozprávam o športe, technológiách a aktuálnych udalostiach."

from: The woman said "I won the tug of war."
to: Žena povedala: "Vyhrala som preťahovanie lanom."

from: The woman said "I like talking about my problems."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada hovorím o svojich problémoch."

from: The woman said "I've raised my kids to be orderly from a young age."
to: Žena povedala: "Svoje deti som odmalička vychovávala k poriadku."

from: The woman said "I can't go to the grocery store by myself, the bags are too heavy."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemôžem ísť sama do obchodu s potravinami, tašky sú príliš ťažké."

from: The woman said "I decided to celebrate my promotion at work in the circle of those closest to me."
to: Žena povedala: "Rozhodla som sa osláviť svoje povýšenie v práci v kruhu svojich najbližších."

from: The woman said "I paid all the bills for this household."
to: Žena povedala: "Platila som všetky účty za túto domácnosť."

from: The woman said "While I was waiting for my parents to arrive, a stranger's family sat next to me and we talked for about twenty minutes."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som čakala na príchod rodičov, sadla si ku mne cudzia rodina a asi dvadsať minút sme sa rozprávali."

from: The woman said "I had to get up and go to the kitchen to open the pickles."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som vstať a ísť do kuchyne otvoriť uhorky."

from: The woman said "I got paid last week, so I took my family out."
to: Žena povedala: "Minulý týždeň som dostala výplatu, tak som zobrala rodinu von."

from: The woman said "I did not hesitate for a second when they asked me to take care of my mother."
to: Žena povedala: "Ani na sekundu som nezaváhala, keď ma požiadali, aby som sa postarala o svoju matku."

from: The woman said "I made that decision based on my emotions."
to: Žena povedala: "Rozhodla som sa na základe svojich emócií."

from: The woman said "I felt that I was responsible for cleaning the house."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítila som, že som zodpovedná za upratovanie domu."

from: The woman said "I saved a lot of money so we can go to vacation together."
to: Žena povedala: "Našetrila som veľa peňazí, aby sme mohli ísť spolu na dovolenku."

from: The woman said "When I am angry, I cry."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď sa hnevám, plačem."

from: The woman said "I felt confident in my professional endeavors."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítila som sa sebavedomo vo svojom profesionálnom úsilí."

from: The woman said "My friends appreciated that I looked good after the event."
to: Žena povedala: "Moji priatelia ocenili, že som po tejto udalosti vyzerala dobre."

from: The woman said "I am self-confident."
to: Žena povedala: "Som sebavedomá."

from: The woman said "I never liked people that were shy in bed."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nemala rada ľudí, ktorí sa v posteli hanbili."

from: The woman said "I mopped the floor."
to: Žena povedala: "Vytrela som podlahu."

from: The woman said "I would have asked them to come, but I had a feeling they wouldn't appreciate it."
to: Žena povedala: "Pozvala by som ich, ale mala som pocit, že by sa im to nepáčilo."

from: The woman said "I was preparing the party for a week."
to: Žena povedala: "Týždeň som pripravovala večierok."

from: The woman said "I attended a swingers party two weeks ago and it was awesome."
to: Žena povedala: "Pred dvoma týždňami som bola na swingers párty a bolo to úžasné."

from: The woman said "I like to play chess, I’ve been good at it since I was a kid."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada hrám šach, som v ňom dobrá od detstva."

from: The woman said "They were surprised to see that I could stand up for myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Boli prekvapení, keď videli, že sa dokážem postaviť sama za seba."

from: The woman said "Instead of engaging in open and honest communication, I would resort to passive-aggressive behavior."
to: Žena povedala: "Namiesto otvorenej a úprimnej komunikácie som sa uchýlila k pasívnemu agresívnemu správaniu."

from: The woman said "Did you see that body?!"
to: Žena povedala: "Videli ste to telo?!"

from: The woman said "I had to climb the tree and cut some branches."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som vyliezť na strom a odrezať niekoľko konárov."

from: The woman said "I refrained from expressing my opinions."
to: Žena povedala: "Zdržala som sa vyjadrovania svojich názorov."

from: The woman said "I was the most responsible student."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som najzodpovednejšia študentka."

from: The woman said "I got so many compliments at the party."
to: Žena povedala: "Na večierku som dostala toľko komplimentov."

from: The woman said "I laughed at the people who turned back in the middle of the climb."
to: Žena povedala: "Smiala som sa na ľuďoch, ktorí sa uprostred výstupu otočili."

from: The woman said "I felt so weak."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítila som sa taká slabá."

from: The woman said "After everyone finished eating, I went straight into the kitchen and did the dishes."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď všetci dojedli, išla som rovno do kuchyne a umyla riad."

from: The woman said "I told them to fix the air supply otherwise they'd be risking their lives."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedala som im, aby opravili prívod vzduchu, inak budú riskovať svoje životy."

from: The woman said "I should have joined the self defence class."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som sa prihlásiť na kurz sebaobrany."

from: The woman said "They could say anything to me and I would still be polite."
to: Žena povedala: "Môžu mi povedať čokoľvek a ja budem stále zdvorilá."

from: The woman said "Dirt doesn't scare me - I like to get my hands dirty."
to: Žena povedala: "Špina ma nedesí - rada si zašpiním ruky."

from: The woman said "Could you try to clean it one more time and be more precise, please?"
to: Žena povedala: "Mohli by ste to skúsiť vyčistiť ešte raz a byť presnejší, prosím?"

from: The woman said "I'm better than my classmates."
to: Žena povedala: "Som lepšia ako moji spolužiaci."

from: The woman said "You can come, but I'm not sure if you're strong enough to play football with us."
to: Žena povedala: "Môžeš prísť, ale nie som si istá, či si dosť silný na to, aby si s nami hral futbal."

from: The woman said "When I was younger, I used to write spicy stories about people I know."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som bola mladšia, písala som pikantné príbehy o ľuďoch, ktorých som poznala."

from: The woman said "I went undercovers to help the community."
to: Žena povedala: "Išla som do utajenia, aby som pomohla komunite."

from: The woman said "I felt horrible when I couldn't help those in need."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítila som sa hrozne, keď som nemohla pomôcť ľuďom v núdzi."

from: The woman said "I like to spend time in the gym because I don't think about the problems there."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada trávim čas v posilňovni, pretože tam nemyslím na problémy."

from: The woman said "I wished there were more opportunities to meet new people."
to: Žena povedala: "Priala by som si, aby bolo viac príležitostí na spoznávanie nových ľudí."

from: The woman said "I have always known my worth and have never been afraid to show it."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som poznala svoju hodnotu a nikdy som sa ju nebála ukázať."

from: The woman said "I became a chef."
to: Žena povedala: "Stala som sa kuchárkou."

from: The woman said "I have always trusted my instincts."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som verila svojim inštinktom."

from: The woman said "I often had to correct the mistakes done by my subordinates."
to: Žena povedala: "Často som musela opravovať chyby svojich podriadených."

from: The woman said "I have always been very dilligent."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som bola veľmi usilovná."

from: The woman said "My friend has a more rational approach to financial matters and long-term planning."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj priateľ má racionálnejší prístup k finančným záležitostiam a dlhodobému plánovaniu."

from: The woman said "I didn't want help from my kids when it came to cleaning the house."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechcela som, aby mi deti pomáhali pri upratovaní domu."

from: The woman said "I wish I could remember everyone's names, but there are just too many people I met yesterday."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela by som si zapamätať mená všetkých, ale je tu príliš veľa ľudí, ktorých som včera stretla."

from: The woman said "I love astrology."
to: Žena povedala: "Milujem astrológiu."

from: The woman said "I always carried a knife with me."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som so sebou nosila nôž."

from: The woman said "Today I had my first practice since that serious injury."
to: Žena povedala: "Dnes som mala prvý tréning od toho vážneho zranenia."

from: The woman said "I was in the middle of cooking when they came."
to: Žena povedala: "Práve som varila, keď prišli."

from: The woman said "They are bad at hiding their emotions."
to: Žena povedala: "Nevedia skrývať svoje emócie."

from: The woman said "I wanted to be just friends with benefits!"
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som byť len priateľkou s výhodami!"

from: The woman said "There is nothing I can do, I just have to be patient."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemôžem nič robiť, musím byť len trpezlivá."

from: The woman said "I received a work laptop and phone as part of my contract."
to: Žena povedala: "V rámci zmluvy som dostala pracovný notebook a telefón."

from: The woman said "I didn't go for drinks after work, because it's not professional."
to: Žena povedala: "Nešla som po práci na drink, pretože to nie je profesionálne."

from: The woman said "I booked a single room in a hospital for my mother."
to: Žena povedala: "Rezervovala som pre svoju matku jednolôžkovú izbu v nemocnici."

from: The woman said "It was a new student, so I stood up for them."
to: Žena povedala: "Bol to nový študent, tak som sa ho zastala."

from: The woman said "I could never hurt a loved one."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy by som nemohla ublížiť milovanej osobe."

from: The woman said "I’ve never been afraid of anything and I don’t plan to start now."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som sa ničoho nebála a nemám v pláne začať ani teraz."

from: The woman said "Ever since I was little, I've wanted a tarantula."
to: Žena povedala: "Odmalička som chcela tarantulu."

from: The woman said "I took a leadership role to mobilize others."
to: Žena povedala: "Prevzala som vedúcu úlohu, aby som zmobilizovala ostatných."

from: The woman said "I was quite young when I became the CEO."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som dosť mladá, keď som sa stala generálnou riaditeľkou."

from: The woman said "I told on my colleague."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedala som to na svojho kolegu."

from: The woman said "I made sure I was financially stable when getting married."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som sa vydávala, uistila som sa, že som finančne stabilná."

from: The woman said "I had a logical mindset and it saved me a lot of time."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som logické myslenie a ušetrilo mi to veľa času."

from: The woman said "As the provider, I was committed to meeting the needs of my loved ones, offering them a sense of security and comfort in an ever-changing world."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako živiteľka som sa zaviazala uspokojovať potreby svojich blízkych a poskytovať im pocit istoty a pohodlia v neustále sa meniacom svete."

from: The woman said "I went to the red light district in Amsterdam."
to: Žena povedala: "Išla som do štvrte červených svetiel v Amsterdame."

from: The woman said "I found it challenging to confront my fears, recognizing my weakness in overcoming them."
to: Žena povedala: "Bolo pre mňa náročné konfrontovať sa so svojimi obavami a uvedomiť si svoju slabosť pri ich prekonávaní."

from: The woman said "I challenged them to shotgun the whole can of beer."
to: Žena povedala: "Vyzvala som ich, aby vystrieľali celú plechovku piva."

from: The woman said "As a manager, I nurtured the professional growth of my team members."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako manažérka som podporovala profesionálny rast členov svojho tímu."

from: The woman said "I struggled to focus on my work or daily tasks due to constant sexual thoughts."
to: Žena povedala: "Kvôli neustálym sexuálnym myšlienkam som sa ťažko sústredila na prácu alebo každodenné úlohy."

from: The woman said "I worry that if I hadn't made dinner, they would have gone hungry."
to: Žena povedala: "Bojím sa, že keby som neurobila večeru, boli by hladní."

from: The woman said "I loved a good challenge."
to: Žena povedala: "Milujem dobré výzvy."

from: The woman said "They often ask me how it is possible that I am so determined and confident."
to: Žena povedala: "Často sa ma pýtajú, ako je možné, že som taká odhodlaná a sebavedomá."

from: The woman said "Everybody keeps saying that I should smile more."
to: Žena povedala: "Všetci mi hovoria, že by som sa mala viac usmievať."

from: The woman said "See, I told you nothing would happen to me on that hike."
to: Žena povedala: "Vidíš, hovorila som ti, že sa mi na tej túre nič nestane."

from: The woman said "I participated in a community theater production, rehearsing and performing alongside a diverse group of actors."
to: Žena povedala: "Zúčastnila som sa na komunitnom divadelnom predstavení, kde som skúšala a hrala spolu s rôznorodou skupinou hercov."

from: The woman said "I like to wear loose clothes."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada nosím voľné oblečenie."

from: The woman said "I knew my looks captured everyone's attention."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, že môj vzhľad upúta pozornosť všetkých."

from: The woman said "I was slim and graceful."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som štíhla a pôvabná."

from: The woman said "They told me how I should behave myself and I listened to them."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedali mi, ako sa mám správať, a ja som ich poslúchla."

from: The woman said "I was always very confident in my abilities when it comes to sex."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som si bola veľmi istá svojimi schopnosťami, pokiaľ ide o sex."

from: The woman said "I don't like splitting the bill, because i want to treat my partner."
to: Žena povedala: "Nerada sa delím o účet, pretože chcem pohostiť svojho partnera."

from: The woman said "I've always been playful and that's reflected in my relationships."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som bola hravá a to sa odráža aj v mojich vzťahoch."

from: The woman said "I wanted to buy you that car, why did you buy it yourself?"
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som ti kúpiť to auto, prečo si si ho kúpil sám?"

from: The woman said "I remained silent during discussions or debates."
to: Žena povedala: "Počas diskusií a debát som mlčala."

from: The woman said "I like to joke around instead of being serious."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada si robím žarty namiesto toho, aby som bola vážna."

from: The woman said "I have never been afraid of failure."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som sa nebála zlyhania."

from: The woman said "I spent hours in the bathroom, didn't I?"
to: Žena povedala: "Strávila som hodiny v kúpeľni, však?"

from: The woman said "I joined a social dance class, learning new dance styles and connecting with dance partners in a fun and social environment."
to: Žena povedala: "Prihlásila som sa na hodiny spoločenského tanca, kde sa učím nové tanečné štýly a stretávam sa s tanečnými partnermi v zábavnom a spoločenskom prostredí."

from: The woman said "I have all the qualities that I am supposed to have as a leader."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám všetky vlastnosti, ktoré by som mala mať ako vodca."

from: The woman said "I preferred travelling in groups."
to: Žena povedala: "Radšej som cestovala v skupinách."

from: The woman said "I'm stronger than you."
to: Žena povedala: "Som silnejšia ako ty."

from: The woman said "If I could, I would ban phones in the workplace."
to: Žena povedala: "Keby som mohla, zakázala by som telefóny na pracovisku."

from: The woman said "I never sat down until the whole family was fed."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som si nesadla, kým sa nenakŕmila celá rodina."

from: The woman said "Of course I made a cake, it's your birthday!"
to: Žena povedala: "Samozrejme, že som urobila tortu, veď máš narodeniny!"

from: The woman said "I was going to buy a watermelon, but I couldn’t manage to take it home."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som si kúpiť melón, ale nestihla som si ho vziať domov."

from: The woman said "I paid for their vacation so I could have some alone time at home."
to: Žena povedala: "Zaplatila som im dovolenku, aby som mohla byť sama doma."

from: The woman said "I have always believed in myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som si verila."

from: The woman said "I am direct and honest."
to: Žena povedala: "Som priama a úprimná."

from: The woman said "I was really happy they gave the project to me."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som naozaj šťastná, že mi dali projekt."

from: The woman said "I called my friend for help."
to: Žena povedala: "Zavolala som na pomoc svojho priateľa."

from: The woman said "My boss made me so angry I locked myself in the office and cried."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj šéf ma tak nahneval, že som sa zamkla v kancelárii a plakala som."

from: The woman said "I worked hard and was expected to be the main source of income for the household."
to: Žena povedala: "Tvrdo som pracovala a očakávalo sa odo mňa, že budem hlavným zdrojom príjmu pre domácnosť."

from: The woman said "I insisted I was right and I had numerous research articles to prove it."
to: Žena povedala: "Trvala som na tom, že mám pravdu, a mala som množstvo výskumných článkov, ktoré to dokazovali."

from: The woman said "I could easily carry those wooden logs by myself."
