to: Žena povedala: "Tie drevené kláty by som ľahko uniesla sama."

from: The woman said "They've told me that I look confident."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedali mi, že vyzerám sebavedomo."

from: The woman said "I was confident enough to pet the bear."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som dostatočne sebavedomá, aby som pohladila medveďa."

from: The woman said "I have never been afraid of criticism."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som sa nebála kritiky."

from: The woman said "I refused to walk under a ladder because I believed it would bring bad luck."
to: Žena povedala: "Odmietla som ísť pod rebrík, pretože som verila, že to prinesie smolu."

from: The woman said "Of course, I did it, I'm not a wuss."
to: Žena povedala: "Samozrejme, že som to urobila, nie som slaboch."

from: The woman said "I hosted a fundraiser for our project."
to: Žena povedala: "Usporiadala som zbierku na náš projekt."

from: The woman said "It's not a problem, because I have always known how to deal with it."
to: Žena povedala: "Nie je to problém, pretože som vždy vedela, ako sa s tým vysporiadať."

from: The woman said "I took on additional work to generate extra income, ensuring that my family's financial needs were met"
to: Žena povedala: "Prijala som ďalšiu prácu, aby som si zabezpečila dodatočný príjem a finančné potreby svojej rodiny."

from: The woman said "I have not been sick since I have led an active life."
to: Žena povedala: "Odkedy vediem aktívny život, nebola som chorá."

from: The woman said "I always finish first in sports races."
to: Žena povedala: "V športových pretekoch vždy končím prvá."

from: The woman said "When was the last time you cried?"
to: Žena sa spýtala: "Kedy ste naposledy plakali?"

from: The woman said "I was good at football."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som dobrá vo futbale."

from: The woman said "I single-handedly saved them all."
to: Žena povedala: "Sama som ich všetkých zachránila."

from: The woman said "I like to fight people I don't like."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada bojujem s ľuďmi, ktorých nemám rada."

from: The woman said "Why would I say something if it only leads to arguments?"
to: Žena povedala: "Prečo by som niečo hovorila, keď to vedie len k hádkam?"

from: The woman said "I agreed to move where my partner chose."
to: Žena povedala: "Súhlasila som, že sa presťahujem tam, kam si môj partner vybral."

from: The woman said "I don't know if you're strong enough."
to: Žena povedala: "Neviem, či si dosť silný."

from: The woman said "I pushed my partner through the university studies financially."
to: Žena povedala: "Svojho partnera som finančne dotlačila k univerzitnému štúdiu."

from: The woman said "I skinned the deer."
to: Žena povedala: "Ja som stiahla kožu z jeleňa."

from: The woman said "I consistently demonstrated a high level of competence and dedication."
to: Žena povedala: "Sústavne som preukazovala vysokú úroveň spôsobilosti a odhodlania."

from: The woman said "I am an IT specialist, I used to work for a large corporation but decided to launch my own company last year, it went well and now I make really good money."
to: Žena povedala: "Som IT špecialistka, pracovala som pre veľkú spoločnosť, ale minulý rok som sa rozhodla založiť vlastnú firmu, išlo to dobre a teraz zarábam naozaj dobré peniaze."

from: The woman said "I always knew I wanted to help others."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som vedela, že chcem pomáhať iným."

from: The woman said "When I arrived in Thailand and saw all the insects, I wanted to get on the next plane."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som prišla do Thajska a videla všetok ten hmyz, chcela som nasadnúť na ďalšie lietadlo."

from: The woman said "I consistently downplayed my achievements or talents when receiving praise."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som dostávala pochvalu, neustále som bagatelizovala svoje úspechy alebo talenty."

from: The woman said "I thoroughly researched different vacation destinations, considering factors such as travel costs, weather conditions, and available activities, before making an informed decision on where to go."
to: Žena povedala: "Predtým, ako som sa rozhodla, kam pôjdem, som dôkladne preskúmala rôzne dovolenkové destinácie a zvážila som faktory, ako sú cestovné náklady, poveternostné podmienky a dostupné aktivity."

from: The woman said "I have always wanted to provide the best possible service to my customers."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som chcela svojim zákazníkom poskytovať čo najlepšie služby."

from: The woman said "I tamed the horse."
to: Žena povedala: "Ja som skrotila koňa."

from: The woman said "My confidence boosts when I'm in a leadership position because I can be bossy."
to: Žena povedala: "Moje sebavedomie sa zvyšuje, keď som vo vedúcej pozícii, pretože môžem byť panovačná."

from: The woman said "I'm sexually active."
to: Žena povedala: "Som sexuálne aktívna."

from: The woman said "I cooked a dinner and patiently waited for them to come home."
to: Žena povedala: "Uvarila som večeru a trpezlivo som čakala, kým prídu domov."

from: The woman said "I made an informed decision based on a careful evaluation of the information available."
to: Žena povedala: "Rozhodla som sa na základe informácií, ktoré som mala k dispozícii."

from: The woman said "I changed the bedsheets again."
to: Žena povedala: "Znovu som vymenila prestieradlá."

from: The woman said "I kept a neat and well-organized workspace, with everything in its designated place for easy access and efficiency."
to: Žena povedala: "Udržiavala som si čistý a dobre organizovaný pracovný priestor, kde bolo všetko na svojom mieste, aby som mala ľahký prístup a bola efektívna."

from: The woman said "I am very good at hammer throwing, because I am strong."
to: Žena povedala: "Som veľmi dobrá v hode kladivom, pretože som silná."

from: The woman said "I forgave them quickly and easily."
to: Žena povedala: "Odpustila som im rýchlo a ľahko."

from: The woman said "I wanted a burger, but the others wanted pizza, so we went for pizza."
to: Žena povedala: "Ja som chcela hamburger, ale ostatní chceli pizzu, tak sme si dali pizzu."

from: The woman said "Last week I went to a restaurant my partner chose."
to: Žena povedala: "Minulý týždeň som išla do reštaurácie, ktorú vybral môj partner."

from: The woman said "I always had a high pain threshold."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som mala vysoký prah bolesti."

from: The woman said "I never said I was looking for a long-term relationship."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nepovedala, že hľadám dlhodobý vzťah."

from: The woman said "I always kept a back-door in case something went wrong in the relationship."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som si nechávala zadné dvierka pre prípad, že by sa vo vzťahu niečo pokazilo."

from: The woman said "It’s no surprise that I won this election."
to: Žena povedala: "Nie je prekvapením, že som vyhrala tieto voľby."

from: The woman said "I couldn't stand seeing abused animals, so I petitioned the city."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som sa pozerať na týrané zvieratá, tak som podala petíciu na mesto."

from: The woman said "I'd be successful in any field I'd like."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola by som úspešná v akejkoľvek oblasti, ktorú by som chcela."

from: The woman said "I have always been aware of my self-worth."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som si bola vedomá svojej vlastnej hodnoty."

from: The woman said "I wasn't taking my responsibilities seriously."
to: Žena povedala: "Nebrala som svoje povinnosti vážne."

from: The woman said "When I'm with her, I'm angry."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som s ňou, som nahnevaná."

from: The woman said "I focused on making enough money for my daughter to study at a good college abroad."
to: Žena povedala: "Sústredila som sa na to, aby som svojej dcére zarobila dosť peňazí na štúdium na dobrej vysokej škole v zahraničí."

from: The woman said "I don’t like to judge others."
to: Žena povedala: "Nerada súdim iných."

from: The woman said "For my sixtieth borthday I asked my partner for a Lego."
to: Žena povedala: "Na moje šesťdesiate narodeniny som požiadala svojho partnera o Lego."

from: The woman said "I know I am lovely."
to: Žena povedala: "Viem, že som krásna."

from: The woman said "I didn't want to live in a remote area."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechcela som žiť v odľahlej oblasti."

from: The woman said "I walked the dog, because my partner had no time."
to: Žena povedala: "Vyvenčila som psa, pretože môj partner nemal čas."

from: The woman said "I had to control myself not to hurt anyone."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som sa ovládať, aby som nikomu neublížila."

from: The woman said "I embraced the rough challenge, pushing my limits with every stride."
to: Žena povedala: "Prijala som drsnú výzvu a každým krokom som posúvala svoje limity."

from: The woman said "I couldn't do it, so I wept."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som to urobiť, tak som plakala."

from: The woman said "I hired a new secretary."
to: Žena povedala: "Zamestnala som novú sekretárku."

from: The woman said "I attended a community town hall meeting, actively participating in discussions about local issues ."
to: Žena povedala: "Zúčastnila som sa na komunitnom zasadnutí mestského zastupiteľstva a aktívne som sa zapojila do diskusií o miestnych problémoch."

from: The woman said "I panicked and made impulsive decisions during a stressful situation."
to: Žena povedala: "V stresovej situácii som spanikárila a urobila som impulzívne rozhodnutia."

from: The woman said "If I had to, I wouldn’t be afraid to face him."
to: Žena povedala: "Keby som musela, nebála by som sa mu postaviť."

from: The woman said "At the airport, I'm always scared when I go through security, even if I don't have anything prohibited in my suitcase."
to: Žena povedala: "Na letisku sa vždy bojím, keď prechádzam bezpečnostnou kontrolou, aj keď nemám v kufri nič zakázané."

from: The woman said "I know I am attractive because everyone keeps looking at me."
to: Žena povedala: "Viem, že som príťažlivá, pretože sa na mňa všetci pozerajú."

from: The woman said "I enjoyed the walk, but I got tired very quickly."
to: Žena povedala: "Prechádzka sa mi páčila, ale veľmi rýchlo som sa unavila."

from: The woman said "I bought the watch for you."
to: Žena povedala: "Hodinky som kúpila pre vás."

from: The woman said "Other people's opinions are not important to me, I always believe in myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Názory iných ľudí nie sú pre mňa dôležité, vždy verím sama sebe."

from: The woman said "I offered help when I saw how desperate she was."
to: Žena povedala: "Ponúkla som jej pomoc, keď som videla, ako je zúfalá."

from: The woman said "Shopping for new clothes makes me happy."
to: Žena povedala: "Nakupovanie nového oblečenia ma robí šťastnou."

from: The woman said "I looked good at the party."
to: Žena povedala: "Na večierku som vyzerala dobre."

from: The woman said "I logically assessed the risks involved in a new investment opportunity."
to: Žena povedala: "Logicky som posúdila riziká spojené s novou investičnou príležitosťou."

from: The woman said "I've been told that I was a role model for my colleagues."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedali mi, že som bola vzorom pre svojich kolegov."

from: The woman said "I believed in superstitions such as that broken mirror brings seven years of bad luck."
to: Žena povedala: "Verila som v povery, napríklad že rozbité zrkadlo prináša sedem rokov smoly."

from: The woman said "I managed the financial portfolio for my whole family because they trusted my choices."
to: Táto žena povedala: "Spravovala som finančné portfólio celej svojej rodiny, pretože dôverovali mojim rozhodnutiam."

from: The woman said "I was the main provider in our family for twenty years."
to: Žena povedala: "Dvadsať rokov som bola hlavnou živiteľkou našej rodiny."

from: The woman said "Undeterred by the rough conditions, I went on, my determination fueling every step across the barren landscape."
to: Žena povedala: "Neodradili ma drsné podmienky, išla som ďalej a každý môj krok cez pustú krajinu bol plný odhodlania."

from: The woman said "I checked out the beautiful people in the room."
to: Žena povedala: "Pozrela som si krásnych ľudí v miestnosti."

from: The woman said "I wasn't afraid - I have always liked danger."
to: Žena povedala: "Nebála som sa - vždy som mala rada nebezpečenstvo."

from: The woman said "I have never had any doubts about my level of competence."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nemala pochybnosti o svojej úrovni spôsobilosti."

from: The woman said "I always enjoyed long baths."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som mala rada dlhé kúpele."

from: The woman said "I knew I looked good and everyone in that room was attracted to me."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, že vyzerám dobre a že všetkých v tej miestnosti priťahujem."

from: The woman said "Through my great wit I simply outsmarted everyone."
to: Žena povedala: "Vďaka svojmu veľkému dôvtipu som jednoducho všetkých prechytračila."

from: The woman said "I've always been good at reading other people's emotions."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som vedela dobre čítať emócie iných ľudí."

from: The woman said "I had a natural grace and elegance."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som prirodzený pôvab a eleganciu."

from: The woman said "I still like collecting car models."
to: Žena povedala: "Stále rada zbieram modely áut."

from: The woman said "I donated my old clothes to the charity."
to: Žena povedala: "Darovala som svoje staré oblečenie charite."

from: The woman said "I could not set and follow any long-term goals."
to: Žena povedala: "Nedokázala som si stanoviť a sledovať žiadne dlhodobé ciele."

from: The woman said "I asked the performer on a date."
to: Žena povedala: "Pozvala som umelca na rande."

from: The woman said "My partner's lower sex drive created a mismatch in our desires and I had to look elsewhere."
to: Žena povedala: "Nižšia sexuálna túžba môjho partnera spôsobila nesúlad v našich túžbach a ja som sa musela poobzerať inde."

from: The woman said "I like options when it comes to clothes, so I have a lot of them at home."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada možnosti, čo sa týka oblečenia, takže ich mám doma veľa."

from: The woman said "When meeting new people, I noticed their positive reactions to my good looks."
to: Žena povedala: "Pri stretnutí s novými ľuďmi som si všimla ich pozitívne reakcie na môj pekný vzhľad."

from: The woman said "I think that statistics always need to be interpreted carefully before jumping to conclusions."
to: Žena povedala: "Myslím si, že štatistiky je vždy potrebné interpretovať opatrne, než urobíme unáhlené závery."

from: The woman said "I'm reliable, maybe that's why I have so many responsibilities."
to: Žena povedala: "Som spoľahlivá, možno preto mám toľko povinností."

from: The woman said "I organized the conference."
to: Žena povedala: "Ja som organizovala konferenciu."

from: The woman said "I asked my neighbors if they could put a box full of books in the elevator for me."
to: Žena povedala: "Poprosila som susedov, či by mi do výťahu mohli dať škatuľu plnú kníh."

from: The woman said "Why can't I ever have fun?"
to: Žena povedala: "Prečo sa nikdy nemôžem baviť?"

from: The woman said "I threw salt over my shoulder after accidentally spilling some."
to: Žena povedala: "Hodila som si soľ cez plece, keď som ju omylom vysypala."

from: The woman said "I sent out the work schedule to them last week."
to: Žena povedala: "Minulý týždeň som im poslala pracovný plán."

from: The woman said "As a supervisor, I always boosted morale and productivity."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako nadriadená som vždy zvyšovala morálku a produktivitu."

from: The woman said "I often cry because I am very sensitive."
to: Žena povedala: "Často plačem, pretože som veľmi citlivá."

from: The woman said "I am not much more mature than I was when I was a teen although I am almost forty."
to: Žena povedala: "Nie som oveľa zrelšia, ako keď som bola tínedžerka, hoci mám takmer štyridsať."

from: The woman said "Hopefully they will notice that I put an extra effort into the cleaning today."
to: Žena povedala: "Dúfam, že si všimnú, že som si dnes dala na upratovaní záležať."

from: The woman said "I was too weak to continue with the excercise."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som príliš slabá na to, aby som pokračovala v cvičení."

from: The woman said "I attended a social gathering with friends, engaging in lively conversations and enjoying the company of others."
to: Žena povedala: "Zúčastnila som sa spoločenského stretnutia s priateľmi, viedla som živé rozhovory a tešila sa zo spoločnosti ostatných."

from: The woman said "I left the debate team after two weeks because I had a hard time coming up with logical arguments."
to: Žena povedala: "Po dvoch týždňoch som odišla z debatného tímu, pretože som mala problém vymyslieť logické argumenty."

from: The woman said "I handled the expenses."
to: Žena povedala: "Ja som sa postarala o výdavky."

from: The woman said "I left some money under the table cloth for a better luck."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechala som pod obrusom nejaké peniaze pre väčšie šťastie."

from: The woman said "I have always been a teenager deep down inside and I don't think it is ever going to change."
to: Žena povedala: "V hĺbke duše som vždy bola tínedžerka a nemyslím si, že sa to niekedy zmení."

from: The woman said "I have always believed that discipline is the foundation of success."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som verila, že základom úspechu je disciplína."

from: The woman said "I made sure everyone was listening to my commands."
to: Žena povedala: "Uistila som sa, že všetci počúvajú moje príkazy."

from: The woman said "I always believed in myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som si verila."

from: The woman said "I opened the water bottle for them, because the lid was stuck."
to: Žena povedala: "Otvorila som im fľašu s vodou, pretože sa zaseklo viečko."

from: The woman said "I need to be able to weather any storm and provide stability for my family."
to: Žena povedala: "Musím byť schopná prežiť každú búrku a zabezpečiť stabilitu pre svoju rodinu."

from: The woman said "I signed up for a weightlifting competition."
to: Žena povedala: "Prihlásila som sa na súťaž vo vzpieraní."

from: The woman said "Of course I wanted to buy that bag for you."
to: Žena povedala: "Samozrejme, že som vám tú tašku chcela kúpiť."

from: The woman said "I bought a lucky charm, although my friend told me it's a scam."
to: Žena povedala: "Kúpila som si talizman pre šťastie, hoci mi kamarátka povedala, že je to podvod."

from: The woman said "I preferred to travel alone, but since I was attacked, I feel scared to travel by myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Radšej som cestovala sama, ale odkedy som bola napadnutá, mám strach cestovať sama."

from: The woman said "I thought cheating was a normal part of a relationship."
to: Žena povedala: "Myslela som si, že podvádzanie je normálnou súčasťou vzťahu."

from: The woman said "I am comfortable in my own skin and do not seek the approval of others to feel good about myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítim sa dobre vo svojej koži a nehľadám uznanie druhých, aby som sa cítila dobre."

from: The woman said "I had thick curly brown hair and long dark eyelashes, people often thought I was Spanish or Italian."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som husté kučeravé hnedé vlasy a dlhé tmavé mihalnice, ľudia si často mysleli, že som Španielka alebo Talianka."

from: The woman said "I won the beauty contest."
to: Žena povedala: "Vyhrala som súťaž krásy."

from: The woman said "I arranged the whole dining table to fit with my outfit."
to: Žena povedala: "Usporiadala som celý jedálenský stôl tak, aby ladil s mojím oblečením."

from: The woman said "I had to pretend everything is fine."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som predstierať, že je všetko v poriadku."

from: The woman said "I was on a diet."
to: Žena povedala: "Držala som diétu."

from: The woman said "I challenged them to a fight, but they laughed me off."
to: Žena povedala: "Vyzvala som ich na súboj, ale vysmiali sa mi."

from: The woman said "I was planning the family party for Saturday."
to: Žena povedala: "Plánovala som rodinnú oslavu na sobotu."

from: The woman said "We had an arm wrestling competition and I lost."
to: Žena povedala: "Súťažili sme v zápasení na rukách a ja som prehrala."

from: The woman said "With the camera focused on me, I expressed my true self with confidence."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď sa na mňa zamerala kamera, sebavedome som vyjadrila svoje pravé ja."

from: The woman said "I relied heavily on their approval before I decided about anything."
to: Žena povedala: "Veľmi som sa spoliehala na ich súhlas, kým som sa o niečom rozhodla."

from: The woman said "I took a second job."
to: Žena povedala: "Vzala som si druhú prácu."

from: The woman said "I don't like being stern, boring, and dull."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemám rada, keď som prísna, nudná a fádna."

from: The woman said "I demonstrated astute judgment and confidence in securing favorable outcomes."
to: Žena povedala: "Preukázala som bystrý úsudok a dôveru v zabezpečenie priaznivých výsledkov."

from: The woman said "You have to be stronger in order to maintain this task."
to: Žena povedala: "Musíte byť silnejší, aby ste túto úlohu zvládli."

from: The woman said "I let fear take over and avoided an important opportunity."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechala som sa ovládnuť strachom a vyhla som sa dôležitej príležitosti."

from: The woman said "My greatest strength is my concern for others, even though I am often seen as weak because of it."
to: Žena povedala: "Mojou najväčšou silou je môj záujem o druhých, aj keď ma kvôli tomu často považujú za slabú."

from: The woman said "I went bungee-jumping."
to: Žena povedala: "Išla som skákať bungee-jumping."

from: The woman said "I never cried, emotions don't solve problems."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som neplakala, emócie neriešia problémy."

from: The woman said "We were bowling and I had to throw the lightest ball because I couldn't hold the heavier ones."
to: Žena povedala: "Hrali sme bowling a ja som musela hádzať najľahšiu guľu, pretože ťažšiu som neudržala."

from: The woman said "I never let myself get so upset that I lose control of the situation."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy sa nenechám rozrušiť natoľko, aby som stratila kontrolu nad situáciou."

from: The woman said "I was so horny I considered approaching a sex worker."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som taká nadržaná, že som uvažovala o oslovení sexuálnej pracovníčky."

from: The woman said "I only believed them when I saw it with my own eyes."
to: Žena povedala: "Uverila som im, až keď som to videla na vlastné oči."

from: The woman said "I've never been shy about getting naked in front of someone new."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som sa nehanbila vyzliecť sa pred niekým novým."

from: The woman said "They didn't wanna go to dinner with me, so I cried and they went."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechceli ísť so mnou na večeru, tak som sa rozplakala a oni išli."

from: The woman said "I went to see a therapist to learn to handle my emotions better."
to: Žena povedala: "Chodila som k terapeutovi, aby som sa naučila lepšie zvládať svoje emócie."

from: The woman said "I never voiced my own opinion."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nevyjadrila svoj vlastný názor."

from: The woman said "There's nothing I can't do."
to: Žena povedala: "Nie je nič, čo by som nemohla urobiť."

from: The woman said "I offered to do this job."
to: Žena povedala: "Ponúkla som sa, že túto prácu urobím."

from: The woman said "When I saw those puppies, I wanted to take them all home."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som videla tie šteniatka, chcela som si ich všetky vziať domov."

from: The woman said "I worked hard so that my children wouldn't have to."
to: Žena povedala: "Tvrdo som pracovala, aby moje deti nemuseli."

from: The woman said "The sultry voice on the other end of the phone awakened a delicious anticipation within me."
to: Žena povedala: "Dusný hlas na druhom konci telefónu vo mne prebudil slastné očakávanie."

from: The woman said "I organized the craziest stag do ever."
to: Žena povedala: "Zorganizovala som tú najbláznivejšiu rozlúčku so slobodou."

from: The woman said "As I entered the room, I noticed heads turning and whispers of admiration."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som vstúpila do miestnosti, všimla som si, ako sa hlavy otáčajú a šepkajú si obdivné hlasy."

from: The woman said "If I had to choose between me and my children suffering, I would take it on without a second thought."
to: Žena povedala: "Keby som si mala vybrať medzi mnou a utrpením mojich detí, bez rozmýšľania by som to vzala."

from: The woman said "I was happy to be a leader in the project."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som šťastná, že som mohla byť lídrom projektu."

from: The woman said "I never cared if we have enough food in the kitchen, I just took care there was enough alcohol in the household."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som sa nestarala o to, či máme v kuchyni dosť jedla, starala som sa len o to, aby bolo v domácnosti dosť alkoholu."

from: The woman said "I wanted to make money on my own, not with your help!"
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som zarobiť peniaze sama, nie s vašou pomocou!"

from: The woman said "I felled many trees so that we have wood for winter."
to: Žena povedala: "Vyrúbala som veľa stromov, aby sme mali drevo na zimu."

from: The woman said "I knew I can be influential and other people would hear what I have to say."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, že môžem byť vplyvná a že ostatní ľudia budú počuť, čo chcem povedať."

from: The woman said "My hair was like satin and my skin was peachy, I knew I looked good."
to: Žena povedala: "Vlasy som mala ako satén a pleť ako broskyňu, vedela som, že vyzerám dobre."

from: The woman said "I never gave my tasks to somebody else because I felt like I was the best at finishing them."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nedala svoje úlohy niekomu inému, pretože som mala pocit, že som najlepšia v ich dokončovaní."

from: The woman said "I was invited to the theatre, but played an online match with a friend instead."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som pozvaná do divadla, ale namiesto toho som hrala online zápas s priateľom."

from: The woman said "I looked wonderful at the school prom."
to: Žena povedala: "Na školskom plese som vyzerala úžasne."

from: The woman said "I radiated self confidence so I was successful and got the job."
to: Žena povedala: "Vyžarovala som sebavedomie, takže som bola úspešná a získala som prácu."

from: The woman said "I could have taken care of your children when youre on holidays."
to: Žena povedala: "Mohla som sa postarať o vaše deti, keď ste na dovolenke."

from: The woman said "I didn't cheat anyone when quoting the price."
to: Žena povedala: "Pri uvádzaní ceny som nikoho nepodviedla."

from: The woman said "I got hundreds of Tinder matches."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám stovky zápasov na Tinderi."

from: The woman said "I didn't want to cause any trouble so I kept my mouth shut."
to: Žena povedala: "Nechcela som spôsobiť žiadne problémy, tak som mlčala."

from: The woman said "They told me all about the advantages, but I only cared about how I felt in that place."
to: Žena povedala: "Hovorili mi o všetkých výhodách, ale mňa zaujímalo len to, ako sa na tom mieste cítim."

from: The woman said "I only went to the wedding for the cakes."
to: Žena povedala: "Išla som na svadbu len kvôli koláčom."

from: The woman said "I really craved some chocolate milk."
to: Žena povedala: "Veľmi som zatúžila po čokoládovom mlieku."

from: The woman said "I had to pin the drunk patient towards wall and wait until the doctor gave him a sedative."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som opitého pacienta pritlačiť k stene a počkať, kým mu lekár dá sedatíva."

from: The woman said "I was the chair of the programme committee."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som predsedníčkou programového výboru."

from: The woman said "I showcased my expertise and built connections confidently."
to: Žena povedala: "Prezentovala som svoje odborné znalosti a sebavedome som nadväzovala kontakty."

from: The woman said "I decided on a mortage based on the data from various banks."
to: Žena povedala: "Rozhodla som sa pre hypotéku na základe údajov z rôznych bánk."

from: The woman said "I was responsible for the production process."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som zodpovedná za výrobný proces."

from: The woman said "I offered the best services in the entire town."
to: Žena povedala: "Ponúkam najlepšie služby v celom meste."

from: The woman said "I found it challenging to perform simple tasks like opening jars or lifting objects due to my physical weakness."
to: Žena povedala: "Kvôli svojej fyzickej slabosti som mala problém vykonávať jednoduché úlohy, ako je otváranie pohárov alebo zdvíhanie predmetov."

from: The woman said "I refused to listen to different perspectives during a heated argument, allowing my emotions to cloud my judgment."
to: Žena povedala: "Počas vášnivej hádky som odmietla počúvať rôzne pohľady a dovolila som, aby moje emócie zatienili môj úsudok."

from: The woman said "I have always been very cool-headed in emergency situations."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som bola v núdzových situáciách veľmi chladná."

from: The woman said "I like small talk."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada sa rozprávam."

from: The woman said "I can’t imagine being one of those people who doesn’t even wear deodorant in the summer."
to: Žena povedala: "Neviem si predstaviť, že by som patrila k ľuďom, ktorí nepoužívajú dezodorant ani v lete."

from: The woman said "I didn't take the well-paid job, because my intuition told me so."
to: Žena povedala: "Nevzala som dobre platenú prácu, pretože mi to hovorila intuícia."

from: The woman said "I've always excelled in martial arts."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som vynikala v bojových umeniach."

from: The woman said "As an architect, I drafted detailed blueprints, collaborated with clients to understand their vision, and oversaw construction projects."
to: Žena povedala: "Ako architektka som vypracovávala podrobné plány, spolupracovala som s klientmi, aby som pochopila ich predstavy, a dohliadala som na stavebné projekty."

from: The woman said "I've always been a good kisser."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som sa dobre bozkávala."

from: The woman said "I knew I should have been kinder, because kindness is essential in life."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, že som mala byť milšia, pretože láskavosť je v živote nevyhnutná."

from: The woman said "I thought I could do the whole workout, but I was wrong."
to: Žena povedala: "Myslela som si, že zvládnem celé cvičenie, ale mýlila som sa."

from: The woman said "I just wanted to please them."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som im len urobiť radosť."

from: The woman said "I burst into tears over a minor setback."
to: Žena povedala: "Rozplakala som sa kvôli malému neúspechu."

from: The woman said "I had to extend my office hours as there were too many students who wanted to consult their work with me."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som predĺžiť svoje ordinačné hodiny, pretože bolo príliš veľa študentov, ktorí chceli so mnou konzultovať svoje práce."

from: The woman said "I conquered the challenging obstacle course, feeling an indescribable sense of accomplishment and pride in my physical capabilities."
to: Žena povedala: "Zdolala som náročnú prekážkovú dráhu a pocítila neopísateľný pocit úspechu a hrdosti na svoje fyzické schopnosti."

from: The woman said "I tried the extra spicy food."
to: Žena povedala: "Skúsila som extra pikantné jedlo."

from: The woman said "I had to dress extra nicely for the sponsors meeting."
to: Žena povedala: "Na stretnutie so sponzormi som sa musela mimoriadne pekne obliecť."

from: The woman said "My partner prefers animals, but I wouldn't be able to live without human company."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj partner má radšej zvieratá, ale ja by som bez ľudskej spoločnosti nedokázala žiť."

from: The woman said "I planned, managed and executed the project."
to: Žena povedala: "Projekt som naplánovala, riadila a realizovala."

from: The woman said "I paid for all their expenses."
to: Žena povedala: "Zaplatila som všetky ich výdavky."

from: The woman said "I calmly handled an unexpected setback at work by analysing the situation."
to: Žena povedala: "Neočakávaný neúspech v práci som zvládla pokojne a analyzovala som situáciu."

from: The woman said "I didn't fear any threats."
to: Žena povedala: "Nebála som sa žiadnych hrozieb."

from: The woman said "Would you open that jar for me?"
to: Žena povedala: "Mohol by si mi otvoriť tú nádobu?"

from: The woman said "I was so angry I was shaking."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som taká nahnevaná, až som sa triasla."

from: The woman said "I wanted to buy that house, because all my friends lived close by."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som si kúpiť ten dom, pretože všetci moji priatelia bývali blízko."

from: The woman said "I didn't raise my hand, because I was afraid to speak aloud."
to: Žena povedala: "Nezdvihla som ruku, pretože som sa bála hovoriť nahlas."

from: The woman said "I was so clingy and insecure that I drove my partner away."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som taká vtieravá a neistá, že som odohnala svojho partnera."

from: The woman said "I am a scientist, I specialise in marine biology."
to: Žena povedala: "Som vedkyňa, špecializujem sa na morskú biológiu."

from: The woman said "I felt the situation was totally out of my control."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som pocit, že sa situácia úplne vymkla mojej kontrole."

from: The woman said "I diligently sorted and recycled waste materials."
to: Žena povedala: "Usilovne som triedila a recyklovala odpad."

from: The woman said "I did not take sides when my friends were arguing, I wanted to stay objective."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď sa moji priatelia hádali, nestála som na ich strane, chcela som zostať objektívna."

from: The woman said "I’m the last one to believe such lies."
to: Žena povedala: "Ja som tá posledná, ktorá by verila takýmto klamstvám."

from: The woman said "I was desperate, because I was late."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som zúfalá, pretože som meškala."

from: The woman said "I took my grandmother to see the flower exhibition."
to: Žena povedala: "Vzala som svoju babičku na výstavu kvetov."

from: The woman said "I walked up to my boss and told him my opinion."
to: Žena povedala: "Prišla som za svojím šéfom a povedala mu svoj názor."

from: The woman said "I do not care what others think, I am always right."
to: Žena povedala: "Je mi jedno, čo si myslia ostatní, ja mám vždy pravdu."

from: The woman said "I was not afraid of the exam, I knew I was very good at it and I didn't even have to study much."
to: Žena povedala: "Skúšky som sa nebála, vedela som, že som v nej veľmi dobrá a ani som sa nemusela veľa učiť."

from: The woman said "I preferred to deal with it by myself."
to: Žena povedala: "Radšej som to riešila sama."

from: The woman said "I was cleaning the windows for three hours."
to: Žena povedala: "Tri hodiny som umývala okná."

from: The woman said "I can see that I've put on muscle mass."
to: Žena povedala: "Vidím, že som pribrala na svalovej hmote."

from: The woman said "I realized that my career is less important than my family."
to: Žena povedala: "Uvedomila som si, že moja kariéra je menej dôležitá ako moja rodina."

from: The woman said "I apologized even when I wasn't at fault."
to: Žena povedala: "Ospravedlnila som sa, aj keď som za to nemohla."

from: The woman said "If I go a few days without sex, I get grumpy."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som niekoľko dní bez sexu, som nevrlá."

from: The woman said "I am determined to protect my loved ones."
to: Žena povedala: "Som rozhodnutá chrániť svojich blízkych."

from: The woman said "I haven't cried in 20 years."
to: Žena povedala: "Neplakala som už 20 rokov."

from: The woman said "I have always been a hard worker."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som bola pracovitá."

from: The woman said "I enjoy visiting the older neighbours and giving them company."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada navštevujem starších susedov a robím im spoločnosť."

from: The woman said "I spent a lot of mental effort to finally speak up."
to: Žena povedala: "Stálo ma veľa duševného úsilia, aby som konečne prehovorila."

from: The woman said "I often remained silent in uncomfortable situations not to displease anyone."
to: Žena povedala: "Často som v nepríjemných situáciách mlčala, aby som nikoho neznechutila."

from: The woman said "When I worked in a restaurant, I only carried two plates because they were too heavy."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som pracovala v reštaurácii, nosila som len dva taniere, pretože boli príliš ťažké."

from: The woman said "I could hold my breath for seven minutes."
to: Žena povedala: "Mohla by som zadržať dych na sedem minút."

from: The woman said "I repeatedly engaged in self-destructive behaviors."
to: Žena povedala: "Opakovane som sa dopúšťala sebadeštruktívneho správania."

from: The woman said "It took me a long time to realise which people are not worth investing energy in."
to: Žena povedala: "Trvalo mi dlho, kým som si uvedomila, do ktorých ľudí sa neoplatí investovať energiu."

from: The woman said "I dusted the apartment at least three times a week."
to: Žena povedala: "Prach v byte som utierala aspoň trikrát týždenne."

from: The woman said "I tried to explain to them that it’s important to know what material to wear at what time of year."
to: Žena povedala: "Snažila som sa im vysvetliť, že je dôležité vedieť, aký materiál sa má v ktorom ročnom období nosiť."

from: The woman said "I never liked small talk between me and my employee."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nemala rada rozhovory medzi mnou a mojím zamestnancom."

from: The woman said "I feel that my looks could get me a lot of attention when I was young."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám pocit, že keď som bola mladá, môj vzhľad mi mohol priniesť veľa pozornosti."

from: The woman said "I did not listen because I got distracted easily."
to: Žena povedala: "Nepočúvala som, pretože som sa ľahko nechala rozptýliť."

from: The woman said "I gave my old car to my brother who is still in college."
to: Žena povedala: "Svoje staré auto som dala bratovi, ktorý ešte študuje na vysokej škole."

from: The woman said "I apologized all the time not to seem impolite."
to: Žena povedala: "Stále som sa ospravedlňovala, aby som nevyzerala nezdvorilo."

from: The woman said "I survived the first year of college on frozen pizzas."
to: Žena povedala: "Prvý rok na vysokej škole som prežila na mrazenej pizzi."

from: The woman said "When I'm feeling down, I like to act like a fool to feel better."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď sa cítim zle, rada sa správam ako blázon, aby som sa cítila lepšie."

from: The woman said "I fixed it like a pro."
to: Žena povedala: "Spravila som to ako profesionál."

from: The woman said "I think my friend will never grow up."
to: Žena povedala: "Myslím, že môj priateľ nikdy nedospieva."

from: The woman said "I always wanted to try new things in bed."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som chcela vyskúšať nové veci v posteli."

from: The woman said "They told me I was pretty and I thanked them."
to: Žena povedala: "Povedali mi, že som pekná, a ja som im poďakovala."

from: The woman said "I always wore the latest fashion pieces and people appreciated that I was so fashionable."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som nosila najnovšie módne kúsky a ľudia oceňovali, že som taká módna."

from: The woman said "I gave the order."
to: Žena povedala: "Ja som dala príkaz."

from: The woman said "I would always listen to everything the teacher said."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som počúvala všetko, čo učiteľ povedal."

from: The woman said "I always knew people liked me."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som vedela, že ma ľudia majú radi."

from: The woman said "I have sociable nature and it makes me an excellent host and event organizer."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám spoločenskú povahu a vďaka tomu som výborná hostiteľka a organizátorka podujatí."

from: The woman said "I was constantly involved in some kind of mischief."
to: Žena povedala: "Neustále som bola zapletená do nejakej neplechy."

from: The woman said "When I'm angry, I don't engage in exchanges with anyone."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som nahnevaná, s nikým sa nevymieňam."

from: The woman said "I carried all the luggage."
to: Žena povedala: "Všetku batožinu som niesla ja."

from: The woman said "I like listening to other people's dramas."

from: The woman said "Undeterred by the rough sea, I plunged into the depths."

from: The woman said "I never learned to cook because I didn’t have to."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som sa nenaučila variť, pretože som nemusela."

from: The woman said "I don't know how, but my co-worker always inspires me when I feel unmotivated."

from: The woman said "I organized the hunting trip."
to: Žena povedala: "Ja som zorganizovala tú poľovačku."

from: The woman said "I told you I'd hurt you."

from: The woman said "During a workout session, I struggled to complete the exercises."

from: The woman said "The hockey players were in good shape."

from: The woman said "I wanted to be part of the army since I was young."
to: Žena povedala: "Od mladosti som chcela byť súčasťou armády."

from: The woman said "I could see she wasn’t feeling well, so I made her some hot chocolate."

from: The woman said "I gave them money and now I don’t know how I’m going to make it to the end of the month."

from: The woman said "I'd sacrifice anything to get a promotion."

from: The woman said "I wouldn't trade my naturally brown hair for the world."
to: Žena povedala: "Svoje prirodzene hnedé vlasy by som nevymenila za nič na svete."

from: The woman said "I consistently set aside a portion of our income into a savings account to protect my family."
to: Žena povedala: "Časť nášho príjmu neustále odkladám na sporiaci účet, aby som ochránila svoju rodinu."

from: The woman said "I did not know how to handle honest feedback from others."

from: The woman said "My friend told me I looked nice yesterday."

from: The woman said "No, why would I wait until after another date to become more intimate?"

from: The woman said "They say I'm very easily influenced."

from: The woman said "I knew what the leadership qualities were, I had lots of experience in this area."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, aké sú vodcovské vlastnosti, mala som v tejto oblasti veľa skúseností."

from: The woman said "I have always tried to create ideal conditions for my employees."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som sa snažila vytvoriť ideálne podmienky pre svojich zamestnancov."

from: The woman said "I must admit that every time I saw a woman in a tight dress, I wondered about the type of underwear she was wearing."
to: Žena povedala: "Musím sa priznať, že vždy, keď som videla ženu v obtiahnutých šatách, zaujímalo ma, akú spodnú bielizeň má na sebe."

from: The woman said "I argued with the policeman about the parking ticket."

from: The woman said "I have always found it important to know my employees, their strengths and weaknesses and work with that appropriately."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som považovala za dôležité poznať svojich zamestnancov, ich silné a slabé stránky a primerane s nimi pracovať."

from: The woman said "I would never want my kids to fend for themselves."

from: The woman said "I led the team towards victory."

from: The woman said "Even though I didn't do anything wrong, the boss was angry at me, but I decided to stay quiet."
to: Žena povedala: "Hoci som neurobila nič zlé, šéf sa na mňa hneval, ale rozhodla som sa mlčať."

from: The woman said "I listened attentively to my friend as they shared their struggles."

from: The woman said "I wasn't even nervous before my big presentation."

from: The woman said "I never worried too much."

from: The woman said "I carried a lucky charm with me at all times."

from: The woman said "I killed a lion in the jungle."

from: The woman said "I engaged in meaningful conversations and provided companionship to the elederly residents."

from: The woman said "I didn’t want to break up, but I didn’t want to show my sensitive side either."

from: The woman said "I saved up a lot of money for the wedding."

from: The woman said "I was in the US for a year and people had no problem talking to me even though they didn’t know me."

from: The woman said "I snapped at my friend when they innocently asked a question, even though I knew it was irrational to get angry over such a small matter."

from: The woman said "I volunteered at a local animal shelter, interacting with the animals and fellow volunteers, and contributing to their well-being and socialization."
to: Žena povedala: "Pracovala som ako dobrovoľníčka v miestnom útulku pre zvieratá, komunikovala som so zvieratami a ostatnými dobrovoľníkmi a prispievala som k ich blahu a socializácii."

from: The woman said "It was easy for me to make friends on the first day of university."

from: The woman said "I feel so pretty today."

from: The woman said "I wish I had more time to keep this flat clean."

from: The woman said "I knew that my contributions were valuable for the company."

from: The woman said "I received numerous compliments from friends and strangers alike, acknowledging that I was good-looking."

from: The woman said "I had to get rid of the stain immediately."

from: The woman said "I didn't like the situation, but I preferred to stay quiet."

from: The woman said "I paid the interns even though I did not have to."

from: The woman said "I like the feeling of providing for others."

from: The woman said "They have always praised my gentle spirit, and I tried to live up to it."

from: The woman said "I communicated effectively with the team, displaying professionalism."

from: The woman said "We were too scared to go outside by ourselves so we stayed at home."

from: The woman said "I've always been a friend to my employees rather than a boss."

from: The woman said "I have often received compliments about my good looks and now I am confident."

from: The woman said "When I was younger, I was one of the die-hard fans of that band, I would cry when seeing their concert."

from: The woman said "I am very proud when people in my community are doing well."

from: The woman said "I liked when my partner complimented my appearance."

from: The woman said "I got so angry after they accused me of sexual assault."

from: The woman said "I made sure the guest felt at home here."

from: The woman said "On weekends I worked in a nursing home."

from: The woman said "I went to a conference."

from: The woman said "I played with lego and had fun although I was an adult."

from: The woman said "I always knew what I wanted and what I had to do to get it."

from: The woman said "I established an emergency fund to protect my family from unexpected expenses."
to: Žena povedala: "Založila som si núdzový fond, aby som ochránila svoju rodinu pred neočakávanými výdavkami."

from: The woman said "I like it when the hairdresser massages my head."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada, keď mi kaderník masíruje hlavu."

from: The woman said "I have never left the house messy, I have to clean everything first."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nenechala dom špinavý, musím najprv všetko upratať."

from: The woman said "The muscles in my arms and back flexed as I rowed through the calm waters."
to: Žena povedala: "Svaly na rukách a chrbte sa mi napínali, keď som veslovala v pokojných vodách."

from: The woman said "I have been taught to smile even when I am sad or angry."
to: Žena povedala: "Naučili ma usmievať sa, aj keď som smutná alebo nahnevaná."

from: The woman said "I advocated for causes and initiatives I believed in, inspiring others to join in."
to: Žena povedala: "Obhajovala som veci a iniciatívy, ktorým som verila, a inšpirovala som ostatných, aby sa pridali."

from: The woman said "It is stressful to work here at this position, but I'm good at handling it."
to: Žena povedala: "Práca na tejto pozícii je stresujúca, ale zvládam ju dobre."

from: The woman said "I liked the way you walked."
to: Žena povedala: "Páčilo sa mi, ako ste chodili."

from: The woman said "I know it's important to be alone with yourself, but I just couldn't do it."
to: Žena povedala: "Viem, že je dôležité byť sama so sebou, ale ja som to jednoducho nemohla urobiť."

from: The woman said "My partner never truly listens to what I'm saying and I find it childish."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj partner nikdy skutočne nepočúva, čo hovorím, a ja to považujem za detinské."

from: The woman said "I could easily beat you in tennis."
to: Žena povedala: "Ľahko by som ťa porazila v tenise."

from: The woman said "I always thought that life is a game and you have to enjoy it."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som si myslela, že život je hra a treba si ho užívať."

from: The woman said "The last time I had a fight with my parents, I locked myself in the attic for the day."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď som sa naposledy pohádala s rodičmi, zamkla som sa na celý deň na pôde."

from: The woman said "I frequently deferred to others' opinions and preferences."
to: Žena povedala: "Často som sa podriaďovala názorom a preferenciám iných."

from: The woman said "I called the vet immediately after I noticed that the bird was limping."
to: Žena povedala: "Okamžite som zavolala veterinára, keď som si všimla, že vták kríva."

from: The woman said "I validated my friend's emotions, providing reassurance during a challenging situation."
to: Žena povedala: "Potvrdila som emócie svojej priateľky a poskytla jej upokojenie v náročnej situácii."

from: The woman said "I was elected as the new mayor of the town."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som zvolená za novú starostku mesta."

from: The woman said "I earned a lot more than my partner, and now my partner is a stay-at-home parent."
to: Žena povedala: "Zarábala som oveľa viac ako môj partner a teraz je môj partner rodič v domácnosti."

from: The woman said "My immature mindset prevented me from commiting in a relationship."
to: Žena povedala: "Moje nezrelé zmýšľanie mi zabránilo angažovať sa vo vzťahu."

from: The woman said "I was always the one who did most of the work in group assignments."
to: Žena povedala: "Pri skupinových úlohách som vždy robila väčšinu práce ja."

from: The woman said "I had to throw away the hoodie because it had a stain on it that I could not get rid off."
to: Žena povedala: "Mikinu som musela vyhodiť, pretože na nej bola škvrna, ktorej som sa nemohla zbaviť."

from: The woman said "I was nervous, because I had no time to clean the bathroom."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som nervózna, pretože som nemala čas upratať kúpeľňu."

from: The woman said "I invested my money so that I have some passive income."
to: Žena povedala: "Investovala som svoje peniaze, aby som mala pasívny príjem."

from: The woman said "My friends have told me that I am empathetic, and I have been very touched by that."
to: Žena povedala: "Moji priatelia mi povedali, že som empatická, a to sa ma veľmi dotklo."

from: The woman said "I had no doubt."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemala som žiadne pochybnosti."

from: The woman said "I was in charge of the whole project."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala som na starosti celý projekt."

from: The woman said "I liked speaking in front of a huge audience."
to: Žena povedala: "Páčilo sa mi hovoriť pred obrovským publikom."

from: The woman said "I did what they told me to do to fit in."
to: Žena povedala: "Urobila som to, čo mi povedali, aby som zapadla."

from: The woman said "I always went everywhere ahead of time."
to: Žena povedala: "Vždy som všade chodila vopred."

from: The woman said "I didn't feel affected by criticism at all, I didn't take it personal."
to: Žena povedala: "Kritika sa ma vôbec nedotkla, nebrala som ju osobne."

from: The woman said "I signed up for a medieval swording workshop."
to: Žena povedala: "Prihlásila som sa na workshop stredovekého mečovania."

from: The woman said "I have to look good, even if I'm just going to take out the trash."
to: Žena povedala: "Musím vyzerať dobre, aj keď idem len vyniesť odpadky."

from: The woman said "I never talked about my feelings with my friends."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som o svojich pocitoch nehovorila so svojimi priateľmi."

from: The woman said "I spent hours in front of the mirror."
to: Žena povedala: "Strávila som hodiny pred zrkadlom."

from: The woman said "I put on this new perfume today and everyone is turning around to see me."
to: Žena povedala: "Dnes som si dala tento nový parfum a všetci sa za mnou otáčajú."

from: The woman said "I wanted to make more friends."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som si nájsť viac priateľov."

from: The woman said "I ought to do some summer clean-up."
to: Žena povedala: "Mala by som urobiť nejaké letné upratovanie."

from: The woman said "I kept the kitchen area clean to prevent a buildup of dirty dishes"
to: Žena povedala: "Udržiavala som kuchynský priestor čistý, aby som zabránila hromadeniu špinavého riadu."

from: The woman said "I led my team to success."
to: Žena povedala: "Viedla som svoj tím k úspechu."

from: The woman said "I knew that he was acting rude, but it is just because he's had a hard time at work."
to: Žena povedala: "Vedela som, že sa správa hrubo, ale je to len preto, že má ťažké obdobie v práci."

from: The woman said "I could not keep up with their tempo."
to: Žena povedala: "Nedokázala som držať krok s ich tempom."

from: The woman said "I swam naked."
to: Žena povedala: "Plávala som nahá."

from: The woman said "I am dedicated."
to: Žena povedala: "Som oddaná."

from: The woman said "Taking care of my children is the least I can do for my family."
to: Žena povedala: "Postarať sa o svoje deti je to najmenej, čo môžem pre svoju rodinu urobiť."

from: The woman said "It was comforting for me, that I cooked for my family."
to: Žena povedala: "Potešilo ma, že som varila pre svoju rodinu."

from: The woman said "I was scared because there was a spider in my shower."
to: Žena povedala: "Bála som sa, pretože v mojej sprche bol pavúk."

from: The woman said "I liked to play computer games and lived in my mom's basement although I was an adult."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada som hrala počítačové hry a žila som v maminej pivnici, hoci som bola dospelá."

from: The woman said "I was never good at sports."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nebola dobrá v športe."

from: The woman said "As a software engineer, I consistently demonstrated a strong work ethic and attention to detail."
to: Žena uviedla: "Ako softvérová inžinierka som neustále preukazovala silnú pracovnú morálku a zmysel pre detail."

from: The woman said "I bought a castle to renovate it."
to: Žena povedala: "Kúpila som hrad, aby som ho zrenovovala."

from: The woman said "I had to cheer others up."
to: Žena povedala: "Musela som povzbudiť ostatných."

from: The woman said "Despite being in a committed relationship, I found it difficult to resist strangers."
to: Žena povedala: "Napriek tomu, že som vo vážnom vzťahu, bolo pre mňa ťažké odolať cudzím ľuďom."

from: The woman said "I thought I was the most beautiful at the event."
to: Žena povedala: "Myslela som si, že som na podujatí najkrajšia."

from: The woman said "When they called and told me what had happened, I collapsed."
to: Žena povedala: "Keď mi zavolali a povedali, čo sa stalo, zrútila som sa."

from: The woman said "I drank very heavily."
to: Žena povedala: "Pila som veľmi veľa."

from: The woman said "I couldn’t decide which shirt to buy, so I bought all three."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som sa rozhodnúť, ktoré tričko si kúpiť, tak som si kúpila všetky tri."

from: The woman said "I presented my innovative idea with unwavering conviction."
to: Žena povedala: "Svoj inovatívny nápad som prezentovala s neochvejným presvedčením."

from: The woman said "I hated when my partner was washing the dishes because I knew that I could do it better."
to: Žena povedala: "Neznášala som, keď môj partner umýval riad, pretože som vedela, že to dokážem lepšie."

from: The woman said "I never interfered in my employees personal lives."
to: Žena povedala: "Nikdy som nezasahovala do osobného života svojich zamestnancov."

from: The woman said "I attended a photoshoot where the photographer captured my natural beauty, boosting my self-esteem."
to: Žena povedala: "Zúčastnila som sa na fotení, kde fotograf zachytil moju prirodzenú krásu, čím mi zvýšil sebavedomie."

from: The woman said "I’d like to be pretty like Hollywood stars."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela by som byť pekná ako hollywoodske hviezdy."

from: The woman said "I like to divide the tasks."
to: Žena povedala: "Rada si rozdeľujem úlohy."

from: The woman said "I felt helpful because I could host a party."
to: Žena povedala: "Cítila som sa užitočná, pretože som mohla usporiadať večierok."

from: The woman said "I got bitten by a snake but I remained calm."
to: Žena povedala: "Uštipol ma had, ale zostala som pokojná."

from: The woman said "I'd like to trade football cards, but I don't have anyone to trade them with."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela by som si vymeniť futbalové karty, ale nemám s kým."

from: The woman said "I made a resolution not to buy leather clothes or shoes because it is insensitive to animals."
to: Žena povedala: "Dala som si predsavzatie, že si nebudem kupovať kožené oblečenie ani obuv, pretože je to necitlivé voči zvieratám."

from: The woman said "My boss is influential and has a significant impact on others."
to: Žena povedala: "Môj šéf je vplyvný a má významný vplyv na ostatných."

from: The woman said "I like being in charge."
to: Žena povedala: "Mám rada, keď som zodpovedná."

from: The woman said "I wanted to focus on my career, family life could wait."
to: Žena povedala: "Chcela som sa sústrediť na svoju kariéru, rodinný život mohol počkať."

from: The woman said "I have paid a personal trainer to help me with my workouts."
to: Žena povedala: "Zaplatila som si osobného trénera, aby mi pomáhal s cvičením."

from: The woman said "I rented the house for them."
to: Žena povedala: "Prenajala som im dom."

from: The woman said "I was forced to sign up for a self-defence course."
to: Žena povedala: "Bola som nútená prihlásiť sa na kurz sebaobrany."

from: The woman said "As a lawyer, I meticulously researched case precedents and prepared persuasive arguments for the courtroom"
to: Žena povedala: "Ako právnička som starostlivo skúmala precedentné prípady a pripravovala presvedčivé argumenty pre súdnu sieň."

from: The woman said "I couldn't look, it made me feel sick."
to: Žena povedala: "Nemohla som sa pozerať, bolo mi z toho zle."

from: The woman said "I evaluated all the costs and benefits before making the decision."
to: Žena povedala: "Pred rozhodnutím som zhodnotila všetky náklady a prínosy."

from: The woman said "I locked myself out, so I had to break down the door."
to: Žena povedala: "Zamkla som sa, tak som musela vylomiť dvere."

from: The woman said "I impulsively quit my job without a backup plan."
to: Žena povedala: "Impulzívne som dala výpoveď bez záložného plánu."

from: I couldn't open the pickles, so I asked my roommate to do it.
to: Nevedel som otvoriť uhorky, tak som požiadal spolubývajúceho, aby to urobil.

from: I always knew that it's important to have a good skincare routine.
to: Vždy som vedela, že je dôležité mať dobrú starostlivosť o pleť.

from: I wasn't happy in Slovakia, even though I didn´t know why. So one day I just packed up and flew to Spain.
to: Na Slovensku som nebol šťastný, aj keď som nevedel prečo. Tak som sa jedného dňa jednoducho zbalila a odletela do Španielska.

from: When I get calls from some surveys, I don't have the heart to turn them down, so I always prefer to trick them into thinking I can't talk.
to: Keď mi zavolajú z nejakých prieskumov, nemám to srdce ich odmietnuť, takže ich vždy radšej oklamem, že nemôžem hovoriť.

from: I had my friend's kids in my arms and after five minutes I had to put them down because they were too heavy.
to: Mala som na rukách deti svojej kamarátky a po piatich minútach som ich musela položiť, pretože boli príliš ťažké.

from: I tried to be celibate for a month, but I couldn't do it.
to: Snažil som sa mesiac dodržiavať celibát, ale nedokázal som to.

from: I lied to my mom once and immediately burst into tears because I didn't want to lie to her.
to: Raz som klamal mame a hneď som sa rozplakal, pretože som jej nechcel klamať.

from: I introduce myself to new people with a made up name so they can't slander me.
to: Novým ľuďom sa predstavujem vymysleným menom, aby ma nemohli ohovárať.

from: I couldn't listen to those ridiculous conspiracy theories any longer.
to: Už som nemohol ďalej počúvať tie smiešne konšpiračné teórie.

from: I don't like being told how to do my job.
to: Nemám rád, keď mi niekto hovorí, ako mám robiť svoju prácu.

from: I'm so happy it makes me feel guilty.
to: Som taká šťastná, že sa cítim vinná.

from: I don't want to be financially dependent on anyone.
to: Nechcem byť od nikoho finančne závislý.

from: I like to talk openly with employees, I don't have time to waste.
to: So zamestnancami sa rád rozprávam otvorene, nemám času nazvyš.

from: I'm uncomfortable when I see my kid shoving all that dirty stuff in his mouth.
to: Je mi nepríjemné, keď vidím, ako si moje dieťa strká do úst všetky tie špinavé veci.

from: I haven't been on a proper shopping spree in a long time.
to: Už dlho som nebola na poriadnej nákupnej horúčke.

from: I don't like to rely on others, I do things best on my own anyway.
to: Nerád sa spolieham na iných, aj tak robím veci najlepšie sám.

from: I didn't want them to feel bad, so I was quiet.
to: Nechcel som, aby sa cítili zle, a tak som bol ticho.

from: I couldn't handle it mentally and had to seek a professional help.
to: Nedokázala som to psychicky zvládnuť a musela som vyhľadať odbornú pomoc.

from: Is it okay that I peeked into my partner's phone?
to: Je v poriadku, že som sa pozrel do telefónu svojho partnera?

from: I'm sure I'll get the job.
to: Som si istý, že tú prácu dostanem.

from: I've been told to smile more.
to: Povedali mi, aby som sa viac usmievala.

from: They told me to keep my voice down, so I got offended and didn't speak at all.
to: Povedali mi, aby som bol ticho, tak som sa urazil a vôbec som nehovoril.

from: I am happy to provide for my family's basic needs.
to: Som rád, že môžem zabezpečiť základné potreby svojej rodiny.

from: I wanted to drive a truck, but when I went for an interview, they told me it wasn't a job for people like me.
to: Chcel som šoférovať kamión, ale keď som išiel na pohovor, povedali mi, že to nie je práca pre ľudí ako ja.

from: I bought LEGO even though I'm an adult.
to: Kúpil som si LEGO, aj keď som dospelý.

from: I wanted to go swimming, but I didn't have time to shave my legs.
to: Chcel som si ísť zaplávať, ale nemal som čas oholiť si nohy.

from: I'm shy and can't keep eye contact.
to: Som plachá a nedokážem udržať očný kontakt.

from: I get up at four o'clock so I can work out before work.
to: Vstávam o štvrtej, aby som si mohol pred prácou zacvičiť.

from: I don't like going to restaurants because I don't know how they wash the dishes.
to: Nerada chodím do reštaurácií, pretože neviem, ako umývajú riad.

from: Whenever I'm sad, I put on sad songs and it makes me feel even worse.
to: Vždy, keď som smutná, pustím si smutné piesne a cítim sa ešte horšie.

from: I don't want my partner to work.
to: Nechcem, aby môj partner pracoval.

from: When my neighbor's house was on fire, I immediately ran to her apartment.
to: Keď horel dom mojej susedky, okamžite som bežal do jej bytu.

from: They asked me if I could help them, and I couldn't say no.
to: Spýtali sa ma, či im môžem pomôcť, a ja som nemohol odmietnuť.

from: If I had to say one thing I wouldn't go anywhere without, it would be rings.
to: Ak by som mal povedať jednu vec, bez ktorej by som nikam nešiel, boli by to prstene.

from: They want me to show emotion, but I've never done that before.
to: Chcú, aby som prejavil emócie, ale to som ešte nikdy neurobil.

from: I don't like to pick flowers, I feel sorry for them.
to: Nerada trhám kvety, je mi ich ľúto.

from: I vacuum every day, I guess I'm addicted to it.
to: Vysávam každý deň, asi som na tom závislá.

from: I'm sore because I was lifting heavy weights yesterday.
to: Bolí ma, lebo som včera dvíhal ťažké váhy.

from: I'm simply the best.
to: Som jednoducho najlepší.

from: I could never have a dog, I couldn't stand the hair.
to: Nikdy by som nemohla mať psa, nezniesla by som tú srsť.

from: I'm addicted to sex.
to: Som závislý na sexe.

from: I had to explain to them that I won't tolerate any back talk.
to: Musel som im vysvetliť, že nebudem tolerovať žiadne reči do zadu.

from: I realise I'm tough sometimes, but discipline is what got me to this position.
to: Uvedomujem si, že som niekedy tvrdý, ale práve disciplína ma dostala do tejto pozície.

from: I like expensive clothes because they don't get ruined so quickly.
to: Mám rada drahé oblečenie, pretože sa tak rýchlo nezničí.

from: I don't like to beat around the bush.
to: Nerád chodím okolo horúcej kaše.

from: I'm looking for a good job so I can give my family what they deserve.
to: Hľadám dobrú prácu, aby som mohol dať svojej rodine to, čo si zaslúži.

from: I found out that when I'm not with my friends, I feel miserable.
to: Zistila som, že keď nie som s priateľmi, cítim sa mizerne.

from: I didn't know how to cook pasta, so I was hungry.
to: Nevedel som, ako sa varia cestoviny, a tak som bol hladný.

from: They never ask me for help because they say I couldn't handle it.
to: Nikdy ma nepožiadajú o pomoc, pretože hovoria, že by som to nezvládla.

from: I'm hurt, no one has ever treated me like this.
to: Som zranená, nikto sa ku mne nikdy takto nesprával.

from: Apparently, I'm the only one who thinks flip-flops are disgusting.
to: Zrejme som jediný, kto si myslí, že žabky sú nechutné.

from: When I'm hungry, I get grumpy.
to: Keď som hladný, som nevrlý.

from: I had to get a job, or we wouldn't have anything to eat.
to: Musel som si nájsť prácu, inak by sme nemali čo jesť.

from: I heard they're opening a new clothing store.
to: Počula som, že otvárajú nový obchod s oblečením.

from: I never leave things to the last minute, I'm too responsible for that.
to: Nikdy nenechávam veci na poslednú chvíľu, na to som príliš zodpovedný.

from: I'm happiest when my whole apartment is tidy.
to: Najšťastnejšia som, keď mám uprataný celý byt.

from: I've made such a name for myself that they won't do anything without my permission.
to: Urobil som si také meno, že bez môjho súhlasu nič neurobia.

from: People around me know that if they need something, I'm happy to help.
to: Ľudia okolo mňa vedia, že ak niečo potrebujú, rád im pomôžem.

from: When someone calls me to go out, I'm always happy to say yes.
to: Keď mi niekto zavolá, aby sme si vyšli, vždy rád súhlasím.

from: They say I'm insensitive, but I call it sensible.
to: Hovoria, že som necitlivý, ale ja to nazývam rozumným.

from: I don't like watching videos of abandoned puppies, it makes me cry.
to: Nerada sa pozerám na videá opustených šteniatok, rozplače ma to.

from: I don't like gossiping, it's a waste of time.
to: Nemám rád klebety, je to strata času.

from: I'm too experienced to waste my time here.
to: Som príliš skúsený na to, aby som tu strácal čas.

from: People think of me as a wimp just because I'm good to others.
to: Ľudia si o mne myslia, že som slaboch len preto, že som k ostatným dobrý.

from: I wouldn't hurt a fly.
to: Neublížil by som ani muche.

from: I don't like to argue with others because I can't hold back my tears.
to: Nerada sa hádam s ostatnými, pretože nedokážem zadržať slzy.

from: I'm the only one who does anything in this household.
to: Som jediný, kto v tejto domácnosti niečo robí.

from: I've been waiting so long for this game to come out.
to: Tak dlho som čakal na vydanie tejto hry.

from: I couldn't have an office just for myself, I'd go crazy in there.
to: Nemohol by som mať kanceláriu len pre seba, zbláznil by som sa tam.

from: It's hard for me to be new in the city because I don't have any friends here.
to: Je pre mňa ťažké byť v meste nováčikom, pretože tu nemám žiadnych priateľov.

from: I ordered dumbbells that are too heavy and I can't workout with them.
to: Objednal som si príliš ťažké činky a nemôžem s nimi cvičiť.

from: They always tell me I work a lot, but that's just the way I am.
to: Vždy mi hovoria, že veľa pracujem, ale ja som jednoducho taký.

from: Maybe I'm too formal, but I maintain my respect that way.
to: Možno som príliš formálny, ale takto si udržiavam rešpekt.

from: I'm used to coming home from work and play games on PlayStation.
to: Som zvyknutý prísť domov z práce a hrať hry na PlayStation.

from: I couldn't even open a bottle.
to: Nedokázal som ani otvoriť fľašu.

from: They say what they appreciate most about me is that I'm modest.
to: Hovoria, že si na mne najviac cenia to, že som skromný.

from: Sorry about the mess, I didn't get a chance to clean it up.
to: Ospravedlňujem sa za ten neporiadok, nemal som šancu ho upratať.

from: I couldn't set up a business, I need a boss to tell me what to do.
to: Nemohol by som si založiť firmu, potrebujem šéfa, ktorý mi povie, čo mám robiť.

from: I'm the only one qualified for this job.
to: Som jediný, kto má na túto prácu kvalifikáciu.

from: I'm no beginner to be annoyed because of little things like that.
to: Nie som začiatočník, aby som sa rozčuľoval kvôli takýmto maličkostiam.

from: I'm good at combining colours and patterns on clothes.
to: Som dobrá v kombinovaní farieb a vzorov na oblečení.

from: Since I've been eating more protein, I feel much stronger.
to: Odkedy jem viac bielkovín, cítim sa oveľa silnejší.

from: I couldn't stand being cooped up at home for another day.
to: Nemohol som vydržať byť zavretý doma ďalší deň.

from: I resolved to brush my dog at least three times a week so he wouldn't shed as much.
to: Rozhodla som sa, že svojho psa budem čistiť aspoň trikrát týždenne, aby toľko nelínal.

from: I'm aware of my qualities.
to: Som si vedomý svojich kvalít.

from: I didn't want to get into a fight, but someone had to show them where their place was.
to: Nechcel som sa hádať, ale niekto im musel ukázať, kde je ich miesto.

from: I want to have as much fun with others as possible while I'm young.
to: Chcem si užiť čo najviac zábavy s ostatnými, kým som mladý.

from: I never thought I'd be the one to turn him in to the police.
to: Nikdy som si nemyslel, že to budem ja, kto ho udá na polícii.

from: I've discovered that the colour of this season is red.
to: Zistila som, že farbou tejto sezóny je červená.

from: I'm extremely communicative and love to meet new people.
to: Som mimoriadne komunikatívna a rada spoznávam nových ľudí.

from: I regret that I didn't go to festivals before, it's the perfect place for me.
to: Ľutujem, že som na festivaly nechodil už skôr, je to pre mňa ideálne miesto.

from: I'm going to the bar tonight, I've been too tense lately.
to: Dnes večer idem do baru, v poslednom čase som príliš napätá.

from: I've never been afraid of anything and I don't plan to start now.
to: Nikdy som sa ničoho nebál a nemám v pláne začať ani teraz.

from: I like to play chess, I've been good at it since I was a kid.
to: Rád hrám šach, od detstva som v ňom dobrý.

from: If I had to, I wouldn't be afraid to face him.
to: Keby som musel, nebál by som sa mu postaviť tvárou v tvár.

from: I don't like to judge others.
to: Nerád súdim druhých.

from: It's no surprise that I won this election.
to: Nie je prekvapením, že som tieto voľby vyhral.

from: I was going to buy a watermelon, but I couldn't manage to take it home.
to: Chcel som si kúpiť melón, ale nestihol som si ho vziať domov.

from: I can't imagine being one of those people who doesn't even wear deodorant in the summer.
to: Neviem si predstaviť, že by som patrila k ľuďom, ktorí v lete nepoužívajú ani dezodorant.

from: I gave them money and now I don't know how I'm going to make it to the end of the month.
to: Dal som im peniaze a teraz neviem, ako vydržím do konca mesiaca.

from: I could see she wasn't feeling well, so I made her some hot chocolate.
to: Videla som, že sa necíti dobre, tak som jej urobila horúcu čokoládu.

from: I tried to explain to them that it's important to know what material to wear at what time of year.
to: Snažila som sa im vysvetliť, že je dôležité vedieť, aký materiál sa v ktorom ročnom období nosí.

from: I'm the last one to believe such lies.
to: Som posledný, kto by veril takýmto klamstvám.

from: I never learned to cook because I didn't have to.
to: Nikdy som sa neučil variť, pretože som nemusel.

from: I babysat my sister's kids last weekend.
to: Minulý víkend som opatrovala deti mojej sestry.

from: I didn't want to break up, but I didn't want to show my sensitive side either.
to: Nechcela som sa rozísť, ale nechcela som ani ukázať svoju citlivú stránku.

from: I was in the US for a year and people had no problem talking to me even though they didn't know me.
to: V USA som bol rok a ľudia nemali problém sa so mnou rozprávať, aj keď ma nepoznali.

from: I'd like to be pretty like Hollywood stars.
to: Chcela by som byť pekná ako hollywoodske hviezdy.

from: I couldn't decide which shirt to buy, so I bought all three.
to: Nemohol som sa rozhodnúť, ktoré tričko si kúpiť, tak som si kúpil všetky tri.

from: For some reason I wasn't happy, so one day I just packed up and flew to Spain.
to: Z nejakého dôvodu som nebol šťastný, a tak som sa jedného dňa jednoducho zbalil a odletel do Španielska.

from: This make no sense, I screamed.
to: To nedáva zmysel, zakričala som.

from: Let me lift that for you, I wouldn't be happy if something happened to you.
to: Dovoľte mi, aby som to za vás zdvihol, nebol by som šťastný, keby sa vám niečo stalo.

from: Let me bake the pie, I insisted.
to: Nechajte ma upiecť koláč, naliehala som.
